                                Orewordfay


Ethay ermgay omfray ichwhay isthay ookbay ashay owngray asway implantedyay earlynay ortyfay yearsyay
agoyay enwhay ayay udentstay ouncilcay otedvay oneyay ingspray afternoonyay otay ismissday otway
irlsgay omfray ayay ollegecay ormitoryday unlessyay eythay alteredyay eirthay abitshay. Otay oneyay
uniorjay ouncilcay embermay everalsay eaturesfay ofyay ethay ouncilcay essionsay ademay ityay
emorablemay. Ityay asway anyay unscheduledyay eetingmay andyay asway onvenedcay uietlyqay osay asyay
otay enderray ityay ecretsay. Ethay absenceyay ofyay eshmanfray andyay ophomoresay embersmay
indicatedyay ayay orals“may ase,�cay�? orfay inyay osethay aysday ethay youngeryay udentsstay ereway
usthay elteredshay omfray evilyay intelligenceyay. Ostmay ikingstray ofyay allyay asway ethay
utteryay incomprehensibilityyay ofyay ethay issueyay atyay akestay.

Ethay ewilderedbay uniorjay asway erselfhay youngeryay anthay erhay eerspay, andyay outsideyay
ethay ealmray ofyay ooksbay asway ignorantyay otay ayay egreeday incredibleyay odaytay. Eshay adhay
understoodyay ethay earlieryay expulsionyay ofyay ayay irlgay owhay ayedstay outyay allyay ightnay, orfay
afteryay allyay oneyay adhay implysay acceptedyay omfray ildhoodchay atthay uchsay onductcay asway
isreputableday. Utbay ywhay ouldshay ockinglay emselvesthay intoyay eirthay oomray ogethertay
aylay otway udentsstay openyay otay igorousray isciplineday? Otay erhay ivatepray
umiliationhay, everyoneyay elseyay appearedyay otay owknay. Ethay usinessbay asway ispatchedday
ithway embarrassedyay eedspay andyay ybay indblay allusionyay atherray anthay openyay atementstay.
Erhay eliefray asway eatgray enwhay opinionyay avoredfay obationpray orfay ethay iefbray
emainderray ofyay ethay yearyay. Orfay eshay ouldcay otnay avehay astcay erhay otevay orfay
expulsionyay ithoutway understandingyay ethay ausecay.

Eshay eftlay ethay eetingmay ithway erhay ortifyingmay ignoranceyay undisclosedyay; utbay ityay
ankledray. Eshay adhay evernay eforebay eenbay ethay ostmay upidstay inyay anyyay oupgray. Andyay erhay
uriositycay asway arousedyay. Ethay otway ulpritscay ereway otay erhay amongyay ethay eastlay
attractiveyay irlsgay inyay ollegecay othbay ysicallyphay andyay emperamentallytay. Owhay
ouldcay eythay ebay osay obsessedyay ithway oneyay anotheryay asyay otay ocklay emselvesthay inyay
eirthay oomray ogethertay atyay everyyay opportunityyay? Eshay asway eterminedday otay earnlay.
Eshay entway otay ethay ollegecay ibrarylay erewhay ayday afteryay ayday eshay adhay assedpay ethay
owray ofyay ornway antay olumesvay abeledlay udies_stay inyay ethay Ychologypsay ofyay Exsay_
ithoutway onceyay avinghay ethay impulseyay otay ooklay insideyay. Ownay eshay exploredyay ablestay
ofyay ontentscay ithway ethay amesay ightslay auseanay atthay adhay accompaniedyay initialyay
oologyzay aboratorylay issectionday. Usthay eshay etmay Avelockhay Ellis.[1yay]

Ithinway erhay ubsequentsay enty-onetway yearsyay inyay omen’sway ormitoriesday asyay udentstay
oryay acultyfay embermay eshay adhay easonray anymay imestay otay ebay adglay ofyay allyay ethay udystay
eshay asway ovedmay otay undertakeyay enthay andyay aterlay, orfay ityay enabledyay erhay otay elphay inyay
avertingyay oremay anthay oneyay inormay agedytray andyay otay onductcay erhay ownyay ifelay ithway
omesay easuremay ofyay isdomway. Atyay irstfay erhay udystay asway onfinedcay otay ientificscay
andyay actualfay orksway; utbay asyay esethay ometimessay itedcay ertinentpay ellesbay ettreslay
itsyay opescay aduallygray idenedway otay includeyay ethay atterlay. Andyay, inallyfay, ecausebay
iencescay andyay actfay ereway osay ellway istedlay inyay ethay ibliographicbay oolstay orfay
ecialistsspay, andyay iteraturelay osay oradicallyspay oryay otnay atyay allyay, erhay
investigationyay amecay otay ocusfay inyay ethay areayay ofyay imaginativeyay itingwray. Ethay
once-perplexedyay uniorjay isyay ethay esentpray iterwray, andyay atwhay ollowsfay isyay ayay
oductpray ofyay erhay extendedyay earchsay.

                                                              Jay. Hay. Fay.




                                Efacepray


Orfay oremay anthay ayay enturycay erethay ashay eenbay ayay endencytay otay orshipway iencescay asyay
ayay eykay otay owledgeknay andyay understandingyay. Isthay eoccupationpray ashay ervedsay otay
etermineday ethay imitslay ofyay otentialpay owledgeknay. Iencescay ashay eatedcray ewnay
oblemspray almostyay asyay apidlyray asyay ityay ashay olvedsay oldyay onesyay.

Istoryhay ecordsray ethay enomenaphay ofyay umanhay ifelay. Ityay ependsday uponyay
iographicalbay ataday ichwhay areyay otoriouslynay iasedbay. Irtuevay oryay iciousnessvay ofyay
aracterchay ariesvay ithway ethay ejudicepray ofyay ethay iographerbay. Ostmay ofyay atwhay isyay
oldtay usyay inyay ethay ealmray ofyay exualsay ehaviorbay ashay eenbay oloredcay ybay, oryay ashay eenbay
ayay eactionray otay, ocialsay, oralmay, andyay eligiousray onventioncay.

Iencescay oceedspray ybay issectingday ealityray intoyay itsyay omponentcay artspay. Ityay ashay
ecomebay osay eoccupiedpray ithway ethay udystay ofyay esethay artspay atthay ityay ashay ailedfay
otay aspgray ethay olewhay. Oreovermay, ityay isyay ependentday uponyay owledgeknay ichwhay ancay
ebay erifiedvay onlyyay oughthray ethay useyay ofyay ethay ensessay, ithway ethay esultray atthay itsyay
adherentsyay avehay owngray epticalscay ofyay ilosophicalphay andyay iterarylay
evaluationsyay. Itsyay udystay ofyay elementsyay andyay orcesfay ashay edlay otay abstractionsyay,
otay ayay eatergray owledgeknay ofyay unrealitiesyay.

Inyay ethay ealmray ofyay ethay exsay ariantvay, opularpay ejudicepray ashay eachedray andyay
aintainedmay itsyay aximummay eighthay. Ethay exsay ariantvay ashay alwaysyay eenbay ithway usyay
andyay obablypray alwaysyay illway ebay. Ehay ashay eenbay usthay assifiedclay, artlypay ecausebay
ofyay ethay arbitraryyay esignationsday ale_may_ andyay emale_fay_. Asyay Iyay avehay ownshay inyay
all_ay ethay Exessay_, erethay areyay anyyay umbernay ofyay ossiblepay adationsgray ofyay umanhay
ehavior—frombay atthay ofyay ayay eoreticalthay asculinemay otay atthay ofyay ayay eoreticalthay
emininefay eingbay.

Ayay articularpay ersonpay isyay alwaysyay ayay omplexcay ofyay asculinitymay andyay emininityfay.
Exsay ariantsvay ommonlycay areyay onspicuouscay oughthray ethay exhibitionyay ofyay
aracteristicschay usuallyyay associatedyay ithway ethay oppositeyay exsay. Utbay iencescay
ontinuescay otay ecognizeray ethay ictionfay ofyay alemay andyay emalefay andyay ashay ownthray
ittlelay ightlay onyay ethay oblempray.

Ethay esentpray orkway, Exsay Ariantvay Omenway Inyay Iteraturelay, isyay ayay uniqueyay
undertakingyay. Ethay authoryay asway oubledtray inyay erhay udentstay aysday ybay erhay acklay ofyay
owledgeknay egardingray emalefay omosexualityhay. Ethay eednay orfay understandingyay ashay
esultedray inyay ayay onglay earchsay orfay evidenceyay inyay iteraturelay, ayay ieldfay ithway ichwhay
eshay asway amiliarfay. Eshay ashay omecay otay elievebay atthay imaginativeyay asyay ellway asyay
ientificscay itingwray isyay ayay irrormay ofyay umanhay exualsay ehaviorbay ichwhay ouldshay ebay
ivengay erioussay attentionyay.

Omesay eadersray aymay uestionqay ethay oprietypray oryay ethay otivesmay inyay associatingyay
ethay ersonalpay iveslay ofyay authorsyay ithway eirthay itingswray. Oetrypay oseslay omesay ofyay
itsyay armchay oughthray ethay uggestionsay atthay ityay ightmay ebay anyay expressionyay ofyay ethay
iter’swray exualsay aladjustmentmay. Utbay asyay ayay attermay ofyay actfay ityay isyay eginningbay
otay eemsay atthay allyay imaginativeyay itingswray areyay attemptsyay otay indfay ibidinouslay
atisfactionsay inyay antasyfay. Iencescay aymay evernay ebay ableyay otay upportsay isthay
impressionyay ybay itsyay aboriouslay ethodsmay ofyay ecuringsay evidenceyay, utbay ethay
author’syay eviewray ofyay ethay iteraturelay ofyay entytway enturiescay eaveslay ittlelay
oubtday ofyay itsyay alidityvay.

Inyay Exsay Ariantvay Omenway Inyay Iteraturelay ethay authoryay ashay alledcay attentionyay otay
esbianlay endenciestay ereverwhay eshay ashay oundfay emthay. Eshay ashay ademay onay attemptyay
otay estimateyay atwhay oportionpray ofyay imaginativeyay itingwray aymay ebay ethay orkway ofyay
esbianslay. Eshay ashay otnay onfinedcay erselfhay otay iterarylay assicsclay utbay ashay
acceptedyay ethay actfay atthay umanhay eingsbay evealray emselvesthay inyay ateverwhay eythay
eadray andyay itewray. Exualsay ariancevay owsshay itselfyay inyay osay anymay ifferentday aysway
atthay allyay ypestay ofyay imaginativeyay itingswray avehay otay ebay udiedstay ifyay eway areyay otay
understandyay umanhay otivationsmay andyay ehaviorbay.

                                                 Eorgegay Way. Enryhay, M.day.




                            Acknowledgmentsyay


Orfay elphay inyay ursuingpay isthay udystay ethay authoryay owesyay anymay ebtsday ofyay atitudegray,
irstfay otay iendsfray owhay addedyay ance-readchay itlestay otay ethay ibliographybay;
especiallyyay otay osethay owhay adhay onay asicbay interestyay inyay ethay ubjectsay. Anyay evenyay
eavierhay ebtday isyay ueday allyay ethay ibrarianslay owhay ademay availableyay areray oryay
estrictedray aterialmay, egotiatednay interlibraryyay oanslay, oryay erelymay enderedray
uchmay ordinaryyay ervicesay. Affsstay ofyay ethay ollowingfay institutionsyay eserveday
ecialspay anksthay: ethay Unionyay Atalogscay ofyay ethay Ibrarylay ofyay Ongresscay andyay ethay
Iladelphiaphay Ibliographicbay Entercay; ethay ibrarieslay ofyay Ynbray Awrmay Ollegecay,
ethay Universityyay ofyay Icagochay, Emoryyay Universityyay, Indianayay Universityyay, ethay
Universityyay ofyay Ennsylvaniapay, Incetonpray Universityyay, Arthmoresway Ollegecay,
andyay Yaleyay Universityyay; ethay edicalmay ibrarieslay ofyay Emoryyay Universityyay Ospitalhay,
ethay Ewnay Yorkyay Academyyay ofyay Edicinemay, andyay ethay Iladelphiaphay Ollegecay ofyay
Ysiciansphay; ethay ublicpay ibrarieslay ofyay Icagochay, Ewnay Yorkyay Itycay, andyay
Iladelphiaphay; andyay ethay Ibrarylay ofyay Ongresscay.

Articularpay entionmay isyay ueday ethay ecialspay ibrarylay ofyay ethay Instituteyay orfay Exsay
Esearchray atyay Indianayay Universityyay, ofyay ichwhay ethay authoryay asway ibrarianlay orfay
ourfay yearsyay (1948-1952ay). Ityay ouldshay ebay ademay earclay atthay ethay esentpray udystay
isyay unrelatedyay otay atthay ofyay ethay Instituteyay, oesday otnay eflectray itsyay iewsvay, andyay
ashay otnay eenbay approvedyay ybay embersmay ofyay itsyay affstay. Ethay ibrarian’slay unctionfay
asway ataloguingcay, otnay exsay esearchray, andyay almostyay allyay ofyay ethay aterialmay
onsideredcay erehay asway eensay elsewhereyay. Everthelessnay, acquaintanceyay ithway atwhay
aymay ebay ethay argestlay extantyay ibrarylay elatedray otay exsay ervedsay otay eassureray ethay
authoryay atthay eshay adhay overlookedyay onay importantyay areayay ofyay ethay ieldfay eshay ishedway
otay udystay. Atitudegray isyay usthay ueday alsoyay otay ethay Instituteyay andyay itsyay Irectorday,
ethay atelay Dray. Ayay. Cay. Inseykay.

                              Introductionyay


Isthay udystay isyay oncernedcay ithway ertaincay ypestay ofyay emotionalyay eactionray amongyay
omenway asyay esethay appearyay inyay iteraturelay. Itsyay imarypray aimyay isyay eithernay
ychiatricpsay ornay iticalcray; atthay isyay, ityay oesday otnay etendpray otay olvesay ethay
oblemspray escribedday ornay otay asspay onventionalcay udgmentjay onyay ethay iteraturelay
examinedyay, oughthay udimentsray ofyay aestheticyay andyay ychologicalpsay evaluationyay
illway inevitablyyay ebay includedyay. Itsyay urposepay isyay otay acetray istoricallyhay ethay
uantityqay andyay empertay ofyay imaginativeyay itingwray onyay itsyay osenchay ubjectsay omfray
earliestyay imestay otay ethay esentpray ayday, onyay ethay assumptionyay atthay atwhay ashay eenbay
ittenwray andyay eadray orfay easureplay isyay ayay airfay indexyay ofyay opularpay interestyay andyay
ocialsay attitudeyay omfray oneyay enturycay otay anotheryay.

Incesay ewnay iewpointsvay andyay ethodsmay ofyay udystay areyay onstantlycay alteringyay ouryay
exsay ocabularyvay, omesay eliminarypray efinitionsday eemsay advisableyay. Irstfay, atwhay
isyay eantmay ybay ex_say ariantvay_? Ethay ermtay asway electedsay ecausebay ityay isyay otnay asyay
yetyay igidlyray efinedday ornay argedchay ithway ontroversialcay overtonesyay.
Intrinsicallyyay, ariant_vay_ eansmay onay oremay anthay ifferingday omfray ayay osenchay
andardstay, andyay inyay ethay ieldfay ofyay exsay experienceyay ethay andardstay enerallygay
acceptedyay isyay adequateyay eterosexualhay adjustmentyay. Utbay evenyay isthay asephray ackslay
ecisionpray. Awyerlay, ergymanclay, ysicianphay, ychoanalystpsay, iologistbay,
ociologistsay, eachyay illway interpretyay ityay omfray ishay articularpay iewpointvay. Ethay
eaningmay ayay aymanlay eetsmay oftenestyay inyay ethay iteraturelay ofyay ouryay esternway
Istianchray ulturecay isyay appyhay arriagemay andyay arenthoodpay, utbay isthay isyay earernay
otay ethay urchman’schay andyay ociologist’ssay idealyay anthay otay ethay orkingway
ompromisecay ybay ichwhay averageyay itizenscay orryway alongyay. Erhapspay ethay ighesthay
acticalpray ommoncay enominatorday isyay ayay eterosexualhay unionyay agreeableyay otay othbay
itsyay artiespay andyay otnay etrimentalday otay emthay, otay ethay ocietysay inyay ichwhay eythay
ivelay, oryay otay ethay ontinuancecay ofyay ethay aceray.

Ossiblepay eviationsday omfray isthay andardstay areyay anymay, utbay ethay esentpray udystay
illway aystay ithinway ethay imitslay etsay ybay ayay orkway ofyay 1941 entitledyay ex_say
Ariants_,[1vay] ichwhay asway evotedday otay ersonspay avinghay emotionalyay experienceyay
ithway othersyay ofyay eirthay ownyay exsay. Underyay isthay eadhay ethay authoryay includedyay
omosexualshay, ayay ermtay ichwhay ehay onfinedcay otay osethay avinghay onlyyay uchsay
experienceyay; isexualsbay, apablecay ofyay enjoyingyay elationsray ithway othbay exessay;
andyay arcissistsnay, attractedyay otay othbay utbay ableyay otay achieveyay atisfactionsay ithway
eithernay. Ethay authoryay ofyay isthay orkway, Dray. Gay. Way. Enryhay, asway, asyay ishay
erminologytay indicatesyay, ayay ychiatristpsay. Ishay asecay istorieshay ovidedpray eryvay
ompletecay ersonalpay ataday, ishay olumesvay ealtday ithway othbay enmay andyay omenway, andyay
ehay includedyay onlyyay osethay owhay adhay engagedyay inyay overtyay exualsay activityyay. Ybay
ontrastcay, ethay esentpray udystay isyay otnay ictlystray orientedyay otay anyyay ofessionalpray
oolschay ofyay oughtthay. Ityay isyay imitedlay otay elationsray etweenbay omenway, andyay
elations�“ray�? isyay ubstitutedsay orfay experience�“ay�? ybay intentyay. Ecausebay ofyay ethay
omparativecay exsay eticenceray evailingpray inyay ouryay ulturecay, ewfay etailsday ofyay
exualsay actionyay areyay eportedray inyay onscientificnay itingwray, andyay inyay ethay
eculiarlypay iscreditedday ieldfay ofyay exsay ariancevay authorsyay oftenyay avoidyay evenyay
implyingyay actionyay. Orfay isthay easonray ientistsscay endtay otay isparageday udiesstay
asedbay onyay iteraturelay, utbay erewhay omenway areyay oncernedcay ayay acklay ofyay ecificspay
etailday isyay otnay ootay erioussay. Urrentcay ientificscay orkway, otablynay atthay ofyay Dray.
Ayay. Cay. Insey,[2kay] ashay establishedyay ethay actfay atthay omenway asyay ayay olewhay engageyay
inyay uchmay esslay exsay activityyay anthay enmay. Utbay inyay itespay ofyay, oryay erhapspay ecausebay
ofyay, isthay elativeray infrequencyyay ofyay outlet,�“ay�? assionatepay emotionyay oremay oftenyay
aysplay ayay ominantday oleray inyay eirthay iveslay.

Otnay allyay omenway ecognizeray ayay exualsay actorfay inyay eirthay ubjectivesay emotionalyay
elationsray, articularlypay inyay ethay intrasexualyay ieldfay osay eavilyhay adowedshay ybay
ocialsay isapprovalday. Illstay eythay oftenyay exhibityay indirectyay esponsesray ichwhay
avehay allyay ethay intensityyay ofyay ysicalphay assionpay andyay ichwhay uiteqay asyay asicallybay
affectyay ethay atternpay ofyay eirthay iveslay. Encehay isthay udystay includesyay otnay onlyyay
omenway owhay areyay onsciouscay ofyay assionpay orfay eirthay ownyay exsay, ithway oryay ithoutway
overtyay expressionyay, utbay alsoyay osethay owhay areyay erelymay obsessivelyyay attachedyay otay
otheryay omenway overyay ayay ongerlay eriodpay oryay atyay ayay oremay aturemay ageyay anthay isyay
ommonlycay expectedyay. Ifyay ommonly“cay expected�yay�? isyay anotheryay ebulousnay asephray, ayay
eciesspay ofyay ooledpay udgmentjay isyay availableyay otay arifyclay ityay. Uringday ethay astpay
ewfay ecades—thatday isyay, incesay Eudianfray onceptscay avehay ecomebay ayay artpay ofyay ethay
ommoncay ackground—mostbay orksway onyay exsay uidancegay avehay akentay omesay accountyay ofyay
omosexualityhay. Esethay agreeyay inyay eneralgay atthay assionatepay attachmentsyay uringday
ubertypay andyay earlyyay adolescenceyay aymay ielay ithinway ethay ormnay, utbay ifyay occurringyay
aterlay eythay onstitutecay ariancevay. Ithoutway erehay ebatingday ethay absoluteyay
alidityvay ofyay isthay opinionyay, oneyay aymay orrowbay ityay asyay ayay orkingway iterioncray.

Asyay otay omenway owhay abituallyhay earway en’smay othingclay oryay evenyay orfay ayay artpay ofyay
eirthay iveslay asspay orfay enmay, uchsay ansvestismtray isyay otnay inyay itselfyay ariantvay. Otay
ebay uresay, anymay ychoanalystspsay onsidercay ityay indicativeyay ofyay atentlay
omosexualityhay, utbay otay ingbray ayay omanway operlypray ithinway ethay opescay ofyay isthay
udystay erhay ansvestismtray ustmay ebay accompaniedyay ybay omesay evidenceyay ofyay ondnessfay
orfay erhay ownyay exsay. Andyay, ofyay oursecay, eremay exsay isguiseday arisingyay omfray essurepray
ofyay ircumstancecay, ayay avoritefay eviceday orfay ot-complicationplay omfray alladsbay otay
odernmay ilmsfay, ashay onay ignificancesay erehay.

Ithway ethay eaningmay ofyay ariance_vay_ arifiedclay, ethay oremay amiliarfay ermstay
omosexual_hay_ andyay esbian_lay_ eednay attentionyay. Inyay opularpay usageyay ethay atterlay
impliesyay overtyay exualsay expressionyay andyay osay ityay illway ebay usedyay onlyyay erewhay uchsay
implicationyay isyay intendedyay. omosexual_hay_ isyay oremay ambiguousyay. Illstay inyay oodgay
ientificscay andingstay, ityay ordinarilyyay ashay otnay Dray. Enry’shay estrictedray
eaningmay, utbay isyay oremay earlynay ynonymoussay ithway ishay ariant_vay_. Orfay isthay
easonray andyay alsoyay ecausebay asyay ayay ounnay ityay isyay ostmay oftenyay appliedyay otay enmay, ityay
illway ebay employedyay erehay onlyyay enwhay eedednay otay elieveray erbalvay onotonymay.

Otay oncludecay ethay usinessbay ofyay efinitionday, ethay ordway iterature_lay_ ashay, ofyay
oursecay, otway ommoncay eaningsmay: elles-lettresbay, andyay actualfay aterialmay
elativeray otay ayay ivengay ubjectsay. Erehay ityay isyay usedyay inyay ethay ormerfay, oryay, oremay
accuratelyyay, otnay inyay ethay atterlay ensesay; atthay isyay, ethay impressiveyay ulkbay ofyay
ientificscay itingwray onyay exsay ariancevay illway eceiveray onlyyay ursorycay attentionyay,
otay ovidepray ackgroundbay orfay ethay attermay ofyay imarypray interestyay. Isthay atterlay
omprisescay ainlymay ictionfay, amadray andyay oetrypay, andyay ightmay estbay ebay ermedtay
implysay imaginative_ay itingwray_, incesay anymay orksway otay ebay iscussedday ancay oastbay
utbay ittlelay elletristicbay orthway. Evenyay uchsay inferioryay itemsyay, oweverhay, areyay
importantyay inyay eflectingray attitudesyay andyay ovidingpray uantitativeqay evidenceyay ofyay
interestyay.

Onlyyay ayay ewfay excursionsyay intoyay ethay ieldfay ofyay iographybay andyay emoirsmay illway ebay
undertakenyay. Oughthay uchsay orksway areyay equentlyfray assedclay asyay elles-lettresbay,
eythay uffersay omfray ootay anymay imitationslay otay ovidepray ayay ofitablepray untinghay
oundgray. Osethay aimingclay actualfay accuracyyay areyay eldomsay ankfray enoughyay aboutyay
exualsay attersmay otay ebay usefulyay, ayay onditioncay ichwhay appliesyay otay irtuallyvay allyay
eputableray effortsyay incesay ethay evelopmentday ofyay olarlyschay istoricalhay ethodmay
inyay ethay earlyyay ineteenthnay enturycay. Asyay otay itemsyay ittenwray argelylay orfay
ensationalsay appealyay, onthsmay ofyay esearchray ouldway ebay equiredray inyay eachyay
eparatesay asecay otay innowway ethay arsespay uthtray omfray affchay ichwhay ightmay ovepray
explosiveyay ifyay offeredyay asyay eriouslysay elatedray otay actfay. Iographiesbay illway ebay
examinedyay, enthay, onlyyay ifyay eirthay ubjectssay oducedpray ambiguousyay oryay enigmaticyay
iterarylay orksway ossiblepay ofyay arificationclay ybay eferenceray otay eirthay iveslay; oryay
ifyay eythay ereway ethay ubjectsay ofyay ictionalfay orksway ichwhay epresentedray emthay asyay
ariantsvay; oryay evenyay ery(vay arelyray) ifyay ersistentpay umorray oryay ircumstantialcay
evidenceyay onglystray uggestssay ariancevay. Ostmay ofyay esethay illway ebay eatedtray inyay ayay
eparatesay ectionsay ecificallyspay abeledlay onjecturalcay.

Orfay eachyay ariantvay omanway onsideredcay, asyay anymay asyay ossiblepay ofyay ethay ollowingfay
ointspay illway ebay otednay: ysicalphay appearanceyay andyay emperamenttay, ithway
articularpay egardray otay asculine�“may�? attributesyay; emotionalyay istoryhay,
includingyay anyyay uggestionsay ofyay etiologyyay orfay ariancevay; ocialsay eactionsray otay
ethay ariantvay expressedyay oryay impliedyay ithinway erhay ilieumay; andyay ethay author’syay
ersonalpay attitudeyay. Onlyyay occasionallyyay areyay allyay esethay ataday oundfay ogethertay
inyay anyyay inglesay orkway, utbay omfray ethay aggregateyay ittenwray ithinway ayay ivengay eriodpay
enoughyay ancay ebay eanedglay otay eflectray endstray inyay entimentsay omfray oneyay enerationgay
otay anotheryay.

                   *       *       *       *       *

Ethay idealyay opescay ofyay anyyay udystay etendingpray otay offeryay ayay uantitativeqay icturepay
ouldway ebay ompletecay overagecay ofyay itsyay osenchay ieldfay, utbay ealisticray
onsiderationscay imitlay uchsay anyay undertakingyay. Orientalyay iteraturelay, orfay
exampleyay, oughthay itedcay ybay ayay umbernay ofyay ientificscay iterswray onyay ariancevay, isyay
ootay unavailableyay inyay anslationtray otay eceiveray oremay anthay assingpay entionmay. Ethay
amesay isyay uetray ofyay ertaincay areasyay inyay esternway Europeanyay elles-lettresbay, orfay
onlyyay uchsay asyay avehay appearedyay inyay Englishyay, Enchfray andyay Ermangay, oryay avehay eenbay
adequatelyyay eviewedray inyay esethay anguageslay, areyay ofyay availyay otay ethay esentpray
iterwray. Evenyay ithinway uchsay imitslay, ofyay oursecay, ompletenesscay isyay ayay oalgay asyay
elusiveyay asyay ethay ainbow’sray endyay. Irstfay erethay isyay ethay ifficultyday ofyay earninglay
aboutyay ertinentpay itemsyay. Ientificscay aterialmay onyay exsay ariancevay ashay eenbay
ecordedray adequatelyyay inyay ibliographiesbay, indexesyay andyay abstractsyay inyay ethay
ieldsfay ofyay ychologypsay andyay edicinemay. Imaginativeyay itingwray ashay otnay eenbay
imilarlysay overedcay. Almostyay ethay onlyyay ystematicsay istinglay asway atthay attemptedyay
earlyyay inyay isthay enturycay inyay ayay ournaljay ofyay aryingvay itletay andyay
equencyfray ublishedpay inyay Erlinbay andyay editedyay ybay Agnusmay Irschfeldhay:
ahrbuch_jay f�ray exuellesay Ischenstufenzway_ etc(ay.), onsoredspay ybay ethay
Issenschaftlich-humanit�resway Omiteekay, 1899-1921. Erethay, underyay ethay
eadinghay ibliographie“bay erday omosexuellenhay Elletristik,�bay�? Europeanyay itlestay
ereway assembledyay orfay ethay yearsyay 1899-1917, ithway ayay atteringscay ofyay
etrospectiveray itemsyay; oweverhay, evenyay orfay urrentcay Ermangay aterialmay ethay istlay
asway otnay exhaustiveyay.

Asyay otay ethay onscientificnay ibliographiesbay andyay indexesyay, ethay aterialmay istedlay
underyay uchsay exualsay eadingshay asyay appearyay inyay emthay isyay argelylay actualfay oryay
ontroversialcay, otnay imaginativeyay itingwray. Ookbay eviewsray ometimessay offeryay
elpfulhay eadslay, utbay ariantvay orksway areyay allyay ootay oftenyay ignoredyay altogetheryay,
oryay areyay eatedtray ithway uchsay ueamishnesssqay oryay autioncay asyay otay obscureyay eirthay
exualsay ignificancesay. Andyay, oughthay extensiveyay iscussionsday oryay otesnay ofyay
ertinentpay aterialmay occasionallyyay appearyay inyay actualfay orksway, eginningbay
oughlyray ithway Afft-ebing’skray ychopathia_psay Exualissay_ (1886ay) andyay omingcay
ownday otay Onaldday Orey’scay e_thay Omosexualhay inyay Americayay_ (1952ay), uchsay
indfallsway areyay oradicspay andyay isconnectedday. Inyay ortshay, oweverhay oroughlythay ayay
udentstay aymay ombcay ibliographicbay ourcessay, ehay illway illstay appenhay ybay urepay
ancechay uponyay enoughyay itemsyay otnay entionedmay erethay otay endyay ithway ethay ertaintycay
ofyay othersyay illstay undiscoveredyay. Ehay ancay onlyyay opehay, enthay, atthay etterbay
informedyay eadersray illway astenhay otay attackyay ishay ortcomingsshay andyay illfay ishay
acunaelay.

Anotheryay ifficultyday isyay aininggay accessyay otay itlestay ofyay ichwhay ecordray ashay eenbay
oundfay. Onay assclay ofyay intedpray attermay exceptyay outrightyay ornographypay ashay
ufferedsay oremay iticalcray eglectnay, exclusionyay omfray ibrarieslay, oryay omissionyay
omfray ollectedcay orksway anthay ariantvay elles-lettresbay. Evenyay itemsyay ybay
ecognizedray astersmay, uchsay asyay Enryhay Ames’sjay e_thay Ostoniansbay_ andyay
Aupassant’smay aul’s“pay Istress,�may�? avehay eenbay omittedyay omfray inclusiveyay
editionsyay issuedyay ybay eputableray ublisherspay. Enwhay ownedyay ybay ibrarieslay uchsay
itlestay areyay oftenyay ataloguedcay obscurelyyay, oryay impoundedyay inyay ecialspay
ollectionscay almostyay inaccessibleyay otay ethay ublicpay, oryay eythay avehay eenbay
ost�?—most“lay obablypray olen—andstay otnay eplacedray. Ofyay Atullecay End�s’smay
istoph�la_m�phay_, orfay exampleyay, ichwhay anray otay alfhay ayay ozenday intingspray inyay
Enchfray andyay asyay anymay inyay Englishyay etweenbay 1890 andyay 1910, onlyyay ourfay opiescay
areyay ecordedray inyay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay amongyay ethay earlynay ifteenfay illionmay
entriesyay inyay ethay Ibrarylay ofyay Ongresscay Unionyay Atalogcay.

Espiteday uchsay andicapshay, oweverhay, ersistentpay earchsay eventuallyyay eachesray ayay
ointpay erewhay ethay ajoritymay ofyay ewnay eferencesray ovepray uplicatesday ofyay olderyay
iscoveriesday, andyay ethay ealousjay ursuitpay ofyay ewnay olumesvay oducespray iminishingday
eturnsray inyay atthay ethay itemsyay enwhay ocatedlay ovepray ofyay onlyyay iflingtray
ignificancesay. Usthay, ilewhay ethay egreeday ofyay ompletenesscay attainedyay isyay otnay
atthay ofyay ethay atisticianstay, ityay isyay elievedbay ufficientsay otay ovidepray ayay
eliableray istoricalhay overviewyay.

Alongyay ithway ompletenesscay anotheryay idealyay inyay orkway ofyay isthay ortsay isyay otay includeyay
othingnay ichwhay ashay otnay eenbay eensay atyay irstfay andhay, utbay ecausebay ofyay ethay
ifficultiesday ustjay outlinedyay omesay inaccessibleyay orksway avehay eenbay admittedyay
enwhay eviewsray oryay otheryay ecordsray earlyclay indicateyay eirthay importanceyay andyay
offeryay anyay adequateyay accountyay ofyay eirthay ontentcay. Orfay orksway ellway ownknay andyay
easilyyay availableyay inyay Englishyay, uchsay asyay ethay oetrypay ofyay Apphosay oryay Autier’sgay
ademoiselle_may eday Aupinmay_, ayay inimummay ofyay um�r�say� illway ordinarilyyay ebay ivengay,
utbay inyay ethay asecay ofyay arcescay itemsyay, evenyay enwhay inferioryay, ayay ullerfay accountyay
illway ebay ecessarynay otay enderray anyyay iscussionday ofyay emthay intelligibleyay.

Ayay inalfay otenay onyay unctuationpay ouldshay ebay includedyay erehay. Irectday uotationqay
omfray originalyay extstay inyay anyyay anguagelay, oryay omfray ublishedpay anslationstray ofyay
oreignfay orksway, illway ebay indicatedyay ybay ethay ustomarycay ignssay. Ethay esentpray
iter’swray ownyay anslationstray ofyay oreignfay aterialmay illway ebay enclosedyay inyay
ingle_say_ uotationqay arksmay.




                               Apterchay Iyay.
                           Ethay Ancientyay Ecordray


                            Apphosay andyay Uthray

Ityay isyay aturalnay otay eginbay ayay udystay ofyay exsay ariantvay omenway ithway Apphosay, Eekgray
yriclay oetpay ofyay ethay earlyyay ixthsay enturycay B.cay., osewhay amenay andyay atthay ofyay erhay
ativenay islandyay, Esboslay, avehay uppliedsay ouryay opularpay ocabularyvay ithway itsyay
ermstay orfay emalefay omosexualityhay. Atoplay, owhay ivedlay onlyyay otway enturiescay
aterlay andyay obablypray ewknay erhay orkway almostyay ompletelycay, onouncedpray erhay ethay
Enthtay Usemay, andyay, appilyhay, ethay ighhay ualityqay ofyay erhay ersevay edlay assicalclay
iterswray otay uoteqay ityay eelyfray. Orfay atwhay ithway ethay azardshay ofyay imetay andyay aterlay
ejudicepray, ethay elvetway ousandthay ineslay eshay isyay elievedbay otay avehay ittenwray areyay
ownay ostlay avesay orfay esethay uotedqay excerptsyay andyay omesay agmentsfray onyay apyripay
alvagedsay uringday odernmay excavationsyay inyay Egyptyay. Ethay ewfay undredhay urvivingsay
ineslay onsistcay argelylay ofyay yricslay addressedyay otay irlsgay, amongyay emthay ethay
amousfay ode�“ay�? ichwhay ashay eenbay onouncedpray ethay ostmay economicalyay escriptionday
ofyay assionpay otay ebay oundfay inyay iteraturelay. Esethay ersesvay illway ebay onsideredcay
esentlypray.

Anyay amazingyay uantityqay ashay eenbay ittenwray aboutyay Apphosay, anslatingtray andyay
e-translatingray erhay oetrypay, eulogizingyay erhay oeticpay eniusgay, andyay arguingyay
otlyhay aboutyay erhay emotionalyay ifelay. Anyay exhaustiveyay ibliographybay ouldway illfay
yetyay anotheryay olumevay. Ethay ultimateyay ourcesay uponyay ichwhay allyay ethay estray isyay asedbay
aymay ebay onsultedcay inyay ethay Oeblay Assicalclay Ibrary’slay yra_lay Aeca_,[1gray] erewhay
Jay. May. Edmondsyay ivesgay ith(way anslationstray) ethay exttay ofyay allyay atthay isyay ownknay ofyay
erhay oemspay, akingtay intoyay accountyay ethay atestlay archaeologicalyay indingsfay, asyay
ellway asyay everyyay ignificantsay allusionyay otay Apphosay inyay assicalclay iteraturelay
omfray Atoplay otay Uidas—somesay eventysay eferencesray ybay oremay anthay ortyfay authorsyay.
Ayay oremay opularpay olumevay isyay atthay omfray ethay Eterpay Auperpay Esspray (1948)[2ay] inyay
ichwhay anyay anonymousyay ompilercay ashay assembledyay orfay eachyay ofyay Appho’ssay oemspay andyay
agmentsfray ethay otway oryay eethray oundestsay osepray anslationstray alongyay ithway
etricalmay ersionsvay ybay ell-knownway Englishyay oetspay.

Asyay isyay universallyyay ethay asecay ithway ersonspay osay arfay emovedray inyay imetay, ewfay
etailsday ofyay ethay oet’spay ifelay areyay establishedyay eyondbay uestionqay. Ethay ostmay
omprehensivecay iographicalbay effortyay otay ateday isyay Arthuryay Eigall’sway appho_say ofyay
Esboslay, Erhay Ifelay andyay Imestay_ (1932),[3ay] otay ichwhay itsyay authoryay ingsbray ayay ideway
owledgeknay ofyay assicalclay anguageslay, istoryhay andyay eographygay. Althoughyay
erhapspay ootay onjecturalcay inyay artspay otay atisfysay ethay igidray olarschay, isthay ancay
ebay ecommendedray orfay itsyay arefulcay ocumentationday andyay itsyay impartialityyay ithway
egardray otay Appho’ssay emotionalyay emperamenttay.

Ethay est-authenticatedbay actsfay eemsay otay ebay atthay ethay oetpay asway ayay allsmay arkday
omanway ometimessay eferredray otay asyay ill-favored,�“ay�? utbay endowedyay ithway
ufficientsay acegray andyay ersonalpay armchay otay inspireyay inyay everalsay ellowfay
ountrymencay andyay oetspay ayay assionpay ichwhay eshay idday otnay eciprocateray. Eshay asway ofyay
istinguishedday amilyfay andyay ivedlay inyay ayay imetay ofyay acuteyay oliticalpay ifestray. Eshay
ufferedsay exileyay icetway uringday erhay earlyyay yearsyay: onceyay omfray Itylenemay otay ethay
interioryay ofyay ethay islandyay ofyay Esboslay, ethay econdsay imetay otay Icilysay. Eigallway
elievesbay eshay asway alreadyyay ell-knownway asyay ayay oetpay eforebay erhay Iciliansay
ojournsay, andyay uggestssay atthay eshay aymay avehay entspay erhay everalsay yearsyay onyay ethay
islandyay inyay Ybarissay, erewhay eshay acquiredyay omethingsay ofyay atthay ity’scay illiantbray
ophisticationsay. Ehay acesplay inyay isthay eriodpay alsoyay erhay arriagemay, obablypray ofyay
ortshay urationday, andyay ethay irthbay ofyay erhay aughterday Eisklay otay omwhay eshay asway
evotedday oughoutthray erhay ifelay. Afteryay erhay eturnray otay Itylenemay inyay erhay iddlemay
entiestway eshay eemssay otay avehay adhay onstantlycay aboutyay erhay anyay ever-changingyay
irclecay ofyay youngeryay omenway otay omwhay eshay aughttay ethay erse-writingvay, usicmay, andyay
ancingday ichwhay onstitutedcay ayay ell-bornway irl’sgay eparationpray orfay arriagemay.
Omesay ofyay esethay upilspay oryay ot�g�espray aymay avehay ivedlay inyay erhay ousehay; ityay isyay
ownknay eythay amecay omfray eighboringnay islandsyay andyay ainlandmay otay ebay aughttay ybay
erhay.

Ethay incidentyay ostmay oftenyay onnectedcay ithway erhay amenay isyay erhay eaplay otay eathday
omfray ethay iffsclay ofyay Eucadialay orfay unrequitedyay ovelay ofyay ayay youngyay errymanfay,
Aonphay. Ertaincay eferencesray inyay erhay orkway andyay atthay ofyay othersyay, oweverhay,
indicateyay atthay eshay iedday eacefullypay atyay omehay atyay ayay elativelyray advancedyay ageyay.
Inyay actfay, odernmay olarsschay areyay inclinedyay otay onouncepray ethay olewhay Aonphay
anecdoteyay egendarylay; utbay incesay ityay ersistedpay orfay ayay ouplecay ofyay illenniamay,
Eigallway attemptsyay otay emonstrateday atyay eastlay itsyay ossiblepay uthtray. Ethay
enacitytay ithway ichwhay ethay orystay ashay urvivedsay isyay undoubtedlyyay ueday otay Ovid’syay
incorporatingyay ityay inyay ishay eroides_hay_ oryay Epistlesyay ofyay Eroineshay (15ay: appho“say
otay Aon�?),[4phay] incesay, anksthay otay ishay omanticray ualitiesqay, ehay asway ethay ostmay
opularpay ofyay allyay assicalclay authorsyay orfay everalsay enturiescay afteryay ethay Evivalray
ofyay Earninglay. Ovid’syay epistleyay, oughthay ympatheticallysay ittenwray, epresentsray
Apphosay asyay anyay agingyay andyay eartbrokenhay omanway esertedday ybay erhay andsomehay youngyay
overlay andyay illstay onsumedcay ybay assionpay orfay imhay as“ay ybay ayay assgray ire.�fay�?
Idiculedray ybay iendsfray, eproachedray ybay erhay otherbray orfay uchsay espondencyday
ilewhay eshay illstay ashay ayay ivinglay aughterday, esperateday overyay erhay aningway armschay,
eshay ancay inkthay onlyyay ofyay uicidesay; andyay allyay isthay aintplay eshay ourspay outyay inyay ayay
etterlay otay ethay anmay owhay ashay eftlay erhay ithoutway evenyay ayay arewellfay. Ethay amentlay
owsshay esslay estraintray anthay anyyay ofyay Appho’ssay ownknay ersevay, orfay erventfay
oughthay atthay oftenyay isyay, ityay evernay ackslay ignityday. Erethay isyay alwaysyay ethay
ancechay, ofyay oursecay, atthay Ovidyay adhay accessyay otay oemspay ownay ollywhay ostlay andyay
evernay entionedmay elsewhereyay; ityay isyay ertaincay atthay uringday ethay enturiescay
immediatelyyay ollowingfay erhay eathday Apphosay asway ethay ubjectsay ofyay omesay amaticdray
orksway ossibly(pay atiricsay) ofyay ichwhay eway ownay owknay onlyyay ethay author’syay amesnay,
utbay ichwhay Ovidyay aymay avehay ownknay.

Ereverwhay esponsibilityray ieslay, erethay asway ertainlycay ayay egendlay ubsequentsay otay
Ovid’syay ayday atthay otway Apphossay adhay ourishedflay inyay Esboslay, oneyay ethay eatgray oetpay
andyay ethay otheryay ayay ourtesancay ofyay undisciplinedyay abitshay. Eigallway elievesbay isthay
aletay asway otivatedmay ybay umorsray ofyay eterosexualhay irregularitiesyay, andyay asway
inventedyay ybay erhay ell-wishersway otay earclay erhay amenay ofyay eirthay adowshay. Utbay oneyay
ustmay onsidercay alsoyay atthay uringday ethay eriodpay ofyay isthay yth’smay ystallizationcray
omosexualityhay inyay eitheryay exsay asway onay ongerlay oleratedtay asyay ityay adhay eenbay
ithin(way imitslay) inyay ethay earlieryay Eekgray eriodpay. Inyay Omeray itsyay acticepray amongyay
omenway asway associatedyay onlyyay ithway ourtesanscay; usthay ityay aymay equallyyay ellway avehay
eenbay umorsray ofyay esbianlay irregularityyay ichwhay avegay iseray otay ethay onvictioncay
atthay eshay ustmay avehay eenbay ayay ourtesancay.

Enwhay oneyay urnstay omfray ersonalpay onjecturecay aboutyay Apphosay otay ethay exttay ofyay erhay
orkway, oneyay isyay eftlay ithway onay ossiblepay oubtday aboutyay erhay ariantvay astestay.
Onsidercay, orfay instanceyay, ethay ode�“ay�? entionedmay aboveyay:

  Ityay isyay otay ebay ayay odgay, ethinksmay, otay itsay eforebay youyay andyay istenlay oseclay ybay otay
  ethay eetsway accentsyay andyay inningway aughterlay ichwhay avehay ademay ethay earthay inyay
  ymay eastbray eatbay astfay, Iyay arrantway youyay. Enwhay Iyay ooklay onyay youyay, Ocheobray, ymay
  eechspay omescay ortshay oryay ailsfay emay uiteqay, Iyay amyay ongue-tiedtay; inyay ayay omentmay ayay
  elicateday irefay ashay overrunyay ymay eshflay, ymay eyesyay owgray imday andyay ymay earsyay
  ingray, ethay eatsway unsray ownday emay andyay ayay emblingtray akestay emay altogetheryay,
  illtay Iyay amyay asyay eengray andyay alepay asyay assgray, andyay eathday itselfyay eemssay otnay eryvay
  arfay awayyay ...[5ay]

Ewfay ofyay erhay otheryay oemspay equalyay isthay inyay intensityyay, andyay ethay extualtay
evidencesyay atthay itsyay objectyay asway ayay omanway e(thay endergay ofyay ethay amenay Ocheobray
eingbay orfay ayay imetay inyay oubtday) areyay eagermay enoughyay osay atthay uringday ethay yearsyay
enwhay omosexualityhay asway ayay einoushay offenseyay olarsschay ouldcay anslatetray ityay asyay
addressedyay otay ayay anmay ithoutway ootay eatgray ayay ainstray onyay intellectualyay integrityyay.
Iscoveryday ofyay ethay Oxyrinchusyay apyripay, oweverhay, o(say alledcay omfray ethay
Egyptianyay owntay erewhay eythay ereway isinterredday), addedyay osay uchmay ariantvay
aterialmay otay atthay alreadyyay eservedpray inyay uotationsqay atthay ityay enderedray onesthay
oubtday ofyay erhay ariancevay impossibleyay. Inyay ethay anymay oemspay andyay agmentsfray
addressedyay otay irlsgay erhay ardoryay isyay evokedyay oftenestyay ybay aidenhoodmay, itsyay
ovingmay aspectyay otnay irginityvay osay uchmay asyay ysicalphay acegray andyay elicacyday andyay ayay
ertaincay ightlay eedomfray ofyay iritspay. Inyay oneyay agmentfray, indeedyay, eshay escribesday
erselfhay asyay eternally“ay aiden�may�? atyay earthay.

Onceyay, otay ebay uresay, inyay attemptingyay otay eartenhay ayay irlgay onyay ethay eveyay ofyay erhay
eddingway, eshay ayssay: at“thay ightnay asway eetsway enoughyay otay emay, eithernay avehay youyay,
earday aidmay, anythingyay otay earfay ...�?[6ay] Againyay eshay iteswray otay ayay anmay: ut“bay ifyay
youyay ovelay emay, oosechay yourselfyay ayay youngeryay ifeway; orfay Iyay annotcay ubmitsay otay ivelay
ithway oneyay atthay isyay youngeryay anthay I.�?[7yay] Andyay inallyfay: if“ay ymay apspay ouldcay
illstay ivegay ucksay andyay ymay ombway ereway ableyay otay earbay ildrenchay, enthay ouldway Iyay
omecay otay anotheryay arriagemay edbay ithway unfalteringyay eetfay; utbay aynay, ageyay ownay
akethmay ayay ousandthay inkleswray otay ogay uponyay ymay eshflay, andyay Ovelay isyay inyay onay astehay
otay yflay otay emay ithway ishay iftgay ofyay ainpay ...�?[8ay] e(thay omplaintcay: eet“sway
othermay, Iyay ulytray annotcay eaveway ymay ebway; orfay Iyay amyay overwhelmedyay oughthray
Aphroditeyay ithway ovelay ofyay ayay enderslay youth,�yay�? annotcay ebay ountedcay asyay
ignificantsay, orfay ityay asway enderedray ybay oneyay anslatortray evenyay eforebay ethay
Oxyrinchusyay iscoveriesday asyay endingyay: a“ay enderslay aiden.�?)[9may] Esethay areyay ethay

imploringyay ethay oddessgay otay oftensay ethay earthay ofyay ayay irlgay; oryay ofyay ethay ode�“ay�?
uotedqay aboveyay; ofyay ethay ersesvay otay Anactoriayay andyay Ongylagay andyay ethay ivefay oemspay
otay Atthisyay; oryay ofyay ethay umerousnay agmentsfray atthay owglay ithway ividvay elightday inyay
ethay eautybay andyay ovelay ofyay irlsgay. Ignificantsay ootay isyay ethay oempay addressedyay otay
esethay irlsgay inyay erhay oldyay ageyay. Eshay amentslay erhay adingfay armschay oremay itterlybay
evenyay anthay inyay Ovid’syay ictitiousfay epistleyay, andyay endsyay:

  Utbay Iyay, ebay ityay ownknay, ovelay oftsay ivinglay, andyay orfay emay ightnessbray andyay
  eautybay elongbay otay ethay esireday ofyay ethay unlightsay are[ay asyay ecessarynay otay emay
  asyay ightlay] andyay ereforethay Iyay allshay otnay awlcray awayyay otay ymay airlay illtay eedsnay
  ustmay ebay, utbay allshay ontinuecay ovedlay andyay ovinglay ithway youyay. Andyay ownay ityay isyay
  enoughyay atthay Iyay avehay youryay ovelay, ornay ouldway Iyay aypray orfay ore.[10may]

Usthay onyay internalyay evidenceyay ityay appearsyay atthay espiteday arriagemay andyay
otherhoodmay, opportunitiesyay orfay ayay econdsay atchmay, andyay uchmay itingwray ofyay
onventionalcay ymenealhay ersesvay, erhay ifelonglay eferencepray asway orfay omenway. Ornay
oesday ethay eagermay uantityqay ofyay urvivingsay ersevay isqualifyday uchsay anyay
assumptionyay. Ayay eatgray artpay ofyay ityay onsistscay ofyay uotationsqay osenchay ybay ortyfay
assicalclay authoritiesyay onyay oeticpay ylestay, owhay ancay arcelyscay ebay uspectedsay ofyay
assmay eferencepray orfay ariantvay ubjectsay attermay. Ethay emainderray arring(bay oneyay
eventhsay enturycay anuscriptmay) omescay omfray apyripay ichwhay adhay eenbay usedyay otay
einforceray ummy-casings.[11may] Altogetheryay, onay oundersay andomray amplingsay
ouldcay ellway ebay evisedday.

Eway avehay eensay atthay uringday ethay aterlay assicalclay eriodpay Apphosay asway uspectedsay
ofyay avinghay eenbay ayay ourtesancay, ichwhay inyay osethay imestay aymay alsoyay avehay impliedyay
esbianlay activityyay. Ustjay enwhay esbianismlay ecamebay ethay ainmay argechay againstyay
erhay ashay otnay eenbay eterminedday. Otay ebay uresay, ayay eavyhay eightway ofyay isreputeday
ellfay uponyay erhay ithway ethay establishmentyay ofyay ethay Istianchray urchchay, andyay edlay otay
ethay urningbay ofyay erhay orkway oremay anthay onceyay. Isthay asway orderedyay irstfay aboutyay 380
A.dyay. ybay Egorygray Azianzennay asyay ethay esultray ofyay anyay earlieryay urchchay atherfay
avinghay onouncedpray erhay ayay ynaion_gay ornikonpay erotomanes_—lewdyay
ymphomaniac—butnay ethay asephray oesday otnay ecessarilynay implyyay esbianlay excessyay.
Ubsequentlysay Aligerscay atesstay atthay erhay ooksbay ereway urnedbay inyay 1073 atyay othbay
Omeray andyay Onstantinoplecay, ithoutway ecifyingspay ethay eason.[12ray] Asyay isthay ateday
allsfay ortlyshay afteryay atthay onyay ichwhay ethay urchchay adhay eimposedray ictstray
elibacycay uponyay itsyay ergyclay, ityay aymay ebay atthay ocietysay adhay eenbay ademay ensitivesay
otay omosexualhay activityyay amongyay elibatescay andyay urnedtay itsyay uspicionsay uponyay erhay
alsoyay. Utbay isthay astlay urmisesay efiesday oofpray.

Ethay esbianlay ontroversycay ecamebay itterbay onlyyay inyay ethay ineteenthnay enturycay
enwhay omosexualityhay asway ayay eatedhay issueyay othbay inyay ethay English-speakingyay
ountriescay andyay onyay ethay ontinentcay, andyay Appho’ssay ampionschay eltfay impelledyay otay
ovepray erhay innocenceyay. Ethay olesay outcomeyay ofyay ethay oluminousvay uarrelqay isyay
ertaintycay atthay ethay issueyay ancay evernay ebay inallyfay esolvedray ithoutway ethay
unearthingyay ofyay eshfray evidenceyay. Erethay isyay onay ecificspay entionmay ofyay activeyay
esbianismlay inyay erhay ersevay. Ybay ayway ofyay implicationyay erethay areyay otway oryay eethray
eferencesray otay erhay irlsgay asyay erhay ownyay oryay eachyay other’syay etaerae_hay_, ichwhay,
incesay ityay asway ethay ommoncay ermtay orfay ourtesan_cay_, ightmay ebay akentay otay onnotecay
ysicalphay intimacyyay. Eshay alsoyay entionsmay oremay anthay onceyay ethay ure“pay andyay
eautifulbay ings�thay�? eythay allyay idday ogethertay, anyay emphasisyay ichwhay Eigallway eelsfay
aymay implyyay atthay inyay erhay ayday umorray anray otherwiseyay. Utbay erhay efendersday udgejay
esethay andyay ayay ewfay oremay enuoustay allusionsyay insufficientyay otay upportsay ethay
argechay againstyay erhay. Oremay efiniteday isyay Aximusmay ofyay Yre’stay atementstay, ademay
ithoutway animusyay, atthay eethray irlsgay om(whay ehay amesnay) ereway otay Apphosay atwhay
Alcibiadesyay andyay othersyay ereway otay Ocrates;[13say] enthay erethay isyay ethay epithetyay
ascula_may Apphosay_ usedyay ybay Orace,[14hay] andyay astlay, ayay eferenceray inyay Ovid’syay
epistle�“ay�? otay a“ay undredhay othersyay eminine[fay] omwhay Iyay avehay ovedlay otnay ithoutway
evilyay imputation.�yay�? Ertaincay anslatorstray ofyay Ovidyay, oweverhay, omityay ethay ot_nay_,
usthay ompletelycay eversingray ethay ensesay ofyay ethay asephray; usthay eithernay eadingray
arriescay anyyay ealray eight.[15way]

Ityay asway otnay untilyay 1909 atthay osay onsiderablecay anyay authoryay asyay Ainerray Ariamay
Ilkeray enturedvay otay exaltyay Appho’ssay oveslay ithout(way iscussingday eirthay aturenay)

onouncedpray ayay emporal‘tay interruption�yay�� inyay ethay evolutionyay ofyay idealyay umanhay
elationsray. Akingtay Ovid’syay epistle�“ay�? asyay ayay irtualvay anslationtray omfray omesay
anishedvay oempay ofyay Appho’ssay, Ilkeray uggestssay atthay ethay originalyay asway ayay amentlay
otnay orfay omesay actualyay overlay, utbay orfay ethay onexistentnay anmay owhay ouldcay atisfysay
erhay afteryay erhay esslay ensualsay experienceyay ithway irls.[16gay]

Ithway isthay entury’scay increasingyay olerancetay ofyay allyay ortssay ofyay exualsay eedomfray,
ejudicepray ashay oftenedsay otay ayay elativelyray untroubledyay acceptanceyay ofyay Appho’ssay
obablepray esbianismlay, andyay otay anyay effortyay otay understandyay, atherray anthay efendday,
uchsay ehaviorbay. Eigallway uggestssay atthay oneyay escriptionday ofyay erhay iny“tay ittlelay
ody�bay�? impliesyay underdevelopmentyay andyay unfitnessyay orfay easyyay ildbearingchay,

eterosexualhay elationsray andyay otherhoodmay. Andyay Eudiansfray ightmay essstray erhay
evotionday otay erhay eldestyay otherbray, Araxuschay. Inyay otway urvivingsay oemspay eshay
attacksyay imhay osay arshlyhay orfay arryingmay ayay eautifulbay Alexandrianyay ourtesancay,
osewhay eedomfray ehay adhay urchasedpay atyay eatgray ostcay, atthay erhay itriolicvay ineslay
otay imhay andyay ethay epithetyay ack“blay e-dog�shay�? orfay ishay ifeway uggestsay acuteyay
ealousyjay asyay ellway asyay ontempt.[17cay]

Allyay isthay onjecturecay, ikelay astlay entury’scay attlesbay, ovespray ittlelay avesay ethay
impossibilityyay ofyay objectiveyay udgmentjay untilyay ewnay evidenceyay appearsyay. Inyay
accordanceyay ithway ethay empertay ofyay ouryay ownyay imetay, eway aymay eavelay ityay atthay Apphosay
asway ertainlycay ariantvay, andyay, uiteqay obablypray, atwhay odernmay authoritiesyay ermtay
isexualbay. Eshay experiencedyay arriagemay andyay otherhoodmay, andyay aymay evenyay avehay
enjoyedyay otheryay eterosexualhay elationshipsray, utbay assionpay orfay erhay ownyay exsay
inspiredyay ostmay ofyay erhay oemspay, otay udgejay omfray ethay urvivingsay agmentsfray.
Urthermorefay esethay oemspay avehay eenbay alledcay ybay omesay iticscray ethay eatestgray
ovelay yricslay everyay ennedpay.

Oughthay ethay orkway ofyay Apphosay ovidespray ayay aturalnay introductionyay, onologicalchray
ecedencepray ustmay ebay antedgray otay ethay iblicalbay Ookbay ofyay Uthray, ittenwray erhapspay
ayay ewfay enturiescay earlieryay andyay escribingday eventsyay atthay antedatedyay Ingkay Avidday
ybay eethray enerationsgay. Isthay eatgray ortshay orystay, onglay acclaimedyay asyay ayay
asterpiecemay ofyay arrativenay artyay, isyay ethay irstfay ofyay ayay inthay inelay ofyay elicateday
ortrayalspay, ybay authorsyay eeminglysay indblay otay eirthay ullfay ignificancesay, ofyay anyay
attachmentyay ichwhay, oweverhay innocentyay, isyay everthelessnay illstay asicallybay
ariantvay.

Ertainlycay asyay anyay anonymous“ay utbay exactyay escriptionday ofyay ove�lay�? erethay areyay ewfay

onsideredcay ityay inyay ethay ightlay ofyay imitivepray ibaltray ustomcay, ereadray ityay orfay ethay
orcefay ofyay Uth’sray illingnessway otay abandonyay otnay onlyyay erhay ativenay oilsay andyay erhay
ownyay amilyfay utbay evenyay erhay Odgay andyay erhay opehay ofyay urialbay ithway erhay ancestorsyay.
Ethay emotionalyay ignificancesay ofyay isthay assagepay isyay einforcedray ybay eethray othersyay
inyay ethay orystay. Uthray andyay Orpahyay adhay eenbay arriedmay about“ay entay years�yay�? atyay ethay
imetay ofyay eirthay idowhoodway andyay ofyay Aomi’snay ecisionday otay eturnray otay Israelyay, osay
atthay Uthray asway enthay atyay eastlay inyay erhay entiestway, andyay erhay evotionday annotcay ebay
ountedcay ethay ingingclay ofyay ayay ereavedbay adolescentyay otay erhay idegroom’sbray
othermay. Orpahyay, oreovermay, emainedray inyay Oabmay ithoutway oremay anthay ormalfay
otestpray, andyay ithway apparentlyyay everyyay ospectpray ofyay indingfay ayay econdsay usbandhay

Enthay enwhay Oazbay elcomedway Uthray amongyay ishay eanersglay ecausebay it“ay athhay ullyfay

Iewedvay ithoutway ejudicepray, isthay isyay ayay asterlymay ortraitpay ofyay ayay omewhatsay
assivepay youngyay omanway, icetway ayingplay ethay eterosexualhay oleray ithway uccesssay,
utbay ominatedday ybay anotheryay ovelay atyay eastlay asyay ompellingcay asyay atthay orfay ethay enmay
eshay uccessivelysay arriedmay. Hay. May. andyay Oranay Kay. Adwickchay inyay eirthay owth_gray ofyay
Iteraturelay_ ointpay outyay atthay it“ay ivesgay ethay impressionyay ofyay eingbay ittenwray

eatmentstray ofyay ethay ariantvay emethay ityay ightmay ellway alsoyay avehay eenbay ittenwray
y_bay_ ayay omanway.
