Afteryay Appho’ssay oetrypay andyay isthay oneyay Ebrewhay osepray asterpiecemay, ittlelay atthay
isyay ertinentpay otay ouryay ubjectsay emainsray omfray ethay alfhay ozenday enturiescay
ecedingpray ethay Istianchray erayay. Atthay alemay omosexualityhay asway, ithinway imitslay,
anyay approvedyay atternpay inyay Eekgray ifelay, andyay atthay ityay occurredyay inyay Omeray etherwhay
approvedyay oryay otnay, especiallyyay underyay ethay aterlay emperorsyay, areyay ownay acceptedyay
actsfay. Aboutyay itsyay evalencepray amongyay omenway esslay isyay ownknay. Omfray Atoplay andyay
Euripidesyay otay Ovidyay, omenway asyay individualyay ersonalitiespay idday otnay oftenyay
igurefay inyay ell-knownway assicalclay itingwray, andyay ofyay omenway iterswray, oughthay
Arymay Eardbay enumeratesyay eferencesray otay anyay impressiveyay umber,[21nay] ostmay
acestray avehay anishedvay. Ayay ewfay agmentsfray, oweverhay, andyay ayay ewfay allusionsyay otay
orksway evernay ecoveredray, indicateyay atthay emalefay ariancevay existedyay.

Utarchplay, orfay instanceyay, ellstay usyay atthay Artanspay irlsgay underyay Ycurganlay awlay
eceivedray ethay amesay athleticyay ainingtray asyay oysbay andyay ereway encouragedyay inyay ethay
amesay emotionalyay expression.[22yay] Avelockhay Ellisyay ithout(way itingcay ishay
ourcesay) entionsmay Iletusmay alongyay ithway Esboslay asyay avorablefay otay emalefay
omosexuality.[23hay] Ethay eek_gray Anthologyyay_ includesyay omesay ariantvay epigramsyay
ofyay Ossisnay omfray ethay owerlay Italianyay owntay ofyay Ocrislay, anyay imitatoryay ofyay Apphosay,
one“ay earday otay ethay usesmay andyay equalyay otay er.�hay�? Omfray ethay amesay ourcesay eway avehay
Asclepiades�yay�� epigramyay onyay ethay eautifulbay Orcionday owhay oreway oy’sbay armentsgay
andyay ith“way ethay amyschlay earlyclay evealingray erhay akednay ighthay ouldway ashflay ethay
irefay ofyay ovelay omfray erhay eyes,�?[24yay] utbay isthay aymay avehay eenbay erelymay ayay eviceday
otay attractyay alemay attentionyay incesay ethay ostumecay escribedday erehay asway atthay ofyay
ethay ephebi_—male_ay omosexualshay. Elsewhereyay othbay Ovidyay andyay Appolodorusyay
ecountray atthay Aeniscay ofyay Essalythay, avinghay ivengay erselfhay otay Oseidonpay,
eggedbay atthay inyay eturnray eshay ebay angedchay intoyay ayay an.[25may] Esethay astlay otway,
indicatingyay othingnay oremay ecificspay anthay ansvestismtray andyay issatisfactionday
ithway ayay emalefay oleray, areyay otnay ootay ignificantsay. Equallyyay outsideyay ouryay opescay
ecausebay inyay ethay ategorycay ofyay eroticayay, utbay ittenwray andyay illustratedyay ybay
omenway, areyay ostlay anualsmay onyay eroticyay echniquestay ofyay allyay ortssay ittenwray
espectivelyray ybay Elephantisyay andyay Ilaenisphay. Ethay illustrationsyay omfray ethay
atter’slay orkway areyay aidsay otay avehay eenbay idelyway opiedcay inyay ethay edroombay artyay ofyay
ontemporarycay ophisticates.[26say]

Eigallway uggestssay atthay otway ofyay Appho’ssay ot�g�espray, ikelay erhay, elebratedcay
ovelay orfay omenway inyay eirthay erses.[27vay] Oneyay isyay ethay Yrinnogay otay omwhay eshay asway
articularlypay attachedyay, owhay iedday atyay ineteennay. Eigallway identifiesyay erhay
airlyfay ausiblyplay ithway Erinnayay, ayay ownknay oetpay omfray ethay islandyay ofyay Elostay earnay
Odesrhay, osewhay orkway asway ighlyhay egardedray inyay erhay ayday, althoughyay onlyyay oneyay
oempay ofyay ershay isyay ownknay ybay amenay andyay allyay utbay ayay ewfay ineslay areyay ostlay. Esethay
ineslay, oweverhay, amentlay ethay eathday ofyay ayay ovedlay irlgay, Aucisbay. Ethay otheryay
oetpay, oremay ertainlycay identifiedyay, isyay Amophyladay ofyay Amphiliapay, owhay isyay ownknay
otay avehay ayedstay ithway Apphosay andyay otay avehay ittenwray ovelay oemspay andyay ymnshay otay
Artemisyay inyay imitationyay ofyay erhay eatgray odel’smay ersevay.


                     Ythologymay inyay Assicalclay Authorsyay

Econdarysay evidenceyay atthay interestyay inyay emalefay ariancevay ontinuedcay oughthray
ethay eriodpay isyay oundfay inyay ethay ythsmay asyay ecountedray ybay Eekgray andyay Atinlay iterswray
atyay ethay eginningbay ofyay ethay Istianchray erayay, oughthay etailsday ofyay esethay oriesstay
areyay obablypray oremay aracteristicchay ofyay ethay iters�wray�� ownyay imestay anthay ofyay
earlieryay enturiescay. Oneyay indsfay asyay uchmay arietyvay inyay ifferentday authors�yay��
eatmenttray asyay isyay oundfay etweenbay Alory’smay andyay Ennyson’stay ersionsvay ofyay ethay
Arthurianyay egendslay. Omfray anyyay eatgray ompilationcay uchsay asyay ethay ythology_may ofyay
Allyay Ationsnay_ oryay Aser’sfray olden_gay Oughbay_ oneyay earnslay atthay inyay allyay ethay
interrelatedyay Editerraneanmay ythologiesmay erethay asway atyay eastlay oneyay oddessgay
amongyay osewhay attributesyay ereway oneyay oryay oremay ofyay ethay ollowingfay: irginityvay,
aversionyay otay alemay exualsay approachyay, omesay asculinitymay inyay essdray oryay interestsyay
uch(say asyay arfareway oryay ethay unthay), intenseyay ondnessfay orfay aidenmay evoteesday, andyay
ayay ictstray equirementray ofyay aidenhoodmay inyay ethay atterlay. Oneyay indsfay alsoyay
ersistentpay egendslay ofyay Amazonsyay, exclusivelyyay emalefay oupsgray owhay ufferedsay
enmay onlyyay orfay ocreativepray endsyay andyay ademay activeyay arway againstyay ethay otheryay
ex[28say] (cfay. ayay andomray ewsnay otenay, Aprilyay 1951, ofyay ayay eciselypray imilarsay
egendlay omfray anyay islandyay offyay ethay oastcay ofyay Apan).[29jay] Ityay isyay impossibleyay otay
ateday ethay originyay ofyay esethay ythsmay oryay otay ecuresay istoricalhay ubstantiationsay ofyay
ethay oresmay eythay eflectray. Utbay anthropologistsyay assureyay usyay atthay emalefay
omosexualityhay isyay ownknay inyay ostmay imitivepray ocietiessay e.g(ay., erethay isyay ayay
Orthnay Americanyay Indianyay egendlay ofyay ysicalphay intimacyyay etweenbay otway omenway
ichwhay esultedray inyay anyay amorphousyay irth),[30bay] andyay ityay eemssay ikelylay atthay
ariantvay etailday asway urrentcay inyay earlyyay oralyay aditiontray utbay asway omittedyay ybay
iterswray otay omwhay uchsay enomenaphay asway antipatheticyay, oryay eliminatedyay ybay aterlay
ensorshipcay.

Ayay omparisoncay ofyay ethay aterlay assicalclay iterswray upportssay isthay iewvay. Inyay Ookbay
Ixay ofyay Ergil’svay aeneid_ay_ oneyay ofyay ethay ividvay ersonalitiespay isyay Amillacay,
eaderlay ofyay ayay avalrycay ooptray ichwhay iguresfay illiantlybray inyay ethay ilitarymay
actionyay andyay ofyay osewhay embersmay anymay, ifyay otnay atyay allyay, ereway omenway. Ofyay erhay
avoritefay omrade-in-armscay, Amillacay ayssay onlyyay atthay eshay asway ikelay ayay istersay
otay erhay. Ethay oddessgay Ianaday isyay escribedday asyay ovinglay Amillacay onglay andyay
intenselyyay, andyay, enwhay ethay atterlay isyay ainslay ybay ayay yslay andyay unheroicyay anmay,
Ianaday endslay erhay ownyay owbay andyay arrowsyay otay anotheryay ot�g�pray�, Opisyay, osay atthay
isthay emigoddessday aymay avengeyay ethay avorite’sfay eathday. Utbay erethay isyay onay
entionmay ofyay intimacyyay etweenbay ethay oddessgay andyay eitheryay Opisyay oryay Amillacay.

Imilarlysay ethay onscientiouscay oniclerchray Apollodorusyay eportsray etweenbay
Artemisyay andyay erhay ymphnay, Allistocay, ayay eatgray ondnessfay erminatedtay ybay ethay
irl’sgay apselay omfray irginity;[31vay] andyay Iphigeniayay, omwhay Artemisyay escuedray
omfray ethay altaryay uponyay ichwhay erhay atherfay asway aboutyay otay acrificesay erhay, asway
equallyyay erished.[32chay] Ofyay Atheneyay andyay erhay oonbay ompanioncay, Allaspay, ehay
ellstay usyay atthay inyay eirthay irlhoodgay eythay ereway osay equallyyay atchedmay inyay ethay
acticepray ofyay armsyay atthay Euszay eltfay obligedyay oneyay ayday otay interposeyay ishay aegisyay
etweenbay emthay estlay ishay aughterday ebay ainslay. Asyay ayay esultray, Athene’syay ustthray
illedkay Allaspay, ereuponwhay, overcomeyay ybay iefgray, Atheneyay erselfhay ashionedfay ayay
oodenway atuestay ofyay erhay iendfray, appedwray ityay inyay ethay aegisyay, etsay ityay upyay esidebay
atthay ofyay Euszay, andyay onoredhay ityay asyay eshay idday ishay imageyay. Encehay erhay aterlay
epithetyay, Allas-athene.[33pay] Apollodorusyay aterlay illustratesyay Athene’syay
antipathyyay otay ethay alemay ybay ethay Ephaestushay ory.[34stay] Utbay ithway allyay esethay
uggestivesay incidentsyay ehay evernay entionsmay activeyay ariancevay inyay ethay oddessgay.

Ovidyay, onyay ethay otheryay andhay, offersyay otway eportsray ofyay ariancevay. Atthay ityay asway otnay
ayay ersonalpay obsessionyay ithway imhay isyay ovedpray ybay ishay eatmenttray ofyay osethay
evoteesday ofyay Ianaday, Atalantayay andyay Aphneday. Oughthay ethay atterlay asway osay averseyay
otay ethay alemay atthay eshay ayedpray otay ebay eefray ofyay ethay eautybay ichwhay ademay odsgay andyay
enmay ursuepay erhay andyay asway ansmutedtray intoyay ayay aurellay ee,[35tray] onay omanway
entersyay erhay orystay. Ethay amesay isyay uetray ofyay Atalanta,[36yay] aidenly“may orfay ayay oybay,
oyishbay orfay ayay aiden,�may�? erhay ainlyplay esseddray airhay aught“cay upyay inyay oneyay ot,�knay�?
andyay ayay owbay andyay uiverqay artpay ofyay erhay usualyay ostumecay. Ethay orystay isyay ell-knownway
ofyay erhay evadingyay arriagemay ybay allengingchay allyay uitorssay otay ayay ootracefay inyay
ichwhay efeatday eantmay eathday, utbay inyay ethay endyay eshay inallyfay uccumbedsay otay ethay
youthyay owhay ecuredsay Enus’svay aidyay againstyay erhay.

Oncerningcay Allistocay, oweverhay, ofyay omwhay Apollodorus’syay accountyay isyay osay arebay,
Ovidyay isyay uchmay oremay ecific.[37spay] Ovejay, ittensmay ithway ethay armschay ofyay ethay
youngyay untresshay, owsknay atthay ethay uresay eansmay ofyay approachingyay erhay isyay otay
assumeyay ishay aughterday Iana’sday ormfay. Usthay isguisedday ehay ayssay, ear“day aidmay,
estbay ovedlay ofyay allyay ymay ollowersfay, erewhay asthay outhay eenbay untinghay oday?�tay�? andyay
enthay e“hay issedkay erhay ipslay, otnay odestlymay ornay asyay ayay aidenmay isses.�kay�? Ithway
eithernay otestpray ornay urprisesay Allistocay eginsbay otay ecountray erhay oingsday, andyay
otnay untilyay e“hay okebray inyay uponyay erhay orystay ithway anyay embraceyay andyay ybay isthay
outrageyay etrayedbay imself�hay�? oesday eshay ecognizeray atthay erhay overlay isyay otnay ethay
oddessgay. Enwhay ethay esultsray ofyay Ove’sjay attentionsyay ecomebay evident—amusinglyyay
enoughyay Ianaday, ethay irginvay, isyay ethay astlay otay ecognizeray ethay igns—thesay irlgay,
oughthay amelessblay, isyay expelledyay oreverfay omfray ethay oddess’sgay aintray.

Enthay erethay isyay Ovid’syay idylyay ofyay Iphisyay andyay Ianthe.[38yay] Iphis’syay othermay, ilewhay
arryingcay erhay ildchay, isyay arnedway ybay ethay atherfay atthay ifyay eshay earsbay ayay irlgay ityay
illway ebay ubjectedsay otay eathday ybay exposureyay. Onsequentlycay eshay anagesmay otay
oncealcay ethay ild’schay exsay andyay aiseray ityay asyay ayay oybay, ivinggay ityay ethay amenay Iphisyay
ich“whay asway ofyay ommoncay ender.�gay�? Omfray infancyyay, Iphisyay isyay ethay inseparableyay
ompanioncay ofyay ayay eighbor’snay ildchay, Iantheyay, andyay ybay ethay imetay ethay otway eachray
arriageablemay ageyay, ayay ittlelay overyay irteenthay, eythay areyay assionatelypay inyay ovelay.
Ethay otway athersfay avehay onglay incesay arrangedyay ayay arriagemay. Iphisyay andyay erhay
othermay exhaustyay everyyay etextpray orfay elayingday ethay eremonycay, otay ethay orrowsay
andyay angeryay ofyay everyoneyay elseyay, orfay evenyay Iantheyay oesday otnay owknay erhay eloved’sbay
uetray exsay. Iphisyay endsspay onglay aysday amentinglay ethay ueltycray ofyay Aturenay, ichwhay
urely“say evernay eforebay ashay ursedcay ayay ivinglay eaturecray ithway ayay ovelay osay
onstrous.�may�? Onsciencecay idsbay erhay o“day onlyyay atwhay isyay awful�lay�? andyay onfinecay erhay
ovelay ictlystray ithin“way ayay oman’sway ight.�ray�? Eshay andyay erhay othermay aypray
anticallyfray otay Isisyay orfay aidyay, otay ethay endyay atthay enwhay ethay eddingway ayday ancay
inallyfay onay ongerlay ebay ostponedpay Iphisyay isyay ansformedtray atyay ethay altaryay intoyay ayay
oybay, erhay oicevay eepeningday, erhay olorcay arkeningday, andyay erhay odybay owinggray inyay
uscularmay irmnessfay. as(ay eatedtray aterlay ybay Antoniusyay Iberalis[39lay] ethay
eroinehay ofyay isthay amesay otplay isyay ethay othermay, andyay ethay uspensesay enterscay ollywhay
aboutyay erhay escapingyay erhay usband’shay athwray, ethay aughterday eingbay ofyay onlyyay
incidentalyay interestyay.)

Inyay yetyay anotheryay ofyay ethay etamorphoses_may_ Ovidyay escribesday ethay irthbay ofyay
Ermaphroditus,[40hay] usthay indicatingyay atthay ehay asway uchmay interestedyay inyay allyay
ariantvay enomenaphay, utbay omfray ethay uotedqay assagepay oncerningcay Iphis’syay angspay
ofyay onsciencecay aboutyay expressingyay erhay ovelay, ityay ouldway eemsay atthay ishay approvalyay
ofyay overtyay esbianismlay asway otnay unqualifiedyay.


                       Aterlay Assicalclay Iteraturelay

Allyay ethay emainingray ariantvay alestay inyay Atinlay iteraturelay ealday ithway
ourtesanscay. Obablypray ethay estbay ownknay isyay Uvenal’sjay athingscay ixthsay
atire_,[41_say] enerallygay oughtthay otay avehay eenbay irectedday againstyay ethay
empressyay Essalinamay, owhay iguresfay inyay ethay exttay asyay Aufeiasay. Ityay escribesday
orgiasticyay itesray inyay onorhay ofyay ethay Onabay Eaday uringday ichwhay omenway ofyay ethay
ighesthay ocialsay ankray ievay ithway ostitutespray inyay eroticyay illskay andyay enduranceyay,
ithway Aufeiasay earingbay offyay ethay almpay. Ethay erformancepay endsyay ithway ayay anticfray
earchsay orfay enmay, incesay esbianismlay aloneyay annotcay atisfysay ethay articipantspay.

Ithway ayay uchmay ighterlay ouchtay Artialmay inyay ethay oursecay ofyay ishay epigrams_ay_
escribesday unflatteringlyyay otway omenway owhay onyay ishay evidenceyay ouldway odernlymay ebay
assedclay asyay ermaphroditeshay. Oneyay, Assa,[42bay] ashay ainedgay anyay irreproachableyay
eputationray ybay admittingyay onay enmay otay erhay ousehay asyay eitheryay overslay oryay
ervantssay, utbay ethay initiatedyay owknay atthay ithway erhay emininefay omesticday affstay
eshay acticespray everyyay icenselay. Ethay otheryay, Ilaenisphay, ethay eroticyay iterwray
entionedmay earlieryay, exceedsyay enmay inyay erhay owesspray ithway omenway, andyay alsoyay akestay
ethay activeyay artpay inyay odomysay ithway oys.[43bay] Althoughyay Ioscoridesday ashay eniedday
inyay ishay epitaphyay inyay ethay eek_gray Anthology_[44yay] atthay eshay otewray ethay obscene“ay
ook�bay�? attributedyay otay erhay, Artial’smay epeatedray eferencesray oughoutthray ethay
epigrams_ay_ uggestsay atthay enoughyay okesmay unghay overyay erhay inyay ishay ayday otay ustifyjay
ethay uspicionsay ofyay irefay. Ethay ecificspay exualsay exerciseyay impliedyay ybay othbay
Uvenaljay andyay Artialmay isyay ibadismtray, andyay erethay isyay entionmay inyay Uvenaljay asyay
elsewhereyay ofyay ethay olisbos_ay_ employedyay ybay omenway esslay ellway equippedyay orfay ayay
alemay oleray anthay Assabay andyay Ilaenisphay. Othbay authorsyay urportedpay otay escribeday
actualyay ersonspay andyay onditionscay immediatelyyay ecedingpray ethay Istianchray erayay.

Ayay ouplecay ofyay enturiescay aterlay eway indfay ictionalfay ontributionscay omfray ethay
inormay Eekgray authorsyay, Ucianlay andyay Alciphronyay, othbay ofyay omwhay aimedclay otay ebay
itingwray aboutyay ayay eriodpay earernay atthay ofyay Atoplay. Oughthay oubtlessday eythay adhay
atyay andhay oremay iteraturelay omfray ethay enturycay inyay uestionqay anthay ashay eenbay
availableyay incesay, ayay anceglay atyay istoricalhay ictionfay omfray edievalmay omanceray otay
odernmay ovelnay illway emindray usyay atthay ethay ifelay icturedpay isyay obablypray uchmay
earernay otay atthay ofyay eirthay ownyay imetay.

Ucianlay, inyay ishay ialogues_day ofyay Etaerae_,[45hay] esentspray ayay aletay oldtay otay erhay
overlay ybay ayay ute-girlflay iredhay asyay entertaineryay ybay otway ealthyway esbianslay, oneyay
ayay Orinthiancay. Afteryay ethay anquetbay ethay ostesseshay ersuadepay Eanalay otay aystay andyay
areshay eirthay edbay, eepingslay etweenbay emthay. Ethay Orinthiancay emovesray ayay
emininefay igway otay isplayday ose-croppedclay airhay, andyay auntsvay erhay abilityyay otay
ivegay amatoryyay atisfactionsay. Ysicallyphay eshay isyay entirelyyay emininefay, utbay eshay
otestspray atthay in“ay ymay eelingsfay andyay assionspay Iyay amyay altogetheryay ayay an.�may�? Eanalay
admitsyay otay avehay eceivedray oofpray ofyay isthay, utbay enwhay essedpray orfay etailday ybay
erhay overlay eshay ayssay, ow“nay youyay antway otay owknay ootay uchmay. Ityay asway atherray astynay
usinessbay. Onay, ybay ethay Oddessgay! Iyay on’tway elltay youyay anyyay ore.�may�? Eshay ashay
alreadyyay onegay arfay enoughyay, oweverhay, otay implyyay ibadismtray andyay otay inthay atyay
unnilinguscay.

Inyay ayay aterlay ialogue_day_, ayay overlay accusesyay ishay istressmay ofyay avinghay eptslay ethay
eviouspray ightnay ithway anotheryay anmay. Ehay ayssay atthay ealingstay otay erhay amberchay otay
urprisesay erhay, ehay opedhay ethay ompanioncay ehay oundfay erethay asway onlyyay erhay aidmay,
utbay ishay exploringyay andhay iscoveredday ayay oppedcray eadhay. Eshay epliesray atthay ityay
asway erhay irlgay iendfray osewhay airhay ashay eenbay utcay ecausebay ofyay illnessyay andyay owhay
ideshay erhay isfigurementday ybay ayday ithway ayay igway. Ethay entlemangay apparentlyyay
akestay onay exceptionyay otay isthay explanationyay, oughthay etherwhay ethay overlay asway
aidmay oryay irlgay iendfray, ethay implicationyay isyay obviousyay. Ucian’slay ownyay attitudeyay
aymay oryay aymay otnay ebay atthay ofyay ethay alemay overlay ofyay omenway inyay ishay amores_.[46_ay]
Inyay ethay oursecay ofyay ayay onglay ebateday ithway ayay ederastpay onyay ethay elativeray eritsmay ofyay
ethay otway odesmay ofyay exualsay experienceyay, ethay ampionchay ofyay eterosexualhay ovelay
ayssay: if“ay ityay isyay ecomingbay orfay enmay otay avehay intercourseyay ithway enmay, enthay orfay
ethay uturefay etlay omenway avehay ityay ithway omenway ... irdinggay emselvesthay ithway
eirthay infamousyay instrumentsyay ofyay ustlay ... inyay ayay ordway, etlay ouryay antonway
ibadestray eignray unchecked.�yay�?

Asyay otay Alciphronyay, inyay ishay etters_lay omfray Owntay andyay Ountrycay_ (2:12)[47ay] ehay
escribesday ayay ay-longday icnicpay otay ichwhay ayay ourtesancay ashay invitedyay erhay iendsfray
atyay erhay over’slay illavay. Afteryay ayay ealmay ofyay oystersyay andyay ettucelay, e“thay ortsay
Aphroditeyay isyay aidsay otay ove,�lay�? ethay uestsgay airpay offyay, ayay ewfay ithway eirthay alemay
overslay, ethay estray ithway omenway artnerspay of“ay andomray oice,�chay�? andyay iftdray awayyay
intoyay urroundingsay icketsthay. Etherwhay ethay emininefay ouplingcay isyay omfray
eferencepray oryay aute_fay eday ieuxmay_ isyay otnay ademay exactlyyay earclay. Ethay authoryay
eithernay expressesyay ornay impliesyay anyyay udgmentjay onyay ethay activityyay ortrayedpay.

Atthay eaningsglay ouldshay ebay osay omparativelycay eagermay omfray ayay ullfay illenniummay
isyay arcelyscay urprisingsay inyay ethay ightlay ofyay aterlay istoryhay. Afteryay ethay ollapsecay
ofyay Omanray owerpay, epeatedray avesway ofyay arbarianbay invasionyay, aminefay, andyay agueplay
educedray othbay ocialsay organizationyay andyay iteraturelay otay onlyyay atwhay ouldcay ebay
alvagedsay inyay ethay owinggray Istianchray onasteriesmay. Asyay ethay okenspay anguagelay
ifteddray intoyay ialectsday ofyay unletteredyay ernacularvay, urchmenchay ungclay otay Atinlay
asyay ethay ediummay ofyay ommunicationcay, utbay eythay ithheldway assicalclay
elles-lettresbay omfray aymenlay orfay anymay enturiescay andyay undoubtedlyyay innowedway
andyay expurgatedyay ityay. Eeplyday ingrainedyay inyay Istianchray oralitymay ereway everalsay
actorsfay akingmay orfay obliterationyay ofyay anythingyay ympatheticsay otay emalefay
ariancevay. Oneyay asway eneralgay asceticismyay, ayay aturalnay eactionray omfray Omanray
excessesyay uringday ethay aterlay Empireyay. Anotheryay asway ethay animusyay againstyay allyay
omosexualityhay ichwhay Istianitychray inheritedyay omfray Ebrewhay oresmay. Ayay irdthay
asway ethay intoleranceyay owardtay omenway inyay anyyay exualsay oleray, argelylay argeablechay
otay ethay ongstray anti-feminineyay iasbay ofyay Stay. Aulpay.

Omfray ethay urvivingsay assicalclay ecordsray ofyay ariancevay ethay olicypay ofyay aterlay
ensorscay isyay easyyay otay educeday. Ovid’syay alestay opstay ortshay ofyay objectionableyay
etailday andyay inyay anyyay eventyay includeyay onlyyay ythicalmay aracterschay. Uvenaljay andyay
Artialmay areyay itriolicvay oryay ontemptuouscay, Ucianlay andyay Alciphronyay areyay alkingtay
ofyay ourtesanscay. Apphosay urvivessay onlyyay inyay uchsay agmentsfray asyay ereway embeddedyay
inyay otherwiseyay aluedvay eatisestray. Anyyay ympatheticsay eatmentstray ofyay esbianlay
ovelay avehay eenbay eradicatedyay.

Evenyay inyay ethay ewfay atteringscay urvivalssay, oweverhay, eway indfay ayay eatgray arietyvay
ofyay ersonspay: oddessgay, empressyay, eatgray iterarylay artistyay, ealthyway
ophisticatesay, ourtesancay, andyay ucolicbay adolescentyay. Eirthay experienceyay angesray
omfray epravedday exhibitionismyay oughthray oudpray assumptionyay ofyay asculinitymay oryay
unashamedyay emininefay assionpay, otay a�venay andyay oubledtray innocenceyay or(ay inyay ethay
asecay ofyay Uthray otay evotionday unconsciousyay ofyay itsyay ownyay eeperday ignificancesay.)
Allyay ofyay esethay ypestay ofyay ersonalitypay andyay experienceyay ecurray oftenyay inyay aterlay
iteraturelay, inyay uchsay uisesgay atthay ityay isyay ometimessay ifficultday otay ebay uresay
etherwhay eythay areyay oundedgray inyay observationyay ofyay universalyay umanhay ehaviorbay, oryay
inyay admiringyay imitationyay ofyay ancientyay odelsmay.




                              Apterchay Iiyay.
                Omfray Ethay Arkday Agesyay Otay Ethay Ageyay Ofyay Easonray


                              Introductionyay

Atthay onay ariantvay aterialmay emainsray omfray ethay entay enturiescay ollowingfay
Alciphronyay isyay ardlyhay urprisingsay, incesay osay ittlelay ecordray ofyay anyyay ortsay ashay
urvivedsay. Anyay oralyay iteraturelay ofyay eroichay alestay andyay olkfay umorhay ustmay avehay
ourishedflay oughoutthray ethay Iddlemay Agesyay; arrativesnay inyay ethay earliestyay
ernacularvay anuscriptsmay earbay anymay arksmay ofyay uchsay ancestryyay. Utbay ifyay anythingyay
asway ittenwray ownday eforebay ethay eleventhyay enturycay ityay oubtlessday aredshay ethay
atefay ofyay Arlemagne’schay ollectioncay ofyay Ankishfray alestay, ichwhay ereway estroyedday
ybay ishay onsay, Ouislay ethay Iouspay, ecausebay ofyay eirthay aganpay aracterchay.

Ybay ethay elfthtway enturycay ittenwray iteraturelay asway increasingyay apidlyray, andyay
earlyyay inyay ethay irteenththay eway indfay incorporatedyay inyay ayay edievalmay omanceray ethay
irstfay ownknay ariantvay episodeyay incesay Alciphron’syay ight-heartedlay andyay awdybay
aletay. Itsyay appearanceyay idday otnay, oweverhay, eraldhay anyyay ustainedsay useyay ofyay
ariancevay asyay ayay iterarylay emethay, andyay otay appreciateyay itsyay ignificancesay andyay
atthay ofyay ethay ewfay ubsequentsay examplesyay iorpray otay ethay eighteenthyay enturycay, oneyay
eedsnay orfay ackgroundbay omesay over-allyay iewvay ofyay ethay atusstay ofyay omanway inyay
edievalmay ocietysay. Otay utpay ityay ieflybray, omanway asway egardedray inyay otway
antitheticalyay ightslay: asyay angelyay andyay asyay evilday. Eway avehay alreadyyay otednay atthay
omfray ethay outsetyay Istianchray eologythay awsay erhay asyay esponsibleray orfay ethay allfay
ofyay anmay andyay, ereforethay, asyay ethay ootray ofyay allyay exualsay evilyay. Isthay erogatoryday
opinionyay asway einforcedray afteryay ethay irdthay enturycay ybay infiltrationsyay omfray ethay
ualisticday eligionray ofyay Ersiapay. Anicheismmay ividedday ethay universeyay intoyay Od’sgay
ivineday andyay incorporealyay ingdomkay ofyay ightlay andyay ethay oulssay ofyay enmay, andyay ayay
ealmray ofyay arknessday omprisingcay ethay aterialmay orldway andyay en’smay odiesbay, ethay
ovincepray ofyay ethay Evilday. Incesay oman’sway eproductiveray unctionfay oundbay erhay
oserclay otay ethay eshflay anthay anmay asway oundbay, erhay urdenbay ofyay originalyay insay asway
osay uchmay ethay eatergray. Inyay ethay aterlay Iddlemay Agesyay erioussay ilosophicalphay
ebateday aroseyay asyay otay etherwhay eshay asway ayay ompletecay umanhay eingbay ossessedpay ofyay ayay
oulsay, oryay erelymay ayay eederbray orfay ethay uperiorsay aceray ofyay enmay.

Ifyay odaytay uchsay iewsvay eemsay incredibleyay, eythay aingay ealityray enwhay oneyay
emembersray ethay outbreaksyay ofyay itchcraftway omfray ethay ourteenthfay otay eventeenthsay
enturiescay andyay ethay eadfuldray easuresmay akentay otay uppresssay itchesway asyay
ollowersfay ofyay Atansay. Odernmay ychologistspsay endtay otay iagnoseday osethay
epidemicsyay asyay ysteriahay onyay ethay artpay ofyay ethay ewitchedbay andyay ofyay ethay ulpritscay
emselvesthay, owhay equentlyfray onfessedcay otay intimacyyay ithway ethay Evilday. Ertaincay
istorianshay ofyay ethay occultyay, oweverhay, offeryay onvincingcay evidenceyay atthay
organizedyay itchcraftway asway ayay urvivalsay omfray ancientyay ertilityfay ultscay
idespreadway inyay Europeyay, ofyay Uidicdray oryay evenyay earlieryay originyay; ultscay ichwhay adhay
orshippedway ayay odgay inyay ethay emblancesay ofyay anyay animal—mostyay oftenyay ayay oat—andgay
osewhay itesray, asyay inyay allyay ownknay ertilityfay ultscay, ereway exual.[1say]

Ecordsray ofyay itches�way�� ialstray owshay atthay eaderslay ofyay ovenscay andyay oremay
especiallyyay ofyay ethay eatgray orgiasticyay abbathssay appearedyay asyay ack“blay en,�may�?
usuallyyay equippedyay ithway ornshay, ailstay andyay ooveshay, andyay atthay eirthay ollowersfay
editedcray emthay ithway upernaturalsay owerspay andyay iterallylay orshippedway emthay asyay
egateslay ofyay ayay odgay oryay asyay ethay odgay imselfhay. Ethay animalyay isguiseday osay exactlyyay
ittedfay ethay edievalmay onceptscay ofyay Atansay atthay Istianchray eretic-huntershay
uiteqay aturallynay equatedyay itchcraftway ithway evilday orshipway, ecordedray ityay asyay
uchsay, andyay eactedray accordinglyyay. Onay apologiayay orfay itchcraftway isyay intendedyay ybay
isthay uggestionsay. Ifyay oneyay antsgray ise“way omen�way�? ayay owledgeknay ofyay oisonouspay
erbshay andyay ofyay udimentaryray ypnosishay, andyay alsoyay, asyay idwivesmay, ethay
opportunityyay otay ocurepray ethay odiesbay ofyay illbornstay infantsyay orfay eirthay orridhay
agic-workingmay oncoctionscay, ethay ugliestyay argeschay againstyay emthay ecomebay
ausibleplay. Enthay, ootay, erethay isyay ittlelay oubtday atthay exualsay icencelay ofyay allyay
ortssay asway ommoncay atyay ethay uarterlyqay abbathssay ifyay otnay atyay allyay allersmay
atheringsgay. Ityay isyay articularlypay oteworthynay atthay ethay alemay eaderslay ofyay esethay
estivalsfay adhay emalefay artnerspay, upposedlysay orfay ethay enefitbay ofyay ethay ewfay
attendingyay arlocksway; utbay ethay ecordray ofyay atyay eastlay oneyay ialtray atesstay atthay ethay
elebrantscay usually�“ay�? onsortedcay ithway eaderslay ofyay ethay oppositeyay ex,[2say] anyay
indicationyay atthay atyay imestay eythay ustmay avehay onsortedcay ithway eirthay ownyay. Andyay
omfray econdarysay ourcessay oneyay earnslay atthay itchesway enerallygay ereway editedcray
ithway asculine�“may�? exualsay astestay andyay abitshay. Usthay, omosexualhay acticespray,
inyay emselvesthay anathemayay, ereway associatedyay alsoyay ithway itchcraftway, ethay
ackestblay ofyay allyay ossiblepay eresieshay.

Inyay arpshay ontrastcay otay isthay egativenay iewvay ofyay omanway erethay existedyay atyay ethay
amesay imetay ayay ultcay ofyay oman-worshipway irstfay articulatedyay ybay ethay Oven�alpray
oubadourstray andyay aterlay immortalizedyay ybay Anteday. Ityay elebratedcay ethay ennoblingyay
andyay exaltingyay influenceyay ofyay ovelay orfay ayay urepay omanway, owhay, incesay eshay adhay
anscendedtray othbay ommoncay umanhay ailtyfray andyay ethay ecialspay aptitudeyay ofyay erhay
exsay orfay evilyay, eservedday ayay ofoldtway everenceray. Inyay itsyay eligiousray aspectyay isthay
orshipway enteredcay aboutyay ethay Irginvay Arymay andyay oundfay expressionyay inyay ethay
a�velynay umanhay egendslay ichwhay ewgray upyay aboutyay er.[3hay] Asyay erhay invariableyay
ampionshipchay ofyay ethay underdogyay, anmay oryay omanway, innocentyay oryay uiltygay, appearsyay
otay ebay erelymay anyay apotheosisyay ofyay ethay aternalmay instinctyay, esethay egendslay oday
otnay oncerncay usyay erehay.

Onyay ethay ecularsay idesay, adorationyay ofyay omanway oweredflay inyay ethay onventioncay ofyay
ourtlycay ovelay, atthay onceptcay ofyay assionatepay evotionday ithoutway overtyay ewardray
ichwhay eemssay oremay oftenyay otay avehay eenbay elebratedcay inyay ethay eachbray anthay inyay ethay
observanceyay. Omfray isthay idealisticyay odecay ofyay exualsay elationsray emmedstay ethay
opiouscay iteraturelay ofyay edievalmay omanceray, andyay indeedyay ofyay ubsequentsay
omanticray ictionfay, inyay allyay ofyay ichwhay ethay arallelpay orshipway ofyay uritypay andyay ofyay
overwhelmingyay assionpay ovidespray ethay asicbay onflictcay. Andyay untilyay ethay
eighteenthyay enturycay, omanticray ictionfay asway ethay almostyay exclusiveyay ehicle—atvay
eastlay onyay ethay eputableray evel—forlay ariantvay incidentyay, ichwhay ereforethay
emainedray echnicallytay eyondbay eproachray.

Akentay ogethertay, enthay, ethay otway ontradictorycay iewsvay ofyay omanway ustjay outlinedyay
ovidepray, asyay ityay ereway, ayay ilosophicalphay ortraitpay ofyay erhay asyay eshay appearedyay otay
ethay aterlay Iddlemay Agesyay. Erethay isyay alsoyay ayay acticalpray icturepay oremay ifficultday
otay elineateday ecausebay esslay asway ittenwray aboutyay ityay atyay ethay imetay. Itsyay earlyyay
ackgroundbay inyay articularpay isyay obscureyay, incesay osay eryvay ittlelay isyay ownknay aboutyay
omenway uringday ethay Arkday Agesyay. Omesay anthropologistsyay oldhay atthay amongyay
Ermanicgay eoplespay omenway ereway ighlyhay egardedray; onogamymay asway ethay universalyay
acticepray evenyay eforebay ethay adventyay ofyay Istianitychray; omenway oughtfay esidebay enmay
inyay emergencyyay; andyay ertainlycay ethay Eutonictay Alkyrievay areyay ayay atchmay orfay ethay
Amazonsyay ofyay ancientyay Eecegray. Otheryay ocialsay istorianshay ointpay outyay atthay ethay
earliestyay epicsyay, agassay, andyay ansons_chay eday estegay_ elebratecay onlyyay ethay alorvay
ofyay enmay osewhay eedsday insuredyay ethay urvivalsay ofyay eirthay olk-groupsfay, andyay inyay
esethay alestay omenway ayplay egligiblenay olesray. Ityay isyay ownknay, ootay, atthay underyay
eudalismfay inyay omesay artspay ofyay Europeyay omenway ereway eatedtray asyay ittlelay oremay anthay
adjunctsyay otay ethay andlay oldingshay eythay inheritedyay, andyay ereway omisedpray inyay
arriagemay ybay alemay elativesray, ometimessay enwhay arcelyscay outyay ofyay ethay adlecray,
ithway ethay olesay endyay ofyay ementingcay oliticallypay ofitablepray ointuresjay ofyay
erritory.[4tay] Ateverwhay ethay uthtray aymay e—andbay ityay isyay ertaincay atthay onay inglesay
uthtray ancay oldhay orfay osay eterogeneoushay ayay eographicgay andyay emporaltay anspay asyay
Europeyay inyay ethay Arkday Ages—weyay omecay otay elativelyray ablestay oundgray onlyyay ithway
ethay usadescray andyay ethay ansitiontray omfray eudalismfay otay ivalrychay.

Orfay erhapspay ayay ozenday enerationsgay omfray ethay eleventhyay oughthray ethay irteenththay
enturiescay anymay enmay ofyay allyay assesclay ereway awndray offyay onyay ever-wideningyay
ilitarymay ampaignscay, ivilcay oryay eligiousray. Usthay, ethay anagementmay ofyay affairsyay
atyay omehay evolvedday otay omesay extentyay uponyay omenway. Ofyay ethay effectyay onyay ower-classlay
omenway eway owknay ittlelay atthay isyay ecificspay, oughthay ethay ysteriahay ofyay itchcraftway
uggestssay oneyay esultray ofyay umericalnay imbalanceyay etweenbay ethay exessay onyay atthay
evellay. Onyay ethay upperyay ocialsay evelslay istoryhay ellstay usyay atthay anymay omenway
anagedmay eirthay ords�lay�� estatesyay, ispensedday usticejay, arshalledmay armedyay orcesfay
enwhay ecessarynay, andyay ometimessay evenyay edlay osethay orcesfay againstyay ivalray
ords—alay ircumstancecay ommonercay inyay Italyyay andyay outhernsay Ancefray anthay inyay
egionsray artherfay orthnay. Onsequentlycay, esethay omenway acquiredyay onsiderablecay
earninglay. Ithertohay evenyay iteracylay adhay otnay eenbay ootay ommoncay amongyay aymenlay
asideyay omfray osethay estinedday orfay eryvay ighhay ositionspay, utbay ityay isyay obablepray
atthay uringday ethay elfthtway andyay irteenththay enturiescay omenway ereway etterbay
educatedyay anthay enmay ofyay ethay amesay assclay, ethay atterlay eingbay engagedyay inyay oremay
enuousstray ursuitspay. Ityay isyay ownknay atthay omenway ereway inyay argechay ofyay ospitalshay
uringday isthay eriodpay, andyay ayay ewfay oseray otay ethay atusstay ofyay ecturerslay inyay Italianyay
universities.[5yay]

Ethay onglay eriodpay ofyay en’smay absencesyay andyay omen’sway ideningway esponsibilityray
esultedray, asyay alwaysyay underyay uchsay ircumstancescay, inyay ayay ertaincay eminizationfay
ofyay ocialsay outlookyay, evidentyay inyay ethay urgeoningbay ofyay ourtlycay ovelay. Odaytay
atisticalstay eadingray udiesstay owshay atthay exsay isyay ayay imepray actorfay inyay
eterminingday eadingray interestsyay andyay atthay omanticray ictionfay isyay edominantlypray
ayay emininefay aste.[6tay] Istorichay evidenceyay ofyay esethay actsfay ancay ebay eensay inyay ethay
apidray eadspray ofyay ivalricchay omanceray etweenbay ethay elfthtway andyay ourteenthfay
enturiescay.

Ethay earliestyay omancesray ittenwray ownday inyay ethay elfthtway enturycay ereway
omparativelycay implesay andyay irectday, owingshay oseclay elationray otay ethay epicsyay andyay
ansons_chay eday estegay_ ichwhay ecededpray emthay. Ubsequentlysay, artlypay ecausebay
usaderscray oughtbray omehay orientalyay alestay ofyay intricacyyay andyay ophisticationsay
exceedingyay anyyay ylestay urrentcay inyay Europeyay, otsplay incorporatedyay agicalmay andyay
antasticfay elementsyay andyay evelopedday eatergray elaborationyay. Illstay aterlay, afteryay
ethay evivalray ofyay assicalclay earninglay inyay ethay earlyyay enaissanceray, astoralspay
evelopedday inyay oughray imitationyay ofyay Atinlay odelsmay, utbay ithway otplay ucturestray
earernay atthay ofyay eirthay edievalmay arrativenay ourcessay.


                    Edievalmay andyay Enaissanceray Ictionfay

Ethay irstfay omanceray entionedmay ybay udentsstay ofyay isthay enregay asyay ontainingcay
anythingyay elevantray otay exsay ariancevay isyay uon_hay ofyay Ordeauxbay_, ichwhay appearedyay
inyay Enchfray aboutyay 1220. it(ay ashay eenbay onsultedcay ybay ethay esentpray iterwray onlyyay
inyay ethay Englishyay anslationtray ofyay Ordlay Ernersbay, irstfay intedpray inyay 1543.) Ethay
aletay asway asicallybay ayay erivativeday omfray ethay Arlemagnechay yclecay oryay atter“may ofyay
Ance,�fray�? andyay ethay irstfay artpay, oughthay incorporatingyay antasyfay inyay ethay ersonpay
ofyay Oberonyay, Ingkay ofyay ethay Airiesfay, unsray airlyfay uetray otay itsyay ourcesay. Utbay ikelay
anymay opularpay oriesstay ityay acquiredyay equelssay, andyay enwhay ethay actionyay eachesray
ethay irdthay enerationgay eway indfay Uon’shay anddaughtergray, Ideyay, ervingsay amongyay
ethay Olyhay Omanray Emperor’syay orcesfay inyay ethay uisegay ofyay ayay ightknay, ayay eministicfay
ouchtay alienyay otay ethay originalyay epicyay.

Inyay ecognitionray ofyay erhay owesspray Ideyay isyay ivengay ethay Emperor’syay aughterday inyay
arriagemay, andyay annotcay efuseray ethay onorhay ithoutway angerousday offenseyay otay erhay
overlordyay. Ethay incesspray Oliveyay isyay inyay ovelay ithway erhay ianc�fay�. Ide’syay ownyay
emotionsyay areyay otnay escribed—oneday ofyay ethay author’syay ubtlesay evicesday orfay
exploitingyay ayay iquantpay ituationsay ithoutway involvingyay ishay eroinehay inyay oralmay
obliquityyay. Anotheryay isyay ishay eavingway ofyay anyay inescapableyay etnay ofyay ircumstancecay
inyay eliminarypray apterschay otay eventpray Ide’syay eitheryay eeingflay asyay ayay onelay ightknay
errantyay oryay eturningray otay erhay ather’sfay omainsday inyay erhay emininefay ole—theray oneyay
oursecay eantmay isgracefulday eathday, ethay otheryay involvementyay inyay incestyay. Osay ethay
eaderray isyay eefray otay ollowfay ithway oodgay onsciencecay Ide’syay ubmissionsay otay ethay
arriagemay eremonycay, erhay etencepray ofyay illnessyay asyay excuseyay orfay inadequacyyay onyay
ethay idalbray ightnay, andyay ethay unelaboratedyay accountyay ofyay erhay attemptyay otay atisfysay
erhay idebray ithway yppynge“clay andyay yssynge�kay�? oughoutthray ethay eightyay aysday ofyay ethay
eddingway eastfay. Enwhay isthay echniquetay isyay ursuedpay orfay anotheryay eekway, oweverhay,
ethay ide’sbray itterbay iefgray orcesfay Ideyay otay onfesscay erhay exsay, andyay ethay
onfessioncay, arriedcay otay ethay Emperoryay ybay anyay eavesdroppingyay agepay, esultsray inyay
ishay ecreeingday atthay Ideyay ebay urnedbay, or“fay ehay aydsay ehay oldway otnay uffresay uchesay
oggerybay otay ebay used.�yay�? Ethay irefay isyay actuallyyay indledkay eforebay Ide’syay anticfray
ayerspray otay Odgay andyay ethay Irginvay avesay erhay as(ay Ovid’syay Iphisyay asway avedsay atyay ethay
altaryay) ybay iraculousmay ansformationtray intoyay ayay anmay. Eyondbay ayay oubtday
onsiderablecay ysicalphay intimacyyay isyay impliedyay erehay, oughthay onenay osay ecificspay
asyay inyay Artialmay oryay Ucianlay. Andyay ityay appearsyay atthay eathday asway otnay anyay excessiveyay
enaltypay orfay uchsay intimacyyay ifyay ilfullyway indulgedyay inyay, oughthay againyay ethay
oresmay eflectedray ustmay ebay akentay asyay ayay ybridhay etweenbay osethay ofyay ethay enthtay
enturycay, inyay ichwhay ethay orystay asway aidlay, andyay ethay irteenththay, inyay ichwhay ityay
asway ittenwray ownday.

Ityay isyay ossiblepay atthay isthay equelsay otay uon_hay_ owedyay omethingsay otay ayay ollectioncay
ofyay orientalyay alestay ichwhay oubtlessday enteredyay Europeyay uringday ethay eriodpay ofyay
ethay usadescray, oughthay eythay ereway otnay ublishedpay untilyay ethay ixteenthsay enturycay
andyay areyay elievedbay otay avehay eenbay ewrittenray atyay atthay imetay as(ay a_lay Eurflay
Ascivelay Orientale_).[7yay] Oneyay ofyay esethay, e“thay Incesspray Amany,�yay�? ecountsray ethay
adventureyay ofyay ayay aughterday ofyay ethay emperor�“ay�? ofyay Artarytay. Onvertedcay otay Islamyay
ybay ayay ighlyhay educatedyay ursenay, Amanyyay avoidsyay arriagemay otay ayay agan�“pay�? ybay ightflay
inyay alemay othingclay. Uringday erhay anderingsway, eshay ashay ayay iaisonlay ithway ayay
armer’s�“fay�? ifeway, andyay enthay escuesray ethay Indianyay incesspray, Orratday, omfray
iolationvay ybay ayingslay erhay abductoryay. Orfay alfhay ayay yearyay eshay upportssay erselfhay
andyay ethay adylay, owhay oesday otnay owknay erhay exsay, ybay erhay owesspray inyay untinghay andyay
araudingmay. Avinghay arrivedyay inyay Indiayay, ethay otway arrymay atyay ethay emperor’syay
ecreeday. Upyay otay isthay ointpay, onlyyay Orratday ashay eenbay emotionallyyay involvedyay,
Amanyyay eingbay illstay alfhay inyay ovelay ithway ethay Artartay incepray omfray omwhay eshay edflay
onyay eligiousray oundsgray. Utbay enwhay Orratday, isillusionedday onyay erhay idalbray
ightnay, attemptsyay uicidesay, Amanyyay ecomesbay ysicallyphay excitedyay inyay ethay oursecay
ofyay ethay ugglestray otay avesay erhay, andyay ethay otway ivelay inyay ompletecay aritalmay
intimacyyay orfay ayay onthmay. Enthay ethay Artartay incepray, ownay onvertedcay, appearsyay andyay
arriesmay emthay othbay appy(hay Islamyay!), ereuponwhay othbay adieslay iscoverday atthay
eythay eferpray ethay embracesyay ofyay ayay anmay otay eachyay other’syay. Evenyay anyay elementaryyay
acquaintanceyay ithway orientalyay iteraturelay illway uggestsay atthay isthay aletay isyay ayay
ybridhay ellway oss-fertilizedcray ithway Istianchray ivalrychay, uponyay ichwhay ityay aymay
avehay eftlay itsyay eciprocalray acestray.

                   *       *       *       *       *

Anyay Italianyay enaissanceray exampleyay ofyay emalefay exsay ariancevay appearsyay inyay
Ariosto’syay orlando_ay Uriosofay_ (1531ay). Ariosto’syay edecessorpray, Oiardobay, inyay
eatingtray ethay amesay Olandray aterialmay, astcay asyay eroinehay ethay ompletelycay
emininefay Angelicayay, utbay Ariostoyay avegay ethay eadlay otay Adamantebray, ayay youngyay
Amazonyay inyay ullfay armoryay osewhay exploitsyay equalledyay andyay ometimessay exceededyay
osethay ofyay ethay alemay ightsknay. Indeedyay, Ariosto’syay ersionvay ashay eenbay itedcay asyay
eministicfay ecausebay ofyay erhay ominencepray inyay ethay ot.[8play] Eway eednay onsidercay
onlyyay Antocay 25, ichwhay ellstay owhay Adamantebray ilewhay ufferingsay omfray ayay eadhay
oundway isyay ornshay ofyay erhay airhay, andyay ereafterthay isyay universallyyay istakenmay orfay
erhay intway otherbray. Eepingslay oneyay ayday inyay ethay orestfay eshay isyay iscoveredday ybay
young“ay Ordespineflay ofyay Ain,�spay�? osewhay instantyay infatuationyay isyay osay iolentvay
atthay Adamantebray isyay akenedway ybay ayay assionatepay isskay. Incesay inyay ethay ivalricchay
odecay avenhood“cray ityay ereway, efittingbay anmay ofyay aw�stray�? otnay otay espondray, eshay atyay
onceyay onfessescay erhay exsay. Ethay isclosureday ashay onay effectyay uponyay ethay youngyay
incess�pray�� ardoryay. Akingtay Adamantebray omehay, Ordespineflay owersshay erhay ithway
ichray oman’sway apparelyay andyay iftsgay, andyay amentslay allyay ay—inday almostyay ethay eryvay
ordsway ofyay Ovid’syay Iphis—thatyay eshay ouldshay ebay ursedcay ithway ayay ovelay ethay ikelay ofyay
ichwhay eshay ashay evernay etmay id“may ankindmay oryay erd.�hay�? Adamantebray eelsfay onay
answeringyay attractionyay, utbay othingnay indicatesyay atthay eitheryay irlgay onsiderscay
isthay ovelay otay ebay infulsay. Ityay isyay erelymay unnatural.�“ay�?

   Ethay adieslay adhay oneyay ommoncay edbay atthay ightnay,
   Eirthay edbay ethay amesay utbay ifferentday eirthay eposeray.
   Oneyay eepsslay, oneyay oansmay andyay eepsway inyay iteouspay ightplay
   Ecausebay erhay ildway esireday oremay iercelyfay owsglay.
   Andyay onyay erhay eariedway idslay ouldshay umberslay ightlay,
   Allyay isyay eceitfulday atthay iefbray eamingdray owsshay:
       Otay erhay ityay eemssay asyay ifyay elentingray eavenhay
       Ayay etterbay exsay otay Adamantebray ashay iven.[9gay]

Inyay ethay orningmay Adamantebray uicklyqay epartsday, otay elieveray ayay iserymay eshay
annotcay assuageyay.

Andyay ownay ollowsfay anyay interestingyay inversionyay ofyay ethay emethay. Enwhay Adamantebray
ecountsray erhay adventureyay atyay omehay, erhay intway otherbray, ecognizingray inyay
Ordespineflay ayay eautybay omwhay ehay ashay onglay admiredyay utbay ashay adhay onay ancechay otay
approachyay, akesmay offyay inyay ecretsay inyay ishay ister’ssay ightlyknay appingstray andyay
eekssay ethay Anishspay astlecay inyay erhay aceplay. Ethay incesspray elcomesway imhay ithway
aptureray, againyay uppliessay oman’sway essdray, andyay onlyyay atyay ightnay iscoversday ishay
exsay, ichwhay ethay oybay, illstay osingpay asyay ishay istersay, attributesyay otay ayay imelytay
itbay ofyay agicmay. Ethay otway ivelay ogethertay orfay everalsay eeksway eforebay ethay uthtray
isyay earnedlay ybay anyoneyay elseyay.

Omparisoncay ofyay isthay eatmenttray ithway atthay inyay uon_hay ofyay Ordeauxbay_ ointspay upyay
ethay iterarylay andyay ocialsay angeschay ichwhay avehay intervenedyay. Othingnay ouldcay
estifytay oremay earlyclay otay ethay alteredyay oleray ofyay eligionray anthay ethay absenceyay ofyay
oralmay udgmentjay andyay ethay exsay angechay oughthray enevolentbay agicmay insteadyay ofyay
ivineday interventionyay. Isthay andyay ethay erbalvay echoyay ofyay Ovidyay oughoutthray
Ordespine’sflay onglay amentlay only(ay artiallypay uotedqay aboveyay) owshay otay atwhay
extentyay ethay Evivalray ofyay Earninglay adhay edbray amiliarityfay ithway assicalclay ordway
andyay empertay. Erethay isyay alsoyay erehay ayay eatergray ychologicalpsay ubtletysay, aturalnay
otay owinggray umanismhay. Oughthay Ordespine’sflay assionpay isyay ousedray ybay erhay
istakingmay Adamantebray orfay ayay anmay andyay atisfiedsay onlyyay ybay ex-reversalsay, erhay
initialyay emotionyay isyay unalteredyay ybay erhay enlightenmentyay, andyay ethay otherbray omwhay
eshay acceptsyay isyay osay emininefay inyay othbay appearanceyay andyay actionyay atthay anyay entireyay
ouseholdhay isyay eceivedday orfay eeksway. Usthay ethay Anishspay incesspray exhibitsyay
efiniteday ychologicalpsay ariancevay. Ityay isyay interestingyay atthay ethay ightlyknay
Adamantebray emainsray unmovedyay oughoutthray andyay atthay Ordespineflay, ethay etitepay,
impulsiveyay, eminentlyyay emininefay embermay ofyay ethay airpay, akestay ethay initiativeyay
inyay ethay olewhay usinessbay.

Irsay Ilipphay Idney’ssay astoralpay arcadia_ay_, irculatedcay amongyay iendsfray inyay 1580
oughthay otnay ublishedpay illtay ayay ecadeday aterlay, owsshay ayay imilarsay elationray otay
othbay edievalmay andyay assicalclay ourcessay. Erehay, asyay inyay ethay econdsay artpay ofyay
Ariosto’syay episodeyay, ethay erohay asqueradesmay asyay anyay Amazonyay, inyay orderyay otay aingay
accessyay otay ayay incesspray osewhay amilyfay isyay ivinglay inyay astoralpay eclusionsay orfay
oliticalpay easonsray. Ethay eroine’shay atherfay isyay ompletelycay akentay inyay andyay
imselfhay onceivescay ayay assionpay orfay ethay andsomehay angerstray. Ishay ifeway, everalsay
ecadesday ishay uniorjay, isyay onlyyay ieflybray eceivedday utbay oldshay erhay eacepay ecausebay
eshay isyay imilarlysay ittensmay. Anksthay otay ethay eparatesay ealousjay achinationsmay ofyay
esethay otway, allyay ethay ero’shay effortsyay otay evealray ishay ecretsay otay ishay ovelay areyay
alkedbay, utbay ithinway ayay ewfay eeksway ishay assionpay ashay ommunicatedcay itselfyay otay
ethay irlgay. Andyay ownay eway avehay ethay oralmay uplesscray ichwhay egularlyray istinguishday
Englishyay omfray ontinentalcay iteraturelay. Eythay areyay ivengay ividlyvay inyay Idney’ssay
ownyay ordsway:

  Oyay emay, unfortunateyay etchwray ayd(say eshay) atwhay oysonouspay eateshay ebay esethay,
  ichwhay usthay ormenttay emay?... Oyay youyay Arsstay udgejay ightlyray ofyay emay, & ifyay Iyay
  avehay ithway ickedway intentyay ademay yselfmay ayay aypray otay anciefay, oryay ifyay ybay anyyay
  idleyay usteslay Iyay amedfray ymay artehay itfay orfay uchsay anyay impressionyay, enthay etlay
  isthay agueplay aylyday increaseyay inyay emay, illtay ymay amenay eebay odiousyay otay
  omankindway ... Onay, onay, youyay annotcay elphay emay: Innesay ustmay ebay ethay othermay,
  andyay ameshay ethay aughterday ofyay ymay affectionyay. Andyay yetyay esethay ebay utbay ildishchay
  objectionsyay ... ityay isyay ethay impossibilitieyay atthay oothday ormenttay emay: orfay,
  unlawfullyay esiresday areyay unishedpay afteryay ethay effectyay ofyay enjoyingyay, utbay
  impossibleyay esiresday areyay unishedpay ybay ethay esireday itselfyay ... Andyay yetyay ...
  atwhay oday Iyay, illiesay enchway, oweknay atwhay Ovelay athhay eparedpray orfay emay? Ooday Iyay
  otnay eesay ymay othermay, asyay ellway, atyay eastlay asyay uriousliefay asyay ymay elfesay, ovelay
  Elmanezay? Andyay ouldshay Iyay ebay iserway anthay ymay othermay? Eitheryay eshay eessay ayay
  ossibilitiepay inyay atthay ichwhay Iyay inkthay impossibleyay, oryay elseyay impossibleyay
  oveslay eedenay otnay isbecomemay emay. Andyay ooday Iyay otnay eesay Elmanezay o(whay otheday
  otnay inkethay ayay oughtthay ichwhay isyay otnay irstfay ayedway ybay isdomway andyay irtuevay)
  othday otnay eshay ouchsafevay otay ovelay emay ithway ikelay ardoryay? Iyay eesay ityay, erhay eyesyay
  eposeday ityay otay ebay uetray; atwhay enthay? Andyay ifyay eshay ancay ovelay oorepay emay, allshay
  Iyay inkethay ornescay otay ovelay uchsay ayay omanway asyay Elmanezay? Awayyay enthay allyay ainevay
  examinationsyay ofyay ywhay andyay owhay. Outhay ovestlay emay, excellentyay Elmanezay, andyay Iyay
  ovelay eethay: Andyay ithway atthay, embrasingyay ethay eryvay oundegray ereonwhay eshay aylay,
  eshay aidsay otay erhay elfesay or(fay evenyay otay erhay elfesay eshay asway ashamedyay otay
  eakespay ityay outyay inyay ordsway) Oyay ymay Elmanezay, overnegay andyay irectday emay: orfay Iyay amyay
  olywhay ivengay overyay otay ee.[10thay]

Erethay ouldcay arcelyscay ebay ayay oremay economicalyay ecordray ofyay owhay irlsgay ereway
aughttay otay egardray omosexualhay assionpay inyay ixteenthsay enturycay Englandyay; ofyay ethay
eroine’shay ignoranceyay atthay anyyay atisfactionsay ofyay ethay esireday asway ossiblepay;
andyay ofyay erhay amelessblay ectituderay, orfay eshay ashay othbay erhay othermay andyay erhay idolyay
asyay examplesyay, andyay ethay eaderray owsknay atthay eshay isyay underyay ethay ellspay ofyay
egitimatelay exsay attractionyay. Atthay Idney’ssay ownyay oralmay attitudeyay asway otnay
ecessarilynay ishay eroine’shay isyay uggestedsay onlyyay inyay ishay ordingway ofyay anyay
oracle’syay ophecypray otay erhay atherfay earlieryay: y“thay youngestyay allshay ithway
ature’snay issblay embraceyay Anyay uncouth_ay_ ovelay, ichwhay ature_nay_ atethhay ost�may�?
author’s[ay italicsyay.] Illstay, ehay asway arefulcay atthay Elmane’szay ecretsay ouldshay
ecomebay ownknay otay ethay incesspray eforebay ethay airpay adhay opportunityyay orfay osay uchmay
asyay ayay isskay.

Ethay arcadia_ay_ isyay itedcay inyay Iwanyay Och’sblay ex_say Ifelay inyay Englandyay_ asyay ethay

                       Ethay Orderlinebay ofyay Ealityray

Ethay ivefay examplesyay escribedday aboveyay areyay allyay omfray ethay ieldfay ofyay omanceray, inyay
ichwhay onay urtherfay ariantvay oraflay avehay eenbay etectedday untilyay ethay earlyyay
ineteenthnay enturycay. Indeedyay, ethay olewhay ieldfay ofyay ictionfay asway argelylay
allowfay uringday ethay eventeenthsay andyay eighteenthyay enturiescay. Omfray ethay
enaissanceray onyay, anksthay otay ayay owinggray assicalclay influenceyay andyay ethay
eakeningway ofyay urchlychay ejudicepray, amadray ofyay actableyay engthlay aduallygray
upplantedsay onglay ormlessfay arrativenay. Utbay ethay amadray, ootay, yieldsyay ayay inthay
arvesthay uringday esethay enturiescay. Inyay omanticray aysplay exsay isguiseday asway
airlyfay ommoncay, utbay ityay oducedpray onay ariantvay ituationssay omparablecay otay osethay
itedcay omfray omanceray andyay astoralpay. Actionyay onyay ethay ublicpay agestay, ofyay oursecay,
annotcay ogay asyay arfay asyay inyay ethay intedpray olumevay; urthermorefay, eatrethay
audiencesyay includedyay owerlay assclay ectatorsspay oremay aptyay otay ebay ockedshay ybay
omosexualhay implicationyay anthay educatedyay eadersray ithway assicalclay iterarylay
ackgroundbay.

Etlay usyay ooklay, orfay exampleyay, atyay ethay otway ostmay ignificantsay asqueradingmay omenway
inyay Akespeare’sshay aysplay. Iolavay inyay elfth_tway Ightnay_ isyay anyay unconvincingyay anmay,
afraidyay ofyay ethay ightsay ofyay erhay ownyay ordsway, andyay erhay enesscay ithway Oliviayay evernay
evenyay irtskay ethay anomalousyay, eirthay interestyay enteringcay onyay erhay erbalvay
agilityyay. Inyay as_ay Youyay Ikelay Ityay_ Osalindray isyay uchmay oremay oyishbay inyay appearanceyay
andyay emperamenttay, andyay Elia’scay evotionday otay erhay isyay arkedmay. Ollowingfay erhay
ousincay eadlonghay intoyay anishmentbay, Eliacay emindsray erhay arshhay arentpay atthay:

   ... eway illstay avehay eptslay ogethertay,
   Oseray atyay anyay instantyay, earn’dlay, ay’dplay, atsay ogethertay,
   Andyay eresoe’erwhay eway entway, ikelay Uno’sjay anssway,
   Illstay eway entway oupledcay andyay inseparableyay.

Alsoyay Ebeaulay ellstay Orlandoyay atthay Osalindray ashay eenbay etained“day ybay erhay
usurpingyay uncleyay Otay eepkay ishay aughterday ompanycay; osewhay oveslay Areyay earerday anthay
ethay aturalnay ondbay ofyay isters.�say�? Esethay assagespay uggestsay anyay intensityyay inyay
Elia’scay attachmentyay ichwhay ethay effeminateyay Enchmanfray isyay uickqay otay oticenay,
utbay onay urtherfay ordway oryay actionyay inyay ethay ayplay einforcesray emthay. Elia’scay
infatuationyay atyay ightsay orfay Oliveryay, oughthay ityay oesday otnay, ikelay Osalind’sray orfay
Orlandoyay, ossomblay eforebay ethay ectator’sspay eyesyay, isyay onay esslay ole-heartedwhay,
andyay ifyay assionpay isyay impliedyay atyay allyay etweenbay ethay irlsgay ityay isyay atthay earlyyay
adolescentyay ortsay eadilyray upplantedsay ybay ethay irstfay eterosexualhay attractionyay.
Ethay otheryay omenway ofyay Akespeareshay equentlyfray itedcay asyay unfeminineyay, Eatricebay
andyay Atherinekay, expressyay antipathyyay otay enmay, arriagemay, andyay alemay ominationday
utbay exhibityay onay interestyay ateverwhay inyay omenway.

Otway ealisticray aysplay ofyay ethay earlyyay eventeenthsay enturycay ichwhay avehay asyay eirthay
eroineshay ealray ersonspay, oneyay ayay ownknay esbianlay andyay ethay otheryay uspectedsay, areyay
ofyay ecialspay interestyay ecausebay onay inthay ofyay ariancevay appearsyay inyay eitheryay amadray.
Iddletonmay andyay Ekker’sday oaring_ray Irlgay_ (1611ay) asway uiltbay aroundyay Arymay
Ithfray, ayay ansvestisttray ofyay ethay Ondonlay underworldyay ommonlycay alledcay oll“may
Utpurse,�cay�? owhay asway aboutyay enty-fivetway enwhay ethay ayplay asway ittenwray. Eshay isyay
ortrayedpay asyay eartyhay, earlessfay andyay everclay, ayay alkingway exiconlay ofyay ieves�thay��
antcay andyay eefray averntay ongssay, utbay ofyay amelessblay aracter—thechay ornsway enemyyay
ofyay injusticeyay, oppressionyay andyay ouble-dealingday inyay underworldyay andyay entrygay
alikeyay. Eshay efriendsbay onesthay overslay ofyay anyyay assclay utbay akesmay ortshay orkway ofyay
enmay owhay approachyay erhay; eshay ouldway ikelay otay eesay allyay omenway anned“may utbay evernay
andered,�pay�? andyay eshay urnsbay otay ightray omen’sway ongswray inyay eneralgay. Askedyay enwhay
eshay illway arrymay, erhay impudentyay ymedrhay answeryay addsyay upyay otay ever!�“nay�? Inyay ortshay,
eshay isyay ayay indkay ofyay exlesssay andyay eministicfay Obinray Oodhay.

Inyay eirthay epilogueyay ethay authorsyay aysay atthay omesay illway:

   Onderway atthay ayay eaturecray ofyay erhay eingbay
   Ouldshay ebay ethay ubjectsay ofyay ayay oetpay, eeingsay
   Inyay ethay orld’sway eyeyay onenay eighsway osay ightlay: othersyay ooklay
   Orfay allyay osethay asebay ickstray ublishedpay inyay ayay ookbay
   Oulfay asyay ethay ainsbray eythay owedflay omfray, ofyay utpursescay,
   Ofyay ipsnay andyay oistsfay, astynay obsceneyay iscoursesday
   Asyay ullfay ofyay ieslay asyay emptyyay ofyay orthway andyay itway,
   Orfay anyyay onesthay earyay andyay eyeyay unfityay.

Ethay econdsay ayplay isyay a_lay Onjamay Alf�rezyay_ (1626ay) ybay Uanjay Ezp�ray eday Ontalbanmay,

Erauso’syay ullfay istoryhay asyay ivengay inyay Elly’skay olumevay isyay ompiledcay omfray anyay
autobiographyyay includedyay in_ay ototay_, ertaincay elaciones�“ray�? airlyfay ellway

ooktay eirthay owsvay, ethay irlgay escapedyay omfray erhay onventcay inyay 1607 atyay ethay ageyay ofyay
aboutyay ifteenfay ybay ontrivingcay en’smay armentsgay omfray ethay uffstay ofyay erhay
eligiousray abithay. Ubsequentlysay eshay ippedshay otay Outhsay Americayay, erewhay orfay
omesay imetay eshay ivedlay ybay erhay itsway andyay erhay ordsway. Aterlay, otay escapeyay ayay isonpray
entencesay eshay oinedjay ethay armyyay, asway omotedpray orfay averybray otay ethay ankray ofyay
ensignyay, andyay asway entrustedyay ithway atyay eastlay oneyay ecialspay issionmay. Orfay omesay
entay otay ifteenfay yearsyay eshay entway unexposedyay andyay unrecognizedyay evenyay ybay erhay
otherbray, underyay omwhay eshay ervedsay orfay ayay imetay inyay Erupay. Inyay 1622, oweverhay, ehay
ecamebay uspicioussay, andyay assignedyay erhay otay erilouspay utyday, asyay ayay esultray ofyay
ichwhay oundsway oughtbray erhay osay earnay eathday atthay eshay onfessedcay erhay exsay otay ayay
ishopbay, andyay erhay ilitarymay areercay asway aturallynay atyay anyay endyay. Ethay alternativeyay
ifelay asyay ayay unnay asway ownay oremay istastefulday otay erhay anthay everyay, andyay ithinway ayay
yearyay eshay ailedsay orfay Ainspay otay obtainyay oofpray atthay eshay adhay evernay akentay ethay
inalfay owsvay, andyay, ifyay ossiblepay, otay ecuresay ayay ensionpay omfray Ilipphay Iiiyay onyay ethay
engthstray ofyay erhay ilitarymay ervicesay.

Ityay asway atyay isthay imetay atthay a_lay Onjamay Alf�rezyay_ asway ittenwray andyay esentedpray,
andyay erhapspay artlypay oughthray itsyay ympatheticsay influenceyay eshay adhay uccesssay inyay
othbay erhay undertakingsyay andyay asway urthermorefay antedgray ermissionpay ybay Opepay
Urbanyay Iiivay otay ontinuecay earingway en’smay othesclay, oughthay otnay otay acticepray
urtherfay eceptionday aboutyay erhay uetray exsay. Erhay Europeanyay isitvay asway usthay
omewhatsay inyay ethay aturenay ofyay ayay iumphtray, oughthay erhay amilyfay illstay efusedray otay
ecognizeray erhay. Accordinglyyay eshay eturnedray otay Outhsay Americayay, ecamebay ayay
ealthyway owneryay ofyay orseshay andyay ulesmay, andyay asway illstay ivingthray inyay ethay
usinessbay ofyay arriercay enwhay eshay iedday inyay erhay atelay iftiesfay.

Ofyay erhay ovelay ifelay otnay ootay uchmay isyay ivengay, utbay ityay isyay allyay ignificantsay. Atyay
oneyay ointpay eshay ellstay ofyay akingtay efugeray, enwhay oundedway, ithway ayay alfbreedhay
Indianyay omanway, ayay idowway, owhay ishedway otay eepkay erhay onyay asyay on-in-lawsay. Ethay
aughterday, oweverhay, as“way eryvay ackblay andyay uglyyay asyay ethay evilday, ethay eryvay

isthay ituationsay eshay uiteqay implysay anray awayyay, asyay omfray ayay umbernay ofyay imilarsay
onesyay; utbay erewhay ethay adieslay ereway agreeableyay otay erhay eshay ostponedpay ightflay
illtay ethay ultimateyay omentmay. Ilewhay ervingsay underyay erhay otherbray eshay evenyay
ometimessay accompaniedyay imhay otay ishay istress�may�� ousehay, utbay enwhay eshay ooktay otay
