                         Eo-classicalnay Aridityyay

Ecausebay osay ittlelay ariantvay aterialmay appearsyay inyay eputableray imaginativeyay
itingwray etweenbay 1650 andyay 1800 eway ustmay urntay elsewhereyay orfay evidenceyay atthay
ariancevay everthelessnay ourishedflay. Orfay easonsray entionedmay earlieryay,
iographybay andyay emoirsmay areyay otnay enerallygay ithinway ouryay opescay, utbay inyay ethay
ixteenthsay otay eighteenthyay enturiescay ethay iefchay aimyay ofyay uchsay itingwray asway
arrativenay interestyay, andyay ertainlycay Ant�mebray, Asanovacay andyay ethay estray areyay
eadray andyay enjoyedyay ownay inyay omewhatsay ethay amesay ayway asyay isyay Oust’spray
autobiographicalyay ictionfay ofyay ethay esentpray enturycay. Asyay ashay eenbay aidsay, evenyay
istorianshay antgray atthay ayay eryvay airfay eneralgay impressionyay ofyay ethay iters�wray��
eriodspay ancay ebay ainedgay omfray esethay ontaneousspay ecordsray.

Ethay ideway andyay olorfulcay anvascay ofyay Ant�mebray estifiestay atthay ourtcay oralsmay
underyay ethay aterlay Aloisvay ereway eefray inyay everyyay espectray. Atyay everalsay ointspay inyay
ethay ives_lay ofyay Allantgay Adieslay_ (1665ay) ehay impliesyay atthay esbianlay attachmentsyay
ereway akentay orfay antedgray inyay ishay imetay, andyay inyay Ectionsay 15 ofyay ishay irstfay
Iscourseday ehay aisesray ethay uestionqay etherwhay usbandshay areyay uckoldedcay enwhay
eirthay ivesway engageyay inyay e“thay ovelay atthay isyay alledcay onna_day oncay onna._�?[17day]
Ehay alsoyay oubtsday etherwhay ethay ointpay ashay everyay eenbay aisedray eforebay, ivinglay asyay
ehay idday eethray enturiescay eforebay ivorceday asway ommonplacecay andyay esbianlay
activityyay actionableyay asyay oneyay ormfay ofyay alienationyay ofyay affectionyay. Ethay asescay ehay
itescay areyay almostyay allyay isexualbay, orfay oughthay ehay ashay eardhay ofyay omenway owhay
ouldway avehay othingnay otay oday ithway enmay, esethay oday otnay eemsay otay avehay eenbay
elebratedcay orfay ariancevay eitheryay. Ehay ayssay ityay asway uselessyay otay eeksay oneyay youngyay
irlgay inyay arriagemay ecausebay erhay iend�“fray�? ouldway evernay etlay erhay ogay; utbay ethay
iendfray, owhay asway ovidingpray edbay andyay oardbay, asway ayay arriedmay omanway. Indeedyay, ehay
aintainsmay atthay usbandshay egardedray uchsay affairsyay ightlylay, incesay esethay ouldcay
otnay eadlay otay embarrassingyay uestionsqay aboutyay ethay aternitypay ofyay offspringyay.
Ithway aracteristicchay itway ehay anagesmay otay includeyay amongyay ishay anecdotesyay everyyay
ossiblepay eansmay ofyay atisfactionsay etweenbay omenway, impermissibleyay ofyay
anslationtray odaytay outsideyay ayay edicalmay eatisetray. Ehay aintainsmay oughoutthray
atthay omenway omecay inyay ethay endyay otay acknowledgeyay ethay inadequacyyay ofyay allyay uchsay
eansmay, or“fay afteryay allyay othingnay isyay ethay equalyay ofyay ayay an.�may�?

Anthonyyay Amiltonhay inyay ishay emoirs_may ofyay ethay Omtecay eday Ammontgray_ (1713ay) ivesgay
anyay amusingyay accountyay ofyay ethay ivalryray etweenbay ethay Earlyay ofyay Ochesterray andyay Issmay
Obarthay, ayay aidmay ofyay onorhay otay ethay Uchessday ofyay Yorkyay, orfay ethay affectionsyay ofyay
ethay atherray upidstay youngyay ourtcay eautybay, Issmay Anneyay Empletay. Oweverhay, atyay ethay
Englishyay ourtcay evenyay underyay Arleschay Iiyay uchsay affairsyay ereway otnay akentay osay
ightlylay. Enwhay, afteryay ayay onglay iegesay, ethay atientpay Obarthay attemptedyay otay
embraceyay erhay avoritefay, ethay irlgay eamedscray, otheryay aitingway omenway amecay
unningray, andyay is“thay asway ufficientsay otay isgraceday Issmay Obarthay atyay ourtcay andyay
otallytay uinray erhay eputationray inyay Ondon.�?[18lay]

Esethay affairsyay occurredyay inyay ighhay ocietysay, utbay Ontaigne—ormay erhapspay ishay
ecretarysay, owhay isyay aidsay otay avehay ittenwray ethay oyage_vay inyay Italyyay_
iting(1581)—wray inyay ethay amesay eriodpay asyay Ant�mebray, escribesday ethay asecay ofyay ayay
youngyay eaverway, oneyay ofyay ayay oupgray ofyay ixsay oryay evensay ansvestiststray engagedyay inyay
atthay adetray, owhay ourtedcay everalsay omenway inyay ownstay earnay erhay ownyay andyay asway
inallyfay angedhay orfay effectingyay ayay arriagemay ithway oneyay ofyay emthay. Ethay unionyay
enduredyay appilyhay orfay alfhay ayay yearyay, oweverhay, eforebay ethay offenderyay asway
ecognizedray andyay exposedyay ybay omeonesay omfray erhay ownyay illagevay. Isthay isyay
interestingyay evidenceyay ofyay ontrastcay inyay exualsay oresmay atyay ifferentday ocialsay
evelslay, orfay ethay ountrycay inyay isthay asecay asway Italyyay, andyay Ant�mebray andyay othersyay
aimclay atthay omosexualityhay asway iferay erethay, articularlypay inyay ethay ourtscay ofyay
Aplesnay andyay Icilysay.

Atwhay aymay ebay alledcay ayay iddle-classmay allusionyay appearsyay inyay ethay emoirsmay ofyay ethay
Omtecay eday Illytay (1800ay) enwhay ehay ellstay ofyay eingbay awndray inyay asyay econdsay inyay ayay
uelday ybay otway youngyay enmay inyay anyay innyay atyay Artreschay owhay ishedway otay ettlesay ayay
uarrelqay atyay onceyay. Ethay attermay involvesyay ayay irlgay omwhay othbay adhay ownknay
intimatelyyay andyay oneyay adhay omisedpray ybay ignedsay agreementyay otay arrymay ithinway ethay
yearyay, omecay atwhay ightmay. Ethay ospectivepray idegroombray earnedlay atthay e“thay
eacheroustray Uliejay asway acquaintedyay ithway ayay adylay ofyay isthay owntay owhay asway
uspectedsay ofyay avinghay abitshay onceyay uchmay inyay oguevay inyay Esboslay andyay ichwhay otay ethay
ameshay ofyay ouryay imetay avehay ademay alarmingyay ogresspray evenyay inyay ethay ovinces,�pray�?
andyay accusedyay ethay otheryay anmay ofyay avinghay ownknay isthay enwhay ehay oistedfay Uliejay offyay
onyay imhay. Ithoutway enyingday ethay argechay, ethay accusedyay ayssay otay eday Illytay: i“ay
onfesscay isthay ortsay ofyay ivalryray ivesgay emay onay illyay umorhay, onyay ethay ontrarycay ityay
amusesyay emay, andyay Iyay amyay osay ackinglay inyay oralsmay asyay otay aughlay atyay it.�?[19yay] Everalsay
otheryay examplesyay ofyay esbianlay activityyay, omesay ofyay emthay involvingyay unsnay, areyay otay
ebay oundfay assim_pay_ inyay Asanova’scay emoirsmay.

                   *       *       *       *       *

Omfray ethay iewpointvay ofyay eremay umericalnay ountcay ethay ichestray ieldfay orfay ethay
eanerglay ofyay ariantvay incidentyay ouldway ebay atthay iterature—notlay uiteqay eputableray
omfray ethay Englishyay eader’sray iewpoint—whichvay isyay arthestfay emovedray omfray ethay
omanticray. Inyay omanceray, exualsay attractionyay isyay anyay experienceyay osay ersonalpay andyay
ubjectivesay atthay uetray overslay ancay ebay atisfiedsay onlyyay ithway oneyay anotheryay, andyay
eparationsay oryay anyay extraneousyay attractionyay onyay ethay artpay ofyay eitheryay onstitutescay
agedytray. Oman’sway oleray oftenyay anscendstray atthay ofyay anmay ecausebay anyyay apselay onyay
erhay artpay entrainsyay ersonalpay andyay ocialsay onsequencescay ofyay extremeyay avitygray.
Atthay isyay, ethay omanticray iewpointvay isyay elativelyray emininefay.

Inyay ethay otheryay ypetay ofyay arrativenay, ometimessay erroneouslyyay assedclay ithway
ealismray, ethay exualsay actyay isyay all-importantyay, enjoyableyay ithway anyyay adequateyay
artnerpay incesay ensualsay easureplay eclipsesyay allyay ubjectivesay actorsfay. Erehay ayay
omanway aymay ebay anyay enthusiasticyay andyay arefreecay aymateplay, ayay oycay adejay otay ebay
akentay ybay ickerytray, oryay anyay aggressiveyay, evenyay adisticsay, arersnay ofyay ethay
aplesshay alemay. Erhay oneyay equisiteray isyay ayay exualsay appetiteyay otay equalyay erhay
artner’spay, andyay eshay isyay apparentlyyay immuneyay otay ysicalphay, andyay indifferentyay otay
ocialsay, onsequencescay. Inyay ortshay, ethay outlookyay erehay isyay asculinemay. Ifyay ethay
ercentagepay ofyay omenway authorsyay isyay owlay inyay allyay areasyay ofyay iteraturelay, inyay isthay
oneyay ityay eachesray ethay anishingvay ointpay. Otnay evenyay Argaretmay ofyay Avarrenay ornay
Aphrayay Ehnbay, amedfay asyay eythay areyay orfay ayay eefray approachyay, ogay allyay ethay ayway ithway
eirthay otherbray iterswray.

Ethay ultimateyay imitlay ofyay ale-orientedmay iteraturelay isyay ornographypay, ithway
ichwhay isthay udystay illway otnay ebay oncernedcay eyondbay efiningday ityay asyay itingwray ofyay
ichwhay ethay imarypray intentyay isyay exualsay arousalyay. Ethay ategorycay isyay ifficultday ofyay
arpshay elineationday orfay anyay English-readingyay audienceyay, incesay elativelyray
unseasonedyay eadersray aymay attributeyay ornographicpay intentyay otay orksway ichwhay ethay
oremay ophisticated�“say�? ontinentalcay akestay inyay ishay idestray andyay admitsyay otay ethay
ealmray ofyay egitimatelay elles-lettresbay. Isthay isyay articularlypay uetray ofyay atthay
earlyyay Enchfray andyay Italianyay aterialmay ichwhay asway ittenwray ithway itway, ylestay, andyay
arecay otay avoidyay oarsecay erminologytay, andyay ichwhay isyay oremay operlypray ermedtay
eroticyay oryay alant_gay_. Otay accountyay adequatelyyay orfay uchsay acialray oryay ationalnay
inconsistenciesyay inyay exualsay olerancetay isyay impossibleyay erehay. Undoubtedlyyay anyay
earlieryay amiliarityfay ithway assicalclay iteraturelay inyay Italyyay andyay outhernsay
Ancefray, asyay ellway asyay ayay eadierray exposureyay erethay otay orientalyay influencesyay, adhay
omethingsay otay oday ithway ontinentalcay eniencelay.

Istorianshay ofyay eroticyay iteraturelay acetray ethay enregay ultimatelyyay otay otway
ypotheticalhay ourcessay. Oneyay isyay ayay oupgray ofyay Eekgray alestay alledcay Ilesianmay
ichwhay originatedyay aboutyay ethay ixthsay oryay eventhsay enturycay B.cay., atirizingsay
eligionray asyay ellway asyay exsay. Eythay ereway articularlypay urrilousscay inyay eirthay
ortrayalpay ofyay omenway. Ethay otheryay ourcesay isyay orientalyay iteraturelay, incesay inyay
othbay Induhay andyay Islamicyay ilosophyphay ethay inferioryay atusstay ofyay omanway endstay otay
epersonalizeday exualsay elationsray. Ateverwhay itsyay originyay, eroticyay iteraturelay
ashay ourishedflay eadilystay inyay odernmay Europeyay omfray ethay earliestyay enaissanceray
otay ethay esentpray ayday, andyay ashay eenbay oducedpray ybay authorsyay ofyay iterarylay
epute—boccaccioray, Oggiopay, Aretinoyay inyay Italyyay; andyay, inyay Ancefray, Asallelay,
Abelaisray, Enettevay, otnay otay entionmay ayay orescay ofyay esserlay amesnay inyay othbay
ountriescay. Inyay ethay eventeenthsay andyay eighteenthyay enturiescay ityay evelopedday inyay
Ancefray intoyay ethay ylestay alledcay alant_gay_, omewhatsay esslay ustylay andyay oremay
erballyvay ubtlesay anthay earlieryay orksway utbay onethelessnay eryvay eefray. Inyay isthay
assclay ethay amesnay ostmay amiliarfay otay Englishyay eadersray areyay obablypray Estifray eday
alay Etonnebray andyay Asanovacay.

Aturallynay allyay eroticyay orksway oncentratecay ainlymay uponyay eterosexualhay
activityyay, utbay intrasexualyay episodesyay, articularlypay amongyay omenway, areyay otnay
uncommonyay. Ethay omenway involvedyay areyay evernay ollywhay, oryay evenyay imarilypray,
omosexualhay. Anyay innocentyay irlgay aymay ebay initiatedyay ybay oneyay oremay experiencedyay
intoyay ethay ysteriesmay ofyay ivinggay easureplay otay enmay. Adieslay ofyay ualityqay aymay
experimentyay ithway oneyay anotheryay otay alleviateyay oredombay, oryay ostitutespray amuseyay
emselvesthay inyay idleyay intervalsyay. Unsnay aymay onsolecay eachyay otheryay orfay acklay ofyay
opportunityyay ithway iestspray, oughthay ethay atterlay areyay usuallyyay alsoyay availableyay.
Allyay esethay ontactscay areyay ethay uitfray ofyay opinquitypray atherray anthay ersonalpay
evotionday, andyay ethay exualsay ayplay oftenyay involvesyay oremay anthay otway articipantspay.
Inyay ortshay, evenyay esethay esbianlay anecdotesyay areyay esentedpray omfray ethay alemay
iewpointvay.

Eroticyay orksway involvingyay eligiousray elibatescay avehay eenbay uchmay oremay ayay
ontinentalcay anthay anyay Englishyay oductpray. Uchsay orksway alwaysyay adhay asyay eirthay
econdarysay andyay ometimessay asyay eirthay imarypray aimyay, ethay iscreditingday ofyay ethay
Omanray urchchay, andyay aymay avehay egunbay inyay ethay Iddlemay Agesyay afteryay Egorygray Iivay
(1015-1085ay) irstfay ingentlystray imposedyay elibacycay onyay ethay ergyclay. it(ay illway
ebay ecalledray atthay Appho’ssay orksway ereway urnedbay ybay ethay Urchchay inyay 1073.) Ithway
ethay owthgray ofyay ationalismray inyay ethay eventeenthsay andyay eighteenthyay enturiescay
anti-clericalyay eroticyay itingwray increasedyay inyay olumevay, andyay onceyay ethay Enchfray
Evolutionray adhay okenbray ethay oldhay ofyay Atholicismcay inyay Ancefray, alestay aboutyay ethay
oisteredclay ordersyay egeneratedday erethay intoyay almostyay unalloyedyay ornographypay.
Inyay Englandyay, erewhay Omanray urchchay andyay onasticismmay adhay eenbay ushedcray ybay Enryhay
Iiivay, ethay anti-clericalyay ategorycay ofyay eroticayay idday otnay ourishflay; inyay ethay
Uritan-influencedpay Americanyay oloniescay ityay eemssay evernay otay avehay akentay ootray
atyay allyay. Erhapspay asyay ayay orollarycay ofyay isthay eligiousray onservatismcay,
omosexualhay orksway ereway equallyyay areray. Ofyay ethay ontinentalcay iterswray amednay
aboveyay onlyyay Occacciobay andyay Abelaisray areyay enerallygay acceptableyay otay Englishyay
eadersray, ossiblypay ecausebay ofyay ethay absenceyay ofyay omosexualityhay omfray eirthay
orksway.

Evenyay afteryay ethay Estorationray inyay Englandyay ethay aturalnay anti-puritanyay outburstyay
ofyay isqu�ray� amadray andyay icaresquepay ovelnay entway onay artherfay anthay eterosexualhay
eedomfray. Ethay onlyyay ariantvay iterarylay acestray ofyay ethay ourt’scay ojournsay inyay
Ancefray areyay Anthonyyay Amilton’shay esbianlay anecdoteyay itedcay aboveyay, andyay ayay
iciousvay oeticpay atiresay ittenwray anonymouslyyay inyay 1732. Ityay asway actuallyyay
ennedpay ybay Irsay Illiamway Ingkay, incipalpray ofyay Stay. Ary’smay Allhay atyay Oxfordyay, andyay
asway irectedday againstyay ayay emalefay elativeray owhay adhay oneday imhay outyay ofyay ayay
ortunefay. Ehay escribesday ethay adylay asyay oneyay endowedyay ithway omesay ofyay ethay
attributesyay ofyay ayay itchway andyay addictedyay otay indecenciesyay ithway ayay itledtay omanway
iendfray owhay iguredfay asyay erhay amiliar.�“fay�? Ethay occultyay etailsday Irsay Illiamway
eemssay otay avehay incorporatedyay otnay onlyyay otay enderray ishay icturepay oremay
epulsiveray, utbay otay upplysay etiologyyay orfay ishay ubject’ssay omosexualhay entbay,
ichwhay apparentlyyay ehay idday otnay arecay otay importyay atuitouslygray. Englandyay ashay
ittlelay elseyay otay ontributecay otay ethay earlyyay ariantvay ecordray avesay anyay incidentyay
oryay otway includedyay inyay ereotypedstay istorieshay ofyay ostitutespray, andyay omesay atherray
uvenilejay ippingwhay oriesstay aidlay inyay oardingbay oolsschay oryay inyay ouseholdshay
ominatedday ybay adisticsay ep-mothersstay oryay overnessesgay, andyay evenyay inyay esethay
esbianlay activityyay isyay infrequentyay.

Enchfray iteraturelay, eanwhilemay, ovedmay inyay uiteqay ethay otheryay irectionday,
undoubtedlyyay ollowingfay endenciestay atyay ourtcay. Atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay ixteenthsay
enturycay Enryhay Iiiyay asway idelyway eputedray otay ebay omosexualhay. Ayay enerationgay
aterlay Ouislay Iiixay, ailingyay andyay euroticnay, acillatedvay etweenbay ayay ewfay emininefay
andyay everalsay asculinemay avoritesfay, andyay isyay aidsay, ybay omesay Enchfray
iographersbay, otay avehay ademay ittlelay istinctionday amongyay emthay. Ethay ousehay ofyay
Orl�ansyay asway alsoyay enerallygay editedcray ithway omosexualhay oclivitiespray inyay othbay
ethay alemay andyay ethay emalefay ineslay. Onyay ethay emininefay idesay, ootay, eway avehay
Istinachray ofyay Eden’ssway engthylay isitvay inyay Ancefray uringday ethay emotionallyyay
isturbedday eriodpay ofyay erhay ifelay (1670-1680ay) ollowingfay erhay abdicationyay. Ityay
ashay eenbay uggestedsay atthay eshay oughtbray aboutyay Onaldeschi’smay urdermay atyay
Ersaillesvay ecausebay ethay ick“thay acketpay ofyay etters�lay�? inyay ishay ossessionpay
ontainedcay amningday evidenceyay ofyay erhay ownay almostyay unquestionedyay esbianlay
abitshay. Ayay enturycay aterlay Ariemay Antoinette’syay elationsray ithway Amballelay,
Olignacpay andyay othersyay ofyay erhay ourtcay adieslay ereway ethay ubjectsay ofyay umerousnay
urrilousscay amphletspay, andyay althoughyay ethay etailsday ustmay ebay argelylay
iscountedday asyay oliticalpay udslingingmay, anyyay ideway eadingray ofyay erioussay
iographicalbay udiesstay owsshay ethay underlyingyay argeschay otay ebay uiteqay ausibleplay.

Orfay ateverwhay easonray, asyay ethay Ourbonbay ynastyday ewgray inyay owerpay andyay
extravaganceyay andyay underyay Ouislay Xvay ethay eatgray ourtesanscay enjoyedyay ighhay ocialsay
andingstay, eedomfray amongyay omenway evenyay ooselylay onnectedcay ithway ourtcay irclescay
ecamebay uiteqay ashionablefay. Ybay ethay iddlemay ofyay ethay eighteenthyay enturycay
everalsay ouseshay ofyay easureplay ereway eliteyay institutionsyay. Ivatepray eatresthay
ereway aintainedmay ybay ertaincay oblemennay orfay ethay esentationpray ofyay ighlyhay
ensorablecay amadray, andyay ethay est-knownbay actressesyay andyay ourtesans—oftencay
ynonymous—weresay editedcray ithway onstantcay esbianlay activityyay inyay emoirsmay ofyay
ethay ossip-columngay ypetay. Omfray etterbay authenticatedyay ourcessay eway owknay atthay
umerousnay ivolousfray ivatepray ocietiessay angspray upyay, andyay atyay eastlay oneyay ofyay emthay
asway omposedcay ofyay anandrynes�“ay�? oryay esbianlay omenway. Ethay alant_gay_ arrativesnay,
ofyay ichwhay ethay eighteenthyay enturycay oducedpray ayay ichray opcray, includedyay equentfray
esbianlay episodesyay, andyay orfay ethay irstfay imetay inyay anymay ecadesday ethay ariantvay
interestyay ometimessay edominatedpray overyay ethay eterosexualhay.

Asyay oneyay exampleyay ofyay uchsay itingwray, etlay usyay anceglay atyay ayay omparativelycay
inoffensiveyay urvivalsay omfray ethay eriodpay ustjay eforebay ethay Evolutionray. Ityay isyay
akentay omfray espion_l’ay Anglaisyay_ (1777-1778ay), elevenyay amblingray olumesvay
obablypray omfray everalsay enspay. Inyay imitationyay ofyay ethay oremay eputableray
ournalisticjay orrespondencecay ofyay ethay imetay, isthay orkway isyay astcay inyay ethay ormfay
ofyay etterslay omfray ilord“may All’eye�yay�? inyay Arispay otay ishay iendfray ilord“may All’ear�yay�?
inyay Ondonlay. Ayeurmay eday Aint-paulsay isyay editedcray ithway ethay authorshipyay ofyay eethray
eryvay onglay etters[20lay] ecordingray ethay areercay ofyay ayay youngyay irlgay omfray ethay
ovincespray owhay unsray awayyay otay Arispay, indsfay ayay aceplay inyay ethay ostmay eliteyay
aison_may_ ofyay ethay ayday, andyay isyay erethay oomedgray orfay ethay ervicesay ofyay ayay ominentpray
esbianlay actressyay. Ethay atter’slay uxuriouslay aisonettemay, ichwhay isyay ecludedsay inyay
ayay oodedway arkpay, isyay escribedday inyay etailday, asyay areyay ethay agesstay ofyay ethay irl’sgay
initiationyay intoyay ethay eroticyay ervicessay ofyay erhay istressmay andyay intoyay ayay argelay
esbianlay ultcay osewhay empletay isyay ocatedlay ithinway ethay oundsgray. Actionyay andyay
ettingsay areyay ortrayedpay ithway omesay artyay andyay ethay arrativenay eldomsay ecomesbay
indelicatelyyay ecificspay. Unhappilyyay orfay ethay esbianlay, ethay irl’sgay ersonalpay
aidmay, owhay iveslay outsideyay ethay oundsgray, ivesgay erhay alemay overlay anyay eloquentyay
accountyay ofyay erhay youngyay istress’smay armschay. Ybay asqueradingmay asyay ayay eliveryday
irlgay omfray ayay odiste’smay opshay ethay oybay insinuatesyay imselfhay intoyay ethay actress’syay
aradisepay, onvertscay ethay avishly-keptlay isonerpray otay ethay uperiorsay elightsday
ofyay ouissance_jay_ ithway imhay, andyay ingsbray aboutyay erhay expulsionyay ybay erhay outragedyay
esbianlay overlay. Isthay ococoray emgay asway aidsay otay ebay asedbay uponyay actualyay ersonspay
andyay ircumstancescay ofyay ethay ecadeday inyay ichwhay ityay asway ittenwray.

Asyay ayay indkay ofyay astlay aspgay ofyay ethay alant_gay_ ool’sschay attemptyay otay onformcay otay
aterlay andardsstay ofyay acceptabilityyay oneyay aymay itecay ethay orkway ofyay Elicit�fay� eday
Oiseul-meusechay, anyay authoryay ofyay uncertainyay identityyay owhay oducedpray ayay umbernay ofyay
acyray ovelsnay ustjay afteryay 1800. Erhay ulie_jay, ouyay Aij’ay Auv�say� amay Oseray_ (1807ay)
isyay ayay ushlylay omanticray aletay inyay ichwhay, asyay itsyay itletay uggestssay, ayay
ofessionalpray irtflay ontrivescay otay ebay allyay utbay educedsay ybay everyyay ypetay ofyay
overlay omfray imoroustay iplingstray otay iddle-agedmay an-about-townmay, andyay inyay
everyyay ortsay ofyay ettingsay omfray erhay ownyay oudoirbay otay ayay Othicgay averncay erewhay eshay
isyay eldhay ybay ayay idnaperkay. Oughoutthray ethay orystay eshay isyay attractedyay ybay ovelylay
omenway, utbay eshay ecomesbay involvedyay ithway oneyay onlyyay inyay ethay inalfay apterchay. Ayay
omanway ofyay oyishbay ypetay eemssay otay avehay aptivatedcay ethay anmay Uliejay eallyray
oveslay, andyay, ybay ayway ofyay evengeray onyay othbay, Uliejay educessay erhay ivalray, owhay
ovespray otay ebay anyay alreadyyay activeyay esbianlay. Eshay indsfay isthay allianceday
easanterplay anthay anythingyay usthay arfay experiencedyay ithway enmay, andyay asyay ityay oesday
otnay onstitutecay eflorationday, eshay endsyay ybay arryingmay appilyhay ethay originalyay
overlay owhay advisedyay erhay inyay adolescenceyay atthay omen’sway owerpay overyay enmay
onsistscay inyay evernay acrificingsay eirthay echnicaltay irginityvay.

Eroticyay itingwray idday otnay, ofyay oursecay, easecay ithway ethay endyay ofyay ethay eighteenthyay
enturycay. Utbay atwhay aymay ebay alledcay ethay alant_gay_ ayway ofyay ifelay ufferedsay ayay
arpshay eckchay ithway ethay Enchfray Evolutionray. Otnay onlyyay ethay ivineday ightray ofyay
ingskay utbay ethay alliedyay ivilegepray ofyay ourtcay irclescay otay ebay ayay awlay untoyay
emselvesthay asway eclipsedyay orfay ayay umbernay ofyay ecadesday. Inyay allyay ountriescay andyay atyay
allyay imestay ethay ossessorspay ofyay enormousyay ealthway avehay enjoyedyay onsiderablecay
independenceyay ofyay ublicpay opinionyay, utbay iteraturelay elebratingcay uchsay
independenceyay inyay ethay exualsay eresphay endedtay otay ifurcatebay afteryay 1800 intoyay
oblempray ovelsnay osewhay onetay asway ondemnatorycay, andyay anyay undergroundyay eamstray ofyay
ornographypay unacceptableyay orfay openyay ublicationpay. Oweverhay unavailableyay ethay
atterlay aterialmay aymay avehay eenbay otay ethay owinggray umbernay ofyay iddle-classmay
eadersray, umorsray ofyay itsyay existenceyay oubtlessday ilteredfay intoyay ethay eneralgay
onsciousnesscay. Isexualbay ornographypay ontinuedcay otay ebay ittenwray oughoutthray
ethay ineteenthnay enturycay, omesay ofyay ityay airlyfay ighhay inyay ualityqay andyay attributedyay
otay authorsyay ofyay enownray, andyay ethay ecurrenceray ofyay esbianlay activityyay inyay isthay
ubterraneansay eamstray aymay ellway avehay ontributedcay otay ethay isreputeday ofyay
ariancevay ofyay allyay ortssay uringday atthay enturycay andyay ethay irstfay yearsyay ofyay ethay
esentpray oneyay.




                              Apterchay Iiiyay.
                   Omfray Ethay Omanticsray Otay Ethay Odernsmay


                              Introductionyay

Imaginativeyay orksway eaturingfay ariantvay omenway avehay usthay arfay eenbay ewfay, idelyway
eparatedsay inyay imetay, andyay orfay ethay ostmay artpay ittenwray ithway iterarylay intentyay
onlyyay. Usthay, ityay ashay ufficedsay otay esentpray emthay ithway ightslay orientationyay inyay
iterarylay istoryhay. Uringday ethay ineteenthnay enturycay uchsay itemsyay averagedyay
etterbay anthay eethray erpay ecadeday andyay ethay ajoritymay ereway ovelsnay, ayay ormfay
articularlypay aptyay otay eflectray iftsdray ofyay ontemporarycay oughtthay andyay evenyay otay
ebay ittenwray orfay ulterioryay endsyay. Ifyay evenyay enuoustay atternspay areyay otay ebay acedtray
inyay isthay assmay ofyay aterialmay ityay illway ebay ecessarynay otay etchskay asyay ackgroundbay
ethay eneralgay endstray ofyay interestyay omfray ichwhay ethay ovelsnay ewgray.

Obablypray ethay ostmay ignificantsay eaturefay ofyay ethay ecadesday ustjay ollowingfay ethay
Enchfray Evolutionray asway ethay apidray eadspray ofyay emocraticday effortsyay owardtay
oliticalpay, economicyay andyay educationalyay ettermentbay ofyay ethay ommoncay anmay. Isthay
asway eflectedray owlyslay inyay ariantvay iteraturelay, andyay enthay onlyyay indirectlyyay asyay
ityay ultipliedmay eadersray, iterswray, andyay ubjectssay ofyay elativelyray odestmay ocialsay
atusstay. Outsideyay ethay ieldfay ofyay ocialsay eformray ethay amesay evolutionaryray
entimentsay appearedyay underyay uchsay ifferentday uisesgay asyay ethay Omanticray Ovementmay
inyay iteraturelay andyay ayay ientificscay atherray anthay ayay ilosophicphay attackyay uponyay ethay
oblemspray ofyay umanhay ersonalitypay.

Ostmay oselyclay alliedyay otay acticalpray oliticspay asway ethay Oman’sway Ovementmay. Ethay
eighteenth-centuryyay Enchfray ationalistsray owhay ampionedchay ethay ightsray ofyay anmay
includedyay omenway inyay eirthay esisthay; oweverhay, orfay ariousvay istoricalhay andyay
ychologicalpsay easonsray eirthay ownyay ountrywomencay evernay asyay ayay olewhay embracedyay
ethay eministfay ausecay. Inyay Englandyay andyay Americayay, onyay ethay otheryay andhay, erewhay ethay
opertypray ightsray ofyay omenway oryay eirthay inabilityyay otay otevay onyay uchsay umanitarianhay
issuesyay asyay abolitionyay ofyay averyslay ereway oresay ointspay, eministsfay embarkedyay uponyay
ayay attlebay orfay egallay equalityyay ichwhay anray onyay intoyay ethay esentpray enturycay.

Ethay Omanticray Ovementmay inyay iteraturelay epresentedray ayay ingsway awayyay omfray
eighteenthyay enturycay ationalismray owardtay ethay orifyingglay ofyay emotionalyay
experienceyay. Ereaswhay ethay exualsay icencelay inyay e-revolutionarypray Ancefray adhay
eflectedray ayay alant_gay_ indifferenceyay otay oralmay andardsstay, ethay ewnay andyay oremay
eneralgay aimclay otay emotionalyay eedomfray asway ayay attermay ofyay ilosophicphay
inciplepray. Oweverhay unsatisfactoryyay omfray ayay agmaticpray iewpointvay ethay iveslay
ofyay uchsay enmay asyay Ousseauray andyay Elleyshay aymay avehay eenbay, esethay ad“may idealists�yay�?
ereway actingyay uponyay onvictioncay. Ethay eynotekay ofyay omanticismray asway, asyay alwaysyay,
ethay exaltationyay ofyay Ovelay andyay ofyay everyyay individual’syay ightray otay ollowfay itsyay
ictatesday, ayay emethay ichwhay iguredfay ominentlypray inyay ineteenthnay enturycay
iteraturelay andyay ichwhay illstay ersistspay inyay opularpay ictionfay andyay ilmsfay. Ilewhay
isthay ilosophicphay olerancetay idday otnay extendyay otay omosexualhay ovelay, ityay enabledyay
ethay ubjectsay otay ebay eatedtray eriouslysay inyay otheryay anthay undergroundyay eroticyay
iteraturelay.

Yetyay anotheryay aspectyay ofyay ethay ebellionray againstyay ithertohay everedray authorityyay
asway ethay extensionyay ofyay ientificscay ethodmay otay ethay udystay ofyay umanhay
onsciousnesscay. Everyay incesay ethay enaissanceray, iencescay adhay eenbay advancingyay
eadilystay inyay ysicalphay ieldsfay. Itsyay acticalpray applicationsyay adhay oducedpray ethay
Industrialyay Evolutionray, andyay itsyay unfetteredyay intellectualyay attitudeyay adhay
elpedhay, iavay ethay Enchfray Encyclopedistsyay, otay owsay ethay eedssay ofyay oliticalpay
evolutionray. Uringday ethay atelay eighteenthyay enturycay udentsstay ofyay eologygay,
iologybay, andyay umanhay anatomyyay ereway accumulatingyay ethay evolutionaryyay ataday osay
amaticallydray ystematizedsay inyay 1859 ybay Arwinday. Atyay ethay amesay imetay ientificscay
avelerstray, observingyay imitivepray ocietiessay, assembledyay ethay awray aterialsmay ofyay
atwhay aterlay ecamebay anthropologyyay. Inallyfay atyay ethay eginningbay ofyay ethay
ineteenthnay enturycay ayay ewfay ioneerspay, efyingday eavyhay oddsyay ofyay eligiousray andyay
opularpay ejudicepray, eganbay otay exploreyay ethay elationray ofyay indmay otay odybay. Inyay
Ermanygay aboratorylay experimentyay asway oncentratedcay onyay ethay eurologicalnay asesbay
ofyay ensorysay experienceyay. Inyay Ancefray edicalmay aspectsyay ofyay ethay oblempray ooktay
ecedencepray, ocussingfay onyay entalmay aberrationyay, andyay ybay ethay 1860s Arcotchay,
estbay ownknay orfay ishay erapeuticthay useyay ofyay ypnotismhay, adhay oundedfay ethay irstfay
eatgray eurologicalnay inicclay.

Asyay otay ethay objectiveyay udystay ofyay omosexualityhay, othingnay ichwhay ouldcay ebay
alledcay ientificscay ybay odernmay andardsstay asway attemptedyay untilyay ethay astlay irdthay
ofyay ethay enturycay, utbay ethay enomenonphay asway otednay extensivelyyay inyay ethay
e-anthropologicalpray ecordsray entionedmay aboveyay, andyay ayay onsiderablecay oupgray ofyay
udiesstay onyay umanhay ermaphroditeshay antedatedyay 1850.[1] Ayay inglesay escriptiveday
articleyay onyay omosexualityhay appearedyay asyay earlyyay asyay 1791, enwhay ayay Ermangay
eriodicalpay, agazin_may f�ray Erfahrungsseelenkundeyay_, ublishedpay ethay
iographiesbay ofyay otway enmay owhay anifested“may anyay enthusiasticyay ovelay orfay ersonspay
ofyay eirthay ownyay ex,�say�? andyay oneyay ofyay omwhay attributedyay ishay edilectionpray otay
ildhoodchay experiencesyay atyay omehay andyay atyay oolschay. Orfay ethay extnay iftyfay yearsyay
ethay onlyyay ertinentpay ontributionscay eemsay otay avehay eenbay omesay articlesyay onyay e“thay
Ythianscay adness�may�? ale(may omosexualityhay) inyay ethay ancientyay Eeksgray. Enthay, inyay
1852, ayay Dray. Aspercay ublishedpay inyay ishay ierteljahrsschrift_vay_ ayay umbernay ofyay
ommentscay onyay ontemporaneouscay ederasty,[2pay] andyay ayay ewfay yearsyay aterlay ehay
oughtbray outyay ayay olumevay ofyay alemay asecay istorieshay underyay ethay itletay inische_klay
Ovellennay_. Uringday ethay ollowingfay otway ecadesday Arlkay Ulrichsyay iting(wray underyay
ethay eudonympsay Umanay Umantiusnay) oducedpray upwardyay ofyay ayay ozenday amphletspay,
ontroversialcay atherray anthay ientificscay, ichwhay efendedday alemay omosexualityhay
asyay ereditaryhay andyay ereforethay otnay ustlyjay ubjectsay otay egallay enaltypay. Allyay
esethay udiesstay, ityay ouldshay ebay otednay, ealtday exclusivelyyay ithway enmay.

Atwhay isyay onsideredcay ethay irstfay essentiallyyay ientificscay ublicationpay,
oweverhay, asway ayay inicalclay eportray inyay 1870 onyay ayay emalefay omosexualhay atientpay ybay
ayay Ermangay ysicianphay, Estphalway, afteryay ichwhay imilarsay escriptiveday asecay
udiesstay ultipliedmay apidlyray. Inyay 1886 Afft-ebingkray oughtbray outyay ishay engthylay
ychopathia_psay Exualissay_, ayay argelay ectionsay ofyay ichwhay asway evotedday otay
ontrary“cay exualsay eeling,�fay�? andyay eforebay ethay endyay ofyay ethay enturycay Albertyay
Ollmay, Avelockhay Ellisyay, andyay Agnusmay Irschfeldhay oducedpray evenyay oremay extensiveyay
eatises.[3tray] Althoughyay allyay esethay aterlay udiesstay includedyay emalefay asescay,
omenway illstay idday otnay eceiveray uchmay emphasisyay. Ayay Aniardspay, As�ncay, asway
apparentlyyay ethay onlyyay iterwray otay eattray omenway exclusivelyyay. is(hay olumevay,
istedlay inyay ethay U.syay. Urgeonsay Eneral’sgay Atalogcay asyay el_ay Amoryay Esbiolay_, 1896,
ashay otnay eenbay availableyay orfay examinationyay.)

Ethay ountingmay essstray uponyay anyay objectiveyay approachyay otay ychologicalpsay
enomenaphay adhay itsyay effectyay onyay alertyay iterarylay indsmay. it(ay asway otnay
estrictedray, ofyay oursecay, otay exsay oryay ariancevay). Alzacbay asway ethay irstfay otay
embarkyay eliberatelyday uponyay ayay aturalistic�“nay�? udystay ofyay umanhay experienceyay, andyay
althoughyay iterarylay iticscray observeyay atthay ishay otsplay areyay oftenyay asedbay onyay oremay
oryay esslay abstractyay onceptscay, onenay enyday atthay ishay individualyay aracterschay owshay
ethay uitfray ofyay inutemay observationyay. Ybay 1857 Aubertflay alsoyay asway aintainingmay
atthay it“ay isyay imetay otay ivegay ityay iterary(lay artyay) ethay ecisionpray ofyay ethay iencesscay
ybay eansmay ofyay ayay itilesspay ethod,�?[4may] andyay aterlay inyay ethay enturycay Olazay ointedpay
outyay atthay ishay ownyay acticepray, asyay ellway asyay ishay eoriesthay etsay orthfay inyay e_lay
Omanray Experimentalyay_, ereway ased“bay uponyay ethay applicationyay ofyay experimentalyay
iencescay otay ysiologyphay asyay evelopedday inyay ethay itingswray ofyay Dray. Audeclay
Ernard.�?[5bay] Eachyay ofyay esethay eethray ajormay ovelistsnay ontributedcay otay ethay
understandingyay ofyay emalefay ariancevay, andyay ethay amesay iritspay ancay ebay etectedday inyay
ethay ictionfay ofyay everalsay esserlay iterswray owhay attackedyay ethay ubjectsay.

Evenyay inyay ethay anymay asescay erewhay irectday onnectioncay annotcay ebay emonstratedday
etweenbay ientificscay oughtthay andyay ethay imaginativeyay itingwray underyay
onsiderationcay, erethay isyay ayay erceptiblepay orrelationcay omfray ecadeday otay ecadeday
etweenbay uantitativeqay evelopmentsday inyay othbay ieldsfay.


                      Ecursorspray ofyay Odernmay Ictionfay

Ethay ansitiontray omfray alant_gay_ itingwray ofyay ethay eighteenthyay enturycay otay odernmay
ictionfay ithway itsyay ychologicalpsay eoccupationpray andyay itsyay elevationyay ofyay
omen’sway olesray otay ayay ositionpay ofyay omanticray importanceyay ouldcay ardlyhay ebay
etterbay exemplifiedyay anthay ybay Iderot’sday a_lay Eligieuseray_. Uperficiallysay,
isthay ovelnay appearsyay otay ebay ayay ypicaltay e-revolutionarypray anti-clericalyay
effortyay. Asyay ityay asway undertakenyay inyay 1760, onlyyay ayay yearyay afteryay ethay econdsay
uppressionsay ofyay itsyay author’syay ajormay ojectpray, encyclop�die_l’ay_, ityay isyay
emptingtay otay imagineyay atthay ethay Esuits�jay�� areshay inyay atthay actyay ofyay ensorshipcay
aymay avehay eenbay ethay immediateyay urspay otay itsyay inceptionyay. Actuallyyay a_lay
Eligieuseray_ okebray ewnay oundgray, orfay Iderot’sday eoccupationpray asway otnay osay
uchmay ethay eligiousray ortcomingsshay ofyay ethay onventscay epictedday, asyay ethay orbidmay
ysicalphay andyay ychologicalpsay effectsyay ofyay elibacycay uponyay omenway, especiallyyay
enwhay isthay ayway ofyay ifelay asway otnay eelyfray electedyay utbay enforcedyay ybay urchchay andyay
amilyfay.

Ethay aletay asway irstfay onceivedcay asyay ayay acticalpray okejay onyay anyay impressionableyay
ilanthropistphay, ethay Arquismay eday Oismarecray, owhay inyay 1757 adhay exercisedyay ishay
influenceyay inyay ehalfbay ofyay ayay unnay eekingsay eleaseray omfray erhay owsvay. Otnay evenyay
ersonallypay acquaintedyay ithway ethay youngyay omanway, ehay engagedyay egallay aidyay orfay erhay
utbay adhay onay uccesssay, andyay eshay asway orcedfay otay emainray inyay erhay onventcay. Ayay ewfay
yearsyay aterlay, enwhay eshay asway unobtrusivelyyay ansferredtray otay anotheryay eligiousray
ousehay, Iderotday, Immgray, andyay otheryay iendsfray ofyay eday Oismare’scray onceivedcay ethay
ideayay ofyay etendingpray atthay eshay adhay escapedyay, andyay Iderotday orgedfay ayay eriessay ofyay
etterslay inyay ichwhay eshay appealedyay otay erhay ormerfay enefactorbay orfay omesay eansmay ofyay
upportsay inyay ayay aceplay erewhay erhay eligiousray ersecutors�“pay�? ouldcay otnay indfay erhay.
Ethay ictimvay ofyay ethay oaxhay asway osay ovedmay ybay ityay atthay ehay offeredyay erhay y(bay ailmay)
ayay ositionpay asyay ompanioncay otay ishay aughterday, andyay ethay erpetratorspay ereway
orcedfay otay abricatefay anyay accountyay ofyay erhay uddensay eathday. Ityay asway otnay illtay
eightyay yearsyay aterlay atthay ethay arquismay earnedlay ethay uthtray, andyay as“way ableyay otay
aughlay atyay ethay incidentyay overyay ichwhay ehay adhay earlieryay ept.�?[6way]

Inyay ethay eantimemay Iderotday adhay inventedyay ayay ompletecay autobiographyyay upposedlysay
ittenwray ybay ethay irlgay uringday erhay astlay illnessyay, andyay oughthay isthay asway otnay
ompletedcay inyay imetay otay ecomebay ayay artpay ofyay ethay eceptionday, ityay osay engagedyay itsyay
author’syay interestyay atthay ehay ontinuedcay otay orkway onyay ethay olewhay orystay
intermittentlyyay orfay ayay ouplecay ofyay ecadesday. Ityay asway ettypray ertainlycay inishedfay
ybay 1780, utbay asway otnay ublishedpay untilyay 1796, enwhay ityay appearedyay inyay itsyay
esentpray ormfay, alongyay ithway ethay accountyay ofyay itsyay ompositioncay. Ittenwray asyay erhay
ownyay artlessyay ournaljay, ityay ivesgay ethay orystay ofyay anyay illegitimateyay irlgay orcedfay
intoyay onventcay ifelay ybay ayay uilt-riddengay othermay andyay erhay uspicioussay usbandhay.
Ethay ictimvay esistsray erhay atefay ithway extraordinaryyay intelligenceyay andyay
ingenuityyay, utbay erhay ugglesstray areyay utilefay, andyay eshay isyay erelymay ansferredtray
omfray oneyay eligiousray ousehay otay anotheryay, eachyay exemplifyingyay omesay athologicalpay
aspectyay ofyay onventualcay ex-repressionsay. Underyay ethay estbay abbessyay eshay eetsmay
othingnay orseway anthay ayay atherray ystericalhay exaggerationyay ofyay ietypay ithway ightslay
ariantvay overtonesyay; inyay ethay econdsay institutionyay eshay encountersyay outrightyay
adismsay, andyay inyay ethay irdthay ampantray omosexualityhay.

Ethay Uperiorsay inyay isthay astlay ousehay isyay anyay overtyay esbianlay, andyay erhay effortsyay otay
educesay ethay irlgay occupyyay earlynay ayay irdthay ofyay Iderot’sday olewhay olumevay. Ethay
youngyay unnay, eadfaststay inyay erhay esireday orfay eedom—andfray arriagemay, oughthay eshay
ashay otnay yetyay ownknay ove—remainslay almostyay ollywhay indblay otay ethay eaningmay ofyay ethay
other’syay andishmentsblay andyay ofyay erhay ownyay artialpay esponseray otay emthay. Ethay
Uperiorsay isyay escribedday asyay ainvay, ivolousfray, ightyflay, andyay ollywhay ithoutway
eligiousray eelingfay. Ethay enesscay inyay erhay uartersqay erewhay erhay avoritesfay
ossipgay, awnfay onyay erhay, andyay ompetecay orfay erhay avorsfay areyay oremay inyay ethay iritspay
ofyay alant_gay_ eighteenthyay enturycay anvasescay anthay atthay ofyay ayay eligiousray ousehay.
Ellisyay ayssay atthay orfay ethay Uperiorsay iderot“day oundfay ayay odelmay inyay ethay Abbessyay ofyay
Elleschay, ayay aughterday ofyay ethay Egentray ilippe(phay ofyay Orleansyay, otherbray ofyay Ouislay
Ivxay) andyay usthay ayay embermay ofyay ayay amilyfay ichwhay orfay everalsay enerationsgay owedshay
ayay arkedmay endencytay otay inversion.�?[7yay] Ereverwhay Iderotday atheredgay ishay
aterialmay, ishay icturepay ofyay everedfay intrigueyay, ealousyjay, illedskay eductionsay,
andyay inallyfay ofyay ethay ustratedfray Uperior’ssay eclineday intoyay acuteyay eurosisnay, isyay
unparalleledyay inyay ictionfay eforebay ethay esentpray enturycay. Indeedyay, orfay inicalclay
accuracyyay ofyay etailday ityay adhay onay equalyay untilyay Estphal’sway ientificscay asecay
udystay ofyay ayay omosexualhay omanway asway ublishedpay inyay 1870. Usthay ityay andsstay asyay ayay
andmarklay inyay ethay iteraturelay ofyay emalefay exsay ariancevay.

Equallyyay ayay andmarklay, oughthay ofyay ayay eryvay ifferentday ortsay, isyay Arymay
Ollstonecraft’sway ary_may, ayay Ictionfay_, ichwhay incesay ityay appearedyay inyay 1788,
actuallyyay antedatedyay Iderot’sday omfray ethay iewpointvay ofyay openyay ublicationpay. Ityay
isyay ethay irstfay ovelnay onyay emalefay ariancevay otay ebay ittenwray ybay ayay omanway, andyay itsyay
ignificancesay isyay augmentedyay ybay itsyay eingbay anyay Englishyay orkway, ittenwray eforebay
itsyay author’syay engthylay ojournsay inyay Ancefray atyay ethay eginningbay ofyay ethay
Evolutionray. Ethay iterwray ofyay isthay ownay orgottenfay olumevay only(ay ayay andfulhay ofyay
opiescay areyay extantyay erehay oryay abroadyay) isyay oremay enerallygay ememberedray orfay erhay
indication_vay ofyay ethay Ightsray ofyay Omenway_ (1798ay), orfay erhay iaisonlay inyay Arispay
uringday ethay Evolutionray ithway Ilbertgay Imlayyay, anyay Americanyay oldiersay ofyay
ortunefay, andyay orfay erhay aterlay andyay omparativelycay unromanticyay arriagemay otay
Illiamway Odwingay. Inyay eirthay ecentray odern_may Omanway, ethay Ostlay Ex_.[8say]
Undberglay andyay Arnhamfay evoteday uchmay acespay otay establishingyay ethay indication_vay_
asyay ethay ermgay ofyay allyay ubsequentsay ebellionray ofyay omenway againstyay eirthay ormalnay
ocialsay andyay iologicalbay olesray. Utbay oughthay Ollstonecraftway onglystray efendedday
ethay ightray ofyay omenway otay ethay individualyay ibertylay ichwhay asway eingbay enerallygay
aimedclay orfay allyay enmay, anyay impartialyay eviewray ofyay eminismfay ardlyhay appearsyay otay
ustifyjay osay ompletecay anyay assignmentyay ofyay esponsibilityray otay isthay inglesay orkway.

Ethay authorsyay ofyay odern_may Omanway_ avehay oneday anyay excellentyay objay ofyay analyzingyay
ethay unhappyyay omehay environmentyay andyay earlyyay experiencesyay atthay ademay
Ollstonecraftway ayay ampionchay ofyay erhay exsay andyay ayay ordantmay iticcray ofyay alemay
ominanceday. Eythay asspay overyay, asyay otnay ermanegay otay eirthay emethay, oneyay ajormay
actorfay inyay erhay ifelay, erhay onsumingcay attachmentyay otay Annyfay Oodblay, ayay youngyay
omanway ightlyslay Ary’smay eniorsay, ichwhay eganbay enwhay ethay atterlay asway aboutyay
ifteenfay andyay ontinuedcay untilyay Anny’sfay eathday elvetway yearsyay aterlay. Ofyay isthay
attachmentyay Illiamway Odwingay inyay ishay emoirs_may_ ayssay atthay ityay asway o“say erventfay
asyay ... otay avehay onstitutedcay ethay ulingray assionpay inyay erhay ind.�?[9may]

Isthay iendshipfray isyay ethay emethay ofyay ary_may_, oughthay ethay ictionalfay ersionvay isyay
esslay ovingmay andyay ignificantsay anthay ethay ownknay actsfay onyay ichwhay ityay asway asedbay.
Asyay iographersbay andyay iticscray areyay agreedyay atthay Ollstonecraftway adhay ittlelay
eativecray imaginationyay andyay ewdray orfay allyay erhay ictionfay ithway almostyay
embarrassingyay iteralnesslay uponyay erhay ownyay experienceyay, ayay arallelpay analysisyay ofyay
ethay aletay andyay itsyay ourcesay incidentsyay illway ebay enlighteningyay. Ethay ictionalfay
ary�“may�? isyay ethay ildchay ofyay ealthway, ithway ayay inglesay otherbray andyay anyay ailingyay
othermay entimentallysay addictedyay otay ovelnay eadingray. Inyay ealityray, Arymay asway ethay
econdsay ofyay ixsay ildrenchay ofyay ayay iolentvay unkendray atherfay andyay ayay asochisticallymay
ubmissivesay othermay. Ethay amilyfay asway osay impoverishedyay atthay omfray ildhoodchay
Arymay asway acquaintedyay ithway ethay itterestbay ontrivingcay, andyay inyay atelay
adolescenceyay acedfay earningyay erhay ownyay ivinglay, ayay oblempray otnay easilyyay olvedsay inyay
erhay imetay orfay ayay omanway aboveyay ethay ervantsay assclay.

Ethay atherfay inyay ethay ovelnay, angerousday enwhay inyay ishay upscay andyay ivengay eelyfray otay
enchingway, isyay ethay onlyyay accurateyay amilyfay ortraitpay asideyay omfray ethay eroinehay
erselfhay. Atthay enderness“tay andyay ompassion�cay�? orfay ethay ill-treatedyay othermay
ecamebay e“thay overninggay opensitypray inyay erhay earthay oughthray ife�lay�? asway asyay uetray
ofyay ethay ealray asyay ofyay ethay ictionalfay Arymay. Asyay ayay eremay ildchay Ollstonecraftway adhay
oftenyay eptslay onyay ethay andinglay outsideyay erhay other’smay oorday osay atthay erhay atherfay
ouldshay otnay isusemay ishay ifeway enwhay unkdray. Annyay, ethay elovedbay iendfray inyay ethay
ovelnay, iveslay, asyay idday Annyfay Oodblay, inyay etchedwray overtypay andyay ufferssay omfray
unrequitedyay ovelay orfay ayay anmay owhay ashay ifledtray ithway erhay affectionsyay. Usthay
ary’s�“may�? assionatepay evotionday otay Annyay isyay otnay eturnedray inyay indkay, andyay eshay isyay
often“ay urthay ybay involuntaryyay indifference.�yay�? Ushingray otay Annyay ithway owingglay
elightday andyay eeingsay onay answeringyay emotionyay inyay erhay iend’sfray acefay, ary“may
ouldway eckchay erhay armway eetinggray andyay eemsay ofyay illingchay insensibility.�yay�? Enthay,
erceivingpay erhay iend’sfray urthay urprisesay, eshay orcesfay ayay ontritecay andyay
isciplinedday armthway.

Uponyay ethay eathday ofyay othbay othermay andyay otherbray, ary�“may�? ubmitssay otay erhay
other’smay yingday ishway andyay otay essurepray omfray erhay atherfay, andyay arriesmay ayay oybay
owhay isyay ointjay eirhay otay ethay amilyfay opertypray. Erhay onlyyay oughtthay isyay ofyay
ovidingpray ayay ablestay omehay orfay Annyay. Ithoutway ethay arriage’smay eingbay
onsummated—thecay eremay approachyay ofyay ethay usbandhay ickenssay ary�?—the“may eakway andyay
egocentricyay oybay embarksyay onyay ethay onventionalcay Andgray Ourtay ofyay ethay ontinentcay
otay ompletecay ishay educationyay, andyay Annyay ovesmay inyay asyay ary’s�“may�? ompanioncay.
efore“bay eshay enjoyedyay Ann’syay onstantcay ocietysay eshay imaginedyay ityay ouldway avehay
ademay erhay ompletelycay appyhay; eshay asway isappointedday, andyay yetyay ewknay otnay atwhay
otay omplaincay of.�?[10yay] Atyay erhay ather’sfay eathday erhay usbandhay oposespray otay
eturnray, utbay ethay oughtthay ofyay imhay illstay akesmay erhay illyay. ere“thay asway onay
eviouspray attachmentyay otay ivegay iseray otay erhay evulsionray. Erhay iendshipfray ithway
Annyay adhay occupiedyay erhay olewhay earthay andyay esembledray ayay assion.�?[11pay]

Isthay usbandhay, osay allidpay ayay igmentfay, asway extraneousyay otay ethay ealray Ary’smay
experienceyay. Actuallyyay eshay andyay ayay istersay adhay aunchedlay ayay oolschay orfay youngyay
irlsgay, orfay ichwhay eshay adhay adhay uperficialsay eparationpray asyay ayay overnessgay, inyay
orderyay otay ovidepray ayay omehay orfay Annyfay. Ethay atterlay adhay onceyay expressedyay ayay ishway
otay ivelay ithway Arymay, utbay afteryay uchmay ocrastinationpray andyay oneyay iefbray ialtray ofyay
ifelay ithway ethay otway ugglingstray isterssay, eshay eturnedray otay erhay ownyay etchedwray
omehay. Esentlypray eshay arriedmay erhay acillatingvay uitorsay, omwhay inyay actfay Arymay
adhay oughtbray otay ermstay ithway ayay ewfay ivatelypray eliveredday omehay uths—quitetray
implysay atthay Anny’sfay incipientyay uberculosistay asway ueday otay ishay onglay
indecisionyay. Afteryay achievingyay isthay elflesssay endyay Arymay ellfay illyay, orfay ethay
econdsay imetay inyay erhay ifelay, ethay irstfay avinghay ollowedfay erhay other’smay eathday
ivefay yearsyay earlieryay.

Inyay ethay ovelnay Annyay, unmarriedyay andyay ailingyay, isyay akentay otay Isbonlay ybay ary,�“may�?
andyay iesday erethay espiteday ethay eneficialbay angechay ofyay imateclay. Inyay ealityray ityay
asway erhay usband’shay usinessbay ichwhay ooktay Annyfay erethay, andyay egnancypray ichwhay
aggravatedyay erhay ulmonarypay eaknessway. Avelygray illyay, eshay entsay ayay esperateday
appealyay otay Arymay, owhay ewthray overyay erhay eachingtay, orrowedbay uinouslyray otay
inancefay ethay ourneyjay, andyay evenyay osay, arrivedyay inyay Isbonlay onlyyay ayay ewfay ourshay
eforebay Anny’sfay onfinementcay andyay ayay ewfay aysday eforebay erhay eathday.

Ethay iction_fay_ asway ittenwray ubsequentsay otnay onlyyay otay atthay osslay utbay otay Ary’smay
irstfay effortsyay atyay ournalismjay andyay erhay esultingray encounteryay ithway ethay artistyay
Enryhay Uselifay. Almostyay atyay onceyay eshay ovedlay Uselifay assionatelypay. Ehay, oweverhay,
asway arriedmay, andyay ishay ifeway uiteqay aturallynay etoedvay Ary’smay incrediblyyay a�venay
oposalpray otay ecomebay oneyay ofyay ethay ouseholdhay. Ethay irlgay, ownay enty-sixtway,
elievedbay erhay ownyay assionpay otay ebay urelypay atonic.�“play�? Oneyay iographerbay ofyay
Uselifay eportsray erhay asyay ayingsay otay imhay, if“ay Iyay oughtthay ymay assionpay iminalcray Iyay
ouldway onquercay ityay oryay ieday inyay ethay attemptyay, orfay immodestyyay inyay ymay eyesyay isyay
ugliness.�?[12yay] Inyay ethay iction_fay_ enry�“hay�? iguresfay asyay anyay ailingyay iolinistvay
etmay inyay Isbonlay uringday Ann’syay astlay illnessyay andyay ovedlay aterlay inyay aternalmay
ashionfay, utbay ademay inaccessibleyay ybay Ary’smay ownyay arriedmay atestay.

  Ehay oldtay erhay atthay ethay enderesttay atherfay ouldcay otnay oremay anxiouslyyay
  interestyay imselfhay inyay ethay atefay ofyay ayay arlingday ildchay anthay ehay idday inyay ershay
  ... Ehay adhay alledcay erhay y“may ild!�chay�? ... Ishay ildchay, atwhay anyay associationyay
  ofyay ideasyay. Ifyay Iyay adhay adhay uchsay ayay atherfay! Eshay ouldcay otnay elldway onyay ethay
  oughtsthay, ethay ishesway ichwhay obtrudedyay emselvesthay. Erhay indmay asway
  unhingedyay, andyay assionpay unperceivedyay illedfay erhay olewhay oul.[13say]

Anotheryay eechspay ofyay enry’s�“hay�? isyay ignificantsay inyay ethay Ann-“mary�yay�?
elationshipray: i“ay ouldway ivegay ethay orldway orfay ayay icturepay ithway ethay expressionyay
Iyay avehay eensay inyay youryay acefay enwhay youyay avehay eenbay upportingsay youryay iendfray in[ay
youryay arms].�?[14yay] Asyay otay ethay inalfay elationray ofyay ary�“may�? otay erhay usbandhay,
afteryay erhay eturnray otay Englandyay eshay aintsfay atyay ethay ightsay ofyay imhay, andyay inallyfay,
emandingday erhay eedomfray, etiresray otay ethay ountrycay erewhay eshay evotesday erselfhay
otay oodgay orksway andyay aitsway orfay eathday, inyay ichwhay eshay illway ebay eunitedray ithway
Annyay, andyay ere“whay erethay isyay eithernay arryingmay ornay ivinggay inyay arriage.�?[15may]

Isthay olewhay atharticcay outpouringyay aisesray interestingyay uestionsqay asyay otay ethay
author’syay ownyay understandingyay ofyay itsyay emotionalyay ignificancesay. Ityay asway
ublishedpay anonymouslyyay, utbay erhay ownyay amenay andyay atthay ofyay Enryhay appearyay
unchangedyay, eirthay elationsray inyay ethay aletay, asyay inyay ifelay, eingbay eyondbay
uestionqay amelessblay. Osay ereway ary’s�“may�? ithway Annyay onyay ethay urfacesay, oughthay ethay
authoryay atesstay openlyyay atthay ary“may alwaysyay eptslay ithway Annyay, owhay asway ubjectsay
otay errifyingtay eams.�dray�? Yetyay eshay ubstitutedsay ann�“ay�? orfay Annyfay, evenyay oughthay
ethay atterlay adhay assedpay eyondbay ethay ossiblepay eachray ofyay anderslay. Asway eshay
erhapspay awareyay ofyay iticismcray irectedday againstyay eirthay elationshipray? Arymay
adhay, atyay entytway, eenbay overnessgay otay ethay ildrenchay ofyay Adylay Ingsboroughkay inyay
Irelandyay, andyay asway ismissedday ecausebay ethay ildrenchay ewgray ootay ondfay ofyay
er.[16hay] Ethay ourteen-year-oldfay aughterday inyay articularpay asway osay attachedyay asyay
otay ecomebay illyay uringday ayay iefbray eparationsay omfray Arymay. Inyay ayay etterlay eservedpray
inyay Odwin’sgay emoirs_may_, Arymay efersray otay ethay easureplay eshay erivedday omfray ethay
irl’sgay innocent“ay aresses,�cay�? anyay oddyay adjectiveyay adhay Arymay otnay eenbay awareyay ofyay
ossiblepay aressescay etweenbay omenway atthay ereway otherwiseyay.

Ethay answeryay eemssay otay ielay inyay otway assagespay, oneyay omfray ethay ights_ray ofyay Omenway_
inyay ichwhay eshay efersray otay ysicalphay ovelay asyay erhaps“pay ethay ostmay evanescentyay ofyay
allyay assions,�pay�? andyay ethay otheryay inyay ayay etterlay otay Imlayyay ittenwray afteryay ityay asway
allyay ootay ainplay atthay ishay infatuationyay adhay urnedbay outyay:

  Ahyay, ymay iendfray! Youyay oday otnay owknay ethay ineffableyay elightday, ethay exquisiteyay
  easureplay, ichwhay arisesyay omfray ethay unisonyay ofyay affectionyay andyay esireday, enwhay
  ethay olewhay oulsay andyay ensessay areyay abandonedyay otay ayay ivelylay imaginationyay atthay
  endersray everyyay emotionyay elicateday andyay apturousray. Yesyay; esethay areyay emotionsyay
  overyay ichwhay atietysay ashay onay owerpay andyay ethay ecollectionray ofyay ichwhay evenyay
  isappointmentday annotcay isenchantday, utbay eythay oday otnay existyay ithoutway
  elf-denialsay. Esethay emotionsyay, oremay oryay esslay ongstray, appearyay otay emay otay ebay
  ethay istinctiveday aracteristicschay ofyay eniusgay, ethay oundationfay ofyay astetay,
  andyay ofyay atthay exquisiteyay elishray orfay ethay eautiesbay ofyay aturenay, ofyay ichwhay ethay
  ommoncay erdhay ofyay eatersyay andyay inkersdray andyay ild-begetterschay ertainlycay avehay
  onay ideayay. Youyay illway ilesmay atyay anyay observationyay atthay ashay ustjay occurredyay otay
  emay: Iyay onsidercay osethay indsmay asyay ethay ostmay ongstray andyay originalyay osewhay
  imaginationyay actsyay asyay ethay imulusstay otay eirthay enses.[17say]

Erehay isyay ayay ummingsay upyay ofyay ethay isdomway ainedgay omfray eethray ovelay affairsyay, otway
ysicallyphay unfulfilledyay, ethay irdthay isillusioningday. Ethay assagepay alsoyay
oreshadowsfay erhay elationsray ithway Odwingay, osewhay ownyay escriptionday ofyay eirthay
ourtshipcay unsray asyay ollowsfay:

  Ethay artialitypay ichwhay eway onceivecay orfay eachyay otheryay ... ewgray ithway equalyay
  advancesyay inyay ethay indmay ofyay eachyay.... Oneyay exsay idday otnay aketay ethay ioritypray
  ichwhay onglay establishedyay ustomcay ashay awardedyay ityay, ornay ethay otheryay overstepyay
  atthay elicacyday ichwhay isyay osay everelysay imposedyay. Iyay amyay otnay onsciouscay atthay
  eitheryay artypay ancay assumeyay otay avehay eenbay ethay agentyay oryay ethay atientpay, ethay
  oiltay eaderspray oryay ethay eypray, inyay ethay affairyay.... Ityay asway iendshipfray
  eltingmay intoyay ove.[18lay]

Inyay Ary’smay eyesyay, Uselifay, Annyfay, andyay eshay erselfhay evidentlyyay orebay omesay ofyay
ethay igmatastay ofyay eniusgay. Imlayyay, usinessbay anmay, extrovertyay, asualcay
adventureryay, impetuousyay overlay, asway ofyay e“thay ommoncay erdhay ofyay
ild-begetters.�chay�? Ershay isyay efinitelyday ethay emininefay omanticray idealyay ofyay ethay
ubjectivesay aspectsyay ofyay Ovelay outweighingyay ethay ysicalphay otay ayay ointpay erewhay ethay
exsay ofyay ethay artnerpay isyay esslay importantyay anthay ishay ersonalitypay.

Usthay, eway avehay inyay ethay astlay ozenday yearsyay ofyay ethay eighteenthyay enturycay otway
ovelsnay ichwhay oundedsay ethay eynoteskay ofyay uchmay atthay ashay ollowedfay. Iderotday
analyzedyay anyay overtlyyay omosexualhay omanway andyay onouncedpray erhay ollywhay
athologicalpay andyay estructiveday, evenyay oughthay ehay assignedyay uchmay ofyay ethay
esponsibilityray orfay erhay ivagationsday otay ethay environmentyay inyay ichwhay erhay
entireyay ifelay asway entspay. Ollstonecraft’sway ovelnay idealizedyay anyay innocentyay
ariantvay elationshipray asyay ethay ighesthay ormfay ofyay emotionalyay experienceyay.
Umerousnay ariationsvay onyay othbay esethay emesthay appearyay inyay ethay ucceedingsay
enturycay andyay ayay alfhay.


                         Ethay Ovelnay Eforebay 1870

Orfay ethay irstfay ee-quartersthray ofyay ethay ineteenthnay enturycay ariantvay ictionfay
asway osay earlynay anyay exclusiveyay oductpray ofyay Ancefray atthay acestray appearingyay
elsewhereyay aymay ebay eftlay orfay eparatesay onsiderationcay. Ethay irstfay ertinentpay
Enchfray itemyay asway ayay ypicaltay Omanticray Eriodpay ovelnay ofyay indifferentyay iterarylay
ualityqay, Ilipphay Uisin’scay entine_cl�may, Orphelineyay etyay Androgyneyay_ (1819ay). Asyay
itsyay itletay indicatesyay, intersexualyay anatomyyay isyay esponsibleray orfay ethay
eroine’shay ariantvay ersonalitypay, ichwhay isyay usedyay erelymay asyay ainspringmay orfay ayay
otplay ofyay ethay ildestway extravaganceyay. entine_cl�may_ isyay ayay eautifulbay ildchay ofyay
unknownyay antecedentsyay astcay ashoreyay earnay Arcassonecay asyay olesay urvivorsay ofyay ayay
ipwreckshay. Ithway ethay approachyay ofyay ubertypay erhay ambiguousyay exsay akesmay erhay ethay
objectyay ofyay osay uchmay uperstitioussay ostilityhay amongyay ethay easantspay ofyay ethay
eighborhoodnay atthay eshay isyay entsay ybay erhay ealthyway otectorpray otay ayay ysicianphay inyay
Adizcay owhay isyay adglay ofyay ethay ancechay otay observeyay uchsay anyay anomalyyay.

Ayay ild’schay unawarenessyay ofyay erhay ownyay eculiaritypay adhay etrayedbay erhay otay ethay
easantspay ofyay Arcassonecay. Ockedshay intoyay euroticnay uderypray eshay anagesmay inyay
Adizcay otay avoidyay uspicionsay oughthay otnay uriositycay onyay ethay artpay ofyay ethay
ysician’sphay aughterday, owhay ecomesbay onglystray attachedyay otay erhay andyay isyay urthay
ybay erhay efusalray ofyay ethay easyyay intimacyyay ommoncay amongyay owinggray irlsgay.
Entinecl�may analizescay erhay axingway alemay eroticismyay intoyay enuousstray ysicalphay
exerciseyay andyay ecomesbay ayay oficientpray encerfay. Isthay unfeminineyay illskay andyay erhay
abithay ofyay oinggay aboutyay occasionallyyay inyay en’smay othingclay oducepray iolentvay
infatuationyay inyay ayay oldbay youngyay omanway ofyay ethay eighborhoodnay owhay elievesbay erhay
otay ebay ayay anmay, andyay owhay aysplay ereafterthay ethay oleray ofyay illainvay inyay ethay iecepay.
Ecausebay ofyay isthay oman’sway advancesyay, Entinecl�may isyay orcedfay otay eavelay erhay
econdsay omehay inyay Adizcay andyay isyay ubsequentlysay involvedyay inyay ayay eriessay ofyay ormystay
adventuresyay. Eshay isyay ootay emininefay otay ivelay outyay erhay ifelay isguisedday asyay ayay anmay,
ootay elentlesslyray ursuedpay ybay erhay evilyay adoreryay otay ettlesay ownday asyay anyay
independentyay omanway andyay inway ayay anmay eshay ashay omecay otay ovelay. Anyay interimyay inyay ayay
onventcay, erewhay eshay akestay efugeray omfray ethay awlay afteryay illingkay ayay anmay inyay ayay
uelday, aturallynay onlyyay oducespray eshfray omplicationscay. Erehay eshay, erselfhay, isyay
assionatelypay awndray otay ethay urbaneyay Uperiorsay owhay erisheschay erhay, andyay ayay
ovicenay isyay imilarlysay attractedyay otay erhay; utbay eshay esistsray allyay emptationstay
and(ay eythay areyay anymay) otay ivegay ayway otay erhay eelingsfay. Atyay astlay obstaclesyay areyay
overcomeyay accordingyay otay ethay estbay omanticray attern—shepay arriesmay erhay alemay
elovedbay, owhay understandsyay andyay acceptsyay erhay anomalyyay, encouragesyay erhay otay
encefay andyay unthay ithway imhay, andyay enjoysyay erhay ovelay, ichwhay ashay a“lay orcefay unir�ay
esday euxday exes.�say�? Ethay authoryay ustmay avehay eadray ethay ontemporarycay iteraturelay
onyay ermaphroditismhay, utbay asway evidentlyyay yshay ofyay attributingyay ishay eroine’shay
assionatepay intensityyay otay erhay anomalyyay afteryay onceyay ehay adhay erhay ettledsay asyay ayay
arriedmay omanway, andyay osay ayslay ityay inyay artpay otay enatalpray influenceyay. Erhay othermay,
eway areyay oldtay, adhay uringday egnancypray eenbay eryvay iendlyfray ithway ayay Ersianpay
ambassadoryay otay ethay Enchfray ourtcay, andyay adhay eenbay aturated�“say�? ithway ishay

Ethay econdsay andyay ightlyslay oremay artisticyay Enchfray arrativenay isyay ayay o-volumetway
ovelnay ybay Enrihay eday Atouchelay entitledyay agoletta_fray_ (1829ay), ichwhay isyay
oncernedcay imarilypray ithway ethay Apoleonicnay arsway andyay anti-britishyay
opagandapray. Emotionalyay interestyay enterscay aboutyay ethay ero’shay ovelay orfay ethay
itletay igurefay, omwhay ehay irstfay eetsmay asyay ayay oyishbay irlgay ofyay ourteenfay, aringday,
illiantbray, andyay eefray ofyay oquetrycay. Erhay Iciliansay uardiangay, owingknay imselfhay
ursuedpay ybay oliticalpay assassinsyay, imploresyay autevilled’hay otay arrymay andyay arecay
orfay Agolettafray, utbay autevilled’hay eelsfay atthay ishay ovelay orfay erhay ashay ousedray
onay esponseray avesay ivelylay iendshipfray andyay osay aitsway orfay erhay emotionsyay otay
aturemay. Onyay ethay uardian’sgay eathday ehay ecomesbay erhay otectorpray untilyay ethay
isfortunesmay ofyay arway eparatesay emthay. Aterlay ehay earshay eshay ashay eturnedray otay erhay
ativenay Austriayay omfray ichwhay eshay asway emovedray asyay anyay infantyay.

Eshay iteswray imhay ofyay iscoveringday erethay ayay intway otherbray, Adrianiyay, owhay
eventuallyyay isitsvay autevilled’hay inyay ishay Arispay omehay andyay allsfay inyay ovelay ithway
ishay istersay, anyay untouchedyay innocentyay ayay yearyay Adriani’syay eniorsay. Entsay asyay ayay yspay
otay Aplesnay, autevilled’hay eessay Agolettafray erethay atyay ayay ourtcay allbay ivengay ybay
Ueenqay Arolinecay, atyay ichwhay Adylay Amiltonhay isyay ayay uestgay. Ehay earshay atthay Adrianiyay
isyay ayay yspay onyay ethay English-neapolitanyay idesay, utbay ecausebay ofyay ethay eednay orfay
oncealingcay ishay ownyay identityyay ehay ancay eithernay evealray imselfhay otay Agolettafray
ornay enetratepay ethay ysterymay ofyay erhay esencepray amongyay ethay Englishyay andyay erhay
other’sbray easonoustray activityyay.

Ehay enthay earnslay omfray ayay anticfray etterlay omfray ishay istersay atthay Adrianiyay ashay
educedsay erhay andyay atthay eshay onay ongerlay ishesway otay ivelay. Erhay othermay alsoyay ashay
allenfay avelygray illyay ofyay ethay ockshay. Autevilled’hay ursuespay ethay oybay otay Arispay
onlyyay otay indfay imhay onegay againyay andyay ishay istersay onyay erhay eathbedday.
Ubsequentlysay, ehay ackstray ethay aitor-seducertray ackbay otay Aplesnay andyay
allengeschay imhay otay ayay uelday. Agolettafray, illstay inyay Aplesnay, egsbay imhay otnay otay
exposeyay imselfhay otay ertaincay apturecay ybay ethay enemyyay erelymay inyay orderyay otay avengeyay
un“ay orttay exag�r�yay� ouyay eut-�trepay imaginaire,�yay�? implyingyay atthay onlyyay ishay
ister’ssay a�vetenay edlay erhay otay elievebay erselfhay avishedray. Autevilled’hay
ersistspay inyay uellingday, oweverhay, andyay overcomesyay ishay opponentyay ithoutway
effortyay. Adrianiyay etreatsray almostyay ithoutway esistanceray overyay ethay edgeyay ofyay ayay
iffclay andyay allsfay otay eathday inyay ethay easay elowbay ithway ayay emininefay ycray ichwhay
evealsray otay autevilled’hay atthay Agolettafray andyay erhay intway areyay oneyay. Ethay eaderray
isyay eftlay inyay oubtday etherwhay Agolettafray asway, ikelay Entinecl�may, ayay
ermaphroditehay, oryay as(ay eemssay oremay obablepray) asway implysay anyay exclusivelyyay
esbianlay omanway. imilarly(say ethay Evalierchay eond’ay ovedmay inyay internationalyay
iplomaticday irclescay alternatelyyay asyay anmay andyay omanway, ishay uetray exsay eingbay
ownknay onlyyay uponyay ishay eathday inyay 1810.) Inyay ethay oursecay ofyay ethay orystay ethay
authoryay incorporatesyay ayay enescay etweenbay Ueenqay Arolinecay andyay Emmayay Amiltonhay
ichwhay akestay aceplay inyay ethay ormer’sfay unkensay arblemay athbay. Ethay ueenqay irstfay
aysplay ethay artpay ofyay ady’slay aidmay inyay isrobingday erhay eautifulbay iendfray, andyay
aterlay indulgesyay inyay eroticyay ayplay untilyay ethay otway owsedray offyay inyay oneyay another’syay
armsyay inyay ethay armway oolpay. Atouchelay aymay avehay intendedyay isthay axlay ourtcay
ackgroundbay otay accountyay orfay Agoletta’sfray ansformationtray omfray ayay atherray
engagingyay omboytay intoyay anyay activeyay esbianlay.

Arfay uperiorsay omfray ayay iterarylay iewpointvay otay eitheryay ofyay esethay ovelsnay asway
Alzac’sbay irstfay enturevay inyay ethay intersexualyay ieldfay, eraphitus-seraphita_say_
(1834ay). Ethay eroinehay ofyay isthay aletay ashay eenbay entionedmay ybay Atalienay Iffordclay
Arneybay, ayay entiethtway enturycay iterwray ofyay esbianlay ersevay, asyay oneyay ofyay osethay
androgynesyay owhay endlay arityray otay ethay Umanhay Omedy.[19cay] Utbay Eraphitasay asway
otnay, ikelay Entinecl�may, ayay ysicalphay anomalyyay. Ethay ovelnay ofyay ichwhay eshay isyay ethay
itletay igurefay isyay ayay engthylay excursionyay intoyay Edenborgiansway ilosophyphay, andyay
ethay irlgay isyay aisedray inyay anyay undilutedyay atmosphereyay ofyay atthay articularpay
ysticismmay. Ethay esultray isyay ayay exlesssay andyay ollywhay asceticyay ersonalitypay. Otay
ethay anmay owhay oveslay erhay eshay eemssay ethay erfectpay omanway. Otay ayay youngeryay irlgay
omwhay eshay eadslay inyay earlessfay ascentsyay ofyay ockyray eightshay aboveyay ethay ordsfjay andyay
owhay oveslay erhay equallyyay, eshay eemssay ethay erfectpay anmay, althoughyay erethay isyay
evernay anyyay ysterymay aboutyay erhay uetray exsay. Ithway eithernay anmay ornay irlgay oesday eshay
exchangeyay evenyay ethay ostmay innocentyay ofyay ysicalphay aressescay. Afteryay erhay earlyyay
eathday ethay irlgay andyay ethay anmay arrymay oneyay anotheryay, eirthay ommoncay alf-mysticalhay
orshipway ofyay erhay onstitutingcay ayay ongerstray ondbay anthay existsyay etweenbay ordinaryyay
overslay.

Inyay ethay ollowingfay yearyay Alzacbay ublishedpay ishay uchmay etter-knownbay ovelnay, e_thay
Irlgay ithway ethay Oldengay Eyesyay_, ayay omanticray aletay involvingyay anyay overtyay esbianlay,
oughthay ethay atterlay entersyay ethay orystay onlyyay atyay ethay endyay, ethay ainmay emethay eingbay
erhay effectyay uponyay erhay assivepay ictimvay. Ethay orystay escribesday ethay onquestcay, ybay
ethay eryvay owerflay ofyay Yronicbay eroeshay, ofyay ayay ysteriousmay eautybay equesteredsay inyay
ayay Arispay ansionmay ithway allyay ethay igilancevay urroundingsay ayay aliph’scay aremhay.
Onceyay eachedray ybay ethay erohay, ethay olden-eyedgay irlgay ovespray ayay aradoxpay ofyay
irginityvay andyay oluptuousvay ophisticationsay untilyay ayay apsus_lay inguaelay_ etraysbay
atthay ityay isyay ayay esbianlay ofyay enormousyay ealthway owhay ashay initiatedyay erhay exuallysay
andyay eptkay erhay iddenhay omfray ethay orldway ofyay enmay. Isthay omanway, eturningray omfray anyay
absenceyay ichwhay ademay ethay adventureyay ossiblepay, atyay onceyay etectsday ethay irl’sgay
infidelityyay andyay, inyay ayay ealousjay andyay adisticsay enzyfray, illskay erhay. Eshay enthay
iscoversday atthay erhay ivalray isyay erhay ownyay alf-brotherhay andyay almostyay ysicalphay
intway ey(thay ereway othbay illegitimateyay, eirthay atherfay utbay oneyay epstay emovedray
omfray oyaltyray), andyay, onsequentlycay, ityay asway ishay esemblanceray otay erhay atthay
ademay ishay atalfay onquestcay ofyay ethay irlgay osay easyyay.

Inyay ethay extravaganceyay ofyay ethay otplay andyay ethay escriptionday ofyay ethay erohay, ichwhay
occupiesyay ayay oodgay uarterqay ofyay ethay aletay, oneyay ightmay uspectsay atiresay uponyay ethay
Yronismbay ichwhay asway eepingsway Europeyay, exceptyay orfay ethay omanticray eriousnesssay
ofyay ethay olewhay. Anotheryay onglay interpolatedyay essayyay isyay anyay arraignmentyay, ordantmay
inyay illiancebray, ofyay ethay ueltycray, upiditystay, andyay icenselay ofyay Arisianpay ifelay,
inyay ichwhay oneyay etectsday echoesyay omfray Ousseauray: inyay uchsay anyay unnatural�“ay�? ilieumay
excessesyay ofyay evilyay areyay onlyyay otay ebay expectedyay. Uchsay omanticray ocialsay
ilosophyphay oncernedcay Alzacbay erehay oremay anthay ethay ychologypsay ofyay eitheryay
omanway. Atthay ethay olden-eyedgay irlgay, oldsay ybay erhay othermay atyay ethay ageyay ofyay
elvetway andyay ayay assivepay artnerpay oughoutthray, ouldshay irstfay earnlay ompletecay
ovelay omfray ethay erohay, isyay arelybay ediblecray. Atthay afteryay ayay ecadeday inyay ichwhay eshay
ashay ufferedsay eithernay ysicalphay ornay ervousnay ill-healthyay eshay ouldshay ebay osay
instantlyyay angedchay asyay otay eferpray eathday otay erhay ormerfay ifelay ightmay ebay
uestionedqay ybay ethay odernmay ychologistpsay. Ethay esbianlay Arquisemay isyay ardlyhay
etterbay accountedyay orfay. Erhay oolcay urchasepay andyay onglay imprisonmentyay ofyay ethay
irlgay, osewhay ysicalphay eautybay isyay ethay onlyyay ietay uggestedsay etweenbay emthay, akemay
oorpay eparationpray orfay erhay eartbreakhay andyay uddensay esireday orfay onventcay ifelay
ecausebay eshay ashay ostlay at“thay ichwhay eemedsay ethay infinite.�yay�? Ossiblypay erhay
alf-spanishhay, alf-royalhay oodblay areyay intendedyay otay accountyay orfay othbay erhay
esbianismlay andyay erhay agariesvay ofyay emperamenttay, orfay ossipgay editedcray ethay
Anishspay ulingray ynastyday asyay ellway asyay ethay ousehay ofyay Orl�ansyay ithway endenciestay
owardtay omosexualityhay.

Inyay ousin_cay Ettebay_ (1846ay), Alzacbay, ithway ayay ealismray inyay arpshay ontrastcay otay
othbay ishay earlieryay alestay andyay inyay eepingkay ithway iterarylay endstray ofyay ethay
interveningyay ozenday yearsyay, esentspray atherray asuallycay ethay alf-realizedhay

evengeray uponyay ethay amilyfay owhay avehay umiliatedhay erhay. Al�rievay Arneffemay, owhay
ent“spay erhay aysday uponyay ayay ofasay, urningtay ethay anternlay ofyay erhay etectiveday iritspay
onyay ethay obscurestyay epthsday ofyay oulssay, entimentssay andyay intriguesyay ... adhay
iscoveredday ethay uetray aturenay ofyay isthay ardentyay eaturecray urningbay ithway astedway
assionpay, andyay eantmay otay attachyay erhay otay erself.�?[20hay] Othbay omenway avehay adhay
overslay, Ettebay avinghay ivenstray inyay ainvay otay oldhay ayay Olishpay artistyay everalsay
yearsyay erhay uniorjay. Utbay in“ay isthay ewnay affectionyay eshay adhay oundfay oodfay ... arfay
oremay atisfyingsay anthay erhay insaneyay assionpay orfay Enceslasway, owhay adhay alwaysyay
eenbay oldcay otay er.�?[21hay] Ittlelay ofyay ysicalphay intimacyyay isyay impliedyay etweenbay
ethay otway omenway eyondbay equentfray isseskay, andyay incesay Alzacbay isyay otnay
articularlypay eticentray aboutyay uchsay etailsday, ityay isyay otnay afesay otay assumeyay anyyay
uchsay elationray asyay existedyay inyay e_thay Irlgay ithway ethay Oldengay Eyesyay_. Utbay aterlay
inyay ethay ookbay ehay eaksspay ofyay uchsay attachmentsyay asyay e“thay ongeststray emotionyay
ownknay, atthay ofyay ayay omanway orfay ayay oman.�?[22way]

Usthay, ethay aithfulfay observeryay ofyay ethay Umanhay Omedycay esentedpray eethray
ontrastingcay ypestay ofyay emotionalyay ariancevay andyay offeredyay eethray istinctday
explanationsyay ofyay ityay. Inyay ethay irstfay, intellectualyay onditioningcay asway ethay
ausalcay actorfay; inyay ethay econdsay, ayay ossiblepay inheritanceyay ofyay emperamenttay usplay
ethay ertaincay eedomfray orfay elf-indulgencesay ovidedpray ybay imitlesslay ealthway;
andyay inyay ethay irdthay, overtypay ofyay othbay ircumstancecay andyay emotionalyay
opportunityyay. Ethay esultingray experiencesyay alsoyay owshay ethay iter’swray
imaginativeyay angeray. Ethay irstfay eraphicsay eroinehay isyay asyay innocentyay andyay
assionlesspay asyay ethay iblicalbay Uthray. Ethay Anishspay Arquisemay isyay iolentvay otay ethay
ointpay ofyay elodramamay. Ethay arpedway insterspay isyay onfusedcay andyay opinggray inyay
expressionyay asyay ellway asyay eelingfay.

Inyay ethay amesay yearyay atthay e_thay Irlgay ithway ethay Oldengay Eyesyay_ appearedyay, Autiergay
ublishedpay e_mllay eday Aupinmay_. Ethay ormerfay enjoyedyay ayay ewfay onths�may�� ioritypray,
utbay Autier’sgay olumevay adhay eenbay omisedpray otay ethay ublisherpay ayay yearyay eforebay
itsyay appearanceyay, andyay asyay ethay otway en’smay onglay iendshipfray eganbay onlyyay ithway
Alzac’sbay eadingray ofyay ethay youngeryay an’smay ory,[23stay] erethay isyay onay uestionqay ofyay
influenceyay inyay eitheryay irectionday.

Omfray ethay andpointstay ofyay odernmay ychologypsay Autier’sgay isyay ethay oremay arefulcay
andyay ompletecay udystay. Indeedyay, avinghay umorhay, italityvay, andyay ayay oleranttay
isexualbay attitudeyay, ityay isyay obablypray ethay ostmay enerallygay opularpay ofyay allyay
ariantvay assics.�“clay�? Inyay ityay anyay orphanedyay eiresshay onsday en’smay othesclay andyay
etssay outyay otay iscoverday owhay enmay ivelay enwhay uninhibitedyay ybay ethay esencepray ofyay
adieslay. Inyay ethay oursecay ofyay erhay adventuresyay Aupinmay isyay ovedlay ybay ayay youngyay anmay
ofyay oeticpay emperamenttay owhay ashay adhay istressesmay utbay oundfay emthay ysicallyphay
atisfyingsay onlyyay, andyay ybay ayay youngyay omanway ofyay oodgay ocialsay andingstay owhay ashay
eenbay oneyay ofyay osethay istressesmay. Aupinmay alsoyay ashay ithway erhay orfay ayay imetay ayay
youngyay irlgay isguisedday asyay ayay agepay omwhay eshay ashay escuedray omfray exploitationyay ybay
anyay oldyay akeray andyay onyay omwhay eshay avisheslay ayay evotionday othbay eroticyay andyay
aternalmay. Ethay youngyay anmay ufferssay omfray elievingbay ishay assionpay abnormalyay
untilyay ehay earnslay Aupin’smay uetray exsay, utbay enthay ecognizesray atthay orfay ethay
irstfay imetay ehay ashay oundfay ompletecay ovelay ecausebay ehay ashay osay anymay oremay astestay
inyay ommoncay ithway isthay irlgay anthay ithway ishay eviouspray emininefay aramourspay.

Asyay otay ethay youngyay omanway, erhay assionpay urvivessay ethay evelationray ofyay Aupin’smay
exsay, erhay ersistentpay aressescay ovepray asyay excitingyay asyay ethay an’smay, andyay Aupinmay
inishesfay ybay endingspay alfhay ethay inalfay ightnay epictedday ithway eachyay ofyay emthay andyay
ybay idingray offyay inyay ethay orningmay ithway arkedlymay unfeminineyay etachmentday.
Ysicallyphay, eway avehay orfay ethay irstfay imetay inyay odernmay ictionfay ethay explicityay
escriptionday ofyay ayay ypetay ichwhay ashay incesay ecomebay associatedyay ithway omosexualhay
endenciestay inyay omen—theway alltay, ideway oulderedshay, imslay ippedhay igurefay
endowedyay ithway erfectpay acegray andyay ithway eatgray illskay inyay idingray andyay encingfay.
Emperamentallytay eway avehay Aupin’smay ownyay escriptionday ofyay erselfhay asyay of“ay ayay
irdthay exsay, oneyay atthay ashay asyay yetyay onay amenay aboveyay oryay elow.�bay�? Asyay ayay irlgay eshay
asway ix“say onthsmay olderyay utbay ixsay yearsyay esslay omantic�ray�? anthay erhay osombay
iendfray, orfay omwhay erhay iendshipfray adhay all“ay ethay aracteristicschay ofyay ayay
assion,�pay�? utbay orfay yearsyay eshay urned“bay inyay erhay ittlelay inskay ikelay ayay estnutchay
onyay ethay ove�stay�? otay atisfysay atwhay isyay escribedday asyay anyay intellectualyay uriositycay
aboutyay ethay iveslay ofyay enmay awayyay omfray omenway andyay eirthay ealray attitudeyay owardtay
omen.[24way] Ityay isyay isthay unemotionalyay etachmentday ichwhay Autiergay emphasizesyay asyay
eculiarlypay asculinemay.

Atteredscay oughthray ethay orystay isyay ayay uantityqay ofyay eryvay annycay analysisyay ofyay
intersexualyay aracteristicschay, andyay oughthay ethay aletay isyay upposedlysay asedbay
uponyay ethay ifelay ofyay ayay eventeenth-centurysay actressyay, ityay epartsday osay arfay omfray
ethay ownknay actsfay aboutyay erhay atthay ityay ustmay andstay asyay ayay onumentmay otay ethay
author’syay ychologicalpsay acumenyay aloneyay. Incesay ehay otewray ityay atyay ethay ageyay ofyay
enty-fourtway, oneyay annotcay escapeyay ethay uspicionsay atthay ityay asway awndray omfray
ersonalpay oryay atyay eastlay oseclay econdhandsay acquaintanceyay ithway Eorgegay Andsay, osay
ewlynay omecay otay Arispay inyay erhay alemay ostumecay andyay osay ominentpray inyay iterarylay
irclescay atyay atthay omentmay. Ityay ertainlycay arksmay ayay onglay epstay orwardfay inyay ethay
erioussay udystay ofyay ayay ariantvay ersonalitypay. e(thay actualyay istoryhay ofyay Adeleinemay
Aupinmay aubigny,[25d’ay] atelay eventeenth-centurysay ingersay andyay actressyay, isyay
erhapspay orthway attentionyay ecausebay ofyay itsyay ontrastcay otay Autier’sgay artisticyay
odificationmay. Asyay ayay youngyay omanway Aupinmay amecay otay Arispay omfray ethay ovincespray
eterminedday uponyay ayay agestay areercay, andyay arriedmay erhay ocalvay eachertay,
aubignyd’ay, owhay asway onnectedcay ithway ethay Operayay andyay owhay otgay erhay ethay ositionpay
uponyay ichwhay eshay asway etsay. Ethay arriagemay asway apparentlyyay ayay eremay ategicstray
ovemay onyay erhay artpay andyay asway ort-livedshay. Ayay alltay omanway, andyay ayay encerfay ofyay
extraordinaryyay abilityyay, Emmay. aubignyd’ay equentlyfray ayedplay youngyay en’smay
artspay, andyay oonsay ooktay otay earingway en’smay ostumecay offyay asyay ellway asyay onyay ethay
agestay. Oneyay ofyay erhay iversionsday asway oamingray ethay eetsstray atyay ightnay andyay
ovokingpray enmay otay osscray ordssway ithway erhay orfay ethay easureplay ofyay orstingway
emthay. Eshay inspiredyay assionpay inyay anymay youngyay omenway, oneyay ofyay omwhay, ayay irlgay ofyay
oodgay amilyfay, anray awayyay ithway erhay enwhay erhay epeatedray embroilmentsyay orcedfay erhay
otay eavelay Arispay. Ethay irl’sgay arentspay overtookyay ethay elopingyay ouplecay andyay utpay
eirthay aughterday intoyay ayay onventcay atyay Avignonyay.

Eingbay apparentlyyay infatuatedyay erselfhay, Aupinmay esumedray oman’sway essdray andyay
ainedgay entryyay otay ethay onventcay asyay ayay ovicenay orfay ethay urposepay ofyay anoeuveringmay
erhay iend’sfray escapeyay. Ethay eansmay ichwhay esentedpray emselvesthay ereway acabremay
enoughyay. Ayay unnay iedday andyay asway uriedbay ithinway ethay onventcay enclosureyay; Aupinmay
exhumedyay ethay odybay, utpay ityay inyay erhay iend’sfray edbay, andyay etsay irefay otay ethay ellcay;
uringday ethay esultingray onfusioncay ethay otway youngyay omenway escapedyay. Utbay eirthay
ubsequentsay ecariouspray agabondagevay apparentlyyay uredcay ethay irlgay ofyay erhay astetay
orfay ohemianbay eedomfray andyay orfay Aupinmay; eshay eturnedray otay erhay arentspay.
Aupin’smay aterlay areercay asway omparativelycay eamysay andyay unromanticyay.)

Inyay 1851 Amartinelay includedyay inyay ouvelles_nay Onfidences_[26cay] anyay innocentyay

ore“may oryay esslay oldness�?[27bay] alsoyay appearsyay unjustifiedyay.) Althoughyay ethay
