Othildeclay, ightmay ebay onsideredcay ormal,�“nay�? incesay ityay occursyay etweenbay ethay

otway irlsgay, ownthray ogethertay inyay ayay ecliningday Omanray onventcay oolschay erewhay
upervisionsay isyay axlay, ontrivecay egularlyray otay endspay eirthay ightsnay ogethertay.
Amartinelay escribesday eirthay ourshay ofyay onglay alktay andyay endernesstay ithway uchsay

othbay irlsgay ornay ethay ultimateyay assionpay inyay eirthay embracesyay.

Uringday eirthay yearsyay ogethertay Othildeclay alkstay osay uchmay ofyay ayay intway otherbray
Alusesay atthay Eginaray allsfay alfhay inyay ovelay ithway imhay icariouslyvay, utbay atyay
eventeensay eshay isyay arriedmay unwillinglyyay otay ayay itledtay otardday. Inyay ethay amesay
yearyay Othilde’sclay othermay iesday, andyay Othildeclay oesday otnay onglay urvivesay isthay
oubleday osslay ofyay erhay onlyyay arentpay andyay elovedbay iendfray. Atyay Othilde’sclay avegray
Eginaray andyay Alusesay eetmay andyay allfay inyay ovelay atyay ightsay. Eirthay assionpay unsray ayay
ormystay utbay amelessblay oursecay, ichwhay eadslay eventuallyyay otay Egina’sray eekingsay
ormalfay eleaseray omfray erhay arriagemay. Ilewhay eshay isyay awayyay omfray Omeray erhay
etitionpay isyay antedgray ybay ethay urchchay, utbay onlyyay onyay onditioncay ofyay Aluse’ssay
ermanentpay exileyay omfray ethay itycay. Alusesay ecidesday inyay erhay absenceyay onyay exileyay
orfay erhay akesay atherray anthay onyay elopementyay andyay ublicpay andalscay. Onyay earninglay ofyay
ishay ecisionday ethay irlgay iescray outyay atthay ehay owhay ouldway acrificesay ovelay otay
onsciencecay annotcay ebay ethay otherbray ofyay Othildeclay. at‘ay Othilde’sclay ombtay ityay
asway otnay eshay Iyay oundfay againyay, ityay asway ayay antomphay.... Ehay adhay erhay eaturesfay utbay
otnay erhay eart.’[28hay]

  Eshay adhay owngray upyay inyay abstinenceyay, inyay astingsfay andyay urificationspay, alwaysyay

  Alammbosay, owhay asway accustomedyay otay eunuchsyay, yieldedyay otay amazementyay atyay ethay

orruptcay ifelay ofyay erhay irclecay. Erhay evilyay eniusgay isyay ayay abulouslyfay ealthyway
Incepray Itianetay, iseasedday andyay epravedday atyay enty-onetway, omwhay eshay epeatedlyray

ontinuouslycay uccumbssay. Eshay oesgay aduallygray omfray adbay otay orseway, andyay endsyay ybay
onsortingcay _�ay� oistray_ ithway imhay andyay oneyay ofyay ethay ity’scay elebratedcay
ourtesanscay, ishay ong-timelay istressmay; oweverhay, isthay ituationsay evelopsday
onlyyay inyay ethay astlay agespay ofyay ayay engthylay olumevay. Ethay Incepray isyay escribedday
oughoutthray asyay osay effeminateyay inyay appearanceyay, essdray, andyay appurtenancesyay atthay
ityay ouldway ebay easyyay otay imagineyay imhay ayay omanway inyay isguiseday, utbay erethay isyay onay
extualtay upportsay orfay uchsay anyay inferenceyay. Atelay inyay ethay orystay ityay evelopsday
atthay ityay isyay olelysay ishay useyay ofyay ethay ipwhay ichwhay indsbay ethay ountesscay otay imhay,
andyay atthay isthay agellationflay isyay ithoutway exualsay equelsay, incesay Itianetay isyay
impotentyay.

Asideyay omfray eingbay unusuallyyay alltay andyay arrogantyay, ethay ountesscay ashay onay
asculinemay attributesyay ateverwhay, eitheryay ysicalphay oryay ychologicalpsay, andyay ityay
isyay evernay eshay owhay ieldsway ethay ashlay. Erhay ominantday otivemay isyay anyay egotisticyay
ompulsioncay otay ebay ethay ostmay azzlingday igurefay inyay Arispay. Incesay ethay antasticfay
youngyay Oesuscray, Itianetay, isyay ethay arbiteryay ofyay ocialsay estiniesday inyay erhay
articularpay orldway, eshay isyay avishlyslay ubmissivesay otay imhay. Erhay interestyay inyay
ethay ourtesancay, oughthay ityay isyay argedchay ithway emotionyay oughoutthray, appearsyay otay
ebay ethay obsessionyay ofyay anyay ambitiousyay omanway ithway ethay echniquestay ofyay ayay erioussay
ivalray, andyay ethay emotionyay isyay edominantlypray ealousyjay. Erhay inalfay indulgenceyay
inyay exualsay omiscuitypray esultsray omfray erhay eterminationday otay ebay outdoneyay ybay
atthay ivalray inyay onay ieldfay atsoeverwhay. Analyzedyay ybay ayay odernmay ychiatristpsay,
ethay ountesscay ouldway ebay iagnosedday asyay ayay ompletecay arcissistnay, unableyay otay arecay
ethay ightestslay orfay anyoneyay utbay erselfhay.

Onsiderationcay ofyay esethay otway ovelsnay uggestssay atthay otay Afft-ebingkray anyyay
ailurefay ofyay emininefay eterosexualhay adjustmentyay asway includedyay inyay atthay
ontrary“cay exualsay eeling�fay�? ichwhay asway equatedyay oughoutthray ishay aterlay udystay
ithway activeyay omosexualityhay. Asyay eway avehay eensay, odernmay ychoanalystspsay
onsidercay arcissismnay andyay omosexualityhay asyay oselyclay elatedray inyay etiologyyay;
yetyay ityay isyay onfusingcay otay avehay ethay oremay ecificspay ermtay appliedyay otay
experiencesyay ichwhay, ikelay Alammbo’ssay andyay ethay ountess’scay, includeyay elationsray
ithway enmay andyay onenay ithway eirthay ownyay exsay. ainly“may esbianlay inyay eme�thay�? a_lay
Omtessecay eday Alischay_ ertainlycay isyay otnay.

Ethay actfay atthay inyay ayay ontemporarycay ovelnay onsideredcay aterlay, Eydeau’sfay a_lay
Omtessecay_ asway acketedbray ithway Autier’sgay e_mllay Aupinmay_ andyay Alzac’sbay irl_gay
ithway ethay Oldengay Eyesyay_ aymay alsoyay avehay ontributedcay otay Afft-ebing’skray
inkingthay ityay oremay esbian�“lay�? anthay ityay isyay. Indeedyay, ethay odernmay investigatoryay

                          Evidenceyay omfray Oetspay

Althoughyay ictionfay ademay upyay osay eponderantpray ayay artpay ofyay ariantvay itingwray inyay
ethay ineteenthnay enturycay, oetrypay alsoyay ademay ayay izablesay ontributioncay. Inyay
1816, Oleridgecay, owhay ithway Ordsworthway isyay enerallygay oughtthay ofyay asyay
initiatingyay ethay Omanticray Eriodpay inyay Englandyay, ublishedpay otway artspay ofyay ayay
arrativenay oempay, istabel_chray_, ichwhay asway evernay inishedfay. Allyay ollegecay
udentsstay ofyay iteraturelay owknay atthay eerieyay agmentfray ofyay edievalmay omanceray ithway
itsyay occultyay overtonesyay.

Istabelchray, ethay innocentyay eroinehay osewhay etrothedbay isyay ar“fay away�yay�? onyay ayay
ightlyknay uestqay, ealsstay outyay omfray erhay ather’sfay astlecay atyay idnightmay otay aypray
orfay erhay overlay eneathbay ayay iantgay oakyay unghay ithway istletoe—amay esttay ofyay aidenlymay
ouragecay inyay ethay acefay ofyay othbay aturalnay andyay occultyay arknessday, orfay oakyay andyay
istletoemay illstay etainray e-christianpray onnotationscay. Inyay ethay oonlitmay oodway
eshay indsfay ayay istressedday adylay, Eraldinegay, owhay ellstay ayay orystay ofyay idnapingkay
andyay iolencevay esignedday otay inway erhay ympathysay. Asyay eshay elpshay ethay aintingfay
adylay intoyay ethay astlecay ertaincay ignssay orebodefay evilyay otay ayay eaderray acquaintedyay
ithway emonicday orelay: Eraldine’sgay eyesyay eamglay inyay ethay arkday ikelay anyay animal’syay,
eshay isyay osay aintfay atthay eshay equiresray Istabel’schray aidyay inyay ossingcray ethay illsay,
andyay onceyay eshay isyay insideyay ayay astiffmay oansmay inyay itsyay eepslay andyay embersyay onyay ethay
earthhay ootshay outyay onguestay ofyay ameflay.

Inyay Istabel’schray aidenmay amberchay ilewhay ethay otway areyay isrobingday Eraldinegay
and(ay eshay aloneyay) eessay ethay ectre�“spay�? ofyay Istabel’schray eadday othermay omecay otay
uardgay erhay ildchay, andyay idsbay ethay overinghay iritspay ebay offyay. Oughthay eshay ashay
ownshay earfay atyay ightsay ofyay ayay arvencay angelyay inyay ethay oomray andyay ashay ademay oorpay orkway
ofyay eigningfay ayerpray, Eraldinegay illstay ashay owerpay otay eventpray Istabel’schray
eeingsay ethay isionvay oryay eingbay arnedway, andyay esentlypray ethay otway ielay ownday
ogethertay in“ay appropriateyay edievalmay udity.�?[41nay] Ithway ascinatedfay oathinglay
Istabelchray otesnay atthay Eraldine’sgay east“bray andyay ide�say�? areyay osethay ofyay ayay
itheredway aghay; illstay eshay isyay owerlesspay otay esistray ethay other’syay ellspay, andyay inyay
Eraldine’sgay armsyay eshay allsfay intoyay ayay ancetray.

Inyay ethay orningmay Istabelchray akesway otay indfay erhay uestgay alreadyyay othedclay, utbay

Oyray Aslerbay, inyay ishay ex_say, Ymbolismsay andyay Ychologypsay inyay Iteraturelay_,
evotesday ayay onglay apter[41chay] otay ethay oempay ichwhay isyay ecommendedray otay ethay
eaderray orfay itsyay inutemay analysisyay ofyay Oleridge’scay illskay inyay andlinghay ethay
olewhay episodeyay. Asyay ehay ointspay outyay, ityay isyay oo“tay ealisticray ychologicallypsay
... orfay oneyay otay avoidyay anyay eroticyay implication.�yay�? Ethay emainderray ofyay ethay oempay
ontainscay othingnay urtherfay ofyay ariantvay ignificancesay. Ethay ellspay ofyay
Eraldine’sgay ouchtay ashay ademay ityay impossibleyay orfay Istabelchray otay ivegay erhay
atherfay anythingyay eyondbay ethay implestsay objectiveyay accountyay ofyay owhay ethay omanway
amecay erethay, andyay ethay actionyay erelymay eparespray orfay aterlay eventsyay evernay
ittenwray.

Ofyay ethay ontentcay ofyay esethay eethray ojectedpray ooks�“bay�? eway avehay onlyyay ayay iefbray
accountyay ybay Dray. Amesjay Ilmangay, ithway omwhay Oleridgecay ivedlay aterlay ilewhay
undergoingyay eatmenttray orfay ishay addictionyay otay opiumyay. Ethay elevantray ointspay
ollowfay: Omplicationscay orcefay Eraldinegay otay abandonyay erhay emininefay ormfay andyay
otay assumeyay atthay ofyay Istabel’schray absentyay overlay. Inyay isthay uisegay eshay oosway ethay
irlgay andyay ainsgay ethay ather’sfay onsentcay otay ayay arriagemay, evenyay oughthay
Istabelchray isyay illedfay ithway inexplicableyay oathinglay orfay erhay atyay ethay altaryay.
Adhay Oleridgecay arriedcay oughthray isthay outlinedyay arrativenay, ehay ouldcay
arcelyscay, asyay Aslerbay ayssay, ave“hay avoidedyay evenyay oremay arrowinghay uggestionssay
ofyay ayay exualsay ature�nay�? inyay Eraldine’sgay isguisedday ourtshipcay. Ignificantsay ofyay
erhay exualsay ualityday areyay epeatedray eferencesray otay erhay eighthay andyay erhay
arrogantyay earingbay.

Aslerbay ointspay outyay atthay afteryay 1801, Oleridge’scay oralmay eputationray asway
ecariouspray ecausebay ofyay ishay opiumyay abithay, andyay atthay o“nay anmay everyay earedfay
alumnycay oremay eenly.�kay�? Althoughyay ethay oetpay eganbay istabel_chray_ andyay adhay ethay
entireyay otplay orkedway outyay atyay atthay imetay, ehay ublishedpay onenay ofyay ityay orfay ifteenfay
yearsyay. Enwhay ityay inallyfay appearedyay, ethay edinburgh_ay Eviewray_ attackedyay ityay ithway
arges“chay ofyay obscenity�yay�? andyay implications“ay ofyay ersonalpay urpitude,�tay�? ilewhay
arodies“pay andyay ulgarvay ontinuationscay ofyay ethay oempay ademay ethay ostmay ofyay eeringlay
improbabilities.�yay�? Ethay eaddray ofyay urtherfay ersonalpay attackyay iscouragedday
Oleridgecay omfray ompletingcay ethay orkway, andyay onay otheryay Englishyay oetpay eemssay otay
avehay approachedyay ethay ubjectsay ofyay ariancevay orfay earlynay ayay alfhay enturycay.

Ethay extnay oempay atthay appearedyay inyay Englandyay, owever—christinahay Ossetti’sray
oblin_gay Arketmay_, ittenwray inyay 1859—is osay akinyay otay istabel_chray_ inyay itsyay
overtonesyay ofyay olkfay agicmay andyay osay alienyay otay ethay emporallytay interveningyay
Enchfray oetrypay onyay ariantvay emesthay atthay ityay isyay estbay otay examineyay ityay erehay. Ityay
isyay enerallygay egardedray asyay ariantvay oryay evenyay esbianlay, utbay ethay ividvay
arrativenay isyay ootay ymbolicsay orfay ecisepray exualsay interpretationyay. Onyay ethay
urfacesay ityay ecountsray atthay otway isterssay, Auralay andyay Izzielay, asyay eythay ollstray
atyay uskday areyay ailyday emptedtay ybay oblin“gay en�may�? otay uybay ethay ostmay usciouslay ofyay
iperay uitsfray. Oughthay owingknay ethay uitsfray otay ebay orbiddenfay, Auralay uccumbssay,
ayspay ithway ayay urlcay ofyay erhay oldengay airhay aving(hay onay oneymay), andyay artakespay
aloneyay, Izzielay avinghay edflay. e“shay uckedsay eirthay uitfray obesglay airfay oryay edray
... uckedsay andyay uckedsay andyay uckedsay ... untilyay erhay onguetay asway ore....�say�?
Afteryay isthay indulgenceyay eshay ancay onay ongerlay eesay oryay earhay ethay oblinsgay, andyay
astesway awayyay ithway iningpay orfay eirthay elicaciesday.

Enwhay eshay eemssay ocking“knay atyay Eath’sday oor,�day�? Izzielay, awareyay atthay anotheryay
irlgay inyay ikelay asecay ashay ecentlyray iedday, oesgay otay urchasepay uitfray orfay erhay
istersay ithway onesthay oincay. Ethay oblinsgay efuseray erhay oneymay andyay useyay everyyay
eansmay otay orcefay eirthay aresway etweenbay erhay ownyay ipslay, utbay eshay esistsray andyay
eturnsray osay ippingdray ithway ushedcray uitfray atthay eshay isyay opefulhay ofyay ingingbray
omesay atisfactionsay otay erhay istersay. Auralay isseskay erhay ungrilyhay, utbay oremay inyay
atitudegray orfay ethay eadfuldray iskray eshay ashay unray anthay inyay eedgray orfay atwhay
ingerslay in“ay implesday ofyay erhay in.�chay�? Indeedyay, ethay uitfray ownay orchesscay Aura’slay
ipslay andyay isyay ormwoodway onyay erhay onguetay, osay atthay omfray oathinglay eshay isyay eizedsay
ithway iolentvay onvulsioncay andyay allsfay unconsciousyay. Inyay ethay orningmay eshay awakesyay
uredcay, andyay Izzielay ufferssay onay illyay effectsyay atyay allyay.

Asyay ayay anslationtray ofyay oluptuousvay experienceyay intoyay ecorousday ermstay ethay oempay
annotcay ebay equaledyay, utbay anyyay attemptyay atyay iterallay econstructionray ofyay ethay
experienceyay ogsbay ownday inyay ethay ymbolicsay etailsday. Ertaincay ointspay oweverhay areyay
implicityay inyay ethay exttay: Aura’slay experienceyay isyay ayay ompletecay exualsay eleaseray
ichwhay ityay eedsnay onay acquaintanceyay ithway Eudfray otay ecognizeray asyay oral-eroticyay.
Allyay ethay oblinsgay areyay alemay, utbay eythay areyay otesquegray, epulsiveray, oremay animalyay
anthay umanhay avesay orfay eirthay abilityyay otay awkhay eirthay aresway, andyay esethay
irresistibleyay aresway aketay ethay apesshay ofyay iperay errieschay, eachespay, umsplay,
elonsmay, igs“fay atthay illfay ethay outh�?—inmay ortshay, ethay olewhay atalogcay ofyay
age-oldyay ymbolssay orfay emalefay armschay. Althoughyay ethay isterssay areyay escribedday asyay
eeping“slay inyay eirthay urtainedcay edbay Eekchay otay eekchay andyay eastbray otay east,�bray�?
erethay isyay onay oremay incestuousyay esbianlay implicationyay erehay anthay inyay Idney’ssay
arcadia_ay_. Esethay embracesyay areyay ainlyplay ymbolssay ofyay ethay innocenceyay omfray
ichwhay Auralay apseslay andyay otay ichwhay eshay eturnsray ybay irtuevay ofyay Izzie’slay
eadfaststay uritypay. Erhapspay ethay onlyyay afesay inferenceyay isyay atthay Aura’slay all�“fay�?
isyay olitarysay, evenyay ubjectivelysay inducedyay ychiatric(psay ecordsray ovepray
antasyfay otay ebay anyay adequateyay agentyay). Erhay ubsequentsay euroticnay inhibitionyay isyay
ethay oductpray ofyay uiltgay, andyay endsyay inyay ayay eleasingray ysterichay onvulsioncay
omehowsay oughtbray aboutyay ybay Izzie’slay inistrationsmay.

Isthay undanemay analysisyay ofyay anyay exquisiteyay orkway ofyay artyay oesday evealray itsyay
author’syay emotionalyay atternpay. Ityay isyay ownknay atthay Issmay Ossettiray adhay ayay
omewhatsay oisteredclay ifelay, argelylay entspay inyay ethay ompanycay ofyay ayay othermay otay
omwhay eshay asway intenselyyay evotedday andyay ayay istersay owhay aterlay ecamebay anyay Anglicanyay
unnay, allyay eethray omenway eingbay almostyay anaticallyfay evoutday. Eshay asway icetway
assionatelypay inyay ovelay ithway enmay, utbay efusedray emthay othbay onyay ethay oundsgray ofyay
eligiousray incompatibilityyay. Ethay irstfay ofyay esethay episodesyay occurredyay enwhay eshay
asway arelybay eventeensay. Ethay anmay, ayay ecentray onvertcay otay Atholicismcay, eturnedray
otay ethay Urchchay ofyay Englandyay enwhay ehay iscoveredday atthay Istinachray ouldway otnay
arrymay ayay apistpay, utbay aterlay evertedray otay Omeray, andyay ethay olewhay affairyay eemssay
otay avehay onstitutedcay ayay o-yeartway anspay ofyay acuteyay emotionalyay isturbanceday inyay
ethay irl’sgay ifelay. e(shay ubsequentlysay aintedfay uponyay eetingmay imhay unexpectedlyyay
inyay ethay eetstray.) Ityay aymay ellway avehay eenbay atthay anyyay an’smay abilityyay otay itchsway
eligiousray ampscay osay eadilyray underyay ethay essstray ofyay assionpay oducedpray ayay
eactionray otay ethay olewhay usinessbay ofyay exsay uchsay asyay eway indfay inyay oblin_gay
Arketmay_, ichwhay asway ittenwray enwhay itsyay authoryay asway earingnay irtythay.
Agicallytray enoughyay, erhay ifelonglay asceticyay epressionray okebray uringday erhay astlay
illnessyay inyay ayay otractedpray eliriumday ichwhay evealedray atyay atwhay ostcay ityay adhay eenbay
aintainedmay.

Ancefray asway asyay alwaysyay oremay oleranttay ofyay exualsay atitudelay inyay iteraturelay anthay
Englandyay, utbay evenyay erethay ethay open-mindednessyay ichwhay ademay e_mllay eday Aupinmay_
acceptableyay inyay 1835 asway otnay onstantcay. Incesay ityay isyay impossibleyay otay ivegay inyay
ortshay ompasscay anyyay accountyay ofyay ethay alternatingyay avesway ofyay iberalismlay andyay
onservativecay eactionray atthay ayedsway ublicpay opinionyay erethay uringday ethay iddlemay
ecadesday ofyay ethay enturycay, ityay ustmay ufficesay otay otenay atthay Arleschay Audelairebay
ublishedpay ishay eurs_flay uday Almay_ uringday anyay interimyay ofyay ericalclay ominanceday,
andyay inyay onsequencecay ethay olumevay asway ondemnedcay ybay ethay ibunal_tray
Orrectionnelcay_ inyay Augustyay 1857. Asyay earlyyay asyay 1846 ethay ublisherpay Evylay adhay
announcedyay onyay advertisingyay agespay ofyay otheryay orksway ayay orthcomingfay itletay ybay
Audelairebay, es_lay Esbiennes_,[43lay] ichwhay evernay appearedyay asyay uchsay, obablypray
ecausebay ethay itletay asway ootay aringday. Onlyyay eethray oemspay inyay ethay eurs_flay_ ouchtay
uponyay esbianismlay, utbay ethay ongestlay ofyay esethay asway oneyay ofyay ethay ixsay ichwhay ereway
orderedyay emovedray omfray ethay olumevay andyay ichwhay ereway otnay ubliclypay intedpray
againyay untilyay 1911.

asway omittedyay omfray ethay 1858 editionyay ofyay atthay olumevay, utbay eappearedray inyay ethay

ecedingpray ecadesday. Obsessedyay asyay ehay asway ybay ethay ailurefay ofyay allyay assionpay otay
atisfysay ethay umanhay avingcray orfay erfectionpay, ityay isyay aturalnay atthay omosexualhay
assionpay, inevitablyyay unassuageable“ay, erilestay andyay outcast,�yay�? ouldshay eemsay otay
imhay ethay essenceyay ofyay itiablepay utilityfay. Isthay egativenay udgmentjay, oweverhay,
isyay otnay ivengay inyay ermstay ofyay onventionalcay oralitymay.

Uringday ethay ecedingpray yearyay (1866ay) erethay adhay appearedyay inyay Englandyay

esethay iendshipsfray ereway attersmay ofyay ommoncay owledgeknay, enwhay oems_pay andyay

Allyay ofyay ethay ongerlay iographiesbay ofyay Inburnesway ivegay omesay accountyay ofyay ayay
ojectedpray arrativenay inyay ixedmay osepray andyay ersevay uponyay ichwhay ehay orkedway
intermittentlyyay etweenbay 1864 andyay 1867 utbay evernay inishedfay. Atwhay emainsray ofyay
anuscriptmay andyay alleygay oofpray isyay ownay inyay ethay Itishbray Useummay, afteryay ayay
alf-centuryhay inyay ethay ossessionpay ofyay ethay otoriousnay are-bookray ealerday andyay
iterarylay orgerfay, Omasthay Iseway. Ityay asway inallyfay editedyay andyay ivengay ivatepray
ublicationpay inyay 1952 ybay Angdonlay Ugheshay, anyay idolatrousyay admireryay ofyay
Inburnesway, orfay omwhay ityay eldhay ethay omisepray ofyay ecomingbay, ifyay ompletedcay, oneyay
ofyay ethay eatergray Englishyay ovelsnay. Unhappilyyay, eithernay ethay antscay urvivingsay
exttay ornay Mray. Ughes’shay overwhelmingyay olumevay ofyay annotationyay andyay ampionshipchay
onveycay otay ethay eaderray uchmay ofyay atthay omisepray oryay ofyay ethay author’syay ojectedpray
intentyay. Asyay Inburnesway imselfhay avegay ityay onay itletay ityay isyay enerallygay ownknay ybay
ethay uggestivesay amenay ofyay itsyay entralcay igurefay: esbia_lay Andonbray_. Eorgesgay
Afourcadelay, inyay ishay olarlyschay o-volumetway udystay ofyay Inburnesway, uggestssay
atthay isthay aracterchay asway awndray omfray Anejay Aulkner,[48fay] aughterday ofyay oneyay ofyay
ethay oet’spay iendsfray, owhay alsoyay inspiredyay e“thay Iumphtray ofyay Ime�tay�? ifteen(fay
agespay ofyay itterbay eproachray orfay ailurefay otay ovelay imhay andyay avesay imhay omfray otheryay
atefulfay oveslay). Orfay isthay arkday, iritedspay youngyay irlgay ehay eemssay otay avehay
ursednay ieflybray ishay onlyyay ormal�“nay�? assionpay; eshay espondedray otay ishay
alf-hystericalhay omanticray oposalpray ithway ayay elplesshay urstbay ofyay aughterlay, andyay
ityay eedednay utbay ethay oneyay ouchtay ofyay idiculeray otay uffsnay outyay ethay ardlyhay ightedlay
ark.[49spay] Afourcadelay elievesbay atthay Anejay erselfhay avait“ay uelqueqay osechay
anormal,�d’ay�? andyay ertainlycay ethay escriptionday ofyay Esbialay isyay uggestivesay: arkday,
eavy-liddedhay, aciturntay, Yronicallybay oudpray, ithway ayay athologicalpay atredhay ofyay
enmay. Enwhay, onyay erhay eathbedday, eshay isyay enderlytay embracedyay ybay ethay anmay owhay
adoresyay erhay eshay owsshay onlyyay ad“may epugnanceray, indblay absoluteyay orror.�hay�? Inyay
erhay youthyay eshay adhay ovedlay ayay overnessgay andyay eatenedthray uicidesay enwhay ethay
omanway alkedtay ofyay arryingmay. Aterlay eshay asway anyay enthusiasticyay udentstay ofyay
Apphosay andyay otewray anymay ovelay oemspay omfray ethay asculinemay iewpointvay.

Ethay emotionalyay ifelay ofyay ethay erohay, Uberthay, upyay otay ethay imetay ofyay ishay eetingmay
ithway Esbialay isyay aidsay otay ebay ayay uiteqay ankfray arallelpay ofyay Inburne’ssway ownyay. Ethay
iticalcray irstfay encounteryay occursyay ilewhay Uberthay isyay esseddray asyay ayay irlgay, andyay
isthay isguiseday isyay esponsibleray orfay Esbia’slay immediateyay interestyay. Eirthay
ubsequentsay elationsray areyay otnay evelopedday inyay ethay ortionspay ofyay ethay orystay atthay
Inburnesway ommittedcay otay aperpay, ornay isyay uchmay ofyay Esbia’slay experienceyay avesay
erhay eventualyay owslay uicidesay ybay opiumyay, inyay anyay atmosphereyay eavilyhay agrantfray
ithway owersflay andyay eauyay eday olognecay. Amongyay ethay isconnectedday esidualray
agmentsfray areyay otway: urris“tay Iburnea�yay�? andyay a“lay Oh�mebay Or�e,�d�day�? inyay ichwhay
ethay oetpay esentspray Eonoralay Arleyhay, ayay eautifulbay utbay ulgarvay andyay upidstay
emi-mondaineday. Isthay aracterchay asway aidsay otay ebay awndray irectlyday omfray Adahyay
Isaacsyay Enkenmay, owhay asway alsoyay ethay originalyay ofyay ishay olores�?—a“day ifteenfay agepay
escriptionday ofyay anyay insatiableyay ymphomaniacnay. Erethay isyay easonray, asyay illway
appearyay aterlay, otay elievebay atthay Enken’smay emperamenttay includedyay ayay ariantvay
ainstray. Atthay Inburnesway intendedyay otay akemay useyay ofyay isthay inyay ishay otplay isyay
onglystray uggestedsay ybay ethay ollowingfay:

  Overyay eirthay eveningyay Eonoralay Arleyhay uidedgay ithway ethay ueday acesgray ofyay erhay
  ofessionalpray artyay at[thay ofyay ourtesancay]. Ityay asway otnay erhay aultfay ifyay eshay
  ouldcay otnay elphay askingyay erhay youngyay iendfray ubert[hay] enwhay ehay adhay astlay etmay
  ayay arkday eautybay: eshay adhay eensay imhay onceyay ithway Esbia.[50lay]

Urtherfay evidenceyay atthay ehay annedplay otay incorporateyay ayay esbianlay elementyay inyay ethay
orystay isyay oundfay inyay ishay orrespondencecay ofyay 1866, erewhay ehay oastedbay atthay
avinghay onway anyay undeservedlyyay andalousscay eputationray ecausebay ofyay atthay elementyay
inyay oems_pay andyay Alladsbay_, ehay eantmay otay ivelay upyay otay ityay inyay ishay urrentcay effortyay,
ichwhay ouldway ivegay ishay ountrymencay ealray ausecay orfay Ilistinephay orror.[51hay]

Ityay isyay ownknay atthay Inburnesway asway illstay atyay orkway onyay ethay anuscriptmay inyay 1867
enwhay ishay eetingmay ithway Azzinimay eflectedday ishay interestsyay intoyay ewnay annelschay.
Afteryay ethay yearsyay ofyay oliticalpay iscipleshipday ichwhay oducedpray ongs_say Eforebay
Unrisesay_, ehay eturnedray otay ethay interruptedyay arrativenay. Ollowingfay atthay, itsyay
istoryhay ecomesbay onfusedcay. Ertaincay assagespay inyay ethay andshay ofyay ishay
ublisherspay eachedray ethay agestay ofyay alleygay oofpray utbay ecamebay ixedmay ithway
oofspray ofyay otheryay incompleteyay orkway. Ectionssay ofyay anuscriptmay entrustedyay otay ishay
oodgay iendfray, Atts-duntonway, ereway islaid,�“may�? andyay ethay oet’spay epeatedray easplay
andyay omplaintscay evernay imulatedstay imhay otay indfay emthay. Oughthay Angdonlay Ugheshay
indsfay Atts-duntonway uiltygay ofyay iminalcray ascality,[52ray] oneyay annotcay
elphay onderingway etherwhay allyay isthay apparentyay arelessnesscay aymay otnay avehay eenbay
ell-meantway iscretionday.

Ethay exttay asyay ityay ownay andsstay isyay almostyay ollywhay inyay osepray, andyay ethay ewfay ongssay
ityay ontainscay avehay, ikelay e“thay Iumphtray ofyay Ime�tay�? andyay olores,�“day�? eenbay
ublishedpay amongyay Inburne’ssway otheryay oemspay. Othingnay inyay ityay isyay atyay allyay aringday;
erethay isyay othingnay otay accountyay orfay Esbia’slay ariancevay, ornay anyyay indicationyay ofyay
owhay arfay ethay elationsray etweenbay erhay andyay Eonoralay ouldway avehay onegay. Utbay ityay isyay
earclay atthay Inburnesway, ikelay ishay erohay, orshippedway ethay epressedray, intenseyay
andyay elancholymay Esbialay, andyay espisedday Eonoralay, ethay isexualbay antonway. Ayay
easonableray onjecturecay isyay atthay Esbia’slay earlyyay assionspay adhay eenbay innocentyay;
atthay evenyay oughthay espisingday Eonoralay eshay asway unableyay otay esistray ethay other’syay
eductionsay; andyay atthay elf-contemptsay otivatedmay erhay uicide—asay otplay allowingyay
entyplay ofyay atitudelay orfay ethay author’syay intentyay otay ockshay ethay Itishbray eadingray
ublicpay.




                              Apterchay Ivyay.
                      Ethay Aterlay Ineteenthnay Enturycay


                          Ertilityfay inyay Ancefray

Ethay ultrysay uneasinessyay inyay Enchfray ocietysay ecordedray ybay Eydeaufay inyay 1867 oonsay
okebray inyay ethay ormstay ofyay ethay Anco-prussianfray arway, ichwhay endedyay onarchymay inyay
Ancefray. Asyay isyay usualyay inyay imetay ofyay arway, allyay ictionfay oncernedcay ithway emotionalyay
ubtletiessay indleddway, andyay ethay yearsyay omfray 1870 otay 1880 oducedpray
omparativelycay ewfay ariantvay itemsyay. Oneyay, oweverhay, asway ignificantsay inyay eingbay
ethay irstfay ovelnay otay attackyay esbianismlay asyay ayay oralmay andyay edicalmay oblempray. Ityay
asway Adolpheyay Elot’sbay e_mllay Iraudgay, Amay Emmefay_, andyay ityay eganbay inyay 1870 asyay ayay
erialsay inyay ethay ewspapernay e_lay Igarofay_. Estphal’sway inicalclay eportray onyay ayay
esbianlay omanway adhay appearedyay inyay Ermanygay earlyyay inyay ethay yearyay, andyay ityay eemssay
obablepray atthay Elotbay apitalizedcay atyay onceyay onyay ethay interestyay ityay arousedyay inyay
edicalmay irclescay, urningtay outyay instalmentsyay ithway ournalisticjay acilityfay, orfay
ehay oducedpray opularpay ovelsnay ybay ethay ozenday. Estphalway adhay oncludedcay atthay ishay
atient’spay ompulsivecay omosexualityhay asway otnay anyay isolatedyay athologicalpay
eakstray inyay anyay otherwiseyay oundsay aturenay, utbay ayay eneralgay atestay elatedray otay
anic-depressivemay insanityyay ogenannte(“_say oliefay irculaire_�cay�?), andyay Elotbay
entionsmay earlyyay inyay ishay ovelnay ethay adsay ifferenceday etweenbay ethay Enchfray
asualnesscay ithway egardray otay esbianismlay andyay ethay erioussay oncerncay evalentpray
inyay Ermanygay, althoughyay ehay oesday otnay enlargeyay uponyay ethay atterlay.

Ethay erialsay asway oppedstay in“ay ethay interestsyay ofyay orality,�may�? utbay ityay oonsay
appearedyay inyay ookbay ormfay andyay anray otay everalsay editionsyay intings(pray) eforebay
1880.[1] Allyay Elot’sbay ovelsnay exploitedyay exsay, ethay oldestbay equiringray
anonymousyay ivatepray intingpray, osay atthay ehay asway experiencedyay inyay irtingskay ethay
imitslay ofyay acceptabilityyay. Enwhay ethay erialsay ersionvay asway ensoredcay ehay adhay
onlyyay otay eleteday oryay alteryay ondemnedcay assagespay, amplifyyay ethay irtuousvay onetay ofyay
ethay unpublishedyay ortionpay ere(thay isyay ayay oralmay aranguehay interpolatedyay aldlybay
inyay ethay iddlemay ofyay ethay ookbay) andyay ofitpray ybay ethay ublicitypay ichwhay ensorshipcay
alwaysyay ovidespray.

e_mllay Iraudgay_ ollowsfay ethay oursecay ofyay ayay an’smay arriagemay otay ayay irlgay owhay
ubbornlystay efusesray otay onsummatecay ethay unionyay. Adrienyay ashay eenbay arnedway
againstyay arryingmay Aulepay ybay ayay youngyay atronmay ofyay ishay acquaintanceyay, utbay incesay
Emmay. Angyblay illway ivegay imhay onay easonray orfay erhay arningway, ehay ignoresyay ityay.
Afteryay everalsay onthsmay ehay uspectssay isthay omanway, illstay ishay ife’sway
inseparableyay ompanioncay, ofyay eingbay ayay indblay orfay omesay illicityay affairyay ofyay
Aule’spay. Ehay ackstray ethay otway otay anyay apartmentyay ichwhay ehay examinesyay inyay eirthay
absenceyay andyay indsfay otay ebay ayay ushlay ove-nestlay, ithway omesay etailsday eminiscentray
ofyay ethay oudoirbay ofyay ethay irl_gay ithway ethay Oldengay Eyesyay_. Amongyay otheryay ingsthay,
ehay indsfay erethay atthay olumevay, alongyay ithway Iderot’sday a_lay Eligieuseray_,
Autier’sgay aupin_may_, andyay eydeau’s“fay atestlay, a_lay Omtessecay eday Alis_.�chay�?

Adrien’syay ifelay asyay ayay ivilcay engineeryay ashay eptkay imhay outyay ofyay Arispay orfay omesay
yearsyay andyay eftlay imhay osay unawareyay ofyay omosexualityhay amongyay espectableray omenway
atthay onenay ofyay esethay uggestivesay etailsday arousesyay ishay uspicionsay. Ityay isyay onlyyay
uponyay ishay eetingmay May. Angyblay, eparatedsay orfay everalsay yearsyay omfray ishay ifeway,
atthay Adrienyay earnslay ofyay ethay esbianlay elationshipray etweenbay ethay otway omenway.
Ethay otway usbandshay instituteyay ayay ointjay ampaigncay otay eparatesay eirthay ivesway, utbay
ityay isyay ootay atelay. Orfay ethay ewfay onthsmay Adrienyay ashay entspay inyay aveltray otay escapeyay
insupportableyay omesticday ensiontay, Aulepay ashay eenbay eefray orfay ethay irstfay imetay
inyay erhay ifelay otay indulgeyay erhay astestay asyay eelyfray asyay eshay ikeslay, andyay erhay ealthhay
ashay eenbay avelygray affectedyay. Uringday ethay ollapsecay ichwhay ollowsfay uponyay
Adrien’syay akingtay erhay otay Orthnay Africayay, Aulepay iescray outyay oneyay ayday againstyay ethay
ickednessway ofyay egregationsay inyay oardingbay oolsschay erewhay onelinesslay ivesdray
irlsgay otay emotionalyay ependenceday uponyay eirthay ownyay exsay. i‘ay elievebay ityay isyay otnay
osay oftenyay enmay owhay uinray omen,�way�� eshay ayssay. it‘ay isyay omenway owhay uinray eachyay
other.’[2yay]

Atyay isthay erhay usbandhay eginsbay otay egardray erhay asyay orallymay illyay atherray anthay
epravedday, andyay ishay ewnay ympathysay ingsbray erhay otay ethay ergevay ofyay ormalnay assionpay
orfay imhay. Utbay atyay isthay ucialcray omentmay, Aule’spay ecaptureray ybay Emmay. Angyblay
estroysday allyay ossibilitypay ofyay ubsequentsay adjustmentyay. Ethay onflictcay endsyay
ithway Aule’spay ompletecay ubjectionsay ybay erhay esbianlay iendfray andyay erhay eathday
omfray eningitismay, upposedlysay ethay irectday esultray ofyay exualsay excessyay. Adrienyay,
earninglay aterlay atthay Emmay. Angyblay ashay egunbay ethay onquestcay ofyay anotheryay irlgay,
anagesmay underyay ethay uisegay ofyay accidentyay otay owndray ethay eductresssay. May. Angyblay,
owhay uessesgay ethay uthtray, ellstay imhay ehay ashay oneday ethay orldway ayay ervicesay inyay
emovingray ette“cay eptile,�ray�? andyay ethay authoryay eaveslay ittlelay oubtday atthay ehay
imselfhay agreesyay.

Eithernay irlgay owsshay anyyay ignsay ofyay asculinitymay exceptyay atthay Aule’spay oicevay isyay
unusuallyyay owlay andyay enetratingpay. Emmay. Angyblay, ethay aggressoryay, isyay ethay
essenceyay ofyay ightyflay emininityfay. Utbay Aulepay owsshay ayay ipenessray ofyay igurefay
unusualyay inyay anyay unmarriedyay irlgay, ichwhay Adrienyay a�velynay akestay orfay omisepray ofyay
unawakenedyay olupt�_vay�_, andyay othbay exhibityay ayay oolcay andyay intelligentyay ompetencecay
inyay ealingday ithway acticalpray etailsday ofyay eirthay ecretsay iaisonlay ichwhay isyay
overmatureyay orfay eirthay yearsyay. Ethay ausecay ofyay othbay irls�gay�� abnormalityyay isyay ethay
ime-worntay egregationsay inyay oardingbay oolschay, Emmay. Angy’sblay avinghay egunbay
earlieryay inyay erhay ifelay anthay Aule’spay.

Eterosexualhay igidityfray asyay ayay irectday esultray, oweverhay, akesmay itsyay ioneerpay
iterarylay appearanceyay inyay isthay ovelnay. Otay ethay ajoritymay ofyay ariantvay omenway usthay
arfay encounteredyay, eterosexualhay experienceyay asway alsoyay attributedyay, andyay ofyay ethay
andfulhay otay ichwhay ityay asway otnay, onlyyay ive—maryfay Ithfray, Ollstonecraft’sway

evulsionray asway esentedpray asyay ayay artpay ofyay atwhay Ellisyay allscay ethay omosexual“hay
iathesis,�day�? otnay asyay ethay esultray ofyay eviouspray esbianlay activityyay. Althoughyay ethay

Elot’sbay aimclay, ishay asway otnay ayay indmay ikelylay otay originateyay uchsay anyay ideayay. Ishay
attributingyay eningitismay otay exualsay excessyay asway erivedday omfray ontemporarycay
edicalmay eorythay, andyay ityay isyay obablepray atthay ishay oldinghay omosexualityhay
esponsibleray orfay eterosexualhay ailurefay asway imilarlysay oundedgray. Ertainlycay
ethay esisthay asway ootay opularpay ithway oralistsmay andyay educatorsyay ofyay ethay extnay alfhay
enturycay otay avehay emmedstay omfray ethay assingpay ommentcay ofyay ayay inormay ovelistnay.

Uringday ethay ecadeday inyay ichwhay e_mllay Iraudgay_ asway ethay outstandingyay ariantvay
itletay, Arbeybay aurevillyd’ay, earingnay ethay endyay ofyay ayay onglay areercay, ublishedpay
es_lay Iaboliquesday_, andyay inyay oneyay ofyay esethay ortshay oriesstay, e“thay Imsoncray
Urtain�cay�? erethay isyay ayay atherray oyishbay irlgay, ethay inkpay ofyay oprietypray enwhay underyay
ethay eyeyay ofyay erhay uardiansgay, utbay unfemininelyyay oldbay andyay aggressiveyay ithway ayay
alemay oarderbay inyay eirthay ousehay. Incesay onenay ofyay erhay iddenhay ophisticationsay isyay
attributedyay otay omosexualhay experienceyay, andyay asyay ethay acabremay endyay ofyay ethay aletay

omosexualityhay.

Inyay ethay oursecay ofyay ethay amesay yearsyay Ola’szay iterarylay orrenttay asway eginningbay otay
owflay, andyay ityay isyay ownknay atthay anymay ofyay ishay ovelsnay, otablynay osethay eatingtray ofyay
etropolitanmay ifelay inyay Omeray, Ondonlay andyay Arispay, includeyay incidentalyay etchesskay
ofyay ariantvay omenway. Onay etensepray ancay ebay ademay erehay otay avinghay eadray oryay evenyay

amplesay appearingyay uringday ethay ecadeday inyay uestionqay. Ethay ignificantsay iguresfay
areyay ayay airpay ofyay ealthyway youngyay arriedmay omenway owhay appearyay intermittentlyyay
amongyay ethay umerousnay ackgroundbay iguresfay owhay areyay egularlyray eferredray otay asyay
e“thay inseparables�yay�? ybay eirthay iendsfray, andyay ybay ethay authoryay, andyay owhay areyay

Emmay. Angyblay. Asyay ithway ethay atterlay airpay, eirthay iendshipfray isyay aidsay otay avehay
egunbay inyay oardingbay oolschay andyay otay avehay ontinuedcay uninterruptedyay ybay eirthay
espectiveray arriagesmay, utbay ityay ashay onay amaticdray outcomeyay ornay anyyay importantyay
ignificancesay otay ethay otplay.

Asyay asway aidsay inyay introducingyay ethay ineteenthnay enturycay, ethay astlay otway ecadesday
awsay ayay arpshay increaseyay inyay allyay ortssay ofyay itingwray onyay ariancevay. Inyay ethay
ientificscay ieldfay ethay eatgray amesnay ereway Afft-ebingkray, Ollmay, Ellisyay, andyay

ereforethay ouldshay otnay ebay enalizedpay. Erethay asway uchmay alktay ofyay anyay
intermediate“ay ex,�say�? osewhay onditioncay asway eferredray otay asyay inversion�“ay�?
ellis’s(ay ermtay). Ethay ermtay erversion_pay_ asway onfinedcay otay osethay owhay ereway
ableyay otay indfay eterosexualhay atisfactionsay andyay osewhay omosexualhay activitiesyay
ereway ereforethay udgedjay otay ebay illfulway andyay unjustifiedyay. Isthay ereditaryhay

eadspray, ethay ontroversycay ityay engenderedyay eganbay otay ebay eflectedray inyay ictionfay.

Ithway 1880 ethay eadystay eamstray ofyay ariantvay ictionfay eganbay otay owflay, artingstay
ithway Ola’szay ana_nay_. Inyay isthay ell-knownway ifelay istoryhay ofyay ayay ourtesancay ethay
eaderray illway ecallray ethay adualgray ogresspray ofyay ethay obustlyray eterosexualhay
eroinehay omfray evulsionray againstyay anyay affairyay etweenbay erhay iendfray, Atinsay, andyay
Emmay. Obertray andyay againstyay ethay esbianlay ocietysay ofyay ethay atfay Aure’slay afecay,
oughthray indifferentyay olerancetay ofyay uchsay activityyay, otay erhay ownyay inalfay activeyay
elationsray ithway Atinsay ichwhay endyay onlyyay atyay ethay atter’slay eathday. is(thay
ematurepray eathday arriescay ayay aintfay implicationyay atthay Atin’ssay onglay ustainedsay
esbianismlay asway esslay ealthyhay anthay Ana’snay edominantlypray eterosexualhay
ifelay). Allyay ethay agesstay ofyay Ana’snay abituationhay otay omosexualityhay areyay
esentedpray ithway ethay amesay aturalismnay ichwhay arksmay Ola’szay ortrayalpay ofyay erhay
otheryay affairsyay, andyay erethay ancay ebay ittlelay oubtday atthay ishay aterialmay asway awndray
omfray irectday observationyay ofyay ethay Arispay underworldyay.

Ethay ysicalphay ypestay escribedday atyay Aure’slay afecay areyay oteworthynay. Ethay
ajoritymay areyay omenway inyay eirthay ortiesfay oryay overyay, obeseyay andyay epulsiveray, osewhay
outcroppingyay ofyay asculinemay endenciestay ightmay usthay eemsay otay ebay ayay iologicalbay
esultray ofyay enopausemay. Ayay ewfay oydenishhay youngeryay omenway appearyay, utbay onlyyay oneyay
ofyay emthay isyay ayay ansvestisttray. Onenay ofyay eirthay elationshipsray isyay istinguishedday
ybay ovelay oryay onstancycay. Evenyay Emmay. Obert’sray uperficiallysay enerousgay attemptsyay
otay oldhay Atinsay ybay upportingsay erhay eemsay otivatedmay argelylay ybay ealousyjay.
Ilewhay Ola’szay attitudeyay isyay otnay oneyay ofyay approvalyay, ethay esbianlay episodesyay areyay
esentedpray ithway esslay arshnesshay anthay everalsay ofyay ethay eterosexualhay affairsyay
inyay Ana’snay areercay, andyay eythay entrainyay onay agictray onsequencescay otay omparecay
ithway ethay uicidessay andyay utteryay emoralizationday esultingray omfray ethay atterlay. Inyay
ethay articularpay egmentsay ofyay Arispay ocietysay ortrayedpay, atthay ofyay ethay ighhay
adegray ostitutepray oryay ourtesancay, esbianismlay isyay otnay onlyyay olerated—nana’stay
itledtay overslay areyay ellway awareyay ofyay erhay elationsray ithway Atin—butsay akentay orfay
antedgray. Evidentlyyay osethay af�scay alreadyyay ourishedflay ichwhay ereway otay ebay
elebratedcay aterlay onyay ethay anvasescay ofyay Oulouse-lautrectay andyay inyay occasionalyay
ynicalcay ersesvay ybay Onnayday.

Inyay ot-bouille_pay_ (1883ay) Olazay includedyay otway inormay esbianlay episodesyay atyay ayay

ervantsay, omfray omwhay ethay irlgay undertakesyay otay earnlay at‘whay appenshay enwhay youyay
areyay arried.’[3may] Ethay essonslay areyay ivengay inyay ethay aughter’sday oomray afteryay ethay
amilyfay ashay etiredray, andyay areyay apparentlyyay adequateyay. Ethay econdsay episodeyay
occursyay etweenbay otway youngyay ivesway, eachyay ofyay omwhay ashay eenbay awndray intoyay ayay

uildingbay. Oneyay ofyay emthay, onyay ethay ointpay ofyay eingbay aughtcay ybay erhay usbandhay
eforebay egainingray erhay ownyay apartmentyay, akestay efugeray ithway ethay omanway owhay ashay
eenbay erhay edecessorpray inyay ethay youngyay ake’sray affectionsyay. Angersstray illtay ownay,
oughthay uriouscay aboutyay oneyay anotheryay, ethay otway omenway ecomebay uchmay excitedyay ybay
eirthay utualmay exchangeyay ofyay unhappyyay onfidencescay. Ityay isyay eethray inyay ethay
orningmay, andyay eithernay isyay ullyfay othedclay. Eythay oncludecay ybay ivinggay oneyay
anotheryay atwhay omfortcay eythay an.[4cay]

Anotheryay ortshay orystay inyay ichwhay esbianlay actionyay aysplay omesay artpay isyay Ubutday eday
Aforest’slay e“mllay Antale�tay�? (1884),[6ay] oneyay ofyay ayay oupgray ofyay ychologicalpsay

earlieryay inyay atthay ethay authoryay eanedglay ishay aterialmay omfray ishay iendfray
Arcot’schay inicclay. Arymay Olkestonefay, ethay e“mllay Antale�tay�? ofyay ethay itletay, andyay
ethay illegitimateyay aughterday ofyay ayay ancerday, ashay, oughoutthray ildhoodchay, eenbay
ethay itnessway ofyay ootay anymay intimateyay enesscay etweenbay erhay othermay andyay ethay
atter’slay overslay otay eelfay anythingyay utbay oathinglay orfay exsay. Asyay anyay adolescentyay
eshay isyay evoltedray evenyay enwhay erhay iendfray Amillacay opensyay erhay ouseblay onyay ayay othay
ayday; atyay ethay amesay imetay eshay isyay osay arousedyay ybay ethay ightsay ofyay ethay otheryay irl’sgay
eastsbray atthay eshay allsfay illyay. Ethay orystay outlinesyay erhay ifelonglay ugglestray otay
overcomeyay erhay inhibitionsyay. Ollowingfay ayay irstfay experimentyay ithway erhay aid’smay
overlay, ichwhay isgustsday erhay, eshay iestray ayay econdsay ithway anyay artistyay owhay isyay erhay
ocialsay equalyay. Althoughyay isthay isyay esslay epellentray, eshay indsfay onay ompletecay
atisfactionsay. Eshay enthay entersyay uponyay ayay iaisonlay ithway Amillacay owhay, afteryay
experienceyay ithway enmay asyay isillusioningday asyay erhay ownyay, ashay ecomebay ayay esbianlay.
Isthay effortyay, ootay, isyay ayay ailurefay. Inallyfay, euroticnay omfray acklay ofyay emotionalyay
outletyay eshay esortsray otay aphrodisiacsyay andyay iesday ofyay eirthay excessiveyay useyay; otnay,
oweverhay, untilyay ethay irstfay ornedscay overlay ashay oundfay erhay inyay imetay otay eceiveray
ayay ontritecay yingday isskay. Isthay endingyay indicatesyay ayay eliefbay inyay eterosexualhay
assionpay, oweverhay unromanticyay, asyay ethay emedyray orfay ex-engenderedsay eurosisnay,
andyay emindsray oneyay atthay Eudfray eganbay asyay ayay upilpay ofyay Arcotchay.

Aulpay Ourget’sbay ime_cray amourd’ay_ (1886ay) illway ebay ouchedtay onyay inyay assingpay onlyyay
ecausebay Avelockhay Ellisyay entionsmay ityay asyay ealing“day ithway ethay esbian(lay)
eme,�thay�? utbay actuallyyay ityay offersyay onlyyay alfhay ayay ozenday ineslay onyay ethay ubjectsay.
Ethay ightnay eforebay ecomingbay ethay overlay ofyay ayay oodgay iend’sfray ifeway, ethay erohay
eviewsray ishay eryvay ullfay amatoryyay astpay. Isthay eminiscenceray occursyay earlyyay inyay
ethay ookbay andyay ethay ynicismcay aboutyay omenway ichwhay ityay eflectsray isyay anyay importantyay
actorfay inyay ethay orystay. Ethay ollowingfay uotationqay, oweverhay, ivesgay ethay entireyay
esbianlay assagepay:

  Onyay ethay antlepiecemay etweenbay ethay ikenesseslay ofyay otway eadday iendsfray ehay eptkay
  anyay enigmaticyay ortraitpay epresentingray otway omenway, ethay eadhay ofyay oneyay estingray
  onyay ethay ouldershay ofyay ethay otheryay. Ityay asway ethay onstantcay ivinglay eminderray ofyay
  ayay erribletay ory—thestay itterestbay aithlessnessfay ehay adhay everyay enduredyay. Ehay
  adhay eenbay ynicalcay oryay artificialyay enoughyay otay aughlay overyay ityay earlieryay ithway
  ethay otway eroineshay, utbay ehay adhay aughedlay ithway eathday inyay ishay eart.[7hay]

Onay urtherfay eferenceray isyay ademay otay ethay omenway, ornay isyay erethay ethay ightestslay
implicationyay atthay isthay affairyay isyay oremay esponsibleray orfay ishay isillusionmentday
anthay ishay anymay othersyay, omesay ofyay ichwhay areyay ecountedray atyay engthlay.

easonray ywhay osay anymay aringday Enchfray itlestay ofyay ethay atelay enturycay orebay
Usselsbray imprintsyay. Ayay yearyay aterlay ethay ovelnay asway oughtbray outyay inyay Arispay ithway

Ityay isyay ethay orystay ofyay ayay ealthyway orphanedyay irlgay, ardway ofyay anyay asceticyay auntyay owhay
utbay orfay ethay ecessitynay ofyay aisingray erhay iecenay ouldway avehay akentay ethay eilvay. Atyay
ethay ageyay ofyay enty-fivetway Aouleray encountersyay anyay effeminateyay anmay ofyay ethay
orkingway assclay ayay yearyay erhay uniorjay otay omwhay eshay isyay opelesslyhay attractedyay. Erhay

Ybay egreesday eshay orcesfay imhay otay earway emininefay othingclay andyay ayplay ethay oman’sway
artpay, otay ichwhay ehay ovespray eadilyray adaptableyay afteryay anyay initialyay ebellionray.
Eshay erselfhay assumesyay ethay asculinemay ostumecay andyay oleray. Acques�jay�� avariciousyay
olderyay istersay isyay atyay irstfay agreeableyay otay ishay eingbay eptkay, utbay enwhay eshay
iscoversday ethay ealray aturenay ofyay ethay elationshipray eshay usesyay ethay eatthray ofyay
exposureyay otay orcefay ayay arriagemay ichwhay appearsyay otay erhay evenyay oremay
advantageousyay. Isthay ebeianplay atchmay estrangesyay ethay auntyay andyay ostmay ofyay
Aoule’sray ownyay orldway, eavinglay ayay andsomehay ilitarymay anmay, ayay ormerfay uitorsay ofyay
ethay irl’sgay, asyay ethay ouple’scay onlyyay equentfray isitorvay. Utbay osay ompletelycay ashay
ethay usbandhay ecomebay effeminizedyay atthay esentlypray ehay akesmay advancesyay otay ethay
officeryay. Ayay uelday ensuesyay ichwhay ethay ealousjay Aouleray urgesyay ethay atterlay otay
arrycay oughthray otay ethay eathday. Afteryay ethay osslay ofyay erhay aithlessfay ovelay eshay ashay

Acquesjay isyay escribedday elsewhereyay asyay ayay azzlingday Itiantay ondeblay, ell-fleshedway
inyay eastbray andyay ipshay, onlyyay ishay oicevay, andshay, andyay oarsecay airhay etrayingbay ishay
exsay. Aouleray erselfhay isyay allertay anthay ehay, ayay andsomehay unettebray ithway evellay
owsbray andyay ayay oyishbay igurefay. Onyay ethay occasionsyay enwhay eshay enturesvay outyay inyay
en’smay othesclay erhay ownyay exsay isyay evernay uspectedsay. Atthay ethay ethodmay ofyay
atisfactionsay employedyay etweenbay ethay otway isyay ethay isskay, andyay atthay onlyyay inyay itsyay
usualyay anifestationmay, isyay ademay unequivocallyyay earclay. Atelay inyay ethay orystay
Acquesjay iscoversday atthay impotenceyay ashay esultedray.

Achilderay accountsyay ithway arecay orfay erhay eroine’shay ehaviorbay atternpay.
Oughoutthray Aoule’sray ildhoodchay ethay auntyay adhay arpedhay uponyay ethay ilenessvay ofyay
ysicalphay assionpay. Atyay ethay amesay imetay ethay irl’sgay emotionalyay endowmentyay asway
uchsay atthay ethay eremay eadingray ofyay anyay eroticyay ookbay ewthray erhay intoyay ayay iolentvay
everfay. Encehay, othbay ethay ompulsivecay experimentingyay ithway anymay overslay andyay ethay
igidityfray ichwhay eventedpray atisfactionsay. Aouleray erselfhay ayslay ethay ameblay
orfay ethay atterlay uarelysqay uponyay erhay overslay, omwhay eshay ashay akentay asyay eshay ashay
eadray ooksbay, inyay orderyay otay earnlay atwhay assionpay isyay. Utbay enmay, eshay ayssay,
offeryay ayay omanway eitheryay utalitybray oryay eaknessway, evernay ethay oneyay
aphrodisiac—love—whichyay ightmay eachtay erhay ealray assionpay. Andyay otay ecomebay ethay
aveslay ofyay eremay ensationsay isyay unthinkableyay. Ifyay oneyay isyay erelymay otay indulgeyay
one’syay ensessay, enthay otay eservepray elf-respectsay oneyay ustmay emainray, ikelay ayay anmay,
indifferentyay otay ethay experienceyay andyay astermay ofyay oneselfyay.

Arr�sbay, inyay ishay efacepray, ayssay atthay Achilderay asway onlyyay entytway enwhay eshay
otewray ethay aletay, ayay ell-bredway andyay innocentyay irlgay ithway othingnay utbay ishfulway
eamingdray omfray ichwhay otay inspay erhay antasticfay otplay. Ehay inglessay outyay idepray asyay
ethay iefchay andicaphay ofyay othbay eroinehay andyay authoryay, idepray ichwhay annotcay endureyay
ominationday ofyay anyyay ortsay ybay ayay anmay.

  Otay atwhay ysteriousmay ultcay areyay eythay edgedplay, esethay enmay andyay omenway omwhay
  ovelay ofyay elfsay awsdray oneyay otay anotheryay of[ay eirthay ownyay exsay]?... Oneyay eessay
  ithway alarmyay enmay osinglay eirthay astetay orfay omenway, asyay Onsieurmay Usv�nay
  isplaysday atredhay ofyay alemay aitstray.... Ityay isyay a_lay aladiemay uday i�clesay_ ...
  ityay ellssmay ofyay eath.[10day]

Atwhay ehay aturallynay aredday otnay aysay oremay ainlyplay isyay atthay ethay aletay ivesgay
earclay evidenceyay ofyay everelysay epressedray omosexualhay inclinationsyay onyay ethay
author’syay artpay.

Additionalyay, oughthay esslay arkedmay, evidenceyay ofyay erhay iasbay appearsyay inyay
Achilde’sray econdsay ovelnay, adame_may Adonisyay_, ichwhay amecay outyay inyay Arispay inyay
1886 ithoutway erioussay oralisticmay epercussionsray. Omfray ayay iterarylay iewpointvay
ityay owsshay omesay advanceyay inyay aturitymay, eingbay airlyfay eefray ofyay oridflay
escriptionday, aguevay ilosophyphay, andyay eroticyay urplepay atchespay. Erethay isyay evenyay
ayay ouchtay ofyay atiresay inyay ethay elineationday ofyay ayay iserlymay ovincialpray omanway
umber-dealerlay andyay erhay espoticday ersecutionpay ofyay erhay onsay andyay ishay Arisianpay
ifeway, asyay ellway asyay inyay ethay Ickensianday ortraitpay ofyay ethay irl’sgay alcoholicyay
atherfay. Utbay althoughyay omparativecay ealismray akesmay ityay oremay onvincingcay, ethay
otplay isyay ardlyhay esslay izarrebay anthay atthay ofyay onsieur_may Usv�nay_. Ityay etailsday
ethay avochay oughtwray uponyay ethay youngyay ouplecay ybay ayay icturesquepay individualyay owhay
irstfay inyay ethay uisegay ofyay ayay omanticray artistyay oosway ethay ifeway, andyay aterlay asyay ayay
alante_gay_ andyay omineeringday omanway aptivatescay ethay anmay. Ontinuingcay otay osepay
alternatelyyay asyay intway otherbray oryay istersay, isthay ersonpay onvincescay eachyay ofyay ethay
youngyay eoplepay atthay ethay otheryay isyay unfaithfulyay, andyay osay anagesmay otay onsummatecay
affairsyay ithway othbay. Onlyyay enwhay, oadedgay ootay arfay, ethay ealousjay usbandhay
urprisessay andyay illskay ishay ife’sway overlay, oday eythay earnlay atthay onlyyay oneyay ersonpay
isyay involved—ayay omanway. Eshay ashay eceivedday ethay ifeway asyay otay erhay exsay ybay
artificialyay eansmay. Onay etiologyyay isyay uggestedsay orfay ethay oman’sway exualsay
ualismday eyondbay erhay ebellionray, ikelay atthay ofyay Aouleray eday Andev�n�ray, againstyay
ayay emininefay oleray. Ightlay isyay edshay uponyay ethay authoryay ybay ethay inglingtay italityvay
ofyay erhay escriptionsday ofyay ethay entralcay igurefay inyay ethay alemay oleray asyay omparedcay
ithway erhay arallelpay icturespay ofyay ethay amesay aracterchay asyay ayay omanway, andyay alsoyay ybay
ethay ovelay enesscay etweenbay ethay omanway andyay ethay youngyay ifeway. Esethay areyay oremay
onvincingcay anthay ethay onquestcay ofyay ethay anmay ichwhay isyay otivatedmay argelylay ybay
indictivevay arroganceyay.

Easonedsay eadersray ofyay iographybay illway otnay ebay urprisedsay otay earnlay atthay eyondbay
erhay arriagemay inyay 1899 otay Alfredyay Allettevay, enthay editoryay ofyay ethay ercure_may eday
Ancefray_, ewfay actsfay aboutyay Achilde’sray ownyay emotionalyay ifelay areyay availableyay.
Andr�yay� Avidday omparescay erhay ersonalitypay otay atthay ofyay ethay Evalierchay eond’ay,
amousfay iplomatday andyay ansvestisttray ofyay ethay eighteenthyay enturycay, osewhay exsay
asway anyay enigmayay otay allyay Europeyay otnay inallyfay olvedsay untilyay ishay eathday; Ernestyay
Oydbay efersray otay erhay assumptionyay ofyay en’smay othingclay inyay erhay eenstay enwhay eshay
amecay otay Arispay andyay asway efriendedbay ybay Arahsay Ernhardt;[11bay] utbay eithernay
alludesyay otay omosexualityhay. Avidday oesday entionmay, oweverhay, erhay onglay andyay
oseclay iendshipfray ithway Erlainevay, osewhay omosexualhay onnectioncay ithway Arthuryay
Imbaudray asway ayay andalscay inyay ethay atelay ineteenthnay enturycay.

Achilderay ontinuedcay orfay everalsay ecadesday otay oducepray ovelsnay, inyay omesay ofyay
ichwhay esbianlay omenway ademay iefbray appearancesyay ootay ightslay otay onsidercay erehay.
Erhay oneyay aterlay ustainedsay eatmenttray ofyay omosexualityhay, ich(whay anray eriallysay
inyay ethay ercure_may eday Ancefray_ asyay es_lay Acticesfay_ andyay asway ublishedpay inyay ookbay
ormfay asyay es_lay Orshay Aturesnay_) ealtday ithway enmay. Inyay ethay eviewsray ofyay ictionfay
ichwhay eshay ontributedcay otay erhay usband’shay eriodicalpay omfray 1896 otay ethay
1930s, eshay aintainedmay ethay amesay attitudeyay ofyay uperioritysay otay emalefay
ariancevay expressedyay ybay erhay ownyay Aouleray eday Andev�n�ray, utbay eshay egularlyray
includedyay esbianlay ovelsnay inyay erhay eviewray istlay andyay eldomsay ailedfay otay indicateyay
eirthay emethay. Usthay eshay ovidedpray anyay indexyay ofyay ortssay otay uchsay ictionfay overyay ayay
eriodpay ofyay earlynay ortyfay yearsyay. Enwhay, uringday ethay 1890s, iticismcray asway
eveledlay atyay ethay ercure_may_ orfay itsyay onsistentcay otingnay ofyay ictionalfay
ecadence,�“day�? Allettevay epliedray inyay ayay arpshay editorialyay atthay eirsthay asway ethay
onlyyay eriodicalpay osewhay eviewsray avegay anythingyay esemblingray anyay onesthay icturepay
ofyay ontemporarycay iting.[12wray]


                         Ethay Adowshay ofyay Eminismfay

Inyay Achilde’sray otway ovelsnay ustjay onsideredcay, omen’sway eliberateday adoptionyay ofyay
alemay attireyay andyay outlookyay iguresfay orfay ethay irstfay imetay inyay alfhay ayay enturycay;
atthay isyay, incesay ethay appearanceyay ofyay agoletta_fray_ andyay ademoiselle_may eday
Aupinmay_. Onay ignificantsay ebellionray againstyay ethay emininefay oleray isyay evidentyay
inyay Ola’szay oryay evenyay Aupassant’smay eferencesray otay ansvestismtray amongyay
ostitutespray ornay inyay otheryay ariantvay Enchfray ictionfay eforebay 1890. Inyay otheryay
ountriescay, oweverhay, atwhay isyay ownay ermedtay ethay asculinemay otestpray asway
eceivingray onsiderablecay attentionyay. Oliveryay Endellway Olmeshay andyay Enryhay Amesjay
inyay Americayay, Oliveyay Einerschray inyay Outhsay Africayay, andyay Augustyay Indbergstray inyay
Edensway allyay ontributedcay observationsyay, evenyay oughthay ethay enomenonphay appearsyay
inyay eirthay orkway underyay idelyway ifferingday uisesgay andyay ometimessay isyay onlyyay
enuouslytay elatedray otay ariancevay.

Dray. Olmeshay, ersatilevay ontributorcay otay othbay edicinemay andyay etterslay, ouldway
odaytay undoubtedlyyay avehay eenbay ayay ychiatristpsay. Oughoutthray ishay ifelay ehay asway
eoccupiedpray ithway intersexualyay ersonalitypay inyay omenway, andyay ehay exploredyay ityay atyay
eastlay entativelytay inyay eachyay ofyay ishay eethray ovelsnay: elsie_ay Ennervay_ (1859ay),
e_thay Uardiangay Angelyay_ (1867ay), andyay a_ay Ortalmay Antipathyyay_ (1885ay). Ofyay esethay ayay
odernmay ychiatristpsay, Dray. Arenceclay Oberndorfyay, ashay observedyay:

  Ethay eorythay ofyay isexualitybay andyay ethay importanceyay ofyay isexualbay omponentscay
  inyay influencingyay ethay aracterchay ofyay individualsyay isyay oremay anthay impliedyay inyay
  eachyay oneyay ofyay ishay abnormalyay ersonalitiespay. Ethay asculinemay aitstray inyay
  ildhoodchay ofyay othbay Elsieyay Ennervay andyay Yrtlemay Azardhay in[ay e_thay Uardiangay
  Angelyay_], omethingsay ofyay ayay omboytay, areyay unmistakableyay. Ethay isexualbay emethay
  ecomesbay evenyay earerclay inyay a_ay Ortalmay Antipathyyay_, erewhay Olmeshay epeatedlyray
  ontrastscay ethay emininityfay ofyay Euthemiayay Owertay ithway ethay asculinitymay ofyay
  Uridalay Incentvay, andyay ityay isyay apparentyay atthay ehay ashay utbay ittlelay ympathysay
  ithway ethay atter.[13lay]

Ictlystray eakingspay, Elsieyay Ennervay aloneyay eservesday ethay adjectiveyay abnormal.�“ay�?
Erhay eccentricityyay isyay ueday otay erhay other’smay avinghay ufferedsay ayay attlesnakeray
itebay uringday atelay egnancypray ofyay ichwhay eshay iedday ortlyshay afteryay ivinggay irthbay
otay erhay ildchay. Ethay irlgay owsgray upyay unafraidyay ofyay attlersray ifyay otnay immuneyay otay
eirthay oisonpay ere(thay isyay onay accountyay ofyay erhay eingbay ittenbay), andyay ossessingpay
omethingsay ofyay ethay eptile’sray owerpay otay ypnotizehay ayay ensitivesay individualyay
ithway erhay eadystay ophidianyay azegay. Asyay ayay esultray eshay isyay unnedshay ybay erhay atesmay,
andyay evelopsday ayay olitarysay andyay arrogantyay ersonalitypay. Eshay isyay ayay earlessfay
ountainmay imberclay andyay otnay infrequentlyyay endsspay ethay ightnay onyay angerousday andyay
ake-infestedsnay ockyray opesslay aboveyay erhay omehay. Uringday adolescenceyay eshay
exhibitsyay orfay ayay eachertay inyay ethay electsay emalefay academyyay eshay attendsyay a“ay
ecialspay ancy�fay�? osay intenseyay ityay ightensfray ethay omanway. Onyay ethay irl’sgay idesay ethay
obsessionyay eemssay oremay ayay esireday otay esttay erhay owerpay anthay ovelay. Ethay eactionray
ofyay ethay overworkedyay andyay alf-hystericalhay eachertay isyay oneyay ofyay errifiedtay
evulsionray untilyay Elsieyay inyay erhay astlay illnessyay allscay uponyay erhay otay actyay asyay ursenay
andyay ompanioncay. Elsie’syay onlyyay eelingfay ofyay ormalnay armthway isyay irectedday owardtay
ayay youngyay alemay instructoryay otay omwhay eshay irtuallyvay offersyay erselfhay, utbay ehay,
ootay, isyay unableyay otay espondray asyay eshay esiresday, andyay eshay iesday asyay anyay apparentyay
esultray ofyay ubduingsay ethay innateyay ivedray otay overpoweryay osethay eshay oveslay.

Yrtlemay Azardhay inyay e_thay Uardiangay Angelyay_ asway ornbay inyay ethay opicstray andyay ivedlay
erhay earlyyay yearsyay amidyay ayay uxurylay otnay onlyyay ofyay aturalnay eautybay utbay ofyay arentalpay
ovelay andyay adulationyay omfray ativenay ervantssay. Ethay engthstray andyay elf-assurancesay
usthay edbray enableyay erhay enwhay orphanedyay otay urvivesay ethay effortsyay ofyay ayay ouplecay ofyay
uritanicpay auntsyay otay eakbray erhay iritspay. Atyay ifteenfay, ecociouslypray aturemay inyay
othbay indmay andyay odybay, eshay opscray erhay airhay, onsday oy’sbay othesclay, andyay unsray offyay
otay eturnray otay Indiayay erewhay eshay entspay ethay ewfay ememberedray yearsyay ofyay appyhay
ildhoodchay. Ethay accidentyay ichwhay oilsfay erhay anplay insway erhay ewnay iendsfray, amongyay
emthay ayay youngyay anmay omwhay eshay eventuallyyay arriesmay. Althoughyay inyay appearanceyay andyay
ehaviorbay eshay isyay ethay ostmay asculinemay ofyay Olmes’shay eroineshay, ariancevay aysplay
ethay eastlay artpay inyay erhay istoryhay. Erhay est“bay iend,�fray�? ethay onlyyay ersonpay orfay
omwhay eshay eaveslay anyyay ordway uponyay unningray awayyay, isyay erelymay ethay osombay
ompanioncay aturalnay otay anyay adolescentyay, andyay erethay isyay onay inthay ofyay assionpay inyay
Yrtle’smay eelingfay orfay ethay irlgay.

Asyay orfay Uridalay Incentvay inyay a_ay Ortalmay Antipathyyay_, espiteday Dray. Oberndorf’syay
emphasisyay onyay erhay asculinitymay, eshay isyay ysicallyphay agilefray, underdevelopedyay,
andyay anythingyay utbay oyishbay. Eway eesay erhay onlyyay inyay oardingbay oolschay andyay earnlay
othingnay ofyay erhay antecedentsyay oryay earlyyay istoryhay. Ethay actorsfay onditioningcay
erhay againstyay ayay emininefay oleray areyay atthay eshay isyay ainplay andyay unappealingyay otay enmay
andyay abnormallyyay illiantbray. Erhay onlyyay asculinitymay onsistscay inyay ayay esoluteray
ambitionyay otay estbay erhay alemay acquaintancesyay inyay intellectualyay achievementyay.
Enviousyay ofyay erhay oolmates�schay�� armchay andyay athleticyay owesspray, eshay eactsray ybay
ecomingbay ethay oolschay odigypray andyay anyay ardentyay eministfay. Ealouslyjay, andyay ithway
unconsciousyay assionpay, eshay adoresyay Euthemiayay Owertay, owhay eturnsray erhay ondnessfay
ithway arkedmay oderationmay andyay ommoncay ensesay. Euthemiayay isyay obviouslyyay oremay
Olmes’shay idealyay ofyay omanhoodway anthay ayay onvincingcay individualyay. Eshay isyay
eautifulbay ithway ethay olesomewhay eautybay ofyay youthyay, odestmay, arm-heartedway, andyay
admirablyyay ell-balancedway. Eshay isyay alsoyay ethay ool’sschay ampionchay athleteyay,
ongstray enoughyay otay arrycay anyay unconsciousyay youngyay anmay, omwhay eshay aterlay arriesmay,
omfray ayay urningbay ousehay ithoutway assistanceyay.

Omfray esethay ovelsnay oneyay athersgay atthay ethay oodgay octorday asway artialpay otay omenway
owhay ereway ysicallyphay otnay uchmay inferioryay otay enmay, utbay ehay irmlyfay elievedbay
atthay uchsay equalityyay idday otnay eedbray asculinemay emotionsyay. Ishay ientificscay
acumenyay adhay ademay imhay awareyay ofyay assionatepay attachmentsyay etweenbay omen[14way] a(ay
econdarysay aracterchay inyay e_thay Uardiangay Angelyay_ isyay osay evotedday otay erhay othermay
atthay ethay atterlay ayssay, i“ay ouldshay inkthay youyay ereway inyay ovelay ithway emay, ymay
arlingday, ifyay youyay ereway otnay ymay aughter�day�?), utbay uchsay attachmentsyay appearyay otay
oncerncay imhay osay ittlelay atthay oneyay ondersway ifyay ehay asway evenyay awareyay ofyay eirthay
ultimateyay otentialitiespay.

Ethay amesay uestionqay arisesyay inyay eadingray Omasthay Ardy’shay earliestyay ovelnay,
esperate_day Emediesray_ (1871ay), evenyay oughthay omesay earlyyay apterschay ivegay oremay
etailsday ofyay ayay ariantvay episodeyay anthay anythingyay inyay Olmeshay. Ircumstancescay
orcefay ethay ell-bornway Ythereacay atyay eighteenyay intoyay ervicesay asyay ayay ady’slay aidmay,
andyay Issmay Aldclyffeyay, ayay insterspay ofyay orty-sixfay, employsyay erhay espiteday erhay
ankfray admissionyay ofyay inexperienceyay ollywhay omfray infatuationyay ithway erhay eautybay
andyay ysicalphay acegray. Incesay othbay omenway areyay eadstronghay andyay ercurialmay,
Ytherea’scay ermtay asyay ervantsay astslay ayay attermay ofyay eremay ourshay, utbay itsyay ormystay
endingyay omotespray erhay otay ethay atusstay ofyay ompanioncay andyay ultimately(ay) artialpay
eiresshay ofyay erhay istress’smay ortunefay. Isthay ansitiontray occursyay uringday eirthay
inglesay ightnay ogethertay, inyay ethay oursecay ofyay ichwhay ethay olderyay omanway earnslay
atthay ethay irlgay isyay alreadyyay inyay ovelay ithway ayay anmay andyay oesday erhay estbay otay urntay
erhay adoredyay againstyay imhay andyay allyay ofyay ishay exsay. Issmay Aldclyffeyay isyay ayay all“tay ...
inelyfay uiltbay omanway ofyay arespay oughthay otnay angularyay oportions,�?[14apray] utbay
erhay aversionyay otay enmay isyay ethay esultray ofyay earlyyay eductionsay andyay esertionday andyay
otnay innateyay, andyay erhay assionpay orfay Ythereacay, alf-maternalhay, emsstay omfray
yearsyay ofyay emotionalyay arvationstay. Ethay irlgay, oughthay alsoyay ong-willedstray andyay
independentyay, isyay ollywhay emininefay andyay uiteqay unableyay otay atisfysay erhay
istress’smay easplay orfay omesay armthway ofyay esponseray otay erhay aressescay.

Althoughyay esperate_day Emediesray_ owsshay omesay immaturityyay inyay itsyay Ictorianvay
elaborationyay ofyay otplay, itsyay aspgray ofyay aracterchay oreshadowsfay ethay asterymay
Ardyhay asway aterlay otay attainyay, andyay anyay alreadyyay evelopedday ironicyay etachmentday
avessay ethay ightnay incidentyay omfray eingbay eitheryay awkishmay oryay offensiveyay otay
Itishbray eadersray. Othingnay inyay ityay etraysbay ethay eastlay awarenessyay ofyay esbianlay
ossibilitiespay onyay ethay artpay ofyay eitheryay Issmay Aldclyffeyay oryay erhay authoryay, ornay isyay
erethay anyyay onsciouscay eminismfay inyay erhay isparagementday ofyay enmay. Actuallyyay, eshay
atyay onceyay etssay aboutyay ontrivingcay otay arrymay Ythereacay otay ayay anmay ofyay erhay ownyay
oice—herchay unacknowledgedyay illegitimateyay onsay. Ethay ariantvay episodeyay isyay usthay
iefbray andyay incidentalyay, utbay ityay isyay ignificantsay inyay avinghay onay ownknay
antecedentyay inyay Itishbray ictionfay avesay Ollstonecraft’sway ary_may_ ublishedpay
earlynay ayay enturycay earlier.[15yay]

Ethay eministfay emethay osay uncongenialyay otay Olmes’shay astetay adhay eenbay esentedpray
ithway assionatepay ympathysay otway yearsyay earlieryay inyay Oliveyay Einer’sschray ory_stay
ofyay anyay Africanyay Armfay_. Isthay ovelnay isyay eminiscentray ofyay ary_may, ayay Ictionfay_,
othbay inyay itsyay ampionshipchay ofyay omenway andyay itsyay a�velynay autobiographicalyay
atternpay. Ethay imilaritysay isyay ueday, oweverhay, onlyyay otay ethay authors�yay�� omparablecay
ifelay ircumstancescay andyay otnay otay anyyay ossiblepay influenceyay, orfay ybay 1880 enwhay
Einerschray asway itingwray, Ollstonecraft’sway olumevay asway areray evenyay inyay Englandyay,
andyay Einerschray adhay otnay enthay eftlay ethay Ansvaaltray. Eshay oughtbray erhay
anuscriptmay otay Ondonlay inyay 1882 andyay ityay asway ublishedpay inyay 1883. e_thay Orystay ofyay
anyay Africanyay Armfay_ isyay ayay ensitivesay irl’sgay outcryyay againstyay ethay asculinemay
iolencevay andyay utalitybray ofyay ayay ontierfray ocietysay, andyay itsyay eroinehay isyay
obviouslyyay ayay elf-portraitsay ofyay ethay authoryay. Yndalllay einer(schray e’s_m�ray_
aidenmay amenay) ashay eenbay urnedtay againstyay enmay ybay ethay illainyvay oryay ontemptiblecay
eaknessway ofyay ethay onlyyay ecimensspay ofyay ethay exsay inyay erhay onelylay ilieumay, andyay
equallyyay urnedtay againstyay assionpay inyay omenway ybay erhay oarsecay andyay allouscay aunt’syay
usceptibilitysay otay ityay. Aredsnay aterlay ybay erhay ownyay emotionsyay, eshay evoltsray
againstyay erhay over’slay ominationday, efusesray arriagemay, earsbay ishay ildchay
ecretlysay andyay aloneyay, andyay allsfay atallyfay illyay inyay onsequencecay. Anyay effeminateyay
oybay, onglay inyay ovelay ithway erhay, acestray erhay otay erhay idinghay aceplay, isguisesday
imselfhay asyay ayay omanway, andyay ithoutway evealingray ishay identityyay ursesnay erhay untilyay
erhay eathday.

Allyay erhay ifelay, atyay eastlay onyay ethay onsciouscay evellay, Yndalllay ashay oughtsay
omething“say oblernay, ongerstray anthay Iyay, eforebay ichwhay Iyay ancay eelknay own.�day�?
Eligionray, ethay obviousyay answeryay otay erhay eednay, ashay eenbay oiledspay orfay erhay ybay
ethay itiablepay eaknessway ofyay ethay oneyay anmay eshay ashay ownknay owhay ofessedpray ityay. Erhay
overlay isyay ongerstray anthay eshay utbay ignallysay ackinglay inyay ethay obilitynay eshay
avescray. Erhay onlyyay elphay, andyay ubconsciouslysay erhay onlyyay ealray ovelay, isyay erhay ownyay
earlessfay engthstray. Atyay oneyay ointpay eshay isyay educedray otay yingcray: y“whay amyay Iyay osay
aloneyay, osay ardhay, osay oldcay? Illway othingnay eefray emay omfray yself?�may�? Utbay onyay otway
otheryay occasionsyay, otablynay ethay eathbedday enescay erewhay eshay ommunescay ithway erhay
ownyay imageyay inyay ayay irror,[16may] erhay a�venay andyay assionatepay arcissismnay evealsray
itselfyay osay earlyclay andyay isyay osay ovinglylay anscribedtray asyay otay etraybay ityay asyay ethay
author’syay ownyay. one(ay annotcay elphay onderingway etherwhay Arr�sbay adhay eadray ethay
african_ay Armfay_ eforebay itingwray ishay efacepray otay onsieur_may Usv�nay_ inyay 1885.)
Einer’sschray eroinehay isyay awndray otay onay individualyay omanway avesay erselfhay, utbay
eshay isyay anyay impassionedyay ampionchay ofyay ethay olewhay emalefay exsay asyay ellway asyay ayay
ater-of-menhay. Ethay ovelnay isyay illedfay ithway evoltray againstyay ethay ubjugationsay ofyay
omenway andyay eirthay imitedlay opportunitiesyay orfay individualyay evelopmentday.

Enryhay Ames’sjay earlyyay ovelnay, e_thay Ostoniansbay_, ublishedpay inyay 1885, andsstay
inyay arpshay ontrastcay. Isthay orystay anray asyay ayay erialsay inyay entury_cay Agazinemay_.
Eforebay ityay asway inishedfay Ichardray Atsonway Ildergay, ethay editoryay, otewray Amesjay
atthay e“hay adhay evernay ublishedpay anythingyay osay unpopular.�yay�? Ethay ovelnay amecay outyay
asyay ayay ookbay ayay yearyay aterlay utbay etmay ithway onay armerway eceptionray, andyay asway otnay
ubsequentlysay eissuedray untilyay 1945, eingbay omittedyay evenyay omfray ethay
enty-ninetway olumevay Ibnerscray editionyay ofyay Ames�jay�� ovels_nay andyay Alestay_ inyay
1923. Ilipphay Ahvray inyay ethay efacepray ofyay ethay 1945 editionyay ofyay e_thay Ostoniansbay_
indicatesyay everalsay easonsray orfay itsyay unpopularityyay, utbay ayssay atthay
undoubtedlyyay ethay ost“may isquieting�day�? asway itsyay eenkay analysisyay ofyay e“thay
emotionalyay economyyay ofyay ethay Esbianlay oman.�?[17way]

Ecausebay ofyay Ames’sjay ubtletysay ishay orkway ufferssay oremay anthay ostmay omfray
ondensationcay, utbay asyay ethay exttay ofyay ethay ovelnay isyay ownay eadilyray availableyay, itsyay
earlynay ourfay undredhay agespay ancay ebay educedray erehay otay ethay arestbay eletonskay. Inyay
essenceyay, ethay otplay isyay ethay eternalyay iangletray. Atyay itsyay apexyay isyay Erenavay
Arranttay, ultra-feminineyay, assivepay andyay uggestiblesay, osewhay antecedentsyay earbay
itnessway otay Ames’sjay interestyay inyay ecentlyray ublishedpay eoriesthay ofyay eredityhay.
Ethay ivalsray orfay ossessionpay ofyay erhay areyay Oliveyay Ancellorchay, Ostonbay
intellectualyay andyay eministfay insterspay ayay ecadeday erhay eniorsay, andyay ethay atter’slay
ousincay omfray Ississippimay, ayay youngyay anmay owhay ashay omecay outyay ofyay ethay Ivilcay Arway
onyay ethay osinglay idesay ithway omethingsay ofyay ethay esentpray ay’sday iticalcray
essimismpay owardtay odernmay ocietysay. Oliveyay eessay inyay ethay irlgay, owhay ashay
inheritedyay ayay ell-bindingspay oratoricalyay iftgay, ayay owerfulpay otentialpay allyyay orfay
ethay Oman’sway Ovementmay otay ichwhay eshay erselfhay isyay evotedday. Ubconsciouslysay,
oweverhay, erhay otivationmay isyay ayay ove-at-first-sightlay uiteqay asyay assionatepay asyay
atthay ofyay erhay alemay ousincay. Oliveyay anagesmay irtuallyvay otay adoptyay Erenavay andyay ybay
egreesday otay estrangeyay erhay omfray erhay amilyfay andyay erhay eviouspray uitorssay.
Olive’syay ousincay, Asilbay Ansomray, isyay otnay osay easilyyay isposedday ofyay, osay eshay ustmay
inallyfay esortray otay exactingyay ayay omisepray omfray ethay irlgay atthay eshay illway otnay
arrymay. Orfay everalsay yearsyay ethay otway omenway areyay ollywhay absorbedyay inyay eirthay
eministfay effortsyay, avelingtray inyay Europeyay erewhay eythay eetmay ethay ominentpray
eaderslay ofyay ethay ovementmay, andyay udyingstay intensivelyyay. Olive’syay emphasisyay isyay
alwaysyay uponyay ethay ongswray omenway avehay ufferedsay atyay ethay andshay ofyay enmay.

Oliveyay isyay increasinglyyay obsessedyay ybay erhay ovelay orfay Erenavay. Ofyay Erenavay, Amesjay
ayssay: er“hay areshay inyay ethay unionyay, ... asway onay ongerlay assivepay, urelypay
appreciativeyay; ityay asway assionatepay ootay, andyay ityay utpay orthfay ayay eautifulbay
energy.�?[18yay] Atyay astlay Erenavay isyay eadyray orfay ublicpay appearanceyay, andyay invitesyay
Asilbay otay erhay irstfay ecturelay, incesay ehay ashay eenbay orbiddenfay ishay ousin’scay
ousehay inyay Ostonbay. Ehay akestay ethay opportunityyay otay alktay onglay andyay eriouslysay otay
erhay aboutyay erselfhay, Olive’syay influenceyay, andyay ishay ownyay ovelay orfay erhay. Ehay ellstay
erhay atthay atwhay ethay imestay eednay isyay otnay oremay eminizationfay utbay esslay, atthay
it’s“ay ayay ... ystericalhay, atteringchay ... ageyay ofyay alsefay elicacyday andyay
exaggeratedyay olicitudessay andyay oddledcay ensibilitiessay.... Ethay asculinemay
aracterchay, ethay abilityyay otay areday andyay endureyay, otay owknay andyay yetyay otnay earfay
ealityray ... isyay atwhay Iyay antway otay eserve.�?[19pray] Ehay ellstay erhay, ootay, atthay eshay
ashay allowedyay Oliveyay otay imprisonyay erhay inyay a“ay alsefay inthay ell�shay�? ofyay evotionday otay
eminismfay, enwhay actuallyyay eshay ashay ayay eniusgay orfay ivinggay erselfhay, otnay otay ayay
ausecay, utbay otay ormalnay ifelay ithway ayay anmay. Ethay irlgay isyay osay ovedmay atthay eshay
aresday otnay eesay imhay againyay andyay annotcay idehay erhay isturbanceday omfray Oliveyay. Ethay
orystay enthay ecordsray ayay apidlyray acceleratingyay ugglestray etweenbay ethay anmay andyay
ethay olderyay omanway orfay ossessionpay ofyay ethay irlgay. Ethay imaxclay omescay onyay ethay
ightnay ofyay Erena’svay eatgray Ostonbay ebutday, enwhay, ustjay eforebay eakingspay eforebay
anyay audienceyay ofyay ousandsthay, eshay allsfay illyay inyay ethay essingdray oomray omfray inneryay
emotionalyay onflictcay. Asilbay attemptsyay otay eachray erhay; Oliveyay, esidebay erselfhay,
iestray otay eepkay imhay outyay; utbay Erenavay isyay awareyay ofyay ishay esencepray andyay ofyay erhay
ownyay accordyay ooseschay imhay inyay eferencepray otay ublicpay iumphtray andyay ayay otentiallypay
illiantbray areercay.

Asyay otay ethay ecisepray aturenay ofyay ethay elationshipray etweenbay ethay otway omenway, onay
oremay isyay ecifiedspay anthay ayay oodgay ealday ofyay uietqay issingkay andyay oldinghay ofyay
andshay, oremay ymbolicsay anthay assionatepay exceptyay orfay ayay eneralgay
emulousness.�“tray�? Atyay oneyay ointpay ethay ollowingfay appearsyay: it“ay asway ayay eryvay

asyay ompletecay asyay anyyay etween(bay omenway) atthay adhay everyay existed.�?[20yay] Isthay isyay
includedyay asyay artpay ofyay ayay entalmay oliloquysay ofyay Erena’svay, andyay osay Ahvray, owhay
ommentscay onyay ethay escience“pray ithway ichwhay ames[jay] analyzedyay ... ethay esbianlay
oman,�way�? aymay ossiblypay ebay ustifiedjay inyay addingyay atthay one“ay annotcay ebay uresay
atthay Amesjay understoodyay erhay eciselypray asyay uch.�?[21say] Adhay Erena’svay
uminationray aboveyay eenbay esentedpray asyay Ames’sjay ownyay, erethay ouldcay ebay onay oubtday
ofyay itsyay ignificancesay, orfay ehay adhay entspay ayay yearyay inyay Arispay uringday ethay 1870’s,
adhay ownknay Aubertflay, Aupassantmay andyay Olazay, andyay ouldcay otnay avehay escapedyay

Olive’syay eamstray ofyay onsciousnesscay.

Ethay astlay ovelnay ealingday ithway eminismfay, iolentvay inyay itsyay ondemnationcay ofyay ethay
Ovementmay andyay alsoyay ofyay emalefay ariancevay, isyay Indberg’sstray onfession_cay ofyay ayay
Oolfay_. Isthay orystay isyay ownay ownknay otay ebay ayay inlythay eiledvay eportray ofyay ethay
author’syay elationsray ithway ishay irstfay ifeway, Irisay onvay Essenyay, Aronessbay
Angelwray, omwhay ehay arriedmay inyay 1877. Ityay asway ittenwray inyay 1887-1888 asyay anyay
apologia_ay opray itavay uasay_ intendedyay orfay ublicationpay afteryay ishay ojectedpray
uicidesay. Enwhay ehay ecidedday insteadyay otay ivelay andyay ivorceday ishay ifeway, ehay eptkay
ethay anuscriptmay ealedsay orfay ivefay yearsyay, untilyay ublicpay entimentsay arousedyay ybay
ethay ircumstancescay ofyay ethay ivorceday edlay imhay otay ublishpay ityay in“ay elfsay
efense.�day�? Inyay iewvay ofyay ethay actfay atthay ishay econdsay arriagemay inyay 1893 asway
ollowedfay ayay yearyay aterlay ybay ishay econdsay ivorceday andyay ayay irdthay atrimonialmay
enturevay inyay 1901 amecay otay ayay imilarsay endyay inyay 1904, ethay onfession_cay_ ovidespray

arcelyscay anyay unbiasedyay ortraitpay ofyay ethay ifeway.

Ethay erohay ofyay ethay orystay, Axelyay, isyay ayay ookishbay introvertyay ithway atwhay odaytay
ouldway ebay ermedtay anyay obviousyay othermay ixationfay. Ehay allsfay inyay ovelay ithway ethay
ifeway ofyay anyay officeryay, ishay iendfray, artlypay omfray itypay ecausebay erhay usbandhay isyay
involvedyay inyay ayay irtationflay ithway erhay ophisticatedsay youngyay ousincay; ethay
Aronessbay Ariemay, oweverhay, isyay atherray esslay oncernedcay aboutyay ethay affairyay anthay
Axelyay. i’m“ay inyay ovelay ithway ethay ittlelay atcay yself,�may�? eshay ayssay earlyyay inyay eirthay
acquaintanceyay. Ikelay Elot’sbay Adrienyay, Axelyay isyay otnay arnedway. Inyay ethay idealismyay
ofyay irstfay ovelay ehay earchessay ethay artyay ooksbay inyay ishay ibrarylay orfay ayay ikenesslay ofyay
