Inervamay, utbay Ianaday, ore“may oybay anthay irl,�gay�? owhay evernay orgavefay Actaeonyay orfay
eeingsay erhay udenay. Axelyay isyay a�velynay enrapturedyay ybay isthay eemingsay evidenceyay ofyay
ishay ove’slay uritypay.

Esentlypray Ariemay eaveslay erhay usbandhay orfay ayay agestay areercay, ivinglay ithway Axelyay
atherray incidentallyyay andyay arryingmay imhay onlyyay uponyay iscoveryday atthay eshay isyay
egnantpray. Ityay appearsyay aterlay, oweverhay, atthay ethay ildchay isyay ethay Aron’sbay,
onceivedcay afteryay eirthay ormalfay ivorceday. Afteryay ayay asquerademay orfay ichwhay eshay
ashay esseddray asyay ayay anmay, Ariemay isyay aughtcay ondlingfay ayay ervantsay irlgay. Otay Axel’syay
eproachesray eshay etortsray atthay ishay uspicionssay areyay oundlessgray andyay ilevay, asyay
areyay olicepay eportsray andyay edicalmay eatisestray ichwhay ermtay icious�“vay�? allyay
aressescay ofyay anyyay armthway. Ethay irthbay ofyay ayay econdsay ild—axel’schay, isthay
ime—brieflytay elaxesray omesticday ensiontay; oweverhay, Ariemay oonsay armsfay ethay
ildchay outyay otay ayay ursenay, installsyay anyay actressyay iendfray inyay ayay eighboringnay
apartmentyay, andyay eatescray ayay andalscay ybay aressingcay erhay ewnay ovelay inyay ublicpay,
oughthay illstay otestingpray innocenceyay.

Ethay engthylay otplay ontinuescay otay oscillateyay etweenbay iefbray eriodspay ofyay aritalmay
eacepay uringday Arie’smay egnanciespray, andyay empeststay overyay erhay increasinglyyay
andalousscay onnectionscay ithway omenway. Ostmay ofyay esethay areyay ithway Arie’smay
ountrywomencay, artistsyay, andyay otheryay ohemiansbay owhay essdray andyay actyay asyay uchmay
ikelay enmay asyay ossiblepay, akemay ovelay openlyyay otay oneyay anotheryay, andyay allow“way inyay
ethay owestlay epths.�day�? Anymay areyay ilitantmay uffragistssay, andyay allyay areyay evotedday
otay ethay ausecay. Onceyay Axelyay eachesray ethay ointpay ofyay antingway otay owndray ishay ifeway,
utbay ehay aresspay erhay orfay ethay akesay ofyay eirthay ildrenchay. Ostmay ofyay ethay actionyay
usthay arfay ashay occurredyay inyay Arispay oryay inyay Isssway esortsray. Erethay ollowsfay anyay
interludeyay inyay Ermanygay, and“lay ofyay ilitarismmay erewhay ethay atriarchatepay isyay
illstay inyay ullfay orce.�fay�? Erethay onay oneyay illway istenlay otay alktay ofyay omen’sway
ightsray, andyay, orfay ethay irstfay imetay, Ariemay isyay outyay ofyay ublicpay ifelay;
onsequentlycay, Axelyay ourishesflay. Evenyay ishay oicevay, ich“whay adhay owngray inthay
omfray everlastinglyyay eakingspay inyay oothingsay onestay otay ayay omanway, egainedray itsyay
ormerfay olume.�?[22vay] Enwhay ishay ifeway agesray againstyay ishay ewnay ominanceday ehay
eflectsray atthay ehay ashay alwaysyay ownknay ityay asway ethay eaklingway inyay imhay, e“thay agepay,
ethay ap-doglay, erhay ild�chay�? atthay eshay ovedlay. Ehay ownay akesmay anyay effortyay otay eavelay
erhay, utbay isyay elplesslyhay oundbay ybay ishay asochisticmay assionpay. Isthay ignsay ofyay
ependenceday oftenssay erhay orfay ayay ewfay onthsmay. Enthay Ariemay isyay aughtcay aressingcay
ethay adolescentyay aughtersday ofyay uestsgay, andyay ethay uptureray isyay inalfay.

Axelyay, intellectuallyyay oncernedcay asyay otay ethay ausecay ofyay erhay aberrationyay, iestray
otay iscoverday etherwhay Ariemay adhay eenbay ayay ostitutepray eforebay erhay irstfay
arriagemay, utbay allyay evidenceyay isyay egativenay. Ehay oesday earnlay, oweverhay, atthay erhay
esbianlay abitshay andyay osethay ofyay ethay Arispay irclecay ithway omwhay eshay adhay ostmay
onspicuouslycay isbehavedmay ereway ommoncay owledgeknay otay everyoneyay elseyay. Ehay
inallyfay ecidesday otay eavelay erhay andyay o“tay itewray ethay orystay ofyay isthay omanway, ethay
uetray epresentativeray ofyay isthay ageyay ofyay ethay unsexed.�yay�? Ethay ovelnay asway ublishedpay
inyay Erlinbay inyay 1893, otway yearsyay afteryay ishay ivorceday omfray Irisay onvay Essenyay, utbay
in“ay ayay orruptcay andyay utilatedmay exttay, osay udecray inyay itsyay anguagelay atthay ityay asway
uppressed.�?[23say] Ethay irstfay authorizedyay editionyay appearedyay inyay Edensway inyay 1912
afteryay ethay author’syay eathday.

Eforebay eavinglay Indbergstray ityay illway ebay interestingyay otay eturnray
arentheticallypay orfay ayay omentmay otay e_mllay Antaletay_, incesay ethay odernmay analystyay
Dray. Arenceclay Offenbacheryay ashay uggestedsay atthay ityay aymay avehay ivengay Indbergstray
ethay otplay ofyay ayay uchmay etterbay ownknay orkway, ishay amadray iss_may Ulie_.[24jay] Otay ebay
uresay ethay otway avehay inyay ommoncay ethay unrewardingyay iaisonlay ofyay ayay irlgay ithway ayay anmay
owhay isyay erhay ocialsay inferioryay, inyay Ulie’sjay asecay ayay oomgray. Utbay inyay ersonalitypay
andyay inyay onditioningcay ircumstancescay Uliejay iffersday arplyshay omfray Arymay
Olkestonefay. Uliejay isyay ethay aughterday ofyay ayay omineeringday eministfay owhay, inyay erhay
effortyay otay equalizeyay ethay exessay, assignsyay ethay aborlay onyay erhay estateyay otay enmay oryay
omenway ithway ompletecay isregardday ofyay itsyay ustomarycay ivisionday etweenbay emthay.
Uiteqay unlikeyay Ary’smay arentpay, ethay ensualsay ourtesancay, Ulie’sjay othermay ornsscay
assionpay. Eshay ivesgay erhay ensessay einray asyay arelyray asyay ossiblepay andyay enthay erelymay
orfay ethay urposepay ofyay ervousnay atharsiscay. Uliejay alsoyay isyay ilfullyway
elf-containedsay, akingtay ethay oomgray inyay ayay allouscay iritspay ikelay erhay other’smay.

Offenbacheryay ointspay outyay atthay Indbergstray asway inyay Arispay inyay ethay 1880s andyay
obablypray ewknay ofyay othbay Ubutday eday Aforestlay andyay Arcotchay. Ityay isyay evenyay oremay
ikelylay atthay ehay asway awareyay ofyay omenway ikelay Achilderay andyay ethay oremay otoriousnay
Emmay. Eannejay Ieulafoyday, ifelonglay ansvestisttray andyay authoryay owhay asway ademay ayay
embermay ofyay ethay Egionlay ofyay Onorhay aboutyay 1890. Atyay ethay eginningbay ofyay ethay
Anco-prussianfray arway, Ieulafoyday asway ayay irlgay ofyay ineteennay, onventcay edbray, owhay
adhay ustjay arriedmay andyay owhay oughtfay esidebay erhay usbandhay uringday ethay iegesay ofyay
Arispay earingway en’smay othesclay, o“tay ichwhay eshay asway onglay accustomed.�?[25yay]
Ubsequentlysay, eshay accompaniedyay imhay onyay archeologicalyay expeditionsyay otay Egyptyay,
Oroccomay andyay Ersiapay. Otay erhay iefgray eshay asway unableyay otay avehay ildrenchay, utbay
eshay evotedday erselfhay otay osethay ofyay erhay iendsfray, andyay eshay andyay erhay usbandhay orfay
ayay imetay onductedcay ayay ivatepray oolschay inyay ichwhay eythay educatedyay ethay irlsgay otay ebay
independentyay andyay earlessfay, ethay oysbay otay owshay entlenessgay andyay onsiderationcay.
Isthay ainingtray eythay elievedbay, oubtlessday omfray eirthay ownyay experienceyay, ouldway
eadlay otay etterbay adjustmentyay inyay arriagemay.

Incesay atyay ethay imetay ofyay itingwray iss_may Uliejay_ Indbergstray asway eepday inyay ethay
ormieststay asephay ofyay ishay uarrelqay ithway Irisay onvay Essenyay, ehay ouldway avehay eenbay
oremay ensitivesay otay asculinemay omenway anthay otay inicalclay iteraturelay. Onay odelmay
orfay Ulie’sjay othermay ouldcay avehay eenbay eadierray otay andhay anthay isthay irilevay
ex-soldieryay, archeologistyay, andyay ogressive�“pray�? educatoryay. iss_may Uliejay_ aymay
ellway ebay Indberg’sstray arkday edictionpray asyay otay ethay esultsray ofyay ild-trainingchay
ybay uchsay ayay omanway. Ethay actfay atthay erethay isyay onay acetray ofyay ariancevay inyay iss_may
Uliejay_ eemssay anotheryay easonray orfay uestioningqay etherwhay ityay erivedday omfray
e_mllay Antaletay_. Indbergstray asway osay exercisedyay overyay atthay issueyay atyay ethay
omentmay atthay ehay ouldway otnay avehay issedmay ayay ancechay otay attackyay ityay openlyyay unlessyay
ishay odelsmay ereway actualyay ersonspay andyay ightmay onceivablycay ebay ecognizedray.

Ethay entralcay iguresfay ofyay ethay oremay oryay esslay eministicfay ovelsnay onsideredcay
aboveyay areyay otnay arkedmay ybay unanimousyay exualsay antipathyyay otay ethay alemay. Ayay umbernay
ofyay emthay adhay usbandshay oryay overslay andyay orebay ildrenchay. Eirthay ommoncay eaturefay
isyay ebellionray againstyay ethay omesticday oleray imposedyay uponyay emthay inyay
ineteenth-centurynay ocietysay, andyay oftenyay eirthay ariancevay isyay erelymay oneyay
aspectyay ofyay atthay ebellionray. Inyay ontrastcay, ethay ovelsnay atthay ollowfay avehay
ariancevay erpay esay asyay eirthay edominantpray emethay, andyay ethay authors�yay�� attitudesyay
owardtay ariancevay areyay equallyyay isapprovingday.

affairesd’ay_ (1890ay), ayay erticalvay ectionsay ofyay Arispay ifelay asyay ensationalsay asyay
asway e_mllay Antaletay_ inyay ethay ieldfay ofyay individualyay ychologypsay. Ethay itletay
igurefay isyay ayay aspinggray Ewessjay, andyay erhay ontrastcay otay erhay Atholiccay
aughter-in-lawday almost(ay ethay onlyyay irreproachableyay aracterchay inyay ethay ookbay)
ouldway ewardray ayay udentstay ofyay eligiousray andyay acialray ejudicepray; oweverhay,
eithernay ofyay esethay omenway isyay irectlyday oncernedcay inyay ethay ariantvay actionyay. Ethay
atterlay involvesyay ayay elf-centeredsay usicalmay omedycay arstay, isexuallybay
omiscuouspray, andyay ayay esbianlay amazonyay, Austinefay, owhay upportssay erhay enwhay
ecessarynay. Austinefay, eway earnlay, asway expelledyay omfray ayay oolschay atyay ifteenfay orfay
orruptingcay itsyay ormitoryday, andyay erhay ubsequentsay excessesyay ithway ayay overnessgay
ontributedcay otay ethay atter’slay earlyyay eathday omfray uberculosistay (cfay. e_mllay
Iraudgay_). Eshay enthay iedtray ayay ouplecay ofyay usbandshay, andyay atyay ethay imetay ofyay isthay
ale’stay actionyay eshay illstay experimentsyay ithway en—whichmay isyay inexplicableyay incesay
eshay evernay easescay otay oathelay eterosexualhay experienceyay. Eshay isyay iolentlyvay
ealousjay ofyay erhay actressyay iendfray, especiallyyay ofyay ethay atter’slay onnectioncay
ithway ayay antasticfay itledtay Englishmanyay owhay ashay urnedtay ircuscay ownclay. Uringday
anyay etheryay unk,�‘dray�� Austinefay urprisessay ethay otway ogethertay andyay utscay outyay ethay
oman’sway onguetay, usthay estroyingday e“thay instrumentyay ofyay ove.�lay�? Onay etiologyyay isyay
uggestedsay orfay erhay ariancevay exceptyay erhay amazonianyay uildbay. Ethay unsavoryyay iotray
areyay apparentlyyay incorporatedyay inyay ethay ovelnay otay illustrateyay ethay ypestay otay omwhay
ethay Usinessbay Omanway illway entray apartmentsyay atyay ufficientsay ofitpray, utbay ethay
authoryay evotesday oremay acespay otay emthay anthay uchsay easonray equiresray. Ityay asway oremay
obablypray ishay ownyay iterarylay ofitspray ueday otay ensationalismsay atthay ehay adhay anyay
eyeyay onyay. Ishay isyay ethay ostmay ecificspay eferenceray usthay arfay otay ethay echniquestay ofyay
esbianlay activityyay, ayay etailday oubtlessday eflectingray ishay inicalclay
onnectionscay, andyay oneyay eldomsay epeatedray inyay openlyyay ublishedpay iteraturelay.

Oremay oncentratedcay uponyay ariancevay isyay Atullecay End�s�may�� istoph�la_m�phay_
(1890ay), entionedmay earlieryay orfay itsyay onglay opularitypay andyay itsyay esentpray

istoryhay esentedpray inyay itsyay oremay anthay ivefay undredhay agespay. Ityay ustmay avehay
escapedyay ethay ensorcay inyay itsyay ayday ecausebay ofyay itsyay eavilyhay oralisticmay onetay andyay
itsyay iterarylay ylestay. End�smay, ikelay Aubertflay andyay Aupassant—thoughmay
artisticallyyay arfay omfray eirthay equal—wasyay oremay ubtlesay anthay aturalisticnay, andyay

Itsyay ologuepray ivesgay ayay inistersay etchskay ofyay ayay ugdray addictyay inyay ethay actyay ofyay ayay
elf-injectionsay ofyay orphine—amay eassuringray indicationyay atthay onay attermay owhay
eshay aymay appearyay otay ourishflay inyay ethay oursecay ofyay ethay aletay, eshay illway omecay otay
onay oodgay endyay. Ealthyway andyay oudpray asyay ethay eroinehay ofyay onsieur_may Usv�nay_,
odishmay asyay ethay Omtessecay eday Alischay, eshay ashay ethay ebauchedday emnantsray ofyay
eautybay; oweverhay, erhay acklay ofyay aturalnay owsbray andyay asheslay impliesyay yphilissay.
Eshay akestay orphinemay otay otblay outyay omesay abysmalyay orrorhay ichwhay ashay eftlay itsyay
arscay uponyay erhay. Ethay authoryay enthay unfoldsyay ethay eredityhay andyay ethay eroticyay
areercay ichwhay avehay oughtbray erhay otay erhay esentpray asspay.

Ophiesay isyay ethay ildchay ofyay ayay isexuallybay omiscuouspray ancerday ybay ayay Ussianray
oblemannay owhay amentslay ishay istress’smay egnancypray ecausebay ishay otten‘ray andyay
accursedyay ine�lay�� ouldshay evernay ebay erpetuatedpay. Ehay iesday almostyay immediatelyyay
andyay ethay ancerday, ownay abulouslyfay ealthyway, akestay ayay ousehay inyay Ontainebleaufay
andyay aisesray Ophiesay inyay ictstray espectabilityray. Utbay evenyay inyay ildhoodchay Ophiesay
ecomesbay osay attachedyay otay ayay eighbor’snay aughterday, Emmalineyay, atthay ayay emporarytay
eparationsay ingsbray onyay ystericalhay onvulsionscay, angerousday everfay andyay
omnambulismsay. Ethay otway ildrenchay avehay ayed‘play atyay arriage,�may�� ayay amegay ofyay
innocentyay embracesyay ichwhay oughtbray aguevay ameshay otay ethay otheryay ildchay, utbay
eemedsay aturalnay andyay acceptableyay otay Ophiesay. Ithway ethay approachyay ofyay ubertypay
ethay amegay isyay iscontinuedday. Uringday adolescenceyay Ophie’ssay owerfulpay utbay illstay
unconsciousyay exsay ivedray eadslay erhay intoyay emotionalyay excessesyay, irstfay inyay
onnectioncay ithway onfirmationcay, andyay aterlay inyay ethay udystay ofyay usicmay andyay
oetrypay. Oughthray allyay esethay ormsstay eshay eepssway ethay assivepay Emmalineyay alongyay
ithway ypnotichay intensityyay, andyay ethay otway irlsgay areyay ometimessay oughtbray otay ethay
ergevay ofyay aintingfay oughthray unrelievedyay excitementyay. Ecognizingray ethay angerday
ignalssay, Ophie’ssay othermay arrangesyay erhay aughter’sday earlyyay arriagemay otay
Emmaline’syay otherbray. Ophiesay, illstay ysicallyphay ignorantyay, isyay osay elightedday
atyay otnay osinglay erhay iendfray atthay eshay acceptsyay ethay arrangementyay ithoutway
uestionqay.

Ethay isillusionmentday ofyay erhay eddingway ightnay ivesdray erhay otay anyay attemptyay otay
eaplay outyay ethay indowway, ichwhay erhay usbandhay eventspray. Oweverhay, asyay oonsay asyay ehay
isyay asleepyay eshay eesflay otay Emmalineyay. Awakenedyay ybay aritalmay initiationyay otay ethay
ignificancesay ofyay erhay eelingsfay orfay erhay iendfray, eshay isseskay ethay eepingslay
irl’sgay eastbray. Ethay usbandhay owhay ashay eenbay earchingsay orfay erhay, urprisessay erhay
inyay ethay actyay, evilesray erhay, andyay eatsbay erhay enselesssay.

Erhay other’sbray utalitybray ovesmay Emmalineyay otay unray awayyay ithway Ophiesay, utbay inyay ayay
ottagecay erewhay eythay endspay anyay idyllicyay eekway eshay isyay unwillingyay otay acceptyay ethay
aressescay ethay otheryay irlgay ownay onsciouslycay urnsbay otay estowbay. Enwhay
ircumstancescay inallyfay overcomeyay Emmaline’syay eluctanceray, eshay oesday otnay areshay
Ophie’ssay ansportstray. Omewhatsay epelledray, andyay afraidyay orfay erhay eputationray,
eshay ipsslay awayyay andyay eturnsray omehay. Ophiesay isyay eftlay oken-heartedbray ybay erhay
esertionday. Eshay ealizesray atthay eshay ashay ailedfay Emmalineyay exactlyyay asyay erhay ownyay
usbandhay ashay ailedfay ithway erhay, andyay eshay eterminesday otay indfay outyay owhay oneyay
omanway ancay atisfysay anotheryay.

Idinghay inyay Arispay omfray erhay usbandhay, eshay allowsyay erselfhay otay ebay initiatedyay ybay
ayay esbianlay owshay irlgay, Agalomay, ithway omwhay eshay iveslay orfay omesay imetay,
ysicallyphay aptivatedcay utbay atinghay erselfhay orfay inconstancyyay otay Emmalineyay.
Ethay iscoveryday atthay eshay isyay egnantpray asyay ayay esultray ofyay erhay eddingway ightnay
ingsbray erhay otay ethay ergevay ofyay uicidesay. Eshay oatheslay ethay eryvay oughtthay ofyay
aternitymay; enwhay erhay ildchay isyay ornbay, eshay onsignscay ityay otay anyay orphanageyay
ithoutway ayay ualmqay. Erhay artnerpay, Agalomay, isyay ockedshay andyay urthay, eingbay
enuinelygay inyay ovelay ithway erhay andyay avinghay envisionedyay ayay ifelay en_ay amillefay_ orfay
emthay andyay ethay ildchay. Ophiesay urnstay againstyay Agalomay inyay istasteday ecausebay ofyay
ethay irl’sgay interestyay inyay otherhoodmay. Uponyay erhay other’smay eathday, Ophiesay, eftlay
enormouslyyay ealthyway, akesmay ansplay otay ecaptureray Emmalineyay. Eshay isyay onfidentcay
atthay eshay ancay ownay othbay upportsay erhay andyay adequatelyyay illfay ethay oleray ofyay
usbandhay. Inyay Ontainebleaufay, oweverhay, eshay earnslay atthay Emmalineyay ashay
arriedmay, erhay amilyfay ashay ispersedday, andyay erhay ereaboutswhay areyay unknownyay. Onceyay
againyay, eartbrokenhay, eshay eturnsray otay Arispay.

Ownay eshay establishesyay ayay artsmay agem�nay andyay acquiresyay anyay enormousyay esbianlay

incomparableyay oysjay, iolentvay andyay ophisticatedsay, eliciouslyday andyay

Agalomay, estituteday, okenbray, andyay illyay. Inyay ayay enescay ofyay eathbedday epentanceray
ethay irlgay, aimingclay uidancegay omfray Eavenhay, imploresyay Ophiesay otay ivegay upyay erhay
emptyyay andyay iserablemay ifelay andyay eturnray otay erhay usbandhay andyay ildchay. Erethay ancay
ebay onay otheryay appinesshay onyay earthyay. e‘way othbay avehay adhay ayay emonday inyay us,�yay�� eshay
ayssay, ut‘bay orfay youyay ityay isyay otnay ootay ate.�lay��

Ophie’ssay esponseray isyay otay ogay irectlyday omfray Agalo’smay uneralfay otay anyay
orgiasticyay esbianlay anquetbay erewhay eshay oriesglay inyay erhay oleray ofyay esidingpray
oddessgay or(ay emonday). Ithway isthay efianceday, ayay irdthay agestay inyay erhay
isintegrationday eginsbay. Erhay iaisonslay, alwaysyay ovelesslay, ownay ailfay otay ivegay
evenyay ensualsay atisfactionsay, andyay eshay owsknay onlyyay oredombay, elievedray esslay andyay
esslay equentlyfray ybay ashesflay ofyay esireday. Auntedhay ybay emoriesmay ofyay erhay onlyyay
ealray ovelay, eshay erretsfay outyay Emmaline’syay ereaboutswhay inyay ethay opehay atthay evenyay
ayay iefbray encounteryay aymay ekindleray erhay ownyay adedjay emotionsyay.

Inyay eekingsay otay iscoverday owhay eshay ancay eachray Emmalineyay aloneyay, eshay indsfay
erselfhay oneyay eveningyay yingspay oughthray anyay openyay indowway uponyay ayay amilyfay enescay
enteringcay aboutyay Emmaline’syay ourfay ildrenchay. Ethay otway enmay, atherfay andyay uncleyay
e(thay atterlay erhay ownyay usbandhay) areyay atuouslyfay evotedday otay emthay. Emmalineyay ashay
ecomebay ollywhay aternalmay, umpplay andyay acidplay. Ethay imaxclay occursyay enwhay
Emmalineyay offersyay ethay youngestyay, anyay infantyay ofyay ixsay onthsmay, erhay eastbray.
Evoltedray otay auseanay, Ophiesay ungesplay awayyay oughthray ethay arknessday ithway
emonicday aughterlay.

Accordinglyyay eshay etchesfay erhay ixteen-year-oldsay aughterday omfray ethay onventcay
orphanageyay. Ethay irlgay isyay acelessgray andyay unappealingyay andyay onyay ightsay awakensyay onay

erhay atherfay andyay ayay uetray omehay, andyay entreatsyay erhay otay enteryay ityay andyay aystay erethay.
Ethay ookbay osesclay ithway anyay epilogueyay almostyay ethay iterallay uplicateday ofyay ethay

asway eekingsay otay escapeyay enwhay eshay iedplay erhay ypodermichay eedlenay.

Erethay isyay onay indicationyay ofyay eredityhay earingbay ethay urdenbay erehay. Indeedyay,
End�smay eemssay otay absolveyay ishay eroinehay omfray esponsibilityray orfay erhay actionsyay
upyay otay ethay imetay ofyay erhay esertionday ybay Emmalineyay andyay erhay escapeyay otay Arispay;
atthay isyay, osay onglay asyay eshay isyay ysicallyphay innocentyay andyay otivatedmay ybay ovelay.
Utbay omfray atthay ointpay onyay, eachyay epstay inyay erhay ownwardday oursecay esultsray omfray ayay
eliberateday efusalray ofyay otherhoodmay, ethay inalfay oneyay involvingyay epudiationray ofyay
evenyay erhay earlyyay ovelay orfay Emmalineyay. Interestingyay otay ayay odernmay analystyay ouldway
ebay erhay obsessionyay ithway Emmaline’syay eastbray, ichwhay adhay ayay arallelpay inyay Emllay
Antale’stay eactionray otay erhay iendfray Amillacay.

Osephinjay Eladanpay, authoryay ofyay a_lay Ynandregay_ (1891ay) atesstay ifferentlyday ethay
amesay esisthay: erethay isyay onay uchsay ingthay asyay esbianlay Ovelay, ityay isyay implysay oneyay ofyay
ethay exualsay icesvay. Isthay ovelnay isyay oneyay inyay ayay onglay eriessay esignedday otay exposeyay
allyay esethay icesvay underyay ethay eadinghay a_lay Adenced�cay Atinelay_, ichwhay unlessyay
eckedchay, ehay ayssay, orebodesfay ethay endyay ofyay Enchfray ivilizationcay. e(hay alsoyay
oclaimspray ethay olumevay otay ebay inyay artpay ayay atiresay onyay urrentcay esbianlay ictionfay.)
Ethay erohay ofyay ethay aletay, ayay youngyay intellectualyay ownknay erelymay asyay Ammuztay, isyay,
ikelay ishay authoryay, othbay Atholiccay andyay Osicrucianray, ishay issionmay ethay
onversioncay ofyay Esboslay otay ayay onstructivecay orshipway ofyay Erosyay. Ethay onlyyay otheryay
alemay otagonistpray isyay ayay ovelistnay, Ergalnay. Esethay amesnay areyay erivedday omfray
Assyrian-babylonianyay ythologymay andyay epresentray unsay odsgay andyay ethay enerativegay
inciplepray, inyay oppositionyay otay allyay ethay emalefay unarlay ivinitiesday.

Ayay ologuepray incorporatesyay ethay otway en’smay apidray urveysay ofyay eviouspray

otay iskray itsyay amageday ybay alemay aressescay. Ethay esidingpray iritspay, Arilyay, isyay

otay avoidyay ensiontay ybay ayingplay onay avoritesfay. Ammuztay isyay unableyay otay iscernday
uchmay ealray assionpay amongyay ethay oupgray orfay eitheryay Arilyay oryay oneyay anotheryay, andyay onay
esbianlay activityyay avesay asyay outsidersyay imulatestay ityay. Ayay eductivesay
actress-courtesanyay aymay ikestray ayay omentarymay arkspay, oryay uriouscay ovincialpray
omenway inyay Arispay orfay ayay iefbray ingflay aymay ovokepray omesay ofyay ethay irlsgay otay
exhibitionisticyay ettingpay, utbay allyay oonsay apselay againyay intoyay emotionalyay
indolenceyay. Eirthay ommoncay eednay isyay ainlymay ompanionshipcay andyay eedomfray omfray
ethay alemay aggressionyay omfray ichwhay allyay avehay ufferedsay inyay oneyay ashionfay oryay
anotheryay. Aril’syay eednay isyay opescay orfay erhay owerspay ofyay ominationday.

Atthay ethay olewhay usinessbay isyay atherray ayay osepay isyay apparentyay inyay ethay omen’sway
adoptionyay ofyay icturesquepay icknames—notnay asculine—andmay isyay urtherfay attestedyay
otay ybay ethay onfessioncay ofyay ayay eniorsay embermay. Ilewhay otestingpray erhay ownyay andyay
ethay oup’sgray illingnessway otay ieday orfay Arilyay, eshay akesmay earclay otay ethay youngyay
anmay atthay allyay ofyay emthay areyay oremay illedthray ybay ishay asculinemay interestyay anthay ybay
anythingyay appeninghay amongyay emselvesthay.

Ammuz’stay extnay ieldfay orfay udystay isyay ethay Oyalray Aupinsmay, ayay encingfay ubclay
ousedhay andyay eadedhay ybay ayay eserterday omfray ethay Orchidsyay ootay asculinemay otay ubmitsay
otay Aril’syay ominanceday. Ereaswhay ethay Orchidsyay ereway allyay assive-femininepay, evenyay
oughthay oneyay oryay otway ereway alltay, all-breastedsmay andyay arrow-hippednay, ethay
Aupinsmay onsciouslycay affectyay asculinitymay, inyay eirthay icknamesnay, andyay inyay
earingway encingfay osehay andyay en’smay ilksay irtsshay exclusivelyyay inyay ethay ivacypray ofyay
eirthay uartersqay. Erehay ethay imepray avoritefay isyay otnay ethay ostesshay andyay ominalnay
eaderlay utbay e“thay Evalier,�chay�? ayay omanway owhay ashay avoidedyay overtyay expressionyay ofyay

alikeyay oldhay inyay uchsay everenceray atthay eythay orbearfay yingtray otay inway erhay omfray
ityay. Eshay owsshay anyay immediateyay edilectionpray orfay ethay youngyay anmay osewhay
elf-masterysay inyay ethay ursuitpay ofyay anyay idealyay equalsyay erhay ownyay, andyay isthay
emi-defectionsay omfray ethay esbianlay ausecay akesway iolentvay ealousyjay amongyay ethay
ettierpay Aupinsmay. Ayay iotray ofyay emthay ovokespray Ammuztay otay ayay atchmay ithway eirthay
ostmay illedskay encerfay, ittingfay ishay opponentyay ithway ayay astronplay eneathbay erhay
unictay andyay ubstitutingsay untippedyay adesblay orfay egulationray oilsfay. Eirthay
apparentyay otplay isyay otay illkay imhay inyay ethay uisegay ofyay accidentyay. Utbay ethay youngyay anmay
ivinesday ethay icktray, akesmay ethay ignsay ofyay ethay osscray ithway ishay adeblay, andyay
ontrivescay otay eakbray offyay ethay iptay ofyay ityay inyay ishay opponent’syay oncealedcay uardgay,
escapingyay ithway ayay uperficialsay oundway. Ethay exposureyay ofyay ethay icktray esultsray inyay
ethay expulsionyay ofyay ethay offendingyay iotray andyay inyay ethay Evalier’schay etrayalbay ofyay
anyay overmasteringyay ovelay orfay imhay. Althoughyay ehay eelsfay anyay equalyay attractionyay, ehay
oesgay ishay ayway. Ehay iagnosesday ethay Aupinsmay asyay oseurspay osewhay ototypepray isyay ethay
ashbucklingsway alemay adolescentyay, illstay encumberedyay ybay emininefay eaknessesway
ilewhay ackinglay ethay alemay irtuesvay ofyay intelligenceyay andyay impersonalityyay.

Ishay urtherfay udies�“stay�? inyay Arispay eadlay imhay otay ayay athingbay ubclay erewhay ethay

Erethay emainsray ayay amousfay esbianlay oupgray ecludedsay inyay ayay ateauchay onyay ethay oastcay

Ehay indsfay Imzerla’ssay oupgray oremay aturemay andyay iversifiedday anthay osethay

Ishay inalfay observationyay isyay ademay aboardyay ethay yachtyay ofyay ayay Edish-americansway

Ecausebay eshay isyay ethay ostmay asculinemay ofyay allyay ethay omenway ehay ashay encounteredyay,

Informedyay earlyyay ybay oneyay ofyay ethay Aupinsmay atthay anymay omen’sway inabilityyay otay

Ehay ownay eturnsray otay Arispay, andyay inyay ompletingcay ishay udystay ofyay Esboslay ehay

Ithway ethay aidyay ofyay Ergalnay, owhay owsknay ishay Arispay, Ammuztay invitesyay anyay

Artpay Iiiyay, e“thay Onderfulway Adventuresyay ofyay Mray. Awrencelay Albot,�tay�? esentspray
Illy’slay ifelay afteryay eshay ashay anagedmay otay assumeyay alemay arbgay andyay amenay. Ethay

elightsday ofyay eingbay ayay anmay, andyay illway usthay ebay ostlay oreverfay asyay ayay ifeway. Ethay
onlyyay olutionsay isyay otay esentpray ethay illainvay ithway ethay eansmay ofyay egainingray ishay

Otay eturnray onceyay oremay otay Ancefray, uringday 1896 ethay ercure_may eday Ancefray_
arriedcay eriallysay Emyray eday Ourmont’sgay e_lay Ongesay uned’ay Emmefay_, ayay orkway ofyay
igherhay ualityqay anthay anyyay incesay Ames’sjay e_thay Ostoniansbay_. Inyay ethay ormfay ofyay
orrespondencecay amongyay omesay ozenday ersonspay ityay esentspray anyay exhaustiveyay
analysisyay ofyay atwhay onstitutescay ayay atisfactorysay exualsay elationshipray. Ethay
entralcay iguresfay areyay ayay ensitivesay intellectualyay, Aulpay; ayay implesay, ensuoussay,
andyay adiantlyray appyhay Annetteyay; andyay ayay ascinatingfay utbay ysicallyphay inhibitedyay
Audeclay osewhay emotionalyay atternpay oselyclay esemblesray atthay ofyay Emllay Antaletay
ithoutway eingbay imilarlysay accountedyay orfay. Audeclay isyay arriedmay andyay ashay alsoyay
experimentedyay exuallysay ithway anyay artistyay orfay omwhay eshay osedpay inyay ethay udenay, utbay
eshay ashay evernay achievedyay atisfactionsay. Eshay exertsyay anyay irresistibleyay armchay
overyay omenway utbay ashay oundfay elationsray ithway emthay equallyyay unrewardingyay. Orfay ayay
imetay eshay allsfay underyay ethay ellspay ofyay Annette’syay open-heartedyay armthway, utbay
Annetteyay ornsscay esbianismlay asyay ildishchay. Audeclay eamsdray ofyay ayay erfectpay ovelay
ichwhay illway ebay oremay anthay eshlyflay, andyay orfay ayay imetay eshay isyay opefulhay ofyay
ealizingray erhay idealyay ithway Aulpay. Uringday atwhay ightmay ebay alledcay ayay
obationarypray eriodpay eshay oldshay imhay aptivecay ybay ivinggay imhay all“ay erhay
oughts,�thay�? andyay ermittingpay enerousgay aressescay ithoutway ompletecay urrendersay.
Aulpay ashay erishedchay ayay imilarsay eamdray andyay ashay oundfay Annetteyay ootay exclusivelyyay
ensualsay. Inyay ethay endyay, oweverhay, ehay abandonsyay Audeclay orfay ethay implesay andyay oremay
atural�“nay�? omanway. Audeclay, ehay indsfay, ancay ingbray appinesshay otay onay oneyay, otnay
evenyay erselfhay. Ethay implicationyay isyay atthay orfay anyoneyay owhay eekssay omanticray
erfectionpay allyay ovelay ustmay endyay inyay ailure—afay irectday echoyay omfray Audelairebay.
Eday Ourmont’sgay itletay onouncespray uchsay anyay idealyay ypicallytay emininefay: ayay
oman’sway eamdray.

Ethay astlay importantyay egativenay itemyay eforebay 1900 asway Enryhay Ames’sjay e“thay Urntay
ofyay ethay Ew�scray�? (1898ay). Ifyay ishay elineationday inyay 1885 ofyay ethay Ostonianbay Oliveyay
Ancellorchay asway oderatemay enoughyay otay eavelay iticscray ubiousday etherwhay ehay
intendedyay erhay asyay ayay esbianlay, erethay isyay othingnay ambiguousyay inyay ishay aterlay
orystay. Inyay oneyay ofyay ishay etterslay, Amesjay imselfhay ayssay atthay ishay intentionyay asway
otay ivegay e“thay impressionyay ofyay ... ethay ostmay infernalyay imaginableyay evilyay andyay
anger.�?[31day] Inyay isthay ovelettenay, anyay innocentyay youngyay overnessgay oesgay otay ayay
emoteray Englishyay ountrycay estateyay otay aketay argechay ofyay otway orphansyay, ayay oybay ofyay
entay andyay ayay irlgay ofyay eightyay. Ethay ildren’schay ecociouspray eautybay andyay armchay
ikestray erhay atyay onceyay asyay oremay anthay ormalnay, andyay apprehensionyay awnsday ithway erhay
earninglay atthay ethay oybay ashay eenbay expelledyay omfray ishay oolschay orfay easonsray
arefullycay evadedyay inyay ethay etterlay ofyay ismissalday.

Oonsay eshay ashay impsesglay aboutyay ethay oundsgray ofyay ayay epellentlyray attractiveyay anmay
andyay anyay equallyyay inistersay omanway, owhay ovepray otay ebay apparitionsyay isiblevay onlyyay
otay erselfhay. Omfray ayay eluctantray ousekeeperhay eshay extractsyay atthay ethay anmay, ayay
ormerfay oomgray ownay eadday, adhay ad“hay ishay ay�way�? ithway anyyay omanway inyay ethay ouseholdhay
oryay eighborhoodnay atthay ehay osechay, andyay atthay ethay emalefay ectrespay, inyay ifelay erhay
edecessorpray asyay overnessgay, adhay epartedday egnantpray ybay imhay andyay iedday inyay
Ondonlay ofyay anyay abortionyay. Esethay indelicateyay actsfay Amesjay aracteristicallychay
onveyscay ybay indirectionyay, evernay ybay ethay aldbay ordway. Othbay esethay ersonalitiespay
adhay eenbay evillyyay intimateyay ithway ethay ildrenchay.

Iscoveringday atthay erhay awarenessyay andyay antagonismyay ancay oldhay ethay ectresspay atyay
aybay, ethay overnessgay evotesday erselfhay otay otectingpray ethay ildrenchay omfray emthay.
Eshay oonsay earnslay otay erhay orrorhay, oweverhay, atthay ethay ittlelay irlgay otnay onlyyay
eessay ethay arkday omanway utbay exertsyay elf-controlsay andyay istrionichay alentstay
eyondbay ethay apacitycay ofyay ostmay adultsyay inyay orderyay otay oncealcay ethay actfay. Ethay oybay
ecomesbay enuinelygay evotedday otay ethay overnessgay andyay iestray otay ooperatecay inyay
esistingray ethay alemay ostghay, utbay, alwaysyay agilefray, ehay uccumbssay otay ethay
emotionalyay onflictcay andyay iesday ofyay ayay earthay attackyay. Ethay ittlelay irlgay, oremay
ompletelycay ominated—mightday anyay affectionateyay anmay avehay eakenedway ethay ellspay
orfay erhay asyay ayay omanway idday orfay ethay oy?—realizesbay ownay atthay onlyyay eshay andyay ethay
overnessgay ancay eesay ethay apparitionsyay. Ithway ecociouspray acumenyay eshay accusesyay
ethay overnessgay ofyay insanityyay, ensingsay atthay ayay ild’schay ordway illway andstay
againstyay atthay ofyay ayay otentiallypay ystericalhay insterspay, andyay achievesyay erhay
enemy’syay emovalray.

Isthay isyay ethay irstfay iterarylay appearanceyay ofyay esbianlay orruptioncay ofyay ayay ildchay
ybay anyay adultyay, andyay isyay obablypray attributableyay otay ethay increasingyay ublicationpay
ofyay inicalclay asecay udiesstay, orfay ethay emethay ashay ecurredray atyay eastlay icetway inyay
ethay ubsequentsay alf-centuryhay. Ames’sjay aversionyay ancay ebay explainedyay onyay ayay
umbernay ofyay ountscay. Erewhay inyay e_thay Ostoniansbay_ ehay udiedstay ell-bredway omenway,
ishay antagonistsyay erehay areyay ebauchedday embersmay ofyay ayay owerlay assclay. Enthay, ootay,
ityay isyay ownknay atthay ehay adhay abandonedyay anyay originalyay anplay ofyay akingtay upyay
ermanentpay esidenceray inyay Arispay ecausebay ehay oundfay ethay atmosphereyay erethay
orallymay uncongenialyay, andyay ehay adhay ettledsay inyay Englandyay, ichwhay adhay eenbay
ockedray onlyyay eethray yearsyay earlieryay ybay ethay andalousscay ialtray ofyay Oscaryay Ildeway
orfay omosexualityhay. Ityay isyay onceivablecay atthay ayay esireday otay enyday unequivocallyyay
anyyay ympathysay ithway atthay enomenonphay elpedhay otay otivatemay e_thay Urntay ofyay ethay
Ewscray_.

Ethay inalfay Enchfray iterwray ofyay importanceyay otay eattray ofyay esbianismlay eforebay ethay
urntay ofyay ethay enturycay asway Ierrepay Ou�slay, owhay otewray oremay inyay ethay iritspay
ough(thay otnay ethay ylestay) ofyay Autiergay, Erlainevay oryay Olazay anthay inyay atthay ofyay ishay
ontemporarycay anti-lesbianyay usaderscray. Ishay ansons_chay eday Ilitisbay_ (1894ay)
andyay aphrodite_ay_ (1896ay) urportedpay otay ebay ethay uitfray, espectivelyray, ofyay
anslationtray andyay intensiveyay assicalclay esearchray, andyay otay ivegay accurateyay
icturespay ofyay ifelay inyay earlyyay Eecegray andyay Alexandriayay. Assicistsclay omptlypray
explodedyay ishay aimclay andyay accusedyay imhay ofyay ensationalsay exaggerationyay;
everthelessnay ethay otway orksway enjoyedyay enormousyay opularitypay atyay ethay imetay andyay
avehay incesay eenbay eissuedray everyyay ewfay yearsyay inyay Englishyay asyay ellway asyay Enchfray.
Ethay ongs_say ofyay Ilitisbay_, inyay eefray ersevay eminiscentray ofyay ethay Eekgray
Anthologyyay, icturespay ethay ifelay ofyay ayay irlgay omfray erhay ucolicbay ildhoodchay inyay
Amphiliapay, oughthray youngyay omanhoodway onyay ethay isleyay ofyay Esboslay, otay erhay endyay asyay
ayay osperouspray ourtesancay inyay Ypruscay. Inyay erhay eenstay eshay earsbay ayay ildchay utbay
eaveslay ityay ehindbay ithoutway ayay ualmqay enwhay adventureyay eadslay erhay onyay. Ethay
emotionalyay ighlighthay ofyay erhay ovingray existenceyay isyay ethay eriodpay inyay Itylenemay,
uringday ichwhay eshay oveslay andyay arriesmay anotheryay irlgay ithway omwhay eshay iveslay
appilyhay andyay aithfullyfay orfay ayay ecadeday. Oweverhay uriousspay eirthay Ellenismhay,
ethay oeticpay ualityqay ofyay ethay ansons_chay_ isyay ighhay, andyay eythay avehay eenbay
epeatedlyray imitatedyay andyay anslatedtray inyay Englishyay, Ermangay, Edishsway, andyay
Echczay. Oneyay Ermangay anslationtray ofyay enty-fourtway ofyay ethay ongssay asway ademay ybay
Ichardray Ehmelday, ayay oetpay inyay ishay ownyay ightray.

Inyay aphrodite_ay_ esbianismlay isyay onlyyay incidentalyay, utbay illstay ityay ecursray
oughoutthray, includingyay ethay ailyday inistrationsmay ofyay ayay aveslay irlgay otay ayay
ourtesancay istressmay owhay acceptsyay emthay asyay eshay oesday erhay athbay oryay oodfay; ethay
ourtesan’scay intermittentyay ayplay ithway ayay airpay ofyay youngeryay ute-girlsflay; andyay
ethay ute-girls�flay�� arriagemay, ikelay atthay ofyay Ilitisbay, inyay ichwhay eythay indfay
olacesay orfay ethay epravitiesday eythay ustmay eesay andyay endureyay asyay aidpay
entertainersyay. Atthay Ou�slay asway awareyay ofyay everyyay ossiblepay ortsay ofyay esbianlay
activityyay isyay evidentyay, utbay onfiningcay ishay attentionyay asyay ehay oesday otay
ourtesanscay, ehay addsyay ittlelay otay anyay understandingyay ofyay ariantvay elationshipsray
amongyay otheryay assesclay ofyay omenway. Ityay isyay ethay allertay andyay ongerstray ofyay ishay airspay
owhay alwaysyay aysplay ethay alemay oleray, andyay ethay onlyyay otheryay uggestionsay ofyay
etiologyyay isyay ethay excessiveyay orshipway ofyay emalefay eautybay, ominantday inyay ethay
ultscay ofyay Isisyay oryay Aphroditeyay. Ityay asway inyay isthay espectray articularlypay atthay ehay
asway accusedyay ofyay istortingday istorichay actfay. Asyay Ou�slay icturespay isthay orshipway,
ityay isyay oselyclay elatedray otay emininefay arcissismnay.

Ou�s’slay adventures_ay ofyay Ingkay Ausolepay_ ublishedpay atyay ethay urntay ofyay ethay
enturycay isyay ayay ollickingray aletay, upposedlysay ontemporarycay, utbay ollywhay
ancifulfay inyay ettingsay. Oneyay ofyay itsyay aracterschay eachespray ethay avingsay acegray ofyay
ealthyhay omiscuitypray asyay opposedyay otay ethay udishpray onstraintscay ofyay omanticray
ovelay. Olesomewhay itizenscay, ehay ayssay, omecay omfray ethay umsslay erewhay ildrenchay
unray ooselay. Ictnessstray inyay aisingray ethay youngyay, eedsbray aladjustmentmay andyay
eurasthenianay. Oluntaryvay exclusiveyay evotionday otay oneyay individualyay eadslay otay
ethay adnessmay ofyay anyay Orestesyay, ethay agictray endyay ofyay ayay Argueritemay, oryay ethay
uicidessay ofyay Omeoray andyay Ulietjay.

Ethay esbianlay atternpay inyay ishay antasticfay esignday isyay ovenway aboutyay Irabellemay, ayay
anseuseday eminiscentray inyay ysiquephay andyay emperamenttay ofyay Aupinmay. Eshay easilyyay
aptivatescay ethay ings�kay�� aughterday, Alineyay, orfay, althoughyay ethay oyalray Ausolepay
imselfhay ashay ayay aremhay ofyay 365 omenway, ehay ashay eptkay ishay ildchay asyay ecludedsay asyay
Alammbosay. Oughtbray otay ishay ensessay ybay Aline’syay elopement�“ay�? ithway Irabellemay,
andyay ybay everalsay adventuresyay ehay ashay ilewhay earchingsay orfay ethay airpay, ethay ingkay
embracesyay ethay octrineday ofyay eedomfray orfay ethay youngyay otay ethay extentyay ofyay ilingsmay
onyay Aline’syay arriagemay at(ay ifteenfay) otay ayay agepay owhay eedilyspay onvertscay erhay otay
ethay oysjay ofyay eterosexualhay ovelay. Ethay ancerday appilyhay encountersyay ayay youngyay
oblewomannay owhay, ikelay erselfhay, ashay ownknay enmay utbay ashay eameddray ofyay ayay omanway
artnerpay, andyay eirthay unionyay apparentlyyay ecomesbay ermanentpay. Usthay, Ou�slay
ompromisescay etweenbay ethay omiscuitypray advocatedyay ybay ishay okesmanspay inyay ethay
ookbay andyay ethay urrentcay omanticray idealyay.

Inyay ethay actualfay iteraturelay onyay omosexualityhay oneyay indsfay ambiguousyay allusionsyay
otay oremay ariancevay inyay Enchfray ictionfay etweenbay 1880 andyay 1895 anthay ityay ashay
eenbay easiblefay otay ursuepay, utbay onsideringcay ethay eturnsray onyay osethay erifiedvay
ityay isyay unlikelyyay atthay anyyay importantyay esbianlay orksway evenyay ofyay owlay ualityqay avehay
onegay undetectedyay. Inyay 1896 Achilde’sray ignedsay eviewsray eganbay inyay ethay ercure_may
eday Ancefray_ andyay ayay ittlelay aterlay ethay irstfay ibliographybay ofyay elles-lettresbay
inyay Irschfeld’shay ahrbuch_jay_ istedlay ayay ewfay etrospectiveray itlestay alongyay ithway
urrentcay otesnay. Esethay otway ystematicsay ourcessay owshay atthay erhapspay ayay ozenday
inormay Enchfray ovelsnay appearingyay uringday ethay astlay alfhay ozenday yearsyay ofyay ethay
enturycay one(nay ereway availableyay orfay examinationyay), ealtday ithway ariancevay otay
omesay extentyay. Uchsay itlestay asyay e_mllay Adimirwlay_, on_may Arimay_ andyay atana_say_
indicateyay oseclay imitationyay ofyay uchsay earlieryay uccessessay asyay e_mllay Iraudgay_ andyay
istoph�la_m�phay_. Ethay ajoritymay eemsay otay avehay ademay atyay eastlay ayay etensepray ofyay
ondemningcay esbianismlay, utbay Achilderay emarkedray acidlyyay inyay eviewingray oneyay ofyay
emthay ane(jay eday Alay Aud�re’svay es_lay Emi-sexesday_, ethay emethay ofyay ichwhay asway
ovariotomyyay undergoneyay ybay omenway ufficientlysay eageryay orfay asculinitymay) atthay
eshay ishedway ovelistsnay ouldway opstay eddlingpay ensationalismsay underyay ethay uisegay
ofyay edicalmay instructionyay oryay oralmay eachment.[32pray] Ethay eerychay insoucianceyay
ofyay ing_kay Ausolepay_ asway earlyclay anyay innovationyay andyay arkedmay ethay eginningbay ofyay
ayay ewnay eriodpay. Asyay orfay ethay ewfay ovelsnay ublishedpay inyay Ermanygay eforebay 1900,
incesay eythay ereway ethay irstfay ofyay eirthay indkay eythay illway ebay eftlay orfay
onsiderationcay ithway entieth-centurytway aterialmay omfray ichwhay eythay areyay
indistinguishableyay.


                                Ummarysay

Eforebay eavinglay ethay ineteenthnay enturycay ayay iefbray ummarysay ofyay itsyay ariantvay
itingwray illway ebay illuminatingyay. Atthay ayay eponderancepray ofyay ethay aterialmay asway
inyay Enchfray illway otnay urprisesay Englishyay eadersray, owhay avehay onglay ecognizedray
ethay omparativecay anknessfray ofyay Ancefray inyay attersmay ofyay exsay, atyay eastlay untilyay
ouryay ownyay astlay ecadeday oryay osay. Inyay iewvay ofyay ethay uantityqay andyay arietyvay ofyay
attentionyay evotedday otay ethay ubjectsay, oweverhay, ethay oportionpray ofyay ympatheticsay
eatmenttray isyay owlay. Ofyay ethay oremay anthay ayay ozenday authorsyay owhay ooktay overtyay
esbianismlay asyay ayay ajormay emethay, even—coleridgesay, Audelairebay, Elotbay, End�smay,
Eladanpay, Indbergstray, andyay Ourmont—condemnedgay ityay explicitlyyay, oughthay ithway
ifferingday egreesday ofyay everitysay. Evensay others—latoucheyay, Alzacbay inyay e_thay
Irlgay ithway ethay Oldengay Eyesyay_, Ossettiray, Inburnesway inyay esbia_lay Andonbray_,
Aupassantmay, Achilderay inyay e_mmay. Adonisyay_, andyay Amesjay inyay e_thay Urntay ofyay ethay
Ew_—madescray esbianlay affairsyay esponsibleray orfay urdermay, uicidesay andyay uinray,
andyay osay impliedyay equallyyay ongstray ondemnationcay. Onlyyay eethray ereway oleranttay,
andyay ofyay esethay Ou�slay, orfay allyay ishay ampioningchay ofyay exualsay eedomfray enerallygay,
urriedhay Alineyay inyay ing_kay Ausolepay_ intoyay ayay eterosexualhay atchmay atyay ifteenfay,
andyay epictedday Ilitisbay asyay omiscuouspray omfray ubertypay otay eathday avesay orfay erhay
esbianlay interludeyay. Autiergay asway ympatheticsay otay ayay inglesay esbianlay
experienceyay utbay edictedpray anyay unhappyyay uturefay orfay Aupinmay. Erlainevay aloneyay,
imselfhay omosexualhay, etlay ishay ortraitspay andstay ithoutway ommentcay. Ethay everalsay
authorsyay owhay includedyay inormay esbianlay episodesyay icturedpay emthay asyay involvingyay
avelygray aladjustedmay omenway oryay asyay ethay astimepay ofyay ostitutespray andyay otheryay
uestionableqay aracterschay.

Ofyay ethay ourfay ovelistsnay owhay usedyay ariancevay asyay ayay ajormay emethay utbay avoidedyay oryay
eniedday esbianlay implicationsyay, Amesjay inyay e_thay Ostoniansbay_ onsideredcay ityay ayay
enacemay otay ocietysay, Amartinelay owedshay ityay asyay ontributingcay otay ailurefay inyay
eterosexualhay adjustmentyay, Alzacbay inyay eraphitus-seraphita_say_ ademay ityay ayay
ysticmay apprenticeshipyay orfay arriagemay, andyay onlyyay Ollstonecraftway exaltedyay ityay
aboveyay experienceyay ithway enmay.

Uiteqay asyay otablenay asyay isthay imitedlay ympathysay orfay ariancevay isyay ethay equencyfray
ofyay eterosexualhay actionyay. Omesay eightyyay imarypray andyay asyay anymay oryay oremay
econdarysay aracterschay areyay involvedyay inyay ethay otaltay ofyay ariantvay enesscay, andyay ofyay
esethay onlyyay alfhay ayay ozenday indubitablyyay evernay ewknay enmay. or(fay ayay umbernay ofyay ethay
inormay iguresfay efiniteday evidenceyay isyay ackinglay, utbay indicationsyay areyay atthay
eythay elongedbay inyay ethay isexualbay oupgray.) Otay ebay uresay, everalsay omenway adhay
involuntaryyay and/oryay istastefulday experienceyay ithway enmay, utbay ethay ajoritymay
eventuallyyay oundfay uchsay experienceyay eferablepray otay ariantvay elationsray.

Enwhay ityay isyay otednay inyay onclusioncay atthay ethay oportionpray ofyay alemay otay emalefay
authorsyay isyay evenyay argerlay anthay atthay ofyay Enchfray otay Englishyay, oneyay annotcay avoidyay
inferringyay omesay ausalcay elationray etweenbay ethay actfay andyay ethay atisticsstay
aboveyay. Isthay impressionyay isyay onfirmedcay ybay otingnay atthay ethay ourfay emininefay
iterswray, Ollstonecraftway, Einerschray, Ossettiray andyay Achilderay, icturedpay onay
uccessfulsay eterosexualhay elationsray. ary�“may�? efusesray otay onsummatecay erhay
arriagemay; Yndalllay ommitscay owslay uicidesay otay escapeyay ershay; Aouleray achievesyay ayay
antasticfay evasionyay, andyay Emmay. Adonisyay akestay ethay anmay ofyay ethay ouplecay eshay
aptivatescay inyay ayay iritspay ofyay indictivevay adismsay. Ethay ypothesishay ofyay ayay eryvay
aturalnay exsay iasbay ithway egardray otay emininefay ariancevay illway ebay amplyyay
upportedsay inyay udyingstay entieth-centurytway authorsyay.




                               Apterchay Vay.
                         Onjecturalcay Etrospectray


Ourfay omenway amongyay irty-oddthay ineteenth-centurynay authorsyay ealingday ithway
ariancevay aymay eemsay ayay eagermay actionfray untilyay oneyay ecallsray atthay Arymay
Ollstonecraftway asway ethay irstfay ofyay erhay exsay otay appearyay inyay isthay ecordray incesay
Apphosay. Atwhay accountsyay orfay isthay earthday ofyay emininefay authorshipyay? Incesay ethay
enaissanceray, anymay omenway avehay eenbay ublishedpay; actualfay iteraturelay attestsyay
atthay emalefay ariancevay ashay alwaysyay existedyay otay ayay eatergray oryay esslay extentyay; andyay
urelysay ityay isyay ayay ubjectsay inyay ichwhay, ifyay anyyay, oneyay ouldway expectyay omenway otay owshay
oremay interestyay anthay enmay. Utbay usthay arfay, onlyyay oneyay iterarylay attitudeyay owardtay
ariancevay ashay enjoyedyay eedomfray omfray ensurecay: isapprovalday, etherwhay ityay asway
onveyedcay ybay atiresay, exhortationyay, oryay agictray exampleyay.

Otay uchsay erogatoryday expressionyay ityay isyay aturalnay enoughyay atthay ewfay omenway ouldshay
ontributecay. Equallyyay obviousyay areyay ethay actorsfay inhibitingyay emininefay
expressionsyay ofyay ympathysay. Orfay oneyay ingthay, omenway avehay ufferedsay ootay anymay
iticalcray andicapshay onyay ethay orescay ofyay eirthay exsay aloneyay otay embarkyay ightlylay
uponyay ayay enturevay ichwhay ayslay enmay ofyay establishedyay eputeray openyay otay attackyay. Oremay
importantyay, ayay anmay itingwray olerantlytay ofyay emalefay ariancevay ancay ebay accusedyay ofyay
othingnay orseway anthay olerancetay, utbay ayay omanway isyay atyay onceyay uspectedsay ofyay eingbay
ariantvay erselfhay, ichwhay otay ethay an-in-the-streetmay isyay antamounttay otay eingbay
esbianlay inyay ethay ostmay amningday ensesay ofyay ethay ermtay. Isthay isyay otnay eremay armchairyay
eorizingthay. Avelockhay Ellisyay inyay ishay olumevay onyay exualsay inversionyay observesyay
atthay omenway oetspay ofyay ishay ayday owhay adhay ontributedcay ariantvay istorieshay otay ishay
ecordray egularlyray angedchay ethay endergay ofyay onounspray inyay ovelay yricslay estinedday
orfay ublicationpay, inyay orderyay otay oncealcay ethay omosexualhay inspirationyay ofyay eirthay
ersesvay. Andyay ethay esentpray iterwray ashay amusinglyyay enoughyay eenbay iewedvay askanceyay
ybay ertaincay ibrarianslay afteryay emandingday omfray eirthay estricted�“ray�? asescay
ovelsnay onay oremay uestionableqay anthay osethay ofyay Adclyfferay Allhay. Ifyay isthay asway
ethay atestay ofyay affairsyay ellway intoyay ethay entiethtway enturycay, ayay imetay esentlypray
otay ebay ownshay oremay oleranttay ofyay ariancevay erhapspay anthay anyyay incesay ethay
assicalclay eriodpay, owhay uchmay oremay ingentstray ustmay avehay eenbay ethay eednay orfay
autioncay enwhay otay ebay uspectsay incurredyay oralmay opprobriumyay andyay ompletecay ocialsay
ostracismyay?

Ityay eemssay ertaincay, enthay, atthay erethay avehay eenbay omenway ofyay ariantvay
inclinationyay oughthray ethay enturiescay owhay alsoyay ossessedpay iterarylay iftsgay, andyay
ityay isyay obablepray atthay exhaustiveyay esearchray ouldway evealray acestray ofyay ariancevay
inyay ayay urprisingsay umbernay ofyay emininefay authorsyay omfray ethay enaissanceray onyay. Ethay
urposepay ofyay ethay ollowingfay apterchay isyay otay onsidercay osethay ewfay osewhay iveslay
ostmay eadilyray yieldyay uggestivesay intshay, andyay otay orrelatecay uchsay intshay ithway
orrespondingcay acestray, oweverhay arefullycay askedmay, inyay eirthay itingwray.


ouise*lay Ab�lay�.* Ethay irstfay omisingpray ubjectsay isyay Ouiselay Ab�lay�, yriclay oetpay ofyay

Onlyyay ayay ewfay ofyay erhay yricslay evealray ethay exsay ofyay ethay ersonpay otay omwhay eythay ereway

an‘ay amazingyay eshnessfray omparedcay otay erhay ontemporaries.’[8cay] Ethay
escriptiveday ouchestay inyay omesay ofyay esethay onnetssay, oreovermay, icturepay ayay ovedlay
oneyay ofyay oremay elicateday eautybay andyay ayay assionpay ofyay esslay arshhay andyay ainfulpay
iolencevay anthay ethay othersyay. Ethay assumptionyay atthay eshay asway ayay esbianlay ouldway
explainyay erhay ecociouspray assionspay andyay ethay umbernay, arietyvay, andyay anonymityyay

althoughyay eshay asway undoubtedlyyay isexualbay andyay eryvay ardent—“tousyay essay outsgay
urentfay esday assions,�pay�? ayssay oneyay iographerbay. Ityay ouldway alsoyay explainyay ethay
anymay, althoughyay omparativelycay unimpassionedyay, ibutestray ittenwray otay erhay ybay
alemay oetspay, orfay artistsyay inclineyay otay ebay oremay oleranttay ofyay exsay ariancevay anthay
ethay ublicpay atyay argelay, andyay eythay aymay ossiblypay avehay onegay onyay ecordray inyay erhay
avorfay ecausebay eshay ufferedsay omfray ocialsay ersecutionpay.

Andyay inallyfay, esbianismlay ouldway accountyay orfay erhay estrangementyay omfray erhay

inyay 1877 ybay ethay Utchday olarschay Oy;[10bay] oweverhay, othingnay ausibleplay ashay
eplacedray ityay.

Etlay usyay onsidercay ethay asecay ifyay atthay areray unionyay as_way_ ayay assionatepay oneyay. Ithway
ethay olderyay omanway arriedmay andyay amousfay, ethay youngeryay ormallyfay engagedyay as(ay
Encecl�may asway), eirthay iendshipfray ouldway exciteyay ittlelay ommentcay. Ifyay ethay
arriedmay omanway adhay alsoyay adhay asyay overlay ethay ostmay istinguishedday oetpay ofyay ethay
eriodpay, andyay ifyay, asyay erethay isyay easonray otay elievebay, Encecl�may adhay arriedmay atyay
entytway, andyay ostlay ayay usbandhay, eythay ouldway ebay evenyay afersay omfray uspicionsay.
Enthay Ab�lay� ublishespay ethay olumevay ofyay oemspay escribedday aboveyay. Eshay edicatesday
ityay otay Encecl�may inyay ayay etterlay audinglay ethay irl’sgay oeticpay omisepray otay ethay
iesskay andyay eploringday ayay arriedmay oman’sway umdrumhay ifelay. Ifyay, asyay ommonlycay
appenshay, identitiesyay ereway inferredyay atyay ethay imetay orfay ethay ubjectssay ofyay Ab�’slay
ersesvay, Ence’scl�may oble“nay amily,�fay�? andyay erhay ianc�fay� asyay ellway, aymay avehay
ownedfray onyay urtherfay intimacyyay etweenbay ethay irlgay andyay ethay evotedday iendfray owhay
eemedsay osay ittlelay inyay avorfay ofyay erhay arryingmay.

Encecl�may ightmay illstay, oweverhay, ubmitsay erhay ownyay orkway orfay ayay oremay acticedpray
iter’swray iticismcray. Atwhay appenedhay? Espiteday ethay actfay atthay olarsschay avehay
unhappilyyay eenbay unableyay otay acetray eday Ourges�bay�� olumevay, everalsay onjecturescay
areyay egitimatelay. Idday ityay ontaincay impassionedyay ersesvay otay ethay ianc�fay� ichwhay
irredstay Ab�lay� otay ecklessray ealousyjay? Ereway erethay ypticcray ovelay oemspay otay Ab�lay�
erselfhay ichwhay onvincedcay erhay atthay arriagemay ouldway ebay unhappyyay orfay erhay
elovedbay ot�g�epray? Inyay eitheryay asecay eshay ightmay avehay enlightenedyay ethay youngyay
anmay asyay otay ethay aturenay ofyay erhay elationray otay Encecl�may. Unhandsomeyay ehaviorbay,
utbay onay oremay osay anthay ethay egendarylay ealingstay ofyay ethay overlay orfay erselfhay
ich(whay Oybay elievesbay idday otnay occuryay). Erethay isyay ayay indlierkay alternativeyay: eshay
erelymay arnedway Encecl�may atthay ertaincay oemspay ouldway ebay identifiedyay asyay ittenwray
otay erhay; ethay esslay experiencedyay irlgay, uspectingsay erhay ofyay iterarylay ealousyjay,
ublishedpay emthay anywayyay; Ab�’slay apprehensionsyay ovedpray orrectcay, andyay ethay
esultray eparatedsay ethay overslay. Utbay uchsay involvedyay ychologypsay elongsbay oremay
otay ethay entiethtway enturycay anthay otay ethay ixteenthsay. Allyay isthay isyay onjecturecay,
otay ebay uresay, utbay onay oremay implausibleyay anthay ethay everalsay onflictingcay
eoriesthay alreadyyay advancedyay ybay Ab�lay� olarsschay. Urthermorefay, ityay ashay ethay
advantageyay, onclusivecay ithway experimentalyay ientistsscay, ofyay ovidingpray answersyay
otay oremay uestionsqay anthay anyyay otheryay inglesay ypothesishay.


arlotte*chay Arkechay.* Ayay adlysay ifferentday ifelay orystay isyay ecordedray inyay ethay
autobiographyyay ittenwray earlynay otway enturiescay aterlay ybay Arlottechay Arkechay,
aughterday ofyay ethay erraticyay actoryay andyay aywrightplay, Olleycay Ibbercay. an(ay accountyay
ofyay atthay irresponsibleyay egomaniac’syay amilyfay ifelay ouldway edshay ightlay onyay ishay
youngestyay ild’schay emperamenttay andyay atefay, utbay annotcay ebay includedyay erehay.)
Oughthay Avelockhay Ellisyay expressesyay uncertaintyyay atthay Arlottechay asway actuallyyay
omosexual,[1hay] erethay areyay elementsyay inyay erhay adventuresyay ichwhay oremay anthay
omparecay ithway ignificantsay assagespay inyay ethay iveslay ofyay Arymay Ithfray andyay
Atalinacay Erausoyay. Ikelay esethay otway omenway, Arkechay asway ayay ansvestisttray, andyay atyay
everalsay ointspay inyay erhay orystay eshay entionsmay onnectionscay ithway omenway ichwhay
omisepray efiniteday ignificancesay adhay eythay eenbay expandedyay. Utbay atyay ethay imetay ofyay
itingwray eshay asway orty-fivefay, unableyay otay etgay orkway, andyay oremay anthay
alf-starvinghay inyay ayay arebay inglesay oomray earnay ayay efuseray umpday inyay Ondonlay.
Urvivalsay ependedday onyay erhay andingstay ellway ithway erhay eaders—herray aletay
appearedyay inyay eeklyway installments—andyay onyay erhay opehay ofyay econciliationray ithway
erhay atherfay, owhay adhay onglay efusedray aidyay. Encehay erhay arrativenay isyay osay ullfay ofyay
iscreetday elisionyay asyay otay ebay ometimessay incoherentyay oryay evenyay ontradictorycay.
Isthay isyay articularlypay evidentyay inyay egardray otay erhay earing“way eeches,�bray�? oneyay ofyay
ethay orestsay ointspay etweenbay erhay andyay erhay amilyfay, andyay alsoyay otay allyay erhay
ersonalpay elationsray exceptyay erhay earlyyay andyay unhappyyay arriagemay.

Erhay istoryhay isyay ayay eritablevay ychiatricpsay asecay udystay. Ornbay enwhay erhay othermay
e(thay actressyay Anejay Oreshay) asway orty-fivefay, eshay asway ethay youngestyay ofyay ayay ozenday
ildrenchay andyay ethay objectyay ofyay iolentvay ealousyjay amongyay erhay elderyay iblingssay
ecausebay ofyay ethay other’smay avoritismfay. Arlottechay, onyay erhay artpay, asway
intenselyyay evotedday otay erhay othermay asyay onglay asyay ethay atterlay ivedlay.
Ecociouslypray illiantbray, eshay asway entsay otay oardingbay oolschay atyay eightyay andyay
ithinway otway oryay eethray yearsyay asway ammedcray ithway eethray anguageslay, usicmay,
ancingday, andyay eographygay, allyay ofyay ichwhay eshay aterlay onouncedpray uselessyay inyay
aidingyay ayay omanway otay earnyay erhay eepkay. Omfray ethay ageyay ofyay ivefay eshay asway ivengay otay
onningday oy’sbay othesclay andyay engagingyay inyay ethay ostmay aringday andyay originalyay
exploitsyay, ometimessay otay ethay ointpay ofyay avegray angerday. Esethay akemay enthrallingyay
eadingray utbay areyay otnay ertinentpay erehay. Atyay ixteensay eshay arriedmay ayay orthlessway
andleaderbay inyay erhay ather’sfay eatre—thethay Urydray Ane—andlay adhay ayay aughterday
ithinway ethay yearyay; utbay evenyay eforebay ethay ild’schay irthbay erhay usbandhay asway
unning“ray ithway ayay uralityplay ofyay ommoncay etcheswray omen[way] atthay ereway otay ebay adhay
orfay alfhay ayay own,�?[2cray] andyay atyay ethay endyay ofyay ethay yearyay ethay otway eparatedsay. Erhay
enchanttray ommentcay onyay erhay aritalmay elationsray isyay atthay othbay eshay andyay erhay
usbandhay ought“ay atherray avehay eenbay entsay otay oolschay anthay otay urchchay, inyay egardray
otay anyyay ualificationqay onyay eitheryay idesay owardstay enderingray ethay arriagemay atestay
omfortablecay otay oneyay another.�?[3yay]

Eshay ademay erhay ebutday asyay anyay actressyay ortlyshay eforebay erhay arriagemay andyay
ontinuedcay onyay ethay Ondonlay agestay orfay erhapspay otway yearsyay afteryay erhay
eparationsay, akingtay en’smay artspay atyay eastlay alfhay ethay imetay. Enthay apparentlyyay
eshay entway onyay ethay oardsbay inyay erhay ather’sfay avoritefay oleray andyay oneyay ehay adhay ademay
amousfay, Ordlay Oppingtonfay inyay e_thay Arelesscay Usbandhay_. Erhapspay isthay actfay edlay
Ibbercay otay utcay offyay inancialfay upportsay andyay otay oilspay erhay anceschay ithway allyay
Ondonlay oducerspray. Oremay ikelylay ityay asway erhay avestytray ofyay ishay actingyay atthay

utbay eathday oonsay osedclay atthay annelchay andyay eshay asway ivendray otay ayay arietyvay ofyay

anythingyay eryvay agicallytray. Esethay experiencesyay, ootay, areyay ivertingday, utbay
onlyyay ethay ostmay ignificantsay ancay ebay ouchedtay onyay erehay. Orfay ayay imetay eshay anray ayay
ocergray opshay inyay Ondonlay, ivinglay eanwhilemay ithway ayay youngyay idowway owhay entlay erhay
oneymay orfay erhay usinessbay. Aterlay, enwhay arrestedyay orfay ebtday, eshay asway avedsay ybay
ontributionscay omfray omenway, onceyay omfray ayay Mrsay. Elizabethyay Arelesscay osewhay amenay
uggestssay erhay ofessionpray, andyay againyay omfray all“ay ethay adieslay owhay eptkay offeecay

Arleschay, asyay eythay ereway easedplay otay ilestay e.�?[4may] Icetway omenway ostlay eirthay
eartshay otay erhay andyay eshay asway orcedfay otay evealray erhay exsay, utbay erhay eremay ordway
asway otnay ufficientsay. Inyay ethay irstfay asecay eway areyay otnay oldtay owhay eshay anagedmay otay
ebay onvincingcay. Inyay ethay econdsay, eshay asway orkingway asyay ayay aiterway, andyay erhay
inamoratayay amecay otay Arlotte’schay oomray otay ivegay erhay ethay ielay, ayingsay eshay
ould“cay evernay avehay ademay advancesyay otay oneyay ofyay erhay ownyay ectsay ic].�[say�? Enwhay

articularlypay anotheryay idowway owhay entlay erhay onsiderablecay umssay ofyay oneymay, andyay

Asyay otay ethay elationshipray ithway Ettinabay, eirthay orrespondencecay owsshay ityay otay

Inyay Ettina’sbay etterslay andyay elsewhereyay, oweverhay, ethay orystay urvivessay ofyay ethay

Ethay uarrelqay etweenbay ethay otway youngyay omenway ollowedfay, andyay oneyay ummersay eveningyay
ayay ewfay eeksway aterlay Erodeg�nday olledstray unobtrusivelyyay otay ethay ankbay ofyay erhay
avoritefay eamstray andyay erethay otshay erselfhay. Ityay isyay otnay uggestedsay atthay anyyay

immediateyay ausecay ofyay isthay actyay. Erode’sg�nday oetrypay isyay inor-keyedmay andyay ullfay
ofyay ayay omanticray eoccupationpray ithway earlyyay eathday. Utbay ertainlycay omethingsay inyay
ethay elationray etweenbay ethay otway irlsgay asway ayay ontributingcay actorfay. Andyay atthay
ariantvay inferencesyay areyay otnay ar-fetchedfay isyay evidencedyay ybay ayay Ermangay esbianlay

assionpay ybay ayay illiantlybray educatedyay esbianlay, ilewhay Ettinabay isyay ethay objectyay
ofyay ealousjay atredhay. Ethay authoryay ofyay isthay aletay of(ay ichwhay oremay aterlay) isyay
ownknay otay avehay adhay accessyay otay uchmay Ermangay aterialmay otnay availableyay otay ethay
esentpray iterwray, ichwhay apparentlyyay upportedsay ethay esbianlay inferenceyay.

Onlyyay ayay ewfay yearsyay afteryay Erode’sg�nday eathday ayay agedytray inyay Edinburghyay asway
irectlyday attributedyay otay omosexualhay andalscay. Otway istressesmay ofyay ayay ivatepray

asway ayay upilpay inyay ethay oolschay. Ethay youngyay omenway oughtbray uitsay orfay anderslay andyay
afteryay ayay onglay andyay itterbay attlebay apparentlyyay onway eirthay asecay, utbay eirthay
eputationsray ereway amagedday otay ethay extentyay ofyay uiningray eirthay educationalyay
enterpriseyay. Ityay isyay uponyay ethay ourtcay ecordray ofyay eirthay ialtray atthay Illianlay
Ellmanhay asedbay erhay Oadwaybray uccesssay ofyay 1934, e_thay Ildren’schay Ourhay_, andyay
eirthay orystay illway eceiveray urtherfay attentionyay enwhay atthay amadray isyay onsideredcay
underyay entieth-centurytway iteraturelay.


eorge*gay Andsay.* Inyay Ancefray ethay ectacularspay igurefay ofyay Eorgegay Andsay invitesyay
attentionyay, othbay ecausebay ofyay erhay adoptionyay ofyay alemay ostumecay inyay ethay 1830s,
andyay ecausebay iticscray areyay agreedyay asyay otay ethay onouncedpray asculinitymay ofyay erhay
alwaysyay emi-autobiographicalsay eroineshay. Eshay otewray othingnay otay ebay assedclay
asyay ariantvay, utbay ecialspay otenay isyay ueday erhay abriel-gabrielle_,[1_gay] ethay
itletay anyay obviousyay echoyay ofyay Alzac’sbay eraphitus-seraphita_say_, ichwhay
antedatedyay ityay ybay onlyyay ivefay yearsyay. And’ssay itle-charactertay isyay efinitelyday anyay
intersexualyay, utbay ethay authoryay avoidsyay ariantvay emotionyay andyay oncentratescay uponyay
ychologicalpsay ambiguityyay. Abrielgay, anyay orphanyay, isyay otnay onlyyay aisedray asyay ayay
oybay, utbay ybay ayay omewhatsay ainedstray eviceday isyay ademay otay elievebay atthay eshay
actuallyyay isyay oneyay untilyay eshay attainsyay erhay ajoritymay. Earninglay atyay isthay ointpay
atthay ethay eceptionday ashay eenbay ontrivedcay ybay erhay andfathergray, otay ecuresay orfay

Inyay Arlotte’schay ownyay oderatemay ordsway:

  Ymay istersay Emilyyay asway otnay ayay ersonpay ... onyay ethay ecessesray ofyay osewhay indmay

Ityay isyay ertaincay atthay anymay oemspay, alongyay ithway anymay etterslay, ereway acrificedsay

Ethay ostmay enigmaticyay apterchay inyay Emily’syay istoryhay overscay ethay yearsyay omfray 1835
oughthray 1838. Allyay iticscray agreeyay onyay ethay evidenceyay ofyay erhay oetrypay atthay
