eparationsay andyay esireday orfay eathday, andyay oneyay ichwhay alsoyay ontainedcay ethay eedssay
ofyay ethay utuallymay estructiveday ovelay ofyay Atherinecay andyay Eathcliffhay inyay
uthering_way Eightshay_, ittenwray earlynay ayay ecadeday aterlay. Emily’syay
orrespondencecay omfray isthay eriodpay ashay eenbay ostlay oryay estroyedday, Arlotte’schay
ewfay urvivingsay etterslay avehay undergoneyay uttingcay onyay erhay artpay ichwhay eaveslay
emthay arrenbay, andyay oneyay ustmay inferyay ointedpay expurgationyay. Ethay ecisepray atingday
ofyay Emily’syay oemspay ittenwray eforebay 1839 ightmay elphay olvesay ethay ysterymay, utbay
orfay uchsay ecisionpray olarsschay avehay ivenstray inyay ainvay. Ethay atestlay andyay estbay
establishedyay onologychray, atthay ofyay Atfieldhay, illway ebay acceptedyay erehay.

Ityay isyay ownknay atthay orfay eethray onthsmay inyay atelay 1835 Emilyyay asway ayay upilpay atyay Oeray
Eadhay, ayay oardingbay oolschay erewhay Arlottechay asway engagedyay asyay eachertay. Erhay
eedyspay ithdrawalway asway aidlay otay Arlotte’schay oncerncay orfay erhay ealthhay; andyay asyay
erhay oemspay eforebay atthay ateday indicateyay atthay eshay ouldcay otnay ebay appyhay awayyay
omfray ethay oorsmay andyay ouldcay otnay endureyay anyyay ortsay ofyay onstraintcay, eshay aymay ellway
avehay eenbay iterallylay icksay orfay ethay eedomfray ofyay omehay. Uponyay erhay eturnray erethay,
Anneyay entway otay Oeray Eadhay inyay erhay aceplay, andyay Emilyyay asway eftlay inyay Aworthhay ithway
Anwellbray, owhay ustmay avehay eenbay adsay enoughyay ompanycay. Ehay adhay ustjay ailedfay
euroticallynay inyay ishay intentionyay otay udystay atyay ethay Oyalray Academyyay andyay asway
endingspay ishay imetay asyay ayay unkendray idleryay atyay ethay illagevay averntay. Ityay isyay
ecausebay osay ewfay oemspay andyay osay ewfay etterslay otay oryay omfray erhay absentyay isterssay
emainray omfray isthay interimyay atthay ethay ypothesishay ofyay ayay uestionableqay
elationshipray etweenbay otherbray andyay istersay ashay owngray upyay, andyay ofyay oursecay,
Emily’syay apidray eclineday andyay eathday ithinway ayay yearyay ofyay Anwell’sbray inyay 1847
endslay omesay upportsay otay ethay eorythay. Utbay erhay oetrypay earingbay ethay ateday ofyay
1836 isyay emotionallyyay inthay andyay immatureyay, andyay iticscray areyay agreedyay atthay ethay
ajormay angechay inyay ityay atesday omfray ethay ollowingfay yearyay.

Ethay inglesay externalyay eventyay inyay erhay ifelay atyay atthay imetay asway ayay eachingtay
engagementyay atyay Awlay Illhay, ofyay ichwhay allyay atthay isyay ownknay ertainlycay isyay atthay ityay
ontinuedcay orfay atyay eastlay ixsay onthsmay uringday 1837. Omesay olarsschay oldhay atthay
ityay eganbay inyay ethay allfay ofyay 1836, othersyay atthay ityay ontinuedcay ellway intoyay 1838.
Erethay areyay acestray ofyay evidenceyay otay upportsay othbay ontentionscay, utbay etherwhay ityay
astedlay ixsay onthsmay oryay ixteensay, ityay asway, eyondbay uestionqay, Emily’syay ongestlay
absenceyay omfray Aworthhay illtay enthay. Ollowingfay Atfield’shay atingday ofyay erhay
oemspay, oneyay ancay acetray irstfay ethay impactyay ofyay ewnay enesscay ebruary(fay 1837),
ostalgianay orfay ethay oorsmay, andyay ayay ishway otay e“bay ealthfulhay illstay andyay urntay awayyay
omfray assion’spay all.�cay�? Enthay inyay equencesay ow(hay apidray oneyay annotcay aysay) omecay
abysmalyay elf-distrustsay; ightmarenay; elancholymay; ethay agonyyay ofyay eparationsay
ovember(nay, 1837); oremay esperateday elancholymay ough(thray 1838); andyay inallyfay
inyay atelay Octoberyay andyay earlyyay Ovembernay, 1838, otway oemspay ofyay assionatepay andyay
itterbay eproachray otay ayay aithlessfay emininefay ovelay: i“ay ewknay otnay as’tway osay ireday
ayay imecray Otay aysay ethay ordway adieu,�yay�? andyay ight“lay upyay ythay alls—andhay inkthay otnay ofyay
e!�may�? Ateverwhay experienceyay oducedpray esethay intenseyay, immediateyay andyay ertainlycay
autobiographicalyay outcriesyay ustmay avehay occurredyay uringday ayay eriodpay enwhay, asyay ayay
etterlay otay Arlottechay estifiestay, erhay oarding-schoolbay esponsibilitiesray
absorbedyay erhay omfray ixsay inyay ethay orningmay untilyay ometimessay elevenyay atyay ightnay,
andyay erewhay upervisionsay ouldway avehay ademay associationyay ithway ayay anmay impossibleyay.
Inyay iewvay ofyay erhay earlieryay uickqay ithdrawalway omfray Oeray Eadhay, ethay actfay atthay eshay
enduredyay uchsay onditionscay orfay evenyay ixsay onthsmay isyay emarkableray.

Ityay isyay easonableray otay imagineyay atthay atyay Awlay Illhay eshay etmay andyay ellfay ardentlyyay
inyay ovelay ithway anotheryay oman—whetherway eachingtay olleaguecay oryay eniorsay
udent—andstay atthay ethay emotionyay asway ufficientlysay utualmay orfay Emilyyay otay
envisionyay omesay uchsay astinglay ompanionshipcay asyay Arlottechay eameddray ofyay ithway
Ellenyay Usseynay. indeed(ay, Oore’smay emphasisyay uponyay ethay eautybay, intellectualyay
andyay ocialsay apacitiescay, andyay ersonalpay armchay ofyay Issmay Elizabethyay Atchettpay,
ethay ool’sschay orty-four-year-oldfay eadmistresshay, uggestssay ethay ossibilitypay
ofyay Emily’syay uperiorsay avinghay itlay ethay ameflay eflectedray inyay erhay ersevay.) Ethay
atternpay ofyay uchsay ormitoryday amasdray, oeverwhay ethay actorsyay, isyay airlyfay
onstantcay. Oneyay youngyay omanway isyay aglowyay ithway excitementyay andyay anyay oftenyay illusoryyay
ensesay ofyay ompletecay apportray; ethay otheryay isyay atteredflay andyay enuinelygay
esponsiveray untilyay ethay emotionalyay oltagevay unsray ootay ighhay. Enthay ithdrawalway
ollowsfay onyay ethay oneyay idesay, urthay andyay isunderstandingmay onyay ethay otheryay. Etherwhay
Emilyyay encounteredyay Ictorianvay admonitionyay omfray ayay olleaguecay, oryay ethay ewsnay
omfray omesay armingchay youngyay eaturecray as(ay eshay oyedtay ithway erhay ewnay ingray) atthay
e_shay_ asway aboutyay otay enteryay ove’slay eal_ray_ ovincepray, ityay isyay ertaincay atthay
Emilyyay eltfay erselfhay etrayed.�“bay�? Actuallyyay, isthay oudpray omanway ofyay entytway oryay
enty-onetway, inyay ethay ipgray ofyay authenticyay assionpay, ustmay avehay eenbay oughtbray otay
eesay erhay eelingfay oughthray otheryay eyesyay asyay omethingsay etweenbay ayay uvenilejay
arm_schway_ andyay atthay orrorhay ethay eryvay amenay ofyay ichwhay Aintsay Aulpay orbadefay otay
ebay utteredyay. Ityay isyay obablepray atthay eshay ecamebay atyay onceyay eitheryay ysicallyphay oryay
ervouslynay illyay andyay erhapspay eftlay ethay oolschay inexplicable(ay inyay ethay iddlemay ofyay
ayay ermtay), idinghay ealouslyjay ethay easonray orfay erhay oinggay, andyay ottingblay ityay omfray
allyay ecordsray. interestingly(ay enoughyay Ooremay ellstay usyay atthay Issmay Atchettpay
arriedmay ayay ocallay icarvay ortly“shay afteryay Emily’syay epartureday omfray Awlay Ill.�hay�?
Asway ityay erhay allshay atthay ereway itlay, andyay orfay erhay eddingway, inyay Ovembernay
1838?)[8]

Ayay owblay ikelay is—thethay ealizationray atthay ethay onlyyay ovelay ofyay ichwhay eshay eemedsay
apablecay asway egardedray ybay ethay orldway asyay eitheryay ivolousfray oryay inful—wouldsay
explainyay erhay ubsequentsay elancholymay andyay erhay ubbornstay efusalray otay enteryay
againyay intoyay anyyay ersonalpay elationshipray. Ityay alsoyay oloredcay erhay emoriesmay ofyay
Awlay Illhay osay atthay ayay ecadeday aterlay eshay usedyay etailsday ofyay ethay uildingsbay andyay
environsyay otay escribeday Utheringway Eightshay armfay, ethay ettingsay inyay ichwhay, asyay
ethay ark-spiritedday Eathcliffhay, eshay inallyfay oughtwray icariousvay evengeray uponyay
ayay ainvay andyay inconstantyay Athycay.


eorge*gay Eliotyay.* Ethay eyeyay inyay earchsay ofyay ariancevay inevitablyyay urnstay extnay otay
ethay Eorgegay inyay Englandyay owhay adhay otnay yetyay assumedyay erhay asculinemay
ognomen—marycay Annyay Evansyay. Isthay ovelistnay asway undoubtedlyyay asculinemay inyay anymay
aysway, othbay ysicallyphay andyay ychologicallypsay; ichwhay ofyay esethay aitstray ereway
inbornyay andyay ichwhay edbray ofyay ethay ildhoodchay adorationyay ofyay atherfay andyay otherbray
osay ividlyvay eflectedray inyay ill_may onyay ethay Ossflay_, ityay isyay impossibleyay otay aysay.
Utbay Eorgegay Eliot’syay asculinitymay oesday otnay eemsay otay avehay affectedyay erhay
emotionalyay ifelay. Erethay areyay, otay ebay uresay, ayay andfulhay ofyay eryvay oseclay omenway
iendsfray itedcay inyay ethay Ansons�hay�� ecentray iography:[1bay] Arasay Ennellhay, earnay
erhay ownyay ageyay andyay, ikelay erhay, atherray asculinemay; Arymay Ibreesay, ethay irstfay
youngyay irlgay eshay utoredtay; andyay aterlay Essiebay Arkespay andyay Arbarabay Eighlay
Aylortay, youngyay eministsfay ayay alfhay ozenday yearsyay oryay oremay erhay uniorjay. Allyay ofyay
esethay areyay entionedmay asyay artiespay otay iendshipsfray ichwhay ereway ieflybray oremay oryay
esslay emotionalyay onyay oneyay idesay oryay othbay. Utbay evenyay osay, otway onsiderationscay
excludeyay eirthay ubjectsay omfray ayay istlay ofyay ariantvay omenway untilyay oremay evidenceyay
isyay atyay andhay. Ethay oncerncay eltfay ybay otway ofyay ethay irls�gay�� amiliesfay aboutyay Arymay
Annyay Evans’syay influenceyay asway ausedcay otnay atyay allyay ybay erhay emotionalyay emperamenttay
utbay ybay erhay eligiousray unorthodoxyyay. Urthermorefay, othingnay inyay Eorgegay Eliot’syay
orkway eflectsray anyyay interestyay inyay emotionalyay onnectionscay etweenbay omenway oryay
evenyay anyay awarenessyay ofyay emthay. Erhay ifelay, asyay oonsay asyay eshay asway eedfray omfray
enslavementyay otay erhay invalidyay atherfay, asway ayay uccessionsay ofyay excitementsyay
involvingyay enmay, enmay owhay aptivatedcay erhay emotionsyay egardlessray ofyay etherwhay
eythay ereway arriedmay oryay ike(lay Erberthay Encerspay) incapableyay ofyay assionpay. Eshay
asway atthay asecay osay ishearteningday otay ethay ereditaryhay eorist—anthay extremelyyay
annishmay omanway otnay obsessedyay ithway omenway utbay ithway enmay.


argaret*may Ullerfay.* Ethay ifelay ofyay anyay Americanyay ontemporarycay ofyay Eorgegay Andsay
andyay Emilyyay Ont�bray� offersyay imilarsay uggestionssay ofyay ariancevay, ilewhay erhay
urvivingsay orkway isyay almostyay equallyyay emptyyay ofyay ityay. Argaretmay Ullerfay, Ewnay
Englandyay anscendentalisttray, eministfay, andyay ournalistjay, isyay ememberedray orfay
erhay oman_way inyay ethay Ineteenthnay Enturycay_, ichwhay ayedplay ayay artpay inyay isthay
ountrycay omparablecay otay Ollstonecraft’sway indication_vay_ inyay Englandyay; orfay erhay
editingyay ofyay ethay ort-livedshay ial_day_, andyay orfay erhay orkway atyay omehay andyay abroadyay
onyay ethay affstay ofyay Oracehay Eeley’sgray ew_nay Yorkyay Ibunetray_. Eshay isyay alsoyay
ememberedray orfay erhay iendshipsfray ithway Emersonyay andyay Arlylecay andyay erhay effortsyay
otay amiliarizefay erhay ountrymencay ithway Italianyay andyay Ermangay iteraturelay,
especiallyyay ethay orkway ofyay Oethegay. Eshay isyay oughtthay otay avehay eenbay ethay odelmay orfay
Olmes�hay�� Uridalay Incentvay andyay orfay ethay Enobiazay ofyay Awthorne’shay ythedale_blay
Omanceray_. Atherinecay Anthonyyay, inyay oneyay ofyay ethay irstfay ychoanalytic�“psay�?
iographiesbay ofyay isthay entury,[1cay] evealsray ethay igorousray asceticismyay andyay
intellectualyay orcingfay imposedyay uponyay erhay uringday ildhoodchay ybay atthay uritanpay
idealistyay, Imothytay Ullerfay, andyay arguesyay orfay ayay atherfay ixationfay asyay ethay eykay otay
erhay aterlay emotionalyay ifelay.

Ityay asway otnay untilyay ethay ageyay ofyay irty-fourthay atthay eshay experiencedyay erhay irstfay
omanticray ovelay orfay ayay anmay, ethay Ermangay Ewjay Amesjay Athannay, omwhay eshay etmay
uringday erhay irstfay yearyay inyay Ewnay Yorkyay. Enwhay ehay expressedyay assionpay orfay erhay,
eshay asway eeplyday isturbedday, evenyay ockedshay, andyay ehay oonsay eturnedray otay Europeyay,
artlypay, ityay isyay oughtthay, otay escapeyay omfray erhay ubbornlystay atonic�“play�? oldhay
uponyay imhay. Ourfay yearsyay aterlay inyay Italyyay eshay ivedlay orfay ayay easonsay ithway ethay
Archesamay ossolid’ay, omwhay eshay arriedmay ecretlysay afteryay iscoveringday atthay eshay
asway egnantpray, asyay Ollstonecraftway adhay oneday inyay ethay asecay ofyay Odwingay. Ersionsvay
ofyay othbay esethay eterosexualhay experiencesyay ereway ermittedpay otay urvivesay ybay
Emersonyay, Illiamway Elleryyay Anningchay, andyay Amesjay Eemanfray Arkeclay, owhay editedyay
erhay emoirs_may_, utbay, ayssay Asonmay Adeway inyay ayay aterlay iographybay, ese“thay iendsfray
ofyay Argaretmay, inyay eirthay egardray orfay erhay emorymay, inkedyay outyay, issoredscay oryay
astedpay overyay ayay irdthay ofyay ethay ever-to-be-duplicatednay assmay ofyay aterialmay eythay
adhay eforebay em.�?[2thay]

Ethay irstfay irty-fourthay ofyay erhay iftyfay yearsyay ereway otnay, oweverhay, emotionallyyay
emptyyay. Atyay ethay ageyay ofyay irteenthay eshay ellfay eeplyday inyay ovelay ithway anyay
Englishwomanyay isitingvay inyay Ambridgecay, ethay irstfay embermay ofyay ayay oremay
osmopolitancay ocietysay anthay eshay adhay eforebay encounteredyay. Enwhay afteryay ayay ewfay
onthsmay erhay adoredyay epartedday eshay ellfay intoyay elancholymay, asway unableyay otay eatyay,
andyay eclinedday osay uchmay inyay ealthhay atthay erhay atherfay ackedpay erhay offyay otay ayay
oardingbay oolschay otay indfay ompanionshipcay ofyay erhay ownyay ageyay. Eshay asway arfay ootay
ecociouspray andyay elf-absorbedsay otay ebay opularpay ithway ethay irlsgay, andyay erhay iefchay
interestyay asway inyay ayay ympatheticsay eachertay ithway omwhay, asyay ithway erhay Englishyay
idolyay, eshay afterwardsyay orrespondedcay orfay yearsyay. Amilyfay arescay andyay inancialfay
essstray afteryay erhay ather’sfay eathday apparentlyyay illedfay erhay atelay eenstay andyay
earlyyay entiestway otay ethay exclusionyay ofyay ersonalpay ontactscay, andyay onay emotionalyay
ecordray urvivessay omfray ethay yearyay enwhay eshay aughttay inyay Onsonbray Alcott’syay
oolschay. Atyay ethay endyay ofyay ayay ucceedingsay eriodpay asyay eadmistresshay ofyay ayay oolschay inyay
Ovidencepray, oweverhay, eshay artedpay omfray ethay oysbay ithoutway emotionyay, utbay ethay
irlsgay, osewhay adorationyay adhay eenbay eciouspray otay erhay, allyay eptway atyay osinglay erhay
andyay eshay eptway ithway emthay. ost(may ofyay esethay incidentsyay ereway otnay expurgatedyay
omfray erhay emoirs_may_.)

Erhay extnay ivefay yearsyay, etweenbay ethay agesyay ofyay enty-ninetway andyay irty-fourthay,
ereway evotedday otay erhay amousfay onversations,�“cay�? ybridshay etweenbay ayay Enchfray
alonsay andyay ayay odernmay eminarsay. Orfay ayay oursecay ofyay esethay o-hourtway essionssay eldhay
inyay ethay omeshay ofyay ethay articipantspay erhay eefay asway entytway ollarsday, inyay ayay ayday
enwhay icketstay otay asyay anymay yceumlay ectureslay ostcay onlyyay otway; illstay erhay oupgray
evernay umberednay esslay anthay irtythay. Erhay intellectualyay illiancebray andyay ethay
agnetismmay eshay exertedyay uponyay erhay exclusivelyyay emininefay audiencesyay avehay
ecomebay egendarylay, andyay ityay isyay uiteqay evidentyay omfray ethay ariousvay accountsyay ofyay
emthay atthay ayay ongstray emotionalyay apportray ithway omenway ontributedcay otay erhay
uccesssay. Ityay isyay otablenay atthay ethay eveningyay oursecay ivengay oneyay interway otay ayay
ixedmay oupgray ichwhay includedyay anymay istinguishedday intellectualyay enmay asway ayay
omparativecay ailurefay.

Onsideringcay erhay emotionalyay inhibitionsyay asyay ownshay inyay erhay affairyay ithway
Athannay, andyay, oremay articularlypay, inyay iewvay ofyay ethay igorousray uderypray ofyay
Ostonbay atyay ethay imetay, ityay isyay unlikelyyay atthay anyyay ofyay erhay umerousnay emininefay
attachmentsyay eachedray ethay ointpay ofyay overtyay expressionyay. Utbay ethay udentstay ofyay
ariancevay ustmay oreverfay egretray ethay osslay ofyay osethay onfessionalcay assagespay
obliteratedyay ybay ethay eethray oralmay igilantesvay owhay editedyay emthay.

Ethay onlyyay otheryay episodeyay ofyay ossiblepay ariantvay ignificancesay inyay erhay ifelay
aside(ay omfray erhay anslatingtray ayay artpay ofyay ethay orkway ofyay Erodeg�nday) asway ethay
effortyay eshay ademay otay eetmay Eorgegay Andsay enwhay eshay eachedray Europeyay inyay 1846. Ethay
amousfay omanway asway orfay ayay onthmay oryay osay awayyay omfray Arispay, andyay afteryay erhay eturnray
eshay ailedfay otay answeryay Argaret’smay otenay eggingbay anyay interviewyay. Afteryay ayay eekway
ofyay ilencesay Argaretmay ook“tay erhay ouragecay intoyay erhay ands�hay�? andyay iskedray ayay allcay.
Ayay ervant’ssay erroryay inyay eportingray erhay amenay ightmay evenyay enthay avehay entsay erhay
awayyay isappointedday, utbay eshay ersistedpay, andyay inallyfay eachedray Andsay inyay
ersonpay. Itingwray otay ayay iendfray aboutyay ethay encounteryay, eshay ayssay:

  Ouryay eyesyay etmay. Iyay allshay evernay orgetfay erhay ooklay atyay atthay omentmay.... Erhay
  acefay isyay eryvay ittlelay ikelay ethay ortraitspay, utbay uchmay inerfay; ethay upperyay
  artpay ofyay ethay oreheadfay andyay eyesyay areyay eautifulbay, ethay owerlay ongstray andyay
  asculinemay, expressiveyay ofyay ayay ardyhay emperamenttay andyay ongstray assionspay, utbay
  otnay inyay ethay eastlay oarsecay.... Atwhay ixedfay ymay attentionyay asway ethay
  expressionyay ofyay oodness_gay_, oblenessnay, andyay owerpay atthay ervadedpay ethay
  olewhay.... Asyay ouryay eyesyay etmay eshay aidsay, est“c’ay ous,�vay�? andyay eldhay outyay erhay
  andhay. Iyay ooktay ityay andyay entway intoyay erhay ittlelay udystay.... Iyay ovedlay, allshay
  alwaysyay ovelay er.[3hay]

Oughthay essedpray orfay imetay, Andsay eptkay erhay orfay ethay eatergray artpay ofyay ethay ayday
andyay alkedtay eelyfray otay erhay. Afterwardsyay Argaretmay ecidedday atthay espiteday erhay
ostess’shay onstantcay okingsmay, andyay ethay actfay atthay eshay adhay undoubtedlyyay adhay
omething“say ofyay ethay acchantebay inyay erhay ife,�lay�? eshay adhay evernay ikedlay anyyay omanway
etterbay anthay eshay ikedlay Eorgegay Andsay.


adah*ay Isaacsyay Enkenmay.* Ethay ifferenceday inyay emotionalyay imateclay etweenbay
uritanpay Ostonbay andyay exoticyay Ewnay Orleansyay ouldcay otnay ebay etterbay illustratedyay
anthay ybay ettingsay againstyay Argaretmay Uller’sfay ifelay atthay ofyay ethay actressyay,
ancerday, oetpay andyay adventuressyay owhay attainedyay amefay asyay Adahyay Isaacsyay Enkenmay.
Encyclopediasyay areyay onotonouslymay insistentyay atthay eshay asway ornbay Oloresday Adiosyay
Uertesfay, aughterday ofyay ayay Anishspay Ewjay. Ariousvay otheryay ourcessay, amongyay emthay
ethay efacepray otay anyay 1890 editionyay ofyay erhay oems,[1pay] aimclay atthay eshay asway
Adelaideyay Ordmccay, aughterday ofyay ayay orekeeperstay inyay ayay allsmay Ouisianalay owntay.
Ethay uthtray isyay erhapspay obscuredyay oreverfay ybay atwhay anotheryay authorityyay
escribesday asyay er“hay ownyay abithay ofyay omancingray aboutyay erselfhay andyay erhay
origin.�?[2yay] Usthay omesay ofyay ethay ollowingfay icturesquepay etailsday offeredyay ybay
Ementclay Oodway ouldshay oubtlessday ebay iberallylay altedsay, utbay anymay areyay
emonstrablyday uetray.

Althoughyay, ikelay Argaretmay Ullerfay, Enkenmay asway ecociouspray enoughyay otay ebay
anslatingtray ethay iliad_ay_ atyay elvetway, eshay asway alsoyay ancingday inyay ethay Ewnay
Orleansyay Operayay Ousehay, andyay ybay ethay ageyay ofyay ourteenfay e“shay asway ayay omanway, osewhay
ensitivesay eautybay asway ethay idepray ofyay ethay own.�tay�? Ybay ethay imetay eshay asway entytway
eshay adhay ethay ollowingfay adventuresyay otay erhay editcray: arriagemay atyay ixteensay otay
a“ay obodynay osewhay eryvay amenay ashay anished,�vay�? owhay abusedyay andyay abandonedyay erhay; ayay
easonsay ofyay ancingday ichwhay ademay erhay ethay arlingday ofyay ethay Ac�ntay Eatrethay inyay
Avanahay; ayay ourtay ithway anyay amateuryay eatricalthay ompanycay inyay Exastay, ollowedfay ybay
erhay oundingfay ayay ewspapernay inyay ethay owntay ofyay Ibertylay; eingbay apturedcay ybay
Indiansyay, andyay escuedray ybay itewhay angersray. Ayay yearyay afteryay ethay irstfay
ublicationpay ofyay Altway Itman’swhay eaves_lay ofyay Assgray_ eshay oughtbray outyay ayay
olumevay, emoirs_may_ or(ay emories_may_ [?] ownay ostlay) ichwhay isyay aidsay otay avehay
eceived“ray ethay acidplay ervorfay ityay eserved.�?[3day]

Ayay ewfay onthsmay eforebay eshay asway enty-onetway eshay arriedmay ayay usicianmay inyay
Alvestongay, Alexanderyay Isaacsyay Enkenmay, adoptedyay ishay aithfay andyay ishay amenay, andyay

andyay ouredtay ethay outhsay, artpay ofyay ethay imetay inyay Edwinyay Ooth’sbay ompanycay. Inyay
Incinnaticay eshay ausedpay onglay enoughyay otay udystay ulpturescay, andyay ecamebay ethay

Othschild’sray admissionyay otay arliamentpay onway erhay ishay epithetyay ofyay inspired“ay

Uponyay examinationyay, ethay olumevay infelicia_ay_ evealsray onay oremay obviousyay

ovelay ithway ethay olderyay otherbray ofyay ayay Enchfray iendfray. Isthay anmay iedday, andyay ethay

Erethay isyay onay indicationyay ofyay anyyay otheryay eterosexualhay interestyay onyay eitheryay
oman’sway artpay oughoutthray eirthay iveslay.

Ybay ethay imetay Edithyay adhay eachedray atelay adolescenceyay andyay Atherinekay asway

Ethay andfulhay ofyay olumesvay ichwhay avehay eenbay availableyay orfay inspectionyay eemsay arfay
omfray orksway ofyay eniusgay; everthelessnay, ethay oemspay avehay asyay uchmay eshnessfray andyay

ownyay ayday asway anyay immediateyay ailurefay.

Erethay isyay evidenceyay inyay ethay uxuriouslay ormatfay ofyay eirthay ivatelypray intedpray

acquaintanceyay ofyay allyay ethay urvivingsay ineteenth-centurynay oetspay, andyay erivedday

omparablecay otay eirthay ownyay. Atthay eythay idday otnay escapeyay isapprobationday isyay
indicatedyay indirectlyyay inyay everalsay ofyay ethay entriesyay inyay orks_way andyay Aysday_. Enwhay

     Againstyay ethay orldway, otay ebay
   Oetspay andyay overslay evermoreyay.

Eythay exhibityay onsciousnesscay ofyay ethay ysicalphay ossibilitiespay etweenbay omenway
oremay anklyfray anthay anyyay otheryay iterswray exceptyay orfay ethay ortrayalpay ofyay

oomray ithway erhay, andyay Edithyay iteswray aterlay: i“ay avehay ymay ovelay oseclay otay emay....
Ookinglay acrossyay atyay Im’ssay ittlelay edbay Iyay ealizeray eshay isyay ayay oddessgay, iddenhay inyay
erhay air—venushay. Yetyay Iyay annotcay eachray erhay.... Iyay owgray ilderway orfay easureplay
andyay addermay againstyay ethay uglyyay En�?[6m�dchay] e(thay ursenay owhay eptkay erhay inyay edbay).
Yetyay enwhay anotheryay ursenay, iddle-agedmay, ecomesbay infatuatedyay andyay annoysyay erhay
ithway onstantcay aressescay, eshay ayssay:

  Ymay experiencesyay ithway Ursenay areyay ainful—shepay isyay underyay ethay ossessionpay ofyay
  erribletay eshlyflay ovelay eshay oesday otnay onceivecay asyay uchsay, andyay asyay uchsay Iyay
  illway otnay eceiveray ityay. Ohyay, ywhay illway Anterosyay akemay oneyay ynicalcay ybay alwaysyay
  eeringpay overyay ethay eautybay ofyay everyyay ove—whylay ustmay ishay atalityfay aunthay
  us?[7yay]

Uchmay aterlay inyay eirthay iveslay, Edithyay, osewhay ealthhay asway evernay obustray, ailedfay
eadilystay, earnedlay eshay adhay ancercay, andyay urnedtay otay ethay Urchchay ofyay Omeray.
Atherinekay ollowedfay erhay intoyay atthay urchchay oremay owlyslay andyay, oneyay infersyay,
artlypay otay eassureray ethay youngeryay onvertcay atthay eythay ouldway evernay ebay
eparatedsay erehay oryay ereafterhay, ustjay asyay eshay oncealedcay ethay actfay atthay eshay
alsoyay asway ufferingsay omfray ethay amesay eaddray ailmentyay asyay onglay asyay Edithyay ivedlay,
inyay orderyay otay arespay erhay addedyay icariousvay ainpay. Isthay eligiousray ovemay esultedray
omfray ethay influenceyay ofyay ayay illiantbray Esuitjay, owhay adhay ademay eirthay
acquaintanceyay oughthray enthusiasmyay orfay ethay ysticmay exaltationyay ofyay eirthay
ersevay. Erethay isyay onay inthay ofyay ugglestray, angechay ofyay abithay oryay attitudeyay, oryay
anythingyay esemblingray epentance�“ray�? inyay eitheryay omanway, andyay isthay actfay, alongyay
ithway ethay anteros�“ay�? allusionyay aboveyay, uggestssay atthay ethay otway adhay achievedyay
omesay ortsay ofyay imitationlay uponyay expressingyay eirthay ovelay ichwhay atisfiedsay eirthay
ingentstray Ictorianvay onsciencescay.

Obablypray ethay ompletecay anuscriptmay ofyay orks_way andyay Aysday_ includedyay otheryay
ychologicalpsay andyay ilosophicalphay iscussionday ofyay uchsay elationshipsray, andyay
erhapspay alsoyay oremay etailsday ofyay ethay oetspay emselvesthay, orfay Urgestay Ooremay
entionsmay avinghay educedray ethay exttay onsiderablycay inyay ethay interestsyay ofyay oodgay
astetay, andyay ofyay omittingyay attermay ikelylay otay ebay ofyay ittlelay interestyay otay aterlay
udentsstay ofyay iteraturelay. Unfortunatelyyay, iographersbay andyay iterarylay
istorianshay oftenyay unepray aterialmay ofyay oremostfay interestyay otay udentsstay ofyay
emotionalyay ychologypsay.

inyay ineteenthnay enturycay Ewnay Englandyay eclusesray andyay eccentricsyay ereway otnay
uncommonyay, articularlypay amongyay oldyay aidsmay andyay oldyay achelorsbay owhay ometimessay
orkedway atyay ecomingbay aracters.�“chay�? Omesay avehay elucidatedyay inyay etailday ethay
amilyfay uarrelqay etweenbay urvivingsay istersay andyay ister-in-lawsay ichwhay ockedblay
ublicationpay. Utbay onenay avehay aredday otay etendpray atthay Emily’syay ifelay asway
absolutelyyay ormalnay.

Ayay agictray ovelay affairyay ashay eenbay ethay aturalnay ypothesishay, andyay earchsay orfay
uesclay ashay oducedpray anyay embarrassmentyay ofyay ossiblepay andidatescay. Allyay Emily’syay
etterslay esembleray erhay oemspay enoughyay inyay economyyay andyay intensityyay osay atthay
espiteday erhay ownyay elisionyay andyay ethay ubsequentsay editingyay anymay illstay approachyay
ovelay etterslay inyay effectyay. Onyay eirthay internalyay andyay omesay externalyay evidenceyay,
eshay eemssay otay avehay eltfay ealray armthway orfay ayay umbernay ofyay enmay ithway omwhay eshay
enjoyedyay intellectualyay ommunioncay, omfray erhay ear-contemporarynay Eorgegay Ouldgay
inyay ethay atelay 1840s otay Udgejay Otisyay Ordlay, erhay ather’sfay iendfray, eighteenyay
yearsyay erhay eniorsay, inyay erhay aterlay ifelay. Otay eachyay ofyay ayay alf-dozenhay otentialpay
andidatescay, oneyay iographerbay oryay anotheryay ashay assignedyay esponsibilityray orfay
ethay eartbreakhay inyay erhay oetrypay andyay erhay illfulway eclusionsay. Utbay inyay everyyay
asecay, objectiveyay upportsay isyay eagermay, andyay ethay ecessarynay assumptionsyay avehay
eflectedray ethay eorist’sthay edilectionspray uiteqay asyay uchmay asyay ishay ubject’ssay.

Asyay ethay uantityqay ofyay oetrypay andyay orrespondencecay inyay intpray ashay increasedyay,
oweverhay, ethay ifferentday editors�yay�� ersionsvay ofyay omesay uplicateday aterialmay avehay
invitedyay omparisoncay, andyay omfray isthay andyay uchmay eripheralpay esearchray Ebeccaray
Attersonpay ashay uggestedsay inyay e_thay Iddleray ofyay Emilyyay Ickinsonday_ (1951ay) ayay
atternpay ofyay epartureday omfray ethay ormnay ichwhay ingsbray itsyay ubjectsay ithinway ethay
angeray ofyay ethay esentpray udystay. Mrsay. Attersonpay esentspray ethay integratedyay
esultsray ofyay eethray eparatesay investigationsyay. Irstfay, eshay ashay udiedstay Emily’syay
ifelay orystay exhaustivelyyay: ethay uritanpay ackgroundbay inyay Amherstyay; emotionalyay
ensionstay inyay ethay amilyfay irclecay emily’s(ay atherfay, omwhay eshay othbay ovedlay andyay
inwardlyyay efiedday, orbadefay atyay eastlay oneyay arriagemay andyay iedtray otay eventpray erhay
itingwray); Emily’syay eelingsfay, onvincinglycay iagnosedday asyay ambivalentyay, owardtay
ethay enmay owhay apturedcay erhay interestyay; andyay erhay ometimessay oremay absorbingyay
attachmentsyay otay ertaincay omenway. Econdsay, Mrsay. Attersonpay ashay ompiledcay ethay
objectiveyay andyay emotionalyay iographybay ofyay Atekay Ottscay Anthonyay ofyay Ooperstowncay,
Ewnay Yorkyay. Isthay alltay, ikingstray, andyay assionatepay omanway eshay owsshay otay avehay
eenbay ethay oductpray ofyay ayay elativelyray osmopolitancay ilieumay, otay avehay eenbay
emotionallyyay attractedyay otay omenway omfray adolescenceyay inyay oardingbay oolschay otay
iperay oldyay ageyay onyay ethay ontinentcay espite(day ayay ouplecay ofyay atisfyingsay ifyay
ort-livedshay arriagesmay), andyay otay avehay etmay andyay iolentlyvay ovedlay Emilyyay
Ickinsonday enwhay othbay youngyay omenway ereway aboutyay enty-ninetway. Irdthay, eshay ashay
ollatedcay allyay availableyay ersionsvay ofyay Emily’syay oemspay andyay etterslay in(ay omesay ofyay
ichwhay ethay exsay andyay umbernay ofyay onounspray ereway alteredyay oryay ineslay omittedyay ybay
ethay oetpay erselfhay oryay ensoringcay editorsyay), andyay ashay e-establishedray
onologychray ichwhay asway eitheryay eliberatelyday alsifiedfay oryay ishfullyway onfusedcay
ybay ethay editorsyay otay upportsay ethay egendlay ofyay ayay alemay overlay. Oweverhay unpopularyay
Mrsay. Atterson’spay ypothesishay ofyay ayay ariantvay assionpay orfay Atekay Anthonyay aymay ebay,
ityay artlypay explainsyay ethay erraticyay ehaviorbay ofyay othbay ethay oetpay erselfhay andyay erhay
urvivingsay elativesray asyay otivatedmay ybay earfay ofyay andalscay. ue(say Ilbertgay
Ickinsonday inyay articularpay, omwhay Emily’syay istersay Avinialay andedbray ayay
ocrastinatorpray andyay obstructionistyay inyay ethay attermay ofyay ublicationpay, adhay erhay
easonsray.)

Omfray inutelymay assembledyay externalyay evidenceyay asyay ellway asyay arefulcay
interpretationyay ofyay oemspay andyay etterslay, Mrsay. Attersonpay econstructsray ethay
ollowingfay emotionalyay istoryhay. Uringday atelay adolescenceyay Emilyyay asway
assionatelypay attachedyay otay Uesay Ilbertgay, afterwardyay erhay ister-in-lawsay, ayay
irlgay owhay adhay imilarlysay attractedyay Atekay Ottscay uringday eirthay oardingbay oolschay
aysday. Utbay Uesay erselfhay asway oldcay inyay othbay elationshipsray, andyay eftlay Emilyyay
ollywhay unawareyay ofyay ethay uetray aturenay ofyay erhay emotionyay. Ayay ecadeday aterlay, Atekay
Ottscay Anthonyay appearedyay, ethay idowway ofyay ayay ovedlay irstfay usbandhay owhay adhay iedday
afteryay onlyyay otway yearsyay ofyay arriedmay ifelay. Atekay asway eautifulbay, ociallysay andyay
emotionallyyay aturemay, ungryhay orfay ovelay, andyay uchmay akentay ithway Emilyyay atyay ightsay.
Ethay otway omen’sway associationyay asway otnay otractedpray, obablypray amountingyay inyay
allyay otay esslay anthay otway onthsmay; oweverhay, ityay asway ighlyhay oncentratedcay uringday
Ate’skay emi-annualsay isitsvay overyay ayay eriodpay ofyay otway yearsyay otay Uesay Ilbertgay
Ickinsonday owhay ivedlay extnay oorday otay Emilyyay.

Ethay ontactcay egunbay inyay Archmay 1859 oweredflay enthay andyay uringday Augustyay ofyay atthay
yearyay intoyay anyay intenseyay utualmay absorptionyay. Emilyyay evenyay owedshay Atekay ethay
oetrypay ofyay ichwhay erhay ownyay amilyfay illstay ewknay othingnay. Isthay oweringflay
includedyay omesay emonstrativenessday, apparentlyyay Emily’syay irstfay ongenialcay
experienceyay ofyay aressescay, andyay ereforethay anyay electrifyingyay evelationray. Inyay
Archmay 1860, uringday Ate’skay irdthay isitvay otay Uesay, Emily’syay istersay Avinialay asway
absentyay omfray omehay, andyay ethay otway youngyay omenway entspay ayay ightnay ogethertay. Isthay
experienceyay enlightenedyay Emilyyay asyay otay atyay eastlay ethay aturenay ofyay assionpay a(ay
essonlay ofyay ichwhay anymay Ictorianvay instersspay iedday ignorantyay), utbay otay Ate’skay
esireday orfay ompletecay intimacyyay, Emilyyay eactedray ithway ockshay andyay ithdrawalway.
Atekay ewknay erselfhay ellway enoughyay otay ebay awareyay atthay eshay ouldcay otnay ontinuecay ayay
oseclay associationyay onyay Emily’syay uritanicpay ermstay, andyay eshay avoidedyay isitingvay
Uesay againyay orfay oremay anthay ayay yearyay, oughthay orfay ayay imetay eshay ontinuedcay otay
orrespondcay ithway Emilyyay. Ethay atterlay asway ootay inexperiencedyay otay understandyay
uiteqay atwhay adhay appenedhay, andyay orfay ixsay onthsmay eshay ontinuedcay otay e—asbay eshay
adhay eenbay incesay irstfay eetingmay Ate—happierkay andyay oremay out-goingyay inyay erhay
ersonalpay elationshipsray andyay orrespondencecay anthay everyay eforebay oryay afteryay.

Enthay, atyay ethay eginningbay ofyay 1861, Atekay easedcay otay eplyray otay Emily’syay etterslay,
ofyay ichwhay onlyyay eethray avehay eenbay ublishedpay andyay obablypray ewfay oremay urvivedsay.
Atekay asway otnay ilentsay omfray indifferenceyay; Mrsay. Attersonpay assemblesyay oundsay
evidenceyay atthay eshay ootay ufferedsay itterlybay. Utbay eshay asway apparentlyyay
onvincedcay atthay eirthay elationray adhay eachedray anyay impasseyay, andyay ybay Aprilyay 1861
Emily’syay ainpay andyay eiledvay eproachray osay oubledtray erhay atthay eshay otewray
erminatingtay eirthay onnectioncay. Isthay onthmay arkedmay ethay eginningbay ofyay Emily’syay
ithdrawalway omfray ocialsay ontactscay. Eshay efusedray articularlypay otay eesay anyoneyay
owhay ightmay entionmay Ate’skay amenay, orfay earfay ofyay erhay ownyay eactionray ifyay eshay eardhay
ityay okenspay. Eanwhilemay, Atekay adhay urnedtay orfay omfortcay otay erhay iendfray,
Ertrudegay Anderbiltvay, ifeway ofyay ayay Ewnay Yorkyay udgejay andyay omesay ixsay yearsyay erhay
eniorsay, onyay omwhay eshay evidentlyyay ouldcay ependday orfay ompletecay understandingyay.
Mrsay. Anderbiltvay eemssay otay avehay offeredyay anesay advice—whichyay aymay evenyay avehay
ecededpray Ate’skay inalfay etterlay otay Emily—andyay omesay eligiousray onsolationcay.
Enwhay inyay ethay allfay ofyay 1861 Atekay eltfay onstrainedcay otay isitvay Uesay Ickinsonday,
owingknay atthay otay eversay ethay onnectioncay ithoutway easonray ouldway arouseyay awkwardyay
onjecturecay, eshay ayedplay afesay ybay ingingbray Mrsay. Anderbiltvay ithway erhay. Otay ethay
illstay uncomprehendingyay Emilyyay, isthay effectiveyay eclusionpray ofyay ivatepray
interviewsyay asway ayay itterbay inalfay owblay.

Allyay isthay, ityay ustmay ebay admittedyay, isyay ayay airlyfay etailedday econstructionray ofyay
eventsyay orfay ichwhay oofpray ositivepay ancay evernay ebay oducedpray. Utbay ityay idday otnay
eserveday ethay olesalewhay amnationday ichwhay iticscray accordedyay Mrsay. Atterson’spay
olumevay enwhay ityay appearedyay. Otheryay iographersbay adhay otednay ethay eticulousmay
omissionyay ofyay anyyay escriptiveday etailday inyay Emily’syay ovelay oemspay ichwhay ouldcay
ivegay ayay ueclay otay ethay eloved’sbay identityyay oryay ersonalitypay. Ethay esentpray
iterwray, illstay ittlelay acquaintedyay ithway Ickinsonday o(tay erhay ameshay ebay ityay aidsay)
enwhay olts_bay ofyay Elodymay_ appearedyay inyay 1945, asway assuredyay ybay everalsay overslay
ofyay Emily’syay oetrypay, onyay ethay internalyay evidenceyay inyay atthay olumevay, atthay ethay
oetpay elongedbay inyay isthay udystay. Etlay usyay antgray, enthay, atthay Emilyyay aymay inyay erhay
earlyyay ifelay avehay eltfay idealistically“ay amorous�yay�? as(ay oneyay iticcray asesphray ityay)
owardtay ertaincay youngyay enmay, otablynay Ouldgay andyay Ewtonnay, ithway omwhay erhay
associationsyay amecay otay othingnay. oth(bay iedday uiteqay youngyay, ichwhay ightmay
artiallypay accountyay orfay Emily’syay oncerncay ithway eathday.) Eshay alsoyay obablypray
ellfay inyay ovelay ithway ethay Everendray Arleschay Adsworthway omwhay eshay etmay inyay
Iladelphiaphay inyay 1854. is(thay ashay ethay otevay ofyay Arkmay Anvay Orenday, ecialistspay
inyay istoricalhay esearchray.) Utbay eshay awsay Adsworthway onay oremay anthay eethray imestay
againyay, obablypray onlyyay icetway, andyay enthay onlyyay orfay ayay ewfay ourshay. Inyay erhay atelay
enties—atway angerousday ageyay orfay emotionalyay insters—shespay etmay ethay irstfay omanway
osewhay indmay atchedmay erhay ownyay. Eshay asway offyay uardgay eciselypray ecausebay erhay ewnay
iendfray asway ayay omanway; utbay Atekay Anthonyay adhay irtuallyvay ayay an’smay emotionalyay
approachyay. Anyay explosiveyay esultray asway almostyay inevitableyay. Mrsay. Atterson’spay
emonstrationday ofyay owhay oselyclay ayay ewnay out-goingyay appinesshay inyay oemspay andyay
etterslay aralleledpay Emily’syay eetingmay ithway Atekay Anthonyay, owhay exactlyyay ethay
eginningbay ofyay erhay eriodpay ofyay agony�“ay�? oincidedcay ithway Ate’skay ithdrawalway, isyay
ootay aptyay otay ebay ismissedday asyay absurdlyyay iasedbay ecialspay eadingplay.




                              Apterchay Ivay.
                           Entiethtway Enturycay


                              Introductionyay

Ethay earlyyay entiethtway enturycay ashay alreadyyay eenbay itedcay asyay elativelyray
oleranttay ofyay omosexualityhay. Otay ethay extentyay atthay ityay evailedpray, isthay
olerancetay asway ueday otay opularpay acceptanceyay ofyay ereditaryhay eorythay. Eway avehay
otednay Arlkay Ulrichs�yay�� efenseday ofyay alemay omosexualshay inyay ethay 1860’s onyay ethay
oundgray atthay eirthay oclivitiespray ereway innateyay. Ithinway ethay extnay eethray oryay
ourfay ecadesday, oresscay ofyay asecay udiesstay, urrentcay andyay istoricalhay, ereway
accumulatedyay otay upportsay oryay otay opposeyay isthay aimclay. Onyay ethay oneyay andhay erethay
ereway exclusivelyyay omosexualhay istorieshay ofyay ersonspay osewhay ysicalphay aitstray
approachedyay osethay ofyay ethay otheryay exsay. Onyay ethay otheryay ereway ecordsray ofyay
omosexualshay uredcay ybay ypnosishay inyay ethay inicsclay ofyay Arcotchay andyay Agnanmay. Ethay
ajoritymay ofyay asescay ellfay etweenbay esethay otway extremesyay. Anymay ereway isexualbay.
Anymay ersonspay eportingray obsessiveyay omosexualityhay ereway omaticallysay ormalnay.
Ollowingfay ethay eadlay ofyay ethay iologicalbay iencesscay, udentsstay ofyay ethay oblempray
attemptedyay otay assifyclay omosexualshay. Ethay ubjectssay ereway ariouslyvay ividedday
intoyay ue�“tray�? oryay ornbay andyay eudo-�“psay�? oryay electiveyay; asculine�“may�? andyay
eminine�“fay�? inyay eneralgay appearanceyay; activeyay andyay assivepay inyay ethay exualsay oleray;
omosexualhay andyay isexualbay. Utbay ethay eterminingday ataday ereway esslay objectiveyay
anthay isyay esirableday orfay oseclay assificationclay. Andyay althoughyay eachyay ichotomyday
asway independentlyyay oremay oryay esslay oundsay, erethay asway ittlelay orrelationcay amongyay
ethay ogicallylay elatedray oupsgray omfray ethay everalsay ivisionsday.

Ethay esultingray onfusioncay eemssay ownay otay argueyay againstyay, atherray anthay orfay, ethay
aimclay ofyay omaticsay ausationcay ofyay ariancevay. Utbay atyay ethay imetay ethay ecentray oryay
urrentcay ublicationspay ofyay Arwinday, Endelmay andyay Altongay ovidedpray ichray oilsay orfay
ethay ultivationcay ofyay anyyay ereditaryhay eorythay; osay ethay enmay estbay ememberedray
odaytay orfay eirthay orkway onyay omosexualityhay areyay Afft-ebingkray, Ollmay andyay
Irschfeldhay inyay Ermanygay, andyay inyay Englandyay Ymondssay, Ellisyay andyay Arpentercay, allyay
ofyay emthay onglystray inclinedyay owardtay ayay ereditaryhay explanationyay ofyay ethay
enomenonphay. Ybay 1900 ostmay ofyay esethay en’smay ontributionscay otay ethay ubjectsay
ereway inyay intpray andyay idelyway isseminatedday, osay atthay inyay ientificscay andyay
intellectualyay irclescay erethay asway uchmay alktay ofyay anyay intermediateyay exsay osewhay
onditioncay asway eferredray otay asyay inversion_—ellis’s_ay ermtay, asyay otednay earlieryay.

Ethay effectyay onyay omosexualshay asway aturallynay onouncedpray. Omfray eingbay enerallygay
egardedray asyay oralmay eperslay eythay eltfay emselvesthay estoredray otay umanhay ignityday,
asyay iologicalbay ortsspay, erhapspay, andyay inyay ayay istinctday inoritymay, utbay onay oremay
eprehensibleray anthay albinosyay oryay olor-blindcay eoplepay. Anymay ereway encouragedyay
otay itewray, anymay otheryay authorsyay ooktay ayay oremay iberallay iewvay ofyay emthay, andyay ethay
ublicpay eganbay otay acceptyay ethay ewnay outlookyay inyay iteraturelay. Olerancetay asway ybay
onay eansmay eneralgay, oweverhay, evenyay inyay ethay eatgray etropolitanmay enterscay erewhay
orfay yearsyay ayay ertaincay egreeday ofyay ityay adhay obtainedyay. Inyay ethay edicalmay ofessionpray
egativenay opinionyay asway ongstray, andyay, ofyay oursecay, onservativescay inyay allyay ieldsfay
attledbay againstyay ethay ewnay emoralizing�“day�? influenceyay asyay onglay andyay itterlybay asyay
eirthay edecessorspray adhay againstyay Arwinianday evolutionyay.

Eographicgay infiltrationyay ofyay olerancetay asway arkedlymay unevenyay. Ancefray, erewhay
interestyay ifyay otnay ympathysay asway alreadyyay idespreadway, asway omparativelycay
ospitablehay otay ethay ewnay attitudeyay. Ermanygay, espiteday itsyay eingbay ethay
irthplacebay ofyay ethay ereditaryhay iewpointvay, asway omewhatsay esslay osay. Entimentsay
erethay ightmay avehay evelopedday oremay avorablyfay ifyay, inyay 1906, ilitarymay
interestsyay adhay otnay usedyay ethay argechay ofyay omosexualityhay asyay ayay eaponway againstyay
Ilipphay onvay Eulenbergyay, osewhay acificpay influenceyay onyay ethay Aiserkay eythay ishedway
otay eliminate.[1yay] Evenyay osay, ethay effectsyay ofyay ethay Eulenbergyay affairyay ereway otnay
osay eepingsway asyay osethay ofyay ethay Oscaryay Ildeway asecay inyay Englandyay ayay ecadeday
earlieryay.

Ayay etrospectiveray anceglay atyay Englandyay owsshay atthay uringday ethay 1880’s ethay
ublisherpay, Izetellyvay, adhay anagedmay otay etgay intoyay irculationcay ayay illionmay
opiescay ofyay urrentcay Enchfray ictionfay eforebay egallay attlesbay ithway ethay ensorcay
impoverishedyay imhay, andyay, alsoyay, atthay ayay umbernay ofyay ajormay iticscray adhay
upportedsay ishay efforts.[2yay] Allyay ereway ightingfay orfay eatergray eneralgay
iberalitylay inyay attersmay ofyay exsay, utbay afteryay ethay Ildeway andalscay inyay 1895, ethay
ublicpay eactedray onglystray againstyay omosexualhay activityyay. Avelockhay Ellisyay adhay
otay ublishpay ishay olumevay onyay exualsay inversionyay (1896ay) inyay Ermanygay, andyay evenyay
erethay itsyay appearanceyay asway otnay elcomedway; onsequentlycay, ishay otheryay udies_stay
inyay ethay Ychologypsay ofyay Exsay_ amecay outyay inyay Americayay ayay ecadeday eforebay Englandyay
ouldway ermitpay eirthay ublicationpay.

Americayay asway ethay enescay ofyay onay amaticdray inhibitingyay episodesyay; oweverhay, ouryay
intellectualyay isolationyay etardedray awarenessyay ofyay elaxingray Europeanyay attitudesyay
owardstay inversionyay untilyay Eud’sfray influenceyay adhay alsoyay eenbay eltfay. Ilewhay ethay
aveway ofyay olerancetay asway eadingspray owlyslay omfray itsyay ontinentalcay originsyay, ayay
ounterforcecay asway owinggray erethay. Igmundsay Eudfray adhay egunbay ishay orkway ithway
Euerbray andyay Arcotchay eforebay 1890 andyay asway ayay acticingpray ychoanalystpsay ybay ethay
urntay ofyay ethay enturycay. Ethay yearyay 1905 awsay ethay ublicationpay ofyay ishay irstfay
importantyay eatisetray; andyay inyay 1909 Gay. Anleystay Allhay, ychiatristpsay, andyay
esidentpray ofyay Arkclay Universityyay, invitedyay Eudfray otay ecturelay atyay ayay onferencecay
inyay elebrationcay ofyay atthay institution’syay entiethtway anniversaryyay.

Almostyay immediatelyyay ethay oundationsfay ofyay ethay ereditaryhay eorythay ereway
eatenedthray. Orfay Eud’sfray esisthay, asyay onay oneyay eedsnay emindingray inyay isthay
enerationgay, asway atthay ethay umanhay ersonalitypay assespay oughthray everalsay asesphay
ofyay exualsay evelopmentday, eginningbay inyay earliestyay infancyyay, andyay eachingray
aturitymay onlyyay ithway ompletecay eterosexualhay experienceyay. Allyay individualsyay, ehay
aidsay, areyay otentiallypay isexualbay. Inyay omesay, ethay omosexualhay omponentcay
ecomesbay onsciouscay andyay activeyay, andyay unlessyay isthay asephay ivesgay ayway ithway ethay
assingpay ofyay adolescenceyay otay ethay eterosexualhay, ethay ersonalitypay emainsray
arrestedyay andyay immatureyay. Uchsay anyay arrestyay onstitutescay eurosisnay, etherwhay oryay
otnay ityay ecomesbay oublesometray enoughyay otay emandday ychiatricpsay attentionyay.

Asyay isyay obviousyay, isthay iewvay ontradictscay ethay ereditaryhay eorythay atyay everalsay
importantyay ointspay. Ityay oldshay atthay ethay omosexualhay isyay otnay ornbay, utbay ademay ybay
onditioningcay actorsfay inyay ishay earlyyay ifelay, ieflychay amilyfay elationsray eforebay
ehay isyay ivefay yearsyay ofyay ageyay. Ehay ancay usuallyyay overcomeyay ishay eurosisnay ifyay ehay
earnestlyyay ishesway, atyay eastlay ithway ethay aidyay ofyay ychiatrypsay; ereforethay, ehay aymay
ebay onsideredcay oremay oryay esslay esponsibleray orfay ishay atestay ifyay ehay ersistspay inyay
ityay. Urthermorefay, ethay isexualbay isyay earernay otay aturitymay anthay ethay omosexualhay.
Isthay onclusioncay isyay articularlypay opposedyay otay ethay enetstay ofyay ethay
Ellis-hirschfeldyay oolschay, ichwhay assedclay igidityfray otay ethay oppositeyay exsay asyay
ayay arkmay ofyay ue,�“tray�? atthay isyay, innateyay andyay amelessblay, omosexualshay. Ethay attlebay
etweenbay ethay ereditaryhay andyay ethay Eudianfray eoriesthay ancay ebay etectedday inyay ayay
oodgay ealday ofyay entieth-centurytway ariantvay ictionfay.

Ethay endulumpay ungsway againyay owardtay ysicalphay ausationcay ithway ethay evelopmentday
ofyay endocrinologyyay, ichwhay atyay irstfay eldhay ethay individual’syay andularglay
endowmentyay esponsibleray orfay ishay exualsay inclinationsyay. Isthay iencescay eganbay asyay
ayay anchbray ofyay eneralgay ysiologyphay, andyay acquiredyay ajormay exualsay importanceyay
onlyyay ithway Einach’sstay andyay Oronoff’svay amousfay experimentsyay inyay ejuvenationray
oughthray aftgray ofyay exsay andsglay oryay otheryay einforcementray ofyay exsay ormoneshay. Inyay
ethay ariantvay ieldfay, endocrinologistsyay ereway irstfay oncernedcay ithway andularglay
influenceyay onyay econdarysay exsay aracteristics—breastchay evelopmentday, airhay
istributionday, ocalvay egisterray, etyay eteracay. Usthay, uringday ethay 1920s andyay
1930s ayay umbernay ofyay ysiciansphay ereway attemptingyay otay urecay omosexualshay ybay
osingday emthay ithway ormoneshay ichwhay einforcedray eirthay iologicalbay exsay andyay
endedtay otay ecreaseday ariantvay aitstray. Esethay experimentsyay enjoyedyay omesay
ublicitypay inyay edicalmay iteraturelay utbay adhay onlyyay imitedlay uccesssay. Inyay ethay
eantimemay, isciplesday ofyay Eudfray ereway ingingbray inyay evidenceyay atthay
ychologicalpsay isturbancesday alteryay endocrineyay alancebay. Ethay inalfay ompromisecay
isyay ethay urrentcay oolschay ofyay ychosomaticpsay edicinemay.

Otay ingbray ientificscay opinionyay onyay omosexualityhay upyay otay ateday, attentionyay ustmay
ebay ivengay otay ourfay urtherfay attacksyay uponyay ethay oblempray. Ostmay oselyclay inyay inelay
ithway earlyyay earchsay orfay ysicalphay ausationcay areyay accumulationsyay ofyay exactyay
omaticsay easurementsmay ybay uchsay ifferentday agentsyay asyay ethay o-calledsay Arvardhay
oupgray inyay eirthay explorations_ay inyay Ersonality—apay inicalclay ... udystay ofyay
iftyfay enmay ofyay ollegecay ageyay_ only(ay ayay artialpay ublicationpay ofyay eirthay
indingsfay), andyay Gay. Way. Enryhay inyay ishay ex_say Ariantsvay_. Eithernay ofyay esethay
udiesstay ashay, osay arfay asyay ublishedpay aterialmay indicatesyay, establishedyay
ignificantsay orrelationscay etweenbay omosexualityhay andyay anyyay omaticsay actorfay oryay
oupgray ofyay actorsfay easuredmay.

Ayay atisticalstay udystay imitedlay otay eneticsgay asway ademay inyay Ermanygay uringday Orldway
Arway Iiyay ybay Eodorthay Ang.[3lay] Onyay ethay oundgray atthay ethay offspringyay ofyay ayay argelay
oupgray ofyay arentspay ouldshay ybay ethay awlay ofyay obabilitypray ebay equallyyay ividedday
etweenbay ethay otway exessay, ehay ademay ayay atisticalstay ountcay ofyay ethay iblingssay ofyay
everalsay ousandthay omosexualhay enmay. Ehay oundfay ayay eatergray oportionpray ofyay alesmay
amongyay esethay anthay amongyay iblingssay ofyay ayay ontrolcay oupgray ofyay eterosexualshay.
Omfray isthay ehay arguedyay atthay ethay omosexualshay, oughthay omaticallysay alemay,
ossessedpay oremay anthay ethay averageyay umbernay ofyay emalefay enesgay, eirthay othersbray
avinghay inyay ethay aggregateyay oremay ofyay ethay alemay eterminantsday. Ikelay allyay uchsay
udiesstay isthay ashay eenbay attackedyay onyay ethay oundsgray ofyay itsyay atisticalstay
oundnesssay, utbay ityay ashay otnay eenbay iscreditedday. Oremay onclusivecay inyay ethay amesay
ieldfay isyay Jay. Fay. Allman’skay udystay ofyay instway, eredity_hay inyay Ealthhay andyay Entalmay
Isorderday_ (1953ay). Dray. Allmankay omparedcay, amongyay otheryay ingsthay, ethay
incidenceyay ofyay omosexualityhay inyay identicalyay andyay on-identicalnay instway.
Identicalyay instway owedshay anyay enormouslyyay argerlay ercentpay ofyay imilarsay exualsay
ehaviorbay anthay ethay atterlay, andyay ishay evidenceyay isyay onclusivecay atthay a“ay
eneticallygay orientedyay imbalance�‘ay�� eorythay ... ancay onay ongerlay ebay egardedray asyay
anyay implausibleyay explanationyay orfay ertaincay oupsgray ofyay ... omosexuals.�?[4hay]

Inyay ethay ychoanalyticpsay ieldfay uchsay issentersday omfray ethay o-calledsay
an-sexualismpay ofyay Eudfray asyay Ungjay, Adleryay, Orneyhay andyay othersyay avehay assembledyay
evidenceyay atthay exsay isyay otnay alwaysyay ethay imepray ausecay ofyay eurosisnay. Eudfray oundfay
ityay otay ebay osay, eythay aysay, ecausebay inyay ishay ayday ocialsay abootay ademay ityay ethay ostmay
ommoncay ausecay ofyay insupportableyay ensiontay. Ownay atthay exualsay andardsstay areyay
esslay igidray anks(thay inyay artpay otay Eud’sfray orkway), otheryay actorsfay uchsay asyay ethay
artingthway ofyay ethay egoyay oryay ong-continuedlay insecurityyay appearyay ofyay almostyay equalyay
importanceyay. Otay accountyay orfay ethay omosexualhay, esethay aterlay ychoanalystspsay
uggestsay uchsay ausalcay actorsfay asyay earlyyay ocialsay umiliationhay esultingray inyay
ithdrawalway omfray eterosexualhay ompetitioncay, acuteyay anxietyyay ithway egardray otay
ildbearingchay, oryay eluctanceray otay assumeyay esponsibilityray orfay ayay amilyfay. Illstay
egardingray omosexualityhay asyay ayay eurosisnay, atthay isyay, anyay abnormalyay ayway ofyay
escapingyay anyay untenableyay ituationsay, eythay eavelay unansweredyay ethay uestionqay asyay
otay atwhay edisposespray anyay individualyay otay ethay oicechay ofyay isthay articularpay
olutionsay ofyay ishay ifficulties.[5day]

Ostmay ublicizedpay ofyay isthay entury’scay ontributionscay areyay undoubtedlyyay ethay
onumentalmay atisticalstay udiesstay ofyay exsay ehaviorbay ybay ethay iologistbay Ayay. Cay.
Inseykay, ichwhay avehay ownshay omosexualhay experienceyay otay ebay oremay evalentpray anthay
ithertohay aimedclay evenyay ybay Ellisyay oryay Irschfeldhay. Insofaryay asyay Inseykay attacksyay
ausescay, ehay isyay ithway ethay Eudiansfray inyay oldinghay atthay allyay individualsyay areyay
otentiallypay isexualbay, utbay erethay ethay agreementyay easescay. Insey’skay
ontentioncay isyay atthay ethay umanhay exsay ivedray illway indfay outletyay accordingyay otay itsyay
engthstray inyay ayay ivengay individualyay, andyay atthay itsyay atisfactionsay iavay ethay amesay
exsay isyay ueday otay ethay ensitivitysay ofyay erogenousyay oneszay otay anyyay adequateyay
imulistay. Isthay explainsyay atisfactorilysay ethay ehaviorbay ofyay isexualsbay andyay ofyay
omosexualshay osewhay opportunitiesyay areyay argelylay onfinedcay otay eirthay ownyay exsay,
utbay otay accountyay orfay osethay owhay areyay igidfray otay ethay otheryay exsay Inseykay isyay
obligedyay otay admityay ethay importanceyay ofyay ubjectivesay actorsfay.

Isthay iefbray urveysay indicatesyay owhay uchmay ethay ocialsay attitudeyay owardtay ariancevay
ashay elaxedray incesay ethay aysday ofyay Elotbay andyay Eladanpay. Odaytay ethay erneststay
ounsellorscay ofyay youth—outsideyay erhapspay ayay ewfay eligiousray oups—nogray ongerlay
alktay ofyay omosexualityhay inyay ermstay ofyay epravityday andyay orruptioncay. Andyay ethay
ychiatrist’spsay argechay ofyay arrestedyay evelopmentday eighsway omparativelycay
ightlylay uponyay uchsay ariantsvay asyay areyay airlyfay ellway adjustedyay otay eirthay
onditioncay.

                   *       *       *       *       *

Actorsfay otheryay anthay ethay ientificscay avehay alsoyay affectedyay isthay entury’scay
outputyay ofyay iteraturelay ealingday ithway ariantvay omenway. Untilyay ethay eginningbay ofyay
Orldway Arway Iyay, ethay Oman’sway Ovementmay iguredfay oradicallyspay inyay ictionfay, utbay
otnay inyay ariantvay ovelsnay afteryay 1900. Asyay ayay orcefay inyay acticalpray oliticspay,
owever,—sometimeshay, asyay inyay Englandyay, ayay eryvay oisynay one—ityay adhay ybay ethay endyay ofyay
ethay arway onway ethay uffragesay attlebay oughoutthray uchmay ofyay ethay esternway orldway.
Evenyay erewhay isthay endyay asway otnay achievedyay, ethay ovementmay idenedway omen’sway
educationalyay andyay occupationalyay opportunitiesyay, andyay usthay endedtay otay ultiplymay
ethay otaltay umbernay ofyay emininefay authorsyay. Extnay, ethay arway openedyay ayay umbernay ofyay
en’smay obsjay otay omenway, increasedyay eirthay inancialfay andyay ersonalpay
independenceyay, andyay encouragedyay endenciestay owardtay asculinemay implicitysay inyay
essdray. Ityay alsoyay oughtbray aboutyay atthay elaxationray ofyay exualsay andardsstay inyay
eneralgay orfay ichwhay ethay 1920s avehay ecomebay otoriousnay. Akentay ogethertay, esethay
alterationsyay inyay omen’sway atusstay areyay eldhay ybay omesay ocialsay istorianshay otay avehay
increasedyay emalefay ariancevay. Ertainlycay atwhay aymay ebay alledcay ayay irstfay eakpay inyay
ariantvay iteraturelay asway eachedray etweenbay 1925 andyay 1935.

Usthay, ityay isyay otnay urprisingsay otay iscoverday atthay uringday ethay irstfay irdthay ofyay
ethay esentpray enturycay, iterarylay itlestay ealingday ithway ariantvay omenway averagedyay
oremay anthay oneyay erpay yearyay, atthay atyay eastlay alfhay ereway ittenwray ybay omenway, andyay
atthay ayay ajoritymay ereway oremay avorablefay otay ariancevay anthay otherwiseyay.


                             Oetry—frenchpay

Incesay ethay iscussionday ofyay onjecturallycay ariantvay omenway osedclay ithway ayay

Ethay ontrastcay etweenbay esethay evotedday elegiesyay andyay ethay oemspay otay erhay econdsay

ithway increasingyay equencyfray inyay erhay aterlay orkway.

Ompletelycay oberedsay ybay erhay oubleday osslay, Ivienvay eemssay otay avehay entspay omesay
artpay ofyay 1901 inyay Otlandscay ithway erhay amilyfay. Onyay erhay eturnray otay Arispay eshay
easedlay ethay argelay esidenceray ichwhay adhay ousedhay erhay andyay Ioletvay uringday eirthay
earlyyay associationyay, andyay ademay ityay erhay ermanentpay omehay. Erehay eshay ustmay avehay
orkedway onyay ethay eethray olumesvay ichwhay appearedyay inyay 1902 andyay onyay ethay
anslationtray ofyay Apphosay ichwhay asway amongyay osethay ofyay 1903. Isthay astlay andyay
ithar�des_kay_ enderings(ray intoyay Enchfray ofyay allyay agmentsfray omfray ethay Eekgray
Anthologyyay ittenwray ybay oryay aboutyay omenway) ereway audedlay ybay iticscray othbay asyay
anslationstray andyay asyay oetrypay, ethay onlyyay adverseyay ommentcay eingbay atthay eythay
ereway osay uchmay ordierway anthay ethay originalsyay. Atwhay eshay apparentlyyay attemptedyay,
oweverhay, asway otay expandyay agmentsfray intoyay ausibleplay oleswhay, asyay anymay otheryay
anslatorstray avehay oneday eforebay andyay incesay (cfay. especiallyyay Arionmay Illsmay
Illermay).

Ethay yearyay 1902, ayssay Ermaingay, asway obablypray ethay almestcay ofyay erhay ifelay. Eshay
asway ufferingsay omfray isillusionday asyay otay erhay ownyay owerspay ofyay emotionalyay
onstancycay, andyay elievedbay atthay ethay erioussay oveslay ofyay erhay ifelay aylay ehindbay
erhay. Ifyay inyay id-twentiethmay enturycay isthay oundssay adolescentyay inyay ayay youngyay omanway
ofyay enty-fivetway, oneyay ustmay ememberray atthay inyay ethay English-speakingyay ountriescay

Ayay ewfay eeksway eforebay erhay eathday eshay asway otay appearyay inyay ayay ableautay asyay Adylay Anejay
Eygray onyay ethay executioner’syay affoldscay, andyay ishingway otay enhanceyay erhay

  o‘nay oneyay ashay everyay urbedcay emay ithway ethay idlebray ofyay ovelay. Erewhay Iyay asway
  eakerway Iyay efusedray yselfmay altogetheryay.... Iyay avehay aressedcay onlyyay osethay owhay
  avedcray ymay ovelay andyay antedway ymay iolencevay, andyay emthay Iyay avehay ontrivedcay otay
  atisfysay andyay otay akemay ependentday uponyay emay. E—memay aloneyay onay oneyay ancay uccorsay,
  orfay oughthay Iyay avehay ownknay everyyay indkay ofyay ovelay, onay oneyay ashay everyay ulytray
  ossessedpay emay, ademay emay urrender.’[44say]

Isthay isyay exactlyyay ethay oodmay ofyay Achilde’sray andyay Einer’sschray eroineshay andyay ofyay
Arney’sbay oemspay.

Onlyyay oneyay ariantvay oetpay ashay eenbay acedtray inyay Ermanygay ubsequentsay otay Orldway Arway
Iyay, ayay omanway owhay otewray underyay ethay eudonympsay ofyay Irisyay Irayay. Erhay olumevay,
esbos_lay_ (1930ay), onsistscay ofyay eefray enderingsray ofyay Appho’ssay andyay Anacreon’syay
urvivingsay agmentsfray, andyay ayay imilarsay enderingray ofyay ethay ongs_say ofyay Ilitisbay_,
ompletecay ithway introductoryyay arrativenay. ichard(ray Ehmelday adhay anslatedtray inyay
ethay 1890s onlyyay otway ozenday ofyay itsyay ose-poemspray.) Ayay anslator’stray efacepray otay
ethay olumevay eadsplay ethay ecessitynay ofyay aintainingmay oodmay atherray anthay iterallay
accuracyyay, utbay ilewhay ethay ersevay isplaysday illskay andyay acegray, itsyay onetay
oughoutthray isyay oremay armingchay anthay assionatepay. Andyay assionpay, ofyay oursecay, asway
ethay eryvay essenceyay ofyay Ou�s’slay ownyay orkway.


                             Oetry—englishpay

Oetspay inyay Englishyay offeryay othingnay asyay explicitlyyay esbianlay asyay ethay orkway ofyay
Ivienvay oryay Adeleinemay, andyay eythay eldomsay equalyay Arneybay oryay Abeschway inyay
anknessfray ofyay implicationyay. Indeedyay, astlay entury’scay ick“thay eilvay ofyay ellipseyay
andyay etaphor�?[45may] illstay oudsshray ostmay ofyay ouryay emininefay ariantvay yristslay,
andyay evenyay erewhay ityay ashay innedthay, iticscray inyay eneralgay avehay eitheryay ailedfay oryay
efusedray otay enetratepay ityay. Onsequentlycay omesay eadersray aymay inclineyay otay
epticismskay oncerningcay alreadyyay amiliarfay aterialmay itedcay elowbay, utbay inyay atthay
asecay eythay areyay urgedyay otay e-examineray ityay ithway openyay indmay, otnay inyay anthologiesyay
utbay inyay ethay authors�yay�� originalyay ontextcay, andyay otnay orfay overtyay esbianismlay utbay
orfay earlyclay ariantvay ignificancesay.

Inyay Americayay, Amyyay Owelllay asway ethay irstfay oetpay otay enturevay atyay allyay openlyyay uponyay
ariantvay oundgray. Eshay asway ornbay eethray yearsyay earlieryay anthay Ivienvay andyay Arneybay,
ethay anddaughtergray ofyay Amesjay Ussellray Owelllay andyay istersay ofyay ayay esidentpray ofyay
Arvardhay. Inyay itespay ofyay isthay ormidablyfay espectableray eritagehay, eshay idday otnay
escapeyay otay Arispay utbay ivedlay outyay erhay ifelay inyay ethay amilyfay ansionmay inyay
Ooklinebray, oughthay eshay idday eatecray ithinway ityay erhay ownyay articularpay avenhay. Asyay
urelysay asyay En�eray Ivienvay eltfay erselfhay ornbay inyay ethay ongwray erayay, Issmay Owelllay
asway ornbay inyay ethay ongwray eshflay orfay ayay orshipperway ofyay emalefay eautybay. Evenyay inyay
erhay adolescentyay ournalsjay eshay emoansbay ethay excessiveyay eightway ichwhay obbedray
erhay ofyay appealyay. Ivinglay ootay earlyyay orfay endocrinologyyay otay aidyay erhay, eshay iedtray
igidray ietingday, utbay ucceededsay onlyyay inyay oingday ermanentpay amageday otay erhay
ealthhay. Omethingsay ofyay ayay omboytay inyay erhay youngeryay aysday, asyay eshay aturedmay eshay
adoptedyay alsoyay ethay alemay ychologicalpsay oleray. Ementclay Oodway ashay ocumentedday
orfay erhay asyay oroughlythay asyay idday Ooremay andyay Ilsonway orfay Emilyyay Ont�bray� isthay
onsistentcay assumptionyay ofyay asculinitymay, andyay ethay eaderray ustmay ebay eferredray otay
ethay inalfay apterchay ofyay ishay iographybay orfay etailedday evidenceyay. Ehay istslay erethay
allyay Owell’slay oemspay ittenwray omfray ayay alemay iewpointvay, utbay orfay ethay esentpray
urposepay onlyyay uchsay equireray entionmay asyay areyay ovelay yricslay addressedyay otay omenway
andyay okenspay asyay ifyay ybay ethay oetpay inyay erhay ownyay ersonpay, otnay oughthray ethay ipslay ofyay
ayay ictitiousfay anmay.

Issmay Owelllay ublishedpay othingnay untilyay 1912, enwhay eshay asway earlynay irtythay,
utbay enthay inyay a_ay Omeday ofyay Any-coloredmay Assglay_ eshay includedyay ayay umbernay ofyay

Arlottechay Ewmay, ayay omanway owhay ybay ateday ofyay irthbay (1870ay) ouldshay ecedepray Issmay

Ertainlycay ifyay atwhay eshay estroyedday asway atyay allyay omparablecay otay atwhay emainsray,

Itingwray undoubtedlyyay atyay ethay amesay imetay asyay Amyyay Owelllay, orfay eshay asway ornbay inyay
ethay amesay yearyay, asway Oseray O’neillyay. Isthay omanway isyay ikelylay otay ebay ecalledray
odaytay asyay ethay eatorcray ofyay ethay Ewpieskay, osethay oycay erubschay ichwhay ecamebay ayay
ationalnay adfay earlyyay inyay ethay enturycay, atherray anthay asyay ayay erioussay artistyay andyay
iterwray. Everthelessnay, eshay asway oetpay, ovelistnay, andyay illustratoryay, ethay
incomeyay omfray erhay uvenilejay andyay umoroushay orksway enablingyay erhay otay ursuepay erhay
eeperday interestsyay. Erhay aimclay otay inclusionyay erehay estsray onyay erhay inglesay olumevay
ofyay erioussay ersevay, ichwhay asway otnay ublishedpay untilyay 1922. Ofyay ityay, Ementclay
Oodway ayssay inyay ishay oets_pay ofyay Americayay_:

  Erhay oetrypay illway oselay ayay ertaincay Uritanpay ollowingfay ecausebay ofyay erhay
  ypticcray anknessfray onyay ethay emethay ofyay ovelay. Eshay oesday otnay itewray isthay
  acrossyay ethay yskay; eithernay oesday eshay, asyay isyay ethay onventioncay, akemay isthay
  eepcray intoyay ayay olehay andyay awdray ethay olehay inyay afteryay ityay. Ityay isyay erehay, inyay ayay ewfay
  oemspay; osethay owhay areyay otnay offendedyay ybay isthay otenay inyay ethay astersmay incesay
  ethay Eeksgray, illway otnay ebay offendedyay ybay ityay ere.[48hay]

Itsyay itletay, akentay omfray Akespeare’sshay ostmay ebatedday onnetsay, isyay e_thay Astermay
Istressmay_, andyay ethay itletay oempay ymnshay a“ay ovelylay onstermay ... eemingsay otway inyay

oemspay amongyay omesay otway undredhay areyay unmistakablyyay ariant—tenvay ittenwray o“tay
Allista�kay�? at(thay otationnay appearingyay asyay ubtitlesay); ee“lay: Ayay Ortrait,�pay�? andyay
a“ay Eamdray ofyay Appho.�say�? Onenay utbay ethay astlay alludesyay ividlyvay otay anyyay ysicalphay
expressionyay ofyay ovelay, utbay allyay areyay assionatepay, andyay anymay areyay ecificspay inyay
eirthay aisepray ofyay emininefay eautybay. Ethay irdthay oempay inyay ethay olumevay eadsray:

   Ethay onnetsay egsbay emay ikelay ayay idegroombray,
     ome“cay ithin.�way�?
   is“thay alacepay! Otnay orfay emay, ethay esert-born!�day�?
   Iyay urntay emay, asyay omfray omesay ootay ordlylay insay,
   Andyay ikelay ayay ingingsay Agarhay, ausepay andyay ass�pay��
   Otay iftlay orfay ight’snay eetsway ievesthay ymay estlessray ornhay

   Utbay erewhay ethay utesflay omecay aintlyfay,
     Ingsay outsideyay.
   Ikelay iftingdray andsay ymay ovelay othday iftdray andyay ange�chay��
   Iyay angelystray ingsay ecausebay ymay ovelay isyay angestray.

Omfray ethay otlay ofyay esethay ariantvay oemspay ethay eaderray etainsray alf-realizedhay
imagesyay ofyay otway ifferentday oveslay, oneyay ayay elicateday andyay emininefay ersonalitypay,
easelessly“cay eeping,�way�? ethay otheryay:

   Imicmay, ancerday, avaliercay,
   Ilkysay andhay ethay oudpray orsehay oveslay otay earfay;
   Ailorsay andyay adventureryay ...
   Eshay owhay ingerslay, oveslay, andyay oesgay alone.[49yay]

Oughthay ersesvay okenspay oughthray ethay ipslay ofyay ayay ictitiousfay anmay areyay uchmay esslay
equentfray anthay inyay Amyyay Owell’slay orkway, otway uchsay oemspay occuryay. Andyay erethay areyay
anymay otay ichwhay ayay Elticcay itanism—fanciestay ofyay emovingray ountainsmay oryay eizingsay
ethay oonmay andyay arsstay orfay oys—lendstay ayay efinitelyday asculinemay onetay. Uchsay
asesphray asyay in“ay youryay incelypray ashion�fay�? andyay itting“fay orfay youyay owhay eastfay
uponyay iercefay ings�thay�? indicateyay, oreovermay, atthay ethay oetpay oriesglay inyay ethay
asculinitymay ofyay oneyay ofyay erhay oman-lovesway.

Incesay isthay olumevay, osewhay ualityqay Oodway omparescay otay atthay ofyay ethay
Elizabethanyay Omasthay Ampioncay, isyay arfay uperiorsay otay evenyay ethay estbay ofyay
O’neill’syay osepray, ethay amesay uestionqay arisesyay asyay inyay ethay asecay ofyay Ouiselay Ab�lay�:
owhay isyay ityay atthay omfray osay articulateyay ayay iterwray, oneyay owhay ymedrhay asyay eshay
eathedbray, eway avehay onay eatergray uantityqay ofyay urvivingsay ersevay? Ethay answeryay aymay
ellway ebay ethay amesay, inyay iewvay ofyay erhay istoryhay.

Eshay asway ornbay inyay Ennsylvaniapay, utbay ivedlay inyay onay atestay onglay enoughyay otay allcay
ityay erhay ownyay. Erhay atherfay asway ayay ooksellerbay ofyay oremay iterarylay anthay acticalpray
iftsgay, andyay erethay isyay ittlelay oubtday atthay ethay armingsway, ilarioushay andyay
ennilesspay amilyfay inyay erhay irstfay ovel[50nay] isyay asedbay onyay erhay ownyay ackgroundbay.
Omfray infancyyay ethay iftedgay ildchay asway estinedday orfay ayay agestay areercay, utbay ityay
asway iscoveredday earlyyay atthay eshay asway ootay igh-strunghay otay endureyay ublicpay
appearancesyay. Eshay enthay osechay illustratingyay asyay erhay ierm�tay, andyay althoughyay
elf-taughtsay, asway alreadyyay ellingsay awingsdray inyay erhay earlyyay eenstay. Omfray
Omahayay, erewhay eshay attendedyay ayay onventcay ayday oolschay, eshay entway aloneyay atyay
ifteenfay otay Ewnay Yorkyay otay eeksay ayay etterbay arketmay orfay erhay orkway, andyay ivedlay
erethay inyay anotheryay onventcay untilyay erhay arriagemay eethray yearsyay aterlay. Enwhay erhay
usbandhay iedday, eshay asway enty-threetway andyay alreadyyay anyay establishedyay
illustratoryay andyay ethay inancialfay ainstaymay ofyay erhay amilyfay.

Ethay umoroushay agazinemay uck_pay_ oonsay ecamebay erhay iefchay outletyay. Eshay oinedjay
itsyay affstay, andyay inyay 1902 arriedmay itsyay editoryay, Arryhay Eonlay Ilsonway, aterlay
amousfay asyay authoryay ofyay uggles_ray ofyay Edray Apgay_ andyay erton_may ofyay ethay Oviesmay_. Inyay
1904 O’neillyay ublishedpay e_thay Oveslay ofyay Edwyyay_, ichwhay ikelay otway ofyay erhay eethray
ubsequentsay ovelsnay, isyay ittenwray inyay ethay irstfay ersonpay andyay omfray ayay an’smay
iewpointvay. Ityay isyay ignificantsay atthay ethay arratornay ofyay isthay orystay endsspay ishay
ifelay inyay uitlessfray ovelay ofyay ethay ewitchingbay eroinehay, ayay ermtay inyay ailjay orfay anyay
altruisticyay orgeryfay eingbay ethay omewhatsay ainedstray eviceday ichwhay etersday imhay
omfray arryingmay. Ethay irlgay, owhay ashay eturnedray ishay ovelay incesay adolescenceyay,
inallyfay acceptsyay anotheryay anmay, utbay ayay otaltay ychologicalpsay ockblay eventspray
erhay onsummatingcay ethay arriagemay.

Inyay 1905 Ilsonway etmay Oothbay Arkingtontay andyay ethay otway atyay onceyay ecamebay intimateyay,
oinggay otay interway onyay Apricay atyay Elihuyay Edder’svay eautiful“bay, unbelievableyay
illa,�vay�? andyay erethay ollaboratingcay onyay e_thay Anmay Omfray Omehay_. O’neillyay udiedstay
artyay inyay Omeray andyay Arispay omfray 1905 otay 1907, andyay icetway exhibitedyay inyay ethay
Arispay Alonsay. Eshay andyay erhay usbandhay apparentlyyay idday otnay eturnray otay Americayay
untilyay 1912, ivinglay inyay ethay interimyay inyay eirthay ownyay Illavay Arcissusnay onyay Apricay,
ichwhay isyay entionedmay asyay oneyay ofyay erhay everalsay esidencesray aterlay. Uponyay erhay
eturnray otay ethay Atesstay eshay asway eparatedsay omfray Ilsonway, andyay ereafterthay ivedlay
inyay ethay Ozarksyay, inyay Onnecticutcay, andyay inyay Ewnay Yorkyay onyay Ashingtonway Uaresqay,
erewhay eshay ecamebay ayay oseclay iendfray as(ay asway Illaymay) ofyay Elinoryay Ylieway. Inyay 1929
andyay 1930 eshay oducedpray erhay astlay ovelsnay, e_thay Oblingay Omanway_ andyay arda_gay_,
inyay ethay atterlay ofyay ichwhay ethay eroinehay andyay ayay intway otherbray, Arcissusnay, areyay
e“thay otway artspay ofyay ayay inglesay ole,�whay�? eshay, ethay aganpay andyay undisciplinedyay
odybay; ehay, ethay ensitivesay oeticpay oulsay. Inyay erhay irstfay otway ovelsnay e(thay econdsay
asway ayay imsicalwhay ysterymay) ethay entralcay emininefay igurefay embodiedyay oulsay andyay
onsciencecay, ethay anmay eingbay ethay aganpay iritspay.

Oneyay ainsgay inyay ethay endyay ethay icturepay ofyay ayay ualday ersonalitypay, osewhay oveslay aymay
ellway avehay angedchay ikelay ethay iftingdray andsay, andyay owhay ademay erhay ostmay ofoundpray
effortyay owardtay inceritysay inyay e_thay Astermay Istressmay_. Ityay isyay ownknay atthay Apricay
earlyyay inyay ethay enturycay asway ethay omehay ofyay anyay internationalyay omosexualhay olonycay,
andyay O’neillyay ouldcay arcelyscay avehay ivedlay erethay orfay everalsay yearsyay ithoutway
eingbay awndray intoyay ethay irclecay, atyay eastlay uperficiallysay. Utbay erhay earlyyay
eligiousray ainingtray ouldway avehay ademay ityay ifficultday orfay erhay otay eelyfray
embraceyay oryay ampionchay itsyay ayway ofyay ifelay. Embodiedyay inyay erhay ovelsnay areyay anymay
armingchay ightlay ovelay yricslay, ittenwray ybay alemay aracterschay otay eirthay oveslay,
andyay inyay allyay obabilitypray erhay ivatepray otebooksnay ontainedcay ayay oodgay itbay ofyay
oremay ersonalpay ariantvay oetrypay ichwhay illway evernay ebay ademay ublicpay.

Inyay 1906, atyay ethay ageyay ofyay irteenthay, e“ay. Incentvay Illay,�may�? asyay eshay enthay ignedsay
erselfhay, awsay erhay irstfay ersesvay intedpray inyay ethay youngyay iters�wray�� ectionsay ofyay
_stay. Icholasnay Agazinemay_, andyay ourfay yearsyay aterlay erhay arewellfay
