irl’sgay ejectionray ofyay ethay enselesssay utalitybray ofyay ootballfay asway ethay oet’spay
ownyay, asyay ethay atredhay ofyay allyay ueltycray inyay erhay aterlay orkway attestsyay. Ethay irl’sgay
occupation—embroidery—wasyay unlikelyyay otay avehay eenbay atthay ofyay youngyay incent,�“vay�?
owhay enjoyedyay ayay oy’sbay outdooryay activitiesyay asyay ellway asyay ayay oy’sbay amenay.

Omfray erhay ebutday inyay _stay. Icholasnay_ otay ethay endyay ofyay erhay ifelay, irtuallyvay allyay
ofyay Illay’smay orkway appearedyay irstfay inyay eriodicalspay, osay atthay orfay acingtray itsyay
onologychray Yost’syay ibliographybay ofyay 1937 isyay invaluableyay. Omfray isthay eway owknay
atthay interim,�“ay�? erhay irstfay oempay ofyay ariantvay ignificancesay, asway ittenwray inyay
1912 alongyay ithway ethay etterbay ownknay enascence.�“ray�? interim�“ay�? isyay ayay enodythray
ichwhay atyay eastlay otway itics[52cray] avehay eticulouslymay insistedyay isyay ethay oductpray
ofyay urepay imaginationyay, incesay onay oneyay intimatelyyay ownknay otay ethay oetpay adhay iedday
enwhay eshay otewray ityay. Ityay isyay ossiblepay, oweverhay, otay uffersay agictray osslay
oughthray eparationsay, especiallyyay enwhay youngyay, andyay everyyay omelyhay andyay oignantpay
etailday ofyay interim�“ay�? eaksspay ofyay immediateyay experienceyay. Oneyay assagepay earnay ethay
iddlemay eedsnay articularpay attentionyay:

       ... Atthay ayday youyay ickedpay ethay irstfay eetsway ea�pay��
   Iyay owknay, youyay eldhay ityay upyay orfay emay otay eesay
   Andyay ushedflay ecausebay Iyay ookedlay otnay atyay ethay owerflay
   Utbay atyay youryay acefay; andyay enwhay ehindbay ymay ooklay
   Youyay awsay uchsay unmistakableyay intentyay
   Youyay aughedlay andyay ushedbray youryay owerflay againstyay ymay ipslay
   you(ay ereway ethay airestfay ingthay Odgay everyay ademay
   Iyay inkthay). Andyay enthay youryay andshay aboveyay ymay earthay
   Ewdray ownday itsyay emstay intoyay ayay asteningfay
   Andyay ilewhay youryay eadhay asway entbay Iyay issedkay youryay airhay.
   Iyay onderway ifyay youyay ewknay ...
       ... Ifyay onlyyay Odgay
   Adhay etlay usyay ove—andlay owshay ethay orldway ethay ayway!
   Angestray ancellingscay ustmay inkyay eternalth’ay ooksbay
   Enwhay ove-crossed-outlay illway ingbray ethay answeryay ight![53ray]

Ethay experienceyay escribedday erehay obviouslyyay involvedyay anotheryay omanway, andyay
emainedray unconsummatedyay. Ikelay Illehay andyay Ilkeray, ethay oetpay eelsfay uchsay ovelay
otay ebay otentiallypay ethay ostmay erfectpay inyay ethay orldway; utbay, unlikeyay emthay, eshay
eessay erfectionpay onlyyay inyay ompletioncay, otnay inyay abstinenceyay. Urthermorefay, ethay
astlay otway uotedqay ineslay avehay ayay indkay ofyay assroomclay echoyay, asyay ofyay isciplineday ybay
omesay arsherhay agentyay anthay ethay eityday ofyay od’s“gay Orld.�way�?

Enwhay Illaymay ubmittedsay isthay oempay alongyay ithway enascence�“ray�? orfay inclusionyay inyay
e_thay Yriclay Yearyay_ eshay erselfhay osay uchmay eferredpray interim�“ay�? atthay eshay
enturedvay otay eadplay ybay ailmay orfay itsyay inclusion.[54yay] Asyay ityay isyay inferioryay otay
enascence�“ray�? inyay othbay ofunditypray andyay estraintray, erhay eferencepray arguesyay
atthay ityay adhay eenbay ittenwray ootay ecentlyray orfay erhay otay aingay erspectivepay uponyay
ityay. Eshay asway entytway atyay ethay imetay, eethray yearsyay outyay ofyay ighhay oolschay, andyay
ivinglay inyay ayay allsmay Ainemay owntay ofyay atherray imitedlay intellectualyay andyay ersonalpay
opportunitiesyay, accordingyay otay erhay istersay Athleen’skay aterlay icturepay ofyay ityay inyay
against_ay ethay Allway_. Ityay isyay alsoyay earclay omfray allyay erhay oetrypay andyay erhay
orrespondencecay atthay ershay asway ayay ighlyhay emotionalyay emperamenttay. Allyay isthay
uggestssay atthay orfay ayay onsiderablecay imetay inyay erhay atelay eenstay Illaymay asway
ompletelycay absorbedyay inyay ayay assionatepay ariantvay attachmentyay, ichwhay enthay
ufferedsay omesay abruptyay erminationtay. Outyay ofyay erhay iefgray ewgray interim�“ay�? andyay ayay
umbernay ofyay otheryay amentslay ichwhay ickledtray intoyay intpray oughoutthray ethay extnay
otway oryay eethray yearsyay. Examinationyay ofyay erhay irstfay ublishedpay olumevay
enascence(_ray_, 1917) owsshay atthay avesay orfay od’s“gay Orld�way�? andyay afternoon“ay onyay
ayay Ill,�hay�? ethay olewhay ollectioncay oundssay ayay otenay ofyay ersonalpay osslay andyay
elancholymay.

Uringday erhay yearsyay atyay Assarvay (1913-1917ay, erhay enty-firsttway otay enty-fifthtway)
eshay admittedyay anyay attachmentyay otay anotheryay airfay elicateday irlgay, atyay eastlay otay
ethay extentyay ofyay erhay ownyay emorial“may otay D.cay. assar(vay Ollegecay, 1918),�? ichwhay
appearedyay inyay ethay olumevay econd_say Aprilyay_. Eathday actuallyyay erminatedtay isthay
iendshipfray, utbay ethay oupgray ofyay ittle“lay elegies�yay�? assembledyay underyay ethay itletay
aboveyay areyay erelymay ightslay andyay acefulgray ybay omparisoncay ithway interim�“ay�? andyay
itsyay aftermathsyay. Ityay isyay obablepray atthay ertaincay aterlay amentslay, uchsay asyay ong“say
ofyay ayay Econdsay April�yay�? andyay o“tay Oneyay Owhay Ightmay Avehay Ornebay ayay Essage,�may�? ereway
uertray expressionsyay ofyay isthay aterlay osslay. Ayay irdthay omanway isyay icturedpay inyay ayay
onnetsay inyay e_thay Arphay Eaverway_:

   Ovelay isyay otnay indblay. Iyay eesay ithway inglesay eyeyay
   Youryay uglinessyay andyay otheryay omen’sway acegray.
   Iyay owknay ethay imperfectionsyay ofyay youryay ace�fay��
   Ethay eyesyay ootay ideway apartyay, ethay owbray ootay ighhay
   Orfay eautybay. Earnedlay omfray earliestyay youthyay amyay Iyay
   Inyay ovelinesslay, andyay annotcay osay eraseyay
   Itsyay etterslay omfray ymay indmay, atthay Iyay aymay acetray
   Youyay aultlessfay, Iyay ustmay ovelay untilyay Iyay ie....[55day]

Isthay isyay esslay assionatepay anthay anymay ofyay erhay ovelay yricslay, andyay ityay aloneyay amongyay
emthay eaksspay ofyay ifelonglay onstancycay. Ityay ightmay avehay eenbay ittenwray otay ethay
oet’spay othermay, otay omwhay, asyay erhay etterslay estifytay, eshay asway ardentlyyay
evotedday.

Atthay ariantvay emotionyay asway atyay eastlay anyay intermittentyay eoccupationpray ithway
Illaymay untilyay eshay asway irtythay isyay evidentyay omfray examinationyay ofyay erhay otaltay
orkway eforebay 1923, ethay yearyay ofyay erhay arriagemay. Erethay areyay ayay umbernay ofyay
onnetssay andyay otheryay ersesvay inyay ichwhay ethay exsay ofyay ethay ubjectsay isyay uncertainyay,
ifyay otnay eliberatelyday oncealedcay, utbay ichwhay oday otnay avehay ethay onetay ofyay osethay
ecificallyspay ittenwray otay enmay. Enthay erethay isyay erhay oeticpay amadray, e_thay Amplay
andyay Ethay Ellbay_, ittenwray uringday ayay ojournsay inyay Arispay oonsay afteryay aduationgray
omfray Assarvay, andyay esentedpray atyay ethay ollegecay inyay 1921. Itsyay emethay isyay anyay
undyingyay evotionday etweenbay otway youngyay omenway, andyay Elizabethyay Atkins’syay
escriptionday ofyay ityay isyay osay elightfulday atthay ityay ustmay ebay orrowedbay:

  Ethay ingdomkay ofyay Iorifay isyay Oughkeepsie-on-the-hudsonpay, andyay ollegecay
  udentsstay andyay acultyfay eepkay ookinglay aightstray oughthray eirthay Italianyay
  eilsvay, eryvay uchmay asyay Elizabethanyay Ondonerslay eepkay iftinglay eirthay asksmay inyay
  Akespeare’sshay Illyriayay andyay Eronavay andyay Essinamay.

  Ethay emethay isyay atthay oneyay ofyay urningbay oncerncay inyay anyyay irls�gay�� ool—theschay
  emethay ofyay iendshipfray; andyay ethay ayplay akestay upyay eirthay endlessyay argumentsyay asyay
  otay etherwhay ityay illway astlay. Octaviayay, ethay eryvay ildlymay ickedway epmotherstay
  inyay ethay ayplay, upposedlysay ayay ueenqay utbay essentiallyyay ayay eanday ofyay omenway,
  aversyay atthay ethay iendshipfray ofyay ethay incesspray andyay erhay ownyay aughterday isyay otnay
  ealthyhay andyay illway otnay astlay. Ofyay oursecay ethay irlsgay ovepray erhay ongwray. Ethay
  incesspray, ithoutway ayay urmurmay, ivesgay upyay erhay overlay otay erhay iendfray; andyay
  onglay afterwardsyay eshay onsentscay otay iolationvay ybay erhay ostmay oathedlay enemyyay,
  inyay orderyay otay ebay ermittedpay otay eachray erhay iendfray asyay eshay ieslay yingday.

  Ethay emethay isyay urelysay Elizabethanyay. Omfray Ylylay otay Eaumontbay andyay Etcherflay,
  Elizabethanyay iteraturelay isyay illedfay ithway asseverationsyay atthay iendshipfray
  isyay ayay ongerstray ingthay anthay exualsay ovelay.... Ethay onlyyay oveltynay isyay atthay
  isthay entiethtway enturycay ayplay ealsday ithway ethay iendshipfray ofyay omenway
  insteadyay ofyay en....[56may]

Iendshipfray, oweverhay, isyay uchmay ootay oolcay ayay escriptionday orfay ethay ovelay etweenbay
ethay incessespray. Ethay elationray isyay assionatepay, oughthay asyay alwaysyay inyay erhay
ariantvay ersevay Illaymay avoidsyay anyyay implicationyay ofyay ysicalphay intimacyyay.

Ybay ethay imetay atthay isthay amadray asway ittenwray, oweverhay, Illaymay alsoyay adhay
ublishedpay ayay umbernay ofyay yricslay ofyay eterosexualhay inspirationyay. Indeedyay, amongyay
ethay onventionallycay indedmay eshay adhay ainedgay ayay uiteqay ockingshay eputationray onyay
ethay engthstray ofyay emthay, orfay eythay antedatedyay ethay ownay otoriousnay Entiestway.
Anymay ofyay emthay areyay ippantflay oryay itterbay inyay omparisoncay otay osethay inspiredyay ybay
omenway, andyay eythay auntflay inconstancyyay andyay omiscuitypray. Eesay orfay instanceyay ethay
onnetssay oh“ay inkthay otnay Iyay amyay aithfulfay otay ayay ow,�vay�? i“ay allshay orgetfay youyay
esentlypray, ymay ear,�?[57day] at“whay ipslay ymay ipslay avehay issedkay ... Iyay avehay
orgotten,�fay�? andyay i“ay eingbay ornbay ayay oman....�?[58way] Inyay ortshay, esethay etraybay
onsciouscay ivingstray owardtay ayay asculinemay exualsay andardstay otay atchmay atthay ofyay
erhay artnerspay. Eythay emindray oneyay atthay incent�“vay�? adhay oncealedcay erhay exsay atyay
ethay ateday ofyay erhay irstfay ublicationpay. Ayay iticcray, itingcay inyay anyay adultyay eviewray
ethay enomenal�“phay�? ualityqay ofyay ayay _stay. Icholasnay_ entryyay Illaymay otewray atyay
ourteenfay, onfessedcay uncertaintyyay etherwhay ethay oempay asway ittenwray ybay ayay oybay oryay
ayay irl.[59gay] Ellowfay oetspay eadingray enascence�“ray�? oughtthay ityay ayay an’smay orkway,
andyay ayay Arnardbay ofessorpray uringday erhay iefbray onthsmay erethay epairing(ray
entranceyay equirementray eficienciesday orfay Assarvay) onouncedpray interim�“ay�? otay ebay
ittenwray inyay ethay aracterchay ofyay ayay an.[60may] Ethay amesay iewpointvay arksmay erhay
ibrettolay orfay Eemsday Aylor’stay operayay, e_thay Ing’skay Enchmanhay_.

Afteryay erhay arriagemay inyay 1923 allyay ofyay Illay’smay ublishedpay ersevay asway arkedmay ybay
eatergray emotionalyay eticenceray, andyay ifyay eshay otewray ivatelypray anythingyay
omparablecay otay erhay earlieryay ariantvay yricslay ethay anceschay areyay againstyay itsyay
everyay eingbay ademay ublicpay. ere(thay ashay eenbay onay ovidentialpray Einachray otay
alvagesay erhay eliquesray orfay osteritypay, andyay ityay isyay umoredray atthay ensorshipcay isyay
eingbay exercisedyay. Etterslay avehay eenbay admittedyay otay ethay ublishedpay olumevay ofyay
erhay orrespondencecay ichwhay implyyay omesay earlyyay eterosexualhay indiscretionyay,
ilewhay allyay ariantvay acestray avehay eenbay eradicatedyay avesay ayay operpray amenay oryay
o[61tway] inyay onnectioncay ithway ichwhay ethay ublishedpay implicationsyay areyay
unrevealingyay. Otay ethay udentstay ofyay ariancevay, oweverhay, eythay areyay ignificantsay.)
Ethay oneyay otablenay exceptionyay otay isthay eneralgay eticenceray isyay atal_fay Interviewyay_
(1930ay), ofyay ichwhay Atkinsyay aidsay inyay 1936 atthay eshay, erselfhay,

  ustmay ebay ethay irstfay ost-victorianpay iticcray onyay ecordray otay atestay inyay oldcay
  intpray ... atthay ayay illstay eathingbray arriedmay omanway, amenay andyay atesday ivengay,
  ashay ittenwray ayay oempay ofyay extra-maritalyay assionpay, otnay asyay ayay iterarylay
  exerciseyay inyay urplepay enmanshippay, utbay asyay anyay onesthay ecordray ofyay immediateyay
  experience.[62yay]

Ethay experienceyay idday otnay occuryay eryvay oseclay otay ethay ateday ofyay ethay olume’svay
ublicationpay, oweverhay, orfay anymay eadersray illway ememberray individualyay onnetssay
omingcay outyay inyay isthay oryay atthay agazinemay overyay ayay onsiderablecay umbernay ofyay yearsyay,
andyay otnay inyay ethay orderyay inyay ichwhay eythay inallyfay andstay. Ethay ajoritymay ightmay, asyay
arfay asyay erbalvay evidenceyay oesgay, avehay eenbay ittenwray otay ayay ersonpay ofyay eitheryay
exsay, andyay eythay ifferday osay arplyshay amongyay emselvesthay atthay evenyay allowingyay orfay
ethay oet’spay ercurialmay emperamenttay andyay ethay amutgay ofyay emotionyay eshay ishedway otay
ecordray, oneyay ometimessay eelsfay eythay annotcay allyay avehay eenbay inspiredyay ybay ethay
amesay individualyay. Ityay aymay ebay ashbray otay uggestsay atthay eythay ouldcay avehay owngray
outyay ofyay oremay anthay oneyay experienceyay, andyay atthay ethay ifty-twofay ereway erelymay
assembledyay intoyay oneyay atchlessmay acingtray ofyay ethay irthbay, owthgray andyay eclineday ofyay
umanhay assionpay. Utbay oneyay ofyay emthay, umberednay Ixxay, emandsday ecialspay attentionyay:

   Onegay inyay oodgay oothsay youyay areyay: otnay evenyay inyay eamdray
   Youyay omecay. Asyay ifyay ethay icturesstray ofyay ethay ightlay,
   Aidlay onyay ouryay ancesglay otay eirthay isesteemday,
   Extendedyay evenyay otay adowsshay andyay ethay ightnay;
   Extendedyay evenyay eyondbay atthay owsydray illsay
   Alongyay osewhay alleriesgay, openyay otay ethay iesskay
   Allyay askersmay ovemay unchallengedyay andyay atyay illway,
   Isorvay inyay andhay andyay oodedhay otay ethay eyesyay.
   Otay atthay avilionpay ethay eengray easay inyay oodflay
   Urvescay inyay, andyay ethay owslay ancersday anceday inyay oamfay;
   Iyay indfay againyay ethay inkpay amellia-budcay
   Onyay ethay ideway epstay, esidebay ayay ilversay omb�cay��
   Utbay ityay isyay entlessscay; upyay ethay arblemay airstay
   Iyay ountmay ithway ainpay, owingknay youyay areyay otnay erethay.

Isthay ersevay asway originallyyay ittenwray eitheryay otay ayay omanway andyay ittedfay aterlay
intoyay ethay artisticyay atternpay ofyay ethay olewhay, oryay ethay anmay owhay inspiredyay ityay ouldcay
appearyay ithout(way incongruityyay inyay ethay eamer’sdray indmay) otay avehay ostlay ayay
asquer’smay accessories—pinkyay amellia-budcay andyay ilversay omb—whichcay areyay
arcelyscay asculinemay. Asway ehay oneyay omwhay ayay oman’sway ostumecay ouldway avehay ecomebay?
Idday ethay eamerdray atyay imestay ecretlysay ishway imhay ayay omanway? Oryay asway isthay onnetsay
and(ay ustjay ossiblypay othersyay inyay ethay equencesay alsoyay) ittenwray ecificallyspay otay
ayay omanway?

Ityay ashay eenbay ethay iticalcray ashionfay orfay omesay imetay otay iscountday Illay’smay
iterarylay importanceyay ecausebay ofyay ethay arpshay eclineday inyay ethay ualityqay ofyay erhay
orkway afteryay e_thay Uckbay inyay ethay Owsnay_. Erhay epitaph“ay orfay ethay Aceray ofyay An�may�? inyay
atthay olumevay aymay ebay eensay almostyay asyay erhay ownyay oeticpay abdicationyay. Anyay artistyay
osewhay odsgay ereway Ifelay andyay Eautybay andyay osewhay evilday asway Ueltycray aymay ellway
avehay oundfay erselfhay aralyzedpay ybay ethay orrorhay ofyay obalglay andyay otaltay arway. Ifyay
oneyay edicatespray alsoyay ethay urdenbay ofyay ayay ualday emotionalyay aturenay, oneyay alfhay ofyay
ichwhay asway inyay aterlay yearsyay ensoredcay ybay ethay other—foryay onay aturemay odernmay ofyay
erhay intelligenceyay ouldway ightlylay ourtcay ethay argechay ofyay arrestedyay adolescenceyay,
onay aughterday ofyay Ewnay Englandyay ouldway illinglyway isplayday atwhay erhay enerationgay
onsideredcay emotionalyay eformity—oneday ashay upplementarysay explanationyay ofyay erhay
eativecray aralysispay.

                   *       *       *       *       *

Otnay allyay ofyay isthay ountry’scay ariantvay oetrypay ashay eenbay ittenwray ybay omenway; atyay
eastlay otway enmay avehay ontributedcay arrativenay ersevay. Edgaryay Eelay Asters’smay
omesday_day Ookbay_ (1929ay) ollowsfay Owning’sbray ing_ray andyay ethay Ookbay_ inyay atthay ityay
eginsbay ithway ayay irl’sgay eathday andyay acestray ethay istoryhay ichwhay edlay upyay otay ityay,
oughthray ethay emoriesmay ofyay arfay oremay anthay Owning’sbray ozenday ersonspay. Inyay ethay
endyay Elenoryay Urraymay isyay eensay asyay ayay omanway ootay assionatepay andyay open-heartedyay otay
ivelay eacefullypay oryay otay endyay erhay aysday inyay appinesshay. Ithinway ayay ecadeday eshay
avegay erselfhay avishlylay otay everalsay enmay utbay asway elf-defeatingsay inyay erhay eryvay
enerositygay, andyay inallyfay endedyay erhay ifelay ecausebay erhay effortsyay otay eetmay erhay
overs�lay�� eednay onlyyay oughtbray ufferingsay otay othersyay asyay ellway asyay erselfhay.

Oneyay ofyay ethay earlieryay eminiscencesray inyay ethay ookbay omescay omfray Almayay Ellbay, ayay
igh-schoolhay eachertay owhay ewknay Elenoryay atyay eventeensay andyay ovedlay erhay eeplyday.
Ecognizingray ethay angersday aheadyay orfay oneyay osay usceptiblesay otay assionpay, eshay
attemptedyay otay elphay ethay irlgay o“tay ipenray otay ayay ichray aturity�may�? unscathedyay. Eshay
adhay uccesssay inyay ardingway offyay ertaincay unsavoryyay alemay advancesyay, utbay otnay inyay
avoidingyay emotionalyay involvementyay erselfhay, incesay, asyay eshay observesyay, ewfay
ersonspay areyay ollywhay eitheryay asculinemay oryay emininefay inyay iritspay.

       ... ethay esh’sflay explanationyay
   Isyay otnay importantyay, ornay otay elltay encewhay omescay
   Ayay ovelay inyay ethay eart—thehay ingthay isyay ovelay atyay astlay ...
   Ymay ovelay orfay Elenoryay Urraymay evernay adhay
   Otheryay expressionyay anthay ethay ooklay ofyay eyesyay,
   Ethay iritualspay illthray ofyay isteninglay otay erhay oicevay,
   Ayay andhay otay aspclay, isskay uponyay ethay ipslay atyay estbay,
   Etterbay otay indfay erhay oulsay, asyay Atoplay ays.[63say]

Espiteday isthay onscientiouscay estraintray ethay owntay ecamebay awareyay ofyay ethay
intimacyyay, andyay Almayay Ellbay asway orcedfay otay esignray erhay ositionpay andyay eavelay

       ... underyay ayay oudclay
   Ecausebay ofyay ovelay orfay Elenoryay Urraymay, yetyay
   Otnay awlesslay ovelay, Iyay itewray ownay otay akemay ear.[64clay]

Ethay exceptionalyay allsmay owntay oronercay, oleranttay andyay ilosophicalphay, owhay
elicitsyay ethay oriesstay ichwhay omposecay ethay atternpay, isyay anyay evidentyay outhpiecemay
orfay ethay oetpay imselfhay. Ishay inalfay estimateyay ofyay ethay irl’sgay aracterchay isyay oneyay
ofyay umanhay ignityday andyay argenesslay ofyay iritspay urpassingsay atthay ofyay erhay
alumniatorscay andyay evenyay erhay overslay andyay iendsfray. Utbay ethay earlyyay uspicionsay ofyay
esbianismlay astcay oneyay ofyay ethay adowsshay ichwhay eachedray eyondbay ethay imitslay ofyay
erhay ittlelay Idwesternmay ommunitycay andyay augmentedyay ethay ifficultiesday ofyay erhay
aterlay ifelay.

Ethay inglesay otestingpray oicevay inyay Americanyay oetrypay isyay atthay ofyay Eorgegay
Irlingstay, osewhay ange_stray Atersway_ isyay ayay iefbray arrativenay elatedray otay ethay
orkway ofyay Obinsonray Effersjay inyay othbay itsyay Acificpay oastcay ettingsay andyay inyay
imnessgray ofyay emethay. Otay ayay ildlesschay, utbay uiteqay appyhay, oetpay andyay ishay Irishyay
ifeway areyay entsay ethay atter’slay eighteen-year-oldyay intway iecesnay. Eythay areyay ethay
ildrenchay ofyay erhay uchmay olderyay otherbray, otay omwhay eshay ashay alludedyay onlyyay onceyay
uringday erhay arriedmay ifelay oclaimingpray imhay ayay onstermay. Ishay eathbedday etterlay
impliesyay omesay ironicyay usticejay inyay eirthay eingbay eftlay otay erhay. Eythay areyay
iery-hairedfay eautiesbay, abnormallyyay eticentray exceptyay ithway oneyay anotheryay, andyay
eirthay utualmay evotionday isyay arkedmay. Ethay oremay oyishbay intway exhibitsyay ayay
illiantbray intellectyay ichwhay ascinatesfay ethay oetpay, utbay ehay intuitivelyyay ensessay
omethingsay amissyay, andyay istenslay atyay ethay oorday ofyay ethay edroombay erewhay eythay eepslay
ogethertay. Otay ishay orrorhay ehay earshay evidenceyay ofyay activeyay esbianismlay, andyay inyay
ethay orningmay ehay accusesyay emthay openlyyay. Efusingray otay answeryay imhay, ethay otway etsay
outyay orfay eirthay usualyay ay-longday oamingray onyay iffsclay andyay oreshay. Oweverhay, eythay
oday otnay eturnray. Enwhay eirthay odiesbay areyay ashedway inyay omfray ethay Acificpay, oneyay
ovespray otay ebay ayay oybay. Ethay ubtlesay implicationyay isyay atthay eythay areyay ethay
incestuousyay offspringyay ofyay ethay oet’spay ifeway andyay erhay otherbray. Eirthay elationray,
enthay, isyay otnay ariantvay, utbay ityay ivesgay Irlingstay opportunityyay otay asspay uponyay
esbianismlay ayay udgmentjay uiteqay asyay ackblay asyay uponyay incestyay, orfay ichwhay inyay isthay
asecay ayay ereditaryhay etiologyyay isyay impliedyay.

Omfray Englandyay ethay ariantvay ontributioncay isyay evenyay innerthay andyay oremay evasiveyay

                              Apterchay Iivay.
                           Ictionfay Inyay Ancefray


                              Eforebay 1914

Ifyay ariantvay oetrypay urgeonedbay uddenlysay ithway ethay urntay ofyay ethay esentpray
enturycay, ewnay evelopmentsday inyay ictionfay ereway equallyyay apparentyay. Etweenbay 1900
andyay 1950, ovelsnay ithway emalefay ariancevay asyay eitheryay ayay entralcay oryay ayay ajormay
emethay averagedyay oremay anthay otway erpay yearyay. Ayay atherray argerlay additionalyay oupgray
usedyay ariancevay asyay ayay inormay otifmay oryay inyay ayay ellingtay incidentyay oryay otway. Ofyay isthay
enerousgay opcray ayay oodgay alfhay asway ethay orkway ofyay Englishyay andyay Americanyay authorsyay;
anyay equalyay oportionpray asway ittenwray ybay omenway; andyay althoughyay activeyay
ampionshipchay ofyay esbianismlay oryay ariancevay asway omparativelycay areray, etterbay
anthay alfhay ethay ictionalfay esentationspray ereway eitheryay ympatheticsay oryay
eutralnay. Esethay ountscay areyay asedbay uponyay ayay undred-oddhay olumesvay availableyay orfay
examinationyay, usplay anyay additionalyay orescay oryay osay ofyay unequivocalyay eviewsray.

Ethay ewnay entury’scay aracteristicchay angeschay ereway eastlay evidentyay inyay Ancefray,
erewhay orfay ayay ouplecay ofyay ecadesday ariantvay ictionfay adhay appearedyay inyay uantityqay,
andyay erewhay atyay eastlay otway oryay eethray omenway achilde(ray, Anejay eday Avaud�relay,
Amillecay Ertpay) adhay ontributedcay. Eway avehay eensay atthay Ierrepay Ou�slay etweenbay
1896 andyay 1901 evenyay uckstray ayay ewnay otenay ofyay eerfulchay insoucianceyay, utbay ishay
aphrodite_ay_ andyay ilitis_bay_ icturedpay ourtesanscay ofyay ethay assicalclay erayay, andyay
ethay adventuresyay ofyay ishay eethray irlsgay inyay ing_kay Ausolepay_ ereway etsay inyay ayay anyzay
antasyfay ellway emovedray omfray ealityray.

Omfray eviewsray andyay ublishers�pay�� ecordsray eway owknay atthay uringday ethay entury’scay
irstfay ecadeday ullyfay asyay anymay inferioryay esbianlay ovelsnay appearedyay asyay inyay ethay
oneyay ecedingpray, ayay ewfay ofyay ichwhay illway ebay entionedmay aterlay. Ethay outstandingyay
orkway, oweverhay, asway atthay oneday ybay ethay ouplecay igningsay emselvesthay
Olette-willycay, owhay openedyay ayay ewnay erayay ybay ortrayingpay eirthay ownyay imestay ithway
othbay anknessfray andyay ympathysay. Illyway asway ethay establishedyay usicmay iticcray andyay
ightlay ovelistnay Enryhay Authier-villarsgay. Idoniesay Abriellegay Olettecay ashay
incesay eenbay ecognizedray asyay ethay oremostfay Enchfray omanway iterwray ofyay erhay imetay,
utbay inyay 1900 eshay asway erelymay ayay iquantpay ersonalitypay owhay, ayay ecadeday earlieryay,
atyay eventeensay, adhay omecay otay Arispay omfray ethay ovincespray andyay arriedmay
Authier-villarsgay. Onsequentlycay, enwhay audine_clay �ay� Ecolel’ay_ appearedyay
(1900ay), ityay asway akentay otay ebay ainlymay ayay orkway ofyay Illyway asedbay uponyay ishay ife’sway
irlhoodgay experiencesyay. Iticscray avehay incesay establishedyay atthay ityay andyay itsyay
eethray uccessorssay, audine_clay �ay� Arispay_ (1901ay), audine_clay enyay Agem�nay_ (1902ay)
andyay audine_clay ens’ay Avay_ (1903ay) ereway esslay ishay anthay Olette’scay ownyay, andyay ethay
ifthfay olumevay, a_lay Etraiteray Entimentalesay_ (1907ay) asway ecognizedray atyay ethay
imetay ofyay itsyay appearanceyay asyay ershay, incesay ybay enthay eshay adhay eparatedsay omfray erhay
usbandhay. Ethay irstfay ourfay ofyay ethay eriessay avehay eenbay anslatedtray asyay audine_clay
atyay Oolschay_, young_ay Adylay ofyay Arispay_, e_thay Indulgentyay Usbandhay_, andyay
innocent_ay Ifeway_, andyay areyay airlyfay ell-knownway.

Isthay eriessay esentspray ethay emotionalyay istoryhay ofyay ethay elightfulday Audineclay
etweenbay ethay agesyay ofyay ifteenfay andyay irtythay, andyay incidentallyyay incorporatesyay
ethay authors�yay�� opinionsyay uponyay anymay ortssay ofyay exualsay elationray. Audineclay
appearsyay irstfay asyay ayay ayday upilpay inyay ayay ovincialpray ublicpay oolschay omewheresay inyay
ethay ountainousmay artements_d�pay_ ofyay outhernsay Ancefray. Otherlessmay, eshay isyay
oughtbray upyay afteryay ayay ashionfay ybay ayay atherfay osay absorbedyay inyay ishay udiesstay asyay otay
approachyay ayay aricaturecay ofyay ethay absent-mindedyay ofessorpray, andyay ybay ayay
ee-tonguedfray ervantsay omparablecay otay Oust’spray An�oisefray. Eshay owsgray upyay ayay
omboytay, eefray otay imbclay eestray, otay oamray aloneyay overyay ethay oodedway illshay aboutyay
erhay allsmay owntay, andyay otay eadray atyay illway inyay erhay ather’sfay uncensoredyay ibrarylay.

Erhay emotionalyay evelopmentday eginsbay ithway anyay attractionyay appropriateyay otay erhay
yearsyay ifteen(fay) utbay uncommonlyyay intenseyay, otay ayay ettypray assistantyay istressmay,
Ademoisellemay Aim�eyay. Ithway Audine’sclay ilyway arrangementyay otay ebay utoredtay inyay
Englishyay atyay omehay, isthay affairyay omisespray otay evelopday ichlyray, utbay ityay isyay
interruptedyay enwhay ethay eadmistresshay, ayay omineeringday edheadray, alsoyay ontractscay
ayay assionpay orfay erhay assistantyay. Owingknay onyay ichwhay idesay erhay eadbray isyay
utteredbay, Aim�eyay abandonsyay Audineclay, otay ecomebay ethay amperedpay arlingday ofyay erhay
uperiorsay. Otway oryay eethray ofyay ethay ig“bay irls�gay�? understandyay erfectlypay atwhay isyay
oinggay onyay, andyay Audineclay evenyay eavesdropsyay oneyay ayday uponyay anyay intimateyay omentmay
enjoyedyay ybay ethay otway omenway inyay eirthay ormitoryday uartersqay ilewhay eirthay assesclay
unray ildway inyay ethay oolroomsschay elowbay. Aterlay, ethay eadmistresshay impliesyay otay
Audineclay atthay adhay eshay otnay omfray ethay outsetyay ownshay antagonismyay, erhay
affectionyay ightmay avehay eenbay estowedbay onyay erhay atherray anthay onyay ethay omewhatsay
insipidyay uniorjay istressmay.

Inyay ethay oursecay ofyay ethay yearyay, Audineclay iscoversday atthay eshay isyay ecomingbay
attractiveyay otay enmay, otablynay ethay ool’sschay isitingvay ysicianphay, ayay olf�“way�? atyay
omwhay eshay aughslay althoughyay ehay ashay anyay irritatingyay owerpay otay ovemay erhay. Ehay usesyay
ishay oliticalpay influenceyay otay ethay endyay ofyay enjoyingyay Aim�e’syay avorsfay, anyay affairyay
otay ichwhay ethay olderyay istressmay appearsyay indifferentyay, erhay ealousyjay eingbay
eservedray orfay emininefay ivalsray. Ayay econdsay iversionday evelopsday enwhay Aim�e’syay
youngyay istersay, Ucelay, entersyay atyay id-termmay asyay ayay aritychay upilpay andyay isyay adlybay
eglectednay ybay ethay otway istressesmay. Ayay yearyay Audine’sclay uniorjay, isthay inthay
een-eyedgray youngsteryay ecomesbay erhay adoringyay aveslay, onstantlycay anoeuveringmay
orfay aressescay, utbay eceivingray onlyyay owsblay, ichwhay eshay appearsyay otay indfay almostyay
asyay atisfyingsay. Otay erselfhay, Audineclay admitsyay atthay, ereway ethay irlgay anyoneyay
utbay ayay istersay otay ethay icklefay Aim�eyay, ethay affairyay ightmay ogay artherfay.

Atyay ethay aduationgray ance—aday eatnay itbay ofyay atiresay onyay ovincialpray
entertainment—claudineyay isyay uchmay oughtsay afteryay ybay ocallay andyay isitingvay
ainssway, andyay analyzesyay afterwardyay ywhay eshay oundfay eirthay attentionsyay osay
unsatisfactoryyay. Eshay ontemplatescay atwhay eshay antsway ofyay ovelay:

  Iyay erriblytay eedednay Omeonesay, andyay asway umiliatedhay ybay isthay acklay, andyay
  ecausebay Iyay ouldcay otnay ivegay anythingyay otay anyoneyay Iyay idday otnay ovelay andyay owknay
  oughthray andyay ough—athray eamdray ichwhay illway evernay omecay uetray, eh?[1yay]

Isthay ispr�cay ofyay ethay emininefay idealyay arksmay ethay eginningbay ofyay Olette’scay
ince-famoussay issectionday ofyay omen’sway emotionalyay ychologypsay.

Ethay econdsay olumevay arriescay Audineclay oughthray ethay year—heryay
eventeenth—whichsay erhay atherfay ecidesday ustmay ebay entspay inyay Arispay, ostensiblyyay
inyay ethay interestsyay ofyay ishay ientificscay orkway, utbay actuallyyay ithway anyay eyeyay otay
ideningway erhay irclecay ofyay acquaintanceyay. Icksay ithway ostalgianay orfay erhay ativenay
Ontignymay andyay oathinglay everyyay aspectyay ofyay erhay urbanyay imprisonmentyay, Audineclay
uccumbssay otay ayay onglay illnessyay ichwhay ashay otway importantyay esultsray. Erhay airhay
ustmay ebay oppedcray, andyay erhay ontactscay areyay onfinedcay otay erhay ather’sfay olderyay
istersay andyay ethay atter’slay andsongray, ayay ettypray eaturecray ofyay erhay ownyay ageyay asyay
effeminateyay asyay eshay isyay oyishbay. Eryvay earlynay islikingday Arcelmay, Audineclay
illstay eelsfay ayay ysicalphay attractionyay uchmay ikelay atthay ichwhay ewdray erhay otay Ucelay.
Utbay Arcel’smay emotionsyay areyay absorbedyay inyay anyay affairyay ithway ayay alemay
oolmate—anschay affairyay ichwhay ashay ademay oubletray orfay othbay oysbay atyay eirthay Yc�elay
andyay evokedyay ethay athwray andyay ontemptcay ofyay Arcel’smay atherfay. Evasiveyay aboutyay ishay
ownyay experiencesyay, Arcelmay isyay avidlyyay uriouscay aboutyay Audine’sclay elationsray
ithway Ucelay ide(pray eventspray erhay entioningmay Aim�eyay). Ityay isyay Arcelmay owhay eessay
ethay odishmay ossibilitiespay inyay Audine’sclay oppedcray eadhay, andyay akestay erhay otay anyay
Englishyay ailortay otay ebay outfittedyay en_ay ar�onnegay_, ayay ylestay eminentlyyay uitedsay
otay erhay othbay ysicallyphay andyay ychologicallypsay.

Uringday erhay illnessyay Audineclay ashay eardhay omfray Ucelay atthay erhay ituationsay atyay
ethay oolschay ashay ecomebay intolerableyay andyay eshay isyay eadyray orfay esperateday
easuresmay. Esentlypray eshay eetsmay Ucelay onyay ayay Arispay eetstray esseddray oremay
artlysmay anthay eshay isyay erselfhay, andyay earnslay atthay ethay irlgay, owhay adhay oughtsay
elphay omfray anyay uncleyay a(ay ossgray ixty-year-oldsay idowerway), isyay ownay eingbay
avishlylay eptkay ybay imhay. Everthelessnay, Ucelay anagesmay otay avehay ayay oy-friendbay
omfray ethay Eaux-artsbay onyay ethay idesay, andyay isyay alsoyay eageryay otay esumeray elationsray
ithway Audineclay. Ethay atterlay, ootay, eelsfay ethay earlieryay attractionyay, utbay
ealizesray eshay annotcay oleratetay intimacyyay ithway ayay ittlelay ue_gray_ owhay isyay ivinglay
ithway erhay ownyay uncleyay. Ithway umoroushay onestyhay eshay admitsyay otay erselfhay atthay
espiteday avinghay ead“ray everything—andyay understoodyay it�yay�? eforebay eshay asway
ixteensay, enwhay ityay omescay otay eal“ray ife�lay�? eshay isyay othingnay utbay an“ay ordinaryyay
oodgay irl.�gay�?

Inyay ethay oursecay ofyay erhay acquaintanceyay ithway ethay ettypray Arcelmay eshay eetsmay
Enaudray, ethay atter’slay idowedway atherfay, andyay isyay awndray otay imhay espiteday ishay
intoleranceyay ofyay ishay on’ssay omosexualhay affairyay. Eshay inksthay ehay isyay ustjay ethay
anmay eshay ouldway avehay osenchay orfay ayay ather—urbanefay andyay ittyway, utbay ithway ombresay
emotionalyay epthsday. Oonsay eshay isyay inyay ovelay ithway imhay. Ethay anmay, entytway yearsyay
erhay eniorsay, ugglesstray againstyay ayay eciprocalray attractionyay, utbay Audine’sclay
eadlonghay infatuationyay insway, andyay ethay ookbay endsyay ithway eirthay engagementyay.

Ethay irstfay ectionsay ofyay audine_clay enyay Agem�nay_ analyzesyay ithway illskay erhay asyay yetyay
incompleteyay aritalmay adjustmentyay. Eshay esentsray ethay emorymay ofyay erhay elaborateyay
eddingway andyay erhay usband’shay ontinuingcay ixturemay ofyay atherlyfay indulgenceyay andyay
experiencedyay ensualitysay ichwhay amesshay erhay adoringyay a�vet�nay�. Ethay ouplecay avehay
entspay ayay yearyay inyay ontinentalcay aveltray uncongenialyay otay ethay Ontignymay omboytay,
andyay asyay eshay ettlessay inyay Enaud’sray Arispay apartmentyay eshay isyay omesickhay orfay erhay
ativenay ovincepray andyay ebelliousray againstyay ethay outineray ofyay ophisticatedsay
entertainingyay erhay usbandhay ishesway otay esumeray.

Acceptingyay ifelay onyay ishay ermstay ithway atwhay acegray eshay ancay, eshay esentlypray eetsmay
Eziray, ayay eductivesay Austrianyay, ifeway ofyay ayay etiredray Englishyay officeryay, andyay oonsay
eythay areyay utuallymay infatuatedyay. Eirthay emotionyay ancay indfay onay outletyay ecausebay
ethay olonel’scay ealousjay urveillancesay andyay ethay unremittingyay ocialsay activityyay
inyay erhay ownyay ouseholdhay affordyay emthay onay ivacypray. Afteryay ayay eriodpay ofyay
increasinglyyay ainfulpay ustrationfray Audineclay appealsyay otay erhay usbandhay orfay
aidyay. Enaudray ashay allyay alongyay ownshay ethay amesay excitedyay interestyay inyay isthay affairyay
atthay ishay onsay exhibitedyay inyay erhay elationsray ithway Ucelay, andyay ehay eadilyray agreesyay
otay indfay ethay airpay ayay ivatepray avenhay. Ehay insistsyay, oweverhay, onyay etainingray ethay
eykay otay eirthay est�“nay�? imselfhay andyay onyay escortingyay emthay otay ityay eneverwhay eythay
ishway otay ogay erethay. Isthay omplaisancecay orderingbay onyay oyeurismvay offendsyay
Audineclay, owhay isyay atyay earthay oundedway ybay ishay acklay ofyay ealousyjay. Aduallygray eshay
ealizesray atthay atwhay eshay eelsfay orfay Eziray isyay eremay infatuationyay. Eshay uspectssay
atthay erhay artnerpay ashay eenbay intimateyay ithway otheryay omenway aboutyay omwhay eshay isyay
evasiveyay, andyay eshay evenyay indsfay easonray otay onderway etherwhay eforebay erhay arriagemay
Enaudray andyay Eziray ightmay otnay avehay adhay anyay affairyay. Erhay oodingbray iscontentday
increasesyay uringday eethray eeksway ofyay illnessyay enwhay eshay ancay eepkay atchway onyay
eithernay usbandhay ornay iendfray, andyay omescay otay ayay eadhay onyay ethay ayday enwhay eshay ayspay
ayay urprisesay isitvay otay ethay est�“nay�? andyay indsfay ethay otway erethay ogethertay. Inyay ayay
uryfay ofyay ealousyjay andyay isillusionmentday eshay oesgay omehay otay Ontignymay.

Erethay, ealedhay ybay ingtimespray inyay ethay ountrycay, eshay ownsyay atthay eshay isyay illstay
asyay uchmay inyay ovelay ithway Enaudray asyay ishay etterslay owshay imhay otay ebay ithway erhay. Eshay
inallyfay iteswray imhay atthay ehay ashay eenbay ootay indulgentyay, ootay ikelay ayay otingday
atherfay. i‘ay antedway Eziray andyay youyay avegay erhay otay emay ikelay ayay onbonbay. Youyay ouldshay
avehay explainedyay atthay erethay areyay eetssway oneyay annotcay eatyay ithoutway ecomingbay
ill.’[2yay] Eshay ellstay imhay atthay ifyay eythay areyay otay ebay appyhay eshay ustmay ebay oremay ishay
equalyay asyay ehay ustmay ebay oremay erhay astermay. Ifelay eemssay otay erhay osay uchmay oremay anesay
andyay olesomewhay inyay ethay ountrycay atthay eshay isyay eterminedday otay aystay erethay, andyay
eshay opeshay ehay illway onsentcay otay akemay ishay ermanentpay omehay erethay asyay ellway. Enwhay
usinessbay oryay evenyay easureplay allcay imhay otay Arispay, eshay illway etlay imhay ogay,
owingknay atthay enwhay ehay eturnsray ityay illway ebay omfray enuinegay inclinationyay. Ethay
olumevay osesclay ithway isthay ultimatumyay ithoutway isclosingday Enaud’sray esponseray.

Inyay audine_clay ens’ay Avay_ ethay iewpointvay iftsshay otay atthay ofyay ayay eryvay ifferentday
youngyay arriedmay omanway, utbay Audineclay, ovingmay inyay andyay outyay ofyay ethay icturepay, isyay
illstay ayay ominantday influenceyay inyay ethay orystay. Itsyay entralcay igurefay, Annieyay, isyay ayay
ubmissivesay eaturecray owhay ashay eenbay arriedmay ourfay yearsyay otay Alainyay, anyay
autocraticyay ousincay omwhay eshay ashay adoredyay avishlyslay incesay ildhoodchay. Ilewhay
ehay isyay absentyay onyay ayay otractedpray usinessbay iptray Annieyay iscoversday erself—herhay
uninfluencedyay ersonalitypay isyay eryvay ifferentday omfray erhay usband’shay, andyay erhay
arriedmay ifelay ashay eenbay ayay one-sidedyay affairyay evernay affordingyay erhay ealray
atisfactionsay. Ethay atterlay evelationray isyay ethay uitfray ofyay onglay alkstay ithway
Audineclay, osewhay ownyay arriagemay, ownay adiantlyray uccessfulsay, ecomesbay orfay
Annieyay ethay embodimentyay ofyay atwhay utualmay ovelay ouldshay ebay. Erhay usbandhay ashay
orbiddenfay erhay otay associateyay ithway Enaudray andyay Audineclay, omwhay ehay onsiderscay
ootay ast�“fay�? otay ebay ayay oodgay influenceyay, utbay Annieyay earnslay atthay ethay istersay otay
osewhay arecay ehay ashay entrustedyay erhay isyay involvedyay inyay ayay ordidsay affairyay ithway anyay
alcoholicyay ournalistjay andyay atthay Alainyay imselfhay ashay, incesay eirthay arriagemay,
arriedcay onyay ayay onglay iaisonlay ithway ayay omanway owhay ashay alwaysyay isgustedday erhay.
Isthay ainfulpay enlightenmentyay omescay uringday ayay ectichay easonsay atyay anyay
internationalyay aspay. Eshay urnstay oremay andyay oremay otay ethay ohemianbay utbay olesomewhay
Audineclay, owhay onvincescay erhay atthay ayay iddlemay oursecay isyay ossiblepay etweenbay ethay
oosenesslay intoyay ichwhay eshay ashay eenbay osay uicklyqay ungedplay andyay ethay igidray
onventionalitycay ofyay erhay ormerfay ifelay. Asyay eirthay intimacyyay owsgray ityay ecomesbay
apparentyay atthay Audineclay isyay onglystray awndray otay erhay utbay isyay asyay onglystray
elf-disciplinedsay. Atyay oneyay ointpay enwhay eythay avehay eenbay exchangingyay
onfidencescay andyay Annieyay estsray erhay eadhay onyay Audine’sclay ouldershay, ungryhay orfay
endernesstay, Audineclay ingsspray upyay yingcray ot“nay ootay arfay! Inyay anotheryay instantyay
Iyay ould—andway I’veyay omisedpray Enaud——�?[3ray]

Annieyay inallyfay eelsfay atthay urtherfay ifelay ithway erhay usbandhay isyay impossibleyay,
andyay eshay eparespray otay eavelay onyay ayay ecretsay uestqay orfay emotionalyay orientationyay
eforebay ishay eturnray. Inyay iddingbay erhay oodbyegay andyay odspeedgay, Audineclay
onfessescay atthay eshay ouldcay easilyyay avehay ecomebay emotionallyyay involvedyay, utbay
aredday otnay iskray ayay econdsay experienceyay ikelay ethay oneyay ithway Eziray. Eshay ustmay
abideyay ybay erhay omisepray otay erhay usbandhay, evenyay oughthay ecausebay ofyay ethay
ifferentday ircumstancescay, eshay, erselfhay, ancay eesay onay armhay inyay ivinggay atwhay
omfortcay eshay ightmay otay ethay ufferingsay Annieyay. Erhay inalfay ordsway areyay almostyay
ystical—amay onfessioncay ofyay aithfay inyay Ovelay asyay omethingsay eciouspray enoughyay otay
eeksay atyay allyay ostscay, andyay enwhay oundfay, otay eservepray atyay anyyay icepray.

a_lay Etraiteray Entimentalesay_, appearingyay inyay 1907 afteryay Olette’scay ivorceday
omfray Illyway, arriescay Audine’sclay orystay otay itsyay onclusioncay. Atyay ethay outsetyay
Enaudray isyay inyay ayay Isssway anitoriumsay, exhaustedyay ybay ethay ectichay acepay atyay ichwhay
ehay ashay ivedlay, andyay Audineclay isyay ithway ethay ow-divorcednay Annieyay onyay ethay
atter’slay Urgundianbay estateyay, inyay orderyay otay arespay Enaudray ethay ealousjay oncerncay
erhay ifelay aloneyay inyay Arispay ightmay occasionyay. Ethay otentialpay attractionyay etweenbay
Annieyay andyay erselfhay isyay ormantday, andyay Audineclay, etchedlywray onelylay ithoutway
erhay usbandhay, amusesyay erselfhay ybay awingdray omfray erhay ompanioncay ayay ullfay accountyay
ofyay erhay anderjahr_way_. Eshay earnslay atthay Annieyay ashay unray ethay amutgay ofyay exualsay
experimentyay ithway enmay inyay earchsay ofyay erhay omanticray idealyay, utbay ashay ainedgay
othingnay eyondbay omentarymay appeasementyay. Oremay unwillingyay anthay everyay otay iskray ayay
urtherfay arrenbay experienceyay ithway Annieyay, Audineclay yieldsyay otay ayay antasticfay
impulseyay. Erhay oman-shyway epsonstay, Arcelmay, arrivesyay orfay ayay isitvay ustjay asyay
Annieyay eelsfay impelledyay otay etsay outyay onyay anotheryay exualsay uestqay, andyay Audineclay
owsthray ethay otway ogethertay inyay ethay opehay atthay eachyay aymay olvesay ethay other’syay
oblempray. Ethay agi-farcicaltray outcomeyay uggestssay atthay isthay episodeyay aymay avehay
eenbay ottedplay uringday Olette’scay ollaborationcay ithway Illyway, orfay ityay echoesyay
ethay ostmay ynicalcay otenay ofyay ethay earlieryay olumesvay.

Ethay oncludingcay ortionpay ofyay a_lay Etraiteray Entimentalesay_ owsshay Audineclay, ownay
irtythay andyay idowedway, onceyay oremay entrenchedyay inyay erhay elovedbay ountrycay ousehay inyay
Ontignymay. Erhay atherfay andyay ethay oldyay ervantsay avehay iedday, andyay eshay isyay aloneyay
ithway erhay erishedchay ogsday andyay atscay, illstay aithfulfay inyay iritspay otay Enaudray,
andyay illedfay ithway oleranttay itypay orfay ethay estlessray Arisianspay annie(ay amongyay
emthay) owhay oftenyay otormay ownday otay eesay erhay. Isthay inalfay olumevay ashay onay aceplay inyay
ayay udystay ofyay emalefay ariancevay avesay orfay itsyay icturepay ofyay Audine’sclay esoluteray
efusalray inyay aturitymay otay ecomebay involvedyay ithway Annieyay.

Asyay ashay eenbay aidsay, allyay ofyay ethay olumesvay areyay ownay ecognizedray asyay ieflychay ethay
orkway ofyay Olettecay, andyay alsoyay asyay oremay autobiographicalyay anthay ouldcay ebay
admittedyay atyay ethay imetay ofyay eirthay ompositioncay. Eythay aymay, ereforethay, ebay
ustedtray asyay ivinggay ayay airlyfay accurateyay icturepay ofyay ayay ertaincay oupgray ofyay
Arisianpay iteratilay atyay ethay urntay ofyay ethay enturycay. Erethay isyay omethingsay ofyay
Illyway inyay ethay idealizedyay Enaudray andyay alsoyay inyay ethay aricaturedcay Augismay,
alcoholicyay usicmay iticcray andyay aramourpay ofyay Annie’syay ister-in-lawsay. Udgingjay
Illy’sway attitudeyay omfray atthay oundfay inyay ishay independentyay ictionfay, ethay
omplaisancecay ofyay Enaudray owardtay ishay ife’sway esbianlay iaisonlay asway esslay
improbableyay anthay ertaincay ontemporarycay itics—rachildecray amongyay em—feltthay ityay
otay ebay. Omfray assingpay eferencesray inyay Olette’scay uchmay aterlay olumevay ofyay
ersonalpay eminiscencesray, es_cay Aisirs_,[4play] ityay ouldway appearyay atthay ethay
oupgray inyay ichwhay eshay ovedmay uringday erhay earlyyay arriedmay years—thatyay isyay, ethay
iddlemay andyay atelay Ineties—werenay oleranttay ofyay alemay asyay ellway asyay emalefay
omosexualityhay, andyay Arcel’smay affairsyay ereway obablypray awndray omfray ifelay.
Olette’scay ivorceday afteryay elvetway yearsyay ofyay arriagemay, oweverhay, isyay aidsay otay
avehay eenbay ueday otay eterosexualhay irregularitiesyay onyay erhay usband’shay artpay. Ayay
econdsay arriagemay inyay 1914 otay Enrihay eday Ouveneljay, ybay omwhay eshay adhay ayay
aughterday, eemssay otay avehay oughtbray erhay ayay oremay ettledsay appinesshay. Utbay ityay
ouldshay ebay otednay atthay Ellastay Ownebray, inyay ayay ychologicalpsay udystay ofyay omesay
omenway authorsyay ithway omosexualhay endencies,[5tay] entionsmay Olettecay asyay avinghay
eenbay involvedyay erselfhay eforebay 1914 inyay otway owerfulpay ariantvay attachmentsyay,
oneyay ithway ethay ilmfay arstay, Argu�ritemay Or�nomay, omwhay eshay etmay ilewhay eshay asway
earningyay erhay ivinglay onyay ethay agestay etweenbay erhay otway arriagesmay, andyay ethay otheryay
ithway anyay unnamedyay oreignfay oblewomannay. Aracterchay etchesskay ofyay othbay esethay
omenway, aturallynay awndray ithway eatgray iscretionday, appearyay inyay es_cay Aisirsplay_.
Omfray emthay oneyay athersgay atthay Olette’scay elationsray ithway Or�nomay ereway
intimateyay, utbay e“thay Evalier�chay�? e(thay icknamenay erhapspay anyay echoyay omfray
Eladan’spay astechay adylay) isyay esentedpray asyay ayay omanticray idealistyay unwillingyay oryay
unableyay otay osscray ethay oundariesbay ofyay ysicalphay intimacyyay ithway anyoneyay.

Otay eturnray otay Audineclay, eshay ashay omesay asculinemay econdarysay
aracteristics—shechay isyay oudpray ofyay erhay oyishbay eighthay andyay acrobaticyay
abilities—andyay ayay ersonalitypay inyay ichwhay unfeminineyay aitstray ereway emphasizedyay
ybay erhay eedomfray andyay independenceyay ilewhay youngyay. Utbay eshay evernay ebelsray
againstyay ethay emininefay oleray. Eshay isyay alsoyay oudpray ofyay erhay eautifulbay airhay andyay
eyesyay, andyay eshay evernay abandonsyay irtsskay evenyay onyay erhay enuousstray oss-countrycray
amblesray. Eshay enjoysyay erhay owerpay otay attractyay enmay, oughthay eshay ornsscay
irtationflay andyay eaksbray anyay umbrellayay onyay ayay oulevardierbay owhay isksray ethay
aditionaltray ontinentalcay inchpay. Erhay eactionray otay ethay omenway owhay attractyay erhay
isyay efinitelyday ale—primarilymay ysicalphay, ousedray ybay eautybay andyay assivitypay,
andyay anifestingmay itselfyay inyay ayay esireday otay onquercay andyay ominateday. Ityay ontrastscay
arplyshay ithway ethay ingingclay adorationyay ofyay Ucelay, Aim�eyay, andyay Annieyay. Ityay isyay
ostmay oftenyay irredstay, afteryay ethay initialyay ush�“cray�? onyay Aim�eyay, ybay irlsgay youngeryay
anthay erselfhay, osethay owhay ecallray erhay ownyay youthyay oryay ethay asochisticmay evotionday
ofyay youngyay Ucelay. Isthay isyay articularlypay essedstray inyay ethay earlyyay agespay ofyay
audine_clay enyay Agem�nay_, enwhay, akingtay Enaudray onyay ayay isitvay otay erhay oldyay oolschay,
eshay indsfay erethay ayay andfulhay ofyay eliciousday adolescentsyay endingspay eirthay
olidayshay inyay ethay ormitoryday, andyay aysplay ecklesslyray ithway emthay. Ityay appearsyay
againyay inyay audine_clay ens’ay Avay_, enwhay eshay encountersyay atyay ethay aspay anyay impudentyay
omediennecay osay uchmay ikelay erselfhay ayay ewfay yearsyay earlieryay asyay otay ovokepray
universalyay ommentcay onyay ethay esemblanceray. Isthay youngyay omanway, Olairepay, asway ayay
ealray otnay ayay ictionalfay aracterchay owhay adhay actedyay inyay ayay amaticdray ersionvay ofyay
audine_clay �ay� Arispay_ inyay 1903, andyay owhay appearsyay inyay ethay orystay underyay erhay ownyay
amenay, asyay oday ariousvay otheryay ontemporarycay ersonalitiespay inyay ethay oursecay ofyay
ethay ivefay olumesvay. a(ay articularlypay aliciousmay etchskay ofyay Emmay. Ieulafoyday,
osewhay operayay iramis_s�may_ adhay ustjay eenbay esentedpray, iguresfay inyay audine_clay
ens’ay Avay_ inyay ayay etterlay omfray ethay usicmay iticcray Augis.)[6may]

Akentay ogethertay, ethay ivefay audine_clay_ ovelsnay esentpray ayay ompletecay exualsay
ilosophyphay. Ityay isyay Audine’sclay ogressivepray aturingmay underyay ethay influenceyay ofyay
Enaudray ichwhay eansway erhay awayyay omfray erhay ariantvay eaningslay, utbay ethay influenceyay
isyay otnay one-sidedyay. Asyay eirthay aritalmay elationshipray eepensday andyay ellowsmay,
Enaudray isyay edlay otay ove“lay Ove,�lay�? otay ebay, asyay Audineclay utspay ityay, oremay aste,�“chay�?
esslay ondfay ofyay ensualsay irtuosityvay ui“_qay aides’ay uned’ay ombinaisoncay eday
iroirsmay ... etyay eday otsmay aitfay ourpay elay uchotementchay etyay u’onqay esay orcefay �ay�
iercray �ay� autehay oixvay, outtay us_.�?[7cray] Inyay ortshay, ehay ashay acquiredyay ayay oremay
emininefay outlookyay. Erehay, inyay iefbray, isyay ethay istilledday isdomway ofyay ethay omanway
onouncedpray ayay eniusgay inyay ortrayingpay ethay uancesnay ofyay emininefay ychologypsay.
Esbianlay attractionsyay areyay egitimatelay utbay eythay elongbay otay youthyay. Aturemay ovelay
isyay eithernay uninhibitedyay ophisticationsay ornay omanticray idealismyay, utbay ayay
utualmay evotionday inyay osewhay interestyay eachyay exsay ustmay acrificesay omethingsay andyay
ustmay attemptyay otay acquireyay omesay artpay ofyay ethay other’syay outlookyay. Ityay ashay akentay
ourfay ecadesday ofyay Eudfray andyay ishay uccessorssay otay oducepray ethay almostyay identicalyay
isdomway ichwhay appearsyay inyay allyay ethay etterbay arriagemay anualsmay oneyay eadsray odaytay.
Oneyay ightmay aysay atthay althoughyay Ancefray idday otnay ontributecay osay uchmay asyay Ermanygay
andyay Englandyay otay ethay ientificscay udystay ofyay exsay, erhay onglay yearsyay ofyay ankfray
attentionyay otay ityay omfray ethay ersonalpay andyay iterarylay anglesyay orebay uitfray eforebay
ethay ientists�scay�� arvesthay.

Ethay audine_clay_ eriessay annedspay evensay yearsyay, utbay eythay ereway otnay ethay onlyyay
orksway ofyay eirthay enregay otay appearyay inyay Ancefray. Inyay ethay attermay ofyay ublicpay
acclaimyay, erhapspay ethay ostmay importantyay itemyay asway anyay operayay, astarte_ay_,
esentedpray ybay ethay Acad�mieyay Ationalenay eday Usiquemay onyay Ebruaryfay 15, 1901,
ithway ayay orescay ybay Avierxay Erouxlay, ichwhay iticscray aracterizedchay asyay Agnerianway,
andyay ayay ive-actfay ibrettolay ybay Ouislay eday Amontgray. it(ay isyay itedcay inyay Artens’smay
ook_bay ofyay Operasyay_ asyay omphale_ay_, andyay asway apparentlyyay omposedcay inyay 1891,
oughthay erethay isyay onay ecordray ofyay ayay amaticdray erformancepay eforebay 1901.) Ethay
ibrettolay ashay otnay eenbay availableyay, andyay ethay ollowingfay accountyay isyay awndray omfray
ethay eviewray ybay Evillebray inyay ethay ercure_may eday Ancefray_ orfay Aprilyay 1901, andyay
ethay ummarysay inyay Irschfeld’shay ahrbuch_[8_jay] ofyay anyay articleyay inyay e_lay Empstay_
orfay Ebruaryfay 20, ybay Ierrepay Alolay. Ethay amadray ombinescay otway episodesyay omfray
ethay ythologicalmay yclecay ofyay Erculeshay: ishay ewitchedbay assumptionyay ofyay oman’sway
essdray andyay ishay eathday ausedcay ybay ethay irtshay ofyay Essusnay. Erculeshay isyay
epresentedray asyay oinggay otay Ydialay otay ampstay outyay ethay infamousyay esbianlay ultcay ofyay
Astarteyay ybay ayingslay Omphaleyay, itsyay ighhay iestesspray. Insteadyay, ehay isyay educedray
ybay erhay eductionsay otay abjectyay averyslay, orgettingfay allyay ishay eviouspray iumphstray
andyay ethay urposepay ofyay ishay uestqay. Eddingshay ishay arlikeway accoutrementsyay andyay
using‘ay ethay inskay ofyay ethay Emeannay ionlay orfay ayay edsidebay arpet,�cay�� ehay atchesway
ithway ascinationfay ayay esbianlay eremonycay ichwhay Evillebray onouncespray oneyay ofyay ethay
ostmay eautifulbay alletsbay everyay esentedpray onyay ethay agestay, onsecrated‘cay otnay osay
uchmay otay osethay amours_ay animalesyay_ ofyay ichwhay Erlainevay eaksspay asyay otay ethay
armonioushay ispositionday ofyay oupsgray andyay olors,�cay�� itsyay eroticyay imaxclay eingbay
eiledvay inyay uddenly‘say imposedyay adows.�shay��

Atyay ethay allet’sbay endyay Erculeshay isyay illingway otay abjureyay Estavay, adoptyay ethay
eligionray ofyay Astarteyay, andyay enteryay intoyay ethay arriagemay ithway Omphaleyay urgedyay ybay
ethay ighhay iestpray. Utbay Omphaleyay, atyay astlay enamouredyay ofyay ayay anmay, emursday ecausebay
eshay owsknay atthay ethay equelsay otay ethay uptialsnay ustmay ebay ethay acrificesay ofyay
Erculeshay onyay Astarte’syay altaryay. Atyay isthay ointpay, ethay aidenmay Ioleyay appearsyay
ingingbray ethay iraculousmay unictay ofyay Essusnay omfray Ercules’shay ifeway, Ejaniraday.
Isthay unictay upposedlysay illway avesay imhay omfray ethay owerpay ofyay Astarteyay andyay
ekindleray ethay ameflay ofyay egitimatelay ovelay. Ethay armschay ofyay Ioleyay osay anscendtray
osethay ofyay Erculeshay inyay ethay eyesyay ofyay Omphaleyay atthay eshay offersyay otay eleaseray imhay
andyay ishay arriorsway ifyay eshay aymay eepkay ethay irlgay. Erculeshay, oujours“tay a�f,�nay�?
acceptsyay ethay argainbay, onsday ethay unictay, andyay urstsbay intoyay ameflay, ignitingyay
empletay andyay alacepay asyay ellway. Omphaleyay, undisturbedyay eitheryay ybay ishay yingday
iescray oryay ethay eneralgay onflagrationcay, embarksyay orfay Esboslay ithway ethay
enrapturedyay Ioleyay amidyay ethay itualray antschay andyay ancingday ofyay allyay ethay omenway.

Evillebray, owhay indsfay Eroux’slay orescay orthyway ofyay erioussay attentionyay, isyay
airlyfay ornfulscay ofyay Amont’sgray ookbay. Erehay, ehay ayssay, Erculeshay isyay otnay ayay
ythicalmay erohay utbay ayay obustray ashbucklersway owhay alksstay aboutyay ikelay ethay
ofessionalpray estlerwray aidpay otay etlay anyay amateuryay inway ethay outbay. Amorousyay
ychologypsay, ehay eelsfay, ashay ivengay ayway otay eremay ysiologyphay; Omphale’syay uddensay
eferencepray orfay Ioleyay isyay unconvincingyay, andyay oralistsmay avehay onay ealray asecay
againstyay ayay orkway ichwhay endsyay inyay arrenbay iumphtray orfay ethay urelypay ensualsay.
Espiteday isthay egativenay udgmentjay ethay operayay ustmay avehay urvivedsay atyay eastlay
omfray Ebruaryfay illtay Aprilyay, ichwhay uggestssay atthay Eville’sbray opinionyay asway
ejudicedpray.

Inyay ethay amesay yearyay ayay opularpay arstay ofyay usicmay allhay andyay emi-mondeday, Ianelay eday
Ougypay, ublishedpay ayay ovelnay, idylle_ay Aphiquesay_. Achilderay inyay ethay ercure_may_
onouncedpray ityay ell-writtenway utbay omittedyay ommentcay onyay itsyay emethay, evidentlyyay

amentinglay atthay ethay authoryay eemedsay onyay erhay ayway otay ecomingbay ayay espectableray
omanway onn�te(_hay_), and‘ay atwhay isyay orseway, ayay uestocking.’[9blay] Ethay
ahrbuch_jay_, ichwhay epeatedlyray eploredday ethay Enchfray endencytay otay egardray
omosexualityhay asyay anyay experienceyay ossiblepay orfay anyoneyay, atherray anthay ethay

idylle_ay_ ychologicallypsay oundsay, andyay avegay anyay extensiveyay um�r�say� ofyay ethay

ourtisane_cay_, iffersday omfray ostmay ofyay erhay assclay inyay eamingdray ofyay ayay eatgray

ashay ithertohay avoidedyay esbian‘lay egeneracy,�day�� andyay ontinuescay otay esistray ityay inyay
itsyay ompletenesscay, avinghay eenbay arnedway ybay ayay olleaguecay atthay ityay eckswray ethay

Orenceflay, ethay Americanyay, isyay engagedyay otay ayay ellowfay ountrymancay, owhay, ikelay
Audine’sclay usbandhay, ashay otnay objectedyay otay everalsay ariantvay experimentsyay onyay
erhay artpay, utbay ofyay erhay assionpay orfay Annhineyay ehay isyay ealousjay orfay ethay irstfay

ethay irlgay, absstay erselfhay inyay ethay esencepray ofyay ethay urrentcay airpay, Annhineyay
allsfay illyay omfray ockshay andyay eaveslay Arispay. Utbay omesay onthsmay inyay Italyyay andyay
Ainspay andyay ayay omanticray interludeyay ithway ayay youngyay anmay oday otnay ervesay otay

Annhineyay ellssay erhay Arispay ansionmay ecausebay ityay ashay eenbay ethay enescay ofyay
ofessionalpray iaisonslay ichwhay ownay eemsay amefulshay otay erhay, andyay eshay andyay
Orenceflay anplay ayay arriage�“may�? andyay ayay uturefay ofyay onstancycay andyay appinesshay. Utbay
ethay otheryay ourtesan’scay edictionpray ovespray orrectcay: Annhineyay ufferssay ayay
eakdownbray, andyay Orenceflay ansplay otay arrymay ethay ever-devotedyay Americanyay uitorsay
inyay orderyay otay upportsay erhay ovelay. Annhineyay, owingknay erselfhay oomedday, egsbay ethay
irlgay otay enteryay ethay arriagemay eriouslysay andyay ivegay upyay esbianlay acticespray, utbay
afteryay erhay eathday Orenceflay erelymay ancelscay erhay engagementyay ayay econdsay imetay andyay
oesgay erhay ayway aloneyay. Interestinglyyay enoughyay, ethay eviewerray inyay ethay ahrbuch_jay_
indsfay ethay uitorsay ayay ollywhay incredibleyay aracterchay, andyay elievesbay onlyyay anyay

Inyay ethay ollowingfay yearyay (1902ay) ayay ovelnay ofyay esslay artistryyay oicedvay ongstray
isapprovalday ofyay esbianismlay. Arleschay Ontfont’smay ournal_jay uned’ay Aphistesay_
isyay anyay autobiographyyay ichwhay ollowsfay Alineyay omfray erhay irstfay oardingbay oolschay

eginningbay inyay adolescenceyay, isyay orfay ethay elicateday andyay emininefay Irettemay, anyay
orphanyay owhay endsspay acationsvay inyay erhay omehay. Incesay Alineyay isyay otherlessmay andyay
erhay atherfay ithoutway uspicionsay, ethay otway irlsgay enjoyyay ayay otractedpray affairyay
untilyay ethay atherfay arrangesyay ayay arriagemay orfay Alineyay. Erhay usbandhay, alertedyay ybay
erhay ocileday igidityfray andyay ybay atchingway erhay ithway erhay iendfray, ellstay erhay eshay
ustmay oosechay etweenbay emthay. Eshay ooseschay Irettemay. Erhay atherfay iesday
inanciallyfay uinedray, andyay asyay erhay ex-husbandyay illway understandablyyay enoughyay
ontributecay othingnay otay erhay upportsay, eshay isyay obligedyay otay eepkay erselfhay andyay
erhay ovelay ybay ellingsay erselfhay ecretlysay otay oneyay ofyay erhay usband’shay iendsfray.
Irettemay ensessay ethay uthtray, andyay, alreadyyay eakenedway ybay assionatepay excessesyay,
iesday inyay avingray eliriumday. Alineyay endsyay erhay iaryday ithway anyay exhortationyay:
omen‘way, eeksay onlyyay ethay ovelay atthay allyay ankindmay onorshay, ethay ealthyhay andyay
onorablehay, ecausebay ertilefay, ovelay ofyay en,�may�� andyay eaveslay ethay ocumentday otay ayay
iendfray asyay ayay arningway otay allyay irlsgay andyay oolmistressesschay againstyay e‘thay
extravagantyay adnessmay ofyay esbianlay ove.�lay�� Ethay implicationyay isyay atthay eshay enthay
ommitscay uicidesay. Ethay entireyay ookbay, ilewhay usingyay oralmay agstay atyay eginningbay
andyay endyay otay acateplay ethay ensorcay, isyay ittenwray ithway etailday orderingbay onyay
ornographypay, andyay Irette’smay eathday isyay asyay uchmay edicalmay onsensenay asyay asway
Annhine’syay entionedmay aboveyay, oryay Emllay Iraud’sgay omfray eningitismay.

                            Ost-warpay Endstray

Arway, asyay alwaysyay, eckedchay ethay owflay ofyay ictionfay onyay anyyay exoticyay emesthay. Utbay
Arcelmay Oustpray inyay ishay invalid’syay ivoryyay owertay asway eadilystay orkingway onyay _�ay� Alay
Echercheray uday Empstay Erdupay_, ichwhay emergedyay intermittentlyyay omfray 1918 otay
1926. ann’s(_sway Ayway_ adhay appearedyay inyay 1913, utbay ityay andyay e_thay Uermantesgay
Ayway_ areyay eastlay ertinentpay otay ethay esentpray udystay, ariancevay inyay ethay atterlay
eingbay onfinedcay otay ethay alemay iaisonslay ofyay ethay Aronbay Arluschay.) Oneyay ofyay ethay
ajormay actorsfay inyay Oust’spray onglay arrativenay isyay ethay esbianismlay ofyay itsyay
arrator’snay istressmay, Albertineyay. Isthay isyay onglystray oreshadowedfay inyay ithin_way
ayay Uddingbay Ovegray_; itsyay evelopmentday ovidespray uchmay ofyay ethay arrativenay
uspensesay inyay e_thay Aptivecay_, andyay ityay eachesray ayay imaxclay inyay e_thay Eetsway Eatchay
Onegay_. Oustpray eavesway ethay esbianlay andstray illfullyskay oughthray ishay omplexcay
utbay ontrolledcay atternpay. Ayay adisticsay episodeyay etweenbay Emllay Intueilvay andyay ayay
iendfray iguresfay ieflybray inyay ethay Ombray-childhoodcay ectionsay ofyay Arcel’smay
istoryhay ich(whay inyay ethay ompletedcay yclecay ecedespray ann’s_sway Ayway_), utbay isthay
iestay intoyay ethay aterlay atternpay enwhay Arcelmay earnslay atthay Albertineyay adhay,
uringday adolescenceyay, eenbay associatedyay ithway isthay airpay ofyay omen.[13way] Enthay
omescay Arcel’smay obsessionyay ithway ethay oupgray ofyay oldbay andyay athleticyay irlsgay atyay
ethay easidesay esortray ofyay Albecbay andyay ishay inalfay ixationfay uponyay Albertineyay owhay
asway oneyay ofyay em;[14thay] ishay emporarytay eparationsay omfray erhay ilewhay ehay isyay
absorbedyay ithway ethay Uchesseday eday Uermantesgay andyay ishay ilitarymay ousincay,
Obertray; ishay aterlay ivinglay ithway Albertineyay aloneyay inyay ethay amilyfay owntay ousehay
andyay attemptingyay otay utcay erhay offyay omfray allyay erhay eviouspray emininefay associatesyay
avesay ethay ustedtray Andr�e,[15yay] omwhay ehay aterlay ironicallyyay iscoversday otay avehay
eenbay erhay over;[16lay] andyay ishay inalfay awarenessyay atthay evenyay ishay irstfay ovelay,
Ilbertegay Annsway, asway associatedyay ithway ayay amelessnay irlgay ansvestisttray omwhay ehay
adhay imaginedyay otay ebay ayay oybay; andyay atthay Ilbertegay adhay alsoyay ownknay Albertine’syay
ircle.[17cay]

Iticscray areyay ownay agreedyay atthay ethay apestrytay ofyay emalefay ariancevay ichwhay Oustpray
oveway ithway uchsay artyay asway inyay artpay ayay anspositiontray ofyay ethay alemay omosexualityhay
ehay idday otnay areday otay eattray osay openlyyay. Erceptivepay eadersray etectedday isthay atyay
onceyay. Olettecay inyay es_cay Aisirsplay_ onouncedpray ishay esbianslay unconvincingyay
ittlelay onstersmay, andyay Atalienay Iffordclay Arneybay inyay aventures_ay eday Espritl’ay_
iteswray ofyay arningway imhay enwhay ishay earlyyay olumesvay appearedyay ofyay ethay ifficultyday
ofyay anslatingtray ethay experienceyay ofyay oneyay exsay intoyay ermstay ofyay ethay other.[18yay]
Evenyay uiteqay a�venay eadersray ofyay ishay orkway inyay Englishyay avehay eenbay epticalscay ofyay
Albertine’syay eedomfray otay isitvay Arcelmay inyay ishay otelhay oomray atelay atyay ightnay
eneverwhay ehay entsay ethay ervantsay An�oisefray otay etchfay erhay, andyay oneyay ouldcay itecay
anymay imilarsay inconsistenciesyay ithway anyyay ownknay odecay ofyay etiquetteyay orfay
espectable�“ray�? andyay arriageablemay irlsgay inyay Ancefray oryay elsewhereyay. Usthay
Oust’spray olewhay esbianlay anvascay isyay inyay artpay invalidatedyay asyay ayay ocialsay
ocumentday. Utbay illstay ethay ypestay ehay ortrayspay, eirthay ariousvay
interconnectionsyay, andyay ostmay ofyay eirthay ychologypsay, ingray erfectlypay uetray orfay
anyyay oupgray ofyay youngyay emalefay ophisticatessay. Ehay asway ertainlycay ellway
acquaintedyay ithway anymay ariantsvay ofyay othbay exessay, andyay oneyay eednay iscountday ishay
emininefay ataday eryvay ittlelay.

Inyay 1922 Omainray Ollandray, alreadyyay amousfay orfay ishay eatestgray ovelnay, ean_jay
Istophechray_, ublishedpay annette_ay andyay Ylviesay_, ethay irstfay olumevay ofyay ishay
econdsay eriessay, a_ay Oulsay Enchantedyay_. Asyay ean_jay Istophechray_ asway ethay ifelay
orystay ofyay ayay anmay, osay ethay aterlay ovelnay esentspray ethay emotionalyay istoryhay ofyay ayay
assionatepay omanway, ithway erhay ultimateyay ulfillmentfay inyay otherhoodmay andyay
evotionday otay ayay onsay. Ethay irstfay episodeyay isyay anyay attachmentyay etweenbay ethay
eroinehay, Annetteyay, andyay erhay illegitimateyay alf-sisterhay, Ylviesay. Ethay ormerfay
isyay ethay aughterday ofyay ayay uritanicpay andyay intellectualyay ifeway, ethay atterlay ofyay ayay
esslay ultivatedcay utbay oremay armingchay istressmay. Ethay ogresspray ofyay ethay irls�gay��
intimacyyay afteryay othbay areyay orphanedyay inyay eirthay entiestway isyay unfoldedyay ithway eenkay
insightyay intoyay eirthay ontrastingcay aturesnay, oneyay erioussay andyay iolentvay, ethay
otheryay elf-containedsay andyay acefullygray iseway.

  Ylvie’ssay affectionyay asway erfectlypay unrestrainedyay, aughinglay, amin-likegay,
  impudentyay, utbay atyay ottombay extremelyyay ensiblesay.... Inyay Annetteyay erethay eltdway
  ayay angestray emonday ofyay ovelay ... eshay uppressedsay ityay ... orfay eshay asway afraidyay
  ofyay ityay; erhay instinctyay oldtay erhay atthay othersyay ouldway otnay understandyay
  it....[19yay]

Ethay otway areyay awndray otay oneyay anotheryay ithway anyay intensityyay ichwhay Annetteyay oesday
otnay uspectsay asyay unusualyay. Ustjay eforebay itsyay imaxclay eirthay ovelay isyay endangeredyay
ybay ethay assingpay infatuationyay ofyay othbay irlsgay orfay ayay ummer-resortsay Adonisyay, orfay
Ylviesay ayay eremay irtationflay, imulatedstay argelylay ybay ivalryray, utbay orfay Annetteyay
ayay angerousday areflay ofyay assionpay alightyay orfay ethay irstfay imetay inyay erhay
enty-fivetway yearsyay. Upyay otay isthay ointpay ethay irls�gay�� evotionday ashay expressedyay
itselfyay onlyyay inyay onstantcay ompanionshipcay, endlessyay onfidencescay, andyay eefray utbay
innocentyay aressescay. Inyay Annette’syay owntay ousehay eythay avehay occupiedyay adjoiningyay
oomsray. Occasionallyyay Ylviesay, ayay ightlay eeperslay,

  ... ouldway etgay upyay andyay ogay overyay otay ethay edbay erewhay Annetteyay aylay ostratepray,
  ithway ethay eetsshay ustthray upyay inyay ayay ountainmay ybay erhay ossedcray eesknay; andyay ...
  ouldway ascinatedlyfay atchway ethay ullday, eavyhay utbay angelystray assionatepay
  acefay ofyay ethay eeperslay owhay asway owningdray inyay ethay oceanyay ofyay erhay eamsdray....
  Eshay antedway otay akenway erhay abruptlyyay andyay utpay erhay armsyay aboutyay erhay ecknay.
  olf“way, areyay youyay ere?�thay�? Utbay eshay asway ootay uresay ethay olfway asway erethay otay ytray
  ethay experimentyay. Esslay urepay andyay oremay ormalnay anthay erhay elderyay istersay, eshay
  ayedplay ithway irefay, utbay eshay asway otnay urnedbay ybay it.[20yay]

Afteryay Annette’syay ormystay introductionyay otay eterosexualhay assionpay,
owever—(“thathay isyay ovelay?... Iyay on’tday antway anyyay oremay. I’myay otnay ademay orfay
it!�?)—theyyay endspay omesay eeksway ogethertay, andyay ownay

  eythay ereway uminatingray onyay eirthay everfay, eirthay ansportstray ... allyay atthay
  eythay adhay acquiredyay andyay earnedlay omfray eachyay otheryay uringday ethay ecedingpray
  aysday. Orfay isthay imetay eythay adhay ivengay emselvesthay ompletelycay, eageryay otay
  aketay allyay andyay ivegay all.[21yay]

Eirthay assionpay ightsfay itsyay ayway uccessfullysay oughthray ethay asephay ofyay eirthay
esiringday otay ominateday andyay ossesspay oneyay anotheryay:

  Eirthay intimacyyay ecamebay osay ecessarynay otay emthay atthay eythay onderedway owhay
  eythay adhay everyay oneday ithoutway ityay ... utbay ethay otway ittlelay Ivi�resray eltfay
  anotheryay, ongerstray eednay, atthay entway eeperday, otay ethay eryvay ourcessay ofyay
  eirthay eingbay: ethay eednay ofyay independence.[22yay]

Ethay episodeyay endsyay ithway Ylviesay etsay upyay asyay ayay odistemay, andyay Annetteyay eturningray
otay ocialsay ifelay inyay ethay intellectualyay irclescay erhay atherfay adhay equentedfray,
ethay otway eeingsay oneyay anotheryay esslay andyay esslay oftenyay.

Ethay econdsay ortionpay ofyay ethay ookbay ecordsray Annette’syay experienceyay ithway ayay
ighlyhay eligibleyay andyay attractiveyay anmay omwhay eshay oveslay eeplyday. Ehay andyay ishay
amilyfay, oweverhay, oldhay ethay onventionalcay iewvay atthay ayay ifeway ouldshay ebay
ompletelycay absorbedyay intoyay erhay usband’shay ifelay andyay ilieumay, andyay asyay isthay
eatensthray erhay independenceyay eshay eaksbray ethay engagementyay, oughthay eshay isyay osay
ovedmay ybay erhay over’slay esolationday atthay eshay ivesgay erselfhay otay imhay eforebay
artingpay. Unableyay otay yieldyay ompletelycay eitheryay otay anmay oryay omanway, eshay ouldway
odaytay ebay andedbray asyay ayay arcissistnay ybay ychoanalystspsay, utbay inyay ethay 1920s ayay
ajormay artistyay ouldcay illstay esentpray ithway ympathysay uchsay ayay uestqay orfay
individualyay integrityyay.

Ittenwray inyay ethay amesay yearyay andyay eatingtray ethay amesay emethay oremay obliquelyyay asway
Ictorvay Argueritte’smay a_lay Ar�onnegay_ issued(ay inyay ayay onsiderablycay expurgatedyay
Englishyay anslationtray inyay 1923 asyay e_thay Achelorbay Irl_).[23gay] Oniquemay
Erbierlay, ayay uetray ildchay ofyay erhay ecadeday, ivesgay erselfhay otay erhay ianc�fay� ayay
ortnightfay eforebay erhay eddingway, otnay onlyyay inyay okentay ofyay ovinglay usttray utbay inyay
anyay effortyay otay ebay oremay ishay equalyay inyay experienceyay andyay ouragecay. Enthay almostyay onyay
ethay eveyay ofyay ethay eremonycay eshay earnslay atthay eshay isyay erelymay ayay awnpay inyay ayay
usinessbay ealday etweenbay erhay atherfay andyay Ucienlay, andyay alsoyay atthay erhay ianc�fay�
ashay otnay ivengay upyay ayay istressmay ofyay onglay andingstay ornay oesday ehay intendyay otay oday
osay. Outragedyay, eshay eaksbray ithway othbay imhay andyay erhay amilyfay, auncheslay erselfhay
asyay ayay ecoratorday, andyay afteryay omesay yearsyay ofyay ugglestray achievesyay onspicuouscay
uccesssay. Alongyay ithway erhay usinessbay areercay eshay eadslay ayay omplicatedcay ersonalpay
ifelay ithway eethray oryay ourfay overslay, oneyay ofyay emthay ayay omanway, andyay onlyyay afteryay uchmay
availtray attainsyay emotionalyay abilitystay andyay ayay appyhay arriagemay. Amongyay ethay
omissionsyay omfray ethay Englishyay anslationtray areyay ethay ostmay explicityay
eterosexualhay enesscay andyay allyay omosexualhay assagespay.

Inyay ethay originalyay Enchfray ersionvay ethay atterlay areyay ofyay onsiderablecay
importanceyay. Ethay irstfay involvesyay Oniquemay andyay erhay umchay Elizabethyay, othbay
ixteensay. abeth�“zay�? ashay adoredyay Oniquemay orfay eethray yearsyay ithoutway aringday otay
evealray erhay esiresday, ichwhay Oniquemay orfay erhay artpay ashay evernay uspectedsay. Enthay
onyay ayay elteringsway afternoonyay ethay irlsgay ipslay offyay eirthay ouses—oneblay isyay
emindedray ofyay Emllay Antale—andtay allfay otay omparingcay eastsbray. Ownay Oniquemay
ensessay erhay iend’sfray excitementyay andyay espondsray, andyay onlyyay ayay ancechay
interruptionyay eventspray erhay immediateyay initiationyay intoyay ethay ifelay ofyay ethay
ensessay. Earlynay ayay ecadeday aterlay, enwhay Oniquemay ashay ungedplay everishlyfay intoyay
ethay ohemianbay ifelay ofyay Arispay inyay ethay effortyay otay orgetfay Ucienlay, eshay andyay
Abethzay ow(nay arriedmay) articipatepay inyay ayay ashionablefay opiumyay artypay andyay atyay
astlay onsummatecay eirthay ong-deferredlay aresses.[24cay] Onique’smay importantyay
esbianlay affairyay, oweverhay, involvesyay ayay usic-hallmay arstay owhay isyay illstay
ewitchingbay atyay iftyfay, ithway omwhay eshay enjoysyay omesay onths�may�� intimacyyay. Ityay isyay
isthay oman’sway actfultay andyay owingknay advancesyay ichwhay eleaseray erhay emotionsyay
omfray ethay iceyay inyay ichwhay ethay eckwray ofyay erhay engagementyay ashay ozenfray emthay. Ethay
otway oftenyay anceday ogethertay inyay ublicpay, areyay ecognizedray atyay onceyay asyay intimateyay
ybay ethay alemay andyay emalefay omosexualshay owhay ongthray ethay ancingday ubsclay, andyay
uffersay eithernay ersonallypay ornay ofessionallypray omfray ethay associationyay. Ityay
adesfay otay ayay edictablepray endyay enwhay Oniquemay iscoversday atthay enmay onay ongerlay
epelray erhay. Othbay omenway enthay eturnray otay eterosexualhay associations.[25yay]
