Asyay inyay e-warpray yearsyay, uringday isthay irdthay ecadeday ariantvay ovelsnay ofyay allyay
ualitiesqay armedsway omfray ethay essespray: Oust’spray odome_say etyay Omorrhegay_
(1921-22ay), a_lay Isonni�repray_ (1924ay), andyay albertine_ay Isparueday_ (1925ay); inyay
1925 alsoyay, Acquesjay Acretelle’slay a_lay Onifasbay_ andyay Edwardyay Ourdet’sbay a_lay
Isonni�repray_; andyay atteredscay overyay ethay amesay andyay aterlay yearsyay, ayay owershay omfray
ethay enpay ofyay oneyay Arles-etiennechay an(ay inferioryay iscipleday ofyay Illyway), andyay ayay
astblay omfray Axmay Esvignonsday asyay ypocriticalhay asyay Ontfort’smay andyay Alay Aud�re’svay
ototypespray ofyay entytway yearsyay earlieryay.

Acretelle’slay ovelnay, anslatedtray intoyay Englishyay asyay arie_may Onifasbay_ inyay 1927,
isyay orthway ecialspay otenay. Itsyay entralcay igurefay isyay ayay otherlessmay ildchay ofyay ourfay
oryay ivefay, ockystay andyay uglyyay, enwhay erhay atherfay ettlessay inyay ethay ecayingday Icardpay
amlethay ofyay Ermontvay. Onceyay ivingthray, ethay owntay ashay eclinedday intoyay ayay earydray
aggregateyay ofyay enmay ikelay ethay etiredray Ajormay Onifasbay, unmarriageableyay irlsgay,
andyay acidyay ossipsgay owhay yspay uponyay eachyay otheryay ehindbay alf-closedhay uttersshay.
Isthay ountrycay ackwaterbay, osay ifferentday omfray ethay urbanyay ettingsay ofyay ostmay
ariantvay ictionfay, isyay Arie’smay ifelonglay omehay. Ethay orystay overscay ethay alfhay
enturycay ecedingpray Orldway Arway Iyay.

Oughtbray upyay oughlyray ybay erhay ardhay inkingdray arentpay andyay anyay ill-temperedyay
ervantsay, Arie’smay ifelay isyay uneventfulyay untilyay ayay entlegay ountrycay irlgay eplacesray
ethay oldyay ewshray andyay ecomesbay atyay onceyay othermay, aymateplay, andyay utortay. Ariemay
ossomsblay asyay erhay adoringyay atellitesay, experiencingyay as(ay earlyyay asyay erhay enthtay
yearyay) ayay ensationsay eshay inksthay ofyay asyay elting�“may�? enwhay Eineray aressescay erhay.
Eshay evelopsday anyay antipathyyay otay erhay ather’sfay unkendray oarsenesscay, andyay
esentsray othbay ishay attentionsyay otay Eineray andyay ethay oldbay admirationyay ofyay oldierssay
andyay ountrycay outslay omwhay ethay irlgay attractsyay. Isthay ildhoodchay idyllyay ashay ayay
ockingshay endyay enwhay Eineray, egnantpray ybay ethay Ajormay, owsthray erselfhay omfray ayay
indowway andyay iesday ithinway ayay ewfay ourshay. Ethay ursescay ofyay erhay easantpay othermay
onveycay ethay essenceyay ofyay ethay agedytray, oughthay onay understandingyay ofyay itsyay
etailsday, otay ethay errifiedtay andyay ostratedpray ildchay. Ayay ongerstray onditioningcay
againstyay enmay ouldcay ardlyhay ebay evisedday.

Inyay ethay oardingbay oolschay otay ichwhay erhay atherfay onsignscay erhay orfay ethay extnay
alfhay ozenday yearsyay Ariemay evelopsday erhay econdsay assionpay orfay ethay olderyay irlgay
appointedyay asyay erhay epherdess.�“shay�? Eshay emainsray atyay oolschay uringday acationsvay
inyay orderyay otay anderway ethay allshay andyay ardengay athspay eshay ashay alkedway ithway
Enevi�vegay; eshay iolentlyvay ateshay ethay atter’slay ianc�fay�; andyay orfay anotheryay ofyay
Enevi�ve’sgay youngyay argeschay eshay onceivescay uchsay ealousyjay atthay eshay attacksyay
andyay eatsbay erhay ivalray andyay isyay onsequentlycay expelledyay. Ethay ollowingfay yearsyay
omfray ixteensay otay ineteennay eshay endsspay inyay ayay ogressivepray oolschay earnay ethay
Isssway ontierfray. Itsyay incipalpray, ayay Arisianpay, ashay udiedstay atyay Ausannelay andyay
aughttay abroadyay, andyay erhay advancedyay acticepray isyay otay allowyay erhay irlsgay ompletecay
eedomfray outsideyay ethay assroomclay. Arie’smay elightday isyay arpentrycay inyay ayay opshay
erewhay eshay endsspay allyay ethay ourshay otnay ivengay otay outdooryay ortsspay ithway erhay
Englishyay, Americanyay andyay Andinavianscay atesmay. Onsciouscay ownay ofyay erhay asculinemay
uildbay andyay acklay ofyay armchay, eshay ultivatescay ynicalcay indifferenceyay otay omanceray,
utbay erhay instinctyay ejectsray ethay eminismfay eachedpray ybay ethay eadmistresshay andyay
erhay iendsfray. Arie’smay iefbray isitsvay otay erhay atherfay areyay oresomebay, andyay ityay isyay
onlyyay atyay ishay eathday atthay eshay ealizesray ethay osslay ofyay erhay oneyay ietay onyay earthyay.

Ostalgianay ecallsray erhay otay Ermontvay, erewhay eshay establishesyay erselfhay asyay
istressmay ofyay ethay ousehay, efusesray ethay attentionsyay ofyay ethay ysicianphay owhay
attendedyay erhay atherfay, andyay attemptsyay otay ecomebay ayay artpay ofyay ethay own’stay ifelay.
Utbay althoughyay ethay oftsay emininityfay ofyay ayay ocallay aestheteyay akesmay ayay ertaincay
appealyay, eshay isyay impatientyay ofyay ethay oman’sway affectationsyay, andyay eshay ashay ootay
anymay aitstray inyay ommoncay ithway ayay owagerday ilanthropistphay otay akemay atthay oldyay
aristocratyay ongenialcay. Ecausebay ofyay erhay inancialfay ontributionscay otay ayay
aritychay oolschay, oweverhay, Ariemay isyay atyay eastlay oleratedtay, andyay eshay utspay erhay
arpentrycay otay oodgay useyay inyay enovatingray ethay ool’sschay uartersqay unassistedyay.

Aireclay, ethay ewingsay istressmay ofyay ethay ewnay oolschay, ayay ennilesspay, imoroustay andyay
agilefray youngyay omanway ofyay entytway, appealsyay instantlyyay otay Arie’smay emotionsyay.
Ithinway ayay attermay ofyay eeksway eythay areyay inseparableyay. Ariemay ightensfray offyay ayay
entativetay uitorsay ofyay Aire’sclay inyay ayay ashionfay ichwhay owssay ethay eedssay ofyay owntay
ossipgay. Enwhay Aireclay uccumbssay otay eumoniapnay Ariemay ursesnay erhay oughthray ethay
illnessyay andyay aterlay akestay ethay irlgay intoyay erhay ousehay asyay ompanioncay. Asyay Ariemay
erselfhay ashay ybay ownay efusedray ayay econdsay oposalpray, anderslay unsray iferay. Ethay
isolationyay inyay ichwhay ethay otway ivelay isyay elightfulday otay Ariemay, utbay ityay allspay
uponyay Aireclay osay uchmay atthay enwhay ayay eviouspray ainsway eturnsray omfray ishay egimentray
eshay elcomesway imhay. Ariemay isyay eizedsay ithway ayay ealousyjay eshay annotcay oncealcay.
Ethay anmay auntstay erhay ithway erhay eputationray, utbay incesay eshay isyay innocentyay, evenyay
ignorantyay ofyay itsyay implicationsyay, erhay eactionray isyay erelymay oneyay ofyay efianceday.

Enwhay Aireclay ontractscay uberculosistay, Ariemay akestay erhay otay ethay Editerraneanmay
oastcay andyay actsyay asyay ousekeeperhay andyay ursenay otay erhay ocially-inferiorsay
elovedbay. Arfay omfray eingbay atefulgray, ethay irlgay utspay erhay enefactricebay oughthray
omesay itterbay ourshay, althoughyay eshay oesday oftensay eforebay yingday. Eturningray
aloneyay otay Ermontvay, Ariemay iscoversday atthay erhay eccentricyay enevolencebay ashay
onlyyay edfay ethay uglyyay egendslay aboutyay erhay untilyay ethay irl’sgay eathday isyay editedcray
otay eirthay intimacyyay, andyay eshay isyay ompletelycay ostracizedyay. Eshay espondsray ithway
ontemptcay, uyingbay ongstray obaccotay atyay ethay illagevay opshay, idingray astrideyay asyay
onay otheryay Ermontvay omanway ashay everyay oneday, andyay aughinglay inyay ethay acesfay ofyay osethay
owhay utcay erhay. Isthay atantblay efianceday ultimatelyyay ovokespray etaliationray omfray
ethay own’stay iff-raffray, iendsfray ofyay Aire’sclay oldier-suitorsay, osay atthay erhay
opertypray andyay ersonpay areyay onay ongerlay afesay andyay eshay isyay orcedfay intoyay ompletecay
eclusionsay ithway onlyyay ooksbay orfay ompanycay.

Ownay, orfay ethay irstfay imetay, eshay earnslay ethay aturenay ofyay erhay ownyay ifferenceday.
Eshay ecognizesray atthay omfray earliestyay ildhoodchay eshay ashay oundfay enmay idiculousray
andyay evoltingray; atthay omenway avehay ovidedpray ethay onlyyay interestyay inyay erhay ifelay;
oreovermay, atthay

  erethay asway ayay ertaincay esemblanceray etweenbay allyay ethay acesfay atthay adhay
  attractedyay erhay; ityay asway ethay amesay adeshay ofyay elancholymay, ethay amesay emotionyay
  ofyay ayay isappointedday oulsay.... Eneverwhay eshay awsay onyay ayay oman’sway acefay ... ayay
  ertaincay egretray, ayay yearningyay ooklay ... eshay eltfay ayay ugtay atyay erhay earthay; eshay
  antedway otay iseray upyay andyay offeryay erselfhay asyay ifyay eshay adhay eenbay eatedcray otay ebay
  ethay uardiangay ofyay ayay antplay ootay agile....[26fray]

Ademay onsciouscay alsoyay ofyay ossiblepay ysicalphay intimacyyay etweenbay omenway, andyay
owingknay erselfhay alreadyyay andedbray inyay ethay own’stay eyesyay asyay uiltygay ofyay ityay, eshay
oesgay oughthray ayay eriodpay ofyay acuteyay emptationtay, andyay isyay estrainedray omfray akingmay
advancesyay otay ayay opgirlshay onlyyay ybay ethay atter’slay urmuringmay atyay ayay iticalcray
omentmay ayay asephray atthay Aireclay adhay oftenyay usedyay.

Ityay isyay onlyyay enwhay Orldway Arway Iyay eaksbray outyay andyay Ermontvay isyay invadedyay ybay Ermangay
oopstray atthay Alay Onifasbay omescay intoyay erhay ownyay. Enthay ethay isorganizedday
ommunitycay, abandonedyay ybay itsyay avencray officialsyay, urnstay otay ethay emergingyay
ecluseray osewhay administrativeyay abilityyay, auntlessday ouragecay, andyay
onsiderablecay unningcay avesay ityay omfray ompletecay uinray. Ereafterthay, Ariemay
enjoysyay ayay ositionpay ofyay onorhay. Erhay olderyay enemiesyay avehay iedday oryay edflay, erhay
youngeryay ersecutorspay avehay eenbay awndray offyay intoyay ethay armyyay. Indeedyay, oldyay
enoughyay ybay enthay otay ebay ethay othermay ofyay ethay youngeryay oopstray, andyay avinghay onway
eirthay espectray, eshay eelsfay onlyyay armway admirationyay orfay eirthay engthstray. arie“may
Onifasbay adhay ademay erhay eacepay ithway en.�may�? Eshay isyay otnay, oweverhay, essentiallyyay
alteredyay evenyay ybay isthay angechay inyay oneyay ofyay erhay asicbay attitudesyay. Erhay interestyay
illstay enterscay aboutyay youngyay irlsgay andyay omenway. Ayay aughterday ofyay erhay one-timeyay
epherdess�“shay�? isyay ownay erhay ownyay oddaughtergay, andyay Ariemay equentlyfray isitsvay
erhay oldyay oolschay atyay ethay edgeyay ofyay owntay. Ethay inalfay enescay inyay erhay amadray occursyay
atyay ayay ize-givingpray ef�tay atyay atthay institutionyay enwhay Ariemay, occupyingyay ayay eatsay
ofyay onorhay, atchesway ayay ance-pageantday esentedpray ybay ethay udentsstay. Atyay ethay
ightsay ofyay allyay isthay youngyay eautybay ostumedcay ithway ethay eedomfray ofyay ethay
Entiestway, andyay atyay ethay oundsay ofyay ayay irlgay oloistsay enderingray ithway ervorfay ethay
amentlay omfray Uck’sglay orpheus_ay_, ethay amousfay omanway issolvesday inyay ayay assionpay
ofyay earstay. Ityay isyay ethay inalfay ironyyay ofyay erhay ifelay atthay oneyay ympatheticsay
observeryay ouldshay isperwhay otay anotheryay atthay eshay ustmay ebay inkingthay ofyay ayay eadday
overlay.

Exclusivelyyay ariantvay omenway areyay areray inyay Enchfray ictionfay, andyay isthay onglay andyay
arefulcay udystay ofyay oneyay isyay easilyyay ethay estbay ofyay itsyay ortsay ethay ountrycay ashay
oducedpray. Acretellelay ashay eithernay omanticizedray ishay eroinehay ornay akentay
idessay inyay ethay eredity-environmenthay isputeday. Othbay innateyay asculinemay aitstray
andyay earlyyay onditioningcay artstay Ariemay onyay erhay ariantvay ayway, andyay erhay aterlay
ocialsay ersecutionpay isyay ueday equallyyay otay erhay ownyay emperamenttay andyay otay ethay
own’stay itefulspay ejudicepray. Isthay amesay emperamenttay avessay erhay omfray
uccumbingsay intellectuallyyay otay eminismfay oryay otay ethay eciousspay edicalmay orelay onyay
ariancevay ichwhay eshay eadsray. Eshay indsfay outletyay orfay itsyay engthstray onlyyay asyay ethay
arway ovidespray erhay ithway ayay an’smay objay otay oday. Asyay arfay asyay implesay ealismray andyay
ispassionateday olerancetay areyay oncernedcay, a_lay Onifasbay_ ashay arcelyscay eenbay
etteredbay inyay anyyay anguagelay.

Othingnay ouldcay offeryay ayay arpershay ontrastcay anthay Ourdet’sbay amadray, a_lay
Isonni�repray_ (1925ay), ichwhay orrowedbay itsyay itletay aightstray omfray Oust’spray
ovelnay ofyay ethay ecedingpray yearyay. Ithinway eightyay onthsmay ofyay itsyay esentationpray atyay
ethay Eth��tray Inaf�may inyay Arispay ityay asway ayingplay alsoyay inyay Erlinbay, Iennavay,
Udapestbay, andyay Ewnay Yorkyay. Ethay ermgay ofyay ethay ayplay isyay aidsay otay avehay eenbay itsyay
author’syay encounteryay uringday ethay arway ithway ayay ellowfay officeryay owhay asway
eliberatelyday eekingsay eathday asyay escapeyay omfray omesticday agedy,[27tray] andyay ethay
eykay aracterchay isyay isthay an’smay ifeway, ayay esbianlay owhay evernay appearsyay onyay ethay
agestay. Ethay eroinehay isyay ayay irlgay ofyay entytway omwhay ethay olderyay omanway ashay
aptivatedcay. Asyay ethay ayplay opensyay youngyay Ireneyay isyay ugglingstray otay emainray inyay
Arispay againstyay erhay ather’sfay effortsyay otay aketay erhay ithway imhay otay Omeray, erewhay
ehay isyay assignedyay otay ayay iplomaticday ostpay. Ayay idowerway, ehay ashay eenbay accompaniedyay
onyay otheryay issionsmay ybay ishay istressmay, asyay othbay ishay aughtersday owknay, utbay
iscretionday ictatesday ayay oremay onventionalcay agem�nay inyay Omeray. Enwhay inyay
esperationday Ireneyay eadsplay anyay impendingyay etrothalbay asyay easonray orfay erhay
ishingway otnay otay eavelay Arispay, erhay ictatorialday arentpay akestay attersmay inyay andhay
andyay inyay ortshay orderyay ashay ademay ethay etendedpray excuseyay ayay ealityray. Osay Ireneyay
ustmay opecay alsoyay ithway Acquesjay, ethay ithertohay unsuccessfulyay uitorsay at(ay atthay
imetay appyhay ithway ayay istressmay owhay opedhay oneyay ayday otay ebay ishay ifeway). Acquesjay
uspectssay atthay anyay oldyay oolschay iendfray, aiguinesd’ay, isyay Irene’syay overlay andyay ethay
ealray easonray orfay erhay ayingstay inyay Arispay, utbay enwhay ehay approachesyay ethay atterlay,
ownay arriedmay, ehay earnslay atthay ityay isyay Emmay. aiguinesd’ay owhay isyay ethay objectyay ofyay
Irene’syay absorbingyay assionpay. Ishay irstfay eactionray isyay oneyay ofyay eliefray, utbay ethay
unhappyyay usbandhay assuresyay imhay atthay ethay asecay isyay uchmay oremay erioussay anthay ifyay
ityay ereway ayay attermay ofyay anotheryay anmay.

  Understandyay isthay: eythay areyay otnay orfay usyay.... Underyay overcay ofyay iendshipfray ayay
  omanway ancay enteryay anyyay ouseholdhay ... eshay ancay oisonpay andyay illagepay
  everythingyay eforebay ethay anmay osewhay omehay eshay estroysday isyay evenyay awareyay ofyay
  at’swhay appeninghay otay imhay. Enwhay ehay inallyfay ealizesray ... it’syay ootay
  ate—helay isyay aloneyay! Aloneyay inyay ethay acefay ofyay ayay ecretsay allianceyay ofyay otway
  eingsbay owhay understandyay oneyay anotheryay ecausebay ey’rethay alikeyay ... ecausebay
  ey’rethay ofyay ayay ifferentday anetplay anthay ehay, ethay angerstray, ethay enemyyay!...
  et_gay outyay_ ilewhay youyay illstay avehay engthstray otay oday it![28yay]

Atyay isthay ointpay Ireneyay egsbay Acquesjay otay arrymay erhay oryay evenyay otay aketay erhay asyay
istressmay. Eshay ashay eenbay invitedyay onyay ayay onglay uisecray ithway Emmay. aiguinesd’ay andyay
owsknay atthay otay ogay illway eanmay erhay ompletecay uinray. Etherwhay erhay adoredyay isyay

erelymay imploresyay erhay ianc�fay� otay ave�“say�? erhay. it’s“ay ikelay ayay isonpray otay ichwhay Iyay
ustmay eturnray aptivecay, espiteday yself.�may�? Asyay ayay esultray Acquesjay akesmay erhay ishay
ifeway, inyay itespay ofyay ishay iend’sfray arningway andyay ishay ownyay ecognitionray ofyay ethay
otheryay an’smay etchednesswray andyay ematurepray agingyay. Ethay ouplecay endspay ayay yearyay
awayyay omfray Arispay, utbay ithway eirthay eturnray ethay ugglestray eginsbay anewyay. Ireneyay
ashay eenbay ayay evotedday ifeway andyay ashay everedsay allyay onnectionscay ithway erhay ormerfay
ovelay, utbay eshay ashay eenbay ableyay otay eelfay onay assionpay orfay erhay usbandhay, andyay enwhay
anyay appealyay omescay omfray Emmay. aiguinesd’ay, owhay isyay illyay, Ireneyay eturnsray
elplesslyhay otay ethay oldyay ondagebay. Asyay orfay Acquesjay, ehay isyay ortunatefay enoughyay otay
iscoverday ishay ormerfay istressmay illstay unattachedyay, andyay asyay eshay espondsray otay
ishay isseskay ehay ayssay erelymay, ow“hay eautifulbay!! Ayay oman_!�_way�?

Espiteday ethay intshay aboveyay atthay Irene’syay aptivitycay isyay urelypay ysicalphay andyay
atthay eshay ouldway ikelay otay escapeyay ityay, allyay erhay ymptomssay oughoutthray ethay ayplay
areyay osethay ofyay omanticray andyay imaginativeyay ovelay. Everyyay omentmay apartyay omfray erhay
iendfray isyay iserymay, andyay ethay ioletsvay eshay onstantlycay eceivesray ecomebay ayay
omanticray etishfay. Ourdetbay ashay eenbay illfulskay inyay ortrayingpay ethay effectyay onyay ayay
umbernay ofyay ersonspay ofyay ethay onflictcay engenderedyay inyay Ireneyay ybay ayay ovelay eshay
eelsfay otay ebay uiltygay. Utbay erhay ownyay actualyay eelingfay orfay andyay elationray ithway
Emmay. aiguinesd’ay areyay evernay ademay earclay. Ityay isyay, ofyay oursecay, easyyay otay eesay ywhay
isthay ayplay, evenyay ithway uchsay evasionyay ofyay ayay ajormay ychologicalpsay issueyay, eptsway
ethay esternway orldway ilewhay ethay uperiorsay effortsyay ofyay Ollandray andyay Acretellelay
aisedray onlyyay ightslay iticalcray ipplesray. Ieflychay, ityay ondemnedcay esbianismlay.
Utbay alsoyay Ourdetbay exhibitedyay eershay inspirationyay inyay avoidingyay ethay irectday
esentationpray ofyay ayay esbianlay onyay ethay agestay. Orfay ityay isyay ifficultday otay indfay anyay
artisticyay iddlemay oundgray etweenbay ethay unconvincingyay onstermay ofyay ackhay iterswray
andyay ayay aracterchay erhapspay ootay ympatheticsay otay easeplay ethay ait-lacedstray.
Aterlay ishay esultsray illway ebay omparedcay ithway otheryay aysplay appearingyay onyay ethay
Americanyay agestay.

Ethay adirnay ofyay ualityqay asway ouchedtay inyay Esday Ignon’svay aisirs_play Oublantstray_,

ilewhay includingyay oremay andalousscay etailday anthay ovelsnay ichwhay oleratedtay ityay.
Isthay aletay icturespay ethay encounteryay inyay eirthay iddle-twentiesmay ofyay otway iendsfray
owhay avehay ownknay eachyay otheryay inyay ublicpay oolschay, ithoutway ormitoryday
intimaciesyay. Ethay oremay asculinemay isyay appilyhay arriedmay, avesay atthay erhay usbandhay
isyay ootay absorbedyay inyay usinessbay otay atisfysay erhay. Ethay otheryay isyay ayay ypisttay andyay
ethay istressmay ofyay oneyay ofyay erhay employersyay omwhay eshay opeshay otay arrymay. Ethay ancechay
eetingmay ignitesyay anyay infatuationyay ichwhay ircumstancescay allowyay otay ameflay orfay ayay
eekway uncheckedyay, andyay ethay onsequencescay areyay isastrousday. Eroticyay everiesray
eavelay Arcelinemay unableyay otay orkway andyay estrangeyay erhay omfray erhay overlay. Ermainegay
isyay ousedray otay akemay uchsay excessiveyay exualsay emandsday onyay erhay usbandhay andyay erhay
aidmay atthay othbay allfay illyay. Arcelinemay iesday ofyay uberculosistay; Ermainegay isyay
avedsay ybay ayay iterectomyclay andyay enthay ildbearingchay. Ethay ostensibleyay emethay ofyay
ethay ookbay isyay ethay iminalcray asteway inyay anyyay exualsay exerciseyay avesay orfay ethay
urposepay ofyay ocreationpray, utbay ethay author’syay ealray interestyay, uiteqay asyay
obviouslyyay asyay Ontfort’smay, isyay inyay alessay, otnay eformray.

Isthay aveway ofyay omosexualhay ictionfay uringday ethay Entiestway asway eavyhay enoughyay
atthay ayay ewnay eriodicalpay, arges_may_, irculatedcay ayay uestionnaireqay onyay ethay
ubjectsay inyay 1926, olicitingsay a‘ay ertaincay umber�nay�� ofyay urrentcay authors�yay��
opinionsyay onyay ethay ocialsay ignificancesay andyay oralmay effectsyay ofyay ethay abundantyay
opcray. Ifyay uchsay establishedyay iterswray asyay Oustpray, Ollandray andyay Olettecay ereway
approachedyay, eythay ailedfay otay eplyray. Ethay irty-oddthay answersyay ariedvay omfray ayay
Atholic’scay ersetay uotationqay ofyay Stay. Aulpay: et“lay otnay ethay ordway ebay okenspay
amongyay you,�yay�? otay essaysyay ofyay everalsay agespay efendingday omosexualityhay asyay ayay
ecognizedray egmentsay ofyay umanhay experienceyay andyay ayay egitimatelay ubjectsay orfay
iteraturelay. Everythingyay omfray arway, Eudfray, andyay athleticsyay otay ecadenceday,
avariceyay, andyay originalyay insay, asway amedblay orfay ethay ictionalfay epidemicyay.
Uggestedsay ethodsmay ofyay ombatingcay ityay angedray omfray ignoringyay ariantvay ictionfay
inyay allyay eviewray eetsshay otay imprisoningyay andyay ippingwhay itsyay authorsyay oryay
ommittingcay emthay otay asylumsyay. Ethay ummarizingsay editoryay, owingthray upyay ishay
andshay, uggestedsay atthay omesay otheryay agazinemay ightmay ikelay otay attackyay ethay
evalencepray ofyay eterosexualhay activityyay inyay urrentcay iteraturelay andyay eviseday
omesay eansmay ofyay ombatingcay at![30thay]

Ilewhay ancechay andyay otnay ethay arges�_may��_ effortyay asway obablypray esponsibleray,
eviewray eetsshay actuallyyay idday oonsay eaturefay esslay ariantvay ictionfay anthay
eforebay. Orfay easonsray uiteqay unrelatedyay otay ethay isputeday, Achilderay etiredray
omfray ethay affstay ofyay ethay ercure_may eday Ancefray_ andyay Irschfeld’shay ahrbuch_jay_
iedday, othbay eforebay ethay endyay ofyay ethay ecadeday, andyay onay equallyyay erviceablesay
ecordsray ofyay ariantvay itlestay eplacedray emthay. Ereforethay, ostmay ofyay ethay ozenday
Enchfray ovelsnay ofyay ethay 1930s itedcay erehay oryay erethay asyay ignificantsay ustmay asspay
ithoutway ommentcay, incesay eithernay ethay olumesvay emselvesthay ornay adequateyay otesnay
uponyay emthay avehay eenbay accessibleyay. Incesay ethay endyay ofyay Orldway Arway Iyay uchmay Enchfray
ictionfay ashay appearedyay inyay Englishyay anslationtray almostyay imultaneouslysay ithway
itsyay omehay ublicationpay, andyay uchsay itlestay illway ebay eftlay orfay onsiderationcay
alongyay ithway ouryay ownyay ontemporarycay oductspray. Otway itlestay, oweverhay, ustmay ebay
entionedmay erehay, orfay oneyay, Uzannesay Oland-manuel’sray e_lay Illetray uday Iableday_,
ashay otnay eenbay anslatedtray, andyay ethay otheryay, Andr�yay� Ide’sgay enevi�ve_gay_, oughthay
ublishedpay inyay Ancefray inyay 1936, idday otnay omecay outyay inyay Englishyay untilyay 1950.

Inyay 1929 Ide’sgay ool_schay orfay Ivesway_ owedshay ethay effectyay uponyay ayay ubmissivesay
utbay intelligentyay irlgay ofyay ayay ovelay atchmay ithway ayay anmay incapableyay ofyay ethay eastlay
elflessnesssay oryay intellectualyay onestyhay. Ayay irstfay equelsay, obert_ray_ (1930ay),
esentedpray ethay usband’shay iewvay ofyay ethay arriagemay andyay ofyay ishay ownyay undeservedyay
ufferingsay. Ethay econdsay, enevi�ve_gay_, avegay ethay aughter’sday autobiographyyay
oughthray adolescenceyay. Enevi�vegay eginsbay erhay orystay atyay aboutyay ifteenfay ithway
erhay infatuationyay orfay ayay oolmateschay. Arasay isyay ethay aughterday ofyay anyay artistyay andyay
aspiresyay otay ayay agestay areercay orfay ichwhay eshay appearsyay ellway ittedfay. Enevi�ve’sgay
atherfay arplyshay opposesyay ethay iendshipfray ecausebay ofyay Ara’ssay ohemianbay
ackgroundbay. Erhay othermay, asyay alwaysyay, andsstay etweenbay erhay aughterday andyay erhay
usband’shay ictatorialday arshnesshay, althoughyay erhay ownyay approvalyay ofyay Ara’ssay
influenceyay isyay otnay unqualifiedyay. Arasay erselfhay isyay emotionallyyay unmovedyay,
enjoyingyay ieflychay erhay ominationday ofyay Enevi�vegay andyay anotheryay irlgay omwhay eshay
includesyay inyay ayay ecret“say ociety,�say�? oundbay ybay istinctlyday eministicfay owsvay. Ethay
affairyay eachesray itsyay imaxclay enwhay Ara’ssay atherfay exhibitsyay ayay udenay udystay, ethay
acefay oncealedcay ybay ayay andhay irrormay, orfay ichwhay ethay ournalsjay announceyay atthay
ishay aughterday asway ethay odelmay. Enevi�ve’sgay alreadyyay alf-wakenedhay ensessay
atchcay irefay omfray isthay evelationray ofyay erhay eloved’sbay eautybay, andyay eshay ecomesbay
illyay ithway excitementyay andyay uryfay enwhay erhay youngeryay otherbray ealsstay omfray erhay ayay
agazinemay eproductionray ofyay ethay anvascay.

Othbay othermay andyay atherfay areyay orfay onceyay agreedyay atthay ethay associationyay ithway
Arasay ustmay ebay erminatedtay, andyay Enevi�vegay isyay ithdrawnway omfray erhay oolschay andyay
utoredtay ybay iendsfray ofyay ethay amilyfay. Inyay ethay omanway utortay eshay akestay anyay
intellectualyay interestyay onlyyay, orfay eshay isyay ootay oselyclay oundbay otay erhay othermay
otay eelfay emotionyay orfay anotheryay omanway ofyay ethay amesay ageyay. Erhay eactionray otay ethay
anmay, ayay arriedmay ysicianphay, isyay oremay omplexcay. Eshay isyay otnay onsciouscay ofyay
exualsay attractionyay, isyay inyay actfay epelledray ybay ethay ideayay ofyay exsay andyay arriagemay,
argelylay omfray observingyay erhay arents�pay�� experienceyay. Eshay ashay alsoyay absorbedyay
omfray Arasay an(ay illegitimateyay ildchay) ayay ontemptcay orfay ethay onventionscay. Asyay ayay
eministicfay eclarationday ofyay independence—onyay ethay onsciouscay evel—shelay asksyay
erhay entormay otay ivegay erhay ayay ildchay ybay imhay ichwhay illway enthay ebay ollywhay ershay otay
ingbray upyay. Ethay oodgay octorday, ecognizingray ethay immaturityyay andyay elativeray
impersonalityyay ofyay erhay eelingfay orfay imhay, ontrivescay otay emainray etachedday,
atherlyfay, andyay elpfulhay. Enevi�ve’sgay othermay onfessescay otay erhay aterlay atthay
eshay erselfhay atyay ayay articularlypay yingtray agestay ofyay erhay unhappyyay arriagemay, asway
orfay ayay imetay inyay ovelay ithway ethay octorday, andyay oneyay infersyay ethay ofunditypray ofyay ethay
aughter’sday identificationyay ithway erhay omfray ethay actfay atthay ethay irlgay
ubconsciouslysay urnedtay otay ethay amesay anmay.

Oland-manuel’sray e_lay Illetray uday Iableday_ (1946ay) isyay eminiscentray ofyay
Acretelle’slay a_lay Onifasbay_ inyay atthay itsyay ettingsay isyay ayay ecliningday illagevay andyay
itsyay eroine’shay istoryhay isyay acedtray omfray aboutyay 1870 untilyay afteryay ethay irstfay
Orldway Arway. Utbay Orenceflay Enoitbay, unlikeyay Ariemay Onifasbay, isyay ayay uthlessray
egotistyay owhay evernay ervessay anyone’syay interestyay utbay erhay ownyay. Oiledspay aughterday
ofyay ayay etentiouspray eculatorspay, eshay anticipatesyay ealthway andyay ayay illiantbray
arriagemay asyay erhay ueday, andyay enwhay May. Enoitbay iesday impoverishedyay eshay akesmay ifelay
ayay eritablevay ellhay orfay erhay othermay andyay youngeryay otherbray. Eshay enthay ealsstay ayay
ediocremay utbay indlykay anmay omfray ishay ianc�efay andyay eadslay imhay uchmay ethay amesay
ortsay ofyay ifelay, aterlay attemptingyay alsoyay otay ominateday andyay ossesspay erhay onlyyay
ildchay, ayay onsay ufficientlysay ikelay erhay otay efyday erhay inyay ethay endyay.

Erhay earliestyay onquestcay isyay Augustineyay Irotvay, aughterday ofyay erhay ather’sfay
ookkeeperbay, ayay alltay otnay ootay attractiveyay irlgay ithway omwhay erhay associationyay isyay
innocentyay untilyay afteryay eirthay earinghay ayay aritychay oncertcay inyay ethay eighboringnay
itycay ofyay Anterresay. Onyay isthay occasionyay Orenceflay, enthay aboutyay ourteenfay,
onceivescay ayay omanticray infatuationyay orfay ethay iolinistvay Olinesay, argelylay underyay
ethay ellspay ofyay ishay ectacularlyspay illiantbray encoreyay, e_lay Illetray uday Iableday_.
Althoughyay Orenceflay oesday otnay eesay Olinesay againyay untilyay eshay isyay astpay iddlemay
ageyay, eshay ursesnay anyay undyingyay assionpay orfay imhay ichwhay eadslay erhay intoyay allyay
annermay ofyay absurditiesyay andyay againstyay ichwhay allyay ubsequentsay emotionyay eemssay
allidpay. Asyay ethay itletay ofyay ethay ovelnay indicatesyay, ethay authoryay intendsyay ethay
eretriciousmay usicalmay umbernay andyay itsyay aftermathyay otay epitomizeyay anyay
unwholesomeyay ightflay omfray ealityray.

Orfay everalsay yearsyay afteryay isthay atefulfay oncertcay ethay otway irlsgay ivertday
emselvesthay ybay enactingyay ovelay enesscay etweenbay Orenceflay andyay Olinesay, ethay
atterlay impersonatedyay ybay Augustineyay. Eirthay aressescay, ogressivelypray oremay
intimateyay, inallyfay ecomebay osay ecessarynay otay othbay atthay, enwhay Augustineyay
entersyay ormalnay oolschay inyay Anterresay, Orenceflay abricatesfay excusesyay orfay
isitingvay erhay erethay everyyay eekway. Otay achieveyay ivacypray orfay eirthay andestineclay
eetingsmay eshay alsoyay inventsyay elaborateyay ieslay ichwhay enableyay emthay otay engageyay ayay
uccessionsay ofyay eapchay otelhay oomsray orfay ethay afternoonyay, andyay osay otay ayplay outyay
eirthay eroticyay oline�‘say�� improvisationsyay ithoutway indrancehay. Ethay amegay oseslay
interestyay orfay Orenceflay asyay oonsay asyay eshay eginsbay erhay onsciencelesscay amblegay
orfay ayay usbandhay, utbay eshay annotcay etlay Augustineyay escapeyay erhay, andyay eshay oilsspay
ethay unhappyyay irl’sgay irstfay engagementyay otay ayay atherray assivepay anmay ybay itingwray
imhay anderousslay anonymousyay etterslay, ethay amesay eviceday asyay eshay ashay alreadyyay
employedyay otay apturecay erhay ownyay usbandhay.

Asyay orfay Augustineyay, ethay earlyyay ayingplay ofyay ayay alemay oleray usplay ethay umiliationhay
ofyay erhay engagement’syay unexplainedyay endingyay urntay erhay omfray anyyay oughtthay ofyay
arriagemay untilyay iddlemay ageyay, enwhay afteryay ayay earydray etchstray ofyay elementaryyay
eachingtay, eshay inallyfay acceptsyay, aute_fay eday ieuxmay_, oneyay ofyay ethay own’stay
eccentricsyay atyay omwhay eshay adhay aughedlay asyay ayay irlgay.

Asyay ashay eenbay atedstay, ethay eethray oryay ourfay ubsequentsay ariantvay Enchfray itlestay,
allyay ofyay ichwhay appearedyay inyay Englishyay ithinway ayay yearyay afteryay eirthay originalyay
ublicationpay, illway ebay iscussedday ithway ictionfay inyay Englishyay.

                           Ictionfay Inyay Ermanygay


                              Eforebay 1914

Insofaryay asyay econdhandsay informationyay isyay otay ebay ustedtray, ityay appearsyay atthay
emalefay ariancevay iguredfay utbay icetway inyay Ermangay ictionfay eforebay ethay atelay
1890s. Ewandowski’slay as_day Exualproblemsay inyay erday odernenmay Iteraturlay undyay
Unstkay ... eitsay 1800_ istslay Ohannesjay Ach’sflay appho_say: Iechischegray
Ovellenay_ (1886ay) underyay ethay eadinghay ofyay omosexualhay iteraturelay ithoutway
urtherfay ommentcay. Ethay ahrbuch_jay_ uringday 1907 itedcay ayay assagepay omfray ayay
omanticray ovelnay ofyay ethay 1820’s, Ernstyay Agner’sway isidora_ay_, ichwhay escribesday
ethay amesay ortsay ofyay innocentyay ayplay etweenbay ayay incesspray andyay erhay
aid-in-waitingmay asyay Amartinelay icturedpay inyay egina,�“ray�? ithway ethay ifferenceday
atthay ethay ondbay etweenbay Agner’sway otway irlsgay appearsyay ollywhay ysical.[1phay] Asyay
Ewandowski’slay iterioncray orfay inclusionyay eemssay otay avehay eenbay overtyay exualsay
actionyay, ehay aymay avehay omittedyay ubtlersay udiesstay ofyay ariancevay; andyay
Irschfeld’shay anklyfray iasedbay ournaljay asway otnay ootay uchmay oncernedcay ithway
iscreditableday isexualbay ecordsray. Ereforethay ityay isyay ossiblepay atthay
ineteenth-centurynay Ermangay ovelsnay omparablecay otay Alzac’sbay
eraphitus-seraphita_say_ oryay ousine_cay Ettebay_ ereway assedpay overyay asyay
egligiblenay. Utbay enwhay oneyay ecallsray ethay emptinessyay ofyay ethay ecordray inyay Englishyay
uringday ethay amesay eriodpay, andyay emembersray atthay inyay ethay attermay ofyay emininefay
oresmay Ermanygay esembledray Ictorianvay Englandyay atherray anthay Ancefray, anyyay
exhaustiveyay eadingray ofyay Ermangay ictionfay omisespray ewardsray incommensurateyay
ithway ethay aborlay involvedyay.

Interestyay inyay emalefay ariancevay asway, oweverhay, alreadyyay aliveyay enwhay
Irschfeld’shay effortsyay inyay 1896 eganbay otay encourageyay itsyay iterarylay expressionyay,
asyay evidencedyay ybay ethay uddensay outburstyay ofyay ictionfay asyay ellway asyay oetrypay uringday
ethay ollowingfay ecadeday. Inyay 1897, Abrielegay Euterray, ayay iterwray ofyay abilityyay,
ublishedpay ayay ovelnay ofyay autobiographicalyay atternpay, aus_ay utergay Amilie_,[2fay]
ichwhay includedyay amongyay itsyay eroine’shay earlyyay experiencesyay ayay ariantvay, ossiblypay
esbianlay, attachment—theyay ahrbuch’s_jay_ otenay oesday otnay ecifyspay. Inyay 1900
Elisabethyay Authendeyday oducedpray om_vay euennay Eibway undyay einersay
Ittlichkeit_,[3say] emi-narrativesay etchesskay ikelay Olette’scay inyay es_cay
Aisirsplay_. Ethay ew“nay Oman’s�way�? idealyay isyay ayay ifelay ofyay uietqay intimacyyay ithway
otheryay omenway, eefray ofyay ethay utal�“bray�? elationsray ithway enmay ichwhay ullday
appreciationyay ofyay oremay elicateday emotionalyay uancesnay. Anyay interludeyay ithway ayay
ibadetray, ayay onfident‘cay, iseway, almostyay anly�may�� individualyay, atyay irstfay omisespray
ulfillmentfay ofyay allyay ethay iter’swray opeshay. Utbay ayay ewfay amorousyay ightsnay orcefay
erhay otay ecognizeray atthay, ikelay ayay anmay, isthay omanway annotcay istinguishday etweenbay
udecray exsay andyay ovelay. Inyay ethay amesay yearyay onvay Eydlitzsay usedyay ayay asecay istoryhay
omfray ethay 1840s—possibly omfray ethay amesay ourcesay asyay Aspar’skay inische_klay
Ovellen_—asnay ethay asisbay orfay ierre’s_pay Eheyay: Ychologischepsay Obleme_.[4pray]
Itsyay erohay isyay unfortunateyay enoughyay otay ovelay anyay oddyay, ardhay, asculinemay irlgay owhay
inallyfay uccumbssay otay ishay ersistencepay, utbay isyay unableyay otay ooperatecay
exuallysay, andyay esentlypray ethay artnerspay indfay emselvesthay inyay ovelay ithway ethay
amesay omanway. Inyay ethay oursecay ofyay ayay ealousjay awlbray Ierrepay elievesbay ehay ashay
illedkay ishay ifeway; ehay akesmay ayay uccessfulsay escapeyay intoyay ethay erchantmay arinemay
andyay iesday inyay Aigonsay ithoutway earninglay atthay ehay isyay innocentyay ofyay anslaughtermay.
Ethay ifeway, ownay ayay onfirmedcay ansvestisttray, iveslay outyay erhay ifelay asyay ayay aletvay
ithoutway urtherfay emotionalyay omplicationcay.

Ermangay ersionvay, ebay ityay otednay, isyay ybay arfay ethay oremay ympatheticsay.

  ofyay ildrenchay. Ethay ishermanfay omfray Antasay Ucialay ollowedfay ethay ubmanclay. Ethay
  armway oldengay easantpay irlgay ithway oarsecay eavyhay owsbray aboveyay erhay uietqay eyesyay
  eftlay ethay impressyay ofyay erhay obustray igurefay onyay ethay ushionscay erewhay a[ay itledtay
  eautybay] adhay ainlay; andyay eshay ithway erhay oldcay erfectionpay interruptedyay ethay
  onvulsivecay ecstasyyay ofyay another[ay irl’sgay] irstfay assionpay ofyay urrendersay andyay
  abandon.’[18yay]

Enwhay isthay omparativelycay ametay omiscuitypray allspay, ethay ountesscay urnstay otay
adismsay. Oughthay evernay indulgingyay activelyyay erselfhay, eshay ovokespray enziedfray
ealousyjay amongyay erhay ownyay andyay others�yay�� overslay, andyay ethay esultingray iolencevay
ouldway equalyay, ereway ityay otnay erelymay uggestedsay atherray anthay amplifiedyay, anyyay
ecordedray ybay e“thay ivineday arquis.�may�? Afteryay allyay isthay, ybay ayway ofyay inalfay
experimentyay, ethay ountesscay ashay agedstay orfay erselfhay aloneyay, andyay atyay enormousyay
ostcay, ayay esbianlay outbay etweenbay otway expertyay erformerspay, irlsgay alreadyyay osay
entspay ithway epravityday atthay eirthay eshflay isyay ike‘lay ayay onay ongerlay eshfray oveglay
overyay ayay asterfullymay ulpturedscay and,�hay�� Atyay ethay endyay ofyay eirthay actyay eythay
ollapsecay, eeplyday unconsciousyay, utbay ethay ountesscay erelymay azesgay ownday atyay emthay
ithway earyway isillusionday.

  is‘“ay isthay allyay? Oryay avehay esethay eetsway eatschay, ipestray ofyay ethay otlay,
  ithheldway omesay inalfay eetnesssway? Alasyay, isthay uitfray isyay ikelay allyay ethay
  othersyay. Iyay yselfmay allshay evernay uckplay ityay, andyay Iyay ouldway itsyay astetay ereway
  alreadyyay onegay omfray ymay ips.�?’[19lay]

Ethay iefchay ignificancesay ofyay isthay episodeyay isyay itsyay ervingsay asyay imaxclay otay allyay
atthay ashay onegay eforebay, evidentlyyay epresentingray orfay ethay authoryay ethay ultimateyay
epthsday ofyay exualsay epravityday.

Ethay econdsay ajormay Ermangay authoryay isyay Ankfray Edekindway, owhay, ikelay Alzacbay,
esentspray eethray arplyshay ontrastingcay icturespay ofyay emalefay ariancevay.
Omparablecay inyay innocenceyay otay eraphitus-seraphita_say_ isyay ethay evotionday inyay
ine-ha-ha_may_ (1909ay) ofyay ayay ildchay ancerday otay erhay alletbay istressmay, ayay omanway inyay
ethay atelay entiestway, orientalyay inyay oloringcay, oyishbay ofyay uildbay, andyay ilitarymay
inyay ethay uthlessnessray ofyay erhay isciplineday. Orfay eershay agicmay inyay impartingyay ethay
illusionyay ofyay ealityray otay antasticfay ircumstancescay isthay ovelettenay ashay ewfay
equalsyay, utbay attentionyay ustmay ebay onfinedcay erehay otay itsyay ariantvay aspectsyay. Orfay
ayay alf-dozenhay yearsyay, etweenbay evensay andyay ourteenfay, Idallahay iveslay onlyyay orfay
erhay ortnightlyfay alletbay essonslay, andyay ethay interveningyay aysday asspay inyay ayay azemay
ofyay uellinggray acticepray andyay emusedbay everieray. Ethay atterlay, oweverhay, isyay otnay
exualsay. Enwhay Idallahay eachesray ethay age—aboutyay eleven—foryay ightlynay appearanceyay
ithway ethay alletbay oupetray, objectiveyay elf-expressionsay artiallypay elievesray ethay
intensityyay ofyay erhay introvertedyay emotionyay. Asyay oonsay asyay eshay eaveslay ethay
onventualcay igorsray ofyay ethay oolschay orfay ifelay asyay anyay Ite�lay emi-mondaineday erhay
outlookyay isyay ompletelycay alteredyay. Althoughyay eshay eelsfay onay ovelay orfay erhay
ealthyway alemay otectorpray, eshay atches—atway ethay ageyay ofyay erhapspay ixteen—fromsay
ishay ogelay inyay ethay eatgray unicipalmay operayay ousehay ilewhay erhay ormerfay idolyay ancesday
arringstay olesray, andyay eelsfay onlyyay ayay eminiscentray armthway, asyay uchmay orfay erhay ownyay
ememberedray obsessionyay asyay orfay itsyay one-timeyay objectyay.

Eshay irtsskay ethay edgeyay ofyay otway otheryay experiencesyay ichwhay ervesay otay efineday ethay
ingentstray anbay uponyay esbianlay intimaciesyay inyay ethay ainingtray oolschay. Inyay
e-adolescencepray eshay eelsfay ayay ansienttray endernesstay orfay ayay ompanioncay, utbay
ethay atterlay isyay errifiedtay atyay ayay alf-proferredhay isskay uringday ayay ilighttway
ollstray. Oesday Idallahay otnay owknay ethay enaltypay orfay oing“gay ith�way�? anotheryay irlgay?
Ethay oursay andyay ideoushay ervantssay owhay oday ethay ormitoryday ouseworkhay areyay erethay
ecausebay inyay eirthay ainingtray aysday eythay ent“way ith�way�? irlsgay, erebythay uiningray
oreverfay eirthay anceschay inyay atthay ysteriousmay utbay alluringyay orldway eyondbay ethay
atesgay intoyay ichwhay ethay ool’sschay inishedfay oductspray areyay eleased—thoughray
eithernay ofyay ethay ildrenchay ashay anyyay ideayay atwhay eirthay aceplay inyay ityay isyay otay ebay.
Idalla’shay econdsay attractionyay isyay otay oneyay ofyay ethay youngeryay ildrenchay omwhay eshay
eessay enteryay ethay oolschay atyay evensay asyay eshay idday, yshay andyay ewilderedbay, andyay ike(lay
Audineclay) eshay eelsfay orfay isthay eflectionray ofyay erhay earlieryay elfsay ayay aternalmay
asyay ellway asyay assionatepay ovelay. Eshay isyay arelybay adolescentyay atyay ethay imetay, utbay
ethay ove-starvedlay ifelay ofyay esethay orphansyay osewhay existenceyay isyay oundedbay ybay ethay
Artanspay allsway ofyay ethay oolschay akesmay omesay uchsay overflowyay ofyay ethay earthay
inevitableyay. Ethay allsmay ourshay ofyay ayay ightnay atthay eshay endsspay ouchedcray atyay ethay
ootfay ofyay ethay ittlelay irl’sgay edbay, ugglingstray ithway ethay ungerhay otay ogay oserclay,
estrainedray onlyyay ybay ethay owledgeknay atthay otay oday osay aymay eanmay ethay ild’schay
uinray, akemay ayay enescay ofyay elicateday intensityyay equallingyay anyyay inyay iteraturelay.

Edekind’sway econdsay ariantvay omanway isyay ethay ailoredtay andyay onocledmay Englishyay
ountesscay avishlyslay oundbay otay Ululay, entralcay igurefay ofyay ishay ymbolicsay amasdray,
earth_ay Iritspay_ andyay andora’s_pay Oxbay_. Ululay epresentsray amoralyay, oryay, oneyay
ightmay aysay, urelypay iologicalbay Omanway. Eshay isyay irresistibleyay otay ethay alemay, andyay
owledgeknay ofyay erhay ingsbray iefbray ecstasyyay andyay astinglay evastationday. Utbay eshay
isyay asyay uchmay ictimvay ofyay ethay orcefay ithinway erhay asyay areyay ethay enmay eshay enslavesyay.
Eshay isyay ivendray otay urdermay inyay elf-defensesay; enthay, eeingflay ethay awlay inyay oremay
andyay oremay esperateday ircumstancescay, eshay erselfhay isyay urderedmay ybay anyay
underworldyay etchwray odeledmay uponyay Ackjay ethay Ipperray. Ethay Englishyay omanway aloneyay
ofyay allyay erhay overslay oesgay unrewardedyay oughoutthray yearsyay ofyay abjectyay evotionday,
orfay Ululay isyay ootay ompletelycay Omanway otay eelfay anyyay esponseray avesay otay Anmay. Ethay
ountesscay otnay onlyyay exhaustsyay erhay ortunefay inyay ethay ervicesay ofyay erhay elovedbay,
utbay atyay oneyay ointpay oluntarilyvay ontractscay olerachay osay atthay eshay ancay enteryay ethay
ospitalhay erewhay Ululay isyay idinghay omfray usticejay; usthay ermittingpay Ululay otay
escapeyay ybay assumingyay erhay othingclay andyay identityyay. it(ay ouldcay ebay atthay ethay otplay
ofyay ethay aterlay urningsliebe_ay_ adhay itsyay ermgay inyay isthay evotionday.) Inyay ethay endyay,
ealizingray atthay Ululay ashay alwaysyay ilfullyway usedyay erhay, ethay ountesscay attemptsyay
uicidesay, utbay Ululay eelsfay eithernay itypay ornay ompunctioncay. Eshay ellstay Ack—thejay
anmay owhay inallyfay illskay emthay oth—thatbay ethay ountesscay isyay erhay istersay andyay
insaneyay, utbay ishay ophisticatedsay intuitionyay uggestssay ethay uthtray. Ehay okesstray
ethay Englishwoman’syay eadhay andyay uttersmay oor‘pay eature,�cray�� uiteqay ethay onlyyay
ympathysay eshay ashay everyay eceivedray. Ityay oesday otnay, oweverhay, eventpray Ack’sjay
ifingknay erhay enwhay eshay attemptsyay otay efendday Ululay againstyay imhay. Ustjay eforebay
isthay appenshay, inyay ayay olitarysay onologuemay, ethay ountesscay ayssay:

  i‘ay amyay otnay ayay anmay, ymay odybay ashay othingnay inyay ommoncay ithway osethay ofyay enmay. Isyay
  ityay atthay Iyay avehay ayay an’smay oulsay? Utbay ormentedtay enmay avehay allsmay andyay arrownay
  oulssay, andyay Iyay owknay atthay isyay otnay ymay asecay, enwhay Iyay avehay ivengay upyay
  everythingyay, ademay everyyay acrifice.’[20say]

Eshay esolvesray otay eavelay Ululay, owhay, eshay ealizesray, ashay omfray ethay eginningbay
eltfay anyay uncontrollableyay antipathyyay otay erhay. Eshay illway udystay awlay andyay evoteday
ethay estray ofyay erhay ifelay otay ightingfay orfay ethay ightsray ofyay omen—theway implicationyay
eingbay, ofyay omenway ikelay erselfhay atherray anthay ethay ewigweibliche_ay_. Ityay isyay atyay
isthay ointpay atthay ethay apache’syay ifeknay endsyay erhay unhappyyay existenceyay.

Inyay 1911 Edekindway ublishedpay ethay atiricsay andyay illstay oremay ymbolicsay amadray,
anziska_fray: Ayay Odernmay Ysterymay_, inyay ichwhay ethay imarypray emethay isyay ayay oman’sway
ugglestray orfay individualyay independenceyay. Ethay otagonistpray Anziskafray, ayay irlgay
ustjay underyay entytway enwhay ethay ayplay opensyay, ashay eenbay irrevocablyyay ejudicedpray
againstyay ethay aditionaltray emininefay otlay ybay ildhoodchay ircumstancescay. Eshay ashay
alsoyay efusedray arriagemay ithway otway enmay, oneyay ayay ysicianphay owhay assumedyay atthay erhay
urrendersay otay imhay eantmay abjectyay adorationyay, ethay otheryay anyay elderlyyay oblemannay
omfray omwhay eshay acceptedyay anyay insuranceyay olicypay ecuringsay ethay uturefay ofyay anyyay
ildchay erhay eefray ifelay ightmay oducepray. Eshay isyay entbay uponyay ivinglay ithway allyay ethay
independenceyay ofyay ayay anmay. Opportunityyay offersyay enwhay eshay eetsmay Eitvay Unzkay, ayay
eatricalthay anagermay osewhay uddensay urstingbay intoyay erhay awingdray oomray outyay ofyay ayay
understormthay arksmay imhay asyay Ephistophelesmay otay erhay Austfay. Ehay eessay inyay erhay
oyishbay avurabray ethay ossibilitypay ofyay exploitingyay erhay inyay ethay orldway ofyay
entertainmentyay. Untilyay atelylay, ehay ayssay, audiencesyay antedway omenway ithway ovelylay
eastsbray, ouldersshay andyay armsyay. Utbay ishay unchhay isyay atthay astetay isyay angingchay,
andyay ishay usinessbay isyay otay eepkay oneyay umpjay aheadyay ofyay ethay odemay. Interestinglyyay
enoughyay, ityay isyay asyay ayay ingersay ehay eansmay otay eaturefay erhay, indicatingyay ayay astetay
orfay emininefay enorstay ayay oodgay ecadeday earlieryay inyay Europeyay anthay inyay ethay Unitedyay
Atesstay, erewhay eythay ereway otnay ashionablefay untilyay ethay Entiestway.

Ilewhay udyingstay oicevay andyay osingpay asyay ayay anmay, anz�‘fray�� ashay ayay averntay affairyay
ithway ayay youngyay ostitutepray ichwhay isyay utcay offyay atyay itsyay enithzay enwhay ethay irlgay isyay
otshay ybay ayay ealousjay overlay. Erhay extnay adventureyay isyay asyay ethay usbandhay ofyay ayay
iddle-classmay eiresshay, owhay antsway, otnay ayay omanticray erohay, utbay ayay espectableray
usbandhay andyay ater_pay amiliasfay_. Enwhay ildrenchay ailfay otay appearyay, ethay omanway
amesblay erhay usband’shay ondnessfay orfay ayay youngyay ancerday, andyay eatensthray otay illkay
ethay irlgay unlessyay eshay etslay anz�“fray�? aloneyay. Omfray ayay enescay etweenbay Anziskafray
andyay Eitvay Unzkay, oweverhay, ityay appearsyay atthay ehay andyay eshay avehay eenbay intimateyay
orfay ayay yearyay, andyay ayay ildchay isyay onyay ethay ayway. Anziskafray isyay esentfulray. Arriagemay
ashay ovedpray irksomeyay ecausebay ofyay erhay ife’sway esireday orfay ayay amilyfay, andyay ashay
imitedlay erhay eedomfray ithway othbay exessay. Ayay ildchay illway ebay ethay inalfay andicaphay.
Unzkay ellstay erhay atthay erhay ifeway isyay ayay uchmay orthierway oulsay anthay eshay, andyay atthay
otherhoodmay illway ingbray oremay aturitymay anthay ultiplemay adventuresyay oryay ishay ownyay
amaticdray ainingtray. Oweverhay, ehay ayssay atthay ifyay eshay ersistspay onyay erhay osenchay
athpay, anityvay, elfishnesssay andyay ambitionyay uchsay asyay ershay areyay ethay ivesdray atthay
oducepray uccessfulsay artistsyay. Anyay enemyyay informsyay erhay ifeway atthay Anziskafray isyay
ayay omanway, andyay ethay ockshay ofyay ethay evelationray ausescay ethay ifeway otay ommitcay
uicidesay, ettingsay Anziskafray eefray.

Ethay irdthay actyay ofyay ethay amadray ovesmay otay ethay estateyay ofyay ayay ealthyway oblemannay,
amateuryay aywrightplay andyay owneryay ofyay ayay ivatepray eatrethay, owhay ashay appliedyay otay
Unzkay orfay ethay ervicessay ofyay ishay intriguingyay ale�“may�? arstay. Ostmay ertinentpay otay
ethay esentpray udystay isyay anyay interludeyay inyay ichwhay Anziskafray, inyay
eighteenth-centuryyay an’smay ostumecay, appearsyay otay ethay ountcay inyay ayay eciesspay ofyay
ymbolicsay isionvay asyay ethay ish-fulfillmentway ofyay ishay ostmay ecretsay eamsdray. Eshay
ellstay imhay eshay isyay eithernay oybay ornay omanway, utbay ethay idealyay ofyay allyay osethay
incapableyay ofyay ealray assionpay; orfay ovelay ofyay anotheryay annotcay ogay eyondbay ovelay ofyay
elfsay inyay esethay unschlosen.�“way�? Isthay echnicaltay escriptionday ofyay arcissismnay
along(ay ithway ethay asticdray effectyay uponyay Anziskafray ofyay earlyyay atredhay ofyay erhay
atherfay) owsshay Edekind’sway amiliarityfay ithway ethay enthay eryvay ewnay octrinesday ofyay
ychoanalysispsay.

Ethay emainingray actsyay owshay Anziskafray irstfay ufficientlysay eminizedfay ybay earlyyay
egnancypray otay ayplay ethay artpay ofyay Elilahday onyay ethay agestay, andyay otay ecomebay
infatuatedyay andyay unray offyay ithway ethay actoryay astcay asyay Amsonsay, owhay eatstray erhay
ithway oughray andyay ontemptuouscay asculinemay uperioritysay. Eitvay Unzkay isyay
ostratedpray. Atyay iftyfay ehay eessay ishay ifelonglay onvictioncay ontrovertedcay atthay
appyhay exualsay andyay ofessionalpray associationyay onyay ayay ootingfay ofyay equalityyay ustmay
uaranteegay ayay ermanentpay unionyay. Ishay illiantbray intellectualyay acumenyay isyay
outplayedyay ybay emalefay iology—womanbay eatsbay ethay evil!—andday ehay isyay arelybay
avedsay omfray uicidesay. Inallyfay Anziskafray, ersuadedpay otay abandonyay erhay areercay
orfay ethay akesay ofyay erhay on’ssay ealthhay, isyay ownshay ivinglay inyay uralray overtypay ithway
imhay. Eshay efusesray upportsay omfray eitheryay Unzkay oryay amson,�“say�? eachyay ofyay omwhay isyay
uresay erhay ildchay isyay ishay, andyay acceptsyay ethay otectionpray ofyay anyay asceticyay artistyay
owhay aintspay erhay asyay ethay adonnamay. Erehay Edekindway itshay ethay arcissistnay omplexcay
eadday entercay. Ityay isyay oofpray againstyay othbay omosexualhay andyay eterosexualhay
experienceyay andyay onlyyay artiallypay esolvedray ybay aternitymay, incesay eshay ancay
oleratetay onlyyay ayay anmay eakerway anthay erselfhay andyay oneyay omanticallyray eludedday
aboutyay erhay.

Ecausebay ofyay ethay Eulenbergyay andalscay inyay 1907 iterarylay eferenceray otay
omosexualityhay asway eckedchay orfay ayay imetay inyay Ermanygay, andyay onay oubtday onlyyay
Edekind’sway establishedyay eputationray andyay ishay isparagingday eatmenttray ofyay ethay
emethay ademay ethay eatricalthay oductionpray ofyay anziska_fray_ ossiblepay inyay 1911. Ybay
1914 Dray. Urtkay Ellerhay asway askingyay inyay ethay ahrbuch_jay_: o“way eibtblay erday
omoerotischehay Oman?�?[21ray] Ehay asway eferringray otay alemay omosexualityhay, andyay ehay
eprecatedday ethay oralisticmay onetay ofyay Omasthay Ann’smay eath_day inyay Enicevay_,
onsideringcay ityay isappointingday omfray ethay authoryay ofyay uddenbrooks_bay_. Ishay
answeryay otay ishay ownyay etoricalrhay uestionqay asway atthay onay ympatheticsay orkway ouldcay
earclay ethay urdlehay ofyay atestay ensorshipcay, orfay evenyay ayay ollywhay iritual�“spay�?
eatmenttray ustmay ebay efinedday ybay omesay ontrastcay ithway ethay ensualsay. Onlyyay uetray
iterarylay eedomfray ouldcay ovidepray incentiveyay orfay eativecray itingwray ofyay irstfay
ualityqay.

Untilyay ethay ost-warpay angechay inyay overnmentgay onay uchsay eedomfray evailedpray. Inyay
1917 Ophiesay Oechstetter’shay elbstanzeige_say: Ieday etztelay Amme_[22flay] adhay otay
ebay intedpray ivatelypray. Enwhay ityay asway attackedyay ybay ayay eviewerray inyay er_day Agtay_,
ethay authoryay efendedday ethay iticizedcray urnische“ay Eanlagt�bay�? asyay anyay essentialyay
agestay inyay ethay elf-comprehensionsay ichwhay asway ethay emethay ofyay ethay olewhay ovelnay.
Eshay alsoyay offeredyay otay upplysay ethay olumevay atisgray otay anyyay interestedyay eaderray,
anyay indicationyay atthay ityay adhay eenbay excludedyay omfray ublicpay alesay. Ithway 1918,
oweverhay, ethay anbay asway elaxedray, andyay uringday ethay 1920s Ermanygay aredshay ithway
ethay estray ofyay ethay esternway orldway ayay eriodpay ofyay exualsay eedomfray ichwhay endedyay
onlyyay ithway ethay owinggray influenceyay ofyay Itlerhay inyay ethay 1930s. Evenyay osay,
ost-warpay entimentsay inyay ethay English-speakingyay ountriescay ademay Ermangay
aterialmay unwelcomeyay erethay, andyay ethay omosexualhay ovelsnay andyay agazinesmay ichwhay
aboundedyay inyay Ermanygay orfay ayay ecadeday ainedgay ittlelay irculationcay abroadyay.

Ithway Itler’shay ascendancyyay esethay itlestay ereway osay oonsay obliteratedyay atthay ityay
isyay ifficultday ownay otay indfay oremay anthay ethay eremay ecordray inyay Ermangay adetray
ibliographiesbay ofyay eirthay originalyay ublicationpay. Isthay isyay especiallyyay
uetray ecausebay inyay 1921 Irschfeld’shay ahrbuch_jay_ y(bay enthay ayay
ierteljahrsschrift_vay_) easedcay ublicationpay. Allyay effortsyay ofyay ethay
Issenschaftlich-humanit�resway Omiteekay orfay epealray ofyay ethay anti-homosexualyay
Aragraphpay 175 ofyay ethay Ussianpray iminalcray odecay adhay ailedfay, andyay ethay
organizationyay asway isheartenedday ybay ethay ailurefay. Oreovermay, ethay ieldsfay ofyay
istoryhay andyay iographybay adhay eenbay ellway overedcay inyay actualfay articlesyay uringday
ethay enty-twotway yearsyay ofyay ethay ournal’sjay existenceyay. Andyay asyay orfay itsyay unctionfay
ofyay eportingray urrentcay omosexualhay elles-lettresbay, atthay asway abandonedyay evenyay
eforebay itsyay ownyay eathday ecausebay uchsay iteraturelay asway egularlyray eviewedray inyay
other‘ay ournals,�jay�� e.g(ay., ie_day Eundinfray_, ie_day Eundschaftfray_,
eundschaft_fray undyay Eiheit_—laterfray eros_—_junggesellen_ay: itmay enday
Eibl�tternbay auenliebe,�“fray�?_ andyay ansvestit_tray_.) Esethay areyay ownay almostyay
ompletelycay ostlay, osay atthay evenyay escriptiveday otesnay onyay ethay iteraturelay inyay
uestionqay areyay otnay accessibleyay odaytay.


                           Ost-warpay Eaningsglay

Ofyay ethay ewfay esbianlay ovelsnay otay eachray ethay Unitedyay Atesstay oneyay ofyay ethay estbay asway
Annayay Elisabetyay Eirauch’sway ee-volumethray orpion_scay_, ichwhay appearedyay inyay
Ermanygay etweenbay 1919 andyay 1921. Ityay asway anslatedtray ayay ozenday yearsyay aterlay inyay
anyay abridgedyay editionyay asyay otway eparatesay itlestay, e_thay Orpionscay_ (1932ay) andyay
e_thay Outcastyay_ (1933ay). Oughthay ightlyslay inferioryay inyay iterarylay ualityqay otay
arie_may Onifasbay_, ityay owsshay equalyay asterymay inyay accountingyay orfay andyay acingtray
ethay ullfay istoryhay ofyay anyay exclusivelyyay ariantvay omanway. Ethay enescay ofyay Ettamay
Udloff’sray ildhoodchay isyay ayay earydray itycay ouseholdhay onsistingcay ofyay erhay
ineffectualyay atherfay andyay ayay itefulspay uritanicpay insterspay auntyay. Erhay arecay isyay
entrustedyay otay ayay urserynay overnessgay iredhay orfay onay oundersay easonray anthay atthay
ethay ildchay akestay anyay instantyay ancyfay otay erhay. Ethay youngyay omanway exhibitsyay ayay
acilefay affectionyay ichwhay uicklyqay enslavesyay erhay ittlelay argechay, utbay erhay
emotionsyay areyay ollywhay oundbay otay ayay ashieredcay ilitarymay officeryay, owhay ontrolscay
erhay ompletelycay andyay owhay alternatelyyay eglectsnay erhay andyay iveslay onyay erhay ountybay.
Otay upplysay imhay ithway undsfay, eshay oremay anthay onceyay awnspay ethay Udloff’sray
eldom-usedsay amilyfay ilversay, employingyay Ettamay otay ecuresay ityay omfray itsyay
upboardcay andyay akingtay erhay alongyay onyay isitsvay otay ethay awnbrokerpay. Enwhay ethay
isdemeanormay isyay etectedday, ethay ildchay isyay eriouslysay involvedyay, andyay ethay
uncomprehendedyay andalscay, usplay ethay osslay ofyay erhay elovedbay Uleinfr�ay, eaveslay ayay
astinglay arscay.

Uringday ubertypay andyay adolescenceyay Ettamay attendsyay ayay ublicpay oolschay, utbay erhay
ather’sfay obberysnay iscouragesday iendshipsfray ithway erhay atesmay, andyay eshay owsgray
upyay ayay oredbay andyay onelylay introvertyay. Earingnay entytway, eshay eetsmay, atyay ethay omehay
ofyay elativesray, ayay andsomehay andyay enigmaticyay omanway ayay ecadeday erhay eniorsay andyay
allsfay iolentlyvay inyay ovelay ithway erhay. Oonsay eshay isyay endingspay ostmay ofyay erhay imetay
inyay erhay ewnay iend’sfray oomsray inyay ayay ensionpay, andyay eshay isyay urredspay orfay ethay irstfay
imetay otay ealray intellectualyay effortyay inyay orderyay otay eepkay upyay ithway Olga’syay ideway
interestsyay. among(ay esethay isyay ethay ifelay andyay orkway ofyay Arolinekay onvay Erodeg�nday,
orfay omwhay Olgayay ashay omecay otay eelfay anyay almostyay ysticmay affinityyay ichwhay irsstay
Ettamay otay ealousjay uryfay.) Atyay ethay ensionpay Ettamay alsoyay eetsmay ayay Dray. Etermannpay,
usicalmay aestheteyay andyay ipplecray, owhay equentlyfray aysplay ishay iolinvay orfay ethay
otway youngyay omenway.

Iscoveringday atthay Olgayay isyay inanciallyfay embarrassedyay, Ettamay ontrivescay otay
aketay oreignfay anguagelay essonslay omfray erhay, utbay ethay otway endspay ostmay ofyay ethay
undsfay osay earnedyay onyay oncertscay, operayay, andyay onglay ountrycay excursionsyay. Onyay oneyay
ofyay ethay atterlay, Ettamay oticesnay atthay eythay areyay ollowedfay ybay ayay anmay. Erhay iendfray
ecomesbay istraughtday atyay ethay iscoveryday andyay etraysbay atthay eshay ashay ufferedsay
ethay amesay experienceyay eforebay. Ethay ystifiedmay youngeryay irlgay onyay arrivingyay atyay
omehay isyay orbiddenfay ybay erhay atherfay otay eesay Olgayay againyay oryay otay eavelay ethay ousehay,
andyay esentlypray eshay isyay isitedvay ybay ayay ychiatristpsay. Underyay ishay uestioningqay,
eshay uddenlysay ecallsray atthay eshay ashay awnedpay ethay ilversay, ollowingfay erhay
ildhoodchay atternpay, inyay orderyay otay edeemray ayay oldgay igarettecay asecay Olgayay asway
orcedfay otay acrificesay otay omentarymay eednay. Isthay objectyay, ayay iftgay omfray anyay
earlieryay elovedbay iendfray ofyay Olga’syay, isyay ecoratedday ithway ayay eweledjay orpionscay,
ethay odiacalzay ymbolsay ofyay assionpay andyay eathday underyay ichwhay Olgayay asway ornbay. Ethay
ychiatristpsay eliversday ayay ubtlesay ecturelay onyay ethay estructiveday effectsyay ofyay
emotionalyay iendshipsfray etweenbay omenway. Ethay ysteriousmay anmay, ehay explainsyay,
asway ayay etectiveday employedyay ybay Etta’smay atherfay, owhay orfay omesay imetay ashay adhay
ethay otway irlsgay underyay urveillancesay, andyay otay aingay egallay owerpay overyay Olgayay, ashay
oughtbay upyay erhay ot-inconsiderablenay ebtsday. Ettamay isyay otay ebay entsay otay anyay
uncle’syay inyay ethay ountrycay osay atthay eparationsay aymay urecay erhay ofyay erhay unhealthyyay
infatuationyay. Eventuallyyay, eshay isyay assuredyay, eshay illway ankthay erhay amilyfay andyay
ethay octorday orfay avinghay avedsay erhay omfray uinray. Eshay isyay orcedfay otay eavelay Erlinbay
ithoutway eitheryay explainingyay erhay epartureday oryay ayingsay oodbyegay otay Olgayay.

Atyay erhay uncle’syay eshay etssay erselfhay oneyay oalgay: otay escapeyay andyay eturnray otay Olgayay.
Eforebay onglay eshay ashay osay ingratiatedyay erselfhay ithway ethay ouseholdhay atthay ityay isyay
otnay ootay ifficultday otay obtainyay oneymay ecretlysay omfray erhay uncle’syay eskday andyay otay
eachray ethay ailroadray ationstay. Inyay Erlinbay, Olgayay eetsmay erhay, utbay insteadyay ofyay
ethay armway elcomeway Ettamay anticipatedyay, eshay erelymay emonstratesray againstyay ethay
adnessmay ofyay Etta’smay ightflay andyay efusesray otay arborhay erhay, owingknay ethay irlgay
illway atyay onceyay ebay ackedtray otay erhay oomsray. Afteryay ayay eryvay adbay uarter-hourqay,
oweverhay, Ettamay ucceedssay inyay ersuadingpay Olgayay otay accompanyyay erhay inyay anyay
impulsiveyay ightflay. Ethay otway aketay ethay extnay aintray eduledschay orfay epartureday
andyay etgay offyay atyay ayay ationstay electedyay ybay ancechay. Inyay ethay odestmay amlethay osay
iscoveredday eythay endspay ayay ewfay ecstaticyay aysday ofyay eritablevay oneymoonhay.

Ithertohay eythay avehay exchangedyay onay aresses—indeedcay, Ettamay ashay oftenyay eenbay
eeplyday urthay ybay Olga’syay owshay ofyay usquebray oldnesscay. Ownay atyay astlay eshay earnslay
ethay uetray ignificancesay ofyay erhay ownyay eelingsfay andyay ofyay ethay olderyay irl’sgay
eviouspray estraintray. Oughthay Olgayay eltfay ayay eciprocalray assionpay, eshay ashay adhay
eviouspray ifficultiesday ecausebay ofyay anyay affairyay ithway ayay omanway, andyay eshay eadeddray
iskingray anotheryay uchsay ordealyay. Eshay eclaresday atthay evernay againyay ancay eshay
endureyay o“tay ebay ippedstray akednay inyay ublic.�pay�? Onceyay enlightenedyay, Ettamay
eterminesday atthay eythay allshay evernay ebay eparatedsay. Ithinway ixsay onthsmay eshay
illway attainyay erhay ajoritymay andyay ebay istressmay ofyay ayay argelay aternalmay
inheritanceyay. Eshay iteswray erhay atherfay ofyay erhay ereaboutswhay andyay erhay
intentionsyay, askingyay orfay emporarytay undsfay, utbay assuringyay Olgayay atthay ifyay eythay
areyay efusedray eshay illway aiseray oneymay onyay erhay expectationsyay.

Erhay answeryay isyay ayay elegramtay omfray ethay auntyay ellingtay erhay atthay erhay atherfay ashay
adhay ayay okestray occasionedyay ybay ethay ockshay ofyay erhay obbing�“ray�? erhay uncleyay, andyay
atthay ehay isyay yingday. Ettamay uspectssay ayay aptray, utbay eturnsray otay indfay ethay ewsnay
uetray, andyay iveslay oughthray everalsay ideoushay aysday eforebay erhay ather’sfay eathday
endsyay ethay ightmarenay. Uringday ethay ubsequentsay ightnay, alf-delirioushay omfray
exhaustionyay andyay erhay aunt’syay iciousvay eproachesray, eshay ipsslay awayyay otay Olga’syay
oomsray orfay olacesay. Erehay eshay isyay oundfay atyay awnday ybay ethay auntyay, ethay ongedwray
uncleyay, andyay etectivesday. Eshay eclaresday erhay intentionyay ofyay evernay eavinglay erhay
iendfray, utbay Olgayay, inyay ethay acefay ofyay ublicpay enunciationday, ailsfay otay omecay otay
erhay upportsay, erelymay insistingyay atthay eshay isyay ithoutway esponsibilityray inyay ethay
olewhay attermay.

Onfinedcay atyay omehay andyay alf-illhay, Ettamay indsfay erselfhay uddenlysay urroundedsay
ybay edicalmay ooksbay andyay amphletspay onyay omosexualityhay, allyay ondemnatorycay oryay
andalmongeringscay. Espiteday ethay itterbay owblay ealtday erhay ovelay andyay idepray ybay
erhay iend’sfray efectionday, eshay iteswray Olgayay epeatedlyray, utbay eceivesray onay
answeryay. Afteryay ayay imetay, ickenedsay ybay erhay eadingray andyay oundedway ybay Olga’syay
ilencesay otay ethay ointpay ofyay apathyyay, eshay allowsyay erselfhay, underyay essurepray omfray
erhay auntyay, otay ecomebay engagedyay. Ethay ociallysay oteworthynay atchmay isyay eaturedfay
inyay ethay ewsnay, andyay onyay ethay eveyay ofyay erhay arriagemay eshay ashay ordway omfray Etermannpay
ofyay Olga’syay uicidesay. Olgayay adhay, ofyay oursecay, onenay ofyay erhay etterslay, utbay adhay
eceivedray anymay urrilousscay anonymousyay eatsthray inyay ichwhay Ettamay ecognizesray ethay
andhay ofyay erhay atedhay auntyay, andyay Olgayay adhay, oreovermay, eenbay osecutedpray ybay ethay
Udloffray estateyay ichwhay eldhay erhay ebtsday. Ockedshay intoyay uddensay ardhay aturitymay,
Ettamay ellssay ethay amilyfay ousehay, ettlessay anyay allowanceyay onyay erhay auntyay, andyay
eaveslay Erlinbay, erhay onlyyay ementosmay Olga’syay orpion�“scay�? igaretcay asecay andyay ethay
evolverray ithway ichwhay eshay otshay erselfhay.

Ethay irstfay Ermangay olumevay endsyay erehay, andyay ethay econdsay opensyay inyay anyay
unspecifiedyay argelay itycay, ichwhay inyay allyay obabilitypray actuallyyay epresentedray
anotheryay aspectyay ofyay Erlinbay. Erethay Ettamay, ompletelycay onyay erhay ownyay, attemptsyay
otay adjustyay otay independentyay ifelay. Eshay ungesplay esolutelyray intoyay olitarysay
udystay, utbay ithoutway ethay incentiveyay ofyay iscussionday ithway Olgayay eshay indsfay ethay
effortyay emptyyay. Onsequentlycay eshay eterminesday otay earn“lay ybay iving,�lay�? andyay
allowsyay erselfhay otay ebay awndray intoyay ayay ohemianbay oupgray, everalsay embersmay ofyay
ichwhay oomray inyay erhay ownyay ensionpay. Amongyay esethay artistsyay, ournalistsjay, andyay
entertainersyay eshay indsfay ayay exualsay eedomfray ichwhay ofoundlypray ocksshay erhay, utbay
ayinglay ethay ockshay otay erhay ithertohay elteredshay ifelay, eshay efusesray otay
ithdrawway, andyay ugsshray offyay ethay alf-maternalhay admonitionsyay ofyay ayay
espectable�“ray�? oteriecay inyay ethay ousehay. Eshay isyay esentlypray involvedyay ithway ayay
ightnay ubclay ingersay, Iselagay, otay omwhay eshay isyay awndray ybay earninglay atthay ethay
irl’sgay obviousyay ysicalphay astingway andyay eputedray ugdray addictionyay areyay ethay
esultsray ofyay opelesshay ovelay orfay ayay omanway. Eirthay affairyay isyay essentiallyyay ayay
attermay ofyay utualmay ysicalphay assuagementyay, eachyay irlgay eingbay illstay inyay ovelay
ithway omeonesay elseyay. Ityay isyay evelopedday ightlyslay oremay inyay ethay Ermangay olumevay
anthay inyay ethay Englishyay orpion_scay_ ofyay ichwhay ityay ormsfay ethay econdsay artpay, utbay isyay
otnay eriouslysay expurgatedyay inyay ethay atterlay.

Ayay uchmay oremay italvay attachmentyay eginsbay etweenbay Ettamay andyay ayay andsomehay
ulptressscay, Ophiesay, utbay isyay okenbray offyay ybay ethay atterlay ecausebay eshay ashay
ivedlay orfay yearsyay ithway anyay invalidyay owhay isyay ompletelycay ependentday onyay erhay. Isthay
omanway asway Ophie’ssay alvationsay inyay ayay esperateday eriodpay ofyay erhay youthyay, andyay
ouldway ivegay upyay ethay ugglestray otay ivelay ifyay eshay eltfay erselfhay onay ongerlay eedednay
ybay erhay artnerpay. Eftlay essentiallyyay iendlessfray ybay Ophie’ssay ithdrawalway,
Ettamay iftsdray intoyay ayay estlessray uestqay orfay iversionday amongyay ethay oupgray ofyay
ofessionalpray entertainersyay andyay omosexualshay ofyay omwhay Iselagay isyay oneyay. Inyay ethay
oursecay ofyay akingmay ayay oundray ofyay ightnay ubsclay Ettamay ecomesbay etchedlywray illyay
omfray experimentingyay ithway ocainecay, andyay ecognizingray amusedyay ontemptcay inyay ethay
eyesyay ofyay attractiveyay angersstray ofyay ethay ocialsay assclay inyay ichwhay eshay asway
aisedray, eshay oesgay omehay illedfay ithway elf-loathingsay otay employyay Olga’syay
erishedchay evolverray andyay ejoinray erhay ostlay ovelay. Eshay isyay eckedchay ybay ethay
inistrationsmay ofyay oneyay ofyay ethay espectable�“ray�? olderyay omenway inyay ethay ousehay, owhay
onfessescay otay ayay eepday ough(thay entirelyyay innocentyay) affectionyay orfay erhay, ellstay
erhay eshay isyay ootay youngyay otay ebay ockingknay aboutyay aloneyay, andyay endssay erhay otay aystay
ithway ayay istersay inyay Amburghay osewhay usbandhay isyay anyay aldermanyay andyay osewhay aughterday
isyay ayay elteredshay adolescentyay.

Inyay isthay ewnay ilieumay Ettamay isyay atyay irstfay errifiedtay estlay eshay ebay ollowedfay ybay
Iselagay, utbay erhay earsfay ovepray oundlessgray, andyay eshay isyay oonsay actingyay ethay odelmay
youngyay adylay, oughthay eshay ashay eednay otay uardgay erhay allusionsyay otay acesplay
ecentlyray equentedfray andyay uncensoredyay ooksbay eshay eadray ithway Olgayay. Eshay oonsay
iscoversday atthay ethay aughterday ofyay ethay ousehay isyay, eneathbay ayay eraphicsay
exterioryay, asyay ophisticatedsay asyay anyyay ofyay erhay atelay associatesyay. Ethay irlgay isyay
arryingcay onyay anyay affairyay ithway ayay anmay icetway erhay ageyay osewhay armchay ieflybray
ouchestay evenyay Ettamay. Eshay alsoyay onstantlycay essespray Ettamay otay onfesscay otay
esbianlay astestay andyay experienceyay, eclaringday atthay eshay an“cay alwaysyay ecognizeray
ethay ype,�tay�? andyay oingday erhay estbay otay educesay Ettamay ybay illfulskay aressescay. Isthay
Amburghay interludeyay endsyay ithway ayay eekendway iptray onyay ichwhay Ettamay isyay upposedlysay
En’sgway aperonechay. Ethay ascinatingfay anmay oinsjay ethay expeditionyay ecretlysay, andyay
ovespray ayay onnoisseurcay ofyay iquorslay andyay anyay adeptyay atyay andestineclay ontrivancecay.
Inyay ethay irls�gay�� oomray, Engway, urredspay ybay alcoholyay andyay ethay ingspray ightnay, akesmay
anyay unusuallyyay insistentyay ayplay orfay Ettamay, utbay ustjay asyay ethay atterlay isyay aboutyay
otay yieldyay, ethay onnectingcay oorday opensyay otay admityay ethay anmay, andyay eshay ecognizesray
ethay olewhay iptray asyay a“ay utpay upyay ob�jay�? otay educesay erhay intoyay ayay artypay _�ay� oistray_.
Utterlyyay evoltedray, eshay akesmay ayay eanclay eakbray ithway isthay ifelay alsoyay, andyay
earchessay urtherfay orfay omesay emotionalyay abilitystay andyay eacepay.

Ethay irdthay Ermangay olumevay of(ay ichwhay e_thay Outcastyay_, inyay Englishyay, isyay ayay
iterallay andyay ompletecay anslationtray) owsshay Ettamay inyay ayay ountainmay owntay erewhay
eshay ashay ademay onay ersonalpay ontactscay andyay ashay oldtay onay oneyay anythingyay ofyay
erselfhay oryay erhay astpay. Allingfay inyay ovelay ithway ethay eautybay ofyay ethay egionray, eshay
uysbay andlay andyay ecidesday otay uildbay; onsequentlycay, eshay ustmay ogay otay Erlinbay orfay
egallay andyay architecturalyay adviceyay. Erethay, enewingray onnectionscay ithway ethay
ippledcray Etermannpay, eshay eetsmay inyay ishay ensionpay ayay omanway owhay emindsray erhay
onglystray ofyay Olgayay andyay owhay oducespray almostyay asyay instantaneousyay anyay emotionalyay
impactyay. Ettamay oonsay earnslay atthay isthay isyay ethay iendfray owhay originallyyay avegay
Olgayay ethay orpionscay igaretcay asecay, andyay atthay ityay asway Oronacay owhay erminatedtay
ethay associationyay ecausebay eshay elievesbay ityay isyay alwaysyay etterbay otay endyay ovelay
ilewhay ityay isyay illstay eautifulbay anthay otay etlay ityay ieday. Oronacay ashay otnay evenyay
ownknay ofyay Olga’syay eathday untilyay eshay eessay ethay orpionscay inyay Etta’smay andshay.

Insteadyay ofyay eturningray otay ethay ountainsmay otay atchway erhay ithertohay illingthray
ewnay ousehay aketay ormfay, Ettamay ingerslay inyay Erlinbay inyay Orona’scay oilstay. Eshay
indsfay isthay omanway esslay intellectualyay andyay arderhay anthay Olgayay, andyay islikesday
intenselyyay ethay exhibitionisticyay oupgray ofyay esbianslay, omesay ailoredtay, omesay
erelymay istrionichay, ithway omwhay erhay ewnay ameflay associatesyay. Enwhay eshay inallyfay
iscoversday atthay Oronacay isyay illstay alf-involvedhay inyay anyay oldyay affairyay ithway ayay
arriedmay omanway, andyay isyay alsoyay encouragingyay ethay advancesyay ofyay ayay Ussianray irlgay inyay
ethay ensionpay, Ettamay eesflay otay erhay ountainsmay andyay iveslay uiteqay aloneyay inyay erhay
ewnay ousehay, avesay orfay isitsvay omfray Etermannpay andyay anotheryay anmay ofyay agictray
istoryhay etmay atyay Ophie’ssay eforebay ethay endyay ofyay atthay associationyay. Ayay
assionately-anticipatedpay isitvay omfray Oronacay, ichwhay Ettamay opeshay aymay esultray
inyay ethay atter’slay akingtay upyay esidenceray ithway erhay awayyay omfray urbanyay
istractionsday, ovespray ayay itterbay isappointmentday. Oronacay inallyfay onfessescay
atthay eshay isyay incurablyyay estlessray andyay emptyyay, ayay untresshay owhay isyay eefray ofyay anyay
actualyay ainpay ofyay ysicalphay eednay onlyyay ilewhay eshay isyay inyay ocesspray ofyay aringsnay ayay
ewnay ictimvay. Eshay asksyay ethay ivilegepray ofyay usingyay Etta’smay ountaintopmay asyay anyay
occasionalyay anctuarysay. Ereafterthay Ettamay ettlessay inyay, otnay appyhay utbay atyay
eastlay elativelyray erenesay, otay ivelay aloneyay andyay ovidepray emporarytay eacepay orfay
uchsay ofyay erhay iendsfray asyay arecay otay eeksay erhay outyay.

Omparisoncay ofyay isthay ovelnay ithway a_lay Onifasbay_ isyay interestingyay ecausebay,
espiteday eirthay imilaritysay inyay asicbay emethay andyay ethay influenceyay ofyay initialyay
aumatictray incidentyay, eythay areyay osay idelyway ifferentday. Evenyay ethay irstfay
incidentsyay illustrateyay ethay ifferenceday: inyay a_lay Onifasbay_, ethay ysicalphay
iolencevay ofyay uicidesay enactedyay eforebay ethay ild’schay eryvay eyesyay; inyay e_thay
Orpionscay_, ayay ycho-socialpsay eapot-tempesttay involvingyay ethay ildchay onlyyay
oughthray erhay oss-questioningcray ybay ayay ildren’schay ychiatristpsay, ichwhay eshay
eetsmay ithway assivepay esistanceray. Inyay ethay oneyay ovelnay ayay emalefay eaturecray isyay
endowedyay ithway allyay ethay extrovertedyay astestay, interestsyay, andyay abilitiesyay
usuallyyay onsideredcay alemay. Inyay ethay otheryay ethay emalefay eaturecray isyay ollywhay
emininefay avesay orfay erhay exualsay inclinationsyay. Accordinglyyay, Eirauchway
essesstray ethay influenceyay ofyay environmentyay. Onenay ofyay erhay esbianslay areyay eallyray
asculinemay inyay appearanceyay, andyay onlyyay oneyay alemay omosexualhay ookslay ornbay otay ethay
oleray. Onyay ethay otheryay andhay, iographicalbay ignettesvay areyay adroitlyyay introducedyay
otay accountyay orfay almostyay everyyay ariantvay inyay ethay orystay, andyay esethay areyay evenyay
oremay effectiveyay ecausebay eythay areyay otnay otablynay Eudianfray inyay atternpay. Indeedyay,
isthay ovel’snay ualityqay ieslay inyay itsyay erisimilitudevay, anyay effectyay aturallynay
easieryay orfay ayay omanway iterwray inyay isthay ieldfay anthay orfay ayay anmay. Ethay inevitableyay
onclusioncay awndray omfray esethay otway ovelsnay ogethertay isyay atthay exualsay ariancevay
isyay otnay osay uchmay anyay inbornyay actorfay inyay ayay ifelay atternpay asyay ityay isyay ayay oncomitantcay
esultray ofyay otheryay aspectsyay ofyay ersonalitypay andyay experienceyay.

Ayay econdsay Ermangay esbianlay itemyay, ie_day Esterschway_, isyay ayay amadray ofyay 1924 ichwhay
inyay ylestay owsshay ethay influenceyay ofyay Edekindway. Ethay authoryay, Anshay Altnekerkay,
akestay arecay otay esentpray inyay ayay orewordfay ishay onvictionscay aboutyay omosexualityhay:
ityay epresentsray ethay eighthay ofyay egotismyay, ethay antithesisyay ofyay ethay Istianchray
iritspay, orfay otay ovelay one’syay ownyay exsay isyay otay ithdrawway omfray ethay ommoncay ifelay ofyay
umanityhay andyay imprisonyay oneselfyay inyay ayay utilefay erilitystay. Ehay oubtlessday eltfay
ityay ecessarynay otay oicevay isthay eassuranceray ecausebay inyay ethay irstfay actyay ofyay ethay
ayplay ishay attitudeyay otay ethay eroinehay appearsyay ollywhay ympatheticsay. Ethay
omosexualhay Uthray oveslay erhay youngyay epsisterstay, Olay, utbay ontrolscay erhay
eelingsfay untilyay ancechay owsthray emthay ogethertay orfay ayay ightnay. Eshay isyay
ubsequentlysay astcay outyay ybay erhay epfatherstay, andyay ishay aughterday isyay astilyhay

Ethay arentspay enthay arriedmay eirthay aughterday offyay otay ethay irstfay availableyay anmay,

Ayay ernerstay ondemnationcay ofyay esbianismlay amecay omfray Erberthay Eulenbergyay inyay er“day
Alermay Ayski,�ray�? ayay ovelettenay inyay ethay olumevay asanova’s_cay Etztelay Abenteueryay_

ousin-companioncay inyay esbianlay ondagebay. Eshay oatheslay enmay, utbay ustmay avehay anyay
eirhay otay inherityay erhay opertiespray, andyay itshay uponyay ethay eviceday ofyay inducingyay erhay
elovedbay otay earbay ayay ildchay omwhay eshay ancay enthay adoptyay. Incesay ethay iresay ustmay ebay
ofyay oodgay ockstay, eshay electssay ayay ontemporarycay artistyay osewhay ualificationsqay
easeplay erhay, ummonssay imhay otay aintpay ortraitspay ofyay erhay andyay erhay ompanioncay, andyay
ontrivescay otay etgay ethay atterlay arriedmay otay imhay ybay essingstray ethay excellenceyay
ofyay ethay irl’sgay inancialfay ospectspray. Ethay ouplecay allfay enuinelygay inyay ovelay,
andyay, underyay ethay influenceyay ofyay ormalnay ovelay, ethay irlgay oomsblay omfray ainedstray
allorpay intoyay erfectpay ealthhay andyay ovelinesslay. Asyay oonsay asyay ayay ildchay isyay
expectedyay, oweverhay, ethay olderyay omanway ecuressay ayay eriessay ofyay uchsay advantageousyay
ommissionscay orfay ethay artistyay atthay ehay ustmay ebay absentyay untilyay afteryay ishay
ild’schay irthbay. Eshay enthay eniesday imhay accessyay otay ethay infant—whatyay ightray ashay
anyyay anmay otay ethay ildchay inyay osewhay egettingbay ehay ashay ayedplay utbay ayay omentarymay

orfay asyay anymay oremay? Otay inchclay ethay attermay eshay ellstay imhay ofyay ethay onglay yearsyay
ofyay intimacyyay etweenbay erselfhay andyay ishay ifeway. Ownay ehay eelsfay atthay ishay ide’sbray
innocenceyay asway allyay etencepray, andyay atthay anyoneyay owhay ouldcay avehay eceivedday imhay
aboutyay osay ackblay ayay astpay ancay evernay ebay ustedtray. Ehay akesmay offyay, oudlypray
efusingray anyyay onetarymay ettlementsay enthay oryay aterlay, andyay eterioratesday intoyay ayay
orthlessway ifterdray ecausebay ofyay isthay evastatingday owblay otay ishay elf-respectsay.
Ethay otway omenway emainray ogethertay, apparentlyyay appyhay, incesay otherhoodmay
ovidespray ethay irlgay ithway omesay ormalnay interestyay.

Incesay ethay ilmfay en_m�dchay inyay Uniformyay_ adhay airlyfay ideway irculationcay inyay isthay

erselfhay escendedday omfray ayay ilitarymay inelay, imposesyay arracksbay isciplineday uponyay

orshipway erhay.

Anuelamay, accustomedyay otay aternalmay endernesstay oughoutthray ildhoodchay, isyay ademay

etweenbay upilpay andyay eachertay, oughthay assionatepay, ashay eenbay ollywhay innocentyay,
andyay Anuelamay isyay unawareyay ofyay itsyay urtherfay otentialitiespay. Ethay adamantyay
eadmistresshay utspay ethay orstway onstructioncay onyay erhay ystericalhay outburstyay,
entencessay erhay otay olitarysay onfinementcay orfay ethay emainderray ofyay ethay

Isthay oolschay interludeyay omprisescay onlyyay ethay astlay irdthay ofyay ethay ovelnay, ethay

ather’sfay ilitarymay estigepray akingtay ecedencepray overyay allyay otheryay amilyfay
eedsnay. Ethay irlgay asway irstfay assionatelypay evotedday otay erhay othermay. Uringday
e-adolescencepray eshay allsfay inyay ovelay ithway ayay ublicpay oolmateschay, Evayay, owhay isyay
alsoyay ethay oicechay ofyay erhay olderyay otherbray. Anuelamay insspay antasiesfay ofyay eingbay ayay

Afteryay erhay other’smay eathday, atyay irteenthay, eshay ashay ayay iefbray andyay imulatingstay
iendshipfray ithway ayay oybay iolinistvay, utbay ityay isyay ishay othermay owhay appealsyay otay erhay

erhay obviousyay ossomingblay, erhay ather’sfay impray ousekeeperhay assumesyay ityay isyay
