atherfay andyay auntyay atthay eshay ustmay ebay eparatedsay omfray imhay. Encehay ethay oardingbay
oolschay.

Erehay oneyay ashay anyay uncommonlyyay igh-strunghay ildchay ithway ayay ongstray
other-fixationmay, ithoutway iendsfray ofyay erhay ownyay ageyay upyay otay ethay imetay ofyay erhay
other’smay eathday. Eshay oftenyay entallymay assumesyay ayay oy’sbay oleray ecausebay onlyyay enmay
andyay oysbay eemsay otay ountcay inyay ethay ifelay aboutyay erhay. Atyay ubertypay eshay isyay eprivedday
ofyay othbay othermay andyay other-substitutemay andyay utshay intoyay ayay irtualvay ilitarymay
isonpray, ethay oppositeyay ofyay erhay ithertohay elativelyray eefray existenceyay. Othbay ethay
inevitableyay emotionalyay explosionyay atyay oolschay andyay ethay arefulcay eparationpray orfay
ityay oweyay ayay ebtday otay Eudianfray eorythay.

Inyay ayay econdsay ovelnay, anslatedtray inyay 1936 asyay irl_gay Aloneyay_, Insloeway includesyay
ariancevay onlyyay inyay assingpay. Ethay eroinehay isyay Eva-mariayay, osewhay amenay
illfullyskay orecastsfay ethay ixturemay ofyay ensualitysay andyay omanticray ysticismmay inyay
erhay aterlay experienceyay. Asyay ayay ugglingstray artyay udentstay, eshay irstfay oveslay ayay
andsomehay oybay omwhay eshay oesday otnay ucceedsay inyay inningway. Eshay isyay extnay educedsay
ybay oneyay ofyay erhay instructorsyay, anyay establishedyay ulptorscay andyay Onday Uanjay orfay omwhay
eshay osespay udenay, andyay asyay anyay aftermathyay ofyay isthay itterbay affairyay eshay ivesgay
erselfhay ecklesslyray otay ayay angerstray onyay ayay ightnay enwhay otherwiseyay eshay ightmay
avehay eapedlay intoyay ethay iverray. Ethay ariantvay elementyay isyay introducedyay inyay ethay
ersonpay ofyay Axfay, ayay ailoredtay andyay auchegay ellowfay udentstay ithway omwhay eshay aresshay
anyay apartmentyay. Isthay irlgay oveslay Evayay assionatelypay, utbay eceivingray onay
esponseray, eshay isyay atisfiedsay otay ooklay afteryay erhay ithway almostyay aternalmay
olicitudesay. Ethay otway enjoyyay undrysay evelsray ithway ayay ohemianbay oupgray includingyay
oneyay inseparableyay esbianlay ouplecay andyay ayay umbernay ofyay unattachedyay omosexualhay
omenway. Enwhay Axfay, oughthay illstay inyay ovelay ithway Evayay, engagesyay inyay ayay irtationflay
ithway oneyay ofyay esethay, anyay alluringyay actressyay, ealousyjay ursspay Evayay owardtay ivinggay
Axfay atwhay eshay avescray. Evayay aitsway inyay erhay oommate’sray edbay orfay erhay eturnray omfray
ayay udiostay artypay, utbay Axfay oesday otnay omecay omehay untilyay aybreak—sheday ashay
uccumbedsay otay ethay actress’syay andishments—andblay Evayay evernay onfessescay atwhay
eshay adhay intendedyay. Evayay erselfhay emainsray unmovedyay ybay enuinegay assionpay
oughoutthray ethay isiscray.

Isthay isyay apparentlyyay ethay inalfay ariantvay episodeyay inyay Ermangay ictionfay eforebay
ethay Azinay urgepay eganbay, andyay eethray yearsyay aterlay authorsyay owhay adhay ealtday ithway
ethay ubjectsay, oweverhay ildlymay, ereway eageryay onlyyay orfay eneralgay oblivionyay ofyay
atthay actfay. Usthay arfay, erethay ashay eenbay onay evidenceyay ofyay ayay ubsequentsay ariantvay
enascenceray.

Oneyay eaturefay ofyay esethay oreignfay entieth-centurytway ovelsnay ichwhay ustmay ikestray
evenyay ayay asualcay observeryay isyay ethay ighhay incidenceyay ofyay uicidesay amongyay ariantvay
omenway. Ysicalphay oryay entalmay illnessyay isyay alsoyay oftenyay attributedyay otay esbianlay
acticespray. Othbay eflectray ethay extentyay otay ichwhay ariantvay ictionfay asway asedbay onyay
inicalclay eadingray. Othbay, ootay, areyay acilefay eansmay ofyay oducingpray amaticdray
effectyay, andyay endtay otay acateplay ethay ait-lacedstray ybay uggestingsay atthay, oughthay
anmay aymay oleratetay aberrationyay, aturenay illway otnay. Uchsay evicesday areyay avoidedyay
ybay iterswray ofyay irstfay ank—coletteray, Ollandray, Oustpray, Acretellelay andyay
Ann—whilemay inyay Edekindway ethay elodramaticmay isyay easonedsay ybay atiresay. Ayay econdsay
onspicuouscay otifmay isyay ethay ugglestray orfay ersonalpay independenceyay ichwhay eadslay
omenway otay eschewyay arriagemay andyay otherhoodmay oryay otay achieveyay elf-realizationsay
atyay ethay expenseyay ofyay amilyfay esponsibilitiesray. Isthay eflectsray ethay ogresspray ofyay
ethay omen’sway ovementmay andyay ethay influenceyay ofyay Ibsenyay, Ellenyay Eykay andyay othersyay.
Iscernibleday alsoyay isyay ayay ightslay ecreaseday inyay ethay oportionpray ofyay isexualbay
experienceyay, ueday undoubtedlyyay otay ethay evalencepray ofyay ereditaryhay eorythay. Andyay
astlay, erethay appearsyay inyay oremay anthay ayay ewfay ovelsnay ayay ackgroundbay ofyay iftingshay
omosexualhay oupsgray, arfay aboveyay ethay underworldyay evellay, uchsay asyay Eladanpay aloneyay
icturedpay earlieryay andyay enthay onlyyay asyay allsmay ivatepray osedclay irclescay. Ityay illway
ebay interestingyay otay eesay owhay anymay ofyay esethay ontinentalcay eaturesfay appearyay inyay
Englishyay andyay Americanyay ictionfay.




                              Apterchay Ixyay.
                           Ictionfay Inyay Englishyay


                              Introductionyay

Ethay ariantvay ovelsnay illstay otay ebay urveyedsay inyay Englishyay umbernay ellway overyay ayay
undredhay. Inyay artpay isthay urprisingsay ountcay eflectsray ethay eneralgay owthgray ofyay
interestyay inyay exualsay ychologypsay andyay ethay increaseyay inyay ethay umbernay ofyay emininefay
authorsyay, othbay ofyay ichwhay endstray evelopedday ightlyslay aterlay inyay ethay
English-speakingyay ountriescay anthay elsewhereyay. Utbay eyondbay oubtday ityay isyay alsoyay
ueday inyay omesay easuremay implysay otay ethay eatergray accessibilityyay ofyay aterialmay inyay
ouryay ownyay anguagelay. Ookbay eviewsray inyay Englishyay andyay ethay indexesyay ocatinglay emthay
avehay ultipliedmay enormouslyyay incesay 1900, andyay, on-committalnay oughthay eviewsray
aymay ebay ithway egardray otay ariancevay, ayay acticedpray eaderray owsgray ensitivesay otay
ignificantsay evasionyay. Evenyay oremay uitfulfray, ofyay oursecay, isyay ethay ideway, ifyay
uperficialsay, immingskay ofyay eachyay year’syay outputyay, ayay abithay ichwhay etsnay otnay onlyyay
unreviewedyay iviatray utbay inormay ariantvay incidentsyay inyay etterbay ovelsnay asyay ellway.
Adhay itlestay inyay Enchfray andyay Ermangay eenbay equallyyay eadyray otay andhay, ethay orescay
erehay ouldway ertainlycay ebay oremay equitableyay.

Inyay apidray urveysay ofyay isthay entury’scay Englishyay ictionfay ertaincay oughray
ivisionsday emergeyay. Ethay irstfay ifteenfay yearsyay ightmay ebay alledcay ethay ageyay ofyay
innocenceyay, inyay atthay onay ublishedpay orkway eferredray otay overtyay esbianismlay,
ariancevay asway otnay ayay ubjectsay ofyay isputeday, andyay onay articularpay oolschay ofyay
ychologicalpsay oughtthay adhay omecay otay ethay orefay. Afteryay 1915 oremay
ophisticationsay asway apparentyay andyay ariancevay ecamebay ayay ontroversialcay issueyay,
articularlypay inyay Englandyay erewhay ethay ugglestray orfay uffragesay exacerbatedyay anyyay
eferenceray otay omen’sway epartureday omfray ethay emininefay andyay omesticday oleray.
Ereafterthay, orfay ayay ecadeday oryay osay artisanpay otsshay echoedyay intermittentlyyay ackbay
andyay orthfay asyay eythay adhay inyay Ancefray ayay uarter-centuryqay earlieryay, ithway ethay
ifferenceday, oweverhay, atthay ownay ethay attackyay equentlyfray employedyay ethay
atteriesbay ofyay Eudfray. Uringday ethay irstfay ofyay esethay ecadesday Orldway Arway Iyay
exertedyay ayay erceptiblepay influenceyay, uickeningqay oss-fertilizationcray etweenbay
ontinentalcay andyay Anglo-americanyay attitudesyay inyay eneralgay, andyay, inyay articularpay,
eadinglay otay ethay anslationtray afteryay 1920 ofyay enoughyay Enchfray ictionfay osay atthay
occasionallyyay ecificspay influencesyay ouldcay ebay etectedday inyay ouryay ownyay ovelsnay.
Anotheryay aftermathyay ofyay arway asway atthay elaxingray ofyay allyay exualsay icturesstray
ichwhay aracterizedchay ethay Entiestway, andyay, inyay inelay ithway ethay owinggray eedomfray,
iterarylay eatmentstray ofyay ariancevay ultipliedmay apidlyray, eachingray ayay irstfay
eakpay inyay 1928.

Inyay atthay yearyay Adclyfferay All’shay ell_way ofyay Onelinesslay_ incurredyay egallay
osecutionpray orfay itsyay explicityay efenseday ofyay ayay esbianlay oman.[1way] Ethay
estrictiveray effectyay ofyay isthay actionyay asway onay oremay anthay ocallay andyay emporarytay,
andyay asyay usualyay inyay asescay ofyay ensorshipcay ethay onglay angeray esultray asway ideway
ublicitypay orfay ethay annedbay itletay andyay orfay othersyay onyay elatedray emesthay.
Onsequentlycay, ethay umbernay ofyay ovelsnay ivinggay attentionyay otay ariancevay elledsway
otay ayay econdsay eakpay inyay ethay iddlemay Irtiesthay, utbay ethay eneralgay onetay asway
alteredyay. Authorsyay ereway ownay oremay elf-conscioussay. Ethay estbay, ifyay atyay allyay
ympatheticsay, ealtday oremay ingerlygay ithway ethay elicateday ubjectsay anthay eforebay
ethay attackyay. Ethay ajoritymay, ofyay intermediateyay opularpay ualityqay, ereway arefulcay
otay oundsay ayay isparagingday otenay. Andyay erethay angspray upyay alsoyay orfay ethay irstfay imetay
inyay Englishyay ethay aveway ofyay ediocremay orkway ichwhay alwaysyay ollowsfay ofitablepray
ublicationpay ofyay etterbay aterialmay inyay anyyay ieldfay. Omesay ofyay esethay inferioryay
alestay ereway ensoriouscay, omesay efensiveday, utbay allyay ereway osay unrestrainedyay atthay
inyay isthay ountrycay, atyay eastlay, ertaincay essurepray oupsgray, otablynay ethay Atholiccay
Eaguelay orfay Ecencyday, ereway ousedray otay usadecray orfay olesalewhay uppressionsay.

Ayay esslay obviousyay influenceyay asway alsoyay atyay orkway. Ethay aming“flay youth�yay�? ofyay ethay
Entiestway, oductpray ofyay arway andyay ofyay eneralgay ebellionray againstyay Ictorianvay
inhibitionsyay, adhay eachedray ayay ointpay ofyay isillusionmentday ithway exualsay eedomfray,
andyay ownay, asyay ethay ost“lay eneration�gay�?, ereway opinggray owardtay emotionalyay
abilitystay. Isthay uestqay orfay adjustmentyay alledcay orthfay ayay uantityqay ofyay opularpay
ychologypsay andyay ociologysay, emmingstay argelylay omfray Eudfray, ichwhay eprecatedday
irregularyay attachmentsyay, especiallyyay ethay omosexualhay, andyay exaltedyay arriagemay
andyay amilyfay ifelay. Usthay, omesay eclineday inyay ariantvay ictionfay asway evidentyay
eforebay ethay endyay ofyay ethay Irtiesthay. Enthay, inyay 1939 ethay econdsay Orldway Arway
exertedyay initialyay essurepray inyay ethay amesay irectionday, orfay, asyay alwaysyay, ethay
youngeryay eneration’sgay urgeyay otay erpetuatepay itselfyay eforebay ootay atelay ewthray
addedyay emphasisyay uponyay eterosexualhay elationsray andyay arenthoodpay. Andyay inallyfay,
inyay ethay ublishingpay usinessbay, otay usualyay artimeway andicapshay asway addedyay ethay ewnay
ilitarymay equisitionray ofyay ellulosecay orfay explosivesyay, ichwhay esultedray inyay anyay
unprecedentedyay ortageshay ofyay aperpay andyay ingentstray electivitysay inyay ublishedpay
ictionfay. Altogetheryay ityay asway inevitableyay atthay uringday ethay earlyyay Ortiesfay ethay
ariantvay iterarylay eamstray ouldshay unray owlay.

Ityay idday otnay, oweverhay, easecay entirelyyay, andyay incesay ethay endyay ofyay Orldway Arway Iiyay,
endstray inyay ictionfay uggestsay atthay ariancevay isyay onyay itsyay ayway otay ecomingbay ayay
ecognizedray ifyay otnay acceptedyay egmentsay ofyay umanhay experienceyay. Ethay obablepray
underlyingyay easonsray orfay isthay angechay areyay ariedvay. Oneyay isyay ethay usualyay
aftermathyay ofyay arway. Esidesbay egularlyray oducingpray ayay umperbay opcray ofyay infantsyay,
arway ashay, incesay ethay aysday ofyay Apphosay, elledsway ethay umbernay ofyay ariantsvay ybay
egregatingsay ethay youngyay otay omesay extentyay uringday ustjay osethay yearsyay enwhay exualsay
interestyay isyay atyay itsyay eighthay. Oremay onsciouscay effortyay asway ademay otay ombatcay isthay
endencytay uringday Orldway Arway Iiyay anthay everyay eforebay, othbay inyay ethay armedyay orcesfay
andyay onyay ethay omehay ontfray. Eventivepray easuresmay isthay imetay ereway asyay uchmay
educationalyay asyay isciplinaryday, osay atthay ethay arway enerationgay emergedyay ithway
omesay oundinggray inyay ychiatry“psay atyay ethay ox-holefay evel.�lay�? Oneyay esultray isyay atthay
amongyay omenway erethay asway onay uchsay eliberateday ost-warpay affectationyay ofyay
asculinitymay asyay occurredyay inyay ethay Entiestway. Anotheryay isyay atthay anymay incipientyay
authorsyay ereway eparedpray otay itewray ofyay ariancevay ithway omesay alancebay andyay
erspectivepay.

Ayay urtherfay ossiblepay easonray orfay ethay elaxingray ofyay atyay eastlay ethay Americanyay
attitudeyay owardtay ariancevay isyay ethay ublicationpay ofyay ethay Inseykay eportsray onyay
exualsay ehavior.[2bay] Ethay appearanceyay ofyay ethay alemay olumevay inyay 1948 encouragedyay
ethay oductionpray ofyay everalsay erioussay ovelsnay eaturingfay alemay omosexualityhay, ayay
ubjectsay ithertohay ingentlystray annedbay omfray Englishyay ictionfay. Ityay isyay otnay afesay
otay aysay atthay isthay iftinglay ofyay abootay ignificantlysay affectedyay ethay emininefay
icturepay, incesay emalefay ariancevay asway evernay osay igorouslyray outlawedyay, andyay ethay
ountcay ofyay ertinentpay itlestay asway asyay argelay inyay 1943 andyay 1944, orfay instanceyay,
asyay inyay 1949 andyay 1950. Orfay isthay amesay easonray Insey’skay econdsay olumevay onyay ethay
emalefay (1953ay) eemssay unlikelyyay otay oducepray anyay effectyay omparablecay otay ishay
irstfay. Utbay oneyay actfay isyay ertain—thecay inclusionyay ofyay incidentalyay ariantvay andyay
evenyay esbianlay episodesyay andyay aracterschay isyay onyay ethay increaseyay inyay opularpay
urrentcay ictionfay.

Isthay atementstay eadslay otay onsiderationcay ofyay ayay irdthay andyay urelypay acticalpray
easonray orfay ethay increase—post-waryay innovationsyay inyay ethay ublishingpay usinessbay.
Eforebay 1941 experimentsyay inyay oducingpray ooksbay ofyay ighhay eadabilityray andyay owlay
ostcay adhay otnay achievedyay inancialfay uccesssay, utbay ourfay yearsyay ofyay overnmentgay
ubsidysay otay ethay endyay ofyay ovidingpray ethay armedyay orcesfay ithway eadingray attermay utpay
ethay enturevay onyay ayay ayingpay asisbay. Atyay esentpray, ictionfay availableyay atyay agazinemay
ostcay andyay omfray allyay agazinemay outletsyay ashay ecomebay ayay ommonplacecay ofyay ailyday
ifelay. Ilewhay esethay aper-coveredpay ovelsnay ereway atyay irstfay eprintsray ofyay itlestay
otablynay uccessfulsay inyay otheryay editionsyay, incesay 1950 ayay umbernay ofyay ompaniescay
avehay issuedyay originalsyay inyay ethay amesay ormatfay. Uiteqay aturallynay oneyay ure-firesay
ellingsay eaturefay onyay ethay ewsstandsnay isyay anknessfray ithway egardray otay exsay, andyay
ethay ultiplicationmay ofyay othbay eprintsray andyay originalsyay ealingday ithway emalefay
ariancevay ovidespray objectiveyay evidenceyay ofyay interestyay inyay atthay ubjectsay.
Anotheryay equisiteray orfay astfay alessay isyay ayay ot-too-exaltednay iterarylay evellay,
andyay ethay ombinationcay ofyay exsay atitudelay andyay opularpay ualityqay ashay alertedyay
ould-beway ensorscay. Orfay omesay yearsyay esethay elf-appointedsay oupsgray avehay oughtsay
otay ontrolcay ethay aper-backedpay arketmay andyay avehay erehay andyay erethay ucceededsay.
Ariantvay itlestay avehay eenbay onspicuouscay inyay allyay istslay underyay irefay omfray oralmay
igilantesvay, andyay ethay urrentcay uestionqay isyay etherwhay ensoringcay agenciesyay illway
ucceedsay inyay onceyay againyay eckingchay uantityqay irculationcay ofyay uchsay aterialmay.


                          Ethay Ageyay ofyay Innocenceyay

Ethay astlay entionedmay ariantvay arrativenay inyay Englishyay asway Enryhay Ames’sjay
ovelettenay e_thay Urntay ofyay ethay Ewscray_ (1898ay). Eatingtray asyay ityay idday ethay
eductionsay ofyay ayay irlgay ofyay eightyay ybay ayay epravedday overnessgay, ityay asway onsideredcay
alongyay ithway Enchfray itlestay ofyay itsyay ecadeday ichwhay ityay esembledray oremay oselyclay
anthay idday anyyay ofyay ethay ovelsnay oonsay otay appearyay inyay Englishyay. Ofyay esethay astlay,
onenay offeredyay oremay ontrastcay otay Enchfray ophisticationsay oryay ouldcay oremay
ittinglyfay avehay usheredyay inyay entieth-centurytway ictionfay inyay ouryay ownyay onguetay
anthay ethay innocuousyay aletay ublishedpay inyay 1900 ybay ayay ow-forgottennay Itishbray
ovelistnay, Ellenyay Orneycroftthay Owlerfay.

Ithinway ethay irstfay uarterqay ofyay e_thay Arringdonsfay_ Mrsay. Owlerfay includesyay ayay
eriessay ofyay eethray assionatepay attachmentsyay experiencedyay ybay ethay otherlessmay
eroinehay. Esethay occuryay eforebay Elisabethyay isyay entytway, utbay eythay areyay oteworthynay
ecausebay ofyay ethay author’syay eculiarpay essstray uponyay emthay.

  Erethay areyay otway ingsthay ichwhay areyay absolutelyyay ecessarynay otay ethay ell-beingway
  ofyay ethay ormalnay emininefay ind—namelymay, oneyay omanticray attachmentyay andyay oneyay
  omfortablecay iendshipfray. Elisabethyay asway erfectlypay ormalnay andyay extremelyyay
  emininefay, andyay onsequentlycay eshay ovidedpray erselfhay earlyyay ithway esethay otway
  aidsyay otay appiness.[3hay]

Espiteday isthay insistenceyay onyay ormalnay emininityfay, ethay objectyay ofyay ethay irl’sgay
omfortablecay iendshipfray isyay ayay oybay eighbornay; atthay ofyay erhay assionatepay
attachmentyay ayay alltay, andsomehay andyay ittyway Ousincay Anneyay, ayay ecadeday olderyay anthay
eshay isyay.

  Allyay ethay omanceray ofyay Elisabeth’syay ature—andnay erethay asway ayay eatgray ealday ofyay
  it—wasyay avishedlay uponyay Anneyay Arringdonfay.... Ethay eremay oundsay ofyay Anne’syay
  oicevay ibratedvay oughthray ethay ild’schay olewhay eingbay, andyay everyyay ittlelay
  ifletray onnectedcay ithway erhay ousincay ecamebay ayay acredsay elic.[4ray]

Eepday inyay ethay eadingray ofyay ythologymay, Elisabethyay eessay erhay ousincay asyay Ianaday,
uildsbay ayay ineshray otay erhay inyay ethay ardengay, andyay acticespray ayay itualray ofyay urntbay
offeringsyay eforebay ityay. Eshay alsoyay akestay eatgray interestyay inyay ethay Ookbay ofyay Uthray,
ensingsay a“ay arallelismpay otay erselfhay andyay Ousincay Anneyay in(ay eelingfay atyay
east).�lay�?

  Eoplepay ometimessay ilesmay atyay ethay adorationyay ofyay ayay youngyay irlgay orfay ayay omanway,
  andyay erethay isyay onay oubtday utbay atthay ethay eelingfay avourssay ightlyslay ofyay oolschay
  aysday andyay eadbray andyay utterbay. Utbay erethay isyay alsoyay onay oubtday atthay ayay irlgay owhay
  ashay onceyay eltfay ityay ashay earnedlay atwhay ealray ovelay isyay, andyay atthay isyay onay allsmay
  essonlay inyay ethay ookbay ofyay ife.[5lay]

Isthay evotionday occupiesyay Elisabethyay omfray elvetway otay ixteensay, enwhay ethay
ousin’scay eathday ungesplay erhay intoyay elancholymay ichwhay eatensthray erhay ealthhay.
Eshay isyay accordinglyyay urriedhay offyay otay oardingbay oolschay, erewhay uringday ethay extnay
ourfay yearsyay eshay experiencesyay ayay asecay ofyay assionatepay ero-worshiphay orfay ethay
eadmistresshay, andyay ayay evoted“day iendship�fray�? ithway ayay oolmateschay owhay ecamebay
orfay ayay imetay e“thay eryvay ainspringmay ofyay Elisabeth’syay ifelay. Eshay asway ayay eautifulbay
irlgay ... andyay Elisabethyay adoredyay erhay ithway ethay adorationyay ... eelyfray ivengay otay
ethay irlgay owhay ashay eautybay ybay ethay irlgay owhay ashay ot.�nay�? Uponyay isthay irlgay
Elisabethyay avisheslay

  atthay assionatepay andyay illingthray iendshipfray ... osay atisfyingsay otay ethay
  immatureyay emalefay oulsay, utbay ichwhay isyay evernay againyay experiencedyay ybay ethay
  omanway owhay ashay onceyay eenbay aughttay ybay ayay anmay ethay aturenay ofyay ealray ove.[6lay]

Ethay atterlay experienceyay eshay eetsmay atyay entytway. Allyay esethay arefulcay atementsstay
indicateyay ethay author’syay ullfay awarenessyay ofyay ethay aturenay ofyay ariancevay andyay erhay
akingtay ayay eliberateday andstay ithway egardray otay ityay. Equallyyay efiniteday isyay ethay
implicationyay atthay onenay ofyay esethay earlyyay adorationsyay involvedyay ysicalphay
intimacyyay.

Otway yearsyay aterlay (1902ay) ayay Anadian-americancay irlgay ofyay enty-onetway ublishedpay
e_thay Orystay ofyay Arymay Aclanemay_, ittenwray asyay ayay ournaljay overingcay eethray onthsmay
uringday erhay ineteenthnay yearyay andyay urportingpay otay ebay iterallay autobiographyyay.
Ikelay ethay omparablecay ory“stay ofyay Opal,�yay�? intedpray asyay authenticyay ybay ethay
atlantic_ay Onthlymay_ inyay 1920, utbay artiallypay ebunked�“day�? ybay iscerningday
iticscray, ityay asway obablypray acedlay ithway oremay anthay ayay ashday ofyay ictionfay. Inyay itsyay
ayday ityay eatedcray ufficientsay ensationsay otay ebay urlesquedbay inyay Eberway andyay
Ield’sfay evueray ofyay atthay yearyay, andyay oldsay ellway enoughyay otay allowyay itsyay authoryay ayay
alf-dozenhay yearsyay inyay Ostonbay andyay Ewnay Yorkyay.

Onspicuouscay inyay itsyay elf-revelationsay isyay undyingyay atredhay ofyay ethay atherfay omwhay
Arymay ostlay atyay ethay ageyay ofyay eightyay.

  Apartyay omfray eedingfay andyay othingclay emay ... andyay endingsay emay otay ool—whichschay
  asway onay oremay anthay asway ueday e—imay annotcay eesay atthay ehay everyay avegay emay ayay
  inglesay oughtthay. Ertainlycay ehay idday otnay ovelay emay, orfay ehay asway uiteqay
  incapableyay ofyay ovinglay anyoneyay utbay imself....[7hay]

Ofyay erhay othermay eshay ayssay aterlay,

  Owhay ancay oneyay ingbray ayay ildchay intoyay ethay orldway andyay otnay apwray ityay oundray ithway ayay
  ertaincay ondrousway endernesstay atthay illway aystay ithway ityay alwaysyay!... Ymay
  othermay ashay omesay ondnessfay orfay e—formay ymay odybay ecausebay ityay amecay outyay ofyay
  ershay. Atthay isyay othing—nothingnay. Ayay enhay oveslay itsyay egg.[8yay]

Arymay eelsfay erselfhay unlovedyay alsoyay ybay ethay estray ofyay erhay amily—olderfay istersay,
olderyay andyay youngeryay othersbray, andyay epfather—allstay ofyay omwhay areyay ictly“stray
acticalpray andyay aterialmay, eeingsay oseclay umanhay elationsray asyay ethay uffstay ofyay
iteraturelay, otnay ealray ife....�lay�? Eshay isyay erselfhay ayay eniusgay, infinitelyyay apartyay
omfray ethay udecray arrennessbay ofyay Uttebay, Ontanamay, oughthay eshay ownsyay otay eenkay
ympathysay orfay omenway erethay owhay areyay outside“ay ethay oralmay ale.�pay�? Allyay isthay, ofyay
oursecay, isyay onceyay againyay ethay ark“day erohay omplex,�cay�? atthay ensesay ofyay eingbay
outcastyay utbay uperiorsay, ichwhay ashay incesay eenbay osay ellway analyzedyay ybay Omerray
Ilsonway inyay Emilyyay Ont�bray� andyay othersyay. Orfay 1902, eethray ecadesday efore_bay_ ethay
erayay enwhay arentspay ouldcay oday onay ightray, ityay asway airlyfay ongstray eatmay.

Asyay orfay enmay, Aclanemay isyay ertaincay onenay ancay everyay ouseray oryay ossesspay erhay exceptyay
ethay Evilday. e“hay illway ebay incarnateyay, utbay ehay illway otnay ebay ayay an.�may�? Ehay illway
urthay erhay, andyay assionpay orfay imhay illway eefray erhay omfray erselfhay, utbay ityay illway
astlay onlyyay eethray aysday, andyay ere“thay ustmay ebay onay allingfay inyay ovelay aboutyay it.�yay�?

  Ymay yshay andyay ensitivesay oulsay ouldway ebay irretrievablyyay oisonedpay andyay
  ollutedpay. Ethay efilementday ofyay osay acredsay andyay eautifulbay ayay ingthay asyay
  arriagemay isyay urelysay ethay arkestday evilyay atthay ancay omecay otay ayay ifelay. Andyay osay
  everythingyay inyay emay atthay adhay urnedtay owardtay atthay ootay ightbray ightlay ouldway
  enthay inkdray eepday ofyay ethay eeslay ofyay eath.[9day]

Ityay asway isthay evilday antasyfay uponyay ichwhay Eberway andyay Ieldsfay eizedsay, andyay onyay ethay
agestay ethay Arkday Entlemangay, ayedplay ybay Illiamway Olliercay, edflay inyay errortay
eforebay ethay enfant_ay erribletay_.

Ethay ertinentpay ointpay otay ichwhay allyay ethay oregoingfay eadslay isyay anyay attachmentyay otay
ayay ighhay oolschay eachertay ofyay iteraturelay irstfay encounteredyay enwhay Arymay asway
eighteenyay, e“thay irstfay ersonpay onyay earthyay owhay everyay ookedlay atyay emay enderly,�tay�? otay
omwhay eshay efersray ithway adolescentyay entimentalitysay asyay ethay anemone“ay Ady.�lay�?
Aboutyay isthay omanway eshay insspay assionatepay everiesray, ishingway eythay ightmay ivelay

ofyay isthay iendshipfray i“ay eltfay ayay appingsnay ofyay ense-drawntay ordscay, ayay eakingbray
awayyay ofyay oodflay ates—andgay ayay angestray ewnay ainpay ... ayay onvulsioncay andyay ayay

Illstay Arymay ayssay:

  Ometimessay Iyay amyay eizedsay ithway earernay, ividervay ensationssay orfay ymay iendfray
  ethay Anemoneyay Adylay ... Iyay eelfay ayay angestray attractionyay ofyay exsay. Erethay isyay inyay

  ethay an-lovemay etsay inyay ethay ysteriousmay ensibilitiessay ofyay ymay oman-natureway.
  Ityay ingsbray emay ainpay andyay easureplay ixedmay.... Oday youyay inkthay ayay anmay isyay ethay
  onlyyay eaturecray ithway omwhay oneyay aymay allfay inyay ove?[11lay]

   Ethay ilewhay Iyay eltknay, Iyay etlay ayay ansypay ideglay
   Etweenbay erhay avegray eetsway acefay andyay openyay ookbay

Isthay Aclanemay ouldway avehay ovedlay, asyay eshay ouldway avehay atedhay ethay arcicalfay
eatmenttray ofyay ariancevay inyay a_ay Oridaflay Enchantmentyay_, andyay otay assumeyay erhay
acquaintanceyay ithway othbay ouldway explainyay erhay otherwiseyay unaccountableyay
inglingsay outyay ofyay esethay otway authorsyay aloneyay orfay ecialspay entionmay. Othbay ofyay
Aclane’smay olumesvay etraybay ayay isingenuousday effortyay otay esentpray erselfhay asyay ayay
ildchay eniusgay ingingspray asyay ityay ereway ybay arthenogenesispay omfray ethay
intellectualyay astelandway ofyay Ontanamay. Ityay isyay obablepray atthay erhay eadingray adhay
eenbay oremay extensiveyay andyay adhay influencedyay erhay oremay anthay eshay admittedyay.

Asyay otay ethay olumevay ofyay 1903, ityay isyay otnay onlyyay esslay artlingstay anthay ethay irstfay
utbay eemssay oremay youthfulyay. Ethay iend�“fray�? ofyay ethay itletay isyay ayay Apanesejay
atuettestay inyay ichwhay erhay antasyfay eessay a“ay omanway ofyay ourteen�fay�? owhay ashay ownknay
ovelay orfay ayay eekway, afteryay ichwhay e“thay ongstray angerstray entway away,�yay�? eavinglay
ifelay abdray. Erehay isyay ethay Evilday againyay, andyay annabel�“ay�? isyay obviouslyyay onay oremay
anthay Ary’smay ownyay ersona_pay_, ardhay, experiencedyay andyay elf-containedsay evenyay
eforebay adolescenceyay. Oneyay ondersway etherwhay Aclanemay aymay avehay ufferedsay omesay
earlyyay aumatictray experienceyay ithway ayay anmay ichwhay oducedpray isthay ecurrentray
antasyfay andyay omptedpray erhay ympathysay orfay ethay ass�esd�clay ofyay Uttebay. Asyay orfay
omenway, annabel�“ay�? isyay erhay onlyyay admittedyay iendfray. Ethay olumevay ecordsray othingnay
eyondbay Ary’smay oamingray aloneyay inyay Ostonbay, allingfay inyay ovelay omentarilymay ithway
Inniemay Addernmay Iskefay asyay ethay Agdalenmay, andyay adoringyay ethay Uvispay eday Avanneschay
uralsmay inyay ethay Ublicpay Ibrary—thoselay elicateday aithswray osay emoteray omfray
ealityray. Ofyay umanhay ontactscay erethay isyay onay entionmay; eshay isyay olitarysay andyay
itterlybay ostalgicnay orfay ethay Anemoneyay Adylay, oryay, atherray, orfay eirthay
ountainsidemay eyrieyay ofyay erhay ownyay imaginingyay. Assagespay inyay erhay irdthay olumevay,
i_ay, Arymay Aclanemay_ (1917ay) edshay omesay ightlay onyay erhay actualyay experiencesyay atyay
isthay imetay, utbay ustmay awaityay iscussionday inyay operpray orderyay ecausebay ethay aterlay
olumevay eflectsray ethay omparativecay emotionalyay ophisticationsay ichwhay adhay
ermeatedpay isthay ountrycay inyay ethay interveningyay yearsyay.

Ethay extnay ariantvay itemyay asway anyay istoricalhay ovelnay ybay Ohnjay Eckenridgebray Ellisyay
(1902ay), utbay ecedencepray illway ebay ivengay otay ethay ecentlyray ublishedpay ings_thay
Asyay Eythay Areyay_ (1951ay), ittenwray inyay 1903 ybay Ertrudegay Einstay, ecausebay ofyay itsyay
oserclay imilaritysay otay Aclane’smay autobiographicalyay olumesvay. Isthay earliestyay
effortyay ofyay Issmay Ein’sstay, ittenwray enwhay eshay asway enty-ninetway, isyay ecognizedray
asyay eryvay earnay otay erhay ownyay experienceyay ybay Edmundyay Ilsonway, ayay ong-timelay udentstay
ofyay erhay otaltay ork.[13way] Ityay ecordsray ethay emotionalyay entanglementsyay amongyay
eethray youngyay Americanyay omenway overyay ayay eriodpay ofyay otway yearsyay, andyay opensyay onyay ayay
ansatlantictray inerlay arryingcay emthay otay Europeyay. Adeleyay, ethay entralcay igurefay
omfray osewhay iewpointvay ethay olewhay orystay isyay ittenwray, isyay oppressedyay ybay
exhaustionyay andyay e“thay isillusionday ofyay ecentray ailures�fay�? inyay Altimorebay, andyay asyay
Mray. Ilsonway ointspay outyay, Issmay Einstay erselfhay entway abroadyay inyay ethay ummersay ofyay

eshay adhay ursuedpay ethay edicalmay oursecay orfay ivefay yearsyay.

Ethay eethray irlsgay areyay aracterizedchay atyay engthlay. Elenhay isyay

  ethay Americanyay ersionvay ofyay ethay Englishyay andsomehay irlgay. Inyay erhay idealyay
  ompletenesscay eshay ouldway avehay eenbay unaggressivelyyay eterminedday, ayay ifletray
  utalbray andyay entirelyyay impersonalyay; ayay omanway ofyay assionspay utbay otnay ofyay

Atyay oneyay ointpay Elenhay argeschay erhay ithway iddle-class“may orality,�may�? otay ichwhay

  emay, ityay isyay inyay ortshay ethay idealyay ofyay affectionateyay amilyfay ife.[17lay]

Utbay atthay ays(say Elenhay) eansmay uttingcay assionpay uiteqay outyay ofyay youryay emeschay ofyay
ingsthay. Adeleyay epliesray:

  Otnay implesay oralmay assionspay, eythay areyay istinctlyday ofyay ityay utbay eallyray ymay
  iefchay ointpay isyay ayay otestpray againstyay isthay endencytay ... otay ogay inyay orfay

  inyay eatergray oryay esslay omplexitycay ... andyay againstyay ethay ultivationcay ofyay ethay
  atterlay Iyay avehay anyay almostyay uritanicpay orrorhay andyay atthay includesyay anyay
  objectionyay otay ityay inyay anyyay ofyay itsyay anymay isguisedday orms.[18fay]

Inyay accordanceyay ithway esethay inciplespray Adeleyay endsspay erhay ummersay inyay Ainspay,
appyhay inyay ethay eremay amily�“fay�? omradeshipcay ofyay ayay ousincay. Utbay uringday ethay
ubsequentsay interway eshay aysplay ayay ividedday amegay. Eshay annotcay esistray oinggay
epeatedlyray omfray Altimorebay otay Ewnay Yorkyay otay eesay Elenhay, oughthay onceyay erethay
eshay isyay otnay onlyyay assivepay utbay esistantray otay ethay otheryay irl’sgay ooingway. Eshay
evenyay ayssay explicitlyyay atthay eythay avehay ewfay interestsyay inyay ommoncay, utbay illstay
ityay isyay eshay owhay oesday allyay ethay avelingtray otay akemay eirthay owinggray intimacyyay
ossiblepay, orfay Elen’shay esourcesray areyay arplyshay urtailedcay ybay unsympatheticyay
arentspay.

Usthay arfay, ethay irdthay irlgay, Ophiesay, ashay emainedray urprisinglysay assivepay inyay
iewvay ofyay erhay ong-establishedlay intimacyyay ithway Elenhay, utbay inyay ethay oursecay ofyay
isthay interway eshay enlightensyay Adeleyay asyay otay ethay ecisepray aturenay ofyay atthay
intimacyyay. Adeleyay isyay osay ockedshay atthay ityay isyay impliedyay earlyclay atthay ethay
elationray isyay ysicalphay andyay, upyay untilyay enthay, ollywhay outsideyay erhay ownyay
acquaintanceyay. Otnay evenyay isthay evelationray, oweverhay, ancay etachday erhay omfray
Elenhay, althoughyay eshay eliberatelyday electsyay ayay econdsay ummersay abroadyay aloneyay andyay
ufferssay enwhay Elen’shay etterslay areyay oppedstay ybay ayay isitvay omfray Ophiesay. Uringday
ethay ubsequentsay interway erhay ownyay elationsray ithway Elenhay eachray ethay agestay ofyay
ysicalphay expressionyay, utbay ethay angechay isyay otnay ayay appyhay oneyay.

  Eirthay ulsespay ereway ifferentlyday imedtay. Eshay ouldcay otnay ogay osay astfay andyay
  Elen’shay exhaustedyay ervesnay ouldcay onay ongerlay aitway. Adeleyay oundfay erselfhay
  onstantlycay orcedfay onyay ybay Elen’shay ainpay. Ityay asway ayay alsefay ositionpay ... erhay
  attitudeyay asway isunderstoodmay andyay Elenhay interpretedyay erhay ownessslay asyay
  eficiencyday ... andyay ethay eatergray erhay affectionyay orfay Elenhay ecamebay ethay
  oremay irritableyay ecamebay erhay iscontent.[19day]

Isthay isyay itetray enoughyay otay eadersray ofyay odernmay exualsay ychologypsay asyay etsay orthfay
inyay arriagemay anualsmay. Ityay asway otnay itetray omingcay omfray anyay unmarriedyay Americanyay
irlgay inyay 1903.

Atyay isthay uncturejay Ophiesay invitesyay Elenhay otay accompanyyay erhay onyay anotheryay
Europeanyay iptray. as(ay Mray. Ilsonway ilydray emarksray, orfay ethay oremay osperouspray
Americanyay ollegecay aduategray, Europeyay asway enthay anyay imperativeyay.) Elenhay
acceptsyay, andyay althoughyay Adeleyay isyay ertaincay atthay Ophiesay isyay inancingfay ethay iptray
eshay aresday otnay utpay ethay uestionqay irectlyday. Oryay erhapspay eshay oesday otnay antway
otay, orfay Elenhay ashay urgedyay erhay otay endspay ethay ummersay abroadyay alsoyay, otnay ithway
emthay, utbay ithinway easyyay eachray.

Andyay osay ethay overlay ofyay erenitysay avelstray orfay erhay irdthay ummersay asyay ayay indkay ofyay
emi-detachedsay appendageyay otay ethay otheryay airpay, andyay ethay emainderray ofyay ethay
actionyay isyay almostyay asyay edioustay andyay onfusingcay otay ethay eaderray asyay otay Adeleyay
erselfhay. Ecausebay ofyay ethay ysicalphay incompatibilityyay osay ellway escribedday
aboveyay, Elenhay ashay ownay ooledcay onsiderablycay inyay atthay espectray, utbay erhay
emotionalyay ependenceday uponyay Adeleyay increasesyay ithway Ophie’ssay alkingbay ofyay
ivatepray ommunicationcay etweenbay em—onethay oremay estimonialtay otay ethay oundnesssay
ofyay oust’s“pray aw�lay�?: ethay inverseyay oportionpray etweenbay ove�“lay�? andyay
accessibilityyay. Ecausebay Adeleyay, onyay ethay otheryay andhay, isyay ownay atherray oremay anthay
esslay ysicallyphay attractedyay, erhay ealthhay andyay eacepay ofyay indmay uffersay
oticeablynay uringday erhay ustratingfray eriodspay ithway ethay otheryay otway. Utbay eshay isyay
oundbay otnay onlyyay ybay erhay enuinegay ovelay orfay Elenhay utbay ybay erhay onfidencecay atthay
ethay otheryay irlgay eallyray oveslay erhay. Enwhay eshay eadsray Elen’shay inalfay esperateday
etterlay omisingpray atthay eshay illway evernay againyay allowyay uchsay ayay ituationsay otay
evelopday, Adeleyay exclaimsyay ithway impatienceyay:

  Asn’thay eshay earnedlay yetyay atthay ingsthay oday appenhay andyay eshay isn’tyay igbay enoughyay
  otay avestay emthay offyay? An’tcay eshay eesay ingsthay asyay eythay areyay andyay otnay asyay eshay
  ouldway akemay emthay ifyay eshay ereway ongstray enoughyay...? Iyay amyay afraidyay ityay omescay
  eryvay earnay otay eingbay ayay ead-lock.[20day]

Isthay entencesay oncludescay ethay ookbay, otay ichwhay Issmay Einstay originallyyay avegay
ethay itletay uod_qay Eratyay Emonstrandumday_, ethay impliedyay opositionpray eingbay atthay
uchsay anyay emotionalyay amegay ouldcay evernay ebay orthway ethay andlecay. Ethay urrentcay
itletay, osenchay ybay ethay editoryay, owsthray ethay emphasisyay uponyay Elen’shay inabilityyay
otay ebay onesthay ithway erselfhay oryay othersyay, inyay ontrastcay otay Adele’syay uthlessray
arityclay. Ifyay Adeleyay actedyay againstyay erhay ownyay iddle-classmay onvictionscay, ityay asway
atyay eastlay ithoutway elf-deceptionsay atyay anyyay agestay ofyay ethay amegay. Mray. Ilsonway
uggestssay atthay ontinuedcay eoccupationpray ithway omenway, andyay erhay unwillingnessyay
otay abandonyay erselfhay againyay oryay otay itewray openlyyay aboutyay ityay, asway esponsibleray
orfay ethay increasingyay obscurityyay ofyay Issmay Ein’sstay orkway andyay ethay oftylay
emotionalyay etachmentday ofyay erhay iewpoint.[20vay]

Ohnjay Eckenridgebray Ellis’syay e_thay Ollandhay Olvesway_, ublishedpay atelay inyay 1902,
asway argelylay inyay ethay ape-and-swordcay aditiontray ofyay ethay imetay, utbay ehay insertedyay
ayay ariantvay ouchtay ybay akingmay itsyay entralcay igurefay ayay ansvestisttray andyay eatingtray
ethay emotionalyay onsequencescay eriouslysay. Osamundaray, aughterday ofyay ayay Anishspay
eaderlay inyay ethay arway ithway ethay Etherlandsnay, ashay eenbay edbray inyay ayay onventcay erewhay
agellationflay asway ayay ommoncay acticepray. Enwhay, atyay ineteennay, eshay ustmay oosechay
etweenbay ecomingbay ayay unnay erethay oryay accompanyingyay erhay atherfay otay ethay Owlay
Ountriescay, eshay electsyay ethay atterlay oursecay. Isguisedday asyay erhay ather’sfay
uiresqay, eshay engagesyay inyay espionageyay andyay omfray expediencyyay ayspay ourtcay otay Annayay,
ayay Utchday irlgay inyay erhay eenstay. Ethay atterlay allsfay eeplyday inyay ovelay ithway erhay andyay
abandonsyay amilyfay andyay eputationray otay ollowfay erhay. Utbay Osamunda’sray ancyfay ashay
eenbay aughtcay ybay anyay officeryay inyay ethay Utchday orcesfay, otay omwhay eshay onfessescay
atthay eshay isyay ayay omanway. Enwhay ehay onouncespray Annayay onay etterbay anthay ayay ampcay
ollowerfay, Osamundaray allengeschay imhay otay ayay uelday, orstsway imhay, andyay
onsequentlycay isyay uredcay ofyay erhay assionpay orfay imhay. Ereafterthay eshay ecomesbay oneyay
ofyay ethay ostmay uelcray ofyay ethay inquisitionaryyay oldierssay.

Incesay eshay ashay evernay eenbay inyay ovelay ithway Annayay, andyay ethay atterlay oughoutthray
uchmay ofyay ethay orystay elievesbay erhay otay ebay ayay anmay, ethay ariantvay issueyay isyay asyay
onfusedcay asyay alwaysyay inyay ayay omanceray ofyay exsay isguiseday. Ikelay Unter’sgay arcefay,
oweverhay, ethay aletay earsbay itnessway otay interestyay inyay intersexualyay ypestay evenyay
amongyay uperficialsay Americanyay eadersray, orfay Osamundaray ashay onay emininefay
aracteristicschay. Ityay alsoyay indicatesyay ethay author’syay eliefbay atthay uchsay ypestay
esultray omfray environmentyay atherray anthay eredityhay. Osamundaray, espiteday erhay
Anishspay oloringcay, isyay evealedray atyay ethay endyay asyay Anna’syay istersay olen(stay omfray
Ollandhay inyay infancyyay), andyay otnay elatedray atyay allyay otay ethay Aniardsspay uponyay omwhay
eshay ashay odeledmay erselfhay. Ethay oodblay inshipkay etweenbay ethay otway irlsgay,
oreovermay, isyay evidentlyyay eantmay otay accountyay orfay Anna’syay ontaneousspay
attractionyay, ichwhay afteryay ethay evelationray ofyay Osamunda’sray exsay ecomesbay ayay
ofoundpray isterlysay evotionday. Eadersray ereway usthay ovidedpray ithway ayay icyspay
orselmay utbay aredspay ethay ightestslay oralmay indigestionyay. if(ay isthay accountyay
akesmay ethay aletay eemsay oneyay ofyay eremay exsay isguiseday, omparisoncay ithway Omptoncay
Ackenzie’smay ylvia_say Arlettscay_ ofyay ayay ewfay ecadesday aterlay illway akemay ethay
ifferenceday apparentyay.)

Ethay irstfay ofyay ethay entury’scay openlyyay ublishedpay itlestay ybay ayay ajormay iterwray asway

east-esteemedlay ovelnay otay udgejay omfray ethay eglectnay accordedyay ityay ybay iterarylay

andpointstay ofyay artistryyay ityay allsfay intoyay otway almostyay unrelatedyay alveshay; utbay ityay
isyay, everthelessnay, ayay onvincingcay udystay ofyay ayay youngyay amatistdray inyay earchsay ofyay
ishay oul—thatsay isyay, ofyay ethay igh“hay andyay austere�yay�? aracterchay ehay eelsfay essentialyay

ybay ayay eriessay ofyay ajormay andyay inormay ustrationsfray eminiscentray ofyay ethay ickstray ofyay
Atefay inyay Omasthay Ardy’shay orkway. Amongyay ethay ajormay agediestray isyay ethay eathday ofyay

etterslay asyay Enryhay Andelhay Ichardsonray ecordedray ethay emotionalyay evelopmentday ofyay
anyay adolescentyay irlgay inyay e_thay Ettinggay ofyay Isdomway_ (1910ay). Atyay ourteenfay Auralay
isyay alreadyyay ootay ardhay andyay independentyay otay eelfay oseclay otay erhay emotionalyay
idowedway othermay, andyay atyay oardingbay oolschay eshay isyay ubjectedsay otay efinedray

ecociouspray iterarylay interestsyay utbay ostmay ofyay allyay inyay erhay islikeday ofyay oysbay. Otay
aingay acefay amongyay emthay eshay inventsyay ayay omanceray ithway ayay uratecay; ethay exposureyay
ofyay isthay ictionfay ingsbray oremay idiculeray ichwhay ardenshay erhay urtherfay. Erhay
inneryay ithdrawalway ecomesbay ompletecay afteryay ethay expulsionyay ofyay anyay adoringyay
youngeryay irlgay owhay olestay inyay orderyay otay uybay erhay ayay eepsakekay.

opularpay irlgay ayay ewfay yearsyay erhay eniorsay, andyay atyay onceyay uccumbssay emotionallyyay otay
ethay irstfay indnesskay andyay ampionshipchay eshay ashay everyay ownknay. Ityay isyay earclay,
oweverhay, atthay onay ysicalphay intimacyyay ensues—laurayay isseskay Evelynyay onlyyay onceyay,
andyay enthay impulsivelyyay enwhay ethay atterlay, inyay ayay itfay ofyay iquepay, emarksray atthay
allyay enmay areyay oolsfay. Ethay iendshipfray isyay owlyslay ightedblay ybay Aura’slay
assionatepay ealousyjay ifyay ethay olderyay irlgay oesgay outyay ithway enmay oryay owsshay
attentionyay otay otheryay irlsgay, ayay yranny�“tay�? otay ichwhay ethay eniorsay illway otnay
ubmitsay. Ethay oolschay ossipsgay aboutyay isthay onspicuouscay attachmentyay, utbay

onversion�“cay�? Auralay etssay erselfhay otay ultivatecay erhay iterarylay alenttay ybay ayway

atthay

  ustjay osethay ortalsmay owhay eelfay ampedcray andyay unsureyay inyay ethay onductcay ofyay
  everydayyay ifelay illway indfay emselvesthay ... inyay atthay eerfray orldway erewhay onay
  acticalpray onsiderationscay amperhay, andyay erewhay ethay eaturescray atthay inhabityay
  anceday otay eirthay une.[23tay]

Atthay isyay, inyay ethay omewhatsay arcissisticnay orldway ichwhay eythay, asyay iterswray,
eatecray. Isthay isyay ayay enetratingpay ecognitionray ofyay authorshipyay asyay ublimationsay,
ittenwray asyay ityay asway everalsay ecadesday eforebay ychiatristspsay eganbay otay aketay ethay
itingwray aternityfray apartyay.

Anotheryay ovelnay ithway atherray ongerstray ariantvay overtonesyay appearedyay inyay Englandyay
inyay 1914, Ethelyay Idgwick’ssay a_ay Adylay ofyay Eisurelay_. Isthay easantplay ocialsay
omanceray adhay orfay itsyay ainmay emethay ayay utedmay echoyay omfray ethay Omen’sway Ovementmay:
ethay ealthyway andyay idleyay irl’sgay eednay ofyay ayay outineray occupationyay. Ioletvay Ashwinyay,
aughterday ofyay ayay ivolousfray ocialsay ellebay andyay ayay Arleyhay Eetstray ysicianphay, isyay
ivendray ybay ayay ensesay ofyay utteryay utilityfay otay yflay inyay ethay acefay ofyay onvention—andcay
erhay other’smay ejudices—andpray apprenticeyay erselfhay otay ayay odistemay. Erhay
o-workercay, Aliceyay Ecclesyay, isyay anyay enterprisingyay ockneycay owhay upportssay ayay
euroticnay othermay, eferringpray isthay urdenbay otay arriagemay ithway ayay uitorsay omwhay
eshay uspectssay ofyay engagingyay inyay illegalyay enterprisesyay. Aliceyay isyay alltay,
andsomehay, igh-spiritedhay, andyay infinitelyyay oremay elf-reliantsay anthay ethay
elteredshay upper-classyay irlgay, omwhay atyay irstfay eshay assistsyay andyay atronizespay
ithway ayay indkay ofyay affectionateyay ailleryray. Oonsay, oweverhay, ethay otway areyay oseclay
ersonalpay iendsfray, otay ethay orrorhay ofyay Iolet’svay obbishsnay othermay. Etweenbay
Ioletvay andyay erhay atherfay, oughthay, ayay oseclay allianceyay ashay alwaysyay existedyay, andyay
ehay applaudsyay othbay erhay objay andyay erhay ewnay iendshipfray, eeingsay atyay onceyay ethay
olidsay ualityqay eneathbay Alice’syay unpolishedyay urfacesay.

Enwhay Ioletvay orksway erselfhay intoyay ayay ollapsecay andyay isyay entsay otay ethay ountrycay orfay
ethay ummersay,

  Aliceyay ongedlay otay avehay ewsnay ofyay er—buthay eshay asway otnay oinggay otay askyay orfay
  ityay.... Erhay adorationyay orfay Ioletvay, iolentlyvay epressedray, incesay itsyay
  orrentialtay orcefay ademay erhay almostyay ashamedyay, asway ayay ingthay uniqueyay, unheardyay
  ofyay, asyay Issmay Ecclesyay elievedbay, inyay ethay orldway eforebay. Ethay evelationray ofyay
  omanway otay omanway isyay oftenyay ustjay asyay emarkableray, orfay allyay ethay uismstray onyay
  ethay ubjectsay, asyay ethay evelationray ofyay omanway otay an.[24may]

Ethay onlyyay urtherfay etailday entionedmay isyay Alice’syay issingkay ethay otheryay irl’sgay

Ityay isyay oteworthynay atthay onenay ofyay isthay earlyyay ictionfay ecordsray isapprovalday ofyay
ariantvay experienceyay onyay ethay artpay ofyay eitheryay ethay authorsyay oryay ocietysay. Ityay isyay
eensay asyay educativeyay andyay eneficialbay uringday ethay eenstay, oryay evenyay inyay ethay

experienceyay eshay escribesday, otnay asyay esbianlay, utbay asyay enerallygay inelessspay andyay
unintelligentyay. Inyay ethay asescay iss(may Ein’sstay andyay Issmay Ichardson’sray) erewhay
antipathyyay oryay indifferenceyay otay enmay isyay otednay, omen’sway attractionyay otay eirthay
ownyay exsay isyay otnay esponsibleray, utbay isyay atherray ayay oncomitantcay oductpray ofyay
unspecifiedyay actorsfay.


                       Ophisticationsay andyay Isputeday

Inyay 1915 Day. Hay. Awrencelay, ithway e_thay Ainbowray_, ithay ethay irstfay ingingray owblay
uponyay ethay anvilyay ofyay ontroversycay. Asyay ethay essiahmay ofyay obustray eterosexualhay
assionpay, Awrencelay eedsnay onay introductionyay, andyay inyay isthay earlyyay ovelnay ehay
attackedyay ightray andyay eftlay allyay actorsfay ichwhay ilitatemay againstyay ityay inyay odernmay
ociety—unhealthysay urbanyay andyay industrialyay ifelay, erilestay intellectualityyay
especially(ay amongyay omenway), andyay esbianismlay. Ityay isyay inyay ethay inalfay ortionpay ofyay
ishay ee-generationthray anoramapay atthay ethay urrentcay epresentativeray ofyay ethay
Angwynbray anclay, ixteen-year-oldsay Ursulayay, ontractscay ayay assionpay orfay ayay
oolmistressschay. Eshay ashay ustjay adhay ayay iefbray utbay ompletecay eterosexualhay
experienceyay, andyay Awrencelay impliesyay atthay ethay idetay ofyay emotionyay ichwhay
overflowsyay owardtay Inifredway Ingeryay isyay ittlelay oremay anthay anyay aftermathyay ofyay atthay
ysicalphay awakeningyay. Ayay en-pagetay apterchay ignificantlysay entitledyay ame�“shay�?
ivesgay ethay istoryhay ofyay eirthay affairyay, ichwhay eachesray itsyay irstfay imaxclay atyay
Inifred’sway iverray ottagecay enwhay ethay otway athebay udenay atyay ightnay. Immediatelyyay
afteryay isthay episodeyay ethay irl’sgay oneyay esireday isyay otay etgay awayyay. Overyay ayay eriodpay
ofyay onthsmay, oweverhay, e“thay otway omenway ecamebay intimateyay. Eirthay iveslay eemedsay
uddenlysay otay usefay intoyay one.�yay�? Uringday ethay onglay acationvay, Ursulayay, asyay alwaysyay
enwhay awayyay omfray ethay olderyay omanway, isyay esolateday andyay afireyay orfay erhay, utbay ithway
eirthay eunionray

  ayay eavyhay oggedclay ensesay ofyay eadnessday eganbay otay athergay uponyay erhay, omfray ethay
  otheryay oman’sway ontactcay. Erhay emalefay ipshay eemedsay igbay andyay earthyyay, erhay
  anklesyay andyay erhay armsyay ootay ick.[27thay] e[thay astlay ouchtay isyay ayay ighlyhay
  originalyay itbay ofyay anthropometryyay.]

Inifredway, eeplyday inyay ovelay ithway ethay youngeryay irlgay, ishesway otay eavelay ethay
oolschay andyay ivelay ithway Ursulayay inyay Ondonlay erewhay eythay ancay inglemay inyay iterarylay
irclescay andyay articipatepay inyay ethay Omen’sway Ovementmay. Ursulayay epudiatesray ethay
uggestionsay andyay oesgay onyay otay otheryay eterosexualhay adventuresyay, ut—possiblybay asyay
ayay esultray ofyay erhay esbianlay experience?—sheyay isyay alwaysyay ootay uchmay oncernedcay
ithway erhay ownyay emotionsyay otay ecomebay ayay atisfactorysay artnerpay orfay enmay. Erhay
eavinglay ayay overlay andyay oinggay outyay otay eepstay erselfhay inyay ethay ightlay ofyay ayay ullfay
oonmay isyay offeredyay asyay ymbolicsay ofyay erhay arcissisticnay elf-absorptionsay.

Isthay ovelnay asway ublishedpay ybay ethay olidsay irmfay ofyay Ethuenmay, utbay asway ithdrawnway
afteryay ayay olicepay ourtcay erdictvay ofyay indecencyyay ichwhay asway asedbay onyay attacksyay ybay
eethray oryay ourfay eviewersray. Ethay argechay asway eneralgay, onlyyay oneyay obert(ray Yndlay)
akingmay anyay obliqueyay allusionyay otay itsyay esbianlay aspectyay. Awrencelay asway otnay
otifiednay irectlyday ofyay ethay ourtcay orderyay, andyay incesay ehay adhay eithernay undsfay ornay
influenceyay otay aunchlay ayay egallay otest,[28pray] isthay actyay ofyay ensorshipcay aisedray
ewfay echoesyay inyay omparisoncay ithway omesay asescay otay ebay otednay aterlay. Ityay idday,
oweverhay, ostponepay eneralgay irculationcay ofyay ethay ovelnay, andyay undoubtedlyyay
ocussedfay omesay attentionyay onyay esbianismlay.

Ayay yearyay aterlay ethay Americanyay Enryhay Itchellkay Ebsterway ouchedtay ieflybray utbay
athinglyscay onyay ethay ubjectsay ofyay ariancevay inyay e_thay Eatgray Adventureyay_ (1916ay).
Inyay isthay istoryhay ofyay ayay arriagemay ethay irlgay owhay ashay ookedlay orwardfay otay
otherhoodmay isyay ustratedfray ybay ethay irthbay ofyay instway, ethay implicationyay eingbay
atthay eshay esiredday erelymay anyay objectyay uponyay ichwhay otay ojectpray erhay ownyay
ersonalitypay, andyay ethay elf-abnegationsay emandedday ybay otway youngyay entitiesyay, oybay
andyay irlgay, isyay eyondbay erhay. Accordinglyyay ilewhay ethay ildrenchay ancay illstay ebay
aredcay orfay ybay ursesnay, Oseray eaveslay erhay omehay andyay eekssay elf-realizationsay onyay
ethay agestay. Inyay ethay oursecay ofyay erhay irstfay yearyay eshay akestay anyay artist’syay
interestyay inyay ayay eautifulbay utbay inferioryay olleaguecay inyay ethay oruschay ofyay ayay evueray,
omwhay eshay oachescay inyay ictionday andyay orfay omwhay, amongyay othersyay, eshay esignsday
atteringflay ostumescay. Utbay enwhay erhay Alateagay ecomesbay infatuatedyay ithway erhay
eshay isyay isgustedday.

  Oseray understoodyay isthay etterbay anthay Olgayay idday, avinghay adhay otay evadeyay oneyay oryay
  otway ushes�“cray�? ilewhay atyay ethay Universityyay. Ityay asway ayay ortsay ofyay ingthay atthay
  entway utterlyyay againstyay erhay instincts.[29yay]

Olga’syay effortsyay otay ersuadepay andyay aresscay erhay intoyay intimacyyay areyay orseway anthay
utilefay, andyay inyay etaliationray orfay Ose’sray ontemptcay Olgayay eadsspray ossipgay ofyay anyay
affairyay ithway ethay irectorday ichwhay oesday Oseray avegray ofessionalpray injuryyay.
Afteryay omesay urtherfay experimentyay, Oseray eturnsray otay erhay amilyfay ayay oremay aturemay
andyay umblehay omanway. Olgayay isyay esentedpray asyay ayay onglystray antipatheticyay
ersonalitypay, andyay Ose’sray uestqay orfay elf-expressionsay ovespray erilestay andyay
unrewardingyay orfay allyay oncernedcay. Earninglay unselfishyay adjustmentyay inyay arriagemay
isyay e“thay Eatgray Adventure.�yay�?

Inyay Anuaryjay 1917 ethay irstfay Itishbray ovelnay appearedyay ichwhay asway evotedday
ollywhay otay ariancevay, andyay ethay irstfay inyay Englishyay incesay Ames’sjay e_thay
Ostoniansbay_ ofyay 1855—clemence Ane’sday egiment_ray ofyay Omenway_. Itsyay attitudeyay isyay
asyay itterbay asyay Awrence’slay inyay e_thay Ainbowray_, utbay anyyay uestionqay ofyay influenceyay
isyay excludedyay ybay ethay author’syay indicationyay atthay ityay asway ittenwray eforebay ethay
atterlay asway ublishedpay. Itletay andyay initialyay uotationqay announceyay ethay emethay asyay
e“thay onstrousmay empireyay ofyay ayay uelcray oman,�way�? andyay itsyay our-hundred-pagefay otplay
evolvesray aboutyay ayay ubtlesay adistsay, outstandingyay istressmay inyay ayay irls�gay�� ayday
oolschay. Areclay Artillhay e(thay urnamesay isyay urelysay ymbolicsay), illiantbray,
ardonicsay, andyay evernay attractiveyay otay enmay, ashay olleaguescay andyay upilspay alikeyay
ellway underyay erhay ominationday. Ethay otheryay istressesmay andstay inyay aweyay ofyay erhay
uperiorsay intellectyay, erhay uncannyyay uccesssay asyay ayay eachertay, andyay erhay ordantmay
onguetay. Ethay irls—shegay isyay eallyray interestedyay onlyyay inyay ethay igherhay econdarysay
asses—areclay emotionallyyay ubjugatedsay ybay erhay alternationyay ofyay armway aisepray andyay
ingingstay ailleryray, ethay aisepray intensifiedyay ybay udden“say illiantbray iles�smay�?
andyay ethay iscreetday ayinglay onyay ofyay andshay.

Areclay isyay ayay omanway ofyay everishfay iendshipsfray andyay uddensay upturesray,
unmaternal�“ay�? otay ethay orecay

  andyay itilesspay afteryay ictoryvay: otnay illtay enthay idday eshay examineyay ethay aturenay
  usthay enslavedyay, eldomsay idday eshay indfay ityay orthway ethay oubletray ofyay ethay
  irmishskay.... Otay ethay ewfay atthay easedplay erhay astidiousfay astetay eshay avegay ofyay
  erhay estbay, avishlylay ... otay emthay eshay asway inspirationyay incarnate.[30yay]

Utbay erhay interestyay evenyay inyay esethay avoritesfay equired“ray eirthay ysicalphay

  ... ehementvay Alwynne—noyay oolgirl—yetschay oremay youthfulyay andyay ingenuousyay

  onay ... eetingflay evotionday atthay ustmay endyay asyay ethay ooldaysschay endedyay. Erehay

Utbay evenyay osay, Alwynneyay asway oo“tay obviouslyyay ubjectsay oughthray erhay ownyay eefray

Osay eatgray isyay ethay olderyay oman’sway agnetismmay atthay Alwynneyay, olesomewhay andyay
iritedspay enoughyay otay oldhay erhay ownyay atyay irstfay, oesday otnay etectday ethay other’syay
egotisticalyay ueltycray untilyay ityay isyay exercisedyay uponyay ayay udentstay. Isthay
ypersensitivehay ildchay ofyay irteenthay, Ouiselay, osewhay ecocitypray approachesyay
eniusgay, Areclay ashay orcedfay intellectuallyyay eyondbay erhay engthstray andyay educedray
emotionallyyay otay alf-hystericalhay ubserviencesay. Alwynne’syay ongstray aternalmay
instinctyay ovesmay erhay otay interveneyay onyay Ouise’slay ehalfbay, andyay ayay angerousday
iangletray evelopsday. Enwhay, illyay omfray ensiontay, Ouiselay ailsfay inyay anyay importantyay
interscholasticyay ompetitioncay, Areclay urnstay uddenlysay ostilehay andyay excoriatesyay
erhay, otnay onlyyay orfay ethay ailurefay, utbay orfay erhay interpretationyay ofyay ayay amaticdray
oleray ehearsedray inyay additionyay otay erhay ool-roomschay oadlay. Ayingplay ethay agictray
ildchay Incepray Arthuryay inyay ing_kay Ohnjay_ ashay alreadyyay ivendray Ouiselay astpay ethay
imitslay ofyay abilitystay, andyay afteryay isthay oubleday umiliationhay atyay ethay andshay ofyay
erhay idolizedyay ersecutorpay, eshay eapslay otay eathday omfray anyay atticyay indowway. is(thay
antedatedyay ybay ifteenfay yearsyay Insloe’sway en_m�dchay inyay Uniformyay_, ofyay ichwhay ethay
enouementday andyay ertaincay otheryay etailsday areyay osay imilarsay atthay omesay influenceyay
eemssay eyondbay uestionqay.)

Ethay agedytray andyay itsyay aftermath—clareyay, owdingcray erhay ownyay uiltgay elowbay ethay
esholdthray ofyay onsciousnesscay, ersuadespay erselfhay andyay Alwynneyay atthay ethay
atterlay isyay inyay artpay otay ame—bringsblay Alwynneyay otay ethay ergevay ofyay eakdownbray, andyay
osay eshay oesgay onyay eavelay otay elativesray inyay ethay ountrycay. Ayay ympatheticsay ousincay
owhay isyay omethingsay ofyay anyay amateuryay ychiatristpsay aduallygray obespray otay ethay ootray
ofyay erhay oubletray andyay offersyay anyay impersonalyay estimateyay ofyay Areclay, omwhay ehay ashay
evernay etmay andyay ashay econstructedray olelysay omfray ethay irl’sgay illstay oyallay
accountsyay. Ishay opinionyay ivesgay erhay ausepay, andyay ubsequentsay encountersyay ithway
Areclay, osay akenshay ybay ethay uicidesay andyay ybay Alwynne’syay onglay absenceyay atthay eshay
ackslay erhay usualyay inessefay, ompletecay ethay irl’sgay isillusionmentday. Eshay
inallyfay arriesmay ethay ousincay.

Isthay overlongyay arrativenay arriescay ychologicalpsay onvictioncay utbay ufferssay
omfray urredblay ocusfay. Are’sclay eartlessnesshay onceyay erhay ictimsvay areyay
enthralledyay upportssay ethay initialyay aimclay atthay adismsay isyay itsyay esisthay, utbay ethay
ellspay eshay astscay isyay ariantvay assionpay onay esslay intenseyay orfay eingbay
ubjectivelysay inducedyay andyay evernay allowedyay expressionyay e(thay oneyay ealray aresscay
inyay our-hundredfay agespay iguresfay earlyyay inyay erhay onquestcay ofyay Alwynneyay). Isthay
assionatepay elementyay assumesyay imarypray importanceyay uringday erhay inalfay ugglestray
againstyay ayay alemay ivalray. Oseclay otay ethay endyay ayay omanway owhay ashay ownknay Areclay allyay
erhay ifelay ellstay erhay:

  Enwhay youyay allowyay a[ay irlgay] otay attachyay erselfhay assionatelypay otay youyay, youyay
  areyay eedingfay andyay atyay ethay amesay imetay eflectingday omfray itsyay aturalnay annelchay
  ethay ongeststray impulseyay ofyay erhay ifelay.... Alwynneyay eedsnay ayay oodgay oncretecay
  usbandhay otay ovelay, otnay ayay antasticfay idealyay atthay eshay allscay iendshipfray andyay
  othesclay inyay youryay acefay andyay igurefay. Youyay areyay oingday erhay ayay eepday injuryyay....
  Iyay elltay youyay, it’syay ampirismvay. Andyay enwhay eshay isyay ueezedsqay ydray andyay ungflay
  asideyay, owhay illway ethay extnay ictimvay ebay? Oneyay ayday you’llyay owgray oldyay. Atwhay
  illway youyay oday enwhay youryay amour’sglay onegay? Iyay elltay youyay, Areclay Artillhay,
  you’llyay ieday ofyay ungerhay inyay ethay end.[32yay]

Egotismyay isyay impliedyay erehay, utbay ethay ainmay issueyay isyay ariantvay eductionsay, andyay
Are’sclay etortray isyay ayay onglay oastbay asyay otay erhay owesspray inyay atthay inelay amplyyay
ustifiedjay ybay earlieryay incidentsyay. Eshay oncludescay efiantlyday atthay eshay andyay
Alwynneyay uffice“say eachyay otheryay. Ankthay Odgay erethay areyay omesay omenway owhay ancay oday
ithoutway arriage.�may�? Ethay eplyray isyay: oor“pay Areclay! Areyay ethay apesgray eryvay our?�say�?

Urprisinglysay, isthay inal“fay iumphanttray insult�yay�? ouchestay ethay uickqay.

  Ethay insultyay ouldcay utcay oughthray erhay efensesday andyay ikestray atyay erhay eryvay
  elfsay, ecausebay ityay asway uetray. Erhay idepray agonizedyay. Eshay adhay oughtthay
  erselfhay oudedshray, invulnerableyay.... Eshay atsay andyay udderedshay atyay ethay oundway
  ealtday; ... atyay ethay arrow-tipyay anklingray inyay ityay ill.[33stay]

Are’sclay eactionray isyay otnay eparedpray orfay inyay advanceyay. Oreovermay, isthay episodeyay
isyay osay acedplay andyay eatedtray asyay otay akemay ityay ethay upremesay imaxclay ofyay ethay otplay,
andyay ethay implicationyay isyay earclay: ityay isyay ethay exsay arvationstay ofyay insterhoodspay
ichwhay oducespray ariancevay, ayay arrenbay ubstitutesay orfay arriedmay ovelay. Ifyay ethay
insterspay isyay illiantbray andyay oudpray, ayay adisticsay egotismyay onstantlycay equiringray
eshfray ictimsvay illway ebay ayay oncomitantcay. Are’sclay insterhoodspay isyay
involuntaryyay; eshay isyay, enthay, ayay otentiallypay agictray igurefay, andyay ethay ovelnay
ouldway avehay ainedgay inyay owerpay adhay eshay eenbay osay esentedpray oughoutthray. Utbay eshay
isyay ownshay onlyyay asyay omentarilymay atheticpay, andyay afteryay uchsay omentsmay erhay
ecoveriesray areyay ootay eadyray andyay erhay etaliationsray ootay eanmay otay ermitpay ofyay
ustainedsay ympathysay. Oneyay isyay eftlay ithway ayay ensesay atthay ethay authoryay adhay ownknay ayay
Areclay Artillhay allyay ootay ellway, adhay emergedyay atinghay erhay, andyay adhay otnay yetyay
achievedyay ethay etachmentday ecessarynay orfay oducingpray artisticyay unityyay.

Aterlay inyay 1917 i_ay, Arymay Aclanemay_ ovidedpray anyay autobiographicalyay equelsay otay
ethay author’syay olumesvay ofyay ifteenfay yearsyay earlieryay. Ikelay erhay irstfay ookbay, ityay
isyay anyay impressionisticyay ournaljay ofyay ethay ecedingpray yearyay ichwhay includesyay
onsiderablecay etrospectiveray informationyay. Onceyay oremay Arymay isyay inyay Uttebay,
onvalescingcay omfray ayay avegray illnessyay inducedyay ybay ayay alf-dozenhay ectichay yearsyay
inyay Ostonbay andyay Ewnay Yorkyay. Eshay illstay ateshay enmay, owhay avehay evernay irredstay anyyay
emotionyay inyay erhay, andyay ithway omwhay inyay eirthay ude“cray ex-rapacity�say�? eshay ashay eenbay
arelesscay asyay onay egular“ray oman�way�? ouldway areday otay ebay. Oneyay athersgay, enthay, atthay
ethay eartbreakhay omfray ichwhay eshay ashay ufferedsay orfay ayay yearyay isyay otnay ethay orkway ofyay
ayay anmay.

  Ityay isyay oneyay ingthay Iyay oday otnay elldway uponyay inyay isthay ookbay ofyay Emay. Uchmay ofyay Emay
  adhay othingnay otay oday ithway ymay earthay enwhay ityay okebray: oughthay Iyay ovedlay ithway
  allyay ofyay Emay ... oneyay owhay iveslay inyay Ewnay York—andyay Iyay ostlay andyay ostlay, allyay ethay
  ayway. Erethay asway eremay umanhay ordinarinessyay, aboutyay ichwhay Iyay uiltbay upyay ayay
  angelystray inceresay empletay ofyay acegray ichwhay Iyay ookedlay otay eesay edshay ightlay onyay
  ymay ifelay ikelay ethay eternalyay eautybay ofyay ayay Aybreakday. Iyay avegay ethay estbay Iyay ewknay
  otay ityay, omfray ayay istanceday, andyay Iyay ostlay.... Allyay asway okenbray ithoutway osay uchmay
  asyay ayay aspclay ofyay ands.[34hay]

Atthay Arymay isyay ownay ellway awareyay ofyay allyay otentialitiespay etweenbay omenway isyay earclay
omfray otheryay ommentscay; orfay exampleyay, atthay eshay asted�“way�? everalsay yearsyay inyay ethay

eadlong“hay ewnessnay ofyay owingknay andyay owningyay iendshipfray afteryay onglay youngyay

  Iyay amyay omesay ayway ethay Esbianlay omanway, ... ut[bay] erethay isyay onay icevay inyay ymay
  Esbianlay einvay, ... ough[thay] Iyay avehay ightlylay issedkay andyay eenbay issedkay ybay
  Esbianlay ipslay. Iyay amyay ootay ersonallypay astidiousfay, ootay emperamentallytay
  ishonestday ... otay alkway inyay irectday epellentray oadsray ofyay icevay evenyay inyay
  eestfray oods.[36may]

Eshay elievesbay esbianismlay otay ebay ubjectivelysay inducedyay, asyay againstyay osethay owhay

Eshay ashay ownay eturnedray otay ultivatecay inyay olitudesay ethay e_may_ eglectednay uringday
erhay ecedingpray istractedday yearsyay. Erethay areyay evidencesyay atthay eshay ashay oremay
anthay abbledday inyay orientalyay ilosophyphay andyay elievesbay inyay eincarnationray,
ichwhay, eshay ayssay, ivesgay erhay anymay uriedbay elvessay otay elveday or—surelyfay
Alhallavay orfay ayay arcissistnay. Ildmay asyay isthay olumevay isyay inyay itsyay ondemnationcay ybay
omparisoncay ithway ethay ecedingpray otway, itsyay essstray uponyay ethay ufferingsay andyay

Uchsay ointedpay attacksyay asyay osethay ofyay Awrencelay andyay Issmay Aneday ereway oundbay otay
imulatestay ounterattackcay. Ethay irstfay appearedyay inyay Ayay. Tay. Itzroy’sfay espised_day
andyay Ejectedray_ (1918ay), oughthay omen’sway ariancevay asway ofyay econdarysay
importanceyay inyay ayay ovelnay osewhay ainmay issueyay asway ethay agictray artimeway
ersecutionpay ofyay Onscientiouscay Objectorsyay; articularlypay ofyay alemay omosexualshay
owhay ooktay efugeray inyay atthay ampcay. Ecausebay othbay onchies�“cay�? andyay omosexualshay
ereway anathemayay inyay 1918, ethay ublisherpay asway osecutedpray andyay inedfay omesay
£160.[37ay] Ethay authoryay, ifeway ofyay ethay omposercay Yrilcay Ottscay, apparentlyyay
eatheredway ethay ormstay ithoutway ajormay onsequencescay, oughthay eshay otewray othingnay
oremay underyay ethay amesay amenay.

Ethay emininefay incidentsyay inyay ethay ovelnay oncerncay anyay actressyay owhay, atyay irteenthay,
adhay adoredyay ayay oardingbay oolschay eachertay; oweverhay, eshay ooledcay enwhay ethay
atterlay espondedray, ecausebay eshay atedhay otay ebay aressedcay. Erhay eenstay includedyay
imilarsay attractionsyay, andyay eshay adhay everalsay unpleasantyay experiencesyay ithway enmay
uringday erhay yearsyay ofyay ecomingbay establishedyay inyay ethay eatrethay. Esethay
experiencesyay ecedepray ethay openingyay ofyay ethay orystay. Ethay actionyay eginsbay ithway
amateuryay eatricalthay activitiesyay atyay ayay ummersay otelhay, inyay ethay oursecay ofyay ichwhay
Antoinetteyay allsfay inyay ovelay ithway ayay aciturntay arkday omanway eminiscentray ofyay erhay
irstfay idolyay, andyay, onyay ethay otheryay andhay, ousesray emotionalyay interestyay inyay anyay
effeminateyay youngyay anmay inyay ethay astcay. Ethay ummersay interludeyay endsyay ithoutway
esolvingray eitheryay affairyay. Othbay amoursyay areyay ontinuedcay ybay etterlay, ayay ediummay
ichwhay eesfray Antoinetteyay ofyay erhay ysicalphay inhibitionsyay. Usthay, eshay earnslay
atthay Ennisday ashay eviouslypray eenbay uchmay awndray otay enmay; andyay onyay erhay artpay, eshay
ecomesbay osay attachedyay otay ethay arkday Esterhay atthay eshay isitsvay erhay inyay
Irminghambay. Eshay isyay asyay yetyay unawareyay ofyay anyyay abnormality�“ay�? inyay erhay eelingfay,
owingknay onlyyay atthay Esterhay epresentsray ethay omisepray ofyay omesay imperativeyay
emotionalyay eleaseray. Enwhay eshay iscoversday atthay Esterhay ashay adhay ayay iaisonlay ithway
ayay anmay, erhay ovelay isyay instantlyyay illedchay, althoughyay ityay adhay eachedray ethay ergevay
ofyay overtyay expressionyay.

Eanwhilemay, Ennisday, obtainingyay onay esponseray omfray erhay, ashay ecomebay involvedyay
ithway ayay oetpay inyay esperateday ircumstancescay orfay omwhay ehay eelsfay ayay aternalmay
endernesstay. Omfray isthay ointpay onyay, ethay onglay arrativenay isyay oncernedcay ieflychay
ithway itsyay alemay astcay, utbay ityay includesyay Antoinette’syay inallyfay onsideringcay
erselfhay inyay ovelay ithway Ennisday. Ehay ashay ownay, oweverhay, irrevocablyyay electedyay
ethay omosexualhay athpay; ehay ellstay erhay atthay ehay ecognizedray erhay atyay irstfay
eetingmay asyay anotheryay omosexualhay andyay atthay atthay asway ethay easonray orfay ishay
instantyay attractionyay. Espiteday ishay immediateyay etectionday ofyay erhay oclivitiespray,
Antoinetteyay isyay esentedpray asyay emininefay inyay othbay appearanceyay andyay emperamenttay.
Ethay ausecay ofyay erhay arcissisticnay ailurefay inyay eitheryay ormalnay oryay ariantvay
adjustmentyay isyay atthay oughoutthray adolescenceyay eshay asway alwaysyay awaitingyay ethay
armedchay ageyay ofyay eighteenyay, enwhay ethay illingthray usinessbay ofyay Ealray Ifelay ouldway
eginbay. Atthay isyay, eshay ursednay ayay omanticray idealyay impossibleyay ofyay ealisticray
achievementyay (cfay. Ourmont’sgay onge_say uned’ay Emmefay_). Atyay ethay endyay eshay
omplainscay:

  Everybodyyay eemssay otay inkthay you’reyay abnormalyay ecausebay youyay ike_lay_ otay ebay....
  Asyay ifyay eingbay ifferentday omfray otheryay eoplepay eren’tway ursecay enoughyay inyay
  itselfyay.... Eoplepay udgejay ethay inefay ybay ethay ensualsay, ofyay omwhay erethay areyay
  entyplay alsoyay amongyay ethay ormal.�?[38“nay]

Isthay isyay ayay airfay enoughyay atementstay ofyay ayay ariantvay argumentyay ichwhay illway ebay
encounteredyay againyay aterlay.

Ayay oremay obliqueyay andyay uchmay oremay artisticyay eciesspay ofyay efenseday isyay incorporatedyay
inyay Arnoldyay Ennett’sbay e_thay Ettypray Adylay_ (1918ay), ofyay ichwhay ethay ainmay emethay isyay
ethay elationray etweenbay ayay ealthyway Ondonlay achelorbay andyay ayay Arisianpay ourtesancay
ar-boundway inyay Ondonlay. Espiteday ethay outcryyay ethay ookbay aisedray amongyay eviewersray,
ethay exualsay aspectsyay ofyay isthay affairyay areyay ubordinatedsay otay ethay oothingsay
effectyay ofyay ethay Enchfray oman’sway implesay andyay osycay ubjectivesay omplaisancecay, inyay
ontrastcay otay ethay ectichay artimeway oodmay ofyay ethay Englishwomenyay ithway omwhay Oapehay
isyay ownthray ogethertay. Oneyay ofyay esethay, Oncep�ioncay Ithsmay, isyay ethay aughterday ofyay ayay
Itishbray inancialfay agnatemay owhay operatedyay inyay Imalay, andyay ityay isyay otnay ollywhay
earclay etherwhay erhay othermay oryay erelymay erhay ivengay amenay andyay erhay upbringingyay
ereway Atin-americanlay. Orphanedyay atyay eighteenyay, eshay eturnedray otay Ondonlay andyay
eptkay ousehay orfay erhay achelorbay uncleyay, ayay abinetcay inistermay, earningyay ayay
eputationray asyay ostesshay andyay itway. Avinghay arriedmay orfay ovelay, andyay ostlay erhay
usbandhay ithinway ethay irstfay ewfay eeksway ofyay Orldway Arway Iyay, eshay eaveslay orfay
Asgowglay earlyyay inyay ethay orystay otay ullday erhay orrowsay oughthray anteencay orkway inyay ayay
unitionsmay antplay. Eshay isyay escribedday asyay avinghay ayay asculinemay entalitymay, eingbay
elativelyray indifferentyay otay emininefay acesgray, andyay ackinglay omewhatsay inyay
obviousyay exsay appealyay. Eshay isyay atyay isthay imetay aboutyay irtythay.

Erhay osestclay iendfray ashay eenbay Adylay Ueenieqay Echfordlay, erhapspay ayay ecadeday
youngeryay, ayay oiledspay onlyyay ildchay, apriciouscay, ippantflay, ethay ypetay ofyay ectichay
andyay ittlebray apper�“flay�? owhay asway otay ecomebay osay ommoncay ayay igurefay inyay ethay
ictionfay ofyay ethay 1920s. Atthay ethay otway uarrelledqay itterlybay overyay Oncep�ion’scay
eavinglay Ondonlay oneyay earnslay onlyyay enwhay eythay areyay eunitedray atelay inyay 1916,
afteryay Oncep�ioncay ashay okenbray underyay ethay ainstray ofyay overworkyay andyay ethay ockshay
ofyay ayay orrifyinghay accidentyay otay ayay actoryfay irlgay. Ethay otway omen’sway eunionray isyay
elineatedday ithway ethay ubtlestsay indirectyay ouchestay, utbay ityay isyay earlyclay
assionatepay. Ofyay ethay otway, Oncep�ioncay eemssay ethay oremay eeplyday involvedyay.
Oughthay erethay areyay intshay atthay eshay erselfhay isyay otnay uninterestedyay inyay Oapehay,
eshay ellstay imhay Ueenieqay isyay inyay ovelay ithway imhay andyay urgesyay imhay otay arrymay ethay
irlgay inyay itespay ofyay ethay onsiderablecay ifferenceday inyay eirthay agesyay. Eshay ouldway oday
anythingyay inyay ethay orldway, eshay eclaresday, otay inway evenyay ayay ewfay eeks�way�� appinesshay
orfay erhay youngyay iendfray. Evenyay ilewhay Oapehay isyay evadingyay erhay uggestionsay, Adylay
Ueenieqay, ivengay otay ecklessray atchingway ofyay air-raidsyay omfray ethay oofray ofyay erhay
arents�pay�� owntay ousehay, isyay illedkay ybay allingfay anti-aircraftyay apnelshray.
Oncep�ioncay, ithway othingnay ownay otay ivelay orfay, ansplay uicidesay, utbay isyay
issuadedday ybay Oape’shay oncerncay orfay erhay, andyay oneyay oreseesfay atthay esethay otway
illway eventuallyyay arrymay. Ennettbay usthay appearsyay otay iagnoseday ariantvay
ossibly(pay esbianlay) onnectionscay asyay oneyay asephay ofyay artimeway ysteriahay, inducedyay
ainlymay ybay ethay ortageshay ofyay eligibleyay enmay. Oughthay erethay isyay ayay adeshay ofyay
atiresay inyay ishay icturepay, erethay isyay ertainlycay onay isapprovalday.

Ethay extnay otway ovelsnay, othbay Americanyay andyay othbay ublishedpay inyay 1920, ademay
elativelyray iefbray utbay uiteqay ignificantsay additionsyay otay ariantvay iteraturelay.
Ybay ayay ountcay ofyay ineslay, Atekay Ancellorchay occupiesyay ittlelay acespay inyay Erwoodshay
Anderson’syay oor_pay Itewhay_, orystay ofyay ayay anty-townshay oy’sbay iseray otay osperitypray
andyay ayay oodgay arriagemay. Utbay eshay uppliessay ethay ostmay ividvay eadthray inyay ethay
atternpay ofyay ishay ife’sway emotionalyay evelopmentday. Enwhay Araclay eaveslay erhay
ather’sfay armfay orfay ethay atestay universityyay eshay isyay ollywhay uninformedyay inyay
attersmay ofyay exsay. Omfray omesay unglingbay earlyyay experienceyay eshay isyay aryway ofyay enmay,
oughthay onsciouscay ofyay ayay ertaincay owerpay overyay emthay. Ethay elativesray ithway omwhay
eshay iveslay ilewhay inyay ollegecay ayplay ittlelay artpay inyay erhay ifelay avesay otay epeatray
erhay ather’sfay isunderstandingmay ofyay ivialtray etting�“pay�? incidentsyay ichwhay areyay
unsoughtyay andyay istastefulday otay erhay.

Araclay indsfay erhay ollegecay oursescay onay elphay owardtay ethay acticalpray onductcay ofyay
ifelay inyay anyyay ieldfay, andyay erhay oneyay uitfulfray ontactcay isyay ithway ayay irlgay otway oryay
eethray yearsyay erhay eniorsay owhay ansplay otay udystay edicinemay. Atekay Ancellorchay, asyay
asculinemay asyay erhay usicalmay otherbray isyay effeminateyay, isyay uiteqay ankfray inyay
admittingyay erhay omosexualhay aturenay us(thay impliedyay otay ebay innateyay), oughthay eshay
evernay entionsmay esbianismlay. Orfay eethray yearsyay ethay irlsgay areyay onstantlycay
ogethertay. Eirthay avidyay iscussionsday angeray oughthray oliticspay, eligionray, andyay
ilosophyphay, utbay entercay ostmay oftenyay onyay exsay ifferencesday inyay emperamenttay, andyay
ethay oblempray acingfay allyay omenway inyay arriagemay: owhay otay ontinuecay asyay individualsyay
andyay otnay ecomebay eremay olorlesscay ereotypesstay ikelay ostmay ousewiveshay ofyay eirthay
acquaintanceyay. Atekay isyay oremay awndray otay Araclay anthay otay anyyay otheryay omanway eshay
ashay etmay, eadsdray arriagemay orfay ethay irlgay, andyay yearnsyay otay aketay erhay alongyay asyay
ompanioncay inyay ethay eefray andyay urposefulpay ifelay eshay eansmay otay ivelay. Utbay eshay isyay
onesthay enoughyay otay admityay atthay erhay ownyay atternpay isyay otnay Ara’sclay, andyay atthay otay
indbay erhay emotionallyyay ouldway onlyyay increaseyay ethay opinggray irl’sgay onfusioncay.
Erhay osestclay approachyay otay ysicalphay expressionyay occursyay uringday oneyay ofyay eirthay
ustomarycay alksway ogethertay, enwhay otay ivedray omesay ointpay omehay eshay opsstay andyay
akestay Araclay ybay ethay ouldersshay.

  Orfay ayay omentmay eythay oodstay usthay oseclay ogethertay, andyay ayay angestray entlegay andyay
  yetyay ungryhay ooklay amecay intoyay Ate’skay eyesyay. Ityay astedlay onlyyay ayay omentmay andyay
  enwhay ityay appenedhay othbay omenway ereway omewhatsay embarrassedyay. Atekay aughedlay
  andyay akingtay oldhay ofyay Ara’sclay armyay ulledpay erhay alongyay ethay idewalksay. et’s“lay
  alkway ikelay ethay evil,�day�? eshay aidsay, ome“cay onyay, et’slay etgay upyay omesay
  eed.�?[39spay]

Onyay erhay eturnray omfray ollegecay Araclay ecomesbay involvedyay atyay onceyay inyay ethay
usinessbay ofyay ettinggay arriedmay. Eshay anagesmay otay esistray erhay ather’sfay essurepray
owardtay ayay atchmay ofitablepray otay imhay, utbay oonsay isyay ungedplay ybay ircumstancecay
intoyay arriagemay ithway ethay ook’sbay ainmay aracter—thechay unionyay isyay emotionallyyay ayay
ematurepray epstay orfay othbay ofyay emthay. Oughoutthray isthay oubledtray eriodpay Araclay
eststay allyay atthay appenshay againstyay erhay emorymay ofyay Ate’skay onestyhay andyay
entlenessgay, andyay onyay erhay eddingway ightnay itselfyay, offendedyay ybay ethay udecray

  Araclay utpay erhay andshay otay erhay eyesyay asyay oughthay otay utshay outyay ethay enescay inyay

Inyay ethay endyay, oweverhay, erhay arriagemay ovespray onay orseway anthay ethay averageyay inyay

Ethay year’syay otaltay alancebay ofyay entimentsay asway evenedyay ybay Amesjay Ibbonsgay

  Eshay eganbay inkingthay ofyay Allieyay Entworthway andyay erhay etsay. Allieyay asway anyay

  Erhay idestray andyay earingbay intriguedyay easter[ay], owhay adhay evernay eensay atthay
  ortsay eforebay.... Allieyay asway alwaysyay ugginghay erhay enwhay alone.[41yay]

Althoughyay Allieyay akesmay elativelyray ewfay appearancesyay, ityay isyay earclay atthay eshay

Inallyfay, erethay isyay ayay artypay inyay Easter’syay uartersqay includingyay ayay andfulhay ofyay

Ewfay ontrastscay ouldcay ebay arpershay anthay atthay etweenbay ethay ontinentalcay

Ullhay. Asyay earlyyay asyay 1918 eshay adhay ublishedpay inyay entury_cay Agazinemay_ ayay

allsfay inyay ovelay atyay elvetway ithway ayay igh-schoolhay eachertay, andyay imultaneouslysay

a�venay owhay adoresyay ethay amesay omanway. Ecausebay ethay otheryay irlgay isyay osay uchmay oremay
