Inyay abyrinth_lay_ (1923ay) Issmay Ullhay attackedyay omfray ayay emininefay angleyay ethay
oblempray osedpay inyay e_thay Eatgray Adventureyay_: ethay ustrationfray ofyay ayay ersatilevay
omanway utcay offyay omfray ersonalpay andyay intellectualyay ontactscay ybay ouseworkhay andyay
ethay arecay ofyay ildrenchay. Afteryay ayay ecadeday ofyay arriagemay Atherinecay eturnsray otay ayay
allengingchay ositionpay ichwhay eshay eldhay uringday Orldway Arway Iyay, oughthay erhay
usbandhay, ayay ofessorpray, isapprovesday ofyay ethay enturevay. Ayay eriessay ofyay omesticday
isescray usplay ethay ofessor’spray alculatedcay ovemay omfray Ewnay Yorkyay otay ayay allsmay
idwesternmay ampuscay inallyfay artthway ishay ife’sway effortsyay otay escapeyay unrelievedyay
omesticityday. Onay ariancevay omplicatescay Atherine’scay oblemspray, utbay oughthray
inormay aracterschay eethray otheryay emotionalyay adjustmentsyay areyay esentedpray, oneyay
involvingyay otway omenway.

Ethay agem�nay ofyay ayay ofessorpray osewhay ifeway isyay othingnay utbay ayay ausfrau_hay_ isyay ullday
eyondbay enduranceyay orfay allyay oncernedcay. Ayay omanway ysicianphay andyay erhay usbandhay
appearyay appyhay, utbay ethay anmay ivatelypray ournsmay ishay ife’sway acrificesay ofyay
aternitymay otay erhay ofessionalpray areercay. Atherine’scay youngeryay istersay, ayay
ocialsay orkerway andyay unmarriedyay, ashay okenbray awayyay omfray erhay othermay ecausebay i“ay
an’tcay ebay abiedbay allyay ymay ife—alllay ortssay ofyay infantileyay aitstray ickingstay otay
e,�may�? andyay isyay ivinglay ithway anyay olderyay ellow-workerfay. Enwhay erhay istersay advisesyay
arriagemay, eshay etortsray:

  Usbandhay! Emay? I’myay ixedfay orfay ifelay ightray ownay.... Anybodyyay eedsnay omeonesay
  ovinglay em’ay, oothingsmay em’ay ownday, ettingsay em’ay upyay, ushingbray offyay ethay ustday
  ... Iyay owknay ayay ittlelay ingthay oryay otway aboutyay ovelay. Utbay is[thay ayway] youyay ancay
  oday atthay ... oughthray andyay aroundyay ateverwhay elseyay you’reyay oingday ... Iyay owknay
  otslay ofyay omenway owhay eferpray otay etsay upyay anyay establishmentyay ithway anotheryay
  omanway. Enthay youyay ogay ifty-fiftyfay onyay everythingyay. Orkway andyay eelingfay andyay
  allyay ethay estray, andyay onay Ingkay aitingway aroundyay orfay ishay umblehay ervant.[44say]

Isthay isyay Issmay Ull’shay earestnay allusionyay otay ysicalphay intimacyyay, andyay ilewhay otnay
explicitlyyay impliedyay, eithernay isyay ityay epudiatedray. Ympatheticallysay asyay ethay
ariantvay airpay areyay ortrayedpay, eythay areyay onay oremay omanticizedray anthay ethay
eterosexualhay ouplescay. Ethay olderyay omanway ashay eenbay ayay anaticfay inyay anymay ausescay
andyay ayay unger-strikerhay orfay uffragesay, isyay oodymay andyay iolentvay, andyay uarrelsqay
ithway anyyay iticalcray alemay atyay ightsay. Ethay youngeryay isyay oolcay, acticalpray, andyay ayay
itbay ardhay. Utbay ethay allianceyay apparentlyyay andsstay asyay oodgay ayay ancechay ofyay
urvivalsay asyay anyyay inyay ethay ookbay, andyay ethay authoryay acceptsyay ityay asyay ayay attermay ofyay
oursecay. Ethay onlyyay issentingday oicevay isyay ethay ofessor’spray; ehay isyay itterbay inyay
ishay animosityyay andyay ontemptcay.

Ublishingpay imultaneouslysay ithway Issmay Ullhay utbay oremay earlynay inyay ethay einvay ofyay
Unekerhay asway England’syay Onaldray Irbankfay, osewhay elightfulday absurditiesyay eganbay
otay owerflay ithway ainglory_vay_ inyay 1918. Irbankfay asway articularlypay ascinatedfay
ybay allyay aspectsyay ofyay omosexualityhay, andyay otnay oneyay ofyay ishay iefbray ovelsnay isyay
ithoutway omesay eferenceray otay ityay. Otay enderray esethay allusionsyay elicateday ehay
ultivatedcay ayay ivolousfray obscurityyay, utbay ityay asway onay oremay esignedday otay oncealcay
anthay areyay ayay ancer’sday eilsvay otay idehay ethay ormfay eneathbay. Obablypray ethay ostmay
ignificantsay inyay ouryay ieldfay isyay e_thay Owerflay Eneathbay ethay Ootfay_ (1923).[45ay]
Itsyay ettingsay isyay ayay incipalitypray ethay approximateyay izesay andyay importanceyay ofyay
Onacomay, ithway ayay ourtcay irclecay adlymay internationalyay. Erehay, asyay alwaysyay, ethay
esbianlay impsesglay areyay obliqueyay, utbay erethay areyay eethray ofyay emthay. Ayay isitingvay
Ueenqay Eeanouheethlay ofyay ethay Andlay ofyay Atesday ecomesbay osay openlyyay enamouredyay ofyay
ethay ondeblay andyay ovinebay Englishyay ambassadressyay atthay ethay olewhay ourtcay earsfay anyay
incident.�“ay�? Ayay adylay inyay aitingway inyay ovelay ithway ethay Incepray, afteryay erhay omanceray
isyay atteredshay ybay ishay iplomaticday arriagemay, eesflay otay anyay adoredyay Istersay inyay
ethay onventcay erewhay eshay asway educatedyay, eamingdray ofyay ayay eturnray otay earlieryay
elightsday. Eshay isyay ayay itbay illedchay atyay eingbay invitedyay, asyay anyay adultyay ownay, otay
ieldway ayay ipwhay. Andyay astlay, otway ofyay ethay ueen’sqay adieslay areyay ecalmedbay orfay ayay
ummersay afternoonyay aloneyay inyay ayay allsmay ailboatsay. Oneyay e(shay emindsray erhay
olleaguescay ofyay Anthonyyay Amilton’shay Issmay Obarthay) isyay ayay irlgay ofyay elicate“day
exlesssay ilhouettesay, osewhay exoticyay attractionyay adhay arousedyay otnay ayay ewfay
eart-burningshay and(ay evenyay eudsfay) amongyay everalsay ofyay ethay andes_gray amesday_
aboutyay ethay ourt.�?[46cay] Erhay ompanioncay isyay ayay iperay andyay anguishinglay idowway. Ethay
exiledyay ountcay uponyay omwhay eythay intendedyay otay allcay atchescay ightsay ofyay eirthay
otionlessmay aftcray andyay ainstray ishay elescopetay uponyay ityay.

  Ohyay oignantpay omentsmay enwhay ethay earthay opsstay illstay! Otnay incesay ethay ourshay
  ofyay ishay exileyay adhay ethay ount’scay eenbay osay arrestedyay. Aughtcay inyay ethay arletscay
  adianceray ofyay ethay afterglowyay ethay ecalmedbay oatbay, orfay oneyay iefbray andyay ostmay
  emorablemay econdsay, asway ishay otay azegay onyay. Inyay ertaincay andslay ithway atwhay
  iplomacyday allsfay ethay ightnay.... Osethay immer-and-dimmerday ilightstway ofyay
  ethay Orthnay ereway unknownyay inyay Isuergapay. Erethay Ightnay ursuespay Ayday asyay ifyay eshay
  eantmay ityay. oh“ay, ywhay asway Iyay otnay ooner_?�_say�? ehay urmuredmay istractedlyday
  aloud.[47yay]

Eedlessnay otay aysay, onay udgmentsjay areyay evenyay intedhay inyay Irbank’sfay alestay. Ifyay ishay
airedpay adieslay areyay atherray idiculousray, osay areyay ishay ettypray entlemengay andyay ishay
ixedmay ouplescay youngyay andyay oldyay, ishay ingskay andyay ocialsay imbersclay andyay admay oldyay
adieslay. Incesay allyay ifelay isyay earlyclay osay absurdyay, ehay eemssay otay aysay, atwhay otay oday
avesay itsay ackbay ith(way allyay ossiblepay acegray) andyay ittertay atyay ethay ectaclespay?
Edmundyay Ilson’sway iagnosisday ofyay Ertrudegay Einstay ightmay applyyay alsoyay inyay omesay
easuremay otay Irbankfay, oughthay ehay idday otnay etreatray osay arfay intoyay iterarylay
obscurityyay.


                           Ost-warpay Escendocray

Esethay ovelsnay ofyay Irbank’sfay, otshay oughthray ithway allusionsyay otay othbay alemay andyay
emalefay omosexualityhay, emindray oneyay atthay o-thirdstway ofyay ethay olumesvay ofyay
Oust’spray echerche_ray uday Empstay Erdupay_ adhay eenbay ublishedpay inyay Ancefray ybay
1923, andyay ereway, ofyay oursecay, ownknay otay anymay Englishyay andyay Americanyay iterswray
eforebay eingbay anslatedtray. Ityay isyay easyyay otay overrateyay ethay influenceyay ofyay Oustpray,
especiallyyay asyay othbay Amesjay Oycejay andyay Orothyday Ichardsonray adhay anticipatedyay
imhay inyay eam“stray ofyay onsciousness�cay�? echniquetay, ethay oneyay ithway ortrait_pay ofyay
ethay Artistyay asyay ayay Youngyay Anmay_ (1915ay), ethay otheryay ithway ointed_pay Oofsray_
(1917ay). Utbay inyay onay oneyay elseyay ofyay Oust’spray ualityqay asway omosexualityhay osay
integralyay ayay artpay ofyay ethay arrativenay abricfay. Anslationstray ofyay Oust’spray ostmay
ignificantsay olumesvay appearedyay inyay Englishyay etweenbay 1924 andyay 1930. Ityay ightmay
alsoyay ebay otednay atthay Argueritte’smay a_lay Ar�onnegay_ asway anslatedtray inyay 1923.

Ayay econdsay increasinglyyay importantyay influenceyay asway atthay ofyay Eudfray, alreadyyay
iscernibleday inyay egiment_ray ofyay Omenway_ ough(thay ayay oodgay asecay ouldcay ebay ademay
erethay orfay Adlerianyay overtonesyay alsoyay), andyay ecomingbay oremay andyay oremay obviousyay
inyay otheryay ovelsnay ofyay ethay amesay alibrecay. Ayay ikingstray exampleyay asway Arveyhay
O’higgins�yay�� ory“stay ofyay Uliejay Ane,�cay�? ichwhay anray eriallysay inyay arper’s_hay
Agazinemay_ uringday 1924, andyay asway asyay uchmay ayay amatizeddray ychiatricpsay
ase-recordcay asyay ethay earlieryay orkway ofyay Ubutday eday Aforestlay inyay Ancefray. Itsyay ainmay
emotionalyay emesthay areyay ayay irtuallyvay incestuousyay evotionday etweenbay ethay alemay
otagonistpray andyay ishay othermay, andyay ethay assionpay ofyay ayay insterspay oolschay
istressmay orfay ethay youngyay eroinehay, erhay ardway. Ethay authoryay, owhay eliversday ayay
oodgay anymay iefbray ectureslay alongyay ethay ayway, abelslay isthay astlay emotionyay
artedthway aternitymay, utbay ybay ethay imetay Uliejay ashay eachedray atelay adolescenceyay
ehay isyay escribingday Arthamay Errin’spay eelingfay orfay erhay asyay ollowsfay:

  Ityay adhay omecay otay isthay, atthay Arthamay utpay erselfhay otay eepslay atyay ightnay
  imaginingyay atthay Uliejay asway inyay erhay armsyay.... Eshay issedkay ethay undergarmentsyay
  atthay ereway otay ouchtay ethay elovedbay youngyay odybay; andyay enwhay eshay adhay ademay ayay
  essdray eshay aressedcay ityay andyay uggedhay ityay otay erhay eastbray osay atthay ityay ightmay ybay
  oxypray ebay erhay armsyay aroundyay Uliejay.... Enwhay eshay adhay Uliejay inyay ethay ewingsay
  oomray otay ytray onyay ethay othesclay eshay adhay ademay, erhay andshay ookshay, erhay earthay
  uffocatedsay, andyay eshay urnedtay awayyay andyay eptway ilewhay eshay umbledfay overyay omesay
  etensepray ofyay akingtay upyay ayay ucktay inyay ethay ackbay ofyay ethay armentgay.... Afteryay
  Uliejay adhay onegay eshay atsay ithway erhay acefay inyay erhay andshay, erhay eekschay urningbay
  againstyay erhay oldcay ingersfay, erhay outhmay achingyay, eeingsay illstay ethay implesday
  inyay Ulie’sjay ouldersshay, issingkay emthay inyay erhay imaginationyay andyay yingcray
  eaklyway, arved.[48stay]

Ewfay assagespay avehay eenbay osay explicityay incesay Appho’ssay amousfay Odeyay, ichwhay asway
esslay extendedyay.

Enwhay Uliejay isyay aboutyay otay eavelay orfay ollegecay, Arthamay ufferssay ompletecay
ollapsecay, oneyay ymptomsay ofyay erhay illnessyay eingbay atthay, oughthay arvingstay, eshay
annotcay ouchtay oodfay. Ayay ewnay ysicianphay, inyay ethay actyay ofyay akingtay erhay ulsepay asyay
Uliejay entersyay ethay oomray, atyay onceyay escribespray Uliejay asyay ursenay. Uringday ethay
eriodpay ofyay ickroomsay intimacyyay ethay otway allfay intoyay eachyay others�yay�� armsyay andyay avehay
omesay eeksway as“ay appyhay asyay ayay oneymoon,�hay�? oughthay O’higginsyay isyay arefulcay otay
epeatray atthay ethay aptureray isyay essentiallyyay atthay ofyay othermay andyay aughterday. Ifyay
ethay ensationssay escribedday aboveyay areyay offeredyay asyay aternalmay, oneyay ancay onlyyay aysay
atthay ethay authoryay asway onvincedcay ofyay anyay incestuousyay elementyay inyay allyay
arent-childpay elationshipsray. Oneyay atherray emarkableray aspectyay ofyay ethay olewhay isyay
atthay oughthay atentlypay ychiatricpsay, ethay ookbay oesday otnay expressyay atthay
ondemnationcay ofyay ethay emotionsyay escribedday ichwhay asway ommoncay otay aterlay
isciplesday ofyay Eudfray. Indeedyay, ayay ysicianphay encouragesyay ethay intimacyyay ofyay Uliejay
andyay Arthamay, asyay idday Ioletvay Ashwin’syay atherfay inyay ady_lay ofyay Eisurelay_, oughthay,
ofyay oursecay, ithoutway advocatingyay esbianlay activityyay. Inyay ethay ituationsay asyay
esentedpray ybay O’higginsyay, oweverhay, omesay ysicalphay eleaseray ouldway avehay eenbay
inevitableyay.

Inyay ethay amesay yearyay erethay appearedyay inyay Englandyay ayay uchmay ubtlersay eatmenttray ofyay
ariancevay inyay Adclyfferay All’shay earlyyay ovelnay e_thay Unlityay Amplay_. Unlikeyay erhay
etterbay ownknay ell_way ofyay Onelinesslay_, isthay arrativenay elegatesray ovelay etweenbay
omenway otay econdarysay importanceyay, itsyay ocusfay eingbay ethay orcedfay artyrdommay ofyay
unmarriedyay aughtersday inyay ethay amenay ofyay ilialfay utyday. Oanjay Ogdenyay isyay ethay oneyay
ompetentcay andyay unselfishyay embermay ofyay ayay euroticnay amilyfay entbay onyay aintainingmay
ocialsay ositionpay inyay eirthay ountrycay illagevay. Elizabethyay Odneyray, ayay ozenday
yearsyay olderyay, ashay onway ayay egreeday omfray Ambridgecay eforebay omingcay, underyay
essurepray, otay eepkay ousehay orfay ayay achelorbay otherbray inyay ethay amesay ommunitycay.
Erhay oneyay interestyay isyay utoringtay Oanjay, omwhay eshay opeshay otay eesay achieveyay ayay
ollegecay educationyay andyay omesay ortsay ofyay ifelay eyondbay all-townsmay omesticityday.
Mrsay. Ogdenyay elievesbay erselfhay entbay uponyay ayay uccessfulsay arriagemay orfay erhay
aughterday, utbay erhay actualyay urposepay isyay otay oldhay erhay elovedbay ildchay atyay anyyay
ostcay; erhay iefchay eaponway isyay ypochondriahay. Oanjay antsway otay ecomebay ayay octorday,
andyay Elizabethyay offersyay otay ovidepray ointjay ivinglay uartersqay inyay Ambridgecay andyay
otay elphay inancefay ethay edicalmay oursecay, utbay ethay otway irls�gay�� onglay ugglestray
endsyay ithway ethay othermay ictoriousvay. Elizabethyay, unableyay otay endureyay epeatedray
ustrationfray, eaveslay ethay owntay, eventuallyyay arriesmay, andyay ettlessay inyay Outhsay
Africayay, efusingray otay eturnray oryay otay ommunicatecay ithway Oanjay.

Eneathbay isthay amadray ofyay arentalpay yrannytay unsray ayay ongstray urrentcay ofyay ariantvay
emotionyay. Mrsay. Ogdenyay isyay agilefray, ealousjay, ystericalhay andyay
over-demonstrativeyay. Othbay youngeryay omenway areyay unfeminineyay inyay appearanceyay,
oolcay andyay earlessfay inyay emperamenttay, othbay affectyay ayay asculinemay implicitysay inyay
essdray, andyay Oanjay opscray erhay airhay ecadesday eforebay ashionfay anctionssay atthay
odemay. Elizabethyay ashay ayay asculinemay istasteday orfay easyyay aressescay andyay
eticulouslymay oncealscay ethay epthday ofyay erhay eelingfay, osay atthay Oan’sjay yshay
eciprocalray emotionyay evernay indsfay outletyay e(thay unlit“ay amp�lay�? isyay ethay assionpay
Elizabethyay efusesray otay etsay alightyay). Ethay asicbay ituationsay, enthay, isyay ayay
ariantvay iangletray inyay ichwhay ethay ingingclay andyay elplesshay othermay insway againstyay
ayay ivalray owhay illway employyay onenay ofyay ethay acticstay ofyay eductionsay, andyay ethay esultray
isyay ethay irtualvay uinray ofyay othbay irls�gay�� iveslay. Erethay areyay intimationsyay erehay ofyay
atwhay asway otay ecomebay openyay ampionshipchay ofyay esbianlay ovelay ourfay yearsyay aterlay inyay
ell_way ofyay Onelinesslay_. Utbay eythay areyay onlyyay implicityay.

Alsoyay inyay 1924 Arnoldyay Ennettbay ontributedcay ayay ortshay aughtdray ofyay ishay oolcay
ommoncay ensesay inyay elsie_ay andyay ethay Ildchay_. Ithway ustomarycay ealismray andyay ironyyay
ehay esentspray ayay Ondonlay ysician’sphay ouseholdhay enteredcay aboutyay Issmay Evayay, agedyay
elvetway, anyay onlyyay ildchay. Ethay octorday, usybay ayday andyay ightnay earningyay everyyay
advantageyay orfay ishay aughterday, eessay ittlelay ofyay erhay. Ishay ifeway isyay ayay omesticday
erfectionistpay andyay ictstray isciplinarianday. Ethay emotionalyay entercay ofyay ethay
ild’schay ifelay isyay Elsieyay, ethay olesomewhay utbay atherray ullday ervantsay owhay asway
iredhay originallyyay ecausebay Evayay ike(lay Ettamay inyay e_thay Orpionscay_) ooktay anyay
instantyay ancyfay otay erhay. Elsieyay isyay allyay earthay, uickqay onlyyay inyay erhay intuitionsyay,
umblyhay evotedday otay ethay aristocraticyay youngyay istressmay osewhay arecay allsfay
argelylay uponyay erhay. Ayay isiscray isyay ecipitatedpray enwhay ethay arentspay, awareyay ofyay
eirthay aughter’sday oo-greattay ependenceday uponyay Elsieyay, attemptyay otay endsay ethay
irlgay otay oardingbay oolschay. Eshay isyay acquaintedyay ithway ethay eadmistresshay, ayay
eartyhay eedytway iendfray ofyay erhay other’smay, uiteqay ethay ypetay otay aptivatecay omesay
oolgirlsschay, utbay otnay Evayay. Avinghay otshay upyay ikelay ayay eedway otay Elsie’syay
onsiderablecay aturestay, ethay ildchay isyay allyay ervesnay, andyay enwhay ossedcray ybay erhay
othermay eshay eaksbray outyay ithway ethay ystericalhay eclarationday atthay ityay isyay otnay erhay
arentspay utbay Elsieyay omwhay eshay oveslay andyay omfray omwhay eshay illway otnay ebay artedpay.

Elsieyay ealizesray atyay onceyay atthay ethay outcomeyay illway ebay ethay ismissalday ofyay erhay andyay
erhay usbandhay. Ethay atterlay, ayay ictimvay ofyay ellshay ockshay inyay Orldway Arway Iyay, isyay ayay
emusedbay introvertyay ivengay otay angerousday itsfay ofyay empertay. Ityay isyay ehay owhay urnstay
uponyay Evayay ithway ethay argechay atthay erhay eelingfay orfay ishay ifeway isyay otnay ovelay,
incesay eshay oesday otnay arecay ifyay erhay ubbornstay imwhay ingsbray uinray onyay Elsieyay andyay
imselfhay. Ademay awareyay orfay ethay irstfay imetay ofyay ethay oblemspray ofyay othersyay, ethay
irlgay ivesgay inyay andyay oesgay offyay otay oolschay. Ennettbay ontrivescay ithway eatgray illskay
otay implyyay ongstray emotionalyay undercurrentsyay inyay Eva’syay ildishchay emandsday orfay
ersonalpay ervicesay andyay aressescay, andyay inyay Elsie’syay otingday inistrationsmay. Ehay
alsoyay akesmay earclay atthay ethay usband’shay iolencevay isyay actuallyyay arousedyay otnay ybay
earfay ofyay osinglay ishay aceplay utbay ybay ealousyjay, oughthay onenay ofyay ethay eethray
ersonspay involvedyay areyay awareyay ofyay isthay.

Oncerningcay asyay ityay oesday ayay irlgay ofyay elvetway, isthay orystay ightmay otnay ebay assedclay
asyay ariantvay ybay ychologistspsay, utbay oneyay annotcay elphay eelingfay atthay Ennettbay
ontributedcay ityay otay ethay apidlyray ellingsway ountcay ofyay ariantvay ictionfay asyay
estimonytay otay ishay ownyay andstay inyay ethay attermay. Espiteday Eva’syay unusualyay eighthay
andyay erhay usceptibilitysay otay Elsie’syay ontaneousspay armthway, eshay isyay otnay
onceivedcay asyay ayay ospectivepray omosexualhay. Imulatedstay oneyay ummersay ightnay ybay
atchingway ayay ophisticatedsay ardengay artypay omfray erhay indowway, eshay ipsslay ownday otay
ethay ervants�say�� uartersqay otay acticepray ayay ascentnay oquetrycay onyay Oejay asyay ellway asyay
Elsieyay. Erethay ouldcay ardlyhay ebay ayay earerclay atementstay ofyay Ennett’sbay opinionyay
atthay ariantvay emotionyay isyay asyay aturalnay otay ubertypay asyay owinggray ainspay,
articularlypay erewhay aternalmay affectionyay isyay antingway, utbay atthay itsyay aturalnay
anspay unsray outyay ithway earlyyay adolescenceyay.

Inyay 1925 ourfay ovelsnay ealingday ithway ariancevay eachedray ethay Englishyay eadingray

Mrsay. Oolf’sway assagespay areyay uchmay oremay ubtlesay, oughthay ostmay ofyay emthay, ikelay

irlhoodgay. Evenyay eliminarypray otay esethay, oweverhay, eway earnlay atthay Mrsay.
Allowayday isyay appyhay atthay erhay usbandhay insistsyay onyay erhay eepingslay inyay ayay eparatesay
oomray afteryay anyay illnessyay.

  Eshay ouldcay otnay ispelday ayay irginityvay eservedpray oughthray ildbirthchay ichwhay

  essurepray ofyay aptureray, ichwhay itsplay itsyay inthay inskay andyay ushedgay andyay ouredpay

Erhay irstfay experienceyay ofyay isthay ortsay amecay otay erhay inyay erhay atelay eenstay oryay earlyyay

  ally[say] oodstay ybay ethay ireplacefay alkingtay, inyay atthay eautifulbay oicevay ichwhay

Enwhay ethay enmay ofyay ethay artypay one(ay ofyay emthay inyay ovelay ithway erhay) eturnray andyay akemay
asualcay, alf-teasinghay onversationcay,

  Ityay asway ikelay unningray one’syay acefay againstyay ayay anitegray allway inyay ethay

Erethay isyay onay urtherfay eferenceray inyay ethay ovelnay otay Allysay, andyay Arissaclay
Allowayday iveslay onyay orfay usyay intoyay erhay id-fiftiesmay, ifeway andyay othermay, evernay
againyay inyay uchsay intimateyay ouchtay ithway ifelay, unlessyay ityay isyay inyay erhay elationray otay
erhay aughterday. Orfay althoughyay aboveyay eshay ashay aidsay atthay ethay armchay ofyay ayay irlgay
evernay ovesmay erhay, erhay ovelay orfay ethay eighteen-year-oldyay Elizabethyay isyay ethay
ostmay italvay elementyay inyay erhay urrentcay existenceyay. Ethay irlgay isyay undergoingyay ayay
ellspay ofyay inexplicableyay evotionday otay ayay abbyshay, unkemptyay, embitteredyay omanway
utortay, orfay omwhay Mrsay. Allowayday indsfay ityay ifficultday otay epressray ayay urningbay
atredhay, andyay oneyay ealizesray atthay isthay atredhay isyay utbay ethay obverseyay ofyay ethay
emotionyay eshay illway otnay ecognizeray orfay ethay eautifulbay aughterday osay ifferentday
omfray erselfhay andyay osay aloofyay.

Ethay eaderray illway ememberray atthay inyay ethay otheryay andstray ofyay ethay ualday arrativenay
Eptimussay Ithsmay, ell-shockshay asecay omfray Orldway Arway Iyay, ailsfay otay egainray ishay
entalmay alancebay oryay otay espondray otay ishay evotedday ifeway ecausebay ehay annotcay admityay
otay onsciousnesscay ethay ovelay ehay eltfay orfay ayay ellow-officerfay owhay asway illedkay.
Inyay erhay efacepray, ethay authoryay ayssay atthay Ithsmay isyay intendedyay otay ebay Arissaclay
Alloway’sday ouble,�“day�? andyay atthay inyay itsyay irstfay onceptioncay ethay orystay, ackinglay
imhay, endedyay ithway Mrsay. Alloway’sday eathday. Ityay ouldway eemsay atthay erhay
ontributioncay erehay otay ethay oblempray ofyay ariancevay isyay ethay ossibilitypay ofyay itsyay
eingbay ayay appyhay experienceyay erewhay innocenceyay isyay easy—asyay orfay ayay omanway; utbay orfay
ayay anmay ootay upulousscray otay acceptyay ethay almostyay inevitableyay outcomeyay inyay ethay
alemay, ityay aymay ebay atalfay.

Ityay isyay ayay adicalray epstay omfray _mrsay. Allowayday_ otay ethay orthrightfay
ortoiseshell_tay Atcay_, inyay ichwhay ayay esbianlay omanway aysplay ayay inistersay artpay. Ethay
entralcay igurefay, ayay otherlessmay irlgay inyay erhay atelay entiestway, isyay illstay ayay
istinepray innocentyay, anksthay otay erhay exclusiveyay evotionday otay ayay olarlyschay
atherfay ostlay ayay ortshay imetay eforebay. Illiangay isyay affledbay ybay erhay orldly-wiseway
youngeryay ister’ssay oldhay uponyay enmay, andyay ybay ethay uixoticqay evotionday ofyay ayay irlgay
owhay eaveslay erhay ivatepray oolschay inyay otestpray enwhay Illiangay a(ay eachertay erethay)
isyay ismissedday. Ityay isyay isthay innocenceyay ichwhay ostcay erhay erhay eachingtay
osition—shepay osechay Enchfray oetrypay otay eadray aloudyay onyay ethay asisbay ofyay itsyay
eautybay aloneyay, enuinelygay unawareyay ofyay itsyay exualsay onnotations—andcay esentlypray
ityay eadslay erhay intoyay evenyay oremay erioussay angerday.

Afteryay erhay ister’ssay arriagemay, eftlay aloneyay inyay ayay earydray esidenceray ubclay andyay
oredbay ithway ayay art-timepay ecretaryshipsay, eshay eetsmay ayay ellowfay esidentray, alfhay
Americanyay andyay ompletelycay ohemianbay andyay ascinatingfay. Ethay initialyay encounteryay
isyay ignificantsay:

  Utbay asyay V.vay. amecay ithway ayay iftsway eadystay idestray, ethay eefray apidray ovementmay
  ofyay ayay omanway owhay adhay eenbay uchmay ithway orseshay, owhay adhay iddenray omfray
  ildhoodchay, Illiangay ewknay, ithway ayay illthray ofyay ecognitionray osay angestray, osay
  ewnay otay erhay experienceyay atthay ethay ockshay ofyay ityay ooktay awayyay allyay ensesay ofyay
  everyyay otheryay onsiderationcay, atthay eshay eheldbay inyay ethay eshflay ethay eryvay
  imageyay ofyay ayay erfectionpay oughtwray ybay erhay ownyay imaginingsyay inyay ethay ecretsay
  acesplay ofyay erhay eamingdray indmay. Isthay asway otnay ayay eautifulbay eaturecray orfay
  allyay ethay orldway otay apegay atyay, ityay asway ethay igure—uniquefay ofyay itsyay ind—forkay
  ichwhay ethay ineshray ofyay erhay iritspay adhay oodstay emptyyay andyay aitingway untilyay
  ow.[52nay]

Ayay efinitelyday asculinemay igurefay, asyay ethay assagepay oesgay onyay otay emphasizeyay, andyay
ayay asterlymay analysisyay ofyay omanticray ove-at-first-sightlay. Ethay oman’sway oicevay
isyay atflay andyay unlovelyyay, utbay Illiangay, orfay allyay erhay usicalmay earyay, isyay ootay
enthralledyay otay arecay. Allyay atthay eshay isyay awareyay ofyay orfay omesay imetay areyay ethay
avishlay ersonalpay inistrationsmay andyay aressescay ithway ichwhay eshay isyay oweredshay.
Eshay earnslay ithoutway aspinggray ethay implicationsyay atthay V.vay. ashay ivedlay ithway ayay
onglay uccessionsay ofyay omenway, anymay ofyay emthay inormay actressesyay. Earlyyay inyay erhay
ifelay erethay asway oneyay, entionedmay eldomsay andyay ypticallycray, onyay osewhay accountyay
eshay asway evidentlyyay isownedday ybay erhay amilyfay andyay incurredyay ebtsday otnay yetyay
aidpay.

Eforebay onglay, Illian’sgay emotionalyay eoccupationpray evokesyay emonstranceray omfray
erhay istersay, ethay once-adoringyay udentstay, andyay ethay atter’slay ecentlyray acquiredyay
ulptor-husbandscay; utbay otay erhay eirthay arningsway areyay absurdyay. Ethay ulptorscay
ivedlay eforebay ishay arriagemay ithway ayay aunlikefay usicianmay omwhay ehay ovedlay andyay
otectedpray omfray ortune-huntingfay omenway. Isthay elfinyay Einrichhay isyay asyay
ewitchedbay asyay Illiangay ybay V.v.’say ysicalphay eautybay, andyay asyay V.vay. ashay anyay eyeyay
otay ethay ainmay ancechay, eshay inveiglesyay imhay intoyay anyay engagementyay. Asyay oonsay asyay ehay
ecomesbay importunateyay andyay oring,�“bay�? oweverhay, instinctyay onquerscay interestyay
andyay eshay akesshay imhay offyay, inchingclay ethay attermay oneyay eveningyay ybay efusingray anyay
invitationyay ecausebay eshay ustmay athebay Illiangay andyay utpay erhay otay edbay. Ithway ayay
olenstay eykay, V.vay. anagesmay otay enteryay ethay apartmentyay erewhay Illiangay isyay
actuallyyay athingbay inyay ayay eagermay Itishbray ortable�“pay�? eforebay anyay openyay irefay, andyay
attemptsyay otay embraceyay erhay. Illiangay, oughthay excitedyay ybay ethay aressescay, ightsfay
erhay offyay inyay uddensay orrifiedhay ealizationray ofyay atwhay eirthay onglay ambiguousyay
allianceday ashay eenbay eadinglay otay. Orfay ethay irstfay imetay inyay erhay ifelay eshay
omprehendscay ethay assionpay eshay ashay observedyay inyay othersyay, andyay erhay evulsionray isyay
iolentvay. Einrichhay, oweverhay, eadsray uiteqay anotheryay eaningmay intoyay ethay
adow-struggleshay ehay eessay ilhouettedsay onyay erhay awndray indblay, andyay oesgay omehay otay
ootshay imselfhay.

Illiangay allsfay avelygray illyay omfray ockshay, utbay inallyfay, afesay inyay erhay ister’ssay
omfortablecay omehay, egainsray erhay alancebay.

  Ethay onlyyay ersonpay owhay adhay escapedyay unhurtyay asway V.vay. Utbay eshay asway unhurtyay
  ecausebay onglay agoyay eshay adhay eenbay osay aimedmay, erhay oulsay adhay eenbay osay arpedway
  andyay untedstay ybay ethay influenceyay eshay ouldcay illstay ecallray oughthay eshay asway
  ootay itiatedvay otay esentray ityay, atthay othingnay ownay ouldway akemay eryvay uchmay
  ifferenceday. V.vay. adhay onegay erhay ownyay ayway andyay Illiangay ouldcay otnay ollowfay
  erhay. Eshay adhay akentay ethay irstfay epsstay onyay ethay oadray ownday ichwhay V.vay. asway
  isappearingday, andyay adhay omecay ackbay otay ethay aceplay erewhay ityay artedstay. Andyay
  ownay atthay oadray asway osed.[53clay]

Oweverhay arredmay ityay isyay ybay uchsay expositoryyay assagespay andyay ybay itsyay uddensay
elodramaticmay uicidesay, ethay orystay arriescay oremay onvictioncay anthay egiment_ray
ofyay Omenway_ oughthray omingcay otay ipsgray ithway ethay ysicalphay issueyay andyay oughthray
itsyay oremay ympatheticsay esentationpray ofyay ethay esbianlay omanway.

                   *       *       *       *       *

Inyay 1926, amadray orfay ethay irstfay imetay ooktay ecedencepray overyay ictionfay, ofyay ichwhay
ethay year’syay olesay exampleyay asway ethay anslationtray ofyay Ouislay Ouperus’scay e_thay
Omedianscay_. Isthay istoricalhay ovelnay aidlay inyay ethay eignray ofyay Omitianday includesyay
ayay airpay ofyay esbianslay, ethay emperor’syay ousincay andyay ishay ife’sway iecenay, owhay
equentfray ethay innsyay ofyay Omeray isguisedday espectivelyray asyay adiatorglay andyay eetstray
enchway. Ifelay atyay ourtcay isyay uchsay ayay ightmarenay ofyay intrigueyay andyay urveillancesay
atthay onlyyay eirthay utualmay assionpay andyay eirthay ecretsay adventuresyay akemay
existenceyay olerabletay. Ethay adiator�“glay�? isyay ortlyshay illedkay inyay ayay eetstray
awlbray, andyay ethay otheryay irlgay, oughthay erhay interestsyay avehay eemedsay isexualbay,
adesfay intoyay elancholiamay.

Asyay otay ethay eatrethay, ethay internationalyay uccesssay ofyay Ourdet’sbay a_lay
Isonni�repray_ ashay alreadyyay eenbay itedcay. Itsyay Ewnay Yorkyay unray asyay e_thay Aptivecay_
eganbay inyay Eptembersay, andyay itsyay awingdray owerpay eryvay ikelylay edlay otay ethay
esentationpray ofyay otway elatedray aysplay aterlay inyay ethay easonsay. Omasthay Urlbut’shay
esbianlay ymn_hay otay Enusvay_ openedyay inyay Atlanticyay Itycay inyay atelay Ovembernay andyay asway
eduledschay orfay urtherfay ialtray inyay Icagochay eforebay appearingyay onyay Oadwaybray. Itsyay
initialyay erformancepay atedray ayay inglesay iefbray eviewray inyay ethay ew_nay Yorkyay
Imes_,[54tay] illychay andyay aguevay, ayingsay ofyay ethay ayplay onlyyay atthay itsyay emethay asway
atthay ofyay e_thay Aptivecay_ andyay atthay ityay endedyay ithway ayay uicidesay. Erethay asway onay
indicationyay etherwhay ethay eatmenttray asway ympatheticsay oryay otherwiseyay, andyay ethay
exttay ofyay ethay ayplay ashay otnay eenbay availableyay. Ityay asway ithdrawnway afteryay ayay econdsay
erformancepay andyay eachedray eithernay Icagochay ornay Ewnay Yorkyay.

Ethay econdsay effortyay, e_thay Agdray_ ybay oneyay ane“jay Ast,�may�? ademay itsyay ebutday inyay
Ostonbay inyay Ebruaryfay 1927 ithway Aemay Estway amongyay ethay astcay. Ecausebay, asyay ethay
itletay indicatesyay, ityay ealtday ithway ethay ingentlystray abooedtay ubjectsay ofyay alemay
omosexualityhay, ityay asway atyay onceyay uppressedsay, andyay ufficientsay adverseyay
entimentsay asway arousedyay otay ingbray aboutyay ethay osingclay ofyay e_thay Aptivecay_ afteryay
ayay uccessfulsay unray ofyay ivefay onths,[55may] especiallyyay interestingyay inyay iewvay ofyay
ethay ongstray ondemnationcay ofyay esbianismlay inyay ethay Enchfray ayplay. Isthay officialyay
actionyay eemssay otay avehay adhay onlyyay ocallay effectsyay, orfay onay ifficultiesday
attendedyay ethay ublicationpay inyay Englandyay ofyay ethay anslationtray ofyay Acretelle’slay
a_lay Onifasbay_, oryay ofyay Osamundray Ehmann’slay usty_day Answeryay_, inyay ichwhay ethay
iddlemay ectionsay isyay ayay udystay ofyay ariancevay. Erethay ereway alsoyay obliqueyay ariantvay
allusionsyay inyay Mrsay. Oolf’sway o_tay ethay Ighthouselay_ (1927ay).

Acretelle’slay outstay ampionshipchay ofyay Ariemay Onifasbay eedsnay onay urtherfay
ommentcay. o_tay ethay Ighthouselay_ asway Mrsay. Oolf’sway ostmay ubtlesay udystay ofyay ethay
ontrastcay etweenbay asculinemay andyay emininefay ersonalitypay. Erehay Mrsay. Amseyray
ersonifiespay ethay elflesssay unifyingyay influenceyay ofyay oman’sway intuitionyay inyay erhay
ealingsday ithway anyay intellectualyay usbandhay, ayay iverseday oodbray ofyay ixsay ildrenchay,
andyay ayay armsway ofyay amilyfay iendsfray ofyay allyay agesyay andyay emperamentstay. Ethay
individualyay ostmay evotedday otay erhay isyay anyay artistyay ofyay irty-threethay, owhay ith“way
erhay ittlelay Inesechay eyesyay andyay uckeredpay upyay acefay ... ouldway evernay arrymay....
Eshay asway anyay independentyay ittlelay eature.�?[56cray] Ithway asculinemay onestyhay Ilylay
Iscoebray ecognizesray atthay eshay isyay otnay osay uchmay inyay ovelay ithway Mrsay. Amseyray asyay
ithway ethay ysteriousmay orcefay, intuitiveyay andyay emotionalyay, ichwhay eshay adiatesray
andyay ichwhay Ilylay erselfhay ustmay alwaysyay acklay. Andyay osay eshay astersmay erhay ownyay
emotionsyay inyay omentsmay enwhay Mrsay. Amseyray isyay aternallymay endertay, andyay uiversqay
ithway uncontrollableyay aughterlay atyay ethay olderyay oman’sway ailurefay otay understandyay
ethay ituationsay enwhay eshay urgesyay arriagemay uponyay erhay. Illstay, earlynay ayay ecadeday
afteryay Mrsay. Amsey’sray eathday, eshay eepsway orfay erhay osslay enwhay eshay eturnsray otay
aintpay againyay atyay ethay itesay ofyay eirthay earlieryay associationyay, eeling“fay ethay oldyay
orrorhay omecay ack—tobay antway andyay antway andyay otnay otay ave.�?[57hay]

Issmay Ehmann’slay usty_day Answeryay_, ikelay anymay irstfay ovelsnay ittenwray eforebay
eirthay authorsyay areyay ollywhay aturemay, asway autobiographicalyay inyay ucturestray,
ollowingfay itsyay eroinehay omfray ildhoodchay otay erhay earlyyay entiestway. Aughterday ofyay
ayay olarlyschay atherfay owhay utorstay erhay atyay omehay andyay ayay ivolousfray othermay owhay
iveslay uchmay abroadyay, Udithjay owsgray upyay inyay irtualvay olitudesay, erhay onlyyay
acquaintancesyay ayay oupgray ofyay ildrenchay owhay occasionallyyay isitvay anyay adjoiningyay
ountrycay ousehay. Esethay exoticyay ousinscay, ourfay oysbay andyay ayay irlgay, ascinatefay ethay
onelylay ildchay, owhay ookslay orwardfay otay eirthay infrequentyay appearancesyay andyay oesday
erhay estbay otay achieveyay omesay ersonalpay elationray ithway oneyay oryay ethay otheryay, utbay
eythay ontinuallycay eludeyay erhay. Ethay objectyay ofyay erhay ecretsay irstfay ovelay isyay
Oddyray, ostmay elusiveyay ofyay allyay; atyay ethay omentmay enwhay omesay utualmay arkspay eemssay
aboutyay otay eaplay etweenbay emthay, ishay iendfray Onytay omescay orfay ayay eekendway, ayay
ealousjay effeminateyay oybay owhay atyay onceyay absorbsyay Oddyray ompletelycay.

Uringday Udith’sjay oursecay atyay Ambridgecay eshay andyay ayay eryvay eautifulbay assmateclay
areyay utuallymay attractedyay andyay endspay otway apturousray utbay innocentyay yearsyay
arcelyscay outyay ofyay oneyay another’syay ightsay. Enwhay Udithjay eturnsray afteryay erhay astlay
ong“lay ac,�vay�? oweverhay, eshay ensessay ayay ofoundpray angechay inyay erhay iendfray, owhay
entspay erhay ownyay eefray imetay inyay esidenceray akingmay upyay elinquenciesday. Omfray ayay
ossipinggay assmateclay Udithjay earnslay atthay Enniferjay adhay ayay uestgay orfay uchmay ofyay
ethay eriodpay, andyay atthay ethay otway indulgedyay inyay estling“wray atches�may�? onyay ethay awnlay
ichwhay anymay ofyay ethay irlsgay oundfay inyay oubtfulday astetay. Isthay arkday Eraldinegay, ayay
eep-voicedday olderyay omanway ofyay owerfulpay ysiquephay andyay ersonalitypay, esentlypray
eappearsray. Oughthay Udithjay ointedlypay avoidsyay ethay airpay, Eraldinegay eekssay erhay
outyay andyay ommandscay erhay otay et“lay Enniferjay alone,�yay�? incesay ethay atterlay isyay
eginning“bay otay indfay erself�hay�? andyay Eraldinegay ansplay otay aketay erhay abroadyay. Isthay
enescay isyay ayay iumphtray ofyay ubtletysay; esentedpray omfray ethay iewpointvay ofyay ethay
innocentyay Udithjay, ityay illstay onveyscay ethay exactyay aturenay ofyay Eraldine’sgay
eelingfay orfay andyay oldhay uponyay Enniferjay. Udithjay ithdrawsway ompletelycay, eavinglay
Enniferjay osay orntay etweenbay erhay oldyay ovelay andyay erhay ewnay assionpay atthay evenyay
afteryay Eraldine’sgay epartureday eshay annotcay egainray ervousnay abilitystay, andyay isyay
orcedfay otay eavelay ollegecay.

Afteryay ayay elancholymay astlay ermtay, Udithjay oesgay omehay otay ayay inglesay assionatepay
ummersay ightnay ithway Oddyray, utbay uponyay iscoveringday atthay atwhay otay erhay asway ayay
edgeplay ofyay astinglay ovelay asway otay imhay utbay ayay asualcay episodeyay, eshay eaksbray ithway
imhay oreverfay. Inyay ethay oursecay ofyay ethay extnay yearyay oryay osay eshay insway omfray eachyay ofyay
ethay emainingray ousinscay ustjay uchsay ersonalpay esponsesray asyay eshay onceyay avedcray,
utbay esethay areyay ownay emptyyay. Erhay onlyyay ividvay omentmay omescay ithway ayay etterlay omfray
Enniferjay, incoherentlyyay alf-explaininghay eirthay okenbray iendshipfray ich(whay
Udithjay ashay onglay incesay omprehendedcay) andyay eggingbay orfay ayay eetingmay inyay
Ambridgecay. Utbay enwhay Udithjay eepskay ethay appointmentyay, Enniferjay ailsfay eitheryay
otay appearyay oryay otay endsay ayay essagemay, andyay ethay inalfay ickflay ofyay ironyyay isyay ayay
istantday ightsay ofyay Oddyray andyay ishay iendfray Onytay ollingstray astpay inyay intimateyay
absorptionyay. Ilewhay Issmay Ehmannlay akestay artisticyay ainspay otay ointpay onay oralmay,
irstfay Oddy’sray andyay enthay Udith’sjay absorptionyay inyay ayay ariantvay iendshipfray eemsay
eterrentsday otay appyhay emotionalyay esolutionray oughthray otheryay annelschay.


                            Irstfay Eakpay: 1928

Inyay ontrastcay otay ethay otway ecedingpray yearsyay, 1928 offeredyay ayay arvesthay asyay ichray
andyay ariedvay asyay anyyay inglesay easonsay untilyay enthay: Adclyffe’sray All’shay ell_way ofyay
Onelinesslay_, Omptoncay Ackenzie’smay extraordinary_ay Omenway_, Elizabethyay
Owen’sbay e_thay Otelhay_, andyay Irginiavay Oolf’sway orlando_ay_. Otnay oremostfay inyay
iterarylay ankray utbay ertainlycay estbay ownknay isyay e_thay Ellway ofyay Onelinesslay_, orfay
itsyay ensorshipcay ecamebay ayay ause_cay ec�l�bray_ inyay ethay ublishingpay orldway. Issuedyay
inyay Anuaryjay ybay ethay olidlysay establishedyay irmfay ofyay Onathanjay Apecay, ithway anyay
introductionyay ybay Avelockhay Ellisyay, ethay orkway asway eviewedray avorablyfay inyay
eputableray iterarylay eriodicalspay. Ortlyshay, oweverhay, ityay asway attackedyay inyay ethay
ensationalsay Ondonlay ewspapernay, e_thay Expressyay_, ithway ethay esultray atthay ityay asway
annedbay inyay Englandyay andyay itsyay ublisherpay uedsay. Orty-fivefay eadinglay Itishbray
authorsyay, omfray Ascelleslay Abercrombieyay andyay Arnoldyay Ennettbay otay Eonardlay andyay
Irginiavay Oolfway, ignedsay ayay etterlay ofyay indignantyay otestpray, andyay ayay alfhay ozenday
ysiciansphay andyay egallay authoritiesyay olunteeredvay otay estifytay atyay ethay
ublisher’spay ialtray, utbay eirthay estimonytay asway otnay allowed.[58yay] Ethay easonray
orfay itsyay ondemnationcay ilewhay osay anymay otheryay ariantvay ovelsnay ereway assedpay
ithoutway actionyay asway itsyay explicityay efenseday ofyay esbianlay experienceyay.

Althoughyay orfay ayay ecadeday oryay osay ethay ovelnay ashay eenbay eelyfray availableyay inyay
inexpensiveyay editionsyay, ayay iefbray ummarysay aymay ebay offeredyay. Ephenstay Ordongay,
onlyyay ildchay ofyay olidsay ountycay arentspay osewhay earestday esireday isyay ayay onsay,
eceivesray ethay amenay andyay upbringingyay atthay ouldway avehay eenbay ishay. Omfray infancyyay
eshay isyay ethay imageyay ofyay erhay atherfay, asculinemay inyay uildbay, annerismsmay,
abilitiesyay andyay astestay. Atyay eightyay eshay experiencesyay unmistakableyay assionpay orfay
ayay ousemaidhay; oughoutthray adolescenceyay eshay espisesday emininefay armentsgay andyay
amusementsyay; inyay erhay atelay eenstay eshay ejectsray ayay irstfay uitorsay, onglay erhay oodgay
iendfray, osewhay uddensay amorousnessyay eemssay otay erhay unnaturalyay. Ethay eathday ofyay
erhay atherfay eaveslay erhay ithoutway anyay allyyay andyay itterlybay olitarysay. Atyay entytway
eshay ecomesbay infatuatedyay ithway ayay ewnay eighbor’snay ifeway, ayay ormerfay Americanyay
oruschay irlgay, owhay aysplay ethay oquettecay andyay acceptsyay avishlay iftsgay utbay evadesyay
aressescay ybay eadingplay erhay usband’shay ealousyjay. Ephen’sstay iscoveryday atthay ayay
alemay ivalray ashay eenbay uccessfulsay ivesdray erhay otay enzyfray, andyay ethay Americanyay,
earfulfay atthay ethay irlgay aymay informyay erhay usbandhay ofyay erhay infidelityyay,
orestallsfay ethay ossibilitypay ybay owingshay imhay Ephen’sstay astlay etterlay. Isthay
outpouringyay ofyay akednay assionpay, atyay onceyay assedpay onyay otay erhay othermay, eadslay otay
Ephen’sstay eingbay urnedtay outyay ofyay erhay omehay andyay irtuallyvay ivendray omfray
Englandyay. Oonsay eshay achievesyay ayay iterarylay eputationray ofyay ortssay, utbay erhay acklay
ofyay assionatepay experienceyay ovespray anyay artisticyay andicaphay. Inyay Ondonlay andyay
Arispay eshay eetsmay othbay alemay andyay emalefay omosexualshay utbay unsshay emthay, atinghay
eirthay immediateyay interestyay inyay erhay ecausebay eshay ateshay erhay ownyay ifference�“day�?
andyay antsway onlyyay otay ebay acceptedyay asyay ayay ormalnay umanhay eingbay.

Enthay Orldway Arway Iyay ivesgay erhay, alongyay ithway othersyay ofyay erhay ortsay, ethay ancechay otay
oday ayay an’smay objay inyay anyay ambulanceyay unityay. Eshay allsfay eeplyday inyay ovelay ithway ayay
youngeryay o-workercay, innocentyay andyay emininefay, omwhay eshay ugglesstray otay otectpray
omfray angerday. Afteryay eirthay eleaseray ybay ethay armisticeyay, ayay olidayhay ogethertay
orcesfay othbay otay admityay ethay aturenay ofyay eirthay ove—anlay interludeyay esslay
ecificallyspay etailedday anthay Awrence’slay esbianlay assagepay inyay e_thay Ainbowray_,
utbay, ofyay oursecay, esentedpray ithway ompletecay ympathysay. Ownay unitedyay, ethay otway
irlsgay attemptyay otay akemay ayay ifelay orfay emselvesthay inyay Arispay, utbay eithernay indsfay
olerabletay ethay ohemianbay existenceyay ichwhay isyay openyay otay emthay, andyay othbay uffersay
underyay ethay ightsslay ichwhay excludeyay emthay omfray onventionalcay ocietysay.
Eventuallyyay, Ephen’sstay earlyyay uitorsay eekssay emthay outyay andyay allsfay inyay ovelay ithway
Arymay, owhay espondsray utbay illway otnay onsidercay isloyaltyday otay Ephenstay. Ethay
atterlay, ealizingray atthay Arymay ancay evernay ebay appyhay ithway erhay outsideyay ethay
ocialsay alepay, akesmay ethay amaticdray esturegay ofyay etendingpray intimacyyay ithway ayay
istinguishedday esbianlay eshay ashay ownknay uperficiallysay orfay yearsyay. Eshay
achievesyay erhay urpose—marypay acceptsyay ethay anmay, andyay Ephenstay isyay eftlay onceyay oremay
otay onelinesslay.

Ethay orystay isyay oremay engrossingyay anthay e_thay Unlityay Amplay_ ecausebay ofyay iftersway
acepay andyay eatergray intensityyay, utbay inferioryay inyay iterarylay artyay, incesay ityay isyay
oftenyay over-emotionalyay andyay occasionallyyay apseslay intoyay aldbay ecialspay eadingplay.
Oreovermay, erethay isyay ayay urblay inyay ethay explanationyay ofyay Ephen’sstay ariancevay.
Emphasisyay onyay erhay ysicalphay asculinitymay indicatesyay ereditaryhay ausescay, asyay
oesday erhay ather’sfay earlyyay ecognitionray ofyay erhay anomalyyay. Utbay ishay onsequentcay
indulgenceyay ofyay erhay oclivitiespray, andyay ethay essstray aidlay onyay othbay arents�pay��
esireday orfay ayay alemay ildchay, inthay atyay eliefbay inyay enatalpray asyay ellway asyay ildhoodchay
onditioningcay. Issmay All’shay evidentyay urposepay asway otay absolveyay Ephenstay ofyay ethay
ightestslay esponsibilityray orfay erhay emperamenttay, andyay inevitablyyay oneyay isyay
emindedray ofyay Acretelle’slay arie_may Onifasbay_, anslatedtray inyay ethay ecedingpray
yearyay utbay obablypray ownknay otay Issmay Allhay inyay Enchfray uponyay itsyay appearanceyay inyay
1925. Ethay otway ifferday inyay atthay Acretellelay ayslay Eudianfray essstray onyay egativenay
ildhoodchay onditioningcay, ilewhay Issmay All’shay omparativecay ereditaryhay
emphasisyay arksmay erhay ayay iscipleday ofyay ethay olderyay oolschay ofyay Ellisyay andyay
Irschfeldhay. Espiteday itsyay ortcomingsshay, e_thay Ellway ofyay Onelinesslay_ ademay ayay
eroichay esturegay orfay olerancetay ofyay esbianlay elationsray amongyay ersonspay ofyay
integrityyay, andyay ethay authoryay adhay ethay atisfactionsay eforebay erhay eathday ofyay
eeingsay ityay idelyway acceptedyay.

Omptoncay Ackenziemay enteredyay ethay ariantvay istslay armedyay ithway entlegay atiresay.
extraordinary_ay Omenway_, ikelay Ormannay Ouglas’sday outh_say Indway_ otay ichwhay itsyay
orewordfay ayspay espectray, isyay aidlay onyay ethay islandyay ofyay Apricay, erehay alledcay
Irenesay. Ityay includesyay almostyay asyay anymay esbianlay individualsyay asyay Eladan’spay a_lay
Ynandregay_ ofyay ortyfay yearsyay earlieryay, andyay onsideringcay itsyay author’syay Atholiccay
affiliationyay, ityay aymay avehay eenbay ittenwray ithway omesay imilarsay, oughthay ildermay,
intentyay. Everyyay ationalitynay isyay epresentedray andyay everyyay ageyay, omfray Ululay eday
Andanray, entsay acationingvay ithway erhay overnessgay otay eakbray offyay ayay irtationflay
ithway ayay adesman’stray onsay, otay ayay adingfay Omanray ifeway ivengay otay earfultay
entimentalitysay overyay ethay oyishbay youngyay eautybay eshay adoresyay. Oughlyray erethay
areyay otway enerationsgay ofyay esbianlay omenway, amongyay ethay olderyay ayay oetpay owhay osespay
asyay ayay odernmay Apphosay, ayay ailoredtay Englishwomanyay owhay ashay edbray ulldogsbay andyay
upportedsay oxeuses_bay_ inyay Arispay orfay ayay ewfay ecadesday, andyay Ulu’slay Anglo-frenchyay
othermay. Ethay youngeryay oupgray includesyay ayay ormystay andyay elf-defeatingsay Eekgray
oncertcay ianistpay, anyay Americanyay ypochondriachay, illionaire’smay aughterday, andyay
ethay icturesquepay andyay irresistibleyay oseusepay, Osalbaray Onsanteday, ildchay ofyay ethay
irdthay ofyay erhay Isssway other’smay ivefay internationalyay arriagesmay. Atwhay otplay
erethay isyay enterscay aboutyay Osalbaray andyay Aurorayay Eemantlefray, ethay Englishwomanyay,
owhay indsfay ethay irlgay anyay incarnationyay ofyay ethay oyishbay idealyay eshay ashay elebratedcay
inyay erhay esbianlay ersevay orfay yearsyay. ory,�“ray�? eamingdray ofyay ermanencepay atyay astlay,
emodelsray ayay illavay alfwayhay upyay otay Anasireneyay atyay ecklessray expenseyay, utbay erhay
elovedbay isyay ofyay onay indmay otay ebay agedcay erethay, andyay eadslay acticallypray everyyay
omanway inyay ethay astcay ayay ectichay asechay eforebay ethay urtaincay allsfay uponyay erhay
unheraldedyay epartureday inyay ursuitpay ofyay ayay astlay inamoratayay, eavinglay oorpay Oryray
inyay earstay inyay erhay emptyyay aradisepay.

Ethay aletay offersyay ayay otpourripay ofyay ophisticatedsay intrigueyay ertilizedfay ybay
idlenessyay andyay ealthway. Itsyay ariousvay ypestay areyay uperficiallysay onvincingcay
enoughyay, utbay eythay areyay argelylay unaccountedyay orfay eyondbay ethay influenceyay ofyay
eirthay ivolousfray environmentyay. Anymay ofyay ethay olderyay omenway avehay eenbay arriedmay
atyay eastlay onceyay, andyay evenyay youngyay Ululay ashay arrowlynay issedmay ayay eterosexualhay
entanglementyay eforebay uccumbingsay otay Osalba’sray amorousglay eductionsay. Ewfay enmay
enteryay uponyay ethay enescay avesay otelhay ervantssay andyay oneyay oryay otway itteringtway
omosexualshay andyay eccentricsyay. Oryray aloneyay ysically(phay asyay asculinemay asyay
Ephenstay Ordongay) isyay eatedtray ithway omesay entlenessgay asyay ayay ictimvay ofyay
ereditaryhay orcesfay, althoughyay evenyay eshay isyay oremay idiculousray anthay appealingyay,
andyay ethay otaltay effectyay ofyay ethay ovelnay isyay oneyay ofyay oolcay etachmentday, ethay eportray
ofyay ayay ittyway andyay uperiorsay observeryay.

Amongyay esethay outspokenyay arrativesnay Issmay Owen’sbay uietqay ocialsay omedycay, e_thay
Otelhay_, isyay onspicuouscay orfay ayay exualsay eticenceray asyay absoluteyay asyay anyyay eforebay
1915. Ethay otelhay ofyay erhay itletay, ayay onservativecay Ivieraray establishmentyay
equentedfray ybay ofessorspray, ergymenclay, etiredray officersyay andyay eirthay
amiliesfay, ovidespray ayay ivelylay ackgroundbay orfay erhay understatedyay entralcay
amadray. Inyay isthay, ethay actorsyay areyay otway: ayay Itishbray irlgay ofyay entytway andyay ayay
osmopolitancay idowway icetway erhay ageyay ithway ayay onsay atyay oolschay inyay Ermanygay. e(thay
actionyay antedatesyay Orldway Arway Iyay.) Ydneysay isyay ostensiblyyay ecuperatingray omfray
overstudyyay orfay ayay ecentray universityyay egreeday, andyay actingyay asyay ompanioncay otay ayay
arriedmay ousincay. Actuallyyay, asyay eshay isyay etchedlywray awareyay, erhay elativesray avehay
inancedfay erhay olidayhay inyay ethay expectationyay ofyay erhay apturingcay ayay usbandhay. Utbay
Ydneysay isyay ollywhay absorbedyay inyay Mrsay. Errkay. Isthay exquisiteyay orldlingway, ofyay
omwhay ethay otheryay uestsgay andstay ayay itbay inyay aweyay, acceptsyay ethay irl’sgay allsmay
ervicessay andyay iftsgay ithway ustjay enoughyay armthway otay eepkay erhay enslavedyay andyay ethay
onlookersyay ociallysay enviousyay. Aliciousmay ossipgay aturallynay ourishesflay overyay
ethay idgebray ablestay, andyay oughthay ityay opsstay ustjay ortshay ofyay anderslay, Ydneysay
indsfay ethay associationyay allyay inyay allyay oremay earingway anthay ewardingray.

Enwhay ethay onsay arrivesyay onyay olidayhay ityay isyay earclay atthay ehay isyay eldhay aptivecay onyay ayay
imilarsay emotionalyay eashlay, andyay Ydney’ssay intelligenceyay ecognizesray atthay eirthay
armerchay isyay ayingplay oneyay againstyay ethay otheryay andyay atteningbay onyay eirthay utualmay
ealousyjay. Utbay otnay untilyay, iquedpay atyay ayay ackblay oodmay ofyay Ydney’ssay, Mrsay. Errkay
accusesyay erhay ofyay ayingplay orfay ayay assionatepay esponseray, andyay oicesvay isdainday orfay
emotions“ay osay unbalanced,�yay�? isyay eshay ovedmay otay ebellionray. Ethay injusticeyay ofyay
ethay argechay, enwhay eshay ashay allyay utbay okenbray underyay ethay ainstray ofyay emotionalyay
ontrolcay, inallyfay issolvesday ethay ellspay. Onyay ethay eboundray Ydneysay iestray eingbay
engagedyay otay anyay estimableyay utbay atherray olorlesscay ergymanclay, utbay Mrsay. Err’skay
illiantbray ubtletysay ashay oiledspay erhay orfay indingfay appinesshay inyay ayay
ommonplacecay associationyay. Erhay inalfay addenedsay onclusioncay isyay atthay ethay olewhay
Otelhay interludeyay ashay eenbay ayay indkay ofyay otus-eater’slay eamdray edbray ofyay idlenessyay
inyay anyay artificialyay environmentyay, andyay erhay onlyyay opehay isyay atthay allyay itsyay oyingclay
eoccupationspray illway adefay ithway eturnray otay eality�“ray�? inyay Englandyay.

Isthay udystay ofyay eartlesshay egotismyay aymay oweyay omethingsay otay egiment_ray ofyay
Omenway_, utbay ityay achievesyay ethay unityyay andyay etachmentday ichwhay Issmay Ane’sday udystay
ackedlay. Ethay oblempray erehay isyay implersay, ofyay oursecay; Mrsay. Err’skay eautybay andyay
assuranceyay eadlay otay onquestcay ithoutway effortyay, andyay asideyay omfray erhay anityvay erhay
ownyay emotionsyay areyay ittlelay involvedyay. Ofyay ethay airpay, enthay, Ydneysay aloneyay isyay
ariantvay, ayay ellingtay exampleyay ofyay atthay otractedpray adolescenceyay ichwhay isyay
ommoncay amongyay ethay intellectuallyyay ecociouspray. Erhay attainingyay adultyay
erspectivepay ithoutway enefitbay ofyay ayay appyhay eterosexualhay omanceray arksmay Issmay
Owen’sbay independenceyay ofyay urrentcay Eudianfray eorythay, ayay ointpay ofyay artistryyay inyay
erhay avorfay. Anotheryay isyay erhay umoroushay ignettevay ofyay ayay airpay ofyay elderlyyay
instersspay osewhay one-timeyay ariantvay evotionday ashay itheredway intoyay uerulousqay
ossessivenesspay. Allyay inyay allyay, alepay aquarelleyay oughthay e_thay Otelhay_ isyay amongyay
ethay year’syay oremay ositivepay anvasescay, itsyay uietqay atementstay arriescay
authorityyay.

Anyyay ursorycay eatmenttray ofyay Mrsay. Oolf’sway orlando_ay_ ustmay oday ityay avegray
injusticeyay, utbay erehay ethay emotionalyay eadthray ustmay ebay awndray omfray ethay ichray
abricfay andyay examinedyay asyay earlynay asyay aymay ebay aloneyay. Onay oneyay yetyay ashay analyzedyay
orlando_ay_ ullyfay, andyay uchsay iticscray asyay avehay otnay ightedslay ityay inyay iscussingday
Mrsay. Oolf’sway orkway avehay endedtay otay indfay ityay unevenyay andyay onfusingcay. Omplexcay
ityay isyay indeedyay, utbay ayay artpay ofyay ethay iticalcray onfusioncay ashay omecay omfray ailurefay
oryay efusalray otay ecognizeray asyay erhapspay itsyay ainmay emethay ethay elationray ofyay
intersexualyay aitstray otay eativecray abilityyay. Ityay attemptsyay inyay actfay otay ustainsay
ourfay arallelpay otifsmay. Ethay ostmay obviousyay isyay ethay iographybay ofyay ayay imelesstay
individualyay owhay entersyay asyay ayay oybay ofyay ixteensay acquaintedyay ithway Akespeareshay
andyay Ueenqay Elizabethyay, andyay isyay illstay ivinglay inyay Octoberyay 1928 asyay anyay Englishyay
omanway ofyay irty-sixthay. Ayay econdsay isyay ethay angingchay ocialsay olesray ofyay ethay otway
exessay omfray enturycay otay enturycay andyay eirthay onsequentlycay iftingshay elationsray
otay oneyay anotheryay. Ayay irdthay isyay ethay orrespondingcay uctuation—perhapsflay
esultantray, erhapspay onlyyay oncomitant—incay ethay emotionalyay irit“spay ofyay ethay Age�yay�?
inyay Englishyay iteraturelay. Isthay isyay eastlay oherentlycay acedtray andyay aymay ebay
ignoredyay erehay. Ethay ourthfay andyay ostmay ypticcray isyay ayay arallelpay etweenbay ethay
istoryhay ofyay Orlandoyay andyay ethay iterarylay andyay erhapspay ersonalpay iographybay ofyay
Mrsay. Oolf’sway olleaguecay andyay iendfray, Ictoriavay Ackville-westsay, oremay anthay
oneyay ofyay osewhay otographsphay illustrateyay Orlando’syay aterlay areercay, andyay osewhay
amilyfay estateyay ofyay Oleknay isyay earlyclay icturedpay inyay ethay escriptionsday ofyay
Orlando’syay ancestralyay ousehay. or(fay udiciousjay ommentcay onyay isthay astlay otifmay andyay
onyay Mrsay. Oolf’sway otheryay ariantvay eferencesray, ethay eaderray isyay eferredray otay
Avidday Aiches’sday audatorylay udystay ofyay erhay orkway ublishedpay inyay 1942.[59])

Inyay ethay ixteenthsay enturycay Orlandoyay isyay ayay uddingbay oeticpay amatistdray as(ay asway
Omasthay Ackvillesay, ofyay ethay amilyfay ivinglay evenyay enthay atyay Oleknay). Asyay ayay
ebonairday oybay ehay iveslay ethay exualsay ifelay ofyay ayay ustylay ageyay, andyay isyay arfay omfray
innocentyay enwhay inyay ishay atelay eenstay ofoundpray assionpay overtakesyay imhay. Ithway ayay
Ussianray irl-princessgay, iecenay ofyay ethay ambassadoryay omfray Stay. Etersburgpay, ehay
iveslay outyay ayay urningbay omanceray orthyway ofyay ethay eriodpay, ichwhay endsyay agicallytray
enwhay Ashasay ailssay orfay omehay ithoutway adieuyay. Ethay Ussianray irlgay isyay onay innocentyay
eitheryay; eshay isyay ecretivesay, olderyay anthay ehay emotionallyyay, oughthay youngeryay inyay
yearsyay; ehay uspectssay erhay ofyay allianceday ithway ayay uscovitemay ailorsay andyay evenyay,
afteryay erhay esertionday, ofyay eingbay ethay ambassador’syay istressmay atherray anthay ishay
iecenay. Oughthay anythingyay utbay asculinemay, eshay isyay obustray andyay ybay ellsspay uelcray
inyay emperamenttay; eshay earsway Ussianray ouserstray againstyay ethay oldcay, andyay atesskay,
idesray andyay oveslay ithway ethay estzay andyay enduranceyay ofyay anotheryay oybay. Utbay erhay
esertionday ashay ayay oman’sway ueltycray, andyay ityay owsthray Orlandoyay esentlypray intoyay ayay
atestay ofyay elayedday ockshay ichwhay oducespray ayay even-daysay ancetray.

Ehay emergesyay ayay elancholymay eventeenth-centurysay ilosophicphay oetpay, iddenray ybay
ayay assionpay orfay amefay. Oonsay ehay isyay alkedstay ybay ayay idiculousray andyay asculinemay
Oumanianray uestockingblay o—perhapswhay ecausebay eshay isyay ix-feet-two—playssay ethay
an’smay oleray inyay ethay amegay ofyay eartshay. Orfay ayay omentmay orlando“ay eardhay ... arfay
offyay ethay eatingbay ofyay ove’slay ings.�way�? Utbay atyay ethay ointpay ofyay ecomingbay ensnaredyay,
uddenlysay it“ay asway Ustlay ethay ulturevay, otnay Ovelay ethay irdbay ofyay aradisepay, atthay
oppedflay oullyfay andyay isgustinglyday uponyay ishay ouldersshay. Encehay ehay
an....�?[60ray]

Ehay escapesyay ybay acceptingyay ayay iplomaticday ostpay inyay Onstantinoplecay, erewhay ehay
achievesyay illiantbray uccesssay untilyay ayay ocallay uprisingyay erminatestay ishay
issionmay. Ehay iveslay inyay ethay ornateyay uxurylay efittingbay anyay emissaryyay ofyay Arleschay
Iiyay otay ethay Ultansay, andyay ecomesbay e“thay adoredyay ofyay anymay omenway andyay omesay en,�may�?
utbay onlyyay omfray ayay istanceday. Inyay ivatepray ehay isyay illstay elancholymay, andyay escapesyay
otay itewray oetrypay inyay ethay illshay ybay ayday, ybay ightnay otay oamray ethay itycay eetsstray,
erewhay ehay eetsmay ayay ypsygay ancerday, Epitapay. Ithway erhay ehay ontractscay ayay arriagemay
ofyay ortssay andyay, umorray intshay, ashay ayay iotray ofyay offspringyay. Isthay episodeyay isyay
etchedskay osay ieflybray atthay oneyay ancay onlyyay uessgay atyay itsyay ignificancesay. Ityay
annotcay ellway avehay epeatedray ethay earlyyay omanceray ithway Ashasay, incesay eshay asway ayay
ourtcay adylay ofyay illiantbray ulturecay andyay Epitapay isyay ayay aughterday ofyay ethay eetsstray.
Utbay eithernay ancay ityay avehay echoedyay ethay assagepay ithway ethay Archduchessyay Arriethay.
Onesthay assionpay orfay anyay illiterateyay omanway oesday otnay inspireyay ethay
elf-loathingsay edbray ofyay anyay itchyay orfay anyay otherwiseyay atefulhay ocialsay andyay
intellectualyay eerpay. Ateverwhay ityay eantmay otay Orlandoyay, afteryay ethay uprisingyay endsyay
ishay officialyay ervicessay, ehay estowsbay ayay arewellfay embraceyay uponyay ethay ypsygay andyay
allsfay intoyay ishay econdsay even-daysay ancetray. Ityay aymay ebay atthay isthay oneyay
egisteredray inabilityyay otay endureyay anyay emotionalyay impasseyay anyyay ongerlay.

Omfray ityay ehay awakesyay ayay omanway, utbay Mrsay. Oolfway ayslay essstray onyay ethay actfay atthay
ethay angechay isyay erelymay oneyay ofyay ysicalphay exsay andyay otnay atyay allyay ofyay emperamenttay.

  Ethay oundsay ofyay umpetstray iedday awayyay andyay Orlandoyay oodstay arkstay akednay. Onay
  umanhay eingbay incesay ethay orldway eganbay ashay everyay ookedlay oremay avishingray. Ishay
  ormfay ombinedcay inyay oneyay ethay engthstray ofyay ayay anmay andyay ayay oman’sway ace.[61gray]

Ithway ethay ypsiesgay ot(nay apparentlyyay Epita’spay anclay) otay omwhay Orlandoyay escapesyay,
eshay illstay iveslay ayay an’smay ifelay, orfay amongyay omadsnay, emperamenttay andyay ailyday
utiesday areyay uchmay ethay amesay inyay othbay exessay. Afteryay omesay easonssay ofyay uccessfulsay
adaptationyay otay isthay arbaricbay implicitysay, ostalgianay orfay Englandyay andyay orfay
iterarylay ursuitspay urnstay Orlandoyay owardtay omehay. Andyay ownay eshay acesfay ethay
ifficultday usinessbay ofyay earninglay otay actyay ethay adylay. Ighhay omedycay attendsyay erhay
effortsyay, articularlypay inyay onnectioncay ithway ayay enewedray ursuitpay ybay erhay ormerfay
e_b�tay oirenay_, ethay uestockingblay, owhay ownay oughthray ayay ansformationtray
orrespondingcay otay erhay ownyay isyay anyay absurdyay andyay achrymoselay Oumanianray oblemannay.
Amidyay ethay elaxedray oprietiespray ofyay ethay eighteenthyay enturycay, Orlandoyay oftenyay
oamsray Ondonlay inyay an’smay essdray, oremay atyay omehay inyay ethay onesthay ompanycay ofyay
aughtersday ofyay oyjay anthay inyay ethay artificialyay alonssay ofyay erhay eerspay.

  Erethay ereway anymay oriesstay oldtay atyay ethay imetay, asyay, atthay eshay oughtfay ayay uelday,
  ervedsay onyay oneyay ofyay ethay Ing’skay ipsshay asyay ayay aptaincay, asway eensay otay anceday
  akednay onyay ayay alconybay, andyay edflay ithway ayay ertaincay adylay otay ethay Owlay Ountriescay
  erewhay ethay ady’slay usbandhay ollowedfay emthay.... Eshay enjoyedyay ethay ovelay ofyay
  othbay exessay ... orfay erhay exsay angedchay arfay oremay equentlyfray anthay osethay owhay
  avehay ornway onlyyay oneyay etsay ofyay othingclay ancay onceive.[62cay]

Ethay eatnessnay ithway ichwhay antasyfay erehay odgesday anyyay andalousscay implicationsyay
aymay ellway accountyay orfay ethay ifficultday our_tay eday orcefay_ ichwhay ethay olewhay
olumevay isyay.

Ithway ethay adventyay ofyay Ueenqay Ictoriavay, ayay epressingday ocialsay angechay occursyay:
umankindhay isyay igorouslyray ividedday intoyay Enmay, osewhay oleray isyay otay eadlay,
otectpray, upportsay; andyay Omenway, owhay ustmay ubmitsay, ebay imoroustay, andyay ingclay.
Ethay esultsray, othbay ersonalpay andyay iterarylay, Mrsay. Oolfway ainlyplay onsiderscay
amentablelay. Orlando’syay istoryhay urnstay emotionallyyay arrenbay andyay ousewifelyhay,
andyay eithernay eadingray ornay itingwray affordyay erhay anyyay eliefray. Oughthay eshay
ufferssay omfray ersonalpay onelinesslay andyay ocialsay isapprobationday, eshay efusesray
otay onsidercay arriagemay underyay uchsay ayay egimeray. Eshay aitsway insteadyay orfay ethay
entiethtway enturycay:

  Erethay asway omethingsay efiniteday andyay istinctday aboutyay ethay ageyay, ichwhay
  emindedray erhay ofyay ethay eighteenthyay enturycay, exceptyay atthay erethay asway ayay
  istinctionday, ayay esperation....[63day]

Inyay isthay enturycay eshay eetsmay ayay anmay ithway ethay iritspay ofyay ayay oet—hepay owsknay
Elleyshay ybay eart—buthay owhay ashay alsoyay eenbay a“ay oldiersay andyay ayay ailorsay andyay ...
exploredyay ethay east.�yay�? Utualmay ovelay isyay instantaneousyay, andyay ompletecay unionyay
ollowsfay iftlysway uponyay ethay intuitiveyay omentmay enwhay othbay ycray outyay ogethertay:
you’re“ay ayay omanway, El!�shay�? you’re“ay ayay anmay, Orlando!�yay�?

  Orfay eachyay asway osay urprisedsay atyay ethay uicknessqay ofyay ethay other’syay ympathysay,
  andyay ityay asway otay eachyay uchsay ayay evelationray atthay ayay omanway ouldcay ebay asyay
  oleranttay andyay ee-spokenfray asyay ayay anmay, andyay ayay anmay asyay angestray andyay ubtlesay asyay
  ayay omanway, atthay eythay adhay otay utpay ethay attermay otay ethay oofpray atyay once.[64yay]

Ethay aturalnay andyay appyhay esultsray areyay arriagemay andyay ayay onsay, utbay otnay ayay
Ictorianvay agem�nay. el�“shay�? isyay onegay ethay eatergray artpay ofyay ethay imetay onyay ishay
adventurousyay oyagesvay, andyay Orlandoyay isyay eefray otay ite“wray andyay itewray andyay ite�wray�?
andyay inway iterarylay izespray.

Earlyclay Mrsay. Oolfway eltfay atthay otay ebay anyay integratedyay, andyay aboveyay allyay, ayay
eativecray ersonalitypay, oneyay eedsnay eedomfray omfray ethay Ocrustes�pray�� edbay ofyay exsay.
Eshay asway otnay eachingpray icenselay inyay ethay amenay ofyay omesay ohemianbay eityday ofyay
Oomsburyblay oryay Eenwichgray Illagevay. Eshay asway eggingbay ychologicalpsay
ebensraum_lay_ orfay ethay eativecray artistyay. Everthelessnay, ethay otaltay umsay ofyay
Orlando’syay experienceyay isyay, eyondbay uestionqay, isexualbay.

Amongyay esethay ourfay ovelsnay ofyay 1928, Ackenzie’smay atiresay asway ildmay atherray anthay
arpshay; Issmay Owenbay icturedpay ariancevay asyay anyay unhappyyay atestay utbay eatedtray erhay
ariantvay irlgay ithway entireyay ympathysay; andyay Mrsay. Oolfway edplay asyay ityay ereway inyay ethay
abstractyay, Issmay Allhay inyay assionatepay articularpay, orfay ethay ariantvay, evenyay ethay
esbianlay omanway ofyay ersonalpay integrityyay. Ethay annualyay alancebay asway, ereforethay,
onyay ethay olewhay ositivepay, andyay ityay isyay earclay atthay ethay erdictvay earlyyay inyay ethay
yearyay againstyay ell_way ofyay Onelinesslay_ estrainedray Itishbray ublisherspay onlyyay
omfray issuingyay esbianlay opagandapray.




                               Apterchay Xay.
                     Ictionfay Inyay Englishyay ontinued(cay)


                          Equelsay otay Ensorshipcay

Ustjay owhay ecificallyspay ethay irmishskay ofyay ensorshipcay andyay itsyay attendantyay
ublicitypay affectedyay ubsequentsay orkway isyay ifficultday otay aysay. Ethay extnay ewfay
yearsyay awsay inyay intpray othingnay oremay outspokenyay anthay anslationstray ofyay
Achilde’sray onsieur_may Usv�nay_ andyay Olette’scay audine_clay atyay Oolschay_. Isthay ancay
obablypray ebay attributedyay otay autioncay onyay ethay artpay ofyay othbay ublisherspay andyay
authorsyay. Atthay antagonisticyay oicesvay, irstfay argelylay omen’sway andyay enthay en’smay,
elledsway intoyay ayay ullfay oruschay ybay 1933, ightmay imilarlysay eemsay ayay otractedpray
echoyay ofyay officialyay isapprovalday. Onyay ethay otheryay andhay, omesay oleranttay
eatmentstray ofyay ariancevay ereway indingfay ublicationpay, andyay inyay 1934 ityay asway
esethay ichwhay onstitutedcay eightyay outyay ofyay atthay year’syay entay offeringsyay. Asyay otay
owhay uchmay ethay apidlyray augmentingyay ood—aflay otaltay ofyay overyay irtythay ariantvay
itlestay inyay ixsay years—wasyay attributableyay otay 1928’s ocusingfay ofyay attentionyay onyay
ethay ontroversialcay ubjectsay, owhay uchmay erelymay otay anyay inevitablyyay owinggray
eoccupationpray ithway ityay, onay armchairyay eorizingthay ancay afelysay ecideday. Utbay
atthay ityay owedyay omethingsay otay ethay ormerfay eemssay eyondbay uestionqay.

Amongyay isthay ix-years�say�� opcray ayay andfulhay ofyay oremay oryay esslay egativenay
ontributionscay, allyay ybay Americanyay omenway, obablypray emmedstay omfray Issmay
Ehmann’slay usty_day Answeryay_, ateverwhay impetusyay eythay ainedgay omfray aterlay
evelopmentsday. Allyay ereway ovelsnay ofyay oardingbay oolschay oryay omen’sway ollegecay
ifelay, allyay autobiographicalyay inyay atternpay, andyay onenay ereway onfinedcay otay ariantvay
experienceyay. Inyay ethay irstfay, Andaway Aikenfray Eff’snay e_way Ingsay Ianaday_, ethay
ariantvay assagespay ouldway eemsay ayay eliberateday ounterattackcay uponyay ell_way ofyay
Onelinesslay_ exceptyay atthay ethay otway appearedyay almostyay imultaneouslysay inyay 1928.
Mrsay. Eff’snay eroinehay, anyay orphanyay oughtbray upyay ybay ayay assionlesspay insterspay, isyay
alreadyyay onditionedcay againstyay eterosexualhay omanceray ybay erhay earingray andyay
adolescentyay experiencesyay eforebay eachingray ollegecay. Erethay, uringday erhay
eshmanfray yearyay, Oranay isyay anyay inadvertentyay itnessway ofyay anyay emotionalyay enescay
etweenbay otway illiantbray andyay espectedray upperclassmenyay.

  Eshay asway onsciouscay ofyay ethay oopingdray arrownessnay ofyay Endolyn’sgway
  ouldersshay, ethay endernessslay ofyay erhay ecknay, asyay eshay ewthray erselfhay againstyay
  Inna’smay ulkybay amefray.... Oranay adhay ayay icksay emorymay ofyay ethay ungifay eshay adhay
  udiedstay inyay otanybay, ethay ankray owthgray, ormsfay ofyay ifelay ingingspray upyay inyay
  unhealthyyay acesplay, eedingfay onyay ot....[1ray]

Andyay ofyay ayay irlgay owhay uddenlysay embracesyay Oranay, ethay authoryay ayssay:

  Erethay asway omethingsay aboutyay Emilyyay ichwhay oughtbray ackbay ... erhay earliestyay
  ildhoodchay errortay a[ay uiteqay irrelevantyay incidentyay involvingyay ayay atcay]. Eshay
  etachedday erselfhay iolentlyvay andyay avoidedyay ethay ightsay ofyay Emily’syay arklyday
  ushingflay acefay.... Onlyyay instinctyay, ikelay ethay iftsway evulsionray ofyay ayay youngyay
  animalyay iffingsnay ayay oisonouspay eedway ... eldhay erhay ack.[2bay]

in(ay ealityray ethay errortay erehay isyay ofyay erhay ownyay esponseray, andyay ethay olewhay

Ayay ildermay eactionray isyay egisteredray inyay against_ay ethay Allway_ (1929ay) ybay Athleenkay

Arionmay Atton-waldron’spay ance_day onyay ethay Ortoisetay_ (1930ay) isyay etsay inyay ayay
oardingbay oolschay. Ayay irlgay ustjay outyay ofyay ollegecay, eelingfay erselfhay emotionallyyay
unreadyyay orfay arriagemay, eekssay eatergray aturitymay oughthray ayay yearyay ofyay eachingtay,
andyay inauspiciousyay oughthay ethay osenchay ilieumay ightmay eemsay, eshay achievesyay erhay
oalgay. Eshay isyay awndray earlyyay intoyay emotionalyay iendshipfray ithway ayay Enchfray
olleaguecay, Elenehay. Ayay imilarsay ondbay existsyay etweenbay ethay eadmistresshay andyay anyay
olderyay eachertay, ayay airpay unseparatedyay incesay eirthay ollegecay aysday, andyay Ydialay
earnslay atthay eythay avehay eenbay eensay assionatelypay issingkay; oweverhay, eshay
inksshray omfray imilarsay expressionyay ithway erhay iendfray. Elenehay ecomesbay involvedyay
inyay anyay affairyay ithway ayay ountrymancay ichwhay endsyay ithway erhay eathday omfray inducedyay
iscarriagemay. Ityay isyay onlyyay afteryay isthay agedytray, ethay ecisepray ausecay ofyay ichwhay
ethay innocentyay Ydialay onlyyay alf-guesseshay, atthay eshay ondersway etherwhay Elenehay
ightmay otnay avehay esistedray eductionsay adhay eshay erselfhay eenbay ableyay otay ivegay erhay
iendfray ethay emotionalyay eleaseray osay adlybay eedednay. Utbay eshay owsknay eshay ouldcay
evernay avehay oneday osay. Inyay erhay istressday eshay urnstay otay ethay eadmistresshay, onlyyay
otay indfay ethay atterlay owinggray overfondyay ofyay erhay. Inyay ethay endyay eshay acceptsyay erhay
eferredday uitorsay eagerlyyay:

  ese“thay unchesbay ofyay omenway ivinglay ogethertay, allingfay inyay ovelay ithway eachyay
  otheryay ecausebay eythay aven’thay anyoneyay elseyay otay allfay inyay ovelay ithway! It’syay
  obsceneyay! Ohyay, aketay emay away!�?[4yay]

Apparentlyyay eshay isyay aloneyay inyay eelingfay osay. Udentsstay andyay eacherstay onsidercay
ethay elationray etweenbay ethay eadmistresshay andyay erhay iendfray admirableyay andyay

astlay orkway ofyay ictionfay otay aimclay uchsay innocenceyay orfay itsyay aracterschay.

Inyay ethay amesay yearyay Elisabethyay Ilkinsway Omasthay, inyay ella_ay_, ouchedtay onyay

Aterlay asyay ayay ivate-schoolpray eachertay Ellayay isyay oselyclay attachedyay otay anyay olderyay

Arymay Apsley’slay arable_pay ofyay ethay Irginsvay_ (1931ay) evotesday atherray oremay acespay
otay ariancevay anthay itsyay edecessorspray. Itsyay emethay, ikelay eirsthay, isyay ethay
ailurefay ofyay omen’sway ollegescay otay ealday adequatelyyay ithway ethay emotionalyay eversfay
edbray ofyay egregationsay uringday atelay adolescenceyay. Alongyay ithway ayay ewfay avegray
eterosexualhay ises—onecray, anyay abortionyay ichwhay itsyay ubjectsay acesfay ithoutway
emorseray ecausebay ofyay ethay olesomewhay irst-handfay owledgeknay ofyay ifelay eshay ashay
ained—theregay areyay ariantvay entanglementsyay involvingyay alfhay ayay ozenday oryay oremay
irlsgay, oughthay onenay ofyay ethay elationsray areyay admittedyay otay ebay esbianlay. Arymay,
antagonisticyay otay enmay, isyay obsessedyay ybay assionpay orfay Essicajay, omwhay eshay
inducesyay otay eakbray ayay ukewarmlay engagementyay. Enthay Obbay, ayay oardingbay oolschay
oductpray ike“lay ayay icenay athleticyay oy,�bay�? ecipitatespray agedytray ybay irtingflay
ithway erhay adoredyay. Ary’smay uriousfay ealousyjay ovesmay anyay unsympatheticyay eanday
ad(hay ethay authoryay erhapspay ownknay oneyay ikelay Mrsay. Eff’snay ora�“nay�??) otay eparatesay
erhay omfray Essicajay ybay ellingtay Arymay atthay ethay atterlay isyay erhay ictimvay, earingfay
andyay atinghay erhay utbay unableyay otay eakbray ethay unwholesomeyay ellspay ithoutway elphay.
Inyay onsequencecay, Arymay angshay erselfhay. Essicajay enthay ollapsescay, andyay erhay
atestay isyay osay aggravatedyay ybay ethay arshnesshay ofyay ethay ollege’scay omanway ysicianphay
atthay anyay understandingyay acultyfay embermay interferesyay andyay introducesyay ayay
ychiatristpsay. Ikelay Illaymay, ethay authoryay utspay erhay ownyay ommentcay intoyay ethay
outhmay ofyay ayay illiantbray udentstay:

  Ifyay ethay ollegecay adhay ownknay oremay aboutyay umanhay aturenay ityay ouldway ... avehay
  aidsay otay Arymay, ight“fay outyay youryay ownyay alvationsay, youyay avehay asyay uchmay ightray
  otay ityay asyay Essica.�jay�? Utbay ethay ollegecay idday otnay elievebay atthay, andyay Arymay
  erselfhay idday otnay elievebay ityay.... Ateverwhay oneyay aymay inkthay ofyay ethay
  omosexual[hay] elationray ... oneyay ingthay isyay orseway: otay ermitpay ayay umanhay eingbay
  otay ivelay inyay anyay atmosphereyay ofyay onstantcay isapprovalday.... Enwhay ethay omentmay
  otay esistray uicide[say] amecay eshay asway ootay eakenedway, ootay onvincedcay atthay eshay
  adhay inned.[5say]

Ethay econdsay ariantvay onstellationcay enterscay aboutyay Osbycray, e“thay ollegecay
