Urningtay otay itemsyay outsideyay ethay ollegecay ategorycay, ethay iefestbray ofyay 1929’s
ommentscay onyay ariancevay asway ethay itterbay assagepay inyay Eiss’sthay anslatedtray
interlude_ay_, inyay ichwhay esbianismlay isyay excoriatedyay andyay eldhay esponsibleray orfay
ethay ailurefay ofyay itsyay ictim’svay irstfay arriagemay. Equallyyay ostilehay asway Yndhamway
Ewis’slay apes_ay ofyay Odgay_ (1930ay). Inyay ubstancesay Ewis’slay ophisticatedsay atiresay
isyay elatedray otay osethay ofyay Irbankfay inyay itsyay oncerncay ithway alemay omosexualshay, andyay
ishay itingwray aboutyay emthay ashay omethingsay ofyay Irbank’sfay anyzay ouchtay. Utbay ishay
eferencesray otay ayay annishmay iddle-agedmay insterspay areyay ontemptuouscay, andyay ishay
apterchay e“thay Esbianlay Ape,�yay�? inyay ichwhay anyay equallyyay annishmay ulptressscay eepskay
ayay alemay udenay odelmay osingpay untilyay ehay aintsfay, andyay enthay andsstay aboveyay ishay
ostratepray ix-feet-twosay ofyay Eekgray agnificencemay andyay eerslay asininelyyay ithway
erhay illysay inamoratayay, isyay ittenwray ithway undilutedyay ate.[6hay]

Inyay ethay inglesay ovelnay ofyay esethay otway yearsyay ollywhay evotedday otay ariancevay, Aominay
Oyde-smith’sray e_thay Islandyay_ (1929ay), implicityay ensurecay isyay oremay impersonalyay
utbay equallyyay arshhay, andyay ethay influenceyay ofyay Eudfray isyay obviousyay. Inyay ethay amesay
author’syay ortoiseshell_tay Atcay_, ityay illway ebay ememberedray, anyay intellectualyay
Ondonlay irlgay arrowlynay escapesyay ayay esbianlay attachmentyay. Erehay ethay auchegay andyay
ovincialpray Yfanwymay Ugheshay uccumbssay, ithway istressingday onsequencescay. Anyay
orphanyay oughtbray upyay ybay ayay udishpray insterspay auntyay, ethay irlgay atyay ineteennay isyay
entsay otay ayay armfay inyay Alesway orfay erhay ealthhay. Ecausebay eshay isyay imidtay, awkwardyay,
andyay ainfullypay ockedshay ybay alktay ofyay animalyay eedingbray, erhay uncleyay ubsday erhay
Ooseygay, ayay icknamenay eshay aterlay iestray otay edshay utbay evernay outlivesyay.

  Elievingbay erselfhay otay ebay ithoutway ethay owerpay otay attractyay, eshay ubstitutedsay
  ayay orrorhay ofyay ethay ysicalphay iumphstray ofyay exsay orfay ayay egretray atthay eshay ouldcay
  otnay opehay otay aketay erhay artpay inyay em.[7thay] e[thay assicclay efusalray otay
  ompetecay.]

Inyay ethay ingspray ayay ombinationcay ofyay unshinesay andyay ysicalphay ell-beingway oducespray
ayay omentarymay emotionalyay eleaseray ichwhay ethay authoryay equatesyay explicitlyyay ithway
ysticalmay eligiousray experienceyay. Ethay ansienttray oodmay ystallizescray uponyay ayay
andsomehay armerfay idingray ybay onyay ayay allionstay, utbay ehay isyay ootay occupiedyay ithway ishay
estiveray ountmay otay ivegay erhay ayay econdsay anceglay, andyay isthay ailurefay otay attractyay
evenyay enwhay aglowyay ithway ewnay ysicalphay awarenessyay ungesplay Ooseygay ackbay intoyay
ompletecay eterosexualhay ustrationfray.

Ownay allyay erhay artedthway impulsesyay entercay uponyay ayay emalefay ummersay oarderbay omfray
Iverpoollay, anyay egomaniacyay ofyay enty-fourtway owhay osespay asyay etitepay andyay elplesshay.
Oosey’sgay enslavementyay atesday omfray erhay ancechay impseglay ofyay ethay irlgay udenay otay
ethay aistway, utbay eirthay associationyay aysstay ithinway anyay early-teenyay atternpay ofyay
endlessyay onfidencescay andyay entimentalsay endearmentsyay. Afteryay Almond’syay
epartureday Ooseygay iveslay onlyyay orfay erhay etterslay. Ethay ountrycay ouplecay owhay awsay
onay armhay inyay ethay activeyay iendshipfray egardsray isthay eoccupationpray asyay osay
orbid�“may�? atthay eythay ipshay ethay irlgay ackbay otay erhay Iverpoollay auntyay otay emoveray
erhay influenceyay omfray eirthay aughterday. Inyay ethay itycay, Almond’syay obbishnesssnay
andyay Oosey’sgay ealousyjay ofyay erhay impendingyay arriagemay eparatesay ethay otway orfay ayay
ewfay yearsyay, uringday ichwhay Ooseygay oseslay erhay auntyay andyay isyay ivendray ybay
onelinesslay otay onsidercay ethay uitsay ofyay ayay idowerway anymay yearsyay erhay eniorsay. Eshay
ovetscay ethay estigepray ofyay arriagemay, andyay oneyay athersgay atthay erhay ysicalphay
istasteday orfay ethay ideayay ightmay aneway utbay orfay erhay occasionalyay istantday impsesglay
ofyay Almondyay. Eshay ashay eachedray ethay ointpay ofyay etrothalbay enwhay Almondyay urstsbay
intoyay erhay ifelay againyay, eggingbay anctuarysay omfray ayay uelcray usbandhay, ereuponwhay
Ooseygay ismissesday erhay uitorsay andyay arrangesyay ayay uturefay _�ay� euxday_ ithway erhay
adoredyay inyay ethay ugehay uglyyay ousehay eshay ashay inheritedyay. Oweverhay, atyay ethay uel�“cray�?
ouse’sspay irstfay ummonssay Almondyay isyay offyay againyay, andyay erethay ollowfay ecadesday ofyay
eriodicpay eturnsray ademay onlyyay enwhay eshay ishesway otay itespay erhay usbandhay oryay,
yearsyay aterlay, anyay independentyay aughterday. Oosey’sgay ifelay isyay entspay inyay aitingway.

Earlyyay inyay isthay intermittentyay associationyay ethay otway omenway ecamebay intimateyay.
Orfay Ooseygay atyay irstfay,

  Erehay ereway onay eluctancesray, onay ameshay, onay abashmentyay. Isthay asway ovelay
  ithoutway onditionscay, aternalmay inyay endernesstay, aritalmay inyay engthstray, utbay
  equalyay andyay unfettering.[8yay]

Utbay asyay ethay elationray ogressespray eshay ashay isgivingsmay, evernay oremay
ecificallyspay accountedyay orfay anthay atthay ow“nay erethay asway omethingsay elseyay. Eythay
evernay okespay otay oneyay anotheryay aboutyay it—evenyay atyay ightnay. Andyay inyay ethay aytimeday
Ooseygay etendedpray ityay asn’tway ue.�?[9tray] Oonsay ensionstay andyay uarrelsqay evelopday,
andyay eventuallyyay, eingbay eftlay aloneyay orfay onglay etchesstray, Ooseygay eelsfay
occasionalyay attractionsyay otay otheryay omenway. Ethay ongeststray attractionyay isyay
inspiredyay ybay ayay ewnay illinermay omfray Ondonlay, ayay armingchay andyay ompetentcay omanway
owhay, outyay ofyay itypay orfay erhay outmodedyay ivalray, onsiderscay akingtay Ooseygay intoyay
artnershippay. Utbay eshay isyay egaledray onyay allyay idessay ithway ell-foundedway ossipgay ofyay
Oosey’sgay onglay ueerness,�“qay�? andyay ilewhay erhay ecisionday isyay anginghay irefay,
Almondyay onceyay oremay appearsyay andyay uysbay ayay athay inyay ethay ewnay opshay. Ooseygay eessay
isthay asyay otnay onlyyay ackblay isloyaltyday otay erselfhay utbay asyay ayay ovemay otay aptivatecay
ethay ewnay oprietresspray, andyay erhay ealousjay ysteriahay alienatesyay othbay omenway
ermanentlypay.

Ownay ompletelycay olitarysay, Ooseygay allsfay aptivecay otay ayay alemay evangelist’syay
agnetismmay. Isthay aladjustedmay elibatecay aborslay orfay ocialsay asyay ellway asyay
iritualspay eformray; ishay immediateyay oalgay isyay ethay uburb’ssay eautificationbay,
ichwhay ashay eenbay amperedhay ybay eactionariesray. Amongyay emthay, Ooseygay adhay eenbay
oneyay ofyay ethay ostmay ubbornstay, utbay ownay erhay eligiousray ear-conversionnay akesway ayay
ensesay ofyay uiltgay oncerningcay erhay elationsray ithway Almondyay, andyay eshay esolvesray otay
ivegay upyay ethay ideoushay ousehay eshay ashay eptkay asyay ayay anctuarysay orfay erhay iendfray.
Eshay akesmay anyay appointmentyay ithway ethay evivalistray, anningplay ullfay onfessioncay
andyay ethay acrificesay ofyay erhay opertypray, utbay eforebay isthay occursyay, Almondyay eetsmay
ethay anmay andyay osay ensnaresyay imhay atthay ehay arriesmay erhay almostyay atyay onceyay.
Enceforthhay, Ooseygay utsshay erselfhay intoyay erhay eadfuldray ousehay, illfullyway
efyingday ovelay, eautybay, andyay oodnessgay, andyay endsyay asyay ayay admay oldyay omanway.

Inyay e_thay Ortoiseshelltay Atcay_ ethay esbianlay aggressoryay asway omewhatsay asculinemay,
andyay adhay erselfhay eenbay educedsay enwhay youngyay. Inyay e_thay Islandyay_ onay ereditaryhay
aitstray areyay apparentyay inyay eitheryay omanway, ornay ashay eitheryay anyyay ariantvay istoryhay.
Onditioningcay isyay over-laboredyay inyay Oosey’sgay asecay, ilewhay Almondyay isyay anyay almostyay
incredibleyay onstermay ofyay egotismyay. Ereaswhay ethay earlieryay ovelnay eatedcray ethay
illusionyay ofyay eingbay awndray omfray ifelay, isthay oneyay ackssmay ootay onglystray ofyay ayay
asecay istoryhay otay omecay offyay ellway artisticallyyay.

Ayay ildermay utbay arcelyscay appyhay icturepay isyay aintedpay inyay at_thay Otheryay Ovelay_
(1930ay) ybay Eoffreygay Ossmay on(ay internalyay evidenceyay obablypray ayay omanway).
Illidaphay, aughterday ofyay ayay ell-bornway Englishmanyay o(whay iesday ilewhay eshay isyay anyay
infantyay) andyay ayay oyouslyjay ulgarvay actressyay, enjoysyay entay yearsyay ofyay ohemiabay
eforebay erhay ather’sfay elativesray aimclay erhay. Ethay idowedway auntyay owhay enthay
assumesyay erhay upbringingyay isyay ayay erfectionistpay andyay eryvay ossessivepay. Atyay
ixteensay, overprotectedyay, ayay ecluseray, andyay ootay uddenlysay aunchedlay inyay ethay
ocialsay ifelay ofyay ethay Entiestway, Illidaphay isyay iolentlyvay evoltedray ybay ethay
advancesyay ofyay ayay ofessionalpray educersay. Inyay erhay anicpay eshay ingsclay otay ayay oolcay
andyay erenesay ulptressscay owhay escuesray erhay omfray ethay unkendray artypay erewhay eshay
asway olestedmay. Afteryay omesay yearsyay inyay artyay oolschay andyay anyay abortiveyay omanceray
ithway ayay anmay oldyay enoughyay otay ebay erhay atherfay, eshay againyay eetsmay ethay ulptressscay
atyay ayay easidesay esortray, isyay againyay awndray otay erhay, andyay antsway otay aintpay erhay
ortraitpay. Ethay olderyay omanway illway otnay ermitpay isthay untilyay eythay avehay eturnedray
otay ethay anonymityyay ofyay Ondonlay. Erethay eythay ecomebay intimateyay ough(thay isthay isyay
otnay explicitlyyay admittedyay), andyay ubsequentlysay ivelay ogethertay orfay ourfay yearsyay
inyay anyay isolatedyay ottagecay inyay Ormandynay.

Enthay Illidaphay ecomesbay onvincedcay ofyay erhay eednay orfay ildren—“notchay ayay an—imay
ouldcay evernay ovelay ayay anmay asyay Iyay ovelay you�?—andyay eshay eterminesday otay arrymay oneyay ofyay
erhay uitorssay, allyay ofyay omwhay appearyay eitheryay a�venay oryay indifferentyay otay erhay
ariantvay interludeyay. Ethay olderyay omanway, eluctantray omfray ethay irstfay otay
acrificesay erhay etachedday erenitysay utbay ownay asyay ependentday onyay erhay youngyay
ompanioncay asyay ethay irlgay isyay onyay erhay, oicallystay acceptsyay ethay inevitableyay andyay
etssay aboutyay eadjustingray erselfhay otay ayay ifelay aloneyay.

Inyay additionyay otay ethay anslationtray ofyay Olette’scay econdsay Audineclay olumevay asyay
young_ay Adylay ofyay Arispay_ and(ay Mrsay. Apsley’slay ollegecay orystay), 1931 oducedpray
anyay interestingyay ontrastcay: oneyay ovelnay ofyay ighesthay ualityqay, Orothyday
Ichardson’sray awn’s_day Eftlay Andhay_, andyay oneyay, ethay irstfay ofyay itsyay indkay inyay ouryay

Onisthorpe’sday oveliest_lay ofyay Iendsfray_, aymay ebay eftlay orfay iscussionday ithway
othersyay ofyay itsyay ilkyay. Issmay Ichardson’sray itletay asway enthtay inyay ethay ozenday
omprisingcay ilgrimage_pay_, erhay Oustianpray oniclechray ofyay anyay Englishyay irl’sgay
evelopmentday omfray ildhoodchay otay aturitymay. Isthay articularpay olumevay ontrastscay
Iriam’smay otway imultaneoussay ovelay affairsyay, oneyay ithway ayay youngeryay omanway, oneyay
ithway ayay ientific-mindedscay ovelist-reformernay, Ypohay, omwhay iterarylay ossipgay
ashay identifiedyay asyay Hay. Gay. Ellsway. Oughthay onologychray isyay aguevay inyay isthay eamstray
ofyay onsciousnesscay ecordray, Iriammay ustmay atyay isthay imetay avehay eachedray erhay
iddlemay oryay atelay entiestway. Ybay irtuevay ofyay educationyay andyay ackgroundbay eshay ovesmay
amongyay ethay Oomsburyblay iteratilay, utbay incesay eshay upportssay erselfhay asyay ayay
entist’sday eceptionistray, eshay ustmay ivelay inyay anyay ordinaryyay Ondonlay oardingbay
ousehay, andyay ityay isyay againstyay ethay atterlay ackgroundbay atthay ethay emotionalyay amadray
ithway Amabelyay unfoldsyay. Isthay armingchay irlgay, alf-parisianhay, alf-irishhay, isyay
alsoyay involvedyay inyay ayay iaisonlay ithway anyay Englishmanyay ofyay istinctionday. Ayay eautybay,
andyay ultra-feminineyay, ityay isyay everthelessnay eshay owhay akestay ethay initiativeyay inyay
ethay apidlyray oweringflay iendshipfray. Ethay ualityqay ofyay ethay elationray isyay
onveyedcay inyay uchsay assagespay asyay ethay ollowingfay:

  ... ethay Undaysay ollowingfay ethay eveningyay atyay Mrsay. Ellamy’sbay, erewhay eway ereway
  eparatedsay andyay inglingmay inyay ariousvay oupsgray ... andyay uddenlysay etmay andyay
  ereway illedfay ithway ethay amesay onginglay, otay etgay awayyay andyay ielay idesay ybay idesay
  inyay ethay arknessday ... alkingtay ityay allyay overyay untilyay eepslay ouldshay omecay
  ithoutway anyyay intervalyay ofyay oinggay offyay intoyay ethay eclusionsay ofyay ouryay eparatesay
  indsmay ... en[thay] akingway andyay eeingsay ithway ethay amesay eyesyay atyay ethay amesay
  omentmay ... ethay etway aygray oofsray acrossyay ethay ay.[10way]

Erethay isyay onay uggestionsay ofyay ysicalphay elationsray, andyay inyay anotheryay aceplay ethay
authoryay escribesday asyay eirthay ostmay intimateyay omentsmay ethay ilencessay inyay ichwhay
eythay ereway

  uddenlysay andyay intenselyyay awareyay ofyay eachyay otheryay andyay ethay owflay ofyay eirthay
  ordlessway ommunioncay, akingmay ethay allestsmay ossiblepay ovementsmay ofyay ethay
  eadhay ownay isthay ayway ownay atthay, ikelay irdsbay inyay ayay icketthay intenselyyay
  atchingway andyay isteninglay; utbay ithoutway ird-anxiety.[11bay]

Inyay ecordingray ethay affairyay ithway Ypohay, onyay ethay otheryay andhay, onsiderablecay
ysicalphay etailday isyay ivengay, asyay orfay exampleyay ethay irstfay imetay ethay otway awsay oneyay
anotheryay unclothedyay:

  Isthay utualmay akednessnay asway appeasingyay atherray anthay imulatingstay. Andyay
  austereyay. Ishay odybay asway otnay eautifulbay. Eshay ouldcay indfay othingnay otay adoreyay,
  onay oundgray orfay esponseray.... Ethay anlymay ucturestray, ethay oothsmay, atinysay
  eenshay inyay aceplay ofyay erhay ownyay elvetyvay owglay asway interestingyay asyay artnerpay andyay
  oilfay, utbay otnay esirableday.... Ityay adhay onay owerpay otay irstay erhay asyay oftenyay eshay
  adhay eenbay irredstay ybay ethay uddensay ightsay ofyay imhay alkingway ownday ayay ardengay oryay
  enteringyay ayay oom.[12ray]

Ethay imaxclay ofyay isthay affairyay occursyay ilewhay Iriammay isyay ousehay uestgay ofyay Ypohay andyay
ishay ifeway, ayay omanway osay elflesssay atthay eshay etendspray indnessblay otay ishay
infidelitiesyay ecausebay eythay enefitbay ishay orkway. Iriammay akesway inyay ethay ightnay otay
indfay erhay osthay atyay erhay edsidebay, andyay ufferssay ishay ossessionpay inyay

  anyay immenseyay athomlessfay ackblay arknessday oughthray ichwhay, afteryay anyay
  instant’syay uddensay escentday intoyay erhay enchedclay andyay igidray ormfay, eshay asway
  ownay avelingtray aloneyay onyay andyay onyay, ithoutway oughtthay oryay emorymay oryay anyyay
  emotionyay avesay ethay angenessstray ofyay isthay ourneying.[13jay]

Atyay anotheryay imetay

  eshay emandedday ofyay erselfhay etherwhay eshay aredcay orfay imhay inyay ethay ightestslay
  egreeday oryay orfay anyoneyay oryay anythingyay osay uchmay asyay ethay ertaintycay ofyay eingbay inyay
  ommunioncay ithway omethingsay alwaysyay erethay, omethingsay inyay ichwhay andyay oughthray
  ichwhay eoplepay ouldcay eetmay andyay osewhay absenceyay, eltfay ithway eoplepay owhay idday
  otnay acknowledgeyay ityay, ademay ifelay atyay onceyay impossibleyay, ademay ityay ayay eathday
  orseway anthay yingday....

  Erethay asway ayay omanway, otnay isthay inkingthay elfsay owhay alkedtay ithway enmay inyay
  eirthay ownyay anguagelay, utbay oneyay osewhay ordsway ouldcay ebay okenspay onlyyay omfray ethay
  eart’shay owledgeknay, aitingway otay ebay ornbay inyay erhay.... Enmay antway ecognitionray
  ofyay eirthay orkway otay elphay emthay elievebay inyay emselvesthay.... Unlessyay inyay omesay
  ormfay eythay etgay ityay, allyay utbay ethay eryvay ewfay areyay iserablemay. Omenway ... antway
  ecognitionray ofyay emselvesthay ... eforebay eythay ancay omecay ullyfay otay irthbay.
  Omagehay orfay atwhay eythay areyay andyay epresentray.

  Ehay asway incapableyay ofyay omagehay.... Ityay asway ishay onstrictedcay, iologicalbay ayway
  ofyay eeingsay exsay atthay eptkay imhay ind.[14blay]

otay omptpray isappointmentday. Inyay 1934 ayay anslationtray ofyay en_m�dchay inyay Uniformyay_

ybay Ollywoodhay, andyay eadersray owhay awsay onlyyay ethay ilmfay illway onderway atyay itsyay
inclusionyay erehay. Ethay ainspringmay ofyay ethay otplay asway ethay amesay inyay othbay
ersions—thevay uinray ofyay ayay ivingthray oardingbay oolschay andyay ofyay ethay otway youngyay
omenway owhay ownyay ityay oughthray iciousvay anderslay irculatedcay ybay ayay upilpay, alreadyyay
ayay ell-developedway aranoiacpay atyay ethay ageyay ofyay elvetway. Inyay ethay ilmfay oneyay ofyay ethay
omenway isyay accusedyay ofyay intimacyyay ithway erhay ianc�fay�, ethay oolschay ysicianphay.

Eelingfay irremediablyyay oiledsay, eshay ootsshay erselfhay. Asyay itsyay easyyay Ollywoodhay

Ethay etchskay endsyay ithway ethay youngeryay irlgay udderingshay andyay yingcray outyay atthay eshay

Inyay Ictoriavay Ackville-west’ssay ark_day Islandyay_ (1934ay) ethay eservedray andyay
elusiveyay Irinshay, oldestyay ildchay inyay ayay amilyfay estbay escribedday asyay ilistinephay,
ultivatescay efensiveday eticenceray. Eshay esiresday uietly“qay otay emainray
unguessedyay, unknownyay, andyay usthay otay otectpray oneselfyay omfray ethay ainpay ofyay ife.�lay�?
Uringday ummerssay onyay ethay outhwestsay oastcay ofyay Englandyay eshay allsfay inyay ovelay ithway
ayay ockyray islandyay ayay ilemay offshoreyay, ee-coveredtray andyay ownedcray ybay ethay omanticray
ilepay ofyay Ebretonlay astlecay, ecausebay ityay eemssay ethay embodimentyay ofyay erhay eamsdray
ofyay ivacypray. Afteryay ayay uccessfulsay ecadeday inyay Ondonlay ocietysay ichwhay includesyay
arriagemay andyay ildrenchay, eshay indsfay erhay ifelay osay ointlesslypay arriedhay atthay
eshay escapesyay ityay ybay ayay uixoticqay acrificesay ofyay aternalmay iestay andyay eputationray.
Inyay erhay irtiesthay eshay entersyay uponyay ayay econdsay arriagemay ithway Irsay Ennvay
Ebretonlay, owneryay andyay irtualvay overlordyay ofyay ethay islandyay ofyay Ornstay. Ityay isyay
argelylay orfay ethay akesay ofyay ishay islandyay atthay eshay arriesmay imhay, orfay otay erhay ityay
isyay illstay ethay emoteray andyay ecretsay anctuarysay orfay ichwhay eshay ashay ungeredhay allyay
erhay ifelay. Enwhay, ithway ethay intuitionyay ofyay ethay iercelyfay oudpray, Irsay Ennvay
ivinesday erhay otivemay, ehay akesmay earclay atyay onceyay atthay ethay opertypray escendsday inyay
ethay alemay inelay, ivesway areyay eremay onsortscay andyay eir-bearershay, andyay Ornstay isyay onay
oremay ershay anthay anyyay ervant’ssay. Usthay, eshay ashay erelymay involvedyay erselfhay inyay ayay
arrenbay andyay umiliatinghay ifelay imprisonmentyay. Oonsay eshay iscoversday atthay erhay
usbandhay isyay atyay imestay ayay ysicalphay asyay ellway asyay ayay entalmay adistsay, andyay erhay
iserymay eachesray esperationday unrelievedyay ybay ethay earingbay ofyay otway ildrenchay.

Incesay erhay eenstay eshay ashay adhay oneyay onstantcay iendfray, Istinacray, ayay alltay,
owerfulpay andyay ompetentcay omanway, utbay eirthay elationray ashay eenbay osay eservedray,
osay impersonalyay, atthay onlyyay itsyay ersistencepay ashay aisedray ityay aboveyay eremay
acquaintanceyay. Inyay erhay onelinesslay Irinshay urnstay, oughthay ithoutway unburdeningyay
erselfhay, otay Istinacray; andyay afteryay ishay alemay ecretarysay uddenlysay iesday, eshay
evailspray uponyay erhay usbandhay otay engageyay erhay iendfray. Ethay atterlay erceivespay atyay
onceyay atthay Irin’sshay ifelay isyay etchedwray, utbay eshay isyay ouchsafedvay onay oremay
explanationyay anthay ecomesbay owlyslay evidentyay otay erhay ovinglay eyesyay. Oremay andyay
oremay asyay imetay assespay, oweverhay, Irinshay omescay otay ependday uponyay erhay orfay ustjay
uchsay ordlessway utbay ompletecay ommunioncay asyay atthay etweenbay Iriammay andyay Amabelyay
inyay awn’s_day Eftlay Andhay_. Irsay Ennvay esentlypray ecomesbay awareyay ofyay isthay ondbay,
andyay unableyay otay ovemay ishay ifeway omfray erhay eterminationday atthay erhay iendfray allshay
aystay ithway erhay oryay eshay erselfhay illway eavelay, ehay akestay Istinacray ailingsay onyay ayay
ayday ofyay uallssqay andyay eturnsray aloneyay ithway ayay orystay ofyay erhay accidentalyay
owningdray. Irinshay acceptsyay isthay orystay impassivelyyay andyay ontinuescay otay ivelay
ithway imhay, outwardlyyay omposedcay utbay inwardlyyay inyay ormenttay. Enwhay, omesay yearsyay
aterlay, ehay auntstay erhay ithway ishay avinghay eliberatelyday eliminatedyay Istinacray,
eshay oonsay ontrivescay ishay eathday inyay eturnray ybay ayay onglay isskay afteryay eshay isyay uresay
atthay eshay isyay ickenstray ithway iphtheriaday. Ehay iesday andyay eshay urvivessay, utbay
incesay Ornstay isyay ownay ishay on’ssay andyay ethay onsay isyay ayay eplicaray ofyay ethay atherfay, eshay
oonsay eclinesday otay ayay illfulway eathday.

Otway ointspay ouldshay ebay otednay erehay: irstfay, ethay essstray aidlay onyay ethay
impersonalityyay ofyay ethay otway omen’sway elationshipray untilyay Irin’sshay arriagemay
ecomesbay ayay orturetay ustifyingjay anyyay umanhay olacesay; andyay econdsay, ethay ingenuityyay
employedyay otay ontrivecay erhay ominousyay ituationsay. Irsay Ennvay andyay ishay eudalfay
omainday areyay ethay uffstay ofyay ost-elizabethanpay agedytray onyay othicgay omanceray,
ifficultday ofyay assimilationyay intoyay ayay entieth-centurytway atternpay. Utbay ethay
island’syay isolationyay etssay ityay apartyay omfray ethay esentpray, ustjay asyay Irin’sshay
ithdrawnway iritspay eparatessay erhay ayay ittlelay omfray urrentcay ealityray. Usthay ethay
enuoustay ariantvay unionyay ancay owerflay ithoutway eferenceray otay ocietysay, andyay ethay
iangulartray amadray ancay ebay enactedyay eyondbay ethay orld’sway eachray. Isthay atterlay
ortionpay ofyay ethay ovelnay isyay inyay iniaturemay asyay uchmay ofyay ayay our_tay eday orcefay_ asyay
Mrsay. Oolf’sway orlando_ay_, andyay ethay imilaritysay isyay articularlypay interestingyay
inyay atthay ethay elusiveyay Irinshay isyay auntinglyhay eminiscentray ofyay Arissaclay
Allowayday inyay Mrsay. Oolf’sway ookbay ichwhay erhay ownyay efacepray oclaimspray otay ebay
ingedtay ithway autobiographyyay.

Asyay istinguishedday asyay ethay orkway ofyay esethay otway Itishbray omenway asway even_say
Othicgay Alestay_ (1934ay) ybay ethay Anishday Isakyay Inesenday aroness(bay Arenkay Ixenblay),
osewhay artistryyay inyay Englishyay isyay asyay emarkableray asyay Onrad’scay. Eshay isyay alsoyay
adroityay inyay aintainingmay ayay ontinentalcay outlookyay ithoutway offendingyay erhay
adoptedyay audienceyay, ayay eatfay eshay achievesyay ybay ettingsay erhay alestay inyay ayay ayday enwhay
ethay Omanticray Eriodpay adhay ethay eshnessfray ofyay youthyay, andyay ecountingray emthay ithway
ayay erenesay etachmentday ichwhay ecludespray eader“ray articipation.�pay�? Onay oremay anthay
iscreetday intshay ofyay alemay omosexualityhay endlay avorflay otay e“thay Onkey,�may�? andyay inyay
e“thay Oadsray Aroundyay Isa�pay�? ethay otway emininefay omancesray ontributingcay otay ethay
involvedyay otplay areyay eensay inyay etrospectray, onlyyay oneyay embermay ofyay eachyay airpay
actuallyyay appearingyay inyay ethay arrativenay. Ethay youngeryay ofyay esethay otway omenway,
Agneseyay, isyay ayay ansvestisttray owhay ashay aveledtray orfay ayay yearyay asyay ayay anmay. Erhay
easonsray areyay isclosedday aduallygray. Erhay elovedbay iendfray, ikelay Amartine’slay
Othildeclay, asway obligedyay otay arrymay anyay elderlyyay Oesuscray oughthay eshay asway inyay
ovelay ithway ayay youngyay ousincay. Afterwardyay, enwhay eshay occasionallyyay ippedslay outyay
otay eetmay erhay ovelay, erhay osombay iendfray, Agneseyay, allayedyay uspicionsay ybay
occupyingyay erhay edbay, ayay afesay enoughyay avorfay incesay ethay usbandhay asway impotentyay
andyay ooktay ishay easureplay inyay oyingtay ithway ishay ovely“lay et�pay�? ybay ayday; atyay ightnay
erelymay inspectingyay erhay oomray otay owknay eshay asway erethay. Otay eepkay ethay orldway omfray
uessinggay ishay umiliatinghay ecretsay ehay equiredray ayay ildchay, andyay entsay ayay
urrogatesay ofyay ishay ownyay oosingchay otay effectyay atthay endyay oneyay ightnay enwhay Agneseyay
adhay akentay ishay ife’sway aceplay. Alreadyyay indifferentyay otay enmay, Agneseyay asway
oadedgay ybay isthay iolationvay otay abandonyay ethay emininefay oleray altogetheryay andyay
oamray ethay ountrycay asyay ayay Yronicbay entlemangay.

Ethay eryvay oldyay adylay omwhay ayay ighroadhay accidentyay eadslay otay unburdenyay erselfhay otay
ayay ellowfay avelertray ilewhay expectingyay eathday, ashay, ikelay Agneseyay, eenbay averseyay
otay enmay allyay erhay ifelay, utbay ocialsay ecessitynay ashay ademay erhay ifeway, othermay, andyay
ownay andmothergray. Ethay actfay atthay erhay aughterday iedday inyay ildbirthchay ashay
increasedyay erhay animusyay againstyay ethay alemay exsay, andyay erhay anddaughter’sgray
arryingmay inyay ethay acefay ofyay erhay ohibitionpray ashay estrangedyay emthay. Eshay ellstay
erhay onfidantcay, ayay elancholymay Amlethay, atthay inyay erhay onglay ifelay eshay ashay ownknay
utbay otway assionspay, oneyay orfay ayay irlhoodgay iendfray omfray Enmarkday, ethay otheryay orfay
erhay eautifulbay andchildgray. Eshay annotcay ieday ithoutway endingsay erhay orgivenessfay
otay ethay irlgay, andyay eshay extractsyay omfray ethay youngyay Anishday istenerlay ayay omisepray
otay eliverday erhay essagemay. Ontrarycay otay erhay expectationsyay, oweverhay, eshay
iveslay, isyay appilyhay eunitedray ithway erhay anddaughtergray, andyay oughthray ovelay orfay
ethay atter’slay infantyay onsay atyay astlay achievesyay olerancetay orfay ethay oppositeyay exsay
(cfay. arie_may Onifasbay_). Eshay alsoyay iscoversday atthay erhay Anishday essengermay isyay
ephewnay ofyay erhay irstfay elovedbay, owhay iedday ayay insterspay. Incesay othbay esethay oveslay
areyay ecountedray ybay oneyay ofyay eirthay actorsyay, eythay oday otnay appearyay onyay ethay urfacesay
otay avehay eenbay esbianlay, utbay erethay areyay ertainlycay onay implicationsyay otay ethay
ontrarycay. Ethay otway omenway, youngyay andyay oldyay, appearingyay inyay ethay orystay areyay othbay
omewhatsay asculinemay; ofyay eachyay airpay ofyay ovinglay omenway, oneyay evernay arriedmay; andyay
orfay eethray ofyay ethay ourfay, ethay earlyyay ariantvay ovelay eemssay otay avehay eenbay ethay
ostmay ividvay ofyay eirthay iveslay, urvivingsay arriagemay oryay otheryay iaisonslay.

Anotheryay ontributioncay omfray ethay ontinentcay asway ethay anslationtray ofyay Olette’scay
audine_clay ens’ay Avay_ asyay e_thay Innocentyay Ifeway_. Operlypray ityay isyay ourthfay inyay itsyay
eriessay, utbay ityay ackslay ethay outrightyay esbianlay elementyay ofyay ethay irdthay, ichwhay
awaitedyay ublicationpay inyay ethay ollowingfay yearyay. Allyay ethay Audineclay ovelsnay, ityay
ouldshay ebay otednay, ereway issuedyay inyay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay, ilewhay Englandyay iskedray
onay ympatheticsay eatmentstray oremay overtyay anthay osethay ofyay Eoffreygay Ossmay, ethay
otway Ichardsonsray, andyay Issmay Ackville-westsay.

Ethay emainderray ofyay ethay year’syay opcray ereway alsoyay Americanyay, otway ofyay oodgay
ualityqay. Oneyay asway Anthonyyay Orne’sthay earteninghay idyllyay, elay_day inyay ethay Unsay_,
inyay ichwhay orty-eightfay ours�hay�� uspensionsay ofyay usbay ervicesay inyay Ainspay esolvesray
ayay arietyvay ofyay emotionalyay onflictscay inyay itsyay Englishyay assengers�pay�� iveslay. Ethay
ariantvay ouplecay areyay annishmay Eanjay Orteouspay, aughterday ofyay ayay itledtay Itishbray
amilyfay andyay ayay ebelray againstyay ethay ocialsay existenceyay expectedyay ofyay erhay, andyay
Ettybay Ale-jonessay, ondeblay, elplesshay andyay utteringflay, omfray e“thay asteryplay
entilitygay ofyay Ensington.�kay�? Usthay arfay eirthay ommoncay ondbay ashay eenbay ethay
eterminationday otay escapeyay amilyfay icturesstray andyay inway ersonalpay eedomfray. Eythay
areyay erelymay oodgay ompanionscay ithway omesay entativetay otionsnay ofyay aringshay ayay atflay
inyay Ondonlay onyay eturningray omfray eirthay iptray. Enthay eirthay isitvay otay anyay emptyyay
ullbay ingray ovesmay Eanjay otay imicmay ithway artlingstay erisimilitudevay ethay Anishspay
erformerspay othbay avehay eensay.

  Inyay ethay othay Anishspay unlightsay eshay ayedplay atyay ullbay ightingfay orfay ethay akesay
  ofyay ayay ettypray irlgay inyay ayay yellowyay essdray owhay atsay inyay ethay arrera_bay_. Ayingplay
  ogethertay, eythay ockedmay ayay angerousday amegay. Andyay angerouslyday eythay enteredyay
  ayay ecretsay orldway inyay ichwhay eythay adhay osay eatgray ayay eednay ofyay eachyay other.[25yay]

Aterlay inyay ethay oonlightmay eythay isitvay ethay ower-drenchedflay ublicpay ardensgay andyay
ielay onyay ethay armway assgray, ingers“fay illstay inkedlay asyay eythay aylay ookinglay upwardsyay
intoyay ethay arklingspay y.�skay�? Enwhay eythay omecay ackbay otay ightslay andyay owdscray eythay
allfay aralyzinglypay yshay andyay areday otnay areshay eirthay ommoncay oomray andyay edbay.
Afteryay ayay estlessray ightnay apartyay, eachyay omescay otay uchmay ethay amesay onclusioncay:

  Atwhay adhay appenedhay otay emthay astlay ightnay asway omethingsay eyondbay eirthay
  ontrolcay. Enthay etlay isthay angestray orcefay ollowfay itsyay ownyay aw—letlay ityay artpay
  emthay oreverfay oryay oinjay emthay oreverfay. Ityay asway omethingsay ootay igbay orfay eirthay
  easonray, andyay ootay elicateday.... Ofyay onay useyay otay ightfay, easonray, oryay
  onder.[26way]

Andyay ityay isyay ithoutway urtherfay esolutionray ofyay eirthay oblempray atthay eythay etlay ethay
uddenly-restoredsay usbay ervicesay arrycay emthay awayyay omfray ethay enescay ofyay eirthay
inarticulateyay omanceray. Ethay authoryay ashay annilycay eftlay eachyay eaderray otay upplysay
atwhay equelsay estbay atisfiessay ishay ownyay ilosophyphay, utbay ethay ingeringlay oodmay isyay
istinctlyday oneyay ofyay armway olerancetay andyay ympathysay atherray anthay isapprovalday.

Inyay after_ay Uchsay Easuresplay_, onyay ethay otheryay andhay, Orothyday Arkerpay azesgray ethay
urfacesay ofyay ariancevay ithway ippantflay alicemay. Ethay inalfay orystay, ory“glay inyay ethay
Aytime,�day�? etchesskay ethay entativetay advancesyay ofyay ayay Ewnay Yorkyay ophisticatesay otay
ayay ewlynay arrivedyay andyay a�venay ittlelay ifeway ithway ayay assionpay orfay agestay
elebritiescay. Usingyay ethay ong-famedlay Ilylay Yntonway asyay aitbay, ethay Othamitegay
invitesyay ethay ovincialpray otay ea—totay ethay isgustday ofyay ethay atter’slay usbandhay,
owhay alwaysyay efersray otay ethay edatorypray Alliehay asyay ank�“hay�? andyay eclaresday atthay
allyay ose“thay omen�way�? akemay imhay icksay. Arry-eyedstay ithway anticipationyay, ittlelay
Mrsay. Urdockmay indsfay erhay ostesshay aloneyay, adclay inyay ouserstray andyay ilksay irtshay.
Eshay isyay elcomedway ithway ayay onglay isskay andyay ethay admonitionyay, on’t“day elltay Ily!�lay�?
Utbay ethay amousfay arstay onyay arrivalyay ovespray otay ebay iddle-agedmay, itheredway, andyay
assy-hairedbray. Eshay isyay alreadyyay ootay unkdray otay ollowfay ethay onversationcay,
emandsday andybray, andyay oonsay ozesday offyay. Mrsay. Urdockmay eaveslay inyay adsay
isillusionday, ithway ayay ewnay appreciationyay ofyay erhay astringentyay atemay, onlyyay otay
indfay atthay ehay ashay onegay outyay inyay ayay empertay orfay ethay irstfay imetay otay ursuepay ishay
ownyay endsyay.


                           Ethay Orm’sway Urningtay

Incesay ethay otaltay ountcay ofyay ariantvay itlestay inyay 1934, includingyay ethay
ensationalsay itemsyay otnay yetyay ouchedtay uponyay, ountedmay otay entay, ityay isyay otnay
urprisingsay atthay omesay ublicpay eactionray ouldshay etsay inyay. Ityay illway ebay evenyay esslay
osay afteryay ayay apidray onsiderationcay ofyay osethay omittedyay iviatray, ofyay ichwhay ithinway
asyay anymay yearsyay omesay alf-dozenhay accumulatedyay. Ecausebay ethay irstfay asway ayay
airlyfay obviousyay ebuttalray ofyay ell_way ofyay Onelinesslay_, ityay eservesday oremay
attentionyay anthay omesay othersyay. Ityay asway oveliest_lay ofyay Iendsfray_ (1931ay) ybay
Eilashay Onisthorpeday, owhay asway eputedlyray anyay Englishyay actressyay ithway ayay umbernay
ofyay otheryay omancesray otay erhay editcray, utbay itsyay erbalvay idiomyay isyay otnay Itishbray andyay
ityay asway ublishedpay onlyyay inyay Ewnay Yorkyay.

Ittenwray ithway intenseyay entimentalitysay, ityay icturespay ethay uinray ofyay Audreyyay,
introducedyay asyay ethay appyhay ifeway ofyay ayay otingday utbay edestrianpay usbandhay osewhay
obbyhay ofyay entleman-farminggay akestay imhay oftenyay outyay ofyay Ondonlay. Ethay ouple’scay
intimateyay ifelay isyay escribedday inyay omesay etailday asyay idealyay, yetyay Audreyyay isyay ivengay
otay ayingplay Opinchay inyay ethay uskday otay elieveray erhay unspentyay emotionyay. Esentlypray
eshay isyay assiduouslyyay ourtedcay ybay oyishbay, impudentyay andyay exquisitely-tailoredyay
Imkay, imilarlysay essedblay ithway ayay usbandhay owhay otesday uponyay erhay andyay allowsyay erhay
everyyay eedomfray. Im’skay owersshay ofyay iftsgay andyay assionatepay elephonetay allscay
intoxicateyay ethay inexperiencedyay Audreyyay. Althoughyay ethay irstfay attemptedyay aresscay
andyay Im’skay onfessioncay atthay eshay isyay ayay overlay ofyay omenway areyay ofoundlypray
ockingshay, Audreyyay oonsay uccumbssay ithoutway eservationray. Enthay eshay iscoversday
atthay erethay isyay ayay ormerfay elovedbay orfay osewhay ailyday etterslay Imkay atchesway
avidlyyay; extnay, eshay earnslay atthay everalsay ofyay erhay ownyay Ondonlay irclecay avehay eenbay
ovedlay andyay iscardedday ybay Imkay; inallyfay, ayay urrentcay ivalray isyay auntedflay otay
ouseray erhay ealousyjay. Isthay eapchay ondeblay Americanyay irtflay isyay ayay ansparenttray
opycay ofyay ethay ex-chorusyay irlgay inyay ell_way ofyay Onelinesslay_, ustjay asyay ayay ividvay
asephray appliedyay otay Im—“akay eadhay osay iercelyfay aliveyay ityay eemedsay elicatelyday otay
ightlay ethay airyay aroundyay it�?[27]—isyay iftedlay erbatimvay omfray ethay escriptionday ofyay
Enniferjay inyay Issmay Ehmann’slay usty_day Answeryay_.

Audreyyay endsspay everalsay eliriousday eeksway atyay ayay oreshay esortray ithway Imkay
escribed(day inyay etailday) ofyay anyay intensityyay impossibleyay otay upportsay orfay onglay,
andyay enwhay immediatelyyay afterwardyay ethay ondeblay ecapturesray Imkay ybay ethay assicclay
eviceday ofyay aradingpay ayay ival—aray epulsiveray aricaturecay ofyay ethay annishmay andyay
ofanepray esbian—audrey’slay overstrainedyay ervesnay ivegay ayway. Ayay eriodpay inyay ayay
anatoriumsay estoresray erhay emporarilytay, utbay, ackbay inyay Ondonlay againyay, eshay isyay
elplesshay againstyay erhay assionpay. Afteryay elodramaticmay incidentsyay involvingyay allyay
ourfay omenway, Audreyyay attemptsyay uicidesay, andyay ailingfay otay achieveyay erhay endyay, eshay
eaveslay omehay andyay usbandhay otay anderway, erelictday andyay outcastyay, orfay ethay estray ofyay
erhay aysday. Oseclay otay ethay endyay ethay authoryay eaksbray outyay inyay ituperationvay againstyay

  osethay owhay amorclay orfay ecognitionray ofyay ethay inistersay oupgray owhay acticepray
  ... esethay adisticsay abitshay ... ookedcray, istedtway eaksfray ofyay Aturenay owhay
  agnatestay inyay arkday andyay uddymay atersway, andyay areyay osay okedchay ithway ethay eedsway
  ofyay iciousnessvay andyay elfishsay ustlay atthay, aineddray ofyay allyay itypay, eythay
  egardray eirthay ictimsvay asyay eremay eppingstay onesstay otay eirthay urtherfay
  easureplay. Ithway ower-sweetflay ingertipsfay eythay ushcray ethay apegray ofyay evilyay
  illtay ityay isyay exquisiteyay, oothsmay andyay usciouslay otay ethay astetay, irringstay upyay
  ubconscioussay esponsivenessray, intensifyingyay allyay atthay ashay eenbay, allyay atthay
  ollowsfay, eavinglay eirthay eypray ibberinggay, ithingwray, ex-soddensay adowsshay
  ofyay eirthay ormerfay elvessay, onsciouscay ofyay onlyyay oneyay esireday inyay indmay andyay
  odybay, ichwhay, everyay esteringfay, everyay estroyingday, owlyslay apssay emthay ofyay
  ealthhay andyay anity.[28say]

Isthay effusionyay isyay anyay obviousyay etortray otay Issmay All’shay elativelyray ontrolledcay
eaplay orfay olerancetay atyay ethay endyay ofyay ell_way ofyay Onelinesslay_, andyay ethay olumevay
ivesgay everyyay evidenceyay ofyay eingbay ittenwray astilyhay otay ofitpray ybay ateverwhay
onservativecay eactionray erethay asway againstyay ethay ympathysay arousedyay amongyay ethay
iteratilay ybay Issmay All’shay effortyay.

Ethay extnay exhibityay asway omfray ethay enpay ofyay ethay Americanyay Iffanytay Ayerthay, iterwray
ofyay ear-eroticanay, andyay omprisescay oneyay apterchay inyay ishay irteen_thay Omenway_
(1932ay). Ayay agilefray eautybay inyay omwhay uritanicpay ex-repressionsay ashay inducedyay
uberculosistay isyay uicklyqay uredcay ybay anyay affairyay ithway erhay Enverday ysician’sphay
esbianlay ifeway. Ethay otway avehay inyay ommoncay ayay atredhay ofyay enmay. Ethay youngeryay
elievesbay eirthay ovelay uniqueyay andyay essedlyblay eefray ofyay ethay uncleannessyay ofyay exsay,
andyay enwhay, ackbay inyay Ewnay Yorkyay, eshay isyay awdilybay enlightenedyay ybay anyay oldyay
oolmateschay owhay isyay ownay ayay audevillevay erformerpay, eshay astesway iftlysway otay ethay
eathday erhay abortiveyay omanceray ostponedpay.

Ofyay ethay amesay alibrecay asway e_thay Establishmentyay ofyay Adamemay Antoniayay_ (1932ay) ybay
oneyay Eylalay Eorgiegay, omprisingcay ifelay etchesskay ofyay ethay inmatesyay ofyay Amburg’shay
ostmay Ite�lay ordellobay, andyay upposedlysay ecordedray ybay oneyay ofyay ethay oupgray. Earlynay
allyay ethay omenway areyay itledtay oryay omfray ethay optay evellay ofyay Europeanyay ocietysay, utbay
avehay eenbay educedray ybay alignmay ancechay. Ethay ariantvay airpay areyay ayay Ussianray
incesspray andyay ayay ewnay ecruitray omwhay eshay otectspray andyay erisheschay. Iscoveringday
atthay oughthay erhay ot�g�epray oveslay erhay, eshay isyay unableyay otay eturnray erhay assionpay,
ethay incesspray introducesyay ethay irlgay otay ayay oblemannay owhay arriesmay erhay. Atachanay
enthay ommitscay uicidesay. Ethay olewhay olumevay isyay ittlelay oremay anthay ayay
omanticizingray ofyay earlieryay oreignfay eroticayay ichwhay elebratedcay oremay eshlyflay
elationsray amongyay ostitutespray.

Ethay itletay ofyay Idabelyay Illiams’sway ellcat_hay_ (1934ay) accuratelyyay escribesday itsyay
eroinehay, owhay expendsyay erhay effortsyay onlyyay onyay uchsay ersonspay asyay eshay ancay ealstay
omfray omeonesay elseyay oryay ancay ivelay uponyay ithoutway acrificesay onyay erhay artpay. Oneyay ofyay
ethay atterlay isyay ayay esbianlay omwhay eshay ornsscay asyay onglay asyay enmay areyay andyhay, utbay
osewhay ospitalityhay eshay inallyfay exploitsyay orfay ayay onglay easonsay, eepingkay erhay
ictimvay inyay ayay onstantcay everfay ybay etendingpray anyay innocenceyay ichwhay eessay inyay
esbianslay onlyyay itfay ubjectssay orfay olicepay ourtcay oryay adhousemay.

Eraldgay Oster’sfay ange_stray Arriagemay_ (1934ay) eservesday anyay extrayay ordway ecausebay
erehay ansvestismtray asicallybay affectsyay ethay otplay orfay ethay irstfay imetay incesay
ethay antasticfay Ermangay eiberbeute_way_ ofyay 1906. Ayay irlgay, expelledyay omfray
ollegecay ustjay eforebay aduationgray, ideshay outyay inyay ayay onelylay eachbay ackshay untilyay
eshay ancay ogay omehay ithoutway evealingray erhay isgraceday. Ingledshay andyay accustomedyay
otay ouserstray eshay iveslay asyay ayay oybay orfay afetysay, utbay indsfay atthay evenyay oysbay areyay
otnay afesay omfray ethay ifeguardlay owhay eekssay erhay outyay atyay ightnay. Ehay isyay, oweverhay,
elightedday onyay iscoveringday erhay ealray exsay. Ishay asterfulmay ossessionpay ofyay erhay,
outragesyay erhay idepray, utbay erhay odybay egistersray aitoroustray omplaisancecay. Inyay ayay
uryfay ofyay ebellionray againstyay ayay oman’sway oubleday isadvantageday, eshay esolvesray otay
ivelay asyay ayay anmay. Ybay uttingpay ethay idthway ofyay ethay ontinentcay etweenbay erhay andyay erhay
astpay ifelay eshay ontrivescay otay etgay ayay ollegecay egreeday onyay ethay estway oastcay andyay ayay
objay inyay ayay awlay officeyay, ontinuingcay erhay udiesstay atyay ightnay. Enwhay ethay eniorsay
artner’spay aughterday allsfay inyay ovelay ithway erhay eshay eciprocatesray ithway armthway,
arriesmay ethay irlgay o(whay isyay innocentyay otay ayay egreeday), andyay iveslay asyay erhay usbandhay
orfay everalsay yearsyay. Enthay ethay oincidentalcay eappearanceray ofyay ethay eachbay uardgay
otnay onlyyay akesmay erhay apprehensiveyay ofyay ecognitionray utbay evivesray ethay esponseray
ehay asway ethay irstfay otay irstay. Ayay uickqay isappearanceday eaveslay erhay ifeway anyay
apparentyay idowway, andyay eshay arriesmay ethay anmay. Ethay isexualbay experienceyay erehay
eemssay oremay indebtedyay otay earlieryay Enchfray iviatray anthay otay urrentcay
ychologicalpsay eorythay, ichwhay axestay unwillingyay eflorationday ithway egativenay
atherray anthay appyhay eterosexualhay esultsray.

Asyay Ilyanlay Ock’sbray ueer_qay Atternspay_ (1935ay) ashay eenbay evivedray inyay otway
ifferentday aperboundpay editionsyay incesay 1950 andyay isyay usthay easilyyay availableyay, ayay
ortshay escriptionday illway ufficesay. Ayay usical-comedymay arstay iestray arriagemay otay
oneyay ofyay osethay erfectpay usbandshay osay usefulyay inyay accentuatingyay indelibleyay
ariantvay eaningslay. Eshay omescay ullyfay otay ifelay, oweverhay, onlyyay underyay ethay andshay
ofyay ayay ynamicday omanway irectorday ofyay erioussay amadray, ithway omwhay eshay enjoysyay otway
erfectpay yearsyay eforebay ossipgay obligesyay emthay otay artpay oryay acefay ofessionalpray
uinray. Ayay onglay illnessyay inducedyay ybay ethay eparationsay andyay ybay ayay ubsequentsay
ealthyway usband’shay ug-crazeddray iolencevay ovidespray opportunityyay orfay ayay
ainedtray ursenay otay allfay inyay ovelay ithway erhay. Ethay ursenay isyay ivendray otay uicidesay
omfray ealousyjay ofyay ethay otheryay omanway. Ethay ug-addictdray usbandhay inallyfay
anglesstray ethay arstay. Isthay isyay offeredyay asyay anyay exampleyay ofyay ineradicableyay inbornyay
ariancevay.

Uiteqay ethay ostmay elodramaticmay ofyay ethay otlay asway ale_may andyay Emalefay_ ybay Ackjay
Oodfordway (1935ay), inyay ichwhay ayay irlgay aboutyay otay ebay arriedmay ealizesray atthay erhay
omparativecay ysicalphay oolnesscay otay erhay ianc�fay� emsstay omfray ayay ithertohay
unadmittedyay attractionyay otay ayay irlgay iendfray. Ethay atterlay, ayay oodingbray introvertyay
afflictedyay ithway equentfray igrainemay, isyay uiteqay awareyay ofyay erhay ownyay eelingsfay,
andyay uststhray erselfhay etweenbay ethay airpay, afteryay eythay arrymay, ithway incredibleyay
emeritytay. Ethay youngyay ouplecay avehay ayay ormystay yearyay ichwhay ouldway avehay eckedwray
eirthay union—sinceyay ethay ifeway eferspray emininefay entlenessgay otay asculinemay
utality�“bray�? inyay ovemaking—butlay orfay eirthay occasionalyay eriodspay ofyay ecstasyyay
enwhay ethay interloperyay isyay aidlay owlay ybay erhay onicchray ailmentyay. Ityay inallyfay
appearsyay atthay isthay iend�“fray�? isyay irtuallyvay ayay itchway a(ay ictionalfay owbackthray
ofyay ayay ullfay illenniummay). Inyay odernmay ermstay, eshay exercisesyay omesay ypnotichay
owerpay overyay ethay ifeway evenyay atyay eatgray istancesday. Incesay, oweverhay, eshay isyay otnay
evilyay atyay earthay, eshay inallyfay ommitscay uicidesay inyay ayay urningbay ousehay ybay ayway ofyay
endingyay erhay ownyay unhappinessyay andyay effectivelyyay erminatingtay erhay atefulfay
influenceyay.

Irtuallyvay ethay astlay itemyay ofyay isthay ortsay omfray ethay ointpay ofyay ateday asway Awengay
Ownrigg’sbray ar_stay Againstyay Arstay_ (1936ay), etendingpray otay Itishbray
authorshipyay, utbay, ikelay oveliest_lay ofyay Iendsfray_, ittenwray inyay Americanyay idiomyay.
Ityay apesyay ell_way ofyay Onelinesslay_ oselyclay inyay itsyay ependenceday uponyay inheritanceyay
andyay ildhoodchay onditioningcay, utbay inyay isthay asecay Orcasday esemblesray ayay
ot-bloodedhay othermay owhay ashay adhay anymay alemay overslay andyay owhay irtuallyvay
educessay erhay ownyay aughterday atyay ethay ageyay ofyay inenay oryay entay. Ayay yearyay inyay ayay Isssway
oardingbay oolschay enwhay eshay isyay ixteensay endsyay ithway ethay expulsionyay ofyay Orcasday
andyay erhay isexualbay Americanyay oommateray orfay esbianlay intimacyyay. Otway effortsyay atyay
affairsyay ithway enmay eavelay Orcasday oldcay, andyay omfray oneyay anmay eshay artspay ecausebay
ehay eaksspay ithway ontemptcay ofyay ezzies.�“lay�? Aterlay, inyay Arispay, eshay eetsmay ayay
eautifulbay ovelistnay alreadyyay enownedray atyay enty-sixtway, andyay ithinway
enty-fourtway ourshay ethay infatuatedyay airpay achieveyay ompletecay intimacyyay. Eythay
eturnray otay ivelay orfay ayay imetay inyay Englandyay; oweverhay, eythay encounteryay atyay onceyay
ethay amesay ocialsay isapprobationday eythay adhay etmay amongyay ethay Itishbray ontingentcay
evenyay onyay ethay ive_ray auchegay_. Ayay iterarylay iticcray arnsway Orcasday, oreovermay,
atthay eshay illway ebay ealousjay ofyay Onsuelo’scay orkway, andyay atthay emotionalyay eleaseray
aymay avehay anyay adverseyay effectyay uponyay ethay atter’slay eativecray owers—anpay
interestingyay inversionyay ofyay Issmay All’shay attributingyay Ephenstay Ordon’sgay
erilitystay otay acklay ofyay uchsay eleaseray. Othbay edictionspray ovepray allyay ootay
accurateyay, andyay ethay unionyay oesgay ompletelycay onyay ethay ocksray ithinway ayay attermay ofyay
onthsmay. Orthlessway asyay ityay isyay artisticallyyay, ethay ovelnay essesstray ayay etailday
eviouslypray intedhay onlyyay inyay at_thay Otheryay Ovelay_: ityay isyay ethay youngeryay irlgay owhay
isruptsday anyay olderyay oman’sway ellway adjustedyay andyay uccessfulsay ifelay. Alsoyay evilyay
uitfray omfray evenyay ompletelycay appyhay ysicalphay expressionyay isyay atyay oddsyay ithway ethay
Eudianfray eorythay ichwhay ethay authoryay elsewhereyay akesmay owshay ofyay acceptingyay.

Ethay inalfay airpay ofyay alestay avehay eenbay eftlay untilyay astlay ecausebay ofyay eirthay
irectday earingbay onyay ensorshipcay effortsyay ichwhay otgay underyay ayway uringday 1934 andyay
1935. Oneyay asway ove_lay Ikelay ayay Adowshay_, ichwhay, althoughyay ittenwray underyay ethay
amenay ofyay Oislay Odgelay, exhibitsyay anymay ofyay ethay aracteristicschay ofyay alemay
authorshipyay istedlay earlieryay inyay iscussingday eroticyay itingwray. Ofyay ethay ollegecay
inyay ichwhay ityay eginsbay, ityay eportsray ull“bay essions�say�? ofyay asscray ulgarityvay, awray
ettingpay artiespay andyay assignationsyay afteryay ancesday, andyay esbianlay alliancesyay
eptkay onlyyay ightlyslay undercoveryay. Inyay ayay Ewnay Yorkyay esidenceray ubclay ayay urgeoningbay

irls—childrengay underyay en—whomtay eshay ashay alreadyyay artedstay onyay ethay athpay otay
Esboslay, andyay ayay arietyvay ofyay ee-livingfray artistsyay, entertainersyay, andyay Arkpay
Avenueyay ensation-seekerssay. Ethay eroinehay, Eanjay, isyay antagonisticyay owardstay enmay
ecausebay ofyay erhay ather’sfay auntedflay infidelitiesyay; anotheryay irlgay, ecausebay eshay

otchscay ueer�“qay�? ossipgay inyay ayay idwesternmay omehay owntay; andyay erhay econdsay ovespray

Isthay itletay adhay ayay ignificantsay ublishingpay istoryhay. Inyay 1938 ethay amesay irmfay

ethay iperssnay.

Otay ebay uresay, ariantvay ictionfay asway otnay aloneyay inyay itsyay amboyanceflay, ornay asway ityay
aloneyay underyay attackyay. Ethay eterosexualhay anknessfray inyay orksway ofyay ighhay ualityqay
uringday ethay entiestway adhay eenbay ollowedfay ybay esserlay andyay esserlay effortsyay, andyay

epresentedray inyay ayay andfulhay ofyay ubiousday olumesvay ulminatingcay inyay arlet_scay
Ansypay_. On-fictionnay alsoyay ooktay advantageyay ofyay ethay openyay arketmay ithway astilyhay
ennedpay olumesvay onyay exualsay ychologypsay andyay erversionspay, andyay evivalsray oryay ewnay
anslationstray ofyay Afft-ebingkray, Ekelstay, andyay esserlay ightslay ofyay ethay ecedingpray
alf-centuryhay. Ayay opcray ofyay ort-livedshay esses—“eugenic,�pray�? anthropological�“ay�?
andyay ysicians�?—sprang“phay upyay otay ofitpray ybay ethay openyay easonsay. Eactionray asway
inevitableyay. Incesay earlieryay attlesbay otay eventpray ublicationpay adhay, asyay eway avehay
eensay, eenbay ostlay inyay isthay ountrycay, ensoringcay oupsgray ownay ainedtray eirthay unsgay
uponyay alessay agenciesyay ereverwhay eythay adhay ufficientsay influenceyay. Inyay oneyay itycay
ayay inglesay alesay ofyay ayay acklistedblay itemyay ightmay aylay ayay ooksellerbay openyay otay
osecutionpray andyay eizuresay ofyay allyay ontrabandcay ockstay. Inyay anotheryay, upplyingsay ayay

adhay otay eeksay anityvay ublishingpay.


                             Aboveyay Eproachray

Ariantvay ictionfay ofyay ualityqay, oweverhay, ufferedsay onay eryvay eatgray eckchay. Inyay
1935, orfay instanceyay, isthay ountrycay awsay ethay ublicationpay ofyay otway ympatheticsay
anslationstray, Istachray Insloe’sway irl_gay Aloneyay_ andyay Olette’scay e_thay
Indulgentyay Usbandhay_, andyay alsoyay ofyay Alegay Ilhelm’sway e_way Ootay Areyay Iftingdray_.
Isthay astlay asway ayay iefbray irstfay ovelnay ybay ayay youngyay omanway icturedpay anklyfray onyay
ethay ustday acketjay asyay ingledshay andyay ailoredtay, owhay asway ayay ylisticstay iscipleday
ofyay Ernestyay Emingwayhay y(bay enthay ayay ajormay influenceyay). Erhay osepray adhay ayay eanlay
economyyay orthyway ofyay erhay astermay, andyay ethay udginggray acclaimyay erhay ovelnay
eceivedray ouldway ertainlycay avehay eenbay armerway andyay oremay oluminousvay exceptyay orfay
erhay ubjectsay.

Erhay entralcay igurefay isyay Anjay Oralemay, anyay artistyay ofyay irtythay osewhay oodcutsway
avehay alreadyyay eritedmay ayay one-manyay owingshay. An’sjay ildhoodchay asway inchedpay andyay
ordidsay; ethay otherbray owhay alwaysyay idhay ehindbay erhay irtsskay endedyay ybay eingbay
angedhay; andyay eshay erselfhay ightmay avehay arvedstay asyay ayay inter’spray evilday utbay orfay
ayay elpinghay andhay omfray ethay establishedyay ulptorscay Etkinklay. Ehay ouldway ikelay otay
arrymay erhay, utbay ecognizesray atthay onay anmay ancay opehay otay ossesspay erhay. Orfay eshay
isyay ethay odelmay orfay ishay ize-winningpray ermaphroditus_hay_, andyay isyay oremay
onvincinglycay asculinemay inyay emperamenttay anthay evenyay Issmay All’shay Ephenstay
Ordongay. Ethay isgracedday otherbray asway erhay intway, andyay effeminateyay, ichwhay
impliesyay eredityhay asyay ethay ausecay ofyay erhay ariancevay. Atyay ethay openingyay ofyay ethay
orystay Anjay isyay entangledyay ithway ayay ocietysay eautybay owhay ashay aisedray aritalmay
eceptionday otay ayay inefay artyay inyay ethay interestsyay ofyay erhay edatorypray esbianlay
abitshay. Anjay ashay eenbay onay oremay anthay ysicallyphay aptivatedcay; eshay isyay alreadyyay
estiveray, andyay ensiontay increasesyay enwhay eshay allsfay omanticallyray inyay ovelay ithway
ethay erenesay innocenceyay ofyay Ictoriavay, ustjay outyay ofyay ollegecay andyay ivinglay ithway
erhay onventionalcay uburbansay amilyfay. An’sjay eticulousmay estraintray inyay efusingray
otay eepsway ethay youngeryay irlgay offyay erhay eetfay, andyay ethay owslay evelopmentday ofyay
eirthay ompletecay intimacyyay, areyay esentedpray elicatelyday utbay ithoutway evasionyay.
Ethay elationshipray urvivessay ethay arriedmay oman’sway ealousjay effortsyay otay estroyday
ityay andyay ersistspay orfay ayay imetay, utbay ithway increasingyay ainstray. Orfay Anjay oldshay otay
ayay ifelonglay uleray againstyay intrudingyay erhay ohemianbay eccentricityyay uponyay
onventionalcay ouseholdshay, andyay Ictoriavay indsfay equentfray absencesyay ardhay otay
explainyay atyay omehay. Ictoriavay isyay anyay onlyyay ildchay otnay onlyyay ovedlay utbay ovinglay,
ithway allyay ethay iantplay assivitypay ofyay Erenavay Arranttay inyay e_thay Ostoniansbay_. Inyay
erhay acidplay ifelay ethay eednay orfay evasionyay oryay ugglestray ashay evernay eforebay
arisenyay, andyay eythay areyay alienyay otay erhay ownay. Ereforethay ethay otway irls�gay��
ong-nursedlay ansplay orfay ayay olidayhay ogethertay ogay ownday eforebay ayay uddenlysay
ojectedpray amilyfay iptray. Anjay, urtivelyfay iddenhay, ustmay atchway ayay
anscontinentaltray aintray ullpay outyay earingbay erhay elovedbay, accompaniedyay ybay erhay
arentspay andyay ethay ice“nay oy�bay�? eythay ishway erhay otay arrymay. Erehay againyay, asyay inyay
ar_stay Againstyay Arstay_, ethay olderyay andyay ell-establishedway omanway isyay ethay oneyay otay
uffersay omfray ayay onsumingcay intimacyyay.

Ethay Itishbray ontributioncay ofyay ethay yearyay asway ayay iefbray ectionsay ofyay Ancisfray
Ettbray Young’syay ite_whay Adieslay_, inyay ichwhay ethay ownay amiliarfay atternpay ofyay
egiment_ray ofyay Omenway_ isyay iscernibleday. Ellabay, escendedday omfray otway
enerationsgay ofyay independentyay andyay assionatepay omenway andyay irtuallyvay orphanedyay,

astlay asyay

  ayay adedfay iddlemay agedyay omanway ofyay imperiousyay andyay uncertainyay empertay,
  atheticallypay ursingnay anyay illusionyay ofyay emancipatedyay youthyay andyay eedomfray andyay
  aringday inyay atwhay asway eallyray ethay aridyay ifelay ofyay ayay onfirmedcay oldyay aid.[32may]

Aterlay, inyay ethay ompanycay ofyay ayay anmay eshay oveslay, Ellabay eetsmay Issmay Ashcay onyay ethay
eetstray ithway anotheryay orshipfulway youngyay irlgay andyay ecognizesray ayay inistersay
elementyay inyay esethay onsumingcay attachmentsyay. Enwhay ethay anmay observesyay atthay
oughthay ethay oolmistressschay ashay ethay acefay ofyay anyay oldyay omanway eshay illstay ovesmay
ikelay ayay irlgay, Ellabay epliesray atthay eshay isyay agelessyay ecausebay eshay isyay ayay ampirevay,
ivinglay onyay youngyay oodblay. Eithernay ofyay ethay omenway erehay appearsyay atyay allyay
asculinemay, oughthay Issmay Ashcay isyay ayay eministfay andyay ayay an-hatermay andyay Ellabay ashay
ayay an’smay acticalpray intelligenceyay andyay ivedray. Ella’sbay oveslay areyay ubstitutessay
orfay amilyfay iestay, andyay ethay olderyay omanway isyay againyay ethay egotistyay inyay eednay ofyay
onstantcay adulationyay.

Inyay 1936 Osamondray Ehmannlay immedskay ariancevay eetinglyflay inyay eather_way inyay ethay
Eetsstray_ ithway ayay ialogueday etweenbay ayay ivorceeday ofyay oyishbay appearanceyay andyay erhay
one-timeyay oolmateschay owhay ainlyplay ashay uspicionssay aboutyay ethay ausecay ofyay erhay
aritalmay ifficulties;[33day] ethay uspicionssay areyay, oweverhay, unfoundedyay. Arciamay
Avenportday avegay erhay imapray onnaday inyay of_ay Enalay Eyergay_ ustjay uchsay ayay aithfulfay
adoreryay asyay Allieyay Entworthway inyay Uneker’shay atiricsay ainted_pay Eilsvay_, utbay eshay
isyay arefulcay otay ecifyspay atthay oughthay ossipgay attributedyay ayay esbianlay olorcay otay
ethay elationshipray ityay asway actuallyyay ameless.[34blay] one(ay uspectssay atthay erethay
aymay avehay eenbay ivinglay odelsmay orfay othbay authors�yay�� ouplescay ofyay ingersay andyay
atellitesay inyay ethay Ewnay Yorkyay usicalmay orldway ofyay ethay earlyyay enturycay.)

Ethay year’syay ostmay importantyay itemyay asway ethay Itishbray editionyay e(thay Americanyay
ollowedfay inyay 1937) ofyay ightwood_nay_ ybay Unadjay Arnesbay, ayay youngyay Americanyay ofyay
ethay Arispay oupgray ofyay expatriatesyay ollowingfay oremay oryay esslay inyay ethay iterarylay
ootstepsfay ofyay Ertrudegay Einstay andyay Amesjay Oycejay. Ortunatelyfay Issmay Arnes’sbay
orkway isyay intelligibleyay ithoutway ayay eykay, erhay inshipkay eingbay erhapspay oserclay
ithway Tay. Say. Eliotyay, owhay otewray ethay efacepray orfay isthay, erhay irstfay ull-lengthfay
arrativenay. Onyay initialyay eadingray, ethay irstfay undredhay agespay ofyay ightwood_nay_
aymay eemsay onlyyay ayay owdedcray anvascay ofyay iguresfay omanticray inyay eirthay eccentricityyay
andyay inkedlay ybay ittlelay avesay Eftlay Ankbay eographygay. Aduallygray oneyay erceivespay
atthay eirthay ualday axisyay isyay ayay airpay ofyay youngyay omenway, oneyay anyay Americanyay. Oranay
Oodflay ownsyay ayay ecayingday omesteadhay earnay enoughyay Ewnay Yorkyay otay ebay owdedcray,
eneverwhay eshay isyay erethay, ithway ethay iftedgay ohemiansbay erhay ospitalityhay
elcomesway. Ethay enescay ofyay ightwood_nay_, oweverhay, isyay ainlymay Arispay, erewhay Oranay
actsyay asyay ublicitypay agentyay orfay ayay allsmay ircuscay. Ofyay ethay enigmaticyay Obinray Otevay,
owhay ovesmay oughthray ethay orystay inyay ayay indkay ofyay omnambulismsay, oneyay earnslay ittlelay
avesay atthay ometimessay eshay eaksbray absentlyyay intoyay agmentsfray ofyay ebasedday ongsay
inyay anyyay ofyay ayay alf-dozenhay anguageslay, andyay exhibitsyay ayay ompulsivecay esbianlay
omiscuitypray, ethay otway ogethertay uggestingsay ayay ubiousday ackgroundbay. Atyay entytway
eshay iftsdray intoyay arriagemay ithway ayay ealthyway Ewjay, utbay ildbirthchay akesway erhay
iolentlyvay otay ethay owledgeknay atthay eithernay arriagemay ornay otherhoodmay isyay
olerabletay otay erhay.

Eshay andyay Oranay areyay awndray otay oneyay anotheryay onyay ightsay, anderway aboutyay ethay
ontinentcay appilyhay ogethertay, andyay ettlesay orfay omesay yearsyay inyay Arispay. Utbay
Obinray isyay increasinglyyay involvedyay inyay ansienttray ontactscay, oughthay eshay ufferssay
emthay ithoutway olitionvay andyay isyay appyhay onlyyay onyay eturnray otay Oranay. Enthay ayay adingfay
andyay eedygray idowway apturescay andyay attemptsyay otay oldhay erhay, andyay Obinray isyay osay orntay
etweenbay erhay otway emotionalyay olespay atthay erhay alwaysyay ecariouspray abilitystay isyay
estroyedday. Ethay occasionyay ofyay Ora’snay irstfay eetingmay erhay asway ayay ircuscay
erformancepay omfray ichwhay ethay irlgay edflay inyay inarticulateyay anicpay ecausebay ethay
animalsyay ereway agneticallymay awndray otay erhay idesay ofyay eirthay agescay, andyay ayay
ionesslay etchedstray awspay oughthray ethay arsbay andyay ixedfay erhay ith“way immingbray
eyesyay ofyay ove.�lay�? Ethay ookbay endsyay ithway Ora’snay acingtray Obin’sray inalfay eadlonghay
ightflay omfray Arispay otay erhay ownyay Americanyay ountrycay aceplay, erewhay eshay indsfay ethay
erangedday irlgay engagedyay inyay oeticallypay eautifulbay utbay ine-chillingspay ayplay
ithway Ora’snay eatgray ogday. Ethay olumevay in_ay ototay_ isyay ayay agictray osepray oempay ofyay
ethay ost—alllay osethay osewhay olesay ierm�tay isyay instinctyay andyay emotionyay, isfitmay andyay
outcastyay inyay ayay ulturecay osewhay awlay isyay ocialsay egimentationray.

Erceptiblypay elatedray inyay ylestay, althoughyay arfay inferioryay inyay artistryyay, isyay
Elenhay Anderson’syay ity_pay orfay Omenway_ (1937ay). Inyay isthay orystay, anyay
over-sensitiveyay otherlessmay irlgay attemptsyay otay akemay erhay ayway aloneyay inyay Ewnay
Yorkyay, ivinglay inyay ayay esidenceray ubclay oremay inistersay inyay itsyay inbredyay ysteriahay
anthay anyyay oman’sway ollegecay ormitoryday. Ethay ystericalhay anifestationsmay areyay
otnay onlyyay ariancevay utbay ethay ecklessray ugglesstray ofyay olderyay irlsgay otay apturecay
enmay. Ethay ind“blay ates�day�? otay ichwhay Annyay ubmitssay, ethay inkingdray andyay
omiscuitypray andyay aftermathsyay ofyay abortionyay andyay uicidesay ichwhay eshay eessay amongyay
erhay ousemateshay, osay ickensay erhay atthay enwhay eshay acquiresyay ayay oommateray otay
assuageyay erhay onelinesslay, eshay ingsclay otay ethay oolcay andyay erenesay Elizabethyay asyay ayay
aviorsay. Ethay otway irlsgay enjoyyay ayay eriodpay ofyay innocentyay iendshipfray eciouspray otay
othbay, utbay ityay isyay eopardizedjay enwhay anyay olderyay omanway alvanizesgay Elizabethyay
intoyay assionatepay ensiontay. Isthay imperiousyay Udithjay oonsay ingsbray Annyay alsoyay
underyay erhay ellspay. Eshay enthay opsdray ethay oremay ontainedcay Elizabethyay, andyay akestay
Annyay asyay erhay ousematehay outsideyay ethay ubclay. Isthay ovemay estrangesyay ethay otway irlsgay
andyay alsoyay erminatestay ayay omisingpray acquaintanceyay etweenbay Annyay andyay ethay oneyay anmay
osewhay ompanycay eshay ashay eenbay ableyay otay enjoyyay.

Erethay isyay atyay irstfay ethay usualyay eriodpay ofyay oneymoonhay ecstasyyay etweenbay ethay otway
ousemateshay utbay enthay itbay ybay itbay Annyay iecespay ogethertay Udith’sjay owdedcray
istoryhay, oneyay onlyyay otay avehay eenbay expectedyay, utbay ostratingpray otay ethay a�venay
Annyay. Eshay isyay articularlypay akenshay ybay ethay orystay ofyay Udith’sjay earestday ovelay, ayay
irlgay asyay youngyay asyay erselfhay, osewhay arriagemay orfay ethay akesay ofyay ayay ildchay ovedray
Udithjay otay attemptyay uicidesay. Eshay alsoyay ufferssay omfray eirthay ocialsay isolationyay,
ichwhay isyay ompletecay avesay orfay Udith’sjay illstay adoringyay olderyay iendsfray. Onay ewnay
ontactscay onyay Ann’syay artpay areyay ermittedpay. Omfray anyay agonyyay ofyay ealousyjay Annyay
astesway osay alarminglyyay atthay Udithjay, otay eassureray erhay, oesgay oughthray ayay
eciesspay ofyay arriagemay eremonycay, usingyay ethay amiliarfay assagepay omfray ethay ook_bay
ofyay Uthray_. Utbay isthay esturegay isyay orseway anthay utilefay. Ann’syay atestay ashay eenbay
inducedyay otnay ybay eednay ofyay ermanencepay utbay ybay unconsciousyay errortay ofyay ityay, ichwhay
arredway ithway erhay assionpay. Asyay eshay eelsfay ethay ettersfay osingclay, erhay indmay
ivesgay ayway. Ofyay ethay eethray omenway epictedday, Udithjay isyay anyay innateyay omosexualhay
andyay ethay otway youngeryay irlsgay areyay ivertedday omfray ormalnay orbitsyay ybay ontactcay
ithway erhay. Elizabethyay ashay aminastay enoughyay otay egainray erhay alancebay, althoughyay
adhay eshay emainedray Udith’sjay oicechay ethay outcomeyay ustmay avehay eenbay ubiousday. Ethay
immatureyay andyay unstableyay Annyay isyay eckedwray eyondbay opehay ofyay ecoveryray.

Afteryay esethay otway udiesstay, ultra-modernyay inyay annermay andyay omewhatsay orbidmay inyay
ubstancesay, otay eadray Elisabethyay Aigin’scray either_ay isyay Ovelay_ (1937ay) isyay otay
epstay ackbay intoyay anotheryay enturycay. Ethay almostyay expositoryyay arrativenay ovesmay
againstyay ayay ackgroundbay inyay ichwhay orseshay illstay ovidepray ethay eansmay ofyay
ansportationtray, andyay erethay isyay ittlelay otay indicateyay atthay ityay isyay otnay ethay
iscreetlyday isguisedday autobiographyyay ichwhay ityay aimsclay otay ebay. Indeedyay itsyay
osepray ylestay uggestssay anyay alreadyyay establishedyay eputationray inyay ieldsfay ofyay
on-fictionnay. Ityay overscay ayay ecadeday inyay ethay ifelay ofyay itsyay authoryay, eginningbay
ithway erhay atelay entiestway. Anyay employeeyay ofyay ethay ederalfay overnmentgay, eshay isyay
ingledsay outyay ybay ayay youngeryay olleaguecay owhay owsshay erhay ethay allsmay attentionsyay
ormallynay offeredpray ybay ayay anmay. Asyay ethay acquaintanceyay evelopsday, itsyay emotionalyay
onetay isturbsday Elisabethyay, owhay ecognizesray ityay asyay atwhay ouldway ordinarilyyay ebay
alledcay alling“fay inyay ove.�lay�? owever(hay, asyay eshay explainsyay, inyay ethay Unitedyay
Atesstay atyay atthay imetay ethay onlyyay availableyay iteraturelay onyay ychologypsay asway
ittenwray ybay Illiamway Amesjay; Afft-ebingkray andyay Avelockhay Ellisyay ereway arelybay
eardhay ofyay, andyay evenyay ethay eminismfay ofyay Oliveyay Einerschray andyay Ellenyay Eykay asway
only“ay orfay ethay eryvay emancipated.�yay�?) Orfay otway yearsyay ethay airpay ugglestray
againstyay ircumstancecay, ethay eednay orfay ecrecysay, andyay eirthay ownyay increasingyay
assionpay. Otay ethay youngyay Achelray, ethay experienceyay ofyay ariantvay if(ay otnay esbianlay)
ovelay isyay otnay ollywhay ewnay. Eretoforehay erhay iendsfray avehay eenbay attractedyay ybay
erhay oyishnessbay, utbay ownay Elisabethyay isyay averseyay otay anyyay avestytray ofyay ayay
eterosexualhay elationray. Eirsthay ustmay ebay anyay onesthay ovelay etweenbay otway omenway.
Inallyfay omesay onthsmay ogethertay abroadyay ivegay emthay ayay ypicaltay interludeyay ofyay
ompletecay andyay erfectpay unionyay.

Enthay amilyfay omplicationscay eparatesay emthay, andyay ethay iefbray eriodspay eythay ancay
atchsnay ogethertay areyay everedfay ybay ethay effortyay otay owdcray ootay uchmay ardoryay intoyay
ootay ittlelay imetay. Uringday ayay onglay etchstray ithway ethay idthway ofyay ethay Atlanticyay
etweenbay emthay, Achelray allsfay ackbay intoyay erhay youthfulyay atternpay ofyay espondingray
otay ethay ynamicday eactionray eshay involuntarilyyay ousesray inyay otheryay omenway. Isthay
infidelityyay otay atwhay isyay illstay erhay eatgray ovelay inducesyay osslay ofyay aithfay inyay
erselfhay, andyay inallyfay eshay ufferssay osay acuteyay ayay ensesay ofyay uiltgay atthay eshay
urnstay againstyay allyay ysicalphay expressionyay andyay ollowsfay ethay eadlay ofyay ayay ewnay
iendfray a(ay ysticmay enamoredyay ofyay elf-abnegationsay) intoyay ethay urchchay. Elisabethyay
ouldcay avehay oregonefay intimacyyay ifyay atthay asway equiredray otay eservepray eirthay
iendshipfray; utbay Achel’sray etroactiveray onvictioncay atthay eirthay olewhay
associationyay asway ongwray eemssay otay erhay eershay acrilegesay. Eshay eelsfay atthay ethay
Achelray ownknay otay erhay isyay eadday, andyay ayay ecadeday assespay eforebay eshay isyay ableyay otay
enteryay uponyay anotheryay emotionalyay elationshipray.

Isthay econdsay ovelay isyay eterosexualhay, andyay ethay otheryay alfhay ofyay ethay olumevay

  Iyay oday otnay evenyay ownay understandyay ethay expressionyay inful�“say�? asyay Iyay earhay ityay inyay
  onnectioncay ithway ovelay etweenbay omenway.... Iyay ouldshay inkthay insay asway
