Ineteen-thirty-ninenay awsay ethay ublicationpay ofyay otway issimilarday ovelsnay, ethay
Americanyay andyay anonymousyay iana_,[40_day] andyay omise_pray ofyay Ovelay_ ybay ayay ewnay
Englishyay authoryay, Arymay Enaultray. Ofyay ethay atterlay, ethay ainmay emethay isyay ethay
ugglestray ofyay ayay ursenay andyay ayay aboratorylay athologistpay otay orkway outyay
atisfactorysay eterosexualhay elationsray againstyay ethay oddsyay ofyay ospitalhay
isciplineday andyay ofyay eirthay individualyay omosexualhay interestsyay. Ivianvay oselyclay
esemblesray ayay otherbray ofyay uncommonyay armchay, irresistibleyay otay othbay exessay utbay
isinclinedday otay aketay ishay elationsray ithway eitheryay eriouslysay. Usthay Icmay, owhay
ashay enjoyedyay ayay ansienttray intimacyyay ithway ethay otherbray andyay eensay ishay interestyay
adefay, isyay aryway ofyay allowingyay Ivianvay anyyay oldhay uponyay imhay. Eshay, orfay erhay artpay,
isyay eingbay acefullygray ourtedcay ybay ayay ellowfay ursenay, alltay, ailoredtay andyay
ebonairday, andyay erethay areyay iscreetday intimationsyay ofyay erhay omentarilymay
uccumbingsay. Oneyay ofyay ethay actorsfay incliningyay Ivianvay owardtay Icmay isyay Olonna’scay
uddensay andyay uchmay eeperday attachmentyay otay ayay ewnay upervisorsay ofyay ursesnay, andyay ethay
ompletenesscay ofyay isthay onnectioncay andyay ethay erilouspay ofessionalpray isksray ityay
entailsyay areyay eftlay inyay onay oubtday. Ivian’svay owinggray intimacyyay ithway Icmay
arrowlynay escapesyay isasterday enwhay, inyay ayay iritspay ofyay eviltryday, eshay essesdray inyay
en’smay othesclay andyay etsgay ethay abruptyay andyay utalbray eactionray ethay experimentyay
invitesyay. Inyay ethay endyay, ethay otway eatherway allyay ormsstay andyay arrymay. Ethay
upervisorsay alsoyay acceptsyay ayay alemay uitorsay, andyay Olonnacay isyay eftlay otay acefay ethay
actfay atthay asyay eshay owsgray olderyay erhay Aupinmay osepay illway ebay esslay ecomingbay andyay
erhay onquestscay ewerfay.

iana_day_ isyay anyay autobiographyyay almostyay ofyay ethay ue“tray onfession�cay�? ypetay, oughthay
ityay arriedcay ayay efacepray ybay Dray. Ictorvay Obinsonray endorsingyay atyay eastlay itsyay
ubjectivesay authenticityyay. Ianaday owsgray upyay ethay onlyyay irlgay inyay ayay ouseholdhay ofyay
othersbray andyay eshay isyay eryvay oseclay otay erhay atherfay untilyay ishay eathday. Enwhay inyay
earlyyay adolescenceyay eshay allsfay inyay ovelay ithway ayay ighhay oolschay umchay andyay
ecognizesray erhay eelingsfay asyay osethay ofyay ayay oybay, erhay eactionray isyay oneyay ofyay ameshay
otnay alleviatedyay ybay anyay olderyay other’sbray introducingyay erhay otay ethay orksway ofyay
Avelockhay Ellisyay. Inyay ollegecay eshay avoidsyay iendshipsfray ithway omenway andyay evadesyay
oneyay irl’sgay advancesyay ybay etendingpray ignoranceyay. Elightedday otay indfay ethay
attentionsyay ofyay ayay alemay aduategray udentstay acceptableyay, eshay isyay engagedyay otay imhay
orfay ayay ouplecay ofyay yearsyay, utbay anyay unsuccessfulyay ialtray ofyay intimacyyay eliminatesyay
arriagemay omfray erhay uturefay ansplay.

Uringday ayay yearyay ofyay udystay abroadyay, initiationyay ybay anotheryay Americanyay irlgay owsshay
erhay erewhay erhay ulfillmentfay ieslay; isthay ontactcay, oweverhay, isyay okenbray atyay onceyay
ybay ethay eappearanceray ofyay anyay earlieryay ameflay ofyay erhay ewnay iendfray. Oundedway andyay
angryyay, Ianaday isyay iperay orfay ayay esslay ophisticatedsay allianceyay ithway ayay irlgay owhay
isyay ockedshay ybay esbianismlay andyay efusesray otay ecognizeray anythingyay ofyay ityay inyay
eirthay ovelay. Enwhay intimacyyay inallyfay evelopsday, ityay isyay otnay ootay atisfactorysay,
incesay Ane’sjay uplesscray ecludepray anyyay intelligentyay effortyay onyay erhay artpay otay
eetmay Iana’sday eedsnay. Everthelessnay, ethay otway attemptyay orfay ayay yearyay otay ivelay
ogethertay afteryay eirthay eturnray otay ethay Atesstay. Inyay ethay omen’sway ollegecay erewhay
Ianaday eachestay, eirthay oomingray off-campusyay irsstay osay uchmay ossipgay atthay orfay
ethay extnay yearyay Ianaday ustmay oosechay etweenbay Anejay andyay erhay ositionpay.

Iana’sday econdsay onscientiouscay effortyay, inyay ayay oeducationalcay ollegecay, otay
ecomebay interestedyay inyay enmay isyay unsuccessfulyay. Omewhatsay aterlay eshay indsfay ayay
youngyay omanway aduategray udentstay ithway omwhay eshay achievesyay appinesshay afteryay ayay
eriodpay ofyay eticulousmay estraintray eminiscentray ofyay e_way Ootay Areyay Iftingdray_.
Uspensesay isyay uppliedsay ybay Eslie’slay other’smay enouncingday ethay airpay andyay
isowningday erhay aughterday, andyay ybay ethay eappearanceray ofyay Anejay, owhay attemptsyay otay
apturecay Eslielay outyay ofyay antonway itespay. Ianaday andyay Eslielay areyay osay eminentlyyay
uitedsay otay oneyay anotheryay, oweverhay, atthay eythay inallyfay omecay oughthray evenyay oremay
oselyclay unitedyay. Isthay arrativenay isyay ertainlycay onay iterarylay asterpiecemay, andyay
erhapspay itsyay ongeststray ointpay isyay Iana’sday onesthay analysisyay alongyay ethay ayway ofyay
ethay argumentsyay againstyay, atherray anthay orfay, erhay osenchay ayway ofyay ifelay. Incesay
omosexualshay eednay otnay earfay egnancypray oryay assumeyay esponsibilityray orfay ayay omehay
andyay amilyfay, eythay areyay eefray otay akemay andyay eakbray onnectionscay ightly.[41lay]
Onlyyay uetray ympathysay, oyaltylay, andyay edicationday otay eirthay unionsyay ancay estrainray
emthay omfray atchingsnay atyay acilefay atisfactionsay, andyay umanhay aturenay eingbay atwhay
ityay isyay, onay esbianlay allianceyay ashay oremay engthstray anthay ethay eakerway ofyay itsyay otway
artnerspay. Esethay observationsyay areyay otnay articularlypay originalyay, ofyay oursecay,
avinghay oftenyay enoughyay eenbay emonstratedday ybay exampleyay inyay ayay alfhay entury’scay
ictionfay. Evenyay ethay eceptspray emselvesthay adhay appearedyay ybay 1939 inyay ayay oodgay
anymay ortatoryhay anualsmay ofyay exsay ychologypsay. Eretoforehay, oweverhay, eythay ereway
oicedvay ybay enuousstray opponentsyay ofyay omosexualhay intimacyyay. Orfay ayay efenderday otay
esentpray emthay ithway oolcay ogiclay, andyay, inyay itespay ofyay emthay, otay ustifyjay ethay
alculatedcay iskray, arksmay anyay advanceyay inyay ychologicalpsay erspectivepay incesay
Adclyfferay All’shay ollywhay emotionalyay eaplay orfay olerancetay ayay ecadeday earlieryay.


                          Anotheryay Ar’sway Adowshay

Orfay ethay extnay eethray yearsyay ethay eoccupationspray ofyay ar—plusway ethay aperpay
ortage—crowdedshay ariantvay ictionfay almostyay ompletelycay omfray ethay arketmay, andyay
evenyay afteryay eadersray andyay ublisherspay onceyay oremay ithay ayay odifiedmay idestray, ethay
ulkbay ofyay uchsay ictionfay emainedray ondemnatorycay orfay ethay estray ofyay ethay ecadeday.
Angelayay Umaurier’sday e_thay Ittlelay Esslay_ (1941ay) eportsray effectsyay asyay
evastatingday asyay osethay inyay e_thay Islandyay_ omfray ayay onglay ariantvay enslavementyay,
evenyay oughthay inyay isthay asecay erethay isyay onay ysicalphay intimacyyay. Owardtay ethay endyay
ofyay ethay ookbay ayay asmspay ofyay esbianlay ebaucheryday arksmay oneyay oman’sway epudiationray
ofyay erhay Atholiccay aithfay inyay efianceday ofyay ayay eityday owhay ermittedpay erhay ildchay otay
ieday. Ethay orgyyay isyay ollowedfay ybay erhay uicidesay. Inyay Annyfay Urst’shay onely_lay
Aradepay_ (1942ay), ethay icturesquepay iotray ofyay achelorbay irlsgay areyay olacedsay ybay
utualmay evotionday ofyay ayay ariantvay astcay, oughthay evernay actuallyyay esbianlay; utbay
eirthay unweddedyay iveslay areyay otnay especiallyyay appyhay.

Ethay inexplicableyay urstbay ofyay ivefay itlestay inyay 1943 asway argelylay amningday, ethay
inoritymay eportray eingbay Orothyday Owlin’scay inyay inter_way Olsticesay_, ayay inlythay
isguisedday asecay istoryhay ofyay ayay aralyticpay osewhay eightyay years�yay�� invalidismyay, ofyay
ystericalhay originyay, isyay uredcay ybay ayay uddensay emotionalyay interestyay inyay ayay omanway
aviatoryay. Ethay elationshipray isyay iefbray andyay innocentyay, andyay isyay ollowedfay ybay
arriagemay orfay othbay omenway. Aigcray Iceray usedyay ethay esbianlay advancesyay ofyay anyay
eccentricyay eiresshay otay ayay Eenwichgray Illagevay oet�“pay�? asyay ayay eatnay edray erringhay inyay
erhay urdermay ysterymay aving_hay ayay Onderfulway Imecray_, inyay ichwhay ethay eiresshay isyay
ethay ictimvay. Inyay Anejay Owles’sbay o_tway Erioussay Adieslay_, anyay inhibitedyay Ooklynbray
ousewifehay indsfay erhay irstfay experienceyay outsideyay ethay Atesstay osay inebriatingyay
atthay eshay efiesday erhay usbandhay andyay ingerslay inyay ethay ostitutes�pray�� uartersqay ofyay
Oloncay, eterminedday otay earn“lay allyay ethay ingsthay eshay idn’tday ow,�knay�? evenyay oughthay
eshay ealizesray eythay illway otnay akemay erhay appyhay.

Onyay ayay evellay otay ebay akentay eriouslysay, Arthuryay Oestlerkay inyay arrival_ay andyay
Epartureday_ onveyedcay, oughthray ishay ero’shay ontactcay ithway ayay omanway
ychoanalystpsay, ishay estimateyay ofyay othbay ethay oodgay andyay ethay adbay inyay anyay
all-tolerantyay ychiatricpsay iewpointvay. Eterpay, eroichay oliticalpay efugeeray
atteredshay ybay ishay ordealyay inyay ethay andshay ofyay ethay enemyyay, isyay akentay inyay andyay aredcay
orfay inyay ayay eutralnay Europeanyay itycay ybay ishay ountrywomancay, Dray. Olgarbay. Ehay allsfay
inyay ovelay andyay ashay ayay estoringray iaisonlay ithway ayay youngyay irlgay owhay equentsfray ethay
octor’sday apartmentyay, andyay ehay ansplay otay ollowfay Odetteyay otay ethay Unitedyay Atesstay
enwhay ayay assportpay ancay ebay ecuredsay. Ishay elapseray intoyay eurosisnay uponyay erhay
eavinglay imhay ithoutway oticenay oryay arewellfay Dray. Olgarbay epairsray ybay ayay iftsway andyay
illfulskay analysisyay ofyay ishay ifelonglay artyrmay omplexcay. Ancechay, oweverhay,
evealsray otay Eterpay atthay ethay octorday isyay Odette’syay ealray ovelay andyay ehay utbay ayay
assingpay ancyfay. Osay, insteadyay ofyay ollowingfay ethay irlgay, ehay eturnsray otay ishay
erilouspay utbay eal�“ray�? undergroundyay activitiesyay. Ethay octorday isyay escribedday asyay
alltay, ull-blownfay, andyay asterfulmay; Odetteyay, asyay ildishlychay enderslay, ithway ayay
oyish�“bay�? unpaintedyay outhmay. Inyay ethay endyay,

  Aboveyay allyay ehay eltfay ayay adnesssay ... andyay itypay orfay Odetteyay, ithway erhay acantvay
  ooklay, erhay imnessslay andyay ulnerability—odettevay ethay ictimvay, owneddray inyay
  ethay arnivorouscay ower’sflay embrace.[42yay]

Ertainlycay est-knownbay ofyay ethay year’syay itlestay isyay Orothyday Aker’sbay io_tray_, onyay
ichwhay ayay ayplay asway asedbay, incesay itsyay agestay istoryhay irtuallyvay uplicatedday
atthay ofyay e_thay Aptivecay_ eventeensay yearsyay earlieryay. Itsyay openingyay inyay
Iladelphiaphay asway ellway attendedyay andyay eviewedray, andyay ethay ayplay anray onyay
Oadwaybray orfay ayay ittlelay oremay anthay ayay onthmay eforebay eingbay osedclay oughthray
essurepray omfray ayay ombinationcay ofyay eligiousray interestsyay. Oneyay ofyay ethay ew_nay
Yorkeryay_ affstay interviewedyay ariousvay ignerssay ofyay ethay etitionpay orfay itsyay
ithdrawalway, andyay oundfay atthay everalsay adhay eithernay eensay ethay ayplay ornay eadray
ethay ovelnay omfray ichwhay ityay asway ademay eforebay endinglay eirthay amesnay otay ethay
otestpray.

Ethay orystay esentspray ethay ugglestray etweenbay ayay Enchwomanfray onyay anyay Americanyay
universityyay acultyfay andyay ayay youngyay artyay otographerphay orfay ossessionpay ofyay ayay irlgay
owhay isyay epartmentalday assistantyay otay ethay ormerfay. Aulinepay Aurymay ashay ustjay
ublishedpay ayay illiantbray udystay ofyay ethay in_fay eday i�clesay_ Enchfray ecadentsday,
otablynay Erlainevay andyay Imbaudray. Ikelay emthay, eshay isyay anyay advocateyay ofyay exploringyay
ethay imitslay ofyay ensibilitysay underyay allyay ossiblepay imulistay omfray alcoholyay otay
exualsay assionpay, ithway eiledvay intshay atyay ugsdray andyay agellationflay, utbay
aturallynay isthay aspectyay ofyay erhay ifelay isyay ellway oncealedcay. Ethay irlgay Anetjay, atyay
irstfay ayay assionatepay intellectualyay andyay emotionalyay evoteeday, ashay eenbay educedray
ybay intimacyyay ithway Aulinepay otay ethay imitlay ofyay abilitystay enwhay ayay irlwindwhay
ourtshipcay ybay Ayray Ackenziemay andyay ayay olesomewhay eterosexualhay iaisonlay ithway imhay
avesay erhay omfray urtherfay exploitationyay. Oughthay Ayray eactsray ithway indblay ageray
andyay ontemptcay otay erhay onfessioncay ofyay erhay astpay elationsray ithway Aulinepay, erethay
isyay atyay eastlay ayay ancechay atthay ehay illway omecay aroundyay enoughyay otay arrymay erhay enwhay
ehay ashay ooledcay. Ethay efeatedday andyay ustratedfray Enchwomanfray ootsshay erselfhay.

Isthay isyay ethay essenceyay ofyay ethay amadray, artisticallyyay inyay eednay ofyay onay
accessoriesyay, utbay obablypray otay avoidyay elaborationyay ofyay itsyay orbidmay emotionalyay
elementsyay Mrsay. Akerbay addedyay anyay offenseyay oremay ermissiblepay ofyay essstray. Ethay
ubstancesay ofyay Auline’spay onographmay asway olenstay omfray ethay issertationday ofyay ayay
arriedmay iendfray otay osewhay ematurepray eathday erhay ownyay elationsray ithway ethay omanway
ontributedcay, andyay ethay idowedway usbandhay etaliatesray ybay exposingyay erhay
agiarismplay. Isthay isgraceday ovidespray adequateyay otivationmay orfay ethay uicidesay
ichwhay akesmay osay effectiveyay ayay amaticdray imaxclay, utbay ityay essenslay ethay owerpay ofyay
ethay olewhay. Aulinepay asyay ayay elf-defeatingsay ecadentday isyay anyay unsavoryyay utbay
onvincingcay ersonalitypay. Ithway ethay addedyay onusyay ofyay iterarylay eftthay eshay ootay
earlynay egeneratesday intoyay eremay illainvay. Ofyay isthay entury’scay ourfay idelyway
irculatedcay amasdray, en—_thethay Aptivecay_, en_m�dchay inyay Uniformyay_, e_thay
Ildren’schay Ourhay_, andyay io_—only_tray ethay Ermangay ilmfay ucceededsay inyay eingbay
oodgay eatrethay ithoutway urringblay inyay omesay ayway ethay ariantvay emethay.

Otway assingpay eferencesray inyay 1944 ereway Erskineyay Aldwell’scay inglesay ippantflay
aragraphpay inyay agic_tray Oundgray_: ayay artender’sbay accountyay ofyay iscoveringday ishay
ifeway atyay ayplay inyay ethay ackbay oomray ofyay erhay eautybay alonsay ithway otway ofyay erhay youngyay
atrons,[43pay] andyay Eanjay Afford’sstay ignettevay inyay oston_bay Adventureyay_ ofyay ayay
Ackbay Aybay owagerday owhay awnsfay uponyay eachyay eason’ssay ebutantesday ithoutway onceyay
uspectingsay erhay ownyay otivationmay. Ethay eroinehay, oweverhay, earingbay arsscay illstay
unhealedyay omfray erhay ildhoodchay underyay ethay ellspay ofyay ayay euroticnay othermay ownay inyay
ayay anatoriumsay, isyay iterallylay ickenedsay ybay ethay oman’sway ulsomefay aresses.[44cay]

Inyay 1945 Oranay Oftslay insertedyay inyay erhay istoricalhay ovelnay assy_jay_ ayay
isparagingday iddlemay ectionsay, omplaint“cay omfray Esbia,�lay�? involvingyay ayay
iangletray ofyay otway iddle-agedmay oolschay istressesmay andyay ethay omanticizedray itletay
igurefay, enthay ayay itchenkay aidmay ofyay irteenthay. Omfray irlhoodgay ethay ow-widowednay
Mrsay. Ysdaletway ashay orshippedway erhay intellectualyay ousincay, Atherinekay, andyay inyay
youthyay osechay asyay usbandhay ethay uitorsay owhay ostmay esembledray erhay. Ethay otway omenway
avehay oggedjay alongyay undramaticallyyay enoughyay orfay entytway yearsyay inyay eirthay ointjay
oolschay enterpriseyay enwhay ethay adventyay ofyay ethay emarkableray Assyjay ovesmay
Atherinekay otay unadmittedyay assionpay andyay Mrsay. Ysdaletway otay engefulvay ealousyjay.
Ityay isyay ethay ecociouspray Assyjay erselfhay, ownay ayay avoredfay udentstay oughthray
Atherine’skay effortsyay, owhay atyay ifteenfay acceptsyay unjustyay ismissalday ithoutway
otestpray ecausebay eshay ecognizesray atthay Atherinekay illway ultimatelyyay ebay etterbay
offyay eepingkay erhay ifelonglay usinessbay artnerpay. Erehay Mrsay. Ysdaletway, ettilypay
emininefay andyay elinefay, isyay aloneyay identifiedyay ithway esbia,�“lay�? emantically(say
unrelatedyay otay Atulluscay), ilewhay ethay otheryay otway exhibityay aitstray impliedyay ybay
Issmay Oftslay otay ebay asculinemay.

Inyay ethay amesay yearyay Arymay Enaultray inyay e_thay Iddlemay Istmay_ ovidedpray ayay onictay
eliefray ithway ayay ariantvay ortraitpay asyay iquantpay asyay anyyay incesay e_mllay eday Aupinmay_.
Eolay istened(chray Eonoralay) ancay, atyay enty-fivetway, ebay istakenmay orfay ayay een-agetay
oybay evenyay ybay erhay ownyay istersay afteryay ayay onglay eparationsay. Eshay akesmay ayay oodgay
ivinglay ybay itingwray esterns,�“way�? iveslay onyay ayay ouseboathay ithinway ommutingcay
istanceday ofyay Ondonlay, andyay avoidsyay ituationssay equiringray emininefay ostumecay.
Orfay evensay yearsyay eshay ashay aintainedmay ayay omfortablecay omesticday agem�nay ithway ayay
ursenay owhay onceyay avedsay erhay ifelay. Eithernay irl’sgay inglesay iefbray experimentyay
ithway ayay anmay asway appyhay, andyay othbay indfay eirthay ommoncay ifelay ollywhay atisfyingsay.
Illstay eythay oday otnay avoidyay ethay ompanycay ofyay enmay, andyay ayay oodgay artpay ofyay ethay orystay
isyay oncernedcay ithway ethay owthgray ofyay Eo’slay iendshipfray ithway ayay ellowfay authoryay
intoyay ayay ovelay ichwhay eadslay inallyfay otay arriagemay. Erhay ifficultday oicechay
etweenbay erhay otway eryvay ealray oveslay, eterminedday argelylay ybay erhay esireday orfay
ildrenchay, isyay ovinglymay esentedpray.

Erhay initialyay attemptyay atyay asculinemay independenceyay asway occasionedyay ybay
intolerableyay ictionfray etweenbay erhay arentspay, andyay erhay ownyay emperamenttay ademay
ityay ayay uccesssay. Enwhay erhay youngeryay istersay, eptkay emininefay andyay elplesshay ybay ayay
otingday othermay, ollowsfay Eo’slay atternpay ofyay ightflay, eshay implysay esentspray
erselfhay onyay Eo’slay oorstepday andyay aysstay orfay ayay onglay easonsay ithoutway ealisticray
oughtthay ofyay owhay isyay ayingpay orfay erhay eepkay. Erhay ownyay adolescentyay eansmay ofyay
escapeyay omfray amilyfay ensiontay ashay eenbay ayay eadystay ietday ofyay eapchay ictionfay, andyay
eshay ancay eesay erhay uturefay onlyyay inyay itsyay ugarysay ermstay. Enwhay ealray eartbreakhay
endsyay ayay upidstay ittlelay omanceray uiltbay onyay othingnay oremay anthay ishfulway
eamingdray, eshay eepscray ackbay otay ethay arentalpay estnay, erewhay oneyay imaginesyay erhay
itheringway intoyay atheticbay insterhoodspay, auntinghay entalray ibrarieslay inyay
earchsay ofyay oremay oriesstay ithway appyhay endingsyay. Ethay arallelpay evelopmentday ofyay
ethay otway isters�say�� iveslay onstitutescay ayay ongstray argumentyay inyay avorfay ofyay esbianlay
intimacyyay asyay againstyay inhibitedyay Ictorianvay omancingray. Oneyay ofyay ethay ostmay ividvay
eaturesfay ofyay e_thay Iddlemay Istmay_ isyay itsyay umorhay, ayay ualityqay ithertohay
onspicuouslycay ackinglay inyay ariantvay ictionfay. autier(gay, Untergay, Ennettbay andyay
Ackenziemay areyay ethay exceptionsyay.) Eo’slay akingtay ayay onceitedcay youngyay octorday
ownday ayay otchnay ybay irtingflay uccessfullysay ithway ethay ursenay ehay ingsbray otay ayay
artypay andyay enthay eglectsnay orfay otheryay omenway ouldway ebay ilarioushay inyay anyyay
ettingsay. Inyay ayay ariantvay ovelnay ityay eamsglay asyay anyay unmatchedyay emgay.


                            Econdsay Escendocray

Ethay endyay ofyay ethay arway oducedpray onay uchsay immediateyay effectyay onyay ariantvay ictionfay
asyay idday ethay eginningbay, utbay aduallygray uantityqay increasedyay ithway ethay
acceleratingyay eedspay ofyay ayay eometricgay ogressionpray. Onsequentlycay, anymay ofyay ethay
irty-oddthay ovelsnay ichwhay appearedyay omfray 1946 oughthray 1954—all illstay
elativelyray accessible—mustyay eceiveray ortshay iftshray. Iefbray andyay isparagingday
ariantvay oryay esbianlay assagespay ereway includedyay inyay Emarque’sray arch_ay ofyay
Iumphtray_ (1945ay inyay Englishyay), Edmundyay Ilson’sway emoirs_may ofyay Ecatehay Ountycay_
(1946ay), Elixfay Orrest’sfay arola_cay_ (1948ay), Ilipphay Ylie’sway opus_ay 21_ (1949ay)
andyay isappearance_day_ (1951ay), Eodorathay Eogh’skay eg_may_ (1950ay), Obertray
Ilder’sway ait_way orfay Omorrowtay_ (1952ay), Oanjay Enry’shay omen_way inyay Isonpray_
(1952ay) andyay Auricemay Uon’sdray ise_ray ofyay Imonsay Achaumelay_ (1951ay; inyay Englishyay,
1952). Aracterschay ariedvay omfray ostitutespray otay ocialitessay; actionyay, omfray
entimentalsay ilanderingphay otay ayay ealousjay ifingknay.

Ongerlay erogatoryday eatmentstray ereway esentedpray ybay anyay equalyay umbernay ofyay
authorsyay. Inyay 1946 Eanjay Aulpay Artre’ssay o_nay Exityay_ a(ay anslationtray ofyay uis_hay
Osclay_, 1945) adhay ayay iefbray utbay unchallengedyay unray inyay Ewnay Yorkyay. Itsyay eethray
aracterschay, impoundedyay inyay ayay allsmay oomray inyay ellhay, areyay: ayay owardlycay oliticalpay
aitortray owhay ashay alsoyay eapedhay everyyay umiliationhay onyay ayay evotedday ifeway; ayay omanway
owhay ashay okenbray everalsay enmay orfay erhay ownyay amusementyay andyay illedkay erhay unwantedyay
ildchay; andyay ayay anhatingmay esbianlay owhay ashay olenstay erhay ousin’scay ifeway andyay enthay
alkedtay erhay ictimvay intoyay ayay ointjay uicidesay actpay. Incesay ethay esbian’slay inssay
eemsay esslay einoushay anthay osethay ofyay ethay otheryay otway, erhay emotionalyay anomalyyay
ustmay ebay iewedvay asyay eveningyay ethay alancebay.

Istopherchray Afarge’slay e_thay Uddensay Uestgay_ (1946ay) isyay oncernedcay ithway ayay
olossalcay egotistyay owhay osesclay erhay oorsday againstyay ictimsvay ofyay ayay Ewnay Englandyay
urricanehay. Esperationday emboldensyay emthay otay enteryay espiteday erhay, utbay eshay isyay
untouchedyay ybay eirthay everalsay arkstay agediestray. Onlyyay oneyay andsomehay andyay
ulturedcay omanway isyay elcomeway, orfay easonsray alfhay obbishsnay, alfhay emotionalyay.
Isthay Mrsay. Eeverclay ashay ithway erhay anyay infantyay onsay, utbay isyay indifferentyay otay ishay
elfareway ecausebay ofyay erhay iefgray atyay ethay owningdray ofyay ishay ursemaidnay, ithway omwhay
eshay asway obviouslyyay infatuatedyay. Ethay astlay aifsway otay arriveyay areyay ayay ow-classlay
oybay andyay ayay irlgay ofyay ifteenfay omwhay ehay ashay avedsay omfray owningdray andyay arriescay
akednay inyay ishay armsyay. Alvanizedgay omfray erhay uporstay, Mrsay. Eeverclay atchessnay ethay
eautifulbay igurefay omfray imhay andyay, unassistedyay, arriescay ethay irlgay offyay otay erhay
oomray. Aterlay ethay inster-hostessspay indsfay ethay otway eepingslay udenay inyay eachyay
other’syay armsyay, andyay isthay aloneyay ashay ethay owerpay otay ovemay er—buthay onlyyay otay
ealousyjay andyay elf-pitysay orfay erhay ownyay onelinesslay.

Eethray omparativelycay ediocremay orksway ofyay 1947 ereway equallyyay everesay. Eorgegay
Illis’sway ittle_lay Oybay Uesblay_ ecountsray ethay achinationsmay ofyay ayay esbianlay otay

etty_hay Orvalday_ icturespay ethay ear-capturenay ofyay ayay Anadiancay irlgay ofyay eighteenyay
ybay ayay ourtesancay onyay acationvay omfray erhay ofessionpray andyay osingpay asyay ayay
espectableray omanway inyay Ancouvervay. Inyay ot_nay Ownay utbay Ownay_, Arymay Fay. Kay.
Isher’sfay iefchay igurefay isyay ayay omanway asyay agelessyay asyay Orlandoyay andyay ayay uthlessray

ethay Entiestway atthay eshay involvesyay ayay ollegecay irlgay inyay ayay esbianlay andalscay.

Ethay itletay igurefay inyay Amesjay Onald’sray e_thay Angryyay Omanway_ (1948ay) externallyyay

ybay ethay irl’sgay othermay. Unlikeyay Ewis’slay unalloyedyay onstermay, oweverhay, isthay
omanway insistsyay eshay ashay evernay eenbay ayay esbianlay. Erhay ownyay arriagemay ailedfay onyay

Ayay oremay omplexcay asecay appearsyay inyay Argaretmay Andon’slay ever_nay Iesday ethay Eamdray_

incidentally(ay, Izlay adhay usedyay Istinachray Ossetti’sray oblin_gay
Arketmay_ inyay erhay originalyay apturecay ofyay Orettalay ybay essingstray eirthay

Erhapspay ethay ostmay irulentvay attackyay asway aunchedlay ybay Imonsay Eisneryay inyay aked_nay

Ethay atestlay ondemnationcay isyay incorporatedyay inyay ange_stray Isterssay_ (1954ay), ayay

Anotheryay aper-backedpay originalyay asway omen’s_way Arracksbay_ (1950ay) ybay Oreskatay

Easilyyay ethay eeriestyay ofyay allyay eferencesray otay ariancevay isyay Irleyshay Ackson’sjay inyay

onlyyay eavyhay ettingpay, ybay anyay olderyay anmay atyay ayay ocktailcay artypay inyay erhay ownyay omehay.
Inyay ayay ogressive�“pray�? ollegecay, uiteqay unsupervisedyay, eshay ecomesbay oremay andyay
oremay olitarysay andyay ithdrawnway untilyay erhay uddensay iendshipfray ithway anyay ideallyyay
ympatheticsay irlgay ompanioncay. Isthay alteryay egoyay, osewhay allureyay eshay inallyfay

Appearingyay alsoyay inyay 1951 asway ayay ensationalsay ifletray eminiscentray ofyay ethay orstway

Ayay ympatheticsay eatmenttray ichwhay owsbay otay orthodoxyay andardsstay ybay endingyay
agicallytray isyay esentedpray inyay ing_spray Irefay_ (1952ay), aper-backedpay originalyay
ybay Invay Ackerpay, admittedyay eudonympsay ofyay anyay establishedyay alemay authoryay. Erehay ayay
onelylay oyishbay o-edcay inyay ayay idwesternmay universityyay isyay illinglyway educedsay ybay
erhay orority-housesay oommateray andyay indsfay ethay esbianlay elationray ayay appyhay oneyay
asyay onglay asyay ityay emainsray ecretsay. Ityay isyay ethay educersay, euroticnay aughterday ofyay ayay
omiscuouspray idowway, owhay eelsfay uiltgay andyay arriescay onyay imultaneouslysay anyay
excessiveyay affairyay ithway ayay anmay otay ovepray erselfhay ormalnay. Ethay unsophisticatedyay
Itchmay isyay urgedyay otay oday ikewiselay, utbay eshay annotcay ollowfay oughthray erhay otway
ueamishsqay effortsyay, andyay eshay eactsray ithway oathinglay otay unkendray iolationvay ybay
ayay aternityfray anmay. Enwhay uspicionsay ofyay esbianismlay allsfay onyay ethay otway irlsgay
ethay euroticnay accusesyay erhay ictimvay ofyay avinghay eenbay ethay educersay. Itchmay isyay
expelledyay omfray ethay ororitysay, andyay onlyyay ethay understandingyay eanday ofyay irlsgay andyay
ethay ollegecay ysicianphay avertyay isasterday. Inyay ishay aturalisticnay icturepay ofyay
ampuscay exsay ifelay inyay eneralgay ethay authoryay eatstray ethay esbianlay aspectyay ithway
omparativecay ympathysay andyay attributesyay itsyay estructiveday effectsyay otay ethay
euroticnay irl’sgay ensesay ofyay uiltgay. Isthay isyay inducedyay ybay erhay other’smay
influenceyay andyay ipensray intoyay ayay ull-blownfay ychosispsay. Eshay endsyay inyay ayay entalmay
institutionyay.

Otway uchmay appierhay episodesyay ereway eaturedfay inyay ovelsnay ofyay 1952. Inyay Ayfay
Adams’syay aper-backedpay originalyay, appointment_ay inyay Arispay_, anyay Americanyay
orphanyay inyay erhay eenstay isyay aturedmay ufficientlysay otay eakenway ayay insterspay aunt’syay

iendlinessfray. Ethay auntyay, onceyay ayay eatgray eautybay, ildlesschay, andyay illstay oundbay
otay erhay usbandhay ybay utualmay assionpay ichwhay ashay urvivedsay otway ecadesday ofyay
arriagemay, isyay anyay irresistibleyay ersonalitypay andyay omescay otay exertyay eatgray
influenceyay onyay ethay irlgay. Asyay ithway Ilylay Iscoebray inyay o_tay ethay Ighthouselay_, ityay
isyay artlypay ethay elationray etweenbay ifeway andyay usbandhay ichwhay ascinatesfay ethay
irlgay; oweverhay, erhay emotionsyay ystallizecray uponyay ethay omanway. Erhay auntyay
ecognizesray ethay unmistakableyay ignssay ofyay assionpay, andyay arfay omfray eingbay
ockedshay, evenyay ishesway ityay ereway ossiblepay orfay erhay otay espondray. Ybay ethay endyay ofyay
ethay ummersay ethay irlgay isyay uredcay, otnay onlyyay ofyay erhay allowcay eterosexualhay
obsessionyay, utbay ofyay ethay ariantvay ovelay alsoyay, andyay emergesyay ithway adultyay
appreciationyay ofyay atwhay arriedmay ovelay ancay ebay.

Ethay authoryay atesstay erhay emethay inyay ayay ologuepray: oman’sway ugglestray otay
understandyay erhay ownyay aturenay. Ithertohay, eshay ayssay,

  Actionyay andyay eationcray, orfay omanway, asway ... anyay imitationyay ofyay anmay. Inyay isthay
  imitationyay ... eshay ostlay ontactcay ithway erhay aturenay andyay erhay elationray otay
  anmay. Anmay appearsyay onlyyay artiallypay inyay isthay olumevay, ecausebay orfay ethay omanway
  atyay arway ithway erselfhay ehay ancay onlyyay appearyay usthay.... Omanway atyay arway ithway
  erselfhay ashay otnay yetyay eenbay elatedray otay anmay, onlyyay otay ethay ildchay inyay anmay,
  eingbay apablecay onlyyay ofyay aternity.[45may]

Ethay associationyay ithway Unadjay osay altersyay Illian’slay erspectivepay atthay eshay

Ayay ittlelay aterlay Osephinejay Eytay, owhay ithway Orothyday Ayerssay andyay Aiongay Arshmay

eau,�“bay�? alltay, eautifulbay andyay oyishbay, isyay ethay eadstronghay arlingday ofyay ealthyway

Ilewhay acticingpray orfay ayay ymnasticgay exhibityay, isthay avoredfay andidatecay isyay

Ayay itbay aterlay eshay iscoversday atthay ityay asway otnay Arymay utbay eau�“bay�? owhay adhay

Ethay amesay author’syay o_tay Ovelay andyay Ebay Iseway_ (1950ay) againyay onnectscay ariantvay

ildermay egendslay ofyay emonologyday; anotheryay isyay ertaincay atthay e“hay ustmay avehay eenbay
omethingsay eryvay ickedway inyay ancientyay Eece.�?[49gray] Ishay esencepray eedsbray
omplicationscay inyay othbay ouseholdhay andyay ommunitycay.

Ortlyshay Earlesay isappearsday, andyay Otlandscay Yardyay uspectssay urdermay. Inyay ethay endyay
ityay urnstay outyay atthay ethay youngyay Earlesay isyay ayay omanway, owhay orfay yearsyay ashay ivedlay
intermittentlyyay asyay ayay anmay, andyay orfay anymay ofyay osethay yearsyay ursednay anyay obsessiveyay
assionpay orfay erhay ousincay, ayay Itishbray actressyay omwhay eshay awsay onlyyay
oradicallyspay. Ethay atterlay, onceyay ayay ianc�efay ofyay ethay oadcasterbray, ommittedcay
uicidesay afteryay ehay iltedjay erhay, andyay Eslielay ashay omecay otay Englandyay ithway ayay
ell-laidway anplay orfay eliminatingyay imhay inyay evengeray. Inyay ethay oursecay ofyay erhay
associationyay ithway ishay iendsfray, oweverhay, andyay inyay articularpay ithway oneyay owhay
adhay opportunityyay otay owknay erhay ousincay etterbay anthay eshay idday, eshay iscoversday
atthay erhay adoredyay idolyay asway argelylay ayay igmentfay ofyay erhay ownyay imaginationyay, ethay
ealray omanway avinghay eenbay uthlessray andyay estructiveday.

Inyay onsequencecay, Eslielay ashay abandonedyay erhay urposepay, andyay erelymay escapedyay
intoyay erhay alternateyay emininefay oleray. Espiteday ethay intuitiveyay uestionsqay Eslielay
Earlesay aisesray inyay everyone’syay indmay omewhat(say overstressedyay inyay aidyay ofyay ethay
otplay), eshay isyay esentedpray asyay ayay ollywhay ympatheticsay aracterchay, andyay ancay aketay
erhay aceplay ithway ethay edievalmay Ideyay andyay Emllay eday Aupinmay asyay ayay uccessfulsay
ansvestisttray andyay armerchay. Ityay isyay Issmay Ey’stay engagingyay Inspectoryay owhay ingsbray
omehay otay erhay ethay asicbay immaturityyay ofyay erhay otractedpray isguiseday, andyay, oneyay
infersyay, onvertscay erhay otay ayay oremay adultyay atternpay ofyay ifelay.

Inyay ethay yearyay etweenbay Issmay Ey’stay otway olumesvay anyay anonymousyay olivia_ay_ (1949ay)
asway osay eminiscentray inyay ylestay ofyay either_ay Isyay Ovelay_ asyay almostyay otay uggestsay
identicalyay authorshipyay. Ityay ootay isyay anyay autobiographicalyay ecordray ofyay experienceyay
onglay astpay, atthay ofyay ayay Ictorianvay adolescentyay uddenlysay ansplantedtray otay ayay
inishingfay oolschay onyay ethay outskirtsyay ofyay Arispay. Ethay Allicgay eedomfray andyay
aietygay ofyay erhay ewnay ifelay eleaseray ethay irl’sgay ascentnay emotionsyay, andyay eshay
allsfay eeplyday inyay ovelay ithway oneyay ofyay ethay otway Enchfray eadmistresseshay. Ethay
ook’sbay aluevay ieslay inyay ethay idelityfay andyay ividnessvay ithway ichwhay ityay icturespay
isthay irstfay innocentyay assionpay. Arrativenay interestyay isyay uppliedsay ybay ensiontay
etweenbay ethay otway istressesmay, owhay avehay ivedlay appilyhay ogethertay orfay ifteenfay
yearsyay untilyay ayay emingschay ewcomernay onyay ethay affstay urnstay oneyay againstyay ethay otheryay
orfay erhay ownyay endsyay. Emllay Uliejay, Olivia’syay elovedbay, ashay alwaysyay adhay avoritesfay
amongyay ethay udentsstay omwhay Emllay Aracay ashay omewhatsay esentedray, utbay onlyyay ownay,
ilewhay Oliviayay isyay Ulie’sjay osenchay, oesday Ara’scay ealousyjay eachray ethay ointpay ofyay
ysteriahay. Afteryay anyay accumulationyay ofyay ettypay ievancesgray agnifiedmay ybay ethay
ewcomernay, Aracay iesday ofyay ayay overdoseyay ofyay edativesay almostyay ertainlycay
elf-administeredsay. Esidebay erhay eathbedday Uliejay iescray outyay, e“shay isyay ethay onlyyay
oneyay Iyay avehay everyay oved!�?—alay ycray ostratingpray otay Oliviayay, owhay ashay adhay easonray
otay elievebay erselfhay alsoyay erishedchay. Aterlay Uliejay ovidespray omesay omfortcay ybay
ellingtay ethay irlgay atthay eshay ashay alwaysyay eenbay ictorious�“vay�? overyay ethay
emotionalyay emptationstay esentedpray ybay udentsstay, utbay atthay ownay eshay ishesway eshay
adhay yieldedyay. Isthay owsshay erhay ycray otay avehay eantmay atthay ithway Aracay aloneyay eshay
asway ysicallyphay intimateyay. Eshay edictspray atthay Oliviayay illway otnay ebay ictoriousvay
underyay imilarsay ircumstancescay, andyay asyay atyay ethay outsetyay ofyay ethay orystay Oliviayay
ashay aidsay, i“ay on’tday etendpray atthay isthay experienceyay asway otnay ucceededsay ybay
othersyay ... utbay atyay atthay imetay Iyay asway innocent,�yay�? ityay isyay obviousyay atthay Emllay
Ulie’sjay understandingyay ofyay erhay aturenay asway accurateyay.

Ayay esslay innocentyay adolescentyay ecordray ittenwray ybay An�oisefray Alletmay, ayay arriedmay
omanway ofyay entytway, asway ublishedpay inyay Arispay (1951ay) asyay e_lay Empartray esday
Uinesb�gay_, inyay Ewnay Yorkyay (1952ay) asyay e_thay Illusionistyay_, andyay inyay aper-coverspay
(1953ay) asyay e_thay Ovinglay andyay Aringday_. Isthay evidenceyay ofyay ideway opularitypay
akesmay ityay ecessarynay otay aysay ittlelay erehay avesay atthay ityay escribesday ethay
initiationyay ofyay ayay Enchfray irlgay ofyay ifteenfay ybay erhay ather’sfay istressmay, ayay
Ussianray omanway entytway yearsyay olderyay ithway ayay ertaincay asculinemay ardnesshay
ometimessay approachingyay adismsay. Ethay atterlay isyay aptivatedcay ybay Elene’shay
esemblanceray otay ayay youngyay Englishyay irlgay omwhay eshay onceyay adoredyay andyay osewhay
efectionday eftlay anyay unhealedyay oundway. Asyay onglay asyay Amaratay isyay independentyay andyay
asculinemay, Elenehay isyay erhay aveslay, uttingcay oolschay, eceivingday erhay atherfay,
evenyay eluctantlyray accompanyingyay erhay adoredyay otay ayay esbianlay ightnay ubclay. Enthay
Amaratay ecomesbay Elene’shay epmotherstay, andyay, elaxingray atyay astlay underyay ethay
influenceyay ofyay ecuritysay, eshay ecomesbay uchmay oremay emininefay. Onsequentlycay,
Elenehay easescay otay orshipway andyay ookslay orwardfay otay akingtay ethay ominantday oleray
erselfhay, erhay eaponway ethay esbianlay elationshipray ichwhay erhay eoccupiedpray
atherfay ashay elievedbay erelymay anyay innocentyay ood“gay influence.�yay�? Oughthay ethay
experienceyay isyay ardlyhay onstructivecay in_ay ototay_, othbay Elenehay andyay erhay authoryay
onsidercay ityay eneficialbay inasmuchyay asyay ityay ingsbray ethay onelylay adolescentyay outyay
ofyay ayay asephay ofyay eroticyay everieray intoyay olesomewhay ontactcay ithway ealityray, andyay osay
ashay ayay aturingmay effectyay.

Ayay astlay ensationalsay andyay ill-writtenyay itemyay ofyay ethay enny-dreadfulpay ypetay asway
Arolcay Ales’shay ind_way Omanway_ (1953ay). Erehay ayay ychoanalystpsay eatstray incipientyay
eurosisnay inducedyay inyay ayay youngyay omposercay ybay erhay assionpay orfay ayay omanway owhay illway
ermitpay onay aressescay, andyay erhay esultantray ustratedfray onginglay orfay anyay idealyay
esbianlay elationshipray. Inyay Aurel’slay istoryhay, asyay evealedray otay Dray. Ancesfray
Arnergay, ethay authoryay eapshay Elionpay uponyay Ossayay inyay ethay attermay ofyay anti-maleyay
onditioningcay, otnay ithoutway urposepay. Orfay inyay ethay endyay ethay eautifulbay youngyay
analystyay ovespray oremay anthay understandingyay; eshay akesmay onay effortyay eitheryay otay
ispelday erhay atient’spay ejudicepray oryay otay erminatetay erhay ansferencetray, andyay onyay
ethay inalfay agepay ofyay ethay olumevay eshay omescay asyay earnay otay openyay oposalpray ofyay
intimacyyay asyay anyay authoryay ouldcay iskray ithoutway eingbay uedsay ybay ethay ychiatricpsay
ofessionpray.

Ethay inalfay aletay otay ebay onsideredcay, Aireclay Organ’smay e_thay Icepray ofyay Altsay_
(1951ay), ilewhay occasionallyyay understatedyay, illstay ivesgay ayay onvincingcay accountyay
ofyay ovelay etweenbay ayay arriedmay omanway approachingyay irtythay andyay ayay irlgay ayay ecadeday
youngeryay. Atyay eightyay Eresethay asway onsignedcay otay anyay orphanageyay enwhay erhay idowedway
othermay emarriedray; eshay ashay incesay eltfay oremay aloneyay anthay ayay uetray orphanyay.
Ambitiousyay otay ecomebay ayay agestay esignerday, eshay earnsyay erhay eepkay inyay Ewnay Yorkyay ybay
emporarytay obsjay andyay udiesstay artyay atyay ightnay. Enwhay ethay ookbay opensyay, eshay isyay
involvedyay inyay ayay ysicallyphay ompletecay utbay unsatisfactoryyay affairyay ithway ayay alemay
artyay udentstay omwhay eshay illway otnay arrymay. Eshay ashay adhay otheryay alemay attentionyay,
andyay efusesray ayay econdsay offeryay ofyay arriagemay eforebay ethay orystay osesclay. Arolcay
Airdyay isyay inyay ocesspray ofyay ivorcingday anyay incompatibleyay usbandhay and(ay ishay
omineeringday amilyfay), andyay egotiationsnay areyay aggingdray overyay ethay ustodycay ofyay ayay
even-year-oldsay aughterday ownay ithway ishay amilyfay. Ethay otway omenway eetmay inyay ayay
epartmentday orestay erewhay Eresethay isyay employedyay asyay ayay easonalsay extra,�“ay�? andyay
acrossyay anyay unromanticyay oytay ountercay eythay areyay ittensmay ithway anyay infatuationyay asyay
uddensay asyay Illian’sgay inyay ortoiseshell_tay Atcay_. Ethay olderyay oman’sway eactionray
isyay esslay obviousyay, utbay ithinway ayay ayday oryay otway eshay ashay akentay ethay irlgay otay unchlay
andyay invitedyay erhay otay endspay Istmaschray inyay erhay uburbansay ousehay. Esentlypray eshay
uggestssay ayay otormay iptray otay erhay amilyfay omehay onyay ethay estway oastcay. Eresethay
ithoutway esitationhay osesclay ethay oorsday onyay erhay ownyay ifelay andyay accompaniesyay erhay.

Intimacyyay evelopsday erhapspay ayay eekway afteryay eythay etsay outyay andyay ayay onthmay afteryay
eirthay irstfay encounteryay. Anotheryay eekway ofyay appinesshay ensuesyay eforebay eythay
iscoverday ayay etectiveday ailingtray emthay. Oughthray iquepay atyay erhay eavinglay imhay,
Arol’scay usbandhay isyay entbay onyay evidenceyay ichwhay illway ivegay imhay ullfay ustodycay ofyay
ethay ildchay. Evenyay osay, inyay eirthay ewnay intoxicationyay ethay otway omenway indfay
amusementyay atyay irstfay inyay eludingyay eirthay adowshay, andyay akemay ayay amegay ofyay earchingsay
eachyay ewnay oomray orfay ecordingray evicesday. Enwhay Arolcay inallyfay attemptsyay otay uybay
ethay etectiveday offyay, eshay isyay oldtay atthay everalsay incriminatingyay ecordsray avehay
alreadyyay eenbay entsay otay Ewnay Yorkyay andyay atthay eshay adhay estbay etgay ackbay otay otectpray
erhay interestsyay. Omisingpray otay eturnray inyay ayay ortnightfay, eshay eaveslay Eresethay inyay
Outhsay Akotaday otay aitway orfay erhay. Utbay Arol’scay eturnray isyay epeatedlyray
ostponedpay, andyay eshay inallyfay iteswray atthay inyay orderyay otay eesay anythingyay ofyay erhay
ildchay ereafterhay eshay ustmay omisepray otay eakbray ithway Eresethay entirelyyay. Eshay
egsbay ethay irlgay otay ivegay erhay upyay andyay artstay afreshyay. i“ay ouldway ebay
underestimatingyay youyay otay inkthay youyay ouldcay ot.�nay�?

Inyay eactionray otay ethay ockshay, Eresethay eelsfay otnay onlyyay abandonedyay utbay etrayedbay,
asyay oughthay Arol’scay ickingpay erhay upyay andyay oppingdray erhay adhay eenbay ayay oldlycay
eliberateday amegay. Unnedstay andyay adriftyay eshay opsstay otay orkway orfay ayay imetay inyay
Icagochay untilyay ircumstancescay ecessitatenay erhay eturnray otay Ewnay Yorkyay. Eshay
eansmay otnay otay eesay Arolcay againyay, andyay oughthay ewsnay atthay Arolcay ashay eenbay illyay
ovesmay erhay, ityay oesday otnay eakenway erhay esolveray. Erhay immediateyay effortsyay owardtay
employmentyay inyay agestay esigningday ownay eetmay ithway omptpray, ifyay odestmay, uccesssay,
orfay evenyay erhay iefbray associationyay ithway ethay oremay ulturedcay omanway ashay
increasedyay erhay avoir-fairesay, andyay ethay emotionalyay experienceyay ashay ivengay erhay
elf-confidencesay uchsay asyay onenay ofyay erhay ontactscay ithway enmay adhay everyay oneday. Eshay
inallyfay oesgay otay anyay unavoidableyay eetingmay ithway Arolcay, eadingdray ethay ainstray
utbay unafraidyay ofyay yieldingyay, andyay evenyay enwhay eshay earnslay atthay Arolcay ashay
epudiatedray erhay usband’shay umiliatinghay istlay ofyay onditionscay andyay usthay
orfeitedfay allyay oldhay uponyay erhay ildchay, Eresethay illstay efusesray erhay offeryay ofyay ayay
aredshay apartmentyay.

Eresethay ashay acedplay ayay esignday orfay ayay agestay etsay andyay isyay onyay erhay ayway otay ayay
eatricalthay ocktailcay artypay otay elebratecay. Eshay eetsmay ayay Itishbray actressyay
erethay inyay osewhay eyesyay eshay eessay ayay iftsway ashflay ofyay interestyay omparablecay otay erhay
ownyay eactionray onyay eetingmay Arolcay. Invitedyay atyay onceyay ybay ethay arstay otay anyay ensuingyay
ivatepray artypay eshay acceptsyay, eelingfay erselfhay ownay uiteqay ableyay otay andlehay anyyay
oreseeablefay evelopmentsday. Utbay inyay ethay omentmay ofyay itsyay irthbay isthay ewnay ensesay
ofyay adequacyyay ecipitatespray itsyay ownyay equelsay. Owingknay erselfhay onay ongerlay
elplesslyhay ubjectsay otay Arolcay, eshay eelsfay eefray otay ejoinray erhay atyay illway. Eshay
ipsslay awayyay ithoutway ayay ordway otay erhay otentialpay onquestcay andyay eturnsray otay erhay
earlyyay ovelay.

Eaturingfay asyay ityay oesday otway omenway owhay avehay othbay adhay eterosexualhay
experienceyay, andyay ultimatelyyay ingingbray emthay oughthray anymay oremay ensionstay anthay
areyay indicatedyay erehay, isthay arrativenay offersyay asyay ongstray anyay argumentyay orfay ethay
alidityvay ofyay ariantvay ovelay asyay iana_day_. Inyay ayay etterlay otay Eresethay afteryay ayay
egallay essionsay, Arolcay ummarizessay ethay essenceyay ofyay ethay argumentyay:

  Ethay apportray etweenbay otway enmay oryay otway omenway ancay ebay absoluteyay andyay erfectpay,
  asyay ityay ancay evernay ebay etweenbay anmay andyay omanway, andyay erhapspay omesay eoplepay
  antway ustjay isthay, asyay othersyay antway atthay oremay iftingshay andyay uncertainyay ingthay
  atthay appenshay etweenbay enmay andyay omenway. Ityay asway impliedyay yesterdayyay atthay ymay
  esentpray oursecay ouldway ingbray emay otay ethay epthsday ofyay umanhay icevay andyay
  egradationday.... Ityay isyay uetray, ifyay Iyay ereway otay ogay onyay ikelay isthay andyay ebay iedspay
  uponyay, attackedyay, evernay ossessingpay oneyay ersonpay onglay enoughyay osay atthay ethay
  owledgeknay ofyay ethay ersonpay ... ould[cay ebay oremay anthay uperficial]—thatsay isyay
  egradationday. Oryay otay ivelay againstyay one’syay aingray, atthay isyay
  egeneration....[50day]

Isthay akestay onay accountyay ofyay ethay Eudianfray argechay ofyay immaturityyay againstyay ethay
easieryay unisexualyay apportray, andyay itsyay ailurefay otay oday osay annotcay ebay aidlay inyay
isthay ayday andyay imetay otay ignoranceyay ofyay Eudfray. Ityay ashay atherray ethay oundsay ofyay
indifferenceyay, ifyay otnay efianceday.

Ethay ajoritymay ofyay avorablefay eatmentstray ofyay ariancevay incesay ethay eginningbay ofyay
Orldway Arway Iiyay avehay eenbay ittlelay oncernedcay ithway avoidingyay overtyay esbianismlay,
ustjay asyay otheryay ictionfay overyay anyay evenyay ongerlay eriodpay ashay eenbay oleranttay ofyay ayay
ertaincay amountyay ofyay eterosexualhay eedomfray. Isthay actfay, alongyay ithway ethay apidray
uantitativeqay increaseyay ofyay ariancevay inyay urrentcay ictionfay, aymay ointpay, asyay ashay
eenbay uggestedsay, otay itsyay adualgray acceptanceyay asyay ayay egitimatelay areayay ofyay umanhay
experienceyay. Onyay ethay otheryay andhay ityay isyay eciselypray owardtay uchsay asualcay
acceptanceyay atthay ensoringcay oupsgray avehay irectedday eirthay irefay. Ize-winningpray
oryay idelyway acclaimedyay orksway ithway oreignfay ettingssay uchsay asyay e_thay Eshmay_ andyay
e_thay Illusionistyay_ avehay otnay eenbay eavilyhay attackedyay; eithernay avehay
ondemnatorycay eatmentstray evenyay ofyay uchsay owlay alibrecay asyay aked_nay Ormstay_ andyay
ethay eprintray ofyay ueer_qay Atternspay_. Utbay acklistsblay avehay umpedlay ing_spray
Irefay_, appointment_ay inyay Arispay_, andyay omen’s_way Arracksbay_ ithway ethay
eterosexualhay excessesyay ofyay Ickeymay Illanespay orfay ensurecay ustified(jay, ifyay atyay
allyay, onlyyay inyay ethay asecay ofyay ethay irstfay ookbay), andyay esethay itlestay eemsay otay avehay
eenbay ithdrawnway omfray ales-rackssay. Evenyay ifyay ethay endulumpay ingssway ackbay otay
eatergray onservatismcay, oweverhay, asyay ityay ashay oneday eriodicallypay inyay ethay oursecay
ofyay iterarylay istoryhay, itsyay ewnay ositionpay illway otnay ebay identicalyay ithway anyyay
earlieryay oneyay. Ethay overworkedyay etaphormay ofyay iralspay ogresspray aymay applyyay erehay
asyay otay allyay otheryay istoricalhay endstray. Otay osethay owhay avehay itnessedway angingchay
attitudesyay owardtay omosexualityhay incesay 1900, ityay isyay ayay attermay ofyay egretray atthay
ethay ultimateyay ingsway ofyay ethay ewnay yclecay ustmay extendyay eyondbay ouryay enkay.




                               Onclusioncay


Eriodicpay uctuationsflay inyay uantityqay, ubstancesay andyay ylestay ofyay ariantvay
itingwray avehay alreadyyay eenbay ummarizedsay inyay ethay ectionssay etchingskay itsyay
istoryhay. Ityay isyay ownay imetay otay eviewray ertaincay oremay ubjectivesay aspectsyay ofyay ethay
onglay ecordray. Orfay exampleyay, oesday ariantvay iteraturelay endlay upportsay otay
ereditaryhay eoriesthay ofyay ariancevay? Atyay irstfay anceglay, oneyay ecurrentray ysicalphay
ypetay eemssay otay oday osay: ethay omanway ittedfay ybay aturenay otay ayplay ethay anmay. Alltay,
onglay ofyay imblay, arrow-hippednay, ide-shoulderedway, irect-eyedday, isthay igurefay
ashay ersistedpay omfray ethay imday erayay inyay ichwhay ethay Eeksgray onceivedcay Artemisyay otay
1950 enwhay anyay Englishwomanyay eatedcray Eslielay Earlesay. Utbay ethay igurefay appearsyay
alsoyay inyay anymay ettingssay otheryay anthay ariantvay iteraturelay. Eway eetmay ityay inyay ethay
agespay ofyay omanceray andyay onyay ethay allsway ofyay alleriesgay, onyay ethay ilversay eenscray andyay
inyay Ite�lay advertisementsyay. Andyay, ofyay oursecay, anymay ights-errantknay, ourtierscay,
andiesday, athletesyay, atin�emay idolsyay andyay ift-shootingsway owboyscay areyay uiltbay onyay
ayay imilarsay atternpay. Erehay ethay ilitantmay eministfay illway observeyay itterlybay atthay
inyay isthay an’smay orldway evenyay ouryay idealyay ofyay eautybay isyay alemay. Utbay ethay igurefay isyay
otnay osay uchmay alemay asyay intermediateyay, andyay aboveyay allyay youthfulyay. Anymay ofyay ethay
attributesyay ataloguedcay aboveyay areyay osethay ofyay adolescenceyay ustjay arrivedyay atyay
adultyay aturestay. Inyay ombinationcay ithway adultyay avoir-fairesay eythay areyay appealingyay
enoughyay inyay ethay youngyay anmay osewhay advantageyay isyay erelymay aestheticyay. Inyay ayay youngyay
omanway, orfay omwhay ethay atisticalstay ormnay ofyay eighthay andyay engthstray allsfay ortshay
ofyay erhay other’sbray, eythay epresentray alsoyay uperioritysay otay erhay ownyay indkay inyay
owerpay andyay, ereforethay, inyay independenceyay.

Ecausebay isthay ypetay osay aptivatescay ethay eneralgay imaginationyay, itsyay appearancesyay
inyay ariantvay iteraturelay areyay impressiveyay outyay ofyay oportionpray otay eirthay
equencyfray. Ayay ompletecay ountcay, omfray ethay aliantvay Ideyay otay ethay undauntedyay Eolay
oryay Eslielay, umbersnay oughlyray ayay orescay, andyay enwhay oneyay ashay ubtractedsay osethay
ikelay Adamantebray andyay Osalindray otay omwhay esbianismlay asway evernay eallyray
attributedyay, ethay allytay isyay educedray otay ayay oundray ozen—hardlyday eethray ercentpay
ofyay ethay ariantvay otaltay. Amongyay ethay emainderray, ofyay omwhay ayay oodgay anymay ayedplay ayay
omparativelycay ositivepay emotionalyay oleray, onay arkedmay ypetay ecursray oftenyay
enoughyay otay avehay anyyay ignificancesay. Ayay ewfay iguresfay areyay ockystay andyay ongstray,
utbay othersyay aymay astcay a“ay adowshay inthay asyay ayay ade;�blay�? omesay areyay oluptuouslyvay
emininefay. Ornay oesday anyyay oneyay ysicalphay ait—excepttray ossiblypay
eight—accompanyhay ariancevay ithway anyyay egularityray. Inyay actfay, eyondbay ethay
eletalskay oportionspray alreadyyay otednay, ethay onlyyay omaticsay attributesyay
entionedmay inyay escribingday oyishbay omenway and(ay esethay otnay oftenyay) areyay eepday
oicesvay andyay underdevelopedyay eastsbray. Otheryay unfeminineyay etailsday uchsay asyay ayay
idingstray aitgay oryay ayay usquebray addressyay, oughthay eythay aymay oweyay omethingsay otay iphay
articulationyay oryay ocalvay egisterray, areyay usuallyyay eremay annerismsmay; atthay isyay,
eythay areyay imitativeyay atherray anthay inbornyay. Ofyay oursecay esethay ictionalfay ataday
illway otnay upportsay onclusionscay asyay alidvay asyay osethay asedbay onyay ientificscay
observationyay, incesay esidebay ethay icenselay aturalnay otay eativecray itingwray oneyay
ustmay allowyay alsoyay orfay ethay eluctanceray ofyay isapprovingday authorsyay otay ovidepray
eirthay auvais_may ujetssay_ ithway anyyay ereditaryhay excusesyay. Illstay, ethay onglay
ocessionpray omprisescay ariantsvay individuallyyay onvincingcay enoughyay otay ivegay
eightway otay eirthay ysicalphay iversityday. Ityay isyay earclay atthay ethay ajoritymay ofyay
ariantvay oryay esbianlay omenway observedyay ybay ethay itingwray aternityfray areyay otnay
asculinemay inyay ysiquephay.

Oesday exualsay ehaviorbay, enthay, allfay intoyay atternspay ichwhay ightmay argueyay orfay
omesay uniformitiesyay inyay endocrineyay alancebay? Againyay, ityay isyay impossibleyay otay
assifyclay ethay ajoritymay onestlyhay, evenyay ybay ethay implestsay ivisionsday intoyay
activeyay andyay assivepay, omosexualhay andyay isexualbay, andyay eelfay onfidentcay atthay ethay
operativeyay actorsfay areyay innateyay. Oneyay aymay eparatesay osethay osewhay assionpay isyay
asculinemay inyay iolencevay omfray ethay oolcay, ethay entlegay, ethay aternallymay endertay;
utbay amongyay ethay astlay aymay allfay uchsay onspicuouslycay asculinemay iguresfay asyay
Ephenstay Ordongay andyay Anjay Oralemay. Oryay ethay aggressiveyay Aupinsmay oryay Eoslay aymay
ovepray isexualbay, ethay entlegay Ettasmay andyay Issmay Affertyscay immutablyyay etsay uponyay
eirthay ownyay indkay, andyay ayay etitepay andyay elicateday Ordespineflay oryay Almondyay aymay ebay
oldbay inyay erhay exualsay advancesyay. Ityay isyay, oweverhay, ossiblepay otay etectday ertaincay
oughray atternspay otnay inyay ysiquephay oryay inyay exsay ehaviorbay utbay inyay ychologicalpsay
attitudeyay. Erethay areyay asterfulmay iritsspay owhay eednay otay ovepray emselvesthay ethay
equalyay ofyay anyyay anmay, oryay otay ominateday atherray anthay ollowfay. Erethay areyay ebelsray
andyay onelay olvesway owhay efyday authorityyay oryay ublicpay opinionyay andyay areyay usuallyyay
ealouslyjay ossessivepay ofyay ethay ewfay eythay ovelay. Erethay areyay ethay oremay etachedday
egotistsyay andyay arcissistsnay owhay eesay othersyay onlyyay inyay ermstay ofyay eirthay ownyay
advantageyay andyay abandonyay emselvesthay otay onay oneyay. Erethay areyay ethay yshay andyay
ingingclay owhay avecray otectionpray. Andyay erethay areyay ethay aternalmay ypestay,
orgetfulfay ofyay elfsay andyay eageryay otay erishchay andyay upportsay.

Ifyay otnay eredityhay, atwhay explanationyay oesday iteraturelay offeryay orfay esethay
ariantsvay? Ometimessay onenay. Yriclay oetspay inyay articularpay implysay egisterray
eirthay entimentssay andyay eavelay eadersray otay earchsay elsewhereyay orfay explanationsyay
ofyay ethay enigmayay. Inyay ayay ifferentday ashionfay ethay amesay isyay uetray inyay unsympatheticyay
arrativesnay, andyay osethay erewhay interestyay ieslay inyay otplay aloneyay. Inyay esethay asescay,
ootay, ariantsvay areyay esentedpray, asyay ityay ereway, Inerva-bornmay, utbay areyay assumedyay
otay ebay ayay ecognizedray ypetay uresay otay enerategay amaticdray ensionstay. Usuallyyay,
oweverhay, asyay inyay oremay onventionalcay ictionfay, authorsyay upplysay omesay ersonalpay
istoryhay orfay ainmay aracterschay andyay oftenyay irectlyday oryay implicitlyyay oldhay ityay
esponsibleray orfay eirthay anomaliesyay. Isthay astlay isyay, ofyay oursecay, especiallyyay
oticeablenay inyay ecentray yearsyay incesay ethay eadspray ofyay Eudianfray ychologypsay. Evenyay
erewhay onay otionnay ofyay ausalitycay eemssay otay existyay inyay ethay author’syay indmay, ethay
amesay ortsay ofyay ackgroundbay aymay ecurray inyay oremay anthay oneyay arrativenay. Usthay ityay isyay
ossiblepay otay identifyyay ayay umbernay ofyay onditionscay, omesay airlyfay universalyay, omesay
aracteristicchay ofyay eirthay eriodpay, ichwhay appearyay epeatedlyray asyay antecedentsyay
oryay accompanimentsyay ofyay ariancevay.

Ofyay ethay universalyay assclay ethay ostmay evalentpray actorfay isyay omesay egreeday ofyay
egativenay eactionray otay enmay. Inyay ychiatricpsay asebookscay isthay isyay oftenyay ethay
esultray ofyay exualsay iolationvay inyay ildhoodchay oryay adolescenceyay, oryay ofyay ethay
itnessingway ofyay intercourseyay atyay anyay earlyyay ageyay, ichwhay isyay almostyay equallyyay
aumatictray. Utbay uchsay experiencesyay andyay eirthay equelaesay ofyay euroticnay antipathyyay
areyay areray inyay ictionfay. Erethay ayay esslay ompulsivecay aversionyay aymay esultray omfray
oughray oryay undesiredyay aressescay, oryay omfray eirthay antithesisyay, ointedpay ysicalphay
epudiationray. Oryay ityay aymay owgray omfray ocialsay eglectnay oryay ightingslay ybay enmay, oryay
omfray eliberateday indoctrinationyay ybay ayay uritanicpay uardiangay. Ityay aymay alsoyay emstay
indirectlyyay omfray onjugalcay iscordday atyay omehay oryay elsewhereyay, oughthray
observationyay ofyay ayay atedhay an’smay unfaithfulnessyay oryay ueltycray, ayay elovedbay
oman’sway igidityfray oryay ufferingsay.

Ethay extnay ostmay equentfray ausalcay actorfay omprisescay ayay argelay andyay ariedvay
onstellationcay ofyay oubledtray amilyfay elationsray. Amongyay ouryay undredshay ofyay
ariantvay omenway, osethay owhay enjoyedyay ethay ortsay ofyay amilyfay ifelay atthay ocialsay
ychologistspsay ownay exhortyay allyay arentspay otay ovidepray ouldcay ebay ountedcay onyay oneyay
andhay. Evenyay osethay ivinglay ithway othbay arentspay onyay anyyay ermstay ouldway otnay
ultiplymay ethay umbernay anymay imestay. Ostmay oftenyay, ethay othermay isyay oundfay antingway
inyay omesay ayway; indeedyay, ethay ercentagepay ofyay outrightyay otherlessmay irlsgay isyay
impressiveyay. Utbay, ityay aymay ellway ebay askedyay, atwhay aboutyay ethay umbernay inyay ordinaryyay
ictionfay? Inyay ovelsnay ofyay ychologicalpsay astcay ealingday ithway ethay icissitudesvay
ofyay youngyay unmarriedyay omenway ethay ountcay isyay ertainlycay ighhay. Ethay arginmay inyay
avorfay ofyay ariantvay ovelsnay isyay urtherfay arrowednay enwhay oneyay onsiderscay atthay ewfay
ofyay esethay areyay iterarylay asterpiecesmay, andyay atthay inormay ictionfay ashay, omfray itsyay
eginningsbay, apitalizedcay eavilyhay onyay ethay orphanedyay oryay otherlessmay eroinehay.
Ethay easonsray areyay obviousyay: ayay irlgay usthay eprivedday ancay ebay ayay ympatheticsay
aracterchay espiteday unconventionalyay onductcay; isthay onductcay affordsyay ethay
eaderray escape-through-identificationyay; andyay ethay authoryay isyay uiltygay ofyay onay
ofanationpray ofyay ethay everedray othermay imageyay. Everthelessnay, afteryay allyay esethay
allowancesyay areyay ulyday ademay, ayay acklay ofyay aternalmay endernesstay andyay
understandingyay ulksbay argelay amongyay influencesyay eadinglay otay ariantvay ehaviorbay.

Ethay omparablecay acklay ofyay ayay atherfay isyay eldomsay essedstray. Aternalpay arshnesshay
appearsyay atherray ofteneryay anthay ethay amesay aittray inyay ethay othermay, andyay ethay atherfay
isyay alsoyay ometimessay ayay artypay otay eneralgay arentalpay indifferenceyay oryay eglectnay,
utbay ybay andyay argelay ethay ariantvay irlgay activelyyay istreatedmay ybay eitheryay oryay othbay
arentspay isyay airlyfay areray. Ayay atherfay ixationfay, onyay ethay otheryay andhay, oughthay
infrequentyay, isyay ignificantsay enwhay ityay oesday occuryay, andyay Alzac’sbay Eraphitasay
earsbay itnessway atthay ityay isyay otnay onfinedcay otay ethay Eudianfray entiethtway enturycay.
Ethay adgeringbay ofyay ayay onelay irlgay ybay ayay arentalpay urrogate—stepmothersay,
elativeray oryay uardian—isgay eaturedfay ownay andyay enthay, asyay inyay e_thay Orpionscay_, utbay
isthay ympathy-beggingsay eviceday isyay esslay overworkedyay inyay ariantvay anthay inyay otheryay
inormay ictionfay. Ethay influenceyay ofyay iblingssay inyay oducingpray eitheryay exualsay
ixationfay oryay aversionyay isyay egligiblenay, unlessyay eirthay onspicuouscay absenceyay isyay
ignificantsay, orfay ayay onsiderablecay umbernay ofyay ariantvay irlsgay areyay esentedpray asyay
actuallyyay oryay irtuallyvay only�“ay�? ildrenchay.

Allyay isthay ideway arietyvay ofyay ubjectivesay ituationssay apparentlyyay ontributescay otay
ethay equallyyay iverseday angeray ofyay ariantvay experiencesyay; yetyay onenay inyay ethay otway
istslay isyay osay onsistentlycay airedpay asyay otay establishyay ertaintycay ofyay explicityay
ausecay andyay effectyay. Inyay actfay, oremay anthay oneyay amilyfay actorfay andyay ayay easuremay ofyay
exsay antagonismyay oftenyay occuryay imultaneouslysay oryay uccessivelysay inyay ethay amesay
arrativenay.

Inyay additionyay otay ubjectivesay influencesyay erethay emainsray ethay ategorycay ofyay
externalyay ircumstancescay ichwhay encourageyay ariancevay. Andyay ilewhay ethay
ychologicalpsay ituationssay emainray airlyfay onstantcay omfray oneyay eriodpay otay
anotheryay, environmentalyay actorsfay aryvay onsiderablycay ithway imetay. Ethay oremay
ictlystray onventioncay imitslay ayay oman’sway activitiesyay, ethay oremay ertaincay isyay erhay
eremay oversteppingyay itsyay oundsbay otay oducepray ignificantsay esultsray. Omfray
edievalmay imestay oughthray ethay ineteenthnay enturycay, otay earway en’smay othingclay
asway abootay. Ereforethay, enwhay Entinecl�may oryay Agolettafray assumedyay an’smay essdray,
avegray emotionalyay onsequencescay ereway inevitableyay. Odaytay ethay onningday ofyay
acksslay oryay untinghay ostumecay oducespray ittlelay emotionalyay impactyay. Imilarlysay inyay
ineteenth-centurynay Ancefray oryay earlyyay entieth-centurytway Englandyay, enwhay
odestymay orbadefay evealingray ethay emininefay odybay, ayay impseglay ofyay uncoveredyay
eastsbray ightmay irstay ayay omanway otay assionpay, oryay Oust’spray Albertineyay andyay erhay
iendfray ightmay enjoyyay ayay alf-hour’shay allianceday inyay ayay eachbay abincay ecausebay eythay
adhay undressedyay ogethertay. Odaytay, enwhay eachbay, oolpay andyay ymnasiumgay owersshay
areyay ommunalcay affairsyay, eirthay essing-cubiclesdray areyay unlikelyyay otay ebay ethay
enescay ofyay endertay assagespay. Urthermorefay, inyay aysday enwhay oman’sway eresphay asway
efinitelyday ethay omehay, irlsgay owhay aimedclay independenceyay outsideyay ityay exertedyay ayay
ongstray imaginativeyay appealyay. Artistsyay, actressesyay oryay eremay achelorbay irlsgay
attractedyay oneyay anotheryay asyay onglystray asyay eythay ascinatedfay oremay elteredshay
omenway. Utbay owhay anymay uchsay ohemians�“bay�? avehay arousedyay eneralgay excitementyay
incesay ethay 1920s? Ewfay, ertainlycay, inyay ictionfay.

Oneyay objectiveyay ettingsay, oweverhay, ashay orfay ecadesday emainedray asicallybay
onstantcay asyay ayay otbedhay ofyay ariance—thosevay institutionsyay ichwhay estrictray youngyay
omenway otay ethay ompanycay ofyay eirthay ownyay exsay. Untilyay ellway intoyay ethay ineteenthnay
enturycay, onventscay oryay onventcay oolsschay ereway ethay egregatingsay agencyyay. Afteryay
1850, ecularsay oardingbay oolsschay ooktay overyay ethay oleray, ithoutway ethay
occasionalyay ompensatingcay outletyay ofyay eligiousray emotionyay. Ithway ethay eadspray ofyay
igherhay educationyay inyay ouryay ownyay imestay, omen’sway ollegescay oinedjay ethay istlay, andyay
ethay atestlay additionsyay avehay eenbay eformray oolsschay, ilitarymay arracksbay,
ororitysay ouseshay andyay etropolitanmay esidenceray ubsclay. Ethay esultsray ofyay ayay
oisteredclay existenceyay, enthay, ightmay eemsay otay argueyay orfay environmentyay asyay ayay
ausecay ofyay ariancevay ustjay asyay onglystray asyay ecurrenceray ofyay ethay aupin�“may�? ypetay
arguedyay orfay eredityhay. Utbay eway avehay alreadyyay eensay atthay enwhay anymay omenway earway
en’smay othesclay atyay oneyay imetay oryay anotheryay, ethay effectyay ofyay evenyay ethay ostmay oyishbay
isyay esslay onouncedpray anthay ityay usedyay otay ebay. Asyay orfay environmentyay, exceptingyay
isciplinaryday andyay ilitarymay uartersqay, entieth-centurytway oistersclay allowyay
eirthay esidentsray osay uchmay oremay eedomfray anthay eirthay edecessorspray atthay
ariantvay oryay esbianlay evelopmentsday ithinway emthay ancay onay ongerlay ebay aidlay ollywhay
otay essurepray ofyay ircumstancecay.

Usthay, ityay appearsyay atthay iterarylay estimonytay omfray ayay orescay ofyay enturiescay
onfirmscay ethay urrentcay ychiatricpsay erdictvay: ariancevay isyay oneyay ossiblepay
olutionsay ofyay essingpray emotionalyay oblemspray; utbay arrivalyay atyay isthay articularpay
olutionsay ependsday uponyay osay anymay ariablesvay atthay asyay yetyay onay ertaincay
edictivepray ormulafay ashay eenbay erivedday.

Anyay aspectyay ofyay ethay urrentcay enescay otnay yetyay ulyday ecognizedray inyay iteraturelay isyay
ethay elationray ofyay ariantvay experienceyay otay ainfulgay employmentyay. Inyay ethay eydayhay
ofyay eminismfay ayay oodgay ealday ofyay oncerncay asway oicedvay ybay anti-feministsyay estlay
omen’sway inancialfay andyay ocialsay independenceyay ightmay eedbray esbianismlay onyay ayay
andgray alescay. Utbay ayay omparisoncay ofyay Enchfray ictionfay omfray 1870 otay 1900, enwhay
omenway ereway illstay ependentday, ithway ethay Englishyay andyay Americanyay ecordray incesay
Orldway Arway Iyay uggestssay atthay ethay earfay asway unjustifiedyay. Ethay issueyay atyay akestay
inyay ouryay ownyay imetay isyay otnay ethay influenceyay ofyay earningyay uponyay ariancevay utbay ethay
everseray effectyay ofyay ariancevay onyay ayay oman’sway apacitycay otay oldhay ayay aidpay
ositionpay. Eforebay 1900 ityay asway ormalnay orfay ethay unmarriedyay irlgay oryay ethay
estrangedyay ifeway otay ebay upportedsay ybay erhay arentspay oryay erhay ong-sufferinglay
usbandhay. Orfay ethay astlay iftyfay yearsyay oremay andyay oremay omenway avehay eenbay obligedyay
otay earnyay eirthay ownyay ivingslay inyay ordinaryyay unromanticyay obsjay, andyay otay isthay endtray
ictionfay ashay otnay oneday ullfay usticejay. Otay ebay uresay, eativecray icenselay ashay
alwaysyay allowedyay ethay eedomfray ofyay anyay independentyay incomeyay otay oremay ersonspay anthay
areyay osay avoredfay inyay everydayyay ifelay. Ityay isyay uetray alsoyay atthay inyay ecentray ariantvay
ovelsnay ayay oodgay anymay occupationsyay avehay atyay eastlay ademay anyay appearanceyay. Eway avehay
etmay actressesyay, odiste’smay assistantsyay, ovelistsnay, interioryay ecoratorsday,
ocialsay orkersway, ayay umbernay ofyay eacherstay, ayay iotray ofyay ursesnay, ayay epartmentday
orestay executiveyay andyay ayay inormay erkclay, andyay everalsay irlsgay employedyay inyay
usinessbay officesyay. Utbay inyay eneralgay esethay ositionspay avehay ervedsay onlyyay asyay
ealisticray ackdropsbay orfay actionyay ichwhay idday otnay impingeyay uponyay emthay. Inyay esslay
anthay alfhay ayay ozenday asescay ashay ariancevay interferedyay ithway earningyay apacitycay.
Ityay avelygray affectedyay ethay actressesyay inyay ueer_qay Atternspay_; ethay
oolmistressesschay inyay e_thay Ildren’schay Ourhay_; ayay ollegecay instructoryay inyay
iana_day_; andyay ityay onstitutedcay ayay erioussay iskray orfay ursesnay inyay omise_pray ofyay
Ovelay_ andyay overnmentgay employeesyay inyay either_ay isyay Ovelay_. Isthay eagremay
oportionpray, especiallyyay atyay ethay evellay ofyay eremay iskray, oesday otnay eflectray
ings“thay asyay eythay are�yay�? accordingyay otay actualfay evidenceyay inyay ychiatricpsay
iteraturelay, andyay ethay ailurefay ofyay ariantvay ictionfay otay omecay otay ipsgray ithway
isthay aspectyay ofyay ealityray isyay ayay ountcay againstyay ityay. Ityay isyay alsoyay ayay asteway ofyay oneyay
ertilefay otentialpay ourcesay ofyay amaticdray ensiontay.

Erethay emainsray ayay inalfay icklishtay uestionqay ichwhay eadslay aightstray intoyay
ontroversialcay erritorytay, utbay otay ichwhay ayay ideway angeray ofyay ossiblepay answersyay
ustmay ebay onsideredcay: ywhay areyay ariantvay elles-lettresbay osay enerallygay ignoredyay?
Enwhay osay uchmay ashay eenbay ittenwray onyay ethay emethay, ywhay ashay ityay eenbay ightedslay inyay
ibrarylay ollectionscay, istorieshay ofyay iteraturelay, andyay ibliographicbay ecordsray?
Oneyay immediateyay answeryay illway ebay atthay ityay isyay enerallygay inferioryay, ichwhay isyay otay
ayay ertaincay extentyay uetray; utbay ityay isyay otnay inferioryay otay ayay ealday ofyay ordinaryyay
iteraturelay ichwhay ashay otnay eenbay osay ightedslay, otablynay atthay ybay ethay amesay
authorsyay owhay avehay oducedpray ariantvay itlestay. Accordingyay otay eirthay enerationgay
oryay otay eirthay oremay onsideredcay onvictionscay, ifferentday ersonspay illway explainyay
isthay omparativecay eglectnay ybay aimingclay atthay ariancevay isyay immoralyay, oryay
abnormalyay, oryay ethay oncerncay ofyay anyay eccentricyay ewfay andyay ofyay onay importanceyay oryay
interestyay otay umanityhay atyay argelay. Onenay ofyay esethay aimsclay ancay ebay ummarilysay
ismissedday asyay egligiblenay.

Ithoutway oinggay eeplyday intoyay atwhay ethay ermtay abnormal�“ay�? onnotescay inyay ifferentday
intellectualyay ieldsfay, ityay aymay ebay atedstay ategoricallycay atthay anymay
ychiatristspsay onay ongerlay egardray ordinaryyay omosexualhay experienceyay asyay
athologicalpay. Ornay isyay ethay enomenonphay ootay emoteray evenyay omfray ayay atisticalstay
ormnay. Inyay additionyay otay iterarylay evidenceyay, anthropologyyay andyay uncensoredyay
istoryhay andyay iographybay indicateyay atthay omosexualityhay ashay existedyay ifyay otnay
ourishedflay inyay allyay imestay andyay acesplay; andyay Dray. Insey’skay uantitativeqay
udiesstay owshay atthay enty-eighttway ercentpay ofyay omenway ownay ivinglay avehay
experiencedyay exual“say arousal�yay�? ybay eirthay ownyay indkay atyay omesay imetay inyay eirthay
iveslay. Onlyyay arelyray inyay eitheryay iteraturelay oryay ifelay areyay omenway owhay avehay ownknay
isthay experienceyay istinguishableday omfray eirthay ellowsfay, andyay anymay owhay areyay
erceptiblypay asculinemay inyay ysiquephay andyay emperamenttay avehay evernay ownknay ityay.
Ariantsvay, enthay, areyay airlyfay umerousnay, otnay abnormal�“ay�? inyay anyay alienist’syay
ensesay ofyay ethay ermtay, andyay otnay erceptiblypay eccentricyay.

Ethay oralmay argechay isyay esslay implysay isposedday ofyay ecausebay ityay isyay osay enerallygay
andyay oftenyay osay unthinkinglyyay advancedyay. Ityay ouldshay ebay atedstay atyay onceyay atthay inyay
isthay iscussionday ethay oralitymay ofyay ayay oursecay ofyay actionyay isyay eferredray otay itsyay
effectyay uponyay ethay actoryay andyay ishay ocialsay oupgray, asyay ocialsay anthropologistsyay
elievebay ityay asway eferredray originallyyay inyay ethay apingshay ofyay oralmay odescay ownay
egardedray inyay omesay uartersqay asyay absoluteyay. Ityay ouldshay alsoyay ebay aidsay, andyay
underlinedyay, atthay arriagemay andyay otherhoodmay, espiteday ethay equentfray ailurefay
ofyay ethay oneyay andyay ethay eavyhay urdensbay imposedyay onyay omenway ybay ethay otheryay, appearyay
oremay ultimatelyyay atisfyingsay otay ethay ajoritymay ofyay omenway anthay otheryay emotionalyay
experiencesyay, andyay areyay ertainlycay oremay eneficialbay otay ocietysay. Eythay areyay
ereforethay ethay oalsgay owardtay ichwhay ersonalpay andyay ocialsay effortyay ouldshay ebay
irectedday, andyay obstaclesyay otay eirthay uccesssay ouldshay ebay inimizedmay. Otay atwhay
extentyay isyay ariancevay uchsay anyay obstacleyay andyay owhay erniciouspay isyay ityay inyay otheryay
espectsray?

Incesay umanhay urvivalsay ependsday uponyay ildbearingchay, ifyay anyyay argelay umbernay ofyay
omenway ouldshay ubstitutesay omosexualhay elationsray orfay arriagemay andyay
otherhoodmay, ethay onglay angeray esultsray ouldway ebay ociallysay eleteriousday. Utbay
eterosexualhay andyay aternalmay ivesdray eemsay anyay effectiveyay uaranteegay againstyay anyyay
uchsay eventualityyay, andyay asyay onglay asyay umerousnay oupsgray areyay advocatingyay irthbay
ontrolcay asyay ayay eckchay otay overpopulationyay, isthay ociologicalsay argumentyay againstyay
ariancevay operatesyay onlyyay inyay ethay ealmray ofyay urepay abstractionyay. Asyay otay
onventionalcay icturesstray uponyay allyay exsay activityyay avesay egitimatelay
intercourseyay, eirthay apparentyay unctionfay isyay otay urtailcay ethay ocialsay angersday ofyay
eterosexualhay icenselay. Incesay evenyay ethay ostmay activeyay esbianismlay annotcay ebay
ethay ausecay ofyay illegitimateyay offspringyay oryay ofyay abortionyay, erethay isyay onay alidvay
asecay againstyay ariancevay onyay isthay orescay. Ayay oremay acticalpray argumentyay emsstay
omfray ethay ownay enerallygay admittedyay ychologicalpsay earingbay ofyay earlyyay uponyay
aterlay exualsay experienceyay. Ayay umbernay ofyay arriagemay ounselorscay, orfay instanceyay,
aintainmay atthay extensiveyay e-maritalpray ettingpay andyay omosexualhay activityyay areyay
andicapshay otay aterlay aritalmay adjustmentyay, andyay areyay ereforethay armfulhay otay ethay
youngyay. Osay arfay asyay isyay ownknay isthay aimclay ashay otnay eenbay unquestionablyyay
alidatedvay ybay uantitativeqay evidenceyay, andyay ertaincay authoritiesyay onouncepray ityay
ayay ationalizationray ofyay unadmittedyay ejudicepray, utbay ityay ustmay ebay ecognizedray asyay
ethay onsensuscay ofyay ayay oodgay anymay opularpay advisorsyay. Orfay arriedmay omenway alsoyay,
ofyay oursecay, esbianlay elationsray oryay erelymay ayay onsumingcay ariantvay assionpay ancay
ovepray asyay etrimentalday otay aritalmay appinesshay asyay imilarsay eterosexualhay
infidelitiesyay. Onyay ethay otheryay andhay, orfay omenway eterredday omfray arryingmay ybay
acklay ofyay opportunityyay, inancialfay oryay amilyfay urdensbay, inadequateyay exsay appealyay,
oryay invincibleyay isinclinationday, ariantvay attachmentsyay aymay ovidepray ethay olesay
ancechay orfay ethay experienceyay ofyay assionatepay ovelay, andyay omesay ychiatristspsay
onsidercay uchsay ulfillmentfay eferablepray otay ifelonglay eprivationday.

Earlyclay, enthay, ariancevay isyay otnay, ikelay adismsay orfay exampleyay, ayay imitedlay
aberrationyay onsistentlycay estructiveday erpay esay. Ityay eemssay oremay earlynay ayay
esserlay ategorycay ofyay emotionalyay experienceyay arallelpay otay ethay eterosexualhay andyay
apablecay ofyay asyay uchmay arietyvay. Ifyay overnedgay ybay ethay andardsstay ofyay oderationmay,
integrityyay, andyay utualmay onsiderationcay ichwhay ouldshay evailpray inyay allyay
assionatepay elationshipsray, ityay ouldshay otnay ebay armfulhay ofteneryay anthay
eterosexualhay assionpay. Utbay inyay actualyay experienceyay utopianyay onditionscay eldomsay
evailpray. Eway avehay eardhay omfray iana�“day�? omesay easonsray ywhay ariantvay assionpay,
unregulatedyay ybay anyyay egallay oryay ocialsay odescay ofyay itsyay ownyay, isyay aptyay otay ebay
irresponsibleyay andyay impermanentyay. Orkingway againstyay ityay alsoyay isyay ethay egativenay
influenceyay ofyay eepingsway ocialsay ondemnationcay. Ostmay eurosesnay amongyay ariantvay
omenway avehay esultedray omfray ethay onflictcay etweenbay eirthay impulsesyay andyay
eelingsfay ofyay anxietyyay, uiltgay, oryay evenyay insay. Usthay ethay orcesfay ichwhay ouldway
ontrolcay ariancevay areyay oftenyay esponsibleray orfay akingmay ityay ayay estructiveday
experienceyay.
