Erehay actuallyyay isyay anyay importantyay easonray orfay uchsay inferiorityyay asyay ariantvay
iteraturelay exhibitsyay. Ethay age-longyay ejudicepray againstyay ariancevay, erivingday
asyay ityay oesday omfray eligiousray abootay, etainsray omethingsay ofyay ethay ysteriahay ichwhay
otivatedmay itch-burningway andyay inquisitionyay. Orfay isthay easonray ethay olewhay
ubjectsay isyay urroundedsay ybay ayay urchargedsay atmosphereyay otay ichwhay onay ensitivesay
indmay isyay imperviousyay. Evenyay ethay estbay authorsyay areyay arcelyscay ableyay otay eefray
eirthay orkway ofyay allyay ontroversialcay overtonesyay, andyay artisanshippay inyay eativecray
itingwray ashay evernay ademay orfay artistryyay. Asyay eway avehay eensay, esserlay iterswray onyay
othbay idessay ofyay ethay issueyay aymay escendday otay outrightyay ealotryzay. Erventfay
antagonistsyay oosechay ariantsvay owhay ouldway ebay atefulhay ithoutway emotionalyay
irregularityyay, andyay owhay, ithway ityay, ecomebay onstersmay, usuallyyay ethay oremay
angerousday orfay eingbay icturesquepay otay ethay eyeyay oryay otherwiseyay eductivesay.
Egativenay itingwray ofyay etterbay ualityqay esentspray ess-sinisterlay aracterschay,
utbay anipulatesmay ircumstancescay otay ethay endyay atthay ariantvay experienceyay allshay
alwaysyay ovepray isastrousday. Inyay e_mmay. Adonisyay_ andyay ie_day Esterschway_ ethay
elativelyray ympatheticsay itletay iguresfay eetmay iolentvay eathday; inyay
istoph�la_m�phay_, e_thay Islandyay_, e_thay Aptivecay_, andyay ity_pay orfay Omenway_, eythay
endyay inyay adnessmay oryay everesay eurosisnay. Inyay inormay Enchfray alestay ofyay ethay astlay
enturycay, ariantvay ouplescay estroyday oneyay anotheryay ybay excessiveyay ysicalphay
indulgenceyay, andyay inyay irtuallyvay allyay ensoriouscay ovelsnay eythay ingbray uchmay armhay
oryay ufferingsay otay osethay ithway omwhay eythay areyay associatedyay.

Ankfray ampionschay ofyay ariancevay areyay uiltygay ofyay arallelpay artisticyay offensesyay.
Omesay akemay ocietysay ethay illainvay andyay ariantsvay itsyay omanticizedray ictimsvay, andyay
ecomebay illshray inyay enunciationday ofyay ethay oneyay andyay efenseday ofyay ethay otheryay. Evenyay
iana_day_ andyay either_ay isyay Ovelay_, emperatetay asyay eythay areyay inyay onetay, ouldway ebay
artisticallyyay isqualifiedday ybay eirthay inclusionyay ofyay outrightyay argumentyay evenyay
ereway eythay oremay excellentyay anthay eythay areyay. Ethay ubtlersay efendersday areyay alsoyay
onay etterbay anthay eirthay opponentsyay. Earingfay ublicpay opinionyay ootay uchmay otay
etraybay unqualifiedyay ympathysay, eythay, ootay, ainstray ircumstancecay otay eventpray
eirthay appealingyay aracterschay omfray enjoyingyay appinesshay. Antedgray atthay inyay ifelay
opularpay ejudicepray akesmay ethay ancechay ofyay appinesshay ecariouspray, asecay udiesstay
andyay otheryay actualfay ecordsray owshay onay uchsay oportionpray ofyay uicidesay andyay agedytray
asyay oday oleranttay ariantvay ovelsnay ofyay ethay inormay ortsay. Evenyay iterswray ofyay owerpay
ometimessay allfay intoyay imilarsay agictray exaggerationyay, asyay orfay exampleyay Issmay
Ackville-westsay inyay ark_day Islandyay_ oryay Asefieldmay inyay ultitude_may andyay
Olitudesay_.

Erethay areyay, oweverhay, ayay airfay umbernay ofyay orksway uiltygay ofyay onay ossgray
ortcomingsshay, andyay ayay ewfay ofyay outstandingyay excellenceyay. Enwhay eirthay authors�yay��
otaltay outputyay eritsmay erioussay iterarylay udystay, iticscray asyay arfay asyay ossiblepay
ignoreyay osethay itlestay inyay ichwhay ariancevay iguresfay. Erewhay onay inclusiveyay
iticalcray appraisalsyay ofyay anyay authoryay areyay ademay, eviewersray ofyay individualyay
ariantvay orksway areyay aptyay otay exerciseyay esslay estraintray, aisingpray emthay
udginglygray orfay eirthay annermay utbay eprecatingday eirthay attermay ithway
isapprovalday, egretray, or—whatyay isyay orse—ironicway oryay atronizingpay uperioritysay.
Ityay ashay alreadyyay eenbay emarkedray atthay ympatheticsay iterarylay eatmentstray ofyay
ariancevay areyay eldomsay ittenwray ybay enmay. Ownay ethay arallelpay ircumstancecay ustmay
ebay oted—mostnay iterarylay iticismcray andyay ethay ajoritymay ofyay ookbay eviewsray areyay
asculinemay orkway. Ityay isyay onlyyay aturalnay atthay enmay ouldshay eactray egativelynay otay
itingwray osay obliviousyay ofyay eirthay ownyay indkay asyay isyay uchmay ariantvay iteraturelay.
Andyay isthay eactionray ustmay otnay ebay iewedvay asyay eremay ejudicepray; itsyay ootsray ogay
eeperday. Atisticalstay udiesstay ofyay ethay eadingray oneday ybay omesay 20,000 ersonspay
avehay establishedyay ethay actfay atthay ethay imepray actorfay affectingyay eadingray
interestsyay, oremay asicbay anthay educationyay, occupationyay oryay ageyay, isyay ex.[1say] Ethay
ersonalitypay inventoriesyay onstructedcay ybay ychologistspsay andyay erivedday omfray
obablypray evenyay oremay umerousnay observationsyay owshay atthay exsay alsoyay eterminesday
anymay otheryay interestsyay andyay attitudes.[2yay] Usthay enmay andyay omenway ivelay otay ayay
ertaincay extentyay inyay ifferentday ubjectivesay orlds—away actfay ecentlyray amatizeddray
ybay Ilipphay Ylieway inyay isappearance_day_.

Ithway egardray otay ariantvay iteraturelay, isthay eansmay atthay enmay, owhay asspay omesay
ine-tenthsnay ofyay ethay udgmentsjay uponyay ityay, areyay attemptingyay otay evaluateyay ayay ealmray
ofyay experienceyay inyay ichwhay irst-handfay owledgeknay isyay impossibleyay otay emthay.
Aturallynay, eythay oday estbay inyay atingray ariantvay aterialmay ittenwray ybay enmay, andyay
extnay estbay ithway unsympatheticyay orksway ybay omenway. Omesay ewfay ojectpray emselvesthay
ithway omparativecay uccesssay intoyay oleranttay udiesstay ybay omenway osewhay entalmay
idiomyay andyay emotionalyay outlookyay isyay omewhatsay asculinemay. Unadjay Arnesbay, Enryhay
Andelhay Ichardsonray, Arymay Enaultray, andyay evenyay Ailgay Ilhelmway inyay erhay irstfay
ovelnay, aredfay atherray ellway atyay ethay andshay ofyay eviewersray. Inyay ontrastcay,
ertinentpay itlestay ybay Osamondray Ehmannlay, Elizabethyay Owenbay, Orothyday
Ichardsonray, Elenhay Andersonyay, Ana�syay Innay andyay Aykay Oylebay, ereway eitheryay
ightedslay oryay eatedtray ithway unjustifiedyay arshnesshay onsideringcay ethay admittedyay
ualityqay ofyay eirthay authors�yay�� otheryay orkway. in,�“thay�? ebulous,�“nay�?
unconvincing,�“ay�? insignificant,�“ay�? utile,�“fay�? overwrought,�“ay�? andyay
ysterical�“hay�? ereway amongyay ethay evaluativeyay ermstay appliedyay otay esethay itlestay ybay
alemay eviewers.[3ray] Omenway onyay ethay otheryay andhay adhay uchmay otay aysay inyay eirthay
avorfay, ethay ostmay ignificantsay andyay equentfray ommentcay eingbay atthay eythay ereway
eculiarlypay ensitivesay andyay accurateyay inyay emotionalyay interpretationyay.

Eithernay oupgray ofyay iticscray ouldshay ebay abeledlay ight�“ray�? andyay ethay otheryay
ong.�“wray�? Otay ostmay omenway andyay otay uchsay enmay asyay areyay endowedyay ithway unusualyay
imaginativeyay ensibilitysay, erceptivepay andyay ell-writtenway ariantvay orksway illway
alwaysyay eemsay oodgay iteraturelay. Andyay eythay are_ay_ oodgay ybay ethay establishedyay
anonscay ofyay uthtray otay experienceyay, oundsay aracterchay analysisyay, artisticyay
ucturestray, onvincingcay ackgroundbay, ividvay objectiveyay etailday, andyay eautybay ofyay
expressionyay. Otay ostmay enmay and—foryay ayay ifferentday eason—someray omenway, uchsay
orksway illway eemsay adbay inyay aryingvay egreesday omfray on-essentialnay otay
intolerableyay. Eythay are_ay_ adbay, enthay, inyay atthay eythay acklay universalityyay ofyay
appealyay. Orfay ethay amesay easonray uchmay on-variantnay ictionfay ittenwray ybay en—workmay
edominantlypray objectiveyay inyay otplay andyay iolentvay inyay actionyay, ullfay ofyay asualcay
andyay unimaginativeyay exsay activity—isyay uninterestingyay oryay istastefulday otay ethay
ajoritymay ofyay omenway, oughthay ityay ootay aymay ulfillfay ethay otheryay equirementsray ofyay
oodgay iteraturelay.

Ariantvay ictionfay isyay ofyay oursecay otnay aloneyay amongyay emininefay effortsyay inyay eingbay
isparagedday ybay ethay oppositeyay exsay. Ethay attlebay overyay ethay ualityqay ofyay emininefay
itingwray isyay oldyay; otay oday ityay ullfay usticejay ouldway equireray ayay allsmay olumevay inyay
itselfyay. Utbay ayay iefbray ommentcay isyay equiredray otay oncludecay isthay onglay
iscussionday. Alemay iticscray o(whay omprisecay etterbay anthay ine-tenthsnay ofyay ethay
olewhay) ancay ebay oughlyray ividedday intoyay eethray oolsschay ofyay opinionyay. Ethay eastlay
aritablechay aintainmay atthay omenway acklay eativecray owerpay inyay allyay artisticyay
ieldsfay ecausebay aturenay ashay esignatedday emthay orfay iologicalbay eationcray aloneyay.
otto(ay Eininger[4way] isyay ethay extremeyay exampleyay ofyay isthay oolschay, utbay ehay isyay otnay
aloneyay inyay ishay opinionsyay.) Ethay argestlay oupgray akemay ethay ointpay atthay omen’sway
artisticyay effortsyay areyay almostyay exclusivelyyay imitativeyay atherray anthay originalyay,
andyay, ithoutway investigatingyay easonsray, eythay argueyay atthay isthay actfay
emonstratesday atentpay eativecray inferiorityyay. Ayay ew—nathanielfay Awthornehay asway
amongyay ethay irst—feelfay atthay

  Enerallygay omenway itewray ikelay emasculatedyay enmay andyay areyay onlyyay otay ebay
  istinguishedday omfray enmay ybay eatergray eeblenessfay andyay ollyfay; utbay enwhay eythay
  owthray offyay imitative[ay] estraintsray ... andyay omecay eforebay ethay ublicpay arkstay
  akednay asyay ityay ere—thenway eirthay ooksbay areyay uresay otay ossesspay aracterchay andyay
  alue.[5vay]

Awthornehay idday otnay, oweverhay, ivelay upyay otay ishay onvictionscay; ehay avegay upyay
itingwray ictionfay inyay ethay 1850s andyay edflay ethay ountrycay ecausebay ityay asway ullfay ofyay
amned“day ibblingscray emales.�fay�? Ethay averageyay ualityqay ofyay ethay ibblingscray
erhapspay ustifiedjay ishay ightflay, utbay ishay apostasyyay asway ymbolicsay ofyay ishay exsay.

Ethay omenway owhay eganbay inyay ethay id-nineteenthmay enturycay otay itewray ikelay omenway
ereway itingwray alsoyay argelylay or_fay_ omenway, andyay onyay ayay evellay otay ebay intedpray inyay
ewspapersnay andyay inyay ethay ewlynay ornbay ome�“hay�? agazinesmay. Eythay otewray omfray ethay
imitedlay onventionalcay experienceyay atthay asway ownknay otay emthay andyay eirthay
umerousnay audienceyay; entimentalsay eligiousray exaltationyay andyay eamsdray ofyay
omanticray ovelay uppliedsay ethay onlyyay emotionalyay olorcay inyay eirthay iveslay. Ethay
ommoncay otlay ofyay arriagemay oughtbray ainlymay omesticday udgerydray andyay onstantcay
ildbearingchay, ithway ethay osslay ofyay osay anymay ildrenchay atthay evenyay ethay universalyay
experienceyay ofyay ethay eathday ofyay ayay ildchay ostlay itsyay eenkay edgeyay. Adhay uchsay iveslay
eenbay esentedpray ithway ethay austereyay uthtray otay experienceyay emandedday ofyay oodgay
iteraturelay, ethay esultsray ouldway avehay eenbay eadray onay oremay idelyway anthay areyay
arklystay ealisticray ovelsnay atyay anyyay imetay. Andyay ostmay ofyay osethay omenway authorsyay
eedednay otay earnyay oneymay. Usthay, emininefay ictionfay oncentratedcay uponyay amelessblay
omanticray assionpay, ooktay ildway ibertieslay ithway ealityray, andyay asway altogetheryay
unrelatedyay otay artyay. Utbay ityay oldsay inyay ethay undredshay ofyay ousandsthay, andyay ityay etsay ayay
ylestay inyay opularpay emininefay arrativenay ichwhay ashay alteredyay inyay etailday omfray
ecadeday otay ecadeday utbay ashay otnay yetyay onegay outyay. Untilyay ellway afteryay 1900 ewfay
omenway authorsyay oseray aboveyay isthay evellay avesay osethay owhay oremay oryay esslay
uccessfullysay imitatedyay enmay, andyay ieflychay uchsay enmay asyay Ickensday andyay Ollopetray.
Isthay entimentalsay idetay ashay alwaysyay eenbay ompletelycay alienyay otay enmay, othbay asyay
individualsyay andyay asyay iticscray, andyay ityay ashay oneday uchmay otay olidifysay ethay
ajoritymay alemay opinionyay atthay omenway areyay otnay eativecray artistsyay. Evenyay osethay
enmay owhay achieveyay omesay intellectualyay appreciationyay ofyay ethay estbay emininefay
itingwray indfay atthay, inyay eneralgay, eythay, ikelay Awthornehay, annotcay acceptyay ityay
ompletelycay. Oneyay ightmay aysay atthay, eginningbay ithway Orothyday Ichardsonray andyay
Atherinekay Ansfieldmay, omenway avehay attemptedyay otay aiseray essentiallyyay emininefay
itingwray otay ayay evellay ofyay absoluteyay ualityqay. Onay etensepray illway ebay ademay erehay otay
acetray isthay owinggray endtray, oryay otay eparatesay ethay oremay omfray ethay esslay
eminine�“fay�? authorsyay. Ethay endtray ashay unray otay oremay andyay oremay ubjectivesay
ontentcay, asyay isyay evidentyay inyay uchsay urrentcay authorsyay asyay Irleyshay Acksonjay andyay
Eanjay Affordstay.

Ariancevay isyay, ofyay oursecay, oremay anthay anyyay otheryay ubjectsay, exclusivelyyay
emininefay. Adhay ityay otnay ufferedsay ethay andicaphay ofyay abootay, obablypray oremay
iteraturelay ofyay ighhay ualityqay ouldway avehay owngray upyay aroundyay ityay. Indeedyay, adhay
uchsay inhibitedyay iritsspay asyay Emilyyay Ont�bray�, Emilyyay Ickinsonday andyay Oseray
O’neillyay, otay entionmay onlyyay ethay ostmay obviousyay, eenbay esslay aralyzedpay
emotionallyyay, eythay ightmay avehay adhay icherray experienceyay omfray ichwhay otay itewray
asyay ellway asyay oremay ouragecay otay itewray aboutyay ityay. Isthay isyay otnay ayay eaplay orfay ethay
ultivationcay ofyay eitheryay omosexualhay experienceyay oryay ariantvay iteraturelay. Ityay isyay
implysay ayay uggestionsay atthay ifyay osethay omenway owhay areyay irremediablyyay osay
onstitutedcay, andyay owhay appenhay alsoyay otay ebay artistsyay, ereway esslay ackledshay, ethay
orld’sway iteraturelay ightmay ebay ybay atthay ightslay egreeday ethay icherray. Eforebay
atthay omescay otay asspay, ofyay oursecay, otway angeschay ustmay occuryay: ublicpay opinionyay inyay
eneralgay ustmay omecay oserclay otay ethay ostmay enientlay ychiatricpsay evaluationyay ofyay
ariancevay. Andyay enmay ustmay ecomebay awareyay ofyay ethay unconsciousyay ejudicepray inyay
eirthay iterarylay evaluationyay ofyay allyay, andyay articularlypay ofyay ariantvay, emininefay
itingwray. Ifyay eythay annotcay urmountsay isthay ejudicepray, eythay ouldshay eavelay ethay
ariantvay ieldfay otay emininefay iticscray. Alsoyay, oremay omenway ouldshay enteryay ethay
ieldfay ofyay iterarylay iticismcray.

                   *       *       *       *       *

Otay oncludecay: eway avehay eensay atthay emininefay ariancevay ashay ersistedpay inyay umanhay
experienceyay incesay ethay eginningbay ofyay iterarylay ecordsray. Ityay ashay epeatedlyray
arousedyay ufficientsay interestyay otay ebay ethay ubjectsay ofyay iteraturelay, omesay ofyay ityay
oodgay enoughyay otay avehay urvivedsay oughthray anymay enturiescay againstyay allyay oddsyay.
Ethay oddsyay avehay eenbay ofyay otway eryvay ifferentday orts—religioussay abootay andyay
asculinemay istasteday. Ethay irstfay operatedyay ingentlystray omfray ethay eginningbay ofyay
ethay Istianchray erayay otay ethay Enaissanceray, andyay isyay otnay yetyay eadday. Ethay econdsay
asway apparentyay inyay assicalclay imestay andyay ashay eenbay especiallyyay evidentyay eneverwhay
ethay eo-classicalnay iritspay evailedpray, orfay atthay iritspay exaltsyay objectiveyay andyay
intellectualyay experienceyay, essesstray ethay ysicalphay aspectsyay ofyay exsay, andyay isyay
ontemptuouscay ofyay ubjectivesay emotionalyay eoccupationpray. Inyay Omanticray eriodspay
enwhay emotionyay asway orified—thatglay isyay, enwhay essentiallyyay emininefay aluesvay
evailed—variantpray iteraturelay ashay atyay eastlay omparativelycay ourishedflay. Inyay
ouryay ownyay ayday ethay ancientyay eligiousray abootay ashay eakenedway andyay ychiatricpsay
aluesvay avehay otay omesay extentyay eenbay ubstitutedsay. Ownay immaturityyay atherray anthay
insay isyay ethay ocio-ethicalsay argumentyay againstyay ariancevay. Otay eachyay ageyay itsyay ownyay
ewnay isdomway eemssay ayay ocialsay anaceapay oremay ogentcay anthay allyay atthay avehay onegay
eforebay, utbay onenay ashay usheredyay inyay Utopiayay. Omentarilymay, oweverhay, eway avehay
attained—oryay atyay eastlay ityay eemssay otay usyay atthay eway avehay attained—toyay omewhatsay
oremay olerancetay anthay ethay elderyay oralistsmay. Ifyay ariancevay isyay otay ebay alwaysyay
ithway usyay, almcay acceptanceyay ofyay atthay actfay aymay ecomebay asyay evalentpray asyay ethay
ecognitionray ofyay umanhay evolutionyay ashay omecay otay ebay. Andyay incesay ariantvay
iterarylay expressionyay appearsyay equallyyay ersistentpay, ityay aymay onceivablycay
ecomebay ayay arrownay utbay imilarlysay ecognizedray ieldfay, ermittedpay otay omecay otay
uitionfray accordingyay otay itsyay ownyay awslay, andyay otay ontributecay ethay estbay ofyay ichwhay
ityay isyay apablecay otay ethay otaltay umsay ofyay orldway iteraturelay.

                             Ibliographiesbay


* Anyay asteriskyay indicatesyay itlestay ofyay ichwhay onlyyay ayay eviewray, anyay abstractyay, oryay ayay
ispr�cay asway eensay.

ist_lay Ayay_: Imarypray elletristicbay itlestay, inyay omesay asescay includingyay
iographicalbay oryay iticalcray aterialmay. Ethay editionsyay istedlay areyay osethay usedyay inyay
ethay udystay. Originalyay atesday ofyay ublicationpay oryay ompositioncay appearyay inyay ethay
exttay.

ist_lay Bay_: Ibliographicbay, iographicalbay, iticalcray andyay istoricalhay
eferencesray, includingyay ychiatricpsay udiesstay ofyay ecificspay authorsyay oryay itlestay.

ist_lay Cay_: Edicalmay, ychologicalpsay, ychiatricpsay andyay ychoanalyticpsay
ackgroundbay eadingray, ithway ecialspay eferenceray otay etiologyyay e.g(ay., inyay udiesstay
ofyay exclusivelyyay alemay ubjectssay.)
